GV00avs___u:0: (AVŚ_1,1.1a) ye triṣaptāḥ pariyanti viśvā rūpāṇi bibhrataḥ |
GV00avs___u:1: (AVŚ_1,1.1c) vācas patir balā teṣāṃ tanvo adya dadhātu me ||1||
GV00avs___u:2: (AVŚ_1,1.2a) punar ehi vacas pate devena manasā saha |
GV00avs___u:3: (AVŚ_1,1.2c) vasoṣ pate ni ramaya mayy evāstu mayi śrutam ||2||
GV00avs___u:4: (AVŚ_1,1.3a) ihaivābhi vi tanūbhe ārtnī iva jyayā |
GV00avs___u:5: (AVŚ_1,1.3c) vācas patir ni yachatu mayy evāstu mayi śrutam ||3||
GV00avs___u:6: (AVŚ_1,1.4a) upahūto vācas patir upāsmān vācaspatir hvayatām |
GV00avs___u:7: (AVŚ_1,1.4c) saṃ śrutena gamemahi mā śrutena vi rādhiṣi ||4||
GV00avs___u:9: (AVŚ_1,2.1c) vidmo ṣv asya mātaraṃ pṛthivīṃ bhūrivarpasam ||1||
GV00avs___u:10: (AVŚ_1,2.2a) jyāke pari ṇo namāśmānaṃ tanvaṃ kṛdhi |
GV00avs___u:11: (AVŚ_1,2.2c) vīḍur varīyo 'rātīr apa dveṣāṃsy ā kṛdhi ||2||
GV00avs___u:12: (AVŚ_1,2.3a) vṛkṣaṃ yad gāvaḥ pariṣasvajānā anusphuraṃ śaraṃ arcanty ṛbhum |
GV00avs___u:14: (AVŚ_1,2.4a) yathā dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntas tiṣṭhati tejanam |
GV00avs___u:15: (AVŚ_1,2.4c) evā rogaṃ cāsrāvaṃ cāntas tiṣṭhatu muñja it ||4||
GV00avs___u:17: (AVŚ_1,3.1c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti ||1||
GV00avs___u:19: (AVŚ_1,3.2c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti ||2||
GV00avs___u:21: (AVŚ_1,3.3c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti ||3||
GV00avs___u:23: (AVŚ_1,3.4c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti ||4||
GV00avs___u:25: (AVŚ_1,3.5c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti ||5||
GV00avs___u:26: (AVŚ_1,3.6a) yad āntreṣu gavīnyor yad vastāv adhi saṃśritam |
GV00avs___u:27: (AVŚ_1,3.6c) evā te mūtraṃ mucyatāṃ bahir bāl iti sarvakam ||6||
GV00avs___u:28: (AVŚ_1,3.7a) pra te bhinadmi mehanaṃ vartraṃ veśantyā iva |
GV00avs___u:29: (AVŚ_1,3.7c) evā te mūtraṃ mucyatāṃ bahir bāl iti sarvakam ||7||
GV00avs___u:31: (AVŚ_1,3.8c) evā te mūtraṃ mucyatāṃ bahir bāl iti sarvakam ||8||
GV00avs___u:33: (AVŚ_1,3.9c) evā te mūtraṃ mucyatāṃ bahir bāl iti sarvakam ||9||
GV00avs___u:36: (AVŚ_1,4.2a) amūr yā upa sūrye yābhir vā sūryaḥ saha |
GV00avs___u:38: (AVŚ_1,4.3a) apo devīr upa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ |
GV00avs___u:41: (AVŚ_1,4.4c) apām uta praśastibhir aśvā bhavatha vājino gāvo bhavatha vājinīḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:42: (AVŚ_1,5.1a) āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvas tā na ūrje dadhātana |
GV00avs___u:44: (AVŚ_1,5.2a) yo vaḥ śivatamo rasas tasya bhājayateha naḥ |
GV00avs___u:46: (AVŚ_1,5.3a) tasmā araṃ gamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha |
GV00avs___u:50: (AVŚ_1,6.1a) śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye |
GV00avs___u:52: (AVŚ_1,6.2a) apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā |
GV00avs___u:54: (AVŚ_1,6.3a) āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama |
GV00avs___u:56: (AVŚ_1,6.4a) śaṃ na āpo dhanvanyāḥ śam u santv anūpyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:57: (AVŚ_1,6.4c) śaṃ naḥ khanitrimā āpaḥ śam u yāḥ kumbha ābhṛtāḥ |
GV00avs___u:59: (AVŚ_1,7.1a) stuvānam agna ā vaha yātudhānaṃ kimīdinam |
GV00avs___u:60: (AVŚ_1,7.1c) tvaṃ hi deva vandito hantā dasyor babhūvitha ||1||
GV00avs___u:62: (AVŚ_1,7.2c) agne taulasya prāśāna yātudhānān vi lāpaya ||2||
GV00avs___u:63: (AVŚ_1,7.3a) vi lapantu yātudhānā attriṇo ye kimīdinaḥ |
GV00avs___u:64: (AVŚ_1,7.3c) athedam agne no havir indraś ca prati haryatam ||3||
GV00avs___u:65: (AVŚ_1,7.4a) agniḥ pūrva ā rabhatāṃ prendro nudatu bāhumān |
GV00avs___u:66: (AVŚ_1,7.4c) bravītu sarvo yātumān ayam asmīty etya ||4||
GV00avs___u:67: (AVŚ_1,7.5a) paśyāma te vīryaṃ jātavedaḥ pra ṇo brūhi yātudhānān nṛcakṣaḥ
GV00avs___u:68: (AVŚ_1,7.5c) tvayā sarve paritaptāḥ purastāt ta ā yantu prabruvāṇā upedam
GV00avs___u:70: (AVŚ_1,7.6c) dūto no agne bhūtvā yātudhānān vi lāpaya ||6||
GV00avs___u:71: (AVŚ_1,7.7a) tvam agne yātudhānān upabaddhāṃ ihā vaha |
GV00avs___u:73: (AVŚ_1,8.1a) idaṃ havir yātudhānān nādī phenam ivā vahat |
GV00avs___u:74: (AVŚ_1,8.1c) ya idaṃ strī pumān akar iha sa stuvatāṃ janaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:75: (AVŚ_1,8.2a) ayaṃ stuvāna āgamad imaṃ sma prati haryata |
GV00avs___u:77: (AVŚ_1,8.3a) yātudhānasya somapa jahi prajāṃ nayasva ca |
GV00avs___u:78: (AVŚ_1,8.3c) ni stuvānasya pātaya param akṣy utāvaram ||3||
GV00avs___u:79: (AVŚ_1,8.4a) yatraiṣām agne janimāni vettha guhā satām attriṇāṃ jātavedaḥ |
GV00avs___u:80: (AVŚ_1,8.4c) tāṃs tvaṃ brahmaṇā vāvṛdhāno jahy eṣāṃ śatatarham agne ||4||
GV00avs___u:81: (AVŚ_1,9.1a) asmin vasu vasavo dhārayantv indraḥ pūṣā varuṇo mitro agniḥ |
GV00avs___u:82: (AVŚ_1,9.1c) imam ādityā uta viśve ca devā uttarasmin jyotiṣi dhārayantu
GV00avs___u:83: (AVŚ_1,9.2a) asya devāḥ pradiśi jyotir astu sūryo agnir uta vā hiraṇyam |
GV00avs___u:84: (AVŚ_1,9.2c) sapatnā asmad adhare bhavantūttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam
GV00avs___u:85: (AVŚ_1,9.3a) yenendrāya samabharaḥ payāṃsy uttamena brahmaṇā jātavedaḥ |
GV00avs___u:86: (AVŚ_1,9.3c) tena tvam agna iha vardhayemaṃ sajātānāṃ śraiṣṭhya ā dhehy
GV00avs___u:88: (AVŚ_1,9.4a) aiṣāṃ yajñam uta varco dade 'haṃ rāyas poṣam uta cittāny agne |
GV00avs___u:89: (AVŚ_1,9.4c) sapatnā asmad adhare bhavantūttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam
GV00avs___u:90: (AVŚ_1,10.1a) ayaṃ devānām asuro vi rājati vaśā hi satyā varuṇasya rājñaḥ
GV00avs___u:91: (AVŚ_1,10.1c) tatas pari brahmaṇā śāśadāna ugrasya manyor ud imaṃ nayāmi
GV00avs___u:92: (AVŚ_1,10.2a) namas te rajan varuṇāstu manyave viśvaṃ hy ugra nicikeṣi
GV00avs___u:94: (AVŚ_1,10.2c) sahasram anyān pra suvāmi sākaṃ śataṃ jīvāti śaradas tavāyam
GV00avs___u:96: (AVŚ_1,10.3c) rājñas tvā satyadharmaṇo muñcāmi varuṇād aham ||3||
GV00avs___u:97: (AVŚ_1,10.4a) muñcāmi tvā vaiśvānarād arṇavān mahatas pari |
GV00avs___u:98: (AVŚ_1,10.4c) sajātān ugrehā vada brahma cāpa cikīhi naḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:99: (AVŚ_1,11.1a) vaṣaṭ te pūṣann asmint sūtāv aryamā hotā kṛṇotu vedhāḥ |
GV00avs___u:100: (AVŚ_1,11.1c) sisratāṃ nāry ṛtaprajātā vi parvāṇi jihatāṃ sūtavā u ||1||
GV00avs___u:101: (AVŚ_1,11.2a) catasro divaḥ pradiśaś catasro bhūmyā uta |
GV00avs___u:102: (AVŚ_1,11.2c) devā garbhaṃ sam airayan taṃ vy ūrṇuvantu sūtave ||2||
GV00avs___u:103: (AVŚ_1,11.3a) sūṣā vy ūrṇotu vi yoniṃ hāpayāmasi |
GV00avs___u:104: (AVŚ_1,11.3c) śrathayā sūṣaṇe tvam ava tvaṃ biṣkale sṛja ||3||
GV00avs___u:105: (AVŚ_1,11.4a) neva māṃse na pīvasi neva majjasv āhatam |
GV00avs___u:106: (AVŚ_1,11.4c) avaitu pṛśni śevalaṃ śune jarāyv attave 'va jarāyu padyatām ||4||
GV00avs___u:107: (AVŚ_1,11.5a) vi te bhinadmi mehanaṃ vi yoniṃ vi gavīnike |
GV00avs___u:108: (AVŚ_1,11.5c) vi mātaraṃ ca putraṃ ca vi kumāraṃ jarāyuṇāva jarāyu
GV00avs___u:110: (AVŚ_1,11.6a) yathā vāto yathā mano yathā patanti pakṣiṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:111: (AVŚ_1,11.6c) evā tvaṃ daśamāsya sākaṃ jarāyuṇā patāva jarāyu padyatām ||6||
GV00avs___u:112: (AVŚ_1,12.1a) jarāyujaḥ prathama usriyo vṛṣā vātābhrajā stanayann eti vṛṣṭyā |
GV00avs___u:113: (AVŚ_1,12.1c) sa no mṛḍāti tanva ṛjugo rujan ya ekam ojas tredhā vicakrame ||1||
GV00avs___u:114: (AVŚ_1,12.2a) aṅgeaṅge śociṣā śiśriyāṇaṃ namasyantas tvā haviṣā vidhema |
GV00avs___u:115: (AVŚ_1,12.2c) aṅkānt samaṅkān haviṣā vidhema yo agrabhīt parvāsyā grabhītā ||2||
GV00avs___u:116: (AVŚ_1,12.3a) muñca śīrṣaktyā uta kāsa enaṃ paruṣparur āviveśā yo asya |
GV00avs___u:117: (AVŚ_1,12.3c) yo abhrajā vātajā yaś ca śuṣmo vanaspatīnt sacatāṃ parvatāṃś
GV00avs___u:119: (AVŚ_1,12.4a) śaṃ me parasmai gātrāya śam astv avarāya me |
GV00avs___u:120: (AVŚ_1,12.4c) śaṃ me caturbhyo aṅgebhyaḥ śam astu tanve mama ||4||
GV00avs___u:121: (AVŚ_1,13.1a) namas te astu vidyute namas te stanayitnave |
GV00avs___u:122: (AVŚ_1,13.1c) namas te astv aśmane yenā dūḍāśe asyasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:123: (AVŚ_1,13.2a) namas te pravato napād yatas tapaḥ samūhasi |
GV00avs___u:124: (AVŚ_1,13.2c) mṛḍayā nas tanūbhyo mayas tokebhyas kṛdhi ||2||
GV00avs___u:125: (AVŚ_1,13.3a) pravato napān nama evāstu tubhyaṃ namas te hetaye tapuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:126: (AVŚ_1,13.3c) vidma te dhāma paramaṃ guhā yat samudre antar nihitāsi
GV00avs___u:128: (AVŚ_1,13.4a) yāṃ tvā devā asṛjanta viśva iṣuṃ kṛṇvānā asanāya dhṛṣṇum |
GV00avs___u:129: (AVŚ_1,13.4c) sā no mṛḍa vidathe gṛṇānā tasyai te namo astu devi ||4||
GV00avs___u:130: (AVŚ_1,14.1a) bhagam asyā varca ādiṣy adhi vṛkṣād iva srajam |
GV00avs___u:131: (AVŚ_1,14.1c) mahābudhna iva parvato jyok pitṛṣv āstām ||1||
GV00avs___u:132: (AVŚ_1,14.2a) eṣā te rājan kanyā vadhūr ni dhūyatām yama |
GV00avs___u:133: (AVŚ_1,14.2c) sā mātur badhyatāṃ gṛhe 'tho bhrātur atho pituḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:134: (AVŚ_1,14.3a) eṣā te kulapā rājan tām u te pari dadmasi |
GV00avs___u:135: (AVŚ_1,14.3c) jyok pitṛṣv āsātā ā śīrṣṇaḥ śamopyāt ||3||
GV00avs___u:136: (AVŚ_1,14.4a) asitasya te brahmaṇā kaśyapasya gayasya ca |
GV00avs___u:137: (AVŚ_1,14.4c) antaḥkośam iva jāmayo 'pi nahyāmi te bhagam ||4 ||
GV00avs___u:138: (AVŚ_1,15.1a) saṃ saṃ sravantu sindhavaḥ saṃ vātāḥ saṃ patatriṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:139: (AVŚ_1,15.1c) imaṃ yajñaṃ pradivo me juṣantāṃ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi ||1||
GV00avs___u:140: (AVŚ_1,15.2a) ihaiva havam ā yāta ma iha saṃsrāvaṇā utemaṃ vardhayatā
GV00avs___u:142: (AVŚ_1,15.2c) ihaitu sarvo yaḥ paśur asmin tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:143: (AVŚ_1,15.3a) ye nadīnāṃ saṃsravanty utsāsaḥ sadam akṣitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:144: (AVŚ_1,15.3c) tebhir me sarvaiḥ saṃsrāvair dhanaṃ saṃ srāvayāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:145: (AVŚ_1,15.4a) ye sarpiṣaḥ saṃsravanti kṣīrasya codakasya ca
GV00avs___u:146: (AVŚ_1,15.4b) tebhir me sarvaiḥ saṃsrāvair dhanaṃ saṃ srāvayāmasi ||4||
GV00avs___u:148: (AVŚ_1,16.1c) agnis turīyo yātuhā so asmabhyam adhi bravat ||1||
GV00avs___u:150: (AVŚ_1,16.2c) sīsaṃ ma indraḥ prāyachat tad aṅga yātucātanam ||2||
GV00avs___u:151: (AVŚ_1,16.3a) idaṃ viṣkandhaṃ sahata idaṃ bādhate attriṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:152: (AVŚ_1,16.3c) anena viśvā sasahe yā jātāni piśācyāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:153: (AVŚ_1,16.4a) yadi no gāṃ haṃsi yady aśvaṃ yadi pūruṣam |
GV00avs___u:154: (AVŚ_1,16.4c) taṃ tvā sīsena vidhyāmo yathā no 'so avīrahā ||4||
GV00avs___u:155: (AVŚ_1,17.1a) amūr yā yanti yoṣito hirā lohitavāsasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:157: (AVŚ_1,17.2a) tiṣṭhāvare tiṣṭha para uta tvaṃ tiṣṭha madhyame |
GV00avs___u:158: (AVŚ_1,17.2c) kaniṣṭhikā ca tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhād id dhamanir mahī ||2||
GV00avs___u:160: (AVŚ_1,17.3c) asthur in madhyamā imāḥ sākam antā araṃsata ||3||
GV00avs___u:161: (AVŚ_1,17.4a) pari vaḥ sikatāvatī dhanūr bṛhaty akramīt |
GV00avs___u:163: (AVŚ_1,18.1a) nir lakṣmyaṃ lalāmyaṃ nir arātiṃ suvāmasi |
GV00avs___u:164: (AVŚ_1,18.1c) atha yā bhadrā tāni naḥ prajāyā arātiṃ nayāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:165: (AVŚ_1,18.2a) nir araṇiṃ savitā sāviṣak pador nir hastayor varuṇo mitro
GV00avs___u:167: (AVŚ_1,18.2c) nir asmabhyam anumatī rarāṇā premāṃ devā asāviṣuḥ saubhagāya ||2||
GV00avs___u:168: (AVŚ_1,18.3a) yat ta ātmani tanvāṃ ghoram asti yad vā keśeṣu praticakṣaṇe vā |
GV00avs___u:169: (AVŚ_1,18.3c) sarvaṃ tad vācāpa hanmo vayaṃ devas tvā savitā sūdayatu
GV00avs___u:172: (AVŚ_1,19.1a) mā no vidan vivyādhino mo abhivyādhino vidan |
GV00avs___u:173: (AVŚ_1,19.1c) ārāc charavyā asmad viṣūcīr indra pātaya ||1||
GV00avs___u:174: (AVŚ_1,19.2a) viṣvañco asmac charavaḥ patantu ye astā ye cāsyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:176: (AVŚ_1,19.3a) yo naḥ svo yo araṇaḥ sajāta uta niṣṭyo yo asmāṃ abhidāsati |
GV00avs___u:178: (AVŚ_1,19.4a) yaḥ sapatno yo 'sapatno yaś ca dviṣan chapāti naḥ |
GV00avs___u:179: (AVŚ_1,19.4c) devās taṃ sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mamāntaram ||4||
GV00avs___u:180: (AVŚ_1,20.1a) adārasṛd bhavatu deva somāsmin yajñe maruto mṛḍatā naḥ |
GV00avs___u:181: (AVŚ_1,20.1c) mā no vidad abhibhā mo aśastir mā no vidad vṛjinā dveṣyā yā
GV00avs___u:183: (AVŚ_1,20.2c) yuvaṃ taṃ mitrāvaruṇāv asmad yāvayataṃ pari ||2||
GV00avs___u:184: (AVŚ_1,20.3a) itaś ca yad amutaś ca yad vadhaṃ varuṇa yāvaya |
GV00avs___u:185: (AVŚ_1,20.3c) vi mahac charma yacha varīyo yāvayā vadham ||3||
GV00avs___u:186: (AVŚ_1,20.4a) śāsa itthā mahāṃ asy amitrasāho astṛtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:187: (AVŚ_1,20.4c) na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana ||4||
GV00avs___u:188: (AVŚ_1,21.1a) svastidā viśāṃ patir vṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī |
GV00avs___u:189: (AVŚ_1,21.1c) vṛṣendraḥ pura etu naḥ somapā abhayaṃkaraḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:190: (AVŚ_1,21.2a) vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yacha pṛtanyataḥ |
GV00avs___u:191: (AVŚ_1,21.2c) adhamaṃ gamayā tamo yo asmāṃ abhidāsati ||2||
GV00avs___u:192: (AVŚ_1,21.3a) vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja |
GV00avs___u:195: (AVŚ_1,21.4c) vi mahac charma yacha varīyo yāvayā vadham ||4||
GV00avs___u:196: (AVŚ_1,22.1a) anu sūryam ud ayatāṃ hṛddyoto harimā ca te |
GV00avs___u:197: (AVŚ_1,22.1c) go rohitasya varṇena tena tvā pari dadhmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:198: (AVŚ_1,22.2a) pari tvā rohitair varṇair dīrghāyutvāya dadhmasi |
GV00avs___u:199: (AVŚ_1,22.2c) yathāyam arapā asad atho aharito bhuvat ||2||
GV00avs___u:200: (AVŚ_1,22.3a) yā rohiṇīr devatyā gāvo yā uta rohiṇīḥ |
GV00avs___u:201: (AVŚ_1,22.3c) rūpaṃrūpaṃ vayovayas tābhiṣ ṭvā pari dadhmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:203: (AVŚ_1,22.4c) atho hāridraveṣu te harimāṇaṃ ni dadhmasi ||4||
GV00avs___u:204: (AVŚ_1,23.1a) naktaṃjātāsi oṣadhe rāme kṛṣṇe asikni ca |
GV00avs___u:205: (AVŚ_1,23.1c) idaṃ rajani rajaya kilāsaṃ palitaṃ ca yat ||1||
GV00avs___u:206: (AVŚ_1,23.2a) kilāsaṃ ca palitaṃ ca nir ito nāśayā pṛṣat |
GV00avs___u:207: (AVŚ_1,23.2c) ā tvā svo viśatāṃ varṇaḥ parā śuklāni pātaya ||2||
GV00avs___u:208: (AVŚ_1,23.3a) asitaṃ te pralayanam āsthānam asitaṃ tava |
GV00avs___u:209: (AVŚ_1,23.3c) asiknī asy oṣadhe nir ito nāśayā pṛṣat ||3||
GV00avs___u:210: (AVŚ_1,23.4a) asthijasya kilāsasya tanūjasya ca yat tvaci |
GV00avs___u:211: (AVŚ_1,23.4c) dūṣyā kṛtasya brahmaṇā lakṣma śvetam anīnaśam ||4||
GV00avs___u:212: (AVŚ_1,24.1a) suparṇo jātaḥ prathamas tasya tvaṃ pittam āsitha |
GV00avs___u:213: (AVŚ_1,24.1c) tad āsurī yudhā jitā rūpaṃ cakre vanaspatīn ||1||
GV00avs___u:214: (AVŚ_1,24.2a) āsurī cakre prathamedaṃ kilāsabheṣajam idaṃ kilāsanāśanam |
GV00avs___u:216: (AVŚ_1,24.3a) sarūpā nāma te mātā sarūpo nāma te pitā |
GV00avs___u:217: (AVŚ_1,24.3c) sarūpakṛt tvam oṣadhe sā sarūpam idaṃ kṛdhi ||3||
GV00avs___u:219: (AVŚ_1,24.4c) idam ū ṣu pra sādhaya punā rūpāṇi kalpaya ||4||
GV00avs___u:220: (AVŚ_1,25.1a) yad agnir āpo adahat praviśya yatrākṛṇvan dharmadhṛto namāṃsi |
GV00avs___u:221: (AVŚ_1,25.1c) tatra ta āhuḥ paramaṃ janitraṃ sa naḥ saṃvidvān pari vṛṅgdhi takman ||1||
GV00avs___u:222: (AVŚ_1,25.2a) yady arcir yadi vāsi śociḥ śakalyeṣi yadi vā te janitram |
GV00avs___u:223: (AVŚ_1,25.2c) hrūḍur nāmāsi haritasya deva sa naḥ saṃvidvān pari vṛṅgdhi
GV00avs___u:225: (AVŚ_1,25.3a) yadi śoko yadi vābhiśoko yadi vā rājño varuṇasyāsi putraḥ |
GV00avs___u:226: (AVŚ_1,25.3c) hrūḍur nāmāsi haritasya deva sa naḥ saṃvidvān pari vṛṅgdhi
GV00avs___u:228: (AVŚ_1,25.4a) namaḥ śītāya takmane namo rūrāya śociṣe kṛṇomi |
GV00avs___u:229: (AVŚ_1,25.4c) yo anyedyur ubhayadyur abhyeti tṛtīyakāya namo astu takmane ||4||
GV00avs___u:230: (AVŚ_1,26.1a) āre 'sāv asmad astu hetir devāso asat |
GV00avs___u:232: (AVŚ_1,26.2a) sakhāsāv asmabhyam astu rātiḥ sakhendro bhagaḥ |
GV00avs___u:234: (AVŚ_1,26.3a) yūyam naḥ pravato napān marutaḥ sūryatvacasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:239: (AVŚ_1,27.1c) tāsām jarāyubhir vayam akṣyāv api vyayāmasy aghāyoḥ paripanthinaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:240: (AVŚ_1,27.2a) viṣūcy etu kṛntatī pinākam iva bibhratī |
GV00avs___u:242: (AVŚ_1,27.3a) na bahavaḥ sam aśakan nārbhakā abhi dādhṛṣuḥ |
GV00avs___u:244: (AVŚ_1,27.4a) pretaṃ pādau pra sphurataṃ vahataṃ pṛṇato gṛhān |
GV00avs___u:248: (AVŚ_1,28.2a) prati daha yātudhānān prati deva kimīdinaḥ |
GV00avs___u:250: (AVŚ_1,28.3a) yā śaśāpa śapanena yāghaṃ mūram ādadhe |
GV00avs___u:251: (AVŚ_1,28.3c) yā rasasya haraṇāya jātam ārebhe tokam attu sā ||3||
GV00avs___u:252: (AVŚ_1,28.4a) putram attu yātudhānīḥ svasāram uta naptyam |
GV00avs___u:253: (AVŚ_1,28.4c) adhā mitho vikeśyo vi ghnatāṃ yātudhānyo vi tṛhyantām arāyyaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:256: (AVŚ_1,29.2a) abhivṛtya sapatnān abhi yā no arātayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:257: (AVŚ_1,29.2c) abhi pṛtanyantaṃ tiṣṭhābhi yo no durasyati ||2||
GV00avs___u:258: (AVŚ_1,29.3a) abhi tvā devaḥ savitābhi ṣomo avīvṛdhat |
GV00avs___u:259: (AVŚ_1,29.3c) abhi tvā viśvā bhūtāny abhīvarto yathāsasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:262: (AVŚ_1,29.5a) ud asau sūryo agād ud idaṃ māmakaṃ vacaḥ |
GV00avs___u:265: (AVŚ_1,29.6c) yathāham eṣāṃ vīrāṇāṃ virājāni janasya ca ||6||
GV00avs___u:266: (AVŚ_1,30.1a) viśve devā vasavo rakṣatemam utādityā jāgṛta yūyam asmin |
GV00avs___u:267: (AVŚ_1,30.1c) memaṃ sanābhir uta vānyanābhir memaṃ prāpat pauruṣeyo vadho yaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:268: (AVŚ_1,30.2a) ye vo devāḥ pitaro ye ca putrāḥ sacetaso me śṛṇutedam uktam |
GV00avs___u:269: (AVŚ_1,30.2c) sarvebhyo vaḥ pari dadāmy etaṃ svasty enaṃ jarase vahātha
GV00avs___u:270: (AVŚ_1,30.3a) ye devā divi ṣṭha ye pṛthivyāṃ ye antarikṣa oṣadhīṣu paśuṣv apsv antaḥ |
GV00avs___u:271: (AVŚ_1,30.3c) te kṛṇuta jarasam āyur asmai śatam anyān pari vṛṇaktu mṛtyūn
GV00avs___u:272: (AVŚ_1,30.4a) yeṣāṃ prayājā uta vānuyājā hutabhāgā ahutādaś ca devāḥ |
GV00avs___u:273: (AVŚ_1,30.4c) yeṣāṃ vaḥ pañca pradiśo vibhaktās tān vo asmai satrasadaḥ
GV00avs___u:277: (AVŚ_1,31.2a) ya āśānām āśāpālāś catvāra sthana devāḥ |
GV00avs___u:279: (AVŚ_1,31.3a) asrāmas tvā haviṣā yajāmy aśloṇas tvā ghṛtena juhomi |
GV00avs___u:280: (AVŚ_1,31.3c) ya āśānām āśāpālas turīyo devaḥ sa naḥ subhūtam eha vakṣat
GV00avs___u:281: (AVŚ_1,31.4a) svasti mātra uta pitre no astu svasti gobhyo jagate
GV00avs___u:283: (AVŚ_1,31.4c) viśvam subhūtam suvidatraṃ no astu jyog eva dṛśema sūryam
GV00avs___u:284: (AVŚ_1,32.1a) idaṃ janāso vidatha mahad brahma vadiṣyati |
GV00avs___u:285: (AVŚ_1,32.1c) na tat pṛthivyāṃ no divi yena prāṇanti vīrudhaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:287: (AVŚ_1,32.2c) āsthānam asya bhūtasya viduṣ ṭad vedhaso na vā ||2||
GV00avs___u:288: (AVŚ_1,32.3a) yad rodasī rejamāne bhūmiś ca niratakṣatam |
GV00avs___u:289: (AVŚ_1,32.3c) ārdraṃ tad adya sarvadā samudrasyeva śrotyāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:290: (AVŚ_1,32.4a) viśvam anyām abhīvāra tad anyasyām adhi śritam |
GV00avs___u:291: (AVŚ_1,32.4c) dive ca viśvavedase pṛthivyai cākaraṃ namaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:292: (AVŚ_1,33.1a) hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakā yāsu jātaḥ savitā yāsv agniḥ |
GV00avs___u:293: (AVŚ_1,33.1c) yā agniṃ garbhaṃ dadhire suvarṇās tā na āpaḥ śaṃ syonā bhavantu ||1||
GV00avs___u:294: (AVŚ_1,33.2a) yāsāṃ rājā varuṇo yāti madhye satyānṛte avapaśyan janānām |
GV00avs___u:295: (AVŚ_1,33.2c) yā agniṃ garbhaṃ dadhire suvarṇās tā na āpaḥ śaṃ syonā bhavantu ||2||
GV00avs___u:296: (AVŚ_1,33.3a) yāsāṃ devā divi kṛṇvanti bhakṣaṃ yā antarikṣe bahudhā bhavanti |
GV00avs___u:297: (AVŚ_1,33.3c) yā agniṃ garbhaṃ dadhire suvarṇās tā na āpaḥ śaṃ syonā bhavantu ||3||
GV00avs___u:298: (AVŚ_1,33.4a) śivena mā cakṣuṣā paśyatāpaḥ śivayā tanvopa spṛśata tvacaṃ me |
GV00avs___u:299: (AVŚ_1,33.4c) ghṛtaścutaḥ śucayo yāḥ pāvakās tā na āpaḥ śaṃ syonā bhavantu
GV00avs___u:300: (AVŚ_1,34.1a) iyaṃ vīrun madhujātā madhunā tvā khanāmasi |
GV00avs___u:301: (AVŚ_1,34.1c) madhor adhi prajātāsi sā no madhumatas kṛdhi ||1||
GV00avs___u:302: (AVŚ_1,34.2a) jihvāyā agre madhu me jihvāmūle madhūlakam |
GV00avs___u:303: (AVŚ_1,34.2c) mamed aha kratāv aso mama cittam upāyasi ||2||
GV00avs___u:304: (AVŚ_1,34.3a) madhuman me nikramaṇaṃ madhuman me parāyaṇam |
GV00avs___u:307: (AVŚ_1,34.4c) mām it kila tvaṃ vanāḥ śākhāṃ madhumatīm iva ||4||
GV00avs___u:309: (AVŚ_1,34.5c) yathā māṃ kaminy aso yathā man nāpagā asaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:310: (AVŚ_1,35.1a) yad ābadhnan dākṣāyaṇā hiraṇyaṃ śatānīkāya sumanasyamānāḥ |
GV00avs___u:311: (AVŚ_1,35.1c) tat te badnāmy āyuṣe varcase balāya dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya ||1||
GV00avs___u:312: (AVŚ_1,35.2a) nainaṃ rakṣāṃsi na piśācāḥ sahante devānām ojaḥ prathamajam hy etat |
GV00avs___u:313: (AVŚ_1,35.2c) yo bibharti dākṣāyaṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ sa jīveṣu kṛṇute dīrgham āyuḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:314: (AVŚ_1,35.3a) apāṃ tejo jyotir ojo balaṃ ca vanaspatīnām uta vīryāṇi |
GV00avs___u:315: (AVŚ_1,35.3c) indra ivendriyāṇy adhi dhārayāmo asmin tad dakṣamāṇo bibharad dhiraṇyam ||3||
GV00avs___u:316: (AVŚ_1,35.4a) samānāṃ māsām ṛtubhiṣ ṭvā vayaṃ saṃvatsarasya payasā piparmi |
GV00avs___u:317: (AVŚ_1,35.4c) indrāgnī viśve devās te 'nu manyantām ahṛṇīyamānāḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:318: (AVŚ_2,1.1a) venas tat paśyat paramaṃ guhā yad yatra viśvaṃ bhavaty
GV00avs___u:320: (AVŚ_2,1.1c) idaṃ pṛśnir aduhaj jāyamānāḥ svarvido abhy anūṣata vrāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:321: (AVŚ_2,1.2a) pra tad voced amṛtasya vidvān gandharvo dhāma paramaṃ guhā
GV00avs___u:323: (AVŚ_2,1.2c) trīṇi padāni nihitā guhāsya yas tāni veda sa pituṣ pitāsat
GV00avs___u:324: (AVŚ_2,1.3a) sa naḥ pitā janitā sa uta bandhur dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV00avs___u:325: (AVŚ_2,1.3c) yo devānāṃ nāmadha eka eva taṃ saṃpraśnaṃ bhuvanā yanti sarvā
GV00avs___u:326: (AVŚ_2,1.4a) pari dyāvāpṛthivī sadya āyam upātiṣṭhe prathamajām ṛtasya |
GV00avs___u:327: (AVŚ_2,1.4c) vācam iva vaktari bhuvaneṣṭhā dhāsyur eṣa nanv eṣo agniḥ
GV00avs___u:328: (AVŚ_2,1.5a) pari viśvā bhuvanāny āyam ṛtasya tantuṃ vitataṃ dṛśe kam |
GV00avs___u:329: (AVŚ_2,1.5c) yatra devā amṛtam ānaśānāḥ samāne yonāv adhy airayanta ||5||
GV00avs___u:330: (AVŚ_2,2.1a) divyo gandharvo bhuvanasya yas patir eka eva namasyo vikṣv
GV00avs___u:332: (AVŚ_2,2.1c) taṃ tvā yaumi brahmaṇā divya deva namas te astu divi te sadhastham ||1||
GV00avs___u:333: (AVŚ_2,2.2a) divi spṛṣṭo yajataḥ sūryatvag avayātā haraso daivyasya |
GV00avs___u:334: (AVŚ_2,2.2c) mṛḍāt gandharvo bhuvanasya yas patir eka eva namasyaḥ suśevāḥ
GV00avs___u:335: (AVŚ_2,2.3a) anavadyābhiḥ sam u jagma ābhir apsarāsv api gandharva āsīt |
GV00avs___u:336: (AVŚ_2,2.3c) samudra āsāṃ sadanaṃ ma āhur yataḥ sadya ā ca parā ca yanti
GV00avs___u:337: (AVŚ_2,2.4a) abhriye didyun nakṣatriye yā viśvāvasuṃ gandharvaṃ sacadhve |
GV00avs___u:338: (AVŚ_2,2.4c) tābhyo vo devīr nama it kṛṇomi ||4||
GV00avs___u:341: (AVŚ_2,3.1a) ado yad avadhāvaty avatkam adhi parvatāt |
GV00avs___u:342: (AVŚ_2,3.1c) tat te kṛṇomi bheṣajaṃ subheṣajaṃ yathāsasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:343: (AVŚ_2,3.2a) ād aṅgā kuvid aṅga śataṃ yā bheṣajāni te |
GV00avs___u:344: (AVŚ_2,3.2c) teṣām asi tvam uttamam anāsrāvam arogaṇam ||2||
GV00avs___u:345: (AVŚ_2,3.3a) nīcaiḥ khananty asurā arusrāṇam idaṃ mahat |
GV00avs___u:346: (AVŚ_2,3.3c) tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam anīnaśat ||3||
GV00avs___u:347: (AVŚ_2,3.4a) upajīkā ud bharanti samudrād adhi bheṣajam |
GV00avs___u:348: (AVŚ_2,3.4c) tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam aśīśamat ||4||
GV00avs___u:349: (AVŚ_2,3.5a) arusrāṇam idaṃ mahat pṛthivyā adhy udbhṛtam |
GV00avs___u:350: (AVŚ_2,3.5c) tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam anīnaśat ||5||
GV00avs___u:351: (AVŚ_2,3.6a) śaṃ no bhavantv apa oṣadhayaḥ śivāḥ |
GV00avs___u:352: (AVŚ_2,3.6c) indrasya vajro apa hantu rakṣasa ārād visṛṣṭā iṣavaḥ patantu
GV00avs___u:357: (AVŚ_2,4.2c) maṇiḥ sahasravīryaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:359: (AVŚ_2,4.3c) ayaṃ no viśvabheṣajo jaṅgiḍaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:362: (AVŚ_2,4.5a) śaṇaś ca mā jaṅgiḍaś ca viṣkandhād abhi rakṣatām |
GV00avs___u:363: (AVŚ_2,4.5c) araṇyād anya ābhṛtaḥ kṛṣyā anyo rasebhyaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:365: (AVŚ_2,4.6c) atho sahasvān jaṅgiḍaḥ pra ṇa āyuṃṣi tāriṣat ||6||
GV00avs___u:366: (AVŚ_2,5.1a) indra juṣasva pra vahā yāhi śūra haribhyām |
GV00avs___u:367: (AVŚ_2,5.1c) pibā sutasya mater iha madhoś cakānaś cārur madāya ||1||
GV00avs___u:368: (AVŚ_2,5.2a) indra jaṭharaṃ navyo na pṛṇasva madhor divo na |
GV00avs___u:369: (AVŚ_2,5.2c) asya sutasya svar ṇopa tvā madāḥ suvāco aguḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:370: (AVŚ_2,5.3a) indras turāṣāṇ mitro vṛtraṃ yo jaghāna yatīr na |
GV00avs___u:371: (AVŚ_2,5.3c) bibheda valaṃ bhṛgur na sasahe śatrūn made somasya ||3||
GV00avs___u:372: (AVŚ_2,5.4a) ā tvā viśantu sutāsa indra pṛṇasva kukṣī viḍḍhi śakra dhiyehy ā naḥ |
GV00avs___u:373: (AVŚ_2,5.4c) śrudhī havaṃ giro me juṣasvendra svayugbhir matsveha mahe raṇāya ||4||
GV00avs___u:374: (AVŚ_2,5.5a) indrasya nu pra vocaṃ vīryāṇi yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī |
GV00avs___u:375: (AVŚ_2,5.5c) ahann ahim anu apas tatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām
GV00avs___u:376: (AVŚ_2,5.6a) ahann ahiṃ parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa |
GV00avs___u:377: (AVŚ_2,5.6c) vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudram ava jagmur āpaḥ
GV00avs___u:378: (AVŚ_2,5.7a) vṛṣāyamāṇo avṛṇīta somaṃ trikadrukeṣu apibat sutasya |
GV00avs___u:379: (AVŚ_2,5.7c) ā sāyakaṃ maghavādatta vajram ahann enaṃ prathamajām ahīnām ||7||
GV00avs___u:380: (AVŚ_2,6.1a) samās tvāgna ṛtavo vardhayantu saṃvatsarā ṛṣayo yāni satyā |
GV00avs___u:381: (AVŚ_2,6.1c) saṃ divyena dīdihi rocanena viśvā ā māhi pradiśaś catasraḥ
GV00avs___u:382: (AVŚ_2,6.2a) saṃ cedhyasvāgne pra ca vardhayemam uc ca tiṣṭha mahate
GV00avs___u:384: (AVŚ_2,6.2c) mā te riṣann upasattāro agne brahmāṇas te yaśasaḥ santu mānye
GV00avs___u:385: (AVŚ_2,6.3a) tvām agne vṛṇate brāhmaṇā ime śivo agne saṃvaraṇe bhavā naḥ |
GV00avs___u:386: (AVŚ_2,6.3c) sapatnahāgne abhimātijid bhava sve gaye jāgṛhy aprayuchan
GV00avs___u:387: (AVŚ_2,6.4a) kṣatreṇāgne svena saṃ rabhasva mitreṇāgne mitradhā yatasva |
GV00avs___u:388: (AVŚ_2,6.4c) sajātānāṃ madhyameṣṭhā rājñām agne vihavyo dīdihīha ||4||
GV00avs___u:389: (AVŚ_2,6.5a) ati niho ati sṛdho 'ty acittīr ati dviṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:390: (AVŚ_2,6.5c) viśvā hy agne duritā tara tvam athāsmabhyaṃ sahavīraṃ rayiṃ
GV00avs___u:393: (AVŚ_2,7.1c) āpo malam iva prāṇaikṣīt sarvān mac chapathāṃ adhi ||1||
GV00avs___u:394: (AVŚ_2,7.2a) yaś ca sāpatnaḥ śapatho jāmyāḥ śapathaś ca yaḥ |
GV00avs___u:395: (AVŚ_2,7.2c) brahmā yan manyutaḥ śapāt sarvaṃ tan no adhaspadam ||2||
GV00avs___u:396: (AVŚ_2,7.3a) divo mūlam avatataṃ pṛthivyā adhy uttatam |
GV00avs___u:397: (AVŚ_2,7.3c) tena sahasrakāṇḍena pari ṇaḥ pāhi viśvataḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:398: (AVŚ_2,7.4a) pari māṃ pari me prajāṃ pari ṇaḥ pāhi yad dhanam |
GV00avs___u:399: (AVŚ_2,7.4c) arātir no mā tārīn mā nas tāriśur abhimātayaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:400: (AVŚ_2,7.5a) śaptāram etu śapatho yaḥ suhārt tena naḥ saha |

GV00avs___u:455: (AVŚ_2,11.5a) śukro 'si bhrājo 'si svar asi jyotir asi |
GV00avs___u:457: (AVŚ_2,12.1a) dyāvāpṛthivī urv antarikṣaṃ kṣetrasya patny urugāyo 'dbhutaḥ
GV00avs___u:458: (AVŚ_2,12.1c) utāntarikṣam uru vātagopaṃ ta iha tapyantāṃ mayi tapyamāne ||1||
GV00avs___u:459: (AVŚ_2,12.2a) idaṃ devāḥ śṛṇuta ye yajñiyā stha bharadvājo mahyam ukthāni
GV00avs___u:461: (AVŚ_2,12.2c) pāśe sa baddho durite ni yujyatāṃ yo asmākaṃ mana idaṃ hinasti ||2||
GV00avs___u:462: (AVŚ_2,12.3a) idam indra śṛṇuhi somapa yat tvā hṛdā śocatā johavīmi |
GV00avs___u:463: (AVŚ_2,12.3c) vṛścāmi taṃ kuliśeneva vṛkṣaṃ yo asmākaṃ mana idaṃ hinasti
GV00avs___u:464: (AVŚ_2,12.4a) aśītibhis tisṛbhiḥ sāmagebhir ādityebhir vasubhir aṅgirobhiḥ
GV00avs___u:465: (AVŚ_2,12.4c) iṣṭāpūrtam avatu naḥ pitṝṇām āmuṃ dade harasā daivyena ||4||
GV00avs___u:466: (AVŚ_2,12.5a) dyāvāpṛthivī anu mā dīdhīthāṃ viśve devāso anu mā rabhadhvam
GV00avs___u:467: (AVŚ_2,12.5c) aṅgirasaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ pāpam ā ṛchatv apakāmasya kartā ||5||

GV00avs___u:469: (AVŚ_2,12.6c) tapūṃṣi tasmai vṛjināni santu brahmadviṣaṃ dyaur
GV00avs___u:471: (AVŚ_2,12.7a) sapta prāṇān aṣṭau manyas tāṃs te vṛścāmi brahmaṇā |

GV00avs___u:475: (AVŚ_2,13.1a) āyurdā agne jarasaṃ vṛṇāno ghṛtapratīko ghṛtapṛṣṭho agne |
GV00avs___u:476: (AVŚ_2,13.1c) ghṛtaṃ pītvā madhu cāru gavyaṃ piteva putrān abhi rakṣatād
GV00avs___u:478: (AVŚ_2,13.2a) pari dhatta dhatta no varcasemam jarāmṛtyuṃ kṛṇuta dīrgham āyuḥ |
GV00avs___u:479: (AVŚ_2,13.2c) bṛhaspatiḥ prāyachad vāsa etat somāya rājñe paridhātavā u ||2||
GV00avs___u:480: (AVŚ_2,13.3a) parīdaṃ vāso adhithāḥ svastaye 'bhūr gṛṣṭīnām abhiśastipā u
GV00avs___u:481: (AVŚ_2,13.3c) śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ purūcī rāyaś ca poṣam upasaṃvyayasva
GV00avs___u:482: (AVŚ_2,13.4a) ehy aśmānam ā tiṣṭhāśmā bhavatu te tanūḥ |
GV00avs___u:483: (AVŚ_2,13.4c) kṛṇvantu viśve devā āyuṣṭe śaradaḥ śatam ||4||
GV00avs___u:484: (AVŚ_2,13.5a) yasya te vāsaḥ prathamavāsyaṃ harāmas taṃ tvā viśve 'vantu
GV00avs___u:486: (AVŚ_2,13.5c) taṃ tvā bhrātaraḥ suvṛdhā vardhamānam anu jāyantāṃ bahavaḥ sujātam ||5||
GV00avs___u:489: (AVŚ_2,14.2a) nir vo goṣṭhād ajāmasi nir akṣān nir upānaśāt |

GV00avs___u:491: (AVŚ_2,14.3a) asau yo adharād gṛhas tatra santv arāyyaḥ |

GV00avs___u:572: (AVŚ_2,25.2c) tayāhaṃ durṇāmnāṃ śiro vṛścāmi śakuner iva ||2||

GV00avs___u:575: (AVŚ_2,25.4a) girim enāṃ ā veśaya kaṇvān jīvitayopanān |
GV00avs___u:576: (AVŚ_2,25.4c) tāṃs tvaṃ devi pṛśniparṇy agnir ivānudahann ihi ||4||
GV00avs___u:577: (AVŚ_2,25.5a) parāca enān pra ṇuda kaṇvān jīvitayopanān |
GV00avs___u:578: (AVŚ_2,25.5c) tamāṃsi yatra gachanti tat kravyādo ajīgamam ||5||
GV00avs___u:579: (AVŚ_2,26.1a) eha yantu paśavo ye pareyur vāyur yeṣāṃ sahacāraṃ jujoṣa |
GV00avs___u:580: (AVŚ_2,26.1c) tvaṣṭā yeṣāṃ rūpadheyāni vedāsmin tān goṣṭhe savitā ni yachatu ||1||
GV00avs___u:581: (AVŚ_2,26.2a) imaṃ goṣṭhaṃ paśavaḥ saṃ sravantu bṛhaspatir ā nayatu prajānan |
GV00avs___u:582: (AVŚ_2,26.2c) sinīvālī nayatv āgram eṣām ājagmuṣo anumate ni yacha ||2||
GV00avs___u:583: (AVŚ_2,26.3a) saṃ saṃ sravantu paśavaḥ sam aśvāḥ sam u pūruṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:584: (AVŚ_2,26.3c) saṃ dhānyasya yā sphātiḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi ||3||
GV00avs___u:585: (AVŚ_2,26.4a) saṃ siñcāmi gavāṃ kṣīram sam ājyena balam rasam |
GV00avs___u:586: (AVŚ_2,26.4c) saṃsiktā asmākaṃ vīrā dhruvā gāvo mayi gopatau ||4||
GV00avs___u:587: (AVŚ_2,26.5a) ā harāmi gavāṃ kṣīram āhārṣaṃ dhānyaṃ rasam |
GV00avs___u:588: (AVŚ_2,26.5c) āhṛtā asmākaṃ vīrā ā patnīr idam astakam ||5||
GV00avs___u:589: (AVŚ_2,27.1a) nec chatruḥ prāśaṃ jayāti sahamānābhibhūr asi |
GV00avs___u:590: (AVŚ_2,27.1c) prāśaṃ pratiprāśo jahy arasān kṛṇv oṣadhe ||1||
GV00avs___u:591: (AVŚ_2,27.2a) suparṇas tvānv avindat sūkaras tvākhanan nasā |
GV00avs___u:592: (AVŚ_2,27.2c) prāśaṃ pratiprāśo jahy arasān kṛṇv oṣadhe ||2||
GV00avs___u:593: (AVŚ_2,27.3a) indro ha cakre tvā bāhāv asurebhya starītave |
GV00avs___u:594: (AVŚ_2,27.3c) prāśaṃ pratiprāśo jahy arasān kṛṇv oṣadhe ||3||
GV00avs___u:595: (AVŚ_2,27.4a) pāṭām indro vy āśnād asurebhya starītave |
GV00avs___u:596: (AVŚ_2,27.4c) prāśaṃ pratiprāśo jahy arasān kṛṇv oṣadhe ||4||
GV00avs___u:597: (AVŚ_2,27.5a) tayāhaṃ śatrūnt sākṣa indraḥ sālāvṛkāṃ iva |
GV00avs___u:598: (AVŚ_2,27.5c) prāśaṃ pratiprāśo jahy arasān kṛṇv oṣadhe ||5||
GV00avs___u:600: (AVŚ_2,27.6c) prāśaṃ pratiprāśo jahy arasān kṛṇv oṣadhe ||6||
GV00avs___u:601: (AVŚ_2,27.7a) tasya prāśaṃ tvaṃ jahi yo na indrābhidāsati |
GV00avs___u:602: (AVŚ_2,27.7c) adhi no brūhi śaktibhiḥ prāśi mām uttaraṃ kṛdhi ||7||
GV00avs___u:603: (AVŚ_2,28.1a) tubhyam eva jariman vardhatām ayam memam anye mṛtyavo hiṃsiṣuḥ śataṃ ye |
GV00avs___u:604: (AVŚ_2,28.1c) māteva putraṃ pramanā upasthe mitra enaṃ mitriyāt pātv aṃhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:605: (AVŚ_2,28.2a) mitra enaṃ varuṇo vā riśādā jarāmṛtyuṃ kṛṇutāṃ saṃvidānau |
GV00avs___u:606: (AVŚ_2,28.2c) tad agnir hotā vayunāni vidvān viśvā devānāṃ janimā vivakti
GV00avs___u:607: (AVŚ_2,28.3a) tvam īśiṣe paśūnām pārthivānāṃ ye jātā uta vā ye janitrāḥ |
GV00avs___u:608: (AVŚ_2,28.3c) memaṃ prāṇo hāsīn mo apāno memaṃ mitrā vadhiṣur mo amitrāḥ
GV00avs___u:609: (AVŚ_2,28.4a) dyauṣ ṭvā pitā pṛthivī mātā jarāmṛtyuṃ kṛṇutāṃ saṃvidāne |
GV00avs___u:610: (AVŚ_2,28.4c) yathā jīvā aditer upasthe prāṇāpānābhyāṃ gupitaḥ śataṃ himāḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:611: (AVŚ_2,28.5a) imam agne āyuṣe varcase naya priyaṃ reto varuṇa mitra rājan
GV00avs___u:612: (AVŚ_2,28.5c) mātevāsmā adite śarma yacha viśve devā jaradaṣṭir yathāsat ||5||
GV00avs___u:613: (AVŚ_2,29.1a) pārthivasya rase devā bhagasya tanvo bale |
GV00avs___u:614: (AVŚ_2,29.1c) āyuṣyam asmā agniḥ sūryo varca ā dhād bṛhaspatiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:615: (AVŚ_2,29.2a) āyur asmai dhehi jātavedaḥ prajāṃ tvaṣṭar adhinidhehi asmai |
GV00avs___u:616: (AVŚ_2,29.2c) rāyas poṣaṃ savitar ā suvāsmai śataṃ jīvāti śaradas tavāyam
GV00avs___u:617: (AVŚ_2,29.3a) āśīr ṇa ūrjam uta sauprajāstvaṃ dakṣaṃ dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ sacetasau |
GV00avs___u:618: (AVŚ_2,29.3c) jayam kṣetrāṇi sahasāyam indra kṛṇvāno anyān adharānt sapatnān ||3||
GV00avs___u:619: (AVŚ_2,29.4a) indreṇa datto varuṇena śiṣṭo marudbhir ugraḥ prahito no āgan
GV00avs___u:620: (AVŚ_2,29.4c) eṣa vāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe mā kṣudhan mā tṛṣat ||4||
GV00avs___u:621: (AVŚ_2,29.5a) ūrjam asmā ūrjasvatī dhattaṃ payo asmai payasvatī dhattam |
GV00avs___u:622: (AVŚ_2,29.5c) ūrjam asmai dyāvapṛthivī adhātāṃ viśve devā maruta ūrjam āpaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:623: (AVŚ_2,29.6a) śivābhiṣ ṭe hṛdayaṃ tarpayāmy anamīvo modiṣīṣṭhāḥ suvarcāḥ |
GV00avs___u:624: (AVŚ_2,29.6c) savāsinau pibatāṃ mantham etam aśvino rūpaṃ paridhāya māyām ||6||
GV00avs___u:625: (AVŚ_2,29.7a) indra etāṃ sasṛje viddho agra ūrjāṃ svadhām ajarāṃ sā ta eṣā |
GV00avs___u:626: (AVŚ_2,29.7c) tayā tvaṃ jīva śaradaḥ suvarcā mā ta ā susrod bhiṣajas te akran ||7||
GV00avs___u:627: (AVŚ_2,30.1a) yathedaṃ bhūmyā adhi tṛṇaṃ vāto mathāyati |
GV00avs___u:628: (AVŚ_2,30.1c) evā mathnāmi te mano yathā māṃ kāminy aso yathā man nāpagā asaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:629: (AVŚ_2,30.2a) saṃ cen nayātho aśvinā kāminā saṃ ca vakṣathaḥ |
GV00avs___u:630: (AVŚ_2,30.2c) saṃ vāṃ bhagāso agmata saṃ cittāni sam u vratā ||2||
GV00avs___u:632: (AVŚ_2,30.3c) tatra me gachatād dhavaṃ śalya iva kulmalaṃ yathā ||3||
GV00avs___u:633: (AVŚ_2,30.4a) yad antaraṃ tad bāhyaṃ yad bāhyaṃ tad antaram |
GV00avs___u:637: (AVŚ_2,31.1a) indrasya yā mahī dṛṣat krimer viśvasya tarhaṇī |
GV00avs___u:638: (AVŚ_2,31.1c) tayā pinaṣmi saṃ krimīn dṛṣadā khalvāṃ iva ||1||
GV00avs___u:639: (AVŚ_2,31.2a) dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam atṛham atho kurūrum atṛham |
GV00avs___u:640: (AVŚ_2,31.2c) algaṇḍūnt sarvān chalunān krimīn vacasā jambhayāmasi ||2||
GV00avs___u:641: (AVŚ_2,31.3a) algaṇḍūn hanmi mahatā vadhena dūnā adūnā arasā abhūvan |
GV00avs___u:642: (AVŚ_2,31.3c) śiṣṭān aśiṣṭān ni tirāmi vācā yathā krimīṇāṃ nakir uchiṣātai
GV00avs___u:645: (AVŚ_2,31.5a) ye krimayaḥ parvateśu vaneṣv oṣadhīṣu paśuṣv apsv antaḥ |
GV00avs___u:646: (AVŚ_2,31.5c) ye asmākaṃ tanvam āviviśuḥ sarvaṃ tad dhanmi janima krimīṇām
GV00avs___u:647: (AVŚ_2,32.1a) udyann ādityaḥ krimīn hantu nimrocan hantu raśmibhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:650: (AVŚ_2,32.2c) śṛṇāmy asya pṛṣṭīr api vṛścāmi yac chiraḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:651: (AVŚ_2,32.3a) atrivad vaḥ krimayo hanmi kaṇvavaj jamadagnivat |
GV00avs___u:652: (AVŚ_2,32.3c) agastyasya brahmaṇā saṃ pinaṣmy ahaṃ krimīn ||3||
GV00avs___u:653: (AVŚ_2,32.4a) hato rājā krimīṇām utaiṣāṃ sthapatir hataḥ |
GV00avs___u:656: (AVŚ_2,32.5c) atho ye kṣullakā iva sarve te krimayo hatāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:657: (AVŚ_2,32.6a) pra te śṛṇāmi śṛṅge yābhyāṃ vitudāyasi |
GV00avs___u:658: (AVŚ_2,32.6c) bhinādmi te kuṣumbhaṃ yas te viṣadhānaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:659: (AVŚ_2,33.1a) akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyāṃ chubukād adhi |
GV00avs___u:660: (AVŚ_2,33.1c) yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ mastiṣkāj jihvāyā vi vṛhāmi te ||1||
GV00avs___u:662: (AVŚ_2,33.2c) yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ vi vṛhāmi te ||2||
GV00avs___u:663: (AVŚ_2,33.3a) hṛdayāt te pari klomno halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām |
GV00avs___u:664: (AVŚ_2,33.3c) yakṣmaṃ matasnābhyāṃ plīhno yaknas te vi vṛhāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:665: (AVŚ_2,33.4a) āntrebhyas te gudābhyo vaniṣṭhor udarād adhi |
GV00avs___u:666: (AVŚ_2,33.4c) yakṣmaṃ kukṣibhyām plāśer nābhyā vi vṛhāmi te ||4||
GV00avs___u:668: (AVŚ_2,33.5c) yakṣmaṃ bhasadyaṃ śroṇibhyāṃ bhāsadaṃ bhaṃsaso vi vṛhāmi te ||5||
GV00avs___u:670: (AVŚ_2,33.6c) yakṣmam pāṇibhyām aṅgulibhyo nakhebhyo vi vṛhāmi te ||6||
GV00avs___u:672: (AVŚ_2,33.7c) yakṣmaṃ tvacasyaṃ te vayaṃ kaśyapasya vībarheṇa viṣvañcaṃ vi vṛhāmasi ||7||
GV00avs___u:673: (AVŚ_2,34.1a) ya īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnām catuṣpadām uta yo dvipadām |
GV00avs___u:674: (AVŚ_2,34.1c) niṣkrītaḥ sa yajñiyaṃ bhāgam etu rāyas poṣā yajamānaṃ sacantām ||1||
GV00avs___u:675: (AVŚ_2,34.2a) pramuñcanto bhuvanasya reto gātuṃ dhatta yajamānāya devāḥ |
GV00avs___u:676: (AVŚ_2,34.2c) upākṛtaṃ śaśamānaṃ yad asthāt priyam devānām apy etu pāthaḥ
GV00avs___u:677: (AVŚ_2,34.3a) ye badhyamānam anu dīdhyānā anvaikṣanta manasā cakṣuṣā ca |
GV00avs___u:678: (AVŚ_2,34.3c) agniṣ ṭān agre pra mumoktu devo viśvakarmā prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:679: (AVŚ_2,34.4a) ye grāmyāḥ paśavo viśvarūpā virūpāḥ santo bahudhaikarūpāḥ |
GV00avs___u:680: (AVŚ_2,34.4c) vāyuṣ ṭān agre pra mumoktu devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:681: (AVŚ_2,34.5a) prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇantu pūrve prāṇam aṅgebhyaḥ pary ācarantam |
GV00avs___u:682: (AVŚ_2,34.5c) divaṃ gacha prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ svargaṃ yāhi pathibhir devayānaiḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:683: (AVŚ_2,35.1a) ye bhakṣayanto na vasūny ānṛdhur yān agnayo anvatapyanta dhiṣṇyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:684: (AVŚ_2,35.1c) yā teṣām avayā duriṣṭiḥ sviṣṭiṃ nas tāṃ kṛṇavad viśvakarmā
GV00avs___u:685: (AVŚ_2,35.2a) yajñapatim ṛṣayaḥ enasāhur nirbhaktaṃ prajā anutapyamānam |
GV00avs___u:686: (AVŚ_2,35.2c) mathavyānt stokān apa yān rarādha saṃ naṣ ṭebhiḥ sṛjatu
GV00avs___u:688: (AVŚ_2,35.3a) adānyānt somapān manyamāno yajñasya vidvānt samaye na dhīraḥ |
GV00avs___u:689: (AVŚ_2,35.3c) yad enaś cakṛvān baddha eṣa taṃ viśvakarman pra muñcā
GV00avs___u:691: (AVŚ_2,35.4a) ghorā ṛṣayo namo astv ebhyaś cakṣur yad eṣāṃ manasaś ca satyam |
GV00avs___u:692: (AVŚ_2,35.4c) bṛhaspataye mahiṣa dyumann namo viśvakarman namas te pāhy asmān ||4||
GV00avs___u:693: (AVŚ_2,35.5a) yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtir mukhaṃ ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi |
GV00avs___u:694: (AVŚ_2,35.5c) imaṃ yajñaṃ vitataṃ viśvakarmaṇā devā yantu sumanasyamānāḥ
GV00avs___u:695: (AVŚ_2,36.1a) ā no agne sumatiṃ saṃbhalo gamed imāṃ kumārīṃ saha no bhagena |
GV00avs___u:696: (AVŚ_2,36.1c) juṣṭā vareṣu samaneṣu valgur oṣaṃ patyā saubhagam astu asyai
GV00avs___u:699: (AVŚ_2,36.3a) iyam agne nārī patim videṣṭa somo hi rājā subhagāṃ kṛṇoti |
GV00avs___u:700: (AVŚ_2,36.3c) suvānā putrān mahiṣī bhavāti gatvā patiṃ subhagā vi rājatu
GV00avs___u:701: (AVŚ_2,36.4a) yathākharo maghavaṃś cārur eṣa priyo mṛgāṇāṃ suṣadā babhūva |
GV00avs___u:702: (AVŚ_2,36.4c) evā bhagasya juṣṭeyam astu nārī saṃpriyā patyāvirādhayantī
GV00avs___u:703: (AVŚ_2,36.5a) bhagasya nāvam ā roha pūrṇām anupadasvatīm |
GV00avs___u:705: (AVŚ_2,36.6a) ā krandaya dhanapate varam āmanasaṃ kṛṇu |
GV00avs___u:706: (AVŚ_2,36.6c) sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛṇu yo varaḥ pratikāmyaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:707: (AVŚ_2,36.7a) idaṃ hiraṇyaṃ gulgulv ayam aukṣo atho bhagaḥ |
GV00avs___u:708: (AVŚ_2,36.7c) ete patibhyas tvām aduḥ pratikāmāya vettave ||7
GV00avs___u:709: (AVŚ_2,36.7e) ā te nayatu savitā nayatu patir yaḥ pratikāmyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:710: (AVŚ_3,1.1a) agnir naḥ śatrūn praty etu vidvān pratidahann abhiśastim arātim |
GV00avs___u:711: (AVŚ_3,1.1c) sa senāṃ mohayatu pareṣāṃ nirhastāṃś ca kṛṇavaj jātavedāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:712: (AVŚ_3,1.2a) yūyam ugrā maruta īdṛśe sthābhi preta mṛṇata sahadhvam |
GV00avs___u:713: (AVŚ_3,1.2c) amīmṛṇan vasavo nāthitā ime agnir hy eṣāṃ dūtaḥ pratyetu
GV00avs___u:716: (AVŚ_3,1.3c) yuvaṃ tām indra vṛtrahann agniś ca dahataṃ prati ||3||
GV00avs___u:717: (AVŚ_3,1.4a) prasūta indra pravatā haribhyāṃ pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇann etu
GV00avs___u:719: (AVŚ_3,1.4c) jahi pratīco anūcaḥ parāco viṣvak satyaṃ kṛṇuhi cittam eṣām
GV00avs___u:721: (AVŚ_3,1.5c) agner vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūco vi nāśaya ||5||
GV00avs___u:722: (AVŚ_3,1.6a) indraḥ senāṃ mohayatu maruto ghnantv ojasā |
GV00avs___u:723: (AVŚ_3,1.6c) cakṣūṃsy agnir ā dattāṃ punar etu parājitā ||6||
GV00avs___u:724: (AVŚ_3,2.1a) agnir no dūtaḥ pratyetu vidvān pratidahann abhiśastim arātim |
GV00avs___u:725: (AVŚ_3,2.1c) sa cittāni mohayatu pareṣāṃ nirhastāṃś ca kṛṇavaj jātavedāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:726: (AVŚ_3,2.2a) ayam agnir amūmuhad yāni cittāni vo hṛdi |
GV00avs___u:727: (AVŚ_3,2.2c) vi vo dhamatv okasaḥ pra vo dhamatu sarvataḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:728: (AVŚ_3,2.3a) indra cittāni mohayann arvāṅ ākūtyā cara |
GV00avs___u:729: (AVŚ_3,2.3c) agner vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūco vi nāśaya ||3||
GV00avs___u:730: (AVŚ_3,2.4a) vy ākūtaya eṣām itātho cittāni muhyata |
GV00avs___u:731: (AVŚ_3,2.4c) atho yad adyaiṣāṃ hṛdi tad eṣāṃ pari nir jahi ||4||
GV00avs___u:732: (AVŚ_3,2.5a) amīṣāṃ cittāni pratimohayantī gṛhāṇāṅgāny apve parehi |
GV00avs___u:733: (AVŚ_3,2.5c) abhi prehi nir daha hṛtsu śokair grāhyāmitrāṃs tamasā vidhya
GV00avs___u:735: (AVŚ_3,2.6a) asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām asmān aity abhy ojasā
GV00avs___u:737: (AVŚ_3,2.6c) tām vidhyata tamasāpavratena yathaiṣām anyo anyaṃ na jānāt ||6||
GV00avs___u:738: (AVŚ_3,3.1a) acikradat svapā iha bhuvad agne vy acasva rodasī urūcī |
GV00avs___u:739: (AVŚ_3,3.1c) yuñjantu tvā maruto viśvavedasa āmuṃ naya namasā rātahavyam ||1||
GV00avs___u:740: (AVŚ_3,3.2a) dūre cit santam aruṣāsa indram ā cyāvayantu sakhyāya vipram |
GV00avs___u:741: (AVŚ_3,3.2c) yad gāyatrīṃ bṛhatīm arkam asmai sautrāmaṇyā dadhṛṣanta devāḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:742: (AVŚ_3,3.3a) adbhyas tvā rāja varuṇo hvayatu somas tvā hvayatu parvatebhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:743: (AVŚ_3,3.3c) indras tvā hvayatu viḍbhya ābhyaḥ śyeno bhūtvā viśa ā patemāḥ
GV00avs___u:744: (AVŚ_3,3.4a) śyeno havyaṃ nayatv ā parasmād anyakṣetre aparuddhaṃ carantam |
GV00avs___u:745: (AVŚ_3,3.4c) aśvinā panthāṃ kṛṇutāṃ sugaṃ ta imaṃ sajātā abhisaṃviśadhvam ||4|| {5}
GV00avs___u:746: (AVŚ_3,3.5a) hvayantu tvā pratijanāḥ prati mitrā avṛṣata |
GV00avs___u:747: (AVŚ_3,3.5c) indrāgnī viśve devās te viśi kṣemam adīdharan ||5|| {6}
GV00avs___u:748: (AVŚ_3,3.6a) yas te havaṃ vivadat sajāto yaś ca niṣṭyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:749: (AVŚ_3,3.6c) apāñcam indra taṃ kṛtvāthemam ihāva gamaya ||6|| {7}
GV00avs___u:750: (AVŚ_3,4.1a) ā tvā gan rāṣtraṃ saha varcasod ihi prāṅ viśāṃ patir ekarāṭ tvaṃ vi rāja |
GV00avs___u:751: (AVŚ_3,4.1c) sarvās tvā rājan pradiśo hvayantūpasadyo namasyo bhaveha
GV00avs___u:752: (AVŚ_3,4.2a) tvāṃ viśo vṛṇatāṃ rājyāya tvām imāḥ pradiśaḥ pañca devīḥ |
GV00avs___u:753: (AVŚ_3,4.2c) varṣman rāṣṭrasya kakudi śrayasva tato na ugro vi bhajā
GV00avs___u:755: (AVŚ_3,4.3a) acha tvā yantu havinaḥ sajātā agnir dūto ajiraḥ saṃ carātai |
GV00avs___u:756: (AVŚ_3,4.3c) jāyāḥ putrāḥ sumanaso bhavantu bahuṃ baliṃ prati paśyāsā ugraḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:757: (AVŚ_3,4.4a) aśvinā tvāgre mitrāvaruṇobhā viśve devā marutas tvā hvayantu |
GV00avs___u:758: (AVŚ_3,4.4c) adhā mano vasudeyāya kṛṇuṣva tato na ugro vi bhajā vasūni
GV00avs___u:759: (AVŚ_3,4.5a) ā pra drava paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ śive te dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe
GV00avs___u:761: (AVŚ_3,4.5c) tad ayaṃ rājā varuṇas tathāha sa tvāyam ahvat sa upedam ehi ||5||
GV00avs___u:762: (AVŚ_3,4.6a) indrendra manuṣyāḥ parehi saṃ hy ajñāsthā varuṇaiḥ saṃvidānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:763: (AVŚ_3,4.6c) sa tvāyam ahvat sve sadhasthe sa devān yakṣat sa u kalpayad viśaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:764: (AVŚ_3,4.7a) pathyā revatīr bahudhā virūpāḥ sarvāḥ saṃgatya varīyas te akran |
GV00avs___u:765: (AVŚ_3,4.7c) tās tvā sarvāḥ saṃvidānā hvayantu daśamīm ugraḥ sumanā vaśeha
GV00avs___u:766: (AVŚ_3,5.1a) āyam agan parṇamaṇir balī balena pramṛṇant sapatnān |
GV00avs___u:767: (AVŚ_3,5.1c) ojo devānāṃ paya oṣadhīnāṃ varcasā mā jinvantv aprayāvan ||1||
GV00avs___u:768: (AVŚ_3,5.2a) mayi kṣatraṃ parṇamaṇe mayi dhārayatād rayim |
GV00avs___u:770: (AVŚ_3,5.3a) yaṃ nidadhur vanaspatau guhyaṃ devāḥ priyaṃ maṇim |
GV00avs___u:771: (AVŚ_3,5.3c) tam asmabhyaṃ sahāyuṣā devā dadatu bhartave ||3||
GV00avs___u:772: (AVŚ_3,5.4a) somasya parṇaḥ saha ugram āgann indreṇa datto varuṇena śiṣṭaḥ
GV00avs___u:773: (AVŚ_3,5.4c) taṃ priyāsaṃ bahu rocamāno dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya ||4||
GV00avs___u:776: (AVŚ_3,5.6a) ye dhīvāno rathakārāḥ karmārā ye manīṣiṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:777: (AVŚ_3,5.6c) upastīn parṇa mahyaṃ tvaṃ sarvān kṛṇv abhito janān ||6||
GV00avs___u:778: (AVŚ_3,5.7a) ye rājāno rājakṛtaḥ sūtā grāmaṇyaś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:779: (AVŚ_3,5.7c) upastīn parṇa mahyaṃ tvaṃ sarvān kṛṇv abhito janān ||7||
GV00avs___u:780: (AVŚ_3,5.8a) parṇo 'si tanūpānaḥ sayonir vīro vīreṇa mayā |
GV00avs___u:781: (AVŚ_3,5.8c) saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena badhnāmi tvā maṇe ||8||
GV00avs___u:783: (AVŚ_3,6.1c) sa hantu śatrūn māmakān yān ahaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām ||1||
GV00avs___u:784: (AVŚ_3,6.2a) tān aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi śatrūn vaibādhadodhataḥ |
GV00avs___u:785: (AVŚ_3,6.2c) indreṇa vṛtraghnā medī mitreṇa varuṇena ca ||2||
GV00avs___u:787: (AVŚ_3,6.3c) evā tānt sarvān nir bhaṅgdhi yān ahaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām ||3||
GV00avs___u:788: (AVŚ_3,6.4a) yaḥ sahamānaś carasi sāsahāna iva ṛṣabhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:790: (AVŚ_3,6.5a) sinātv enān nirṛtir mṛtyoḥ pāśair amokyaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:791: (AVŚ_3,6.5c) aśvattha śatrūn māmakān yān ahaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām ||5||
GV00avs___u:793: (AVŚ_3,6.6c) evā me śatror mūrdhānaṃ viṣvag bhinddhi sahasva ca ||6||
GV00avs___u:794: (AVŚ_3,6.7a) te 'dharāñcaḥ pra plavantāṃ chinnā naur iva bandhanāt |
GV00avs___u:796: (AVŚ_3,6.8a) praiṇān nude manasā pra cittenota brahmaṇā |
GV00avs___u:800: (AVŚ_3,7.2a) anu tvā hariṇo vṛṣā padbhiś caturbhir akramīt |
GV00avs___u:801: (AVŚ_3,7.2c) viṣāṇe vi ṣya guṣpitaṃ yad asya kṣetriyaṃ hṛdi ||2||
GV00avs___u:802: (AVŚ_3,7.3a) ado yad avarocate catuṣpakṣam iva chadiḥ |
GV00avs___u:803: (AVŚ_3,7.3c) tenā te sarvaṃ kṣetriyam aṅgebhyo nāśayāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:804: (AVŚ_3,7.4a) amū ye divi subhage vicṛtau nāma tārake |
GV00avs___u:805: (AVŚ_3,7.4c) vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām adhamaṃ pāśam uttamam ||4||
GV00avs___u:806: (AVŚ_3,7.5a) āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ |
GV00avs___u:807: (AVŚ_3,7.5c) āpo viśvasya bheṣajīs tās tvā muñcantu kṣetriyāt ||5||
GV00avs___u:808: (AVŚ_3,7.6a) yad āsuteḥ kriyamānāyāḥ kṣetriyaṃ tvā vyānaśe |
GV00avs___u:809: (AVŚ_3,7.6c) vedāhaṃ tasya bheṣajaṃ kṣetriyaṃ nāśayāmi tvat ||6||
GV00avs___u:811: (AVŚ_3,7.7c) apāsmat sarvaṃ durbhūtam apa kṣetriyam uchatu ||7||
GV00avs___u:812: (AVŚ_3,8.1a) ā yātu mitra ṛtubhiḥ kalpamānaḥ saṃveśayan pṛthivīm usriyābhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:813: (AVŚ_3,8.1c) athāsmabhyam varuṇo vāyur agnir bṛhad rāṣṭraṃ saṃveśyam dadhātu ||1||
GV00avs___u:814: (AVŚ_3,8.2a) dhātā rātiḥ savitedaṃ juśantām indras tvaṣṭā prati haryantu me vacaḥ |
GV00avs___u:815: (AVŚ_3,8.2c) huve devīm aditiṃ śūraputrāṃ sajātānāṃ madhyameṣṭhā yathāsāni
GV00avs___u:816: (AVŚ_3,8.3a) huve somaṃ savitāraṃ namobhir viśvān ādityāṃ aham uttaratve |
GV00avs___u:817: (AVŚ_3,8.3c) ayam agnir dīdāyad dīrgham eva sajātair iddho
GV00avs___u:819: (AVŚ_3,8.4a) ihed asātha na paro gamātheryo gopāḥ puṣṭapatir va ājat |
GV00avs___u:820: (AVŚ_3,8.4c) asmai kāmāyopa kāminīr viśve vo devā upasaṃyantu ||4||
GV00avs___u:821: (AVŚ_3,8.5a) saṃ vo manāṃsi saṃ vratā sam ākūtīr namāmasi |
GV00avs___u:822: (AVŚ_3,8.5c) amī ye vivratā sthana tān vaḥ saṃ namayāmasi ||5||
GV00avs___u:823: (AVŚ_3,8.6a) ahaṃ gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhir eta |
GV00avs___u:824: (AVŚ_3,8.6c) mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmāna eta
GV00avs___u:825: (AVŚ_3,9.1a) karśaphasya viśaphasya dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā |
GV00avs___u:827: (AVŚ_3,9.2a) aśreṣmāṇo adhārayan tathā tan manunā kṛtam |
GV00avs___u:828: (AVŚ_3,9.2c) kṛṇomi vadhri viṣkandhaṃ muṣkābarho gavām iva ||2||
GV00avs___u:829: (AVŚ_3,9.3a) piśaṅge sūtre khṛgalaṃ tad ā badhnanti vedhasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:830: (AVŚ_3,9.3c) śravasyuṃ śuṣmaṃ kābavaṃ vadhriṃ kṛṇvantu bandhuraḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:832: (AVŚ_3,9.4c) śunāṃ kapir iva dūṣaṇo bandhurā kābavasya ca ||4||
GV00avs___u:833: (AVŚ_3,9.5a) duṣṭyai hi tvā bhatsyāmi dūṣayiṣyāmi kābavam |
GV00avs___u:834: (AVŚ_3,9.5c) ud āśavo rathā iva śapathebhiḥ sariṣyatha ||5||
GV00avs___u:836: (AVŚ_3,9.6c) teṣāṃ tvām agre uj jaharur maṇiṃ viṣkandhadūṣaṇam ||6||
GV00avs___u:837: (AVŚ_3,10.1a) prathamā ha vy uvāsa sā dhenur abhavad yame |
GV00avs___u:838: (AVŚ_3,10.1c) sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarāmuttarām samām ||1||
GV00avs___u:839: (AVŚ_3,10.2a) yāṃ devāḥ pratinandanti rātrim dhenum upāyatīm |
GV00avs___u:840: (AVŚ_3,10.2c) saṃvatsarasya yā patnī sā no astu sumaṅgalī ||2||
GV00avs___u:841: (AVŚ_3,10.3a) saṃvatsarasya pratimāṃ yāṃ tvā rātry upāsmahe |
GV00avs___u:842: (AVŚ_3,10.3c) sā na āyuṣmatīṃ prajāṃ rāyas poṣeṇa saṃ sṛja ||3||
GV00avs___u:843: (AVŚ_3,10.4a) iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyauchad āsv itarāsu carati praviṣṭā
GV00avs___u:844: (AVŚ_3,10.4c) mahānto asyāṃ mahimāno antar vadhūr jigāya navagaj janitrī ||4||
GV00avs___u:845: (AVŚ_3,10.5a) vānaspatyā grāvāṇo ghoṣam akrata haviṣ kṛṇvantaḥ
GV00avs___u:847: (AVŚ_3,10.5c) ekāṣṭake suprajasaḥ suvīrā vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||5||
GV00avs___u:848: (AVŚ_3,10.6a) iḍāyās padaṃ ghṛtavat sarīsṛpaṃ jātavedaḥ prati havyā gṛbhāya |
GV00avs___u:849: (AVŚ_3,10.6c) ye grāmyāḥ paśavo viśvarūpās teṣāṃ saptānāṃ mayi rantir astu
GV00avs___u:850: (AVŚ_3,10.7a) ā mā puṣṭe ca poṣe ca rātri devānāṃ sumatau syāma |
GV00avs___u:851: (AVŚ_3,10.7c) pūrṇā darve parā pata supūrṇā punar ā pata |
GV00avs___u:852: (AVŚ_3,10.7e) sarvān yajñānt saṃbhuñjatīṣam ūrjaṃ na ā bhara ||7||
GV00avs___u:853: (AVŚ_3,10.8a) āyam agant saṃvatsaraḥ patir ekāṣṭake tava |
GV00avs___u:854: (AVŚ_3,10.8c) sā na āyuṣmatīṃ prajāṃ rāyas poṣeṇa saṃ sṛja ||8||
GV00avs___u:855: (AVŚ_3,10.9a) ṛtūn yaja ṛtupatīn ārtavān uta hāyanān |
GV00avs___u:856: (AVŚ_3,10.9c) samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsān bhūtasya pataye yaje ||9||
GV00avs___u:858: (AVŚ_3,10.10c) dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje ||10||
GV00avs___u:859: (AVŚ_3,10.11a) iḍayā juhvato vayaṃ devān ghṛtavatā yaje |
GV00avs___u:860: (AVŚ_3,10.11c) gṛhān alubhyato vayaṃ saṃ viśemopa gomataḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:861: (AVŚ_3,10.12a) ekāṣṭakā tapasā tapyamānā jajāna garbhaṃ mahimānam indram |
GV00avs___u:862: (AVŚ_3,10.12c) tena devā vy asahanta śatrūn hantā dasyūnām abhavac chacīpatiḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:864: (AVŚ_3,10.13c) kāmān asmākaṃ pūraya prati gṛhṇāhi no haviḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:865: (AVŚ_3,11.1a) muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñātayakṣmād uta rājayakṣmāt |
GV00avs___u:866: (AVŚ_3,11.1c) grāhir jagrāha yady etad enaṃ tasyā indrāgnī pra mumuktam
GV00avs___u:868: (AVŚ_3,11.2a) yadi kṣitāyur yadi vā pareto yadi mṛtyor antikaṃ eva |
GV00avs___u:869: (AVŚ_3,11.2c) tam ā harāmi nirṛter upasthād aspārśam enaṃ śataśāradāya ||2||
GV00avs___u:871: (AVŚ_3,11.3c) indro yathainaṃ śarado nayāty ati viśvasya duritasya pāram ||3||
GV00avs___u:872: (AVŚ_3,11.4a) śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamānaḥ śataṃ hemantān chatam u vasantān |
GV00avs___u:873: (AVŚ_3,11.4c) śataṃ te indro agniḥ savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śatāyuṣā haviṣāhārṣam enam ||4||
GV00avs___u:874: (AVŚ_3,11.5a) pra viśataṃ prāṇāpānāv anaḍvāhāv iva vrajam |
GV00avs___u:875: (AVŚ_3,11.5c) vy anye yantu mṛtyavo yān āhur itarān chatam ||5||
GV00avs___u:876: (AVŚ_3,11.6a) ihaiva staṃ prāṇāpānau māpa gātam ito yuvam |
GV00avs___u:878: (AVŚ_3,11.7a) jarāyai tvā pari dadāmi jarāyai ni dhuvāmi tvā |
GV00avs___u:879: (AVŚ_3,11.7c) jarā tvā bhadrā neṣṭa vy anye yantu mṛtyavo yān āhur itarān chatam ||7||
GV00avs___u:880: (AVŚ_3,11.8a) abhi tvā jarimāhita gām ukṣaṇam iva rajjvā |
GV00avs___u:881: (AVŚ_3,11.8c) yas tvā mṛtyur abhyadhatta jāyamānaṃ supāśayā |
GV00avs___u:882: (AVŚ_3,11.8e) taṃ te satyasya hastābhyām ud amuñcad bṛhaspatiḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:883: (AVŚ_3,12.1a) ihaiva dhruvāṃ ni minomi śālāṃ kṣeme tiṣṭhāti ghṛtam ukṣamāṇā |
GV00avs___u:884: (AVŚ_3,12.1c) tāṃ tvā śāle sarvavīrāḥ suvīrā ariṣṭavīrā upa saṃ carema
GV00avs___u:885: (AVŚ_3,12.2a) ihaiva dhruvā prati tiṣṭha śāle 'śvāvatī gomatī sūnṛtāvatī |
GV00avs___u:886: (AVŚ_3,12.2c) ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī payasvaty uc chrayasva mahate saubhagāya
GV00avs___u:888: (AVŚ_3,12.3c) ā tvā vatso gamed ā kumāra ā dhenavaḥ sāyam āspandamānāḥ
GV00avs___u:889: (AVŚ_3,12.4a) imāṃ śālāṃ savitā vāyur indro bṛhaspatir ni minotu prajānan
GV00avs___u:890: (AVŚ_3,12.4c) ukṣantūdnā maruto ghṛtena bhago no rājā ni kṛṣiṃ tanotu
GV00avs___u:891: (AVŚ_3,12.5a) mānasya patni śaraṇā syonā devī devebhir nimitāsy agre |
GV00avs___u:892: (AVŚ_3,12.5c) tṛṇaṃ vasānā sumanā asas tvam athāsmabhyaṃ sahavīraṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:893: (AVŚ_3,12.6a) ṛtena sthūṇām adhi roha vaṃśogro virājann apa vṛṅkṣva śatrūn
GV00avs___u:894: (AVŚ_3,12.6c) mā te riṣann upasattāro gṛhāṇāṃ śāle śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ
GV00avs___u:896: (AVŚ_3,12.7a) emāṃ kumāras taruṇa ā vatso jagatā saha |
GV00avs___u:897: (AVŚ_3,12.7c) emām parisrutaḥ kumbha ā dadhnaḥ kalaśair aguḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:898: (AVŚ_3,12.8a) pūrṇaṃ nāri pra bhara kumbham etaṃ ghṛtasya dhārām amṛtena
GV00avs___u:900: (AVŚ_3,12.8c) imāṃ pātṝn amṛtena sam aṅgdhīṣṭāpūrtam abhi rakṣāty enām ||8||
GV00avs___u:901: (AVŚ_3,12.9a) imā āpaḥ pra bharāmy ayakṣmā yakṣmanāśanīḥ |
GV00avs___u:902: (AVŚ_3,12.9c) gṛhān upa pra sīdāmy amṛtena sahāgninā ||9||
GV00avs___u:903: (AVŚ_3,13.1a) yad adaḥ saṃprayatīr ahāv anadatā hate |
GV00avs___u:904: (AVŚ_3,13.1c) tasmād ā nadyo nāma stha tā vo nāmāni sindhavaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:906: (AVŚ_3,13.2c) tad āpnod indro vo yatīs tasmād āpo anu ṣṭhana ||2||
GV00avs___u:907: (AVŚ_3,13.3a) apakāmaṃ syandamānā avīvarata vo hi kam |
GV00avs___u:908: (AVŚ_3,13.3c) indro vaḥ śaktibhir devīs tasmād vār nāma vo hitam ||3||
GV00avs___u:909: (AVŚ_3,13.4a) ekaḥ vo devo 'py atiṣṭhat syandamānā yathāvaśam |
GV00avs___u:910: (AVŚ_3,13.4c) ud āniṣur mahīr iti tasmād udakam ucyate ||4||
GV00avs___u:911: (AVŚ_3,13.5a) āpo bhadrā ghṛtam id āpa āsann agnīṣomau bibhraty āpa it tāḥ |
GV00avs___u:912: (AVŚ_3,13.5c) tīvro raso madhupṛcām araṃgama ā mā prāṇena saha varcasā
GV00avs___u:914: (AVŚ_3,13.6a) ād it paśyāmy uta vā śṛṇomy ā mā ghoṣo gachati vāṅ māsām |
GV00avs___u:915: (AVŚ_3,13.6c) manye bhejāno amṛtasya tarhi hiraṇyavarṇā atṛpaṃ yadā vaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:916: (AVŚ_3,13.7a) idaṃ va āpo hṛdayam ayaṃ vatsa ṛtāvarīḥ |
GV00avs___u:917: (AVŚ_3,13.7c) ihettham eta śakvarīr yatredaṃ veśayāmi vaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:918: (AVŚ_3,14.1a) saṃ vo goṣṭhena suṣadā saṃ rayyā saṃ subhūtyā |
GV00avs___u:919: (AVŚ_3,14.1c) aharjātasya yan nāma tenā vaḥ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:920: (AVŚ_3,14.2a) saṃ vaḥ sṛjatv aryamā saṃ pūṣā saṃ bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:921: (AVŚ_3,14.2c) sam indro yo dhanaṃjayo mayi puṣyata yad vasu ||2||
GV00avs___u:925: (AVŚ_3,14.4c) ihaivota pra jāyadhvaṃ mayi saṃjñānam astu vaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:926: (AVŚ_3,14.5a) śivo vo goṣṭho bhavatu śāriśākeva puṣyata |
GV00avs___u:927: (AVŚ_3,14.5c) ihaivota pra jāyadhvaṃ mayā vaḥ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||5||
GV00avs___u:928: (AVŚ_3,14.6a) mayā gāvo gopatinā sacadhvam ayaṃ vo goṣṭha iha poṣayiṣṇuḥ |
GV00avs___u:929: (AVŚ_3,14.6c) rāyas poṣeṇa bahulā bhavantīr jīvā jīvantīr upa vaḥ sadema
GV00avs___u:930: (AVŚ_3,15.1a) indram ahaṃ vaṇijaṃ codayāmi sa na aitu puraetā no astu |
GV00avs___u:931: (AVŚ_3,15.1c) nudann arātiṃ paripanthinaṃ mṛgaṃ sa īśāno dhanadā astu mahyam ||1||
GV00avs___u:932: (AVŚ_3,15.2a) ye panthāno bahavo devayānā antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti |
GV00avs___u:933: (AVŚ_3,15.2c) te mā juṣantāṃ payasā ghṛtena yathā krītvā dhanam āharāṇi
GV00avs___u:934: (AVŚ_3,15.3a) idhmenāgna ichamāno ghṛtena juhomi havyaṃ tarase balāya |
GV00avs___u:935: (AVŚ_3,15.3c) yāvad īśe brahmaṇā vandamāna imāṃ dhiyaṃ śataseyāya devīm ||3||
GV00avs___u:936: (AVŚ_3,15.4a) imām agne śaraṇiṃ mīmṛṣo no yam adhvānam agāma dūram |
GV00avs___u:937: (AVŚ_3,15.4c) śunaṃ no astu prapaṇo vikrayaś ca pratipaṇaḥ phalinaṃ mā
GV00avs___u:939: (AVŚ_3,15.4e) idaṃ havyaṃ saṃvidānau juṣethāṃ śunaṃ no astu caritam utthitaṃ ca ||4||
GV00avs___u:940: (AVŚ_3,15.5a) yena dhanena prapaṇaṃ carāmi dhanena devā dhanam ichamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:941: (AVŚ_3,15.5c) tan me bhūyo bhavatu mā kanīyo 'gne sātaghno devān haviṣā ni ṣedha ||5||
GV00avs___u:942: (AVŚ_3,15.6a) yena dhanena prapaṇaṃ carāmi dhanena devā dhanam ichamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:943: (AVŚ_3,15.6c) tasmin ma indro rucim ā dadhātu prajāpatiḥ savitā somo agniḥ
GV00avs___u:944: (AVŚ_3,15.7a) upa tvā namasā vayaṃ hotar vaiśvānara stumaḥ |
GV00avs___u:945: (AVŚ_3,15.7c) sa naḥ prajāsv ātmasu goṣu prāṇeṣu jāgṛhi ||7||
GV00avs___u:946: (AVŚ_3,15.8a) viśvāhā te sadam id bharemāśvāyeva tiṣṭhate jātavedaḥ |
GV00avs___u:947: (AVŚ_3,15.8c) rāyas poṣeṇa sam iṣā madanto mā te agne prativeśā riṣāma
GV00avs___u:948: (AVŚ_3,16.1a) prātar agniṃ prātar indram havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā |
GV00avs___u:949: (AVŚ_3,16.1c) prātar bhagaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇas patiṃ prātaḥ somam uta rudraṃ havāmahe ||1||
GV00avs___u:950: (AVŚ_3,16.2a) prātarjitaṃ bhagam ugram havāmahe vayaṃ putram aditer yo vidhartā |
GV00avs___u:951: (AVŚ_3,16.2c) ādhraś cid yaṃ manyamānas turaś cid rājā cid yaṃ bhagaṃ bhakṣīty āha ||2||
GV00avs___u:952: (AVŚ_3,16.3a) bhaga praṇetar bhaga satyarādho bhagemāṃ dhiyam ud avā dadan
GV00avs___u:954: (AVŚ_3,16.3c) bhaga pra ṇo janaya gobhir aśvair bhaga pra nṛbhir nṛvantaḥ syāma ||3||
GV00avs___u:955: (AVŚ_3,16.4a) utedānīṃ bhagavantaḥ syāmota prapitva uta madhye ahnām |
GV00avs___u:956: (AVŚ_3,16.4c) utoditau maghavant sūryasya vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma
GV00avs___u:957: (AVŚ_3,16.5a) bhaga eva bhagavāṃ astu devas tenā vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma |
GV00avs___u:958: (AVŚ_3,16.5c) taṃ tvā bhaga sarva ij johavīmi sa no bhaga puraetā bhaveha ||5||
GV00avs___u:959: (AVŚ_3,16.6a) sam adhvarāyoṣaso namanta dadhikrāveva śucaye padāya |
GV00avs___u:960: (AVŚ_3,16.6c) arvācīnaṃ vasuvidaṃ bhagaṃ me ratham ivāśvā vājina ā vahantu
GV00avs___u:961: (AVŚ_3,16.7a) aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam uchantu bhadrāḥ |
GV00avs___u:962: (AVŚ_3,16.7c) ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:963: (AVŚ_3,17.1a) sīrā yuñjanti kavayo yugā vi tanvate pṛthak |
GV00avs___u:965: (AVŚ_3,17.2a) yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanota kṛte yonau vapateha bījam |
GV00avs___u:966: (AVŚ_3,17.2c) virājaḥ śnuṣṭiḥ sabharā asan no nedīya it sṛṇyaḥ pakvam ā yavan ||2||
GV00avs___u:968: (AVŚ_3,17.3c) ud id vapatu gām aviṃ prasthāvad rathavāhanaṃ pībarīṃ ca
GV00avs___u:970: (AVŚ_3,17.4a) indraḥ sītāṃ ni gṛhṇātu tāṃ pūṣābhi rakṣatu |
GV00avs___u:971: (AVŚ_3,17.4c) sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarāmuttarāṃ samām ||4||
GV00avs___u:972: (AVŚ_3,17.5a) śunaṃ suphālā vi tudantu bhūmiṃ śunaṃ kīnāśā anu yantu vāhān
GV00avs___u:973: (AVŚ_3,17.5c) śunāsīrā haviṣā tośamānā supippalā oṣadhīḥ kartam asmai
GV00avs___u:974: (AVŚ_3,17.6a) śunaṃ vāhāḥ śunaṃ naraḥ śunaṃ kṛṣatu lāṅgalam |
GV00avs___u:975: (AVŚ_3,17.6c) śunaṃ varatrā badhyantāṃ śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya ||6||
GV00avs___u:977: (AVŚ_3,17.7c) yad divi cakrathuḥ payas tenemām upa siñcatam ||7||
GV00avs___u:979: (AVŚ_3,17.8c) yathā naḥ sumanā aso yathā naḥ suphalā bhuvaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:980: (AVŚ_3,17.9a) ghṛtena sītā madhunā samaktā viśvair devair anumatā marudbhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:981: (AVŚ_3,17.9c) sā naḥ sīte payasābhyāvavṛtsvorjasvatī ghṛtavat pinvamānā
GV00avs___u:983: (AVŚ_3,18.1c) yayā sapatnīṃ bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim ||1||
GV00avs___u:985: (AVŚ_3,18.2c) sapatnīṃ me parā ṇuda patiṃ me kevalaṃ kṛdhi ||2||
GV00avs___u:986: (AVŚ_3,18.3a) nahi te nāma jagrāha no asmin ramase patau |
GV00avs___u:990: (AVŚ_3,18.5a) aham asmi sahamānātho tvam asi sāsahiḥ |
GV00avs___u:991: (AVŚ_3,18.5c) ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvā sapatnīṃ me sahāvahai ||5||
GV00avs___u:992: (AVŚ_3,18.6a) abhi te 'dhāṃ sahamānām upa te 'dhāṃ sahīyasīm |
GV00avs___u:993: (AVŚ_3,18.6c) mām anu pra te mano vatsaṃ gaur iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva
GV00avs___u:995: (AVŚ_3,19.1a) saṃśitaṃ ma idaṃ brahma saṃśitaṃ vīryaṃ balam |
GV00avs___u:996: (AVŚ_3,19.1c) saṃśitaṃ kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇur yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:997: (AVŚ_3,19.2a) sam aham eṣāṃ rāṣṭraṃ syāmi sam ojo vīryaṃ balam |
GV00avs___u:998: (AVŚ_3,19.2c) vṛścāmi śatrūṇāṃ bāhūn anena haviṣā aham ||2||
GV00avs___u:999: (AVŚ_3,19.3a) nīcaiḥ padyantām adhare bhavantu ye naḥ sūriṃ maghavānaṃ pṛtanyān |
GV00avs___u:1000: (AVŚ_3,19.3c) kṣiṇāmi brahmaṇāmitrān un nayāmi svān aham ||3||
GV00avs___u:1002: (AVŚ_3,19.4c) indrasya vajrāt tīkṣṇīyāṃso yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1003: (AVŚ_3,19.5a) eṣām aham āyudhā saṃ syāmy eṣāṃ rāṣṭraṃ suvīraṃ vardhayāmi |
GV00avs___u:1004: (AVŚ_3,19.5c) eṣām kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇv eṣāṃ cittaṃ viśve 'vantu
GV00avs___u:1006: (AVŚ_3,19.6a) ud dharṣantāṃ maghavan vājināny ud vīrāṇāṃ jayatām etu ghoṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1007: (AVŚ_3,19.6c) pṛthag ghoṣā ululayaḥ ketumanta ud īratām |
GV00avs___u:1009: (AVŚ_3,19.7a) pretā jayatā nara ugrā vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1012: (AVŚ_3,19.8c) jaya amitrān pra padyasva jahy eṣāṃ varaṃvaraṃ māmīṣāṃ moci
GV00avs___u:1014: (AVŚ_3,20.1a) ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviyo yato jāto arocathāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1015: (AVŚ_3,20.1c) taṃ jānann agna ā rohādhā no vardhaya rayim ||1||
GV00avs___u:1016: (AVŚ_3,20.2a) agne achā vadeha naḥ pratyaṅ naḥ sumanā bhava |
GV00avs___u:1017: (AVŚ_3,20.2c) pra ṇo yacha viśāṃ pate dhanadā asi nas tvam ||2||
GV00avs___u:1018: (AVŚ_3,20.3a) pra ṇo yachatv aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:1019: (AVŚ_3,20.3c) pra devīḥ prota sūnṛtā rayiṃ devī dadhātu me ||3||
GV00avs___u:1021: (AVŚ_3,20.4c) ādityam viṣṇum sūryaṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim ||4||
GV00avs___u:1022: (AVŚ_3,20.5a) tvaṃ no agne agnibhir brahma yajñaṃ vardhaya |
GV00avs___u:1023: (AVŚ_3,20.5c) tvaṃ no deva dātave rayiṃ dānāya codaya ||5||
GV00avs___u:1025: (AVŚ_3,20.6c) yathā naḥ sarva ij janaḥ saṃgatyāṃ sumanā asad dānakāmaś ca no bhuvat ||6||
GV00avs___u:1027: (AVŚ_3,20.7c) vātaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca vājinam ||7||
GV00avs___u:1028: (AVŚ_3,20.8a) vājasya nu prasave saṃ babhūvimemā ca viśvā bhuvanāni antaḥ
GV00avs___u:1029: (AVŚ_3,20.8c) utāditsantaṃ dāpayatu prajānan rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ ni yacha ||8||
GV00avs___u:1030: (AVŚ_3,20.9a) duhrām me pañca pradiṣo duhrām urvīr yathābalam |
GV00avs___u:1031: (AVŚ_3,20.9c) prāpeyaṃ sarvā ākūtīr manasā hṛdayena ca ||9||
GV00avs___u:1033: (AVŚ_3,20.10c) ā rundhāṃ sarvato vāyus tvaṣṭā poṣaṃ dadhātu me ||10||
GV00avs___u:1034: (AVŚ_3,21.1a) ye agnayo apsv antar ye vṛtre ye puruṣe ye aśmasu |
GV00avs___u:1035: (AVŚ_3,21.1c) ya āviveśoṣadhīr yo vanaspatīṃs tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||1||
GV00avs___u:1036: (AVŚ_3,21.2a) yaḥ some antar yo goṣv antar ya āviṣṭo vayaḥsu yo mṛgeṣu |
GV00avs___u:1037: (AVŚ_3,21.2c) ya āviveśa dvipado yas catuṣpadas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv
GV00avs___u:1039: (AVŚ_3,21.3a) ya indreṇa sarathaṃ yāti devo vaiśvānara uta viśvadāvyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1040: (AVŚ_3,21.3c) yaṃ johavīmi pṛtanāsu sāsahiṃ tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||3||
GV00avs___u:1041: (AVŚ_3,21.4a) yo devo viśvād yam u kāmam āhur yaṃ dātāraṃ pratigṛhṇantam āhuḥ |
GV00avs___u:1042: (AVŚ_3,21.4c) yo dhīraḥ śakraḥ paribhūr adābhyas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||4||
GV00avs___u:1043: (AVŚ_3,21.5a) yaṃ tvā hotāraṃ manasābhi saṃvidus trayodaśa bhauvanāḥ pañca mānavāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1044: (AVŚ_3,21.5c) varcodhase yaśase sūnṛtāvate tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||5||
GV00avs___u:1046: (AVŚ_3,21.6c) vaiśvānarajyeṣṭhebhyas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||6||
GV00avs___u:1047: (AVŚ_3,21.7a) divaṃ pṛthivīm anv antarikṣam ye vidyutam anusaṃcaranti |
GV00avs___u:1048: (AVŚ_3,21.7c) ye dikṣv antar ye vāte antas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||7||
GV00avs___u:1049: (AVŚ_3,21.8a) hiraṇyapāṇiṃ savitāram indraṃ bṛhaspatiṃ varuṇaṃ mitram
GV00avs___u:1051: (AVŚ_3,21.8c) viśvān devān aṅgiraso havāmahe imaṃ kravyādaṃ śamayantv agnim ||8||
GV00avs___u:1053: (AVŚ_3,21.9c) atho yo viśvadāvyas taṃ kravyādam aśīśamam ||9||
GV00avs___u:1055: (AVŚ_3,21.10c) vātaḥ parjanya ād agnis te kravyādam aśīśaman ||10||
GV00avs___u:1056: (AVŚ_3,22.1a) hastivarcasaṃ prathatāṃ bṛhad yaśo adityā yat tanvaḥ saṃbabhūva |
GV00avs___u:1057: (AVŚ_3,22.1c) tat sarve sam adur mahyam etad viśve devā aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ
GV00avs___u:1058: (AVŚ_3,22.2a) mitraś ca varuṇaś cendro rudraś ca cetatu |
GV00avs___u:1060: (AVŚ_3,22.3a) yena hastī varcasā saṃbabhūva yena rājā manuṣyesv apsv antaḥ
GV00avs___u:1061: (AVŚ_3,22.3c) yena devā devatām agra āyan tena mām adya varcasāgne
GV00avs___u:1063: (AVŚ_3,22.4a) yat te varco jātavedo bṛhad bhavaty āhuteḥ |
GV00avs___u:1064: (AVŚ_3,22.4c) yāvat sūryasya varca āsurasya ca hastinaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1065: (AVŚ_3,22.4e) tāvan me aśvinā varca ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā ||4||
GV00avs___u:1066: (AVŚ_3,22.5a) yāvac catasraḥ pradiśaś cakṣur yāvat samaśnute |
GV00avs___u:1067: (AVŚ_3,22.5c) tāvat samaitv indriyaṃ mayi tad dhastivarcasam ||5||
GV00avs___u:1068: (AVŚ_3,22.6a) hastī mṛgāṇāṃ suṣadām atiṣṭhāvān babhūva hi |
GV00avs___u:1069: (AVŚ_3,22.6c) tasya bhagena varcasābhi ṣiñcāmi mām aham ||6||
GV00avs___u:1070: (AVŚ_3,23.1a) yena vehad babhūvitha nāśayāmasi tat tvat |
GV00avs___u:1071: (AVŚ_3,23.1c) idaṃ tad anyatra tvad apa dūre ni dadhmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:1072: (AVŚ_3,23.2a) ā te yoniṃ garbha etu pumān bāṇa iveṣudhim |
GV00avs___u:1073: (AVŚ_3,23.2c) ā vīro 'tra jāyatāṃ putras te daśamāsyaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1074: (AVŚ_3,23.3a) pumāṃsaṃ putraṃ janaya taṃ pumān anu jāyatām |
GV00avs___u:1075: (AVŚ_3,23.3c) bhavāsi putrāṇāṃ mātā jātānāṃ janayāś ca yān ||3||
GV00avs___u:1076: (AVŚ_3,23.4a) yāni badrāṇi bījāny ṛṣabhā janayanti ca |
GV00avs___u:1077: (AVŚ_3,23.4c) tais tvaṃ putraṃ vindasva sā prasūr dhenukā bhava ||4||
GV00avs___u:1078: (AVŚ_3,23.5a) kṛṇomi te prājāpatyam ā yoniṃ garbha etu te |
GV00avs___u:1079: (AVŚ_3,23.5c) vindasva tvaṃ putraṃ nāri yas tubhyaṃ śam asac cham u tasmai tvam bhava ||5||
GV00avs___u:1080: (AVŚ_3,23.6a) yāsām dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudro mūlaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva
GV00avs___u:1081: (AVŚ_3,23.6c) tās tvā putravidyāya daivīḥ prāvantv oṣadhayaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1085: (AVŚ_3,24.2c) saṃbhṛtvā nāma yo devas taṃ vayaṃ havāmahe yoyo ayajvano
GV00avs___u:1087: (AVŚ_3,24.3a) imā yāḥ pañca pradiśo mānavīḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1088: (AVŚ_3,24.3c) vṛṣṭe śāpaṃ nadīr iveha sphātiṃ samāvahān ||3||
GV00avs___u:1094: (AVŚ_3,24.6c) tāsāṃ yā sphātimattamā tayā tvābhi mṛśāmasi ||6||
GV00avs___u:1095: (AVŚ_3,24.7a) upohaś ca samūhaś ca kṣattārau te prajāpate |
GV00avs___u:1096: (AVŚ_3,24.7c) tāv ihā vahatāṃ sphātiṃ bahuṃ bhūmānam akṣitam ||7||
GV00avs___u:1097: (AVŚ_3,25.1a) uttudas tvot tudatu mā dhṛthāḥ śayane sve |
GV00avs___u:1098: (AVŚ_3,25.1c) iṣuḥ kāmasya yā bhīmā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi ||1||
GV00avs___u:1100: (AVŚ_3,25.2c) tāṃ susaṃnatāṃ kṛtvā kāmo vidhyatu tvā hṛdi ||2||
GV00avs___u:1102: (AVŚ_3,25.3c) prācīnapakṣā vyoṣā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi ||3||
GV00avs___u:1103: (AVŚ_3,25.4a) śucā viddhā vyoṣayā śuṣkāsyābhi sarpa mā |
GV00avs___u:1105: (AVŚ_3,25.5a) ājāmi tvājanyā pari mātur atho pituḥ |
GV00avs___u:1106: (AVŚ_3,25.5c) yathā mama kratāv aso mama cittam upāyasi ||5||
GV00avs___u:1107: (AVŚ_3,25.6a) vy asyai mitrāvaruṇau hṛdaś cittāny asyatam |
GV00avs___u:1108: (AVŚ_3,25.6c) athainām akratuṃ kṛtvā mamaiva kṛṇutaṃ vaśe ||6||
GV00avs___u:1109: (AVŚ_3,26.1a) ye 'syāṃ stha prācyāṃ diśi hetayo nāma devās teṣāṃ vo agnir
GV00avs___u:1111: (AVŚ_3,26.1c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ
GV00avs___u:1113: (AVŚ_3,26.2a) ye 'syāṃ stha dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśy aviṣyavo nāma devās teṣāṃ vaḥ kāma iṣavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1114: (AVŚ_3,26.2c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ
GV00avs___u:1116: (AVŚ_3,26.3a) ye 'syāṃ stha pratīcyāṃ diśi vairājā nāma devās teṣāṃ va āpa
GV00avs___u:1118: (AVŚ_3,26.3c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ

GV00avs___u:1121: (AVŚ_3,26.4c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ
GV00avs___u:1123: (AVŚ_3,26.5a) ye 'syāṃ stha dhruvāyāṃ diśi nilimpā nāma devās teṣāṃ va oṣadhīr iṣavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1124: (AVŚ_3,26.5c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ

GV00avs___u:1127: (AVŚ_3,26.6c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ
GV00avs___u:1129: (AVŚ_3,27.1a) prācī dig agnir adhipatir asito rakṣitādityā iṣavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1130: (AVŚ_3,27.1c) tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo nama ebhyo astu |
GV00avs___u:1131: (AVŚ_3,27.1e) yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmaḥ ||1||

GV00avs___u:1134: (AVŚ_3,27.2c) tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo nama ebhyo astu |
GV00avs___u:1135: (AVŚ_3,27.2e) yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1136: (AVŚ_3,27.3a) pratīcī dig varuṇo 'dhipatiḥ pṛdākū rakṣitānnam iṣavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1137: (AVŚ_3,27.3c) tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo nama ebhyo astu |
GV00avs___u:1138: (AVŚ_3,27.3e) yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:1139: (AVŚ_3,27.4a) udīcī dik somo 'dhipatiḥ svajo rakṣitāśanir iṣavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1140: (AVŚ_3,27.4c) tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo nama ebhyo astu |
GV00avs___u:1141: (AVŚ_3,27.4e) yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1142: (AVŚ_3,27.5a) dhruvā dig viṣṇur adhipatiḥ kalmāṣagrīvo rakṣitā vīrudha iṣavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1143: (AVŚ_3,27.5c) tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo nama ebhyo astu |

GV00avs___u:1145: (AVŚ_3,27.6a) ūrdhvā dig bṛhaspatir adhipatiḥ śvitro rakṣitā varṣam iṣavaḥ |
