GV00avs___u:1148: (AVŚ_3,28.1a) ekaikayaiṣā sṛṣṭyā saṃ babhūva yatra gā asṛjanta bhūtakṛto viśvarūpāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1149: (AVŚ_3,28.1c) yatra vijāyate yaminy apartuḥ sā paśūn kṣiṇāti riphatī ruśatī ||1||
GV00avs___u:1150: (AVŚ_3,28.2a) eṣā paśūnt saṃ kṣiṇāti kravyād bhūtvā vyadvarī |
GV00avs___u:1151: (AVŚ_3,28.2c) utaināṃ brahmaṇe dadyāt tathā syonā śivā syāt ||2||
GV00avs___u:1152: (AVŚ_3,28.3a) śivā bhava puruṣebhyo gobhyo aśvebhyaḥ śivā |
GV00avs___u:1153: (AVŚ_3,28.3c) śivāsmai sarvasmai kṣetrāya śivā na ihaidhi ||3||
GV00avs___u:1154: (AVŚ_3,28.4a) iha puṣṭir iha rasa iha sahasrasātamā bhava |
GV00avs___u:1156: (AVŚ_3,28.5a) yatrā suhārdaḥ sukṛto madanti vihāya rogaṃ tanvaḥ svāyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1157: (AVŚ_3,28.5c) taṃ lokaṃ yaminy abhisaṃbabhūva sā no mā hiṃsīt puruṣān
GV00avs___u:1159: (AVŚ_3,28.6a) yatrā suhārdāṃ sukṛtām agnihotrahutām yatra lokaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1160: (AVŚ_3,28.6c) taṃ lokaṃ yaminy abhisaṃbabhūva sā no mā hiṃsīt puruṣān
GV00avs___u:1162: (AVŚ_3,29.1a) yad rājāno vibhajanta iṣṭāpūrtasya ṣoḍaśam yamasyāmī
GV00avs___u:1164: (AVŚ_3,29.1c) avis tasmāt pra muñcati dattaḥ śitipāt svadhā ||1||
GV00avs___u:1165: (AVŚ_3,29.2a) sarvān kāmān pūrayaty ābhavan prabhavan bhavan |
GV00avs___u:1167: (AVŚ_3,29.3a) yo dadāti śitipādam aviṃ lokena saṃmitam |
GV00avs___u:1168: (AVŚ_3,29.3c) sa nākam abhyārohati yatra śulko na kriyate abalena balīyase
GV00avs___u:1173: (AVŚ_3,29.6a) ireva nopa dasyati samudra iva payo mahat |
GV00avs___u:1174: (AVŚ_3,29.6c) devau savāsināv iva śitipān nopa dasyati ||6||
GV00avs___u:1175: (AVŚ_3,29.7a) ka idaṃ kasmā adāt kāmaḥ kāmāyādāt |
GV00avs___u:1176: (AVŚ_3,29.7c) kāmo dātā kāmaḥ pratigrahītā kāmaḥ samudram ā viveśa |
GV00avs___u:1177: (AVŚ_3,29.7e) kāmena tvā prati gṛhnāmi kāmaitat te ||7||
GV00avs___u:1178: (AVŚ_3,29.8a) bhūmiṣ ṭvā prati gṛhṇātv antarikṣam idaṃ mahat |
GV00avs___u:1179: (AVŚ_3,29.8c) māhaṃ prāṇena mātmanā mā prajayā pratigṛhya vi rādhiṣi ||8||
GV00avs___u:1181: (AVŚ_3,30.1c) anyo anyam abhi haryata vatsaṃ jātam ivāghnyā ||1||
GV00avs___u:1182: (AVŚ_3,30.2a) anuvrataḥ pituḥ putro mātrā bhavatu saṃmanāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1183: (AVŚ_3,30.2c) jāyā patye madhumatīṃ vācaṃ vadatu śantivām ||2||
GV00avs___u:1184: (AVŚ_3,30.3a) mā bhrātā bhrātaraṃ dvikṣan mā svasāram uta svasā |
GV00avs___u:1185: (AVŚ_3,30.3c) samyañcaḥ savratā bhūtvā vācaṃ vadata bhadrayā ||3||
GV00avs___u:1186: (AVŚ_3,30.4a) yena devā na viyanti no ca vidviṣate mithaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1187: (AVŚ_3,30.4c) tat kṛṇmo brahma vo gṛhe saṃjñānaṃ puruṣebhyaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1188: (AVŚ_3,30.5a) jyāyasvantaś cittino mā vi yauṣṭa saṃrādhayantaḥ sadhurāś carantaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1189: (AVŚ_3,30.5c) anyo anyasmai valgu vadanta eta sadhrīcīnān vaḥ saṃmanasas krṇomi ||5||
GV00avs___u:1190: (AVŚ_3,30.6a) samānī prapā saha vo 'nnabhāgaḥ samāne yoktre saha vo yunajmi |
GV00avs___u:1192: (AVŚ_3,30.7a) sadhrīcīnān vaḥ saṃmanasas kṛṇomy ekaśnuṣṭīnt saṃvananena
GV00avs___u:1194: (AVŚ_3,30.7c) devā ivāmṛtaṃ rakṣamāṇāḥ sāyaṃprātaḥ saumanaso vo astu ||7||
GV00avs___u:1195: (AVŚ_3,31.1a) vi devā jarasāvṛtan vi tvam agne arātyā |
GV00avs___u:1196: (AVŚ_3,31.1c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||1||
GV00avs___u:1197: (AVŚ_3,31.2a) vy ārtyā pavamāno vi śakraḥ pāpakṛtyayā |
GV00avs___u:1198: (AVŚ_3,31.2c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||2||
GV00avs___u:1199: (AVŚ_3,31.3a) vi grāmyāḥ paśava āraṇyair vy āpas tṛṣṇayāsaran |
GV00avs___u:1200: (AVŚ_3,31.3c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||3||
GV00avs___u:1201: (AVŚ_3,31.4a) vī me dyāvāpṛthivī ito vi panthāno diśaṃdiśam |
GV00avs___u:1202: (AVŚ_3,31.4c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||4||
GV00avs___u:1203: (AVŚ_3,31.5a) tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatuṃ yunaktītīdaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ vi yāti |
GV00avs___u:1204: (AVŚ_3,31.5c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||5||
GV00avs___u:1205: (AVŚ_3,31.6a) agniḥ prāṇānt saṃ dadhāti candraḥ prāṇena saṃhitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1206: (AVŚ_3,31.6c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||6||
GV00avs___u:1207: (AVŚ_3,31.7a) prāṇena viśvatovīryaṃ devāḥ sūryaṃ sam airayan |
GV00avs___u:1208: (AVŚ_3,31.7c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||7||
GV00avs___u:1209: (AVŚ_3,31.8a) āyuṣmatām āyuṣkṛtāṃ prāṇena jīva mā mṛthāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1210: (AVŚ_3,31.8c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||8||
GV00avs___u:1211: (AVŚ_3,31.9a) prāṇena prāṇatāṃ prāṇehaiva bhava mā mṛthāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1212: (AVŚ_3,31.9c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||9||
GV00avs___u:1213: (AVŚ_3,31.10a) ud āyuṣā sam āyuṣod oṣadhīnāṃ rasena |
GV00avs___u:1214: (AVŚ_3,31.10c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||10||
GV00avs___u:1216: (AVŚ_3,31.11c) vy ahaṃ sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā ||11||
GV00avs___u:1217: (AVŚ_4,1.1a) brahma jajñānaṃ prathamaṃ purastād vi sīmataḥ suruco vena āvaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1218: (AVŚ_4,1.1c) sa budhnyā upamā asya viṣṭhāḥ sataś ca yonim asataś ca vi vaḥ
GV00avs___u:1219: (AVŚ_4,1.2a) iyaṃ pitryā rāṣṭry etv agre prathamāya januṣe bhuvaneṣṭhāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1220: (AVŚ_4,1.2c) tasmā etaṃ surucaṃ hvāram ahyaṃ gharmaṃ śrīṇantu prathamāya dhāsyave ||2||
GV00avs___u:1221: (AVŚ_4,1.3a) pra yo jajñe vidvān asya bandhur viśvā devānāṃ janimā vivakti
GV00avs___u:1222: (AVŚ_4,1.3c) brahma brahmaṇa uj jabhāra madhyān nicair uccaiḥ svadhā abhi
GV00avs___u:1224: (AVŚ_4,1.4a) sa hi vidaḥ sa pṛthivyā ṛtasthā mahī kṣemaṃ rodasī askabhāyat
GV00avs___u:1225: (AVŚ_4,1.4c) mahān mahī askabhāyad vi jāto dyāṃ sadma pārthivaṃ ca rajaḥ
GV00avs___u:1226: (AVŚ_4,1.5a) sa bhudhnyād āṣṭra januṣo 'bhy agram bṛhaspatir devatā tasya samrāṭ |
GV00avs___u:1227: (AVŚ_4,1.5c) ahar yac chukraṃ jyotiṣo janiṣṭātha dyumanto vi vasantu viprāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:1228: (AVŚ_4,1.6a) nūnaṃ tad asya kāvyo hinoti maho devasya pūrvyasya dhāma |
GV00avs___u:1229: (AVŚ_4,1.6c) eṣa jajñe bahubhiḥ sākam itthā pūrve ardhe viṣite sasan nu
GV00avs___u:1230: (AVŚ_4,1.7a) yo 'tharvāṇaṃ pitaraṃ devabandhuṃ bṛhaspatiṃ namasāva ca gachāt |
GV00avs___u:1231: (AVŚ_4,1.7c) tvaṃ viśveṣāṃ janitā yathāsaḥ kavir devo na dabhāyat svadhāvān ||7||
GV00avs___u:1232: (AVŚ_4,2.1a) ya ātmadā baladā yasya viśva upāsate praśiṣaṃ yasya devāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1233: (AVŚ_4,2.1c) yo 'syeśe dvipado yaś catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema
GV00avs___u:1234: (AVŚ_4,2.2a) yaḥ prāṇato nimiṣato mahitvaiko rājā jagato babhūva |
GV00avs___u:1235: (AVŚ_4,2.2c) yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||2||
GV00avs___u:1236: (AVŚ_4,2.3a) yaṃ krandasī avataś caskabhāne bhiyasāne rodasī ahvayethām |
GV00avs___u:1237: (AVŚ_4,2.3c) yasyāsau panthā rajaso vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||3||
GV00avs___u:1238: (AVŚ_4,2.4a) yasya dyaur urvī pṛthivī ca mahī yasyāda urv antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:1239: (AVŚ_4,2.4c) yasyāsau sūro vitato mahitvā kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||4||
GV00avs___u:1240: (AVŚ_4,2.5a) yasya viśve himavanto mahitvā samudre yasya rasām id āhuḥ |
GV00avs___u:1241: (AVŚ_4,2.5c) imāś ca pradiśo yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||5||
GV00avs___u:1242: (AVŚ_4,2.6a) āpo agre viśvam āvan garbhaṃ dadhānā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1243: (AVŚ_4,2.6c) yāsu devīṣv adhi deva āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||6||
GV00avs___u:1244: (AVŚ_4,2.7a) hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sam avartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patir eka āsīt |
GV00avs___u:1245: (AVŚ_4,2.7c) sa dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema
GV00avs___u:1246: (AVŚ_4,2.8a) āpo vatsaṃ janayantīr garbham agre sam airayan |
GV00avs___u:1247: (AVŚ_4,2.8c) tasyota jāyamānasyolba āsīd dhiraṇyayaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||8||
GV00avs___u:1248: (AVŚ_4,3.1a) ud itas trayo akraman vyāghraḥ puruṣo vṛkaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1249: (AVŚ_4,3.1c) hirug ghi yanti sindhavo hirug devo vanaspatir hiruṅ namantu
GV00avs___u:1253: (AVŚ_4,3.3a) akṣyau ca te mukhaṃ ca te vyāghra jambhayāmasi |
GV00avs___u:1256: (AVŚ_4,3.4c) ād u ṣṭenam atho ahiṃ yātudhānam atho vṛkam ||4||
GV00avs___u:1257: (AVŚ_4,3.5a) yo adya stena āyati sa saṃpiṣṭo apāyati |
GV00avs___u:1258: (AVŚ_4,3.5c) pathām apadhvaṃsenaitv indro vajreṇa hantu tam ||5||
GV00avs___u:1259: (AVŚ_4,3.6a) mūrṇā mṛgasya dantā apiśīrṇā u pṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1260: (AVŚ_4,3.6c) nimruk te godhā bhavatu nīcāyac chaśayur mṛgaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1261: (AVŚ_4,3.7a) yat saṃyamo na vi yamo vi yamo yan na saṃyamaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1263: (AVŚ_4,4.1a) yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanad varuṇāya mṛtabhraje |
GV00avs___u:1264: (AVŚ_4,4.1c) tāṃ tvā vayaṃ khanāmasy oṣadhiṃ śepaharṣaṇīm ||1||
GV00avs___u:1265: (AVŚ_4,4.2a) ud uṣā ud u sūrya ud idaṃ māmakaṃ vacaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1266: (AVŚ_4,4.2c) ud ejatu prajāpatir vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa vājinā ||2||
GV00avs___u:1268: (AVŚ_4,4.3c) tatas te śuṣmavattaram iyaṃ kṛṇotv oṣadhiḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:1270: (AVŚ_4,4.4c) saṃ puṃsām indra vṛṣṇyam asmin dhehi tanūvaśin ||4||
GV00avs___u:1272: (AVŚ_4,4.5c) uta somasya bhrātāsy utārśam asi vṛṣṇyam ||5||
GV00avs___u:1273: (AVŚ_4,4.6a) adyāgne adya savitar adya devi sarasvati |
GV00avs___u:1274: (AVŚ_4,4.6c) adyāsya brahmaṇas pate dhanur ivā tānayā pasaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1275: (AVŚ_4,4.7a) āhaṃ tanomi te paso adhi jyām iva dhanvani |
GV00avs___u:1278: (AVŚ_4,4.8c) atha ṛṣabhasya ye vājās tān asmin dhehi tanūvaśin ||8||
GV00avs___u:1280: (AVŚ_4,5.1c) tenā sahasyenā vayaṃ ni janānt svāpayāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:1281: (AVŚ_4,5.2a) na bhūmiṃ vāto ati vāti nāti paśyati kaś cana |
GV00avs___u:1282: (AVŚ_4,5.2c) striyaś ca sarvāḥ svāpaya śunaś cendrasakhā caran ||2||
GV00avs___u:1284: (AVŚ_4,5.3c) striyo yāḥ puṇyagandhayas tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:1287: (AVŚ_4,5.5a) ya āste yaś carati yaś ca tiṣṭhan vipaśyati |
GV00avs___u:1288: (AVŚ_4,5.5c) teṣāṃ saṃ dadhmo akṣīṇi yathedaṃ harmyaṃ tathā ||5||
GV00avs___u:1289: (AVŚ_4,5.6a) svaptu mātā svaptu pitā svaptu śvā svaptu viśpatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:1290: (AVŚ_4,5.6c) svapantv asyai jñātayaḥ svaptv ayam abhito janaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1291: (AVŚ_4,5.7a) svapna svapnābhikaraṇena sarvaṃ ni svāpayā janam |
GV00avs___u:1292: (AVŚ_4,5.7c) otsūryam anyānt svāpayāvyuṣaṃ jāgṛtād aham indra ivāriṣṭo akṣitaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1294: (AVŚ_4,6.1c) sa somaṃ prathamaḥ papau sa cakārārasaṃ viṣam ||1||
GV00avs___u:1295: (AVŚ_4,6.2a) yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvat sapta sindhavo vitaṣṭhire |
GV00avs___u:1296: (AVŚ_4,6.2c) vācaṃ viṣasya dūṣaṇīṃ tām ito nir avādiṣam ||2||
GV00avs___u:1297: (AVŚ_4,6.3a) suparṇas tvā garutmān viṣa prathamam āvayat |
GV00avs___u:1299: (AVŚ_4,6.4a) yas ta āsyat pañcāṅgurir vakrāc cid adhi dhanvanaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1300: (AVŚ_4,6.4c) apaskambhasya śalyān nir avocam ahaṃ viṣam ||4||
GV00avs___u:1301: (AVŚ_4,6.5a) śalyād viṣaṃ nir avocam prāñjanād uta parṇadheḥ |
GV00avs___u:1302: (AVŚ_4,6.5c) apāṣṭhāc chṛṅgāt kulmalān nir avocam aham viṣam ||5||
GV00avs___u:1303: (AVŚ_4,6.6a) arasas ta iṣo śalyo 'tho te arasaṃ viṣam |
GV00avs___u:1305: (AVŚ_4,6.7a) ye apīṣan ye adihan ya āsyan ye avāsṛjan |
GV00avs___u:1306: (AVŚ_4,6.7c) sarve te vadhrayaḥ kṛtā vadhrir viṣagiriḥ kṛtaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1307: (AVŚ_4,6.8a) vadhrayas te khanitāro vadhris tvam asy oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:1308: (AVŚ_4,6.8c) vadhriḥ sa parvato girir yato jātam idaṃ viṣam ||8||
GV00avs___u:1311: (AVŚ_4,7.2a) arasaṃ prācyaṃ viṣam arasaṃ yad udīcyam |
GV00avs___u:1314: (AVŚ_4,7.3c) kṣudhā kila tvā duṣṭano jakṣivānt sa na rūrupaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:1315: (AVŚ_4,7.4a) vi te madaṃ madāvati śaram iva pātayāmasi |
GV00avs___u:1316: (AVŚ_4,7.4c) pra tvā carum iva yeṣantaṃ vacasā sthāpayāmasi ||4||
GV00avs___u:1318: (AVŚ_4,7.5c) tiṣṭhā vṛkṣa iva sthāmny abhrikhāte na rūrupaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:1319: (AVŚ_4,7.6a) pavastais tvā pary akrīṇan dūrśebhir ajinair uta |
GV00avs___u:1320: (AVŚ_4,7.6c) prakrīr asi tvam oṣadhe 'bhrikhāte na rūrupaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1321: (AVŚ_4,7.7a) anāptā ye vaḥ prathamā yāni karmāṇi cakrire |
GV00avs___u:1322: (AVŚ_4,7.7c) vīrān no atra mā dabhan tad va etat puro dadhe ||7||
GV00avs___u:1323: (AVŚ_4,8.1a) bhūto bhūteṣu paya ā dadhāti sa bhūtānām adhipatir babhūva |
GV00avs___u:1324: (AVŚ_4,8.1c) tasya mṛtyuś carati rājasūyaṃ sa rājā anu manyatām idaṃ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1325: (AVŚ_4,8.2a) abhi prehi māpa vena ugraś cettā sapatnahā |
GV00avs___u:1326: (AVŚ_4,8.2c) ā tiṣṭha mitravardhana tubhyam devā adhi bruvan ||2||
GV00avs___u:1327: (AVŚ_4,8.3a) ātiṣṭhantaṃ pari viśve abhūṣaṃ chriyaṃ vasānaś carati svarociḥ |
GV00avs___u:1328: (AVŚ_4,8.3c) mahat tad vṛṣṇo asurasya nāmā viśvarūpo amṛtāni tasthau ||3||
GV00avs___u:1329: (AVŚ_4,8.4a) vyāghro adhi vaiyāghre vi kramasva diśo mahīḥ |
GV00avs___u:1330: (AVŚ_4,8.4c) viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantv āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1331: (AVŚ_4,8.5a) yā āpo divyāḥ payasā madanty antarikṣa uta vā pṛthivyām |
GV00avs___u:1332: (AVŚ_4,8.5c) tāsāṃ tvā sarvāsām apām abhi ṣiñcāmi varcasā ||5||
GV00avs___u:1333: (AVŚ_4,8.6a) abhi tvā varcasāsicann āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ |
GV00avs___u:1334: (AVŚ_4,8.6c) yathāso mitravardhanas tathā tvā savitā karat ||6||
GV00avs___u:1335: (AVŚ_4,8.7a) enā vyāghraṃ pariṣasvajānāḥ siṃhaṃ hinvanti mahate saubhagāya
GV00avs___u:1336: (AVŚ_4,8.7c) samudraṃ na subhuvas tasthivāṃsaṃ marmṛjyante dvīpinam apsv antaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1338: (AVŚ_4,9.1c) viśvebhir devair dattaṃ paridhir jīvanāya kam ||1||
GV00avs___u:1342: (AVŚ_4,9.3c) utāmṛtasya tvaṃ vetthātho asi jīvabhojanam atho
GV00avs___u:1345: (AVŚ_4,9.4c) tato yakṣmaṃ vi bādhasa ugro madhyamaśīr iva ||4||
GV00avs___u:1346: (AVŚ_4,9.5a) nainaṃ prāpnoti śapatho na kṛtyā nābhiśocanam |
GV00avs___u:1347: (AVŚ_4,9.5c) nainaṃ viṣkandham aśnute yas tvā bibharty āñjana ||5||
GV00avs___u:1349: (AVŚ_4,9.6c) durhārdaś cakṣuṣo ghorāt tasmān naḥ pāhy āñjana ||6||
GV00avs___u:1350: (AVŚ_4,9.7a) idaṃ vidvān āñjana satyaṃ vakṣyāmi nānṛtam |
GV00avs___u:1351: (AVŚ_4,9.7c) saneyam aśvaṃ gām aham ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa ||7||
GV00avs___u:1352: (AVŚ_4,9.8a) trayo dāsā āñjanasya takmā balāsa ād ahiḥ |
GV00avs___u:1353: (AVŚ_4,9.8c) varṣiṣṭhaḥ parvatānāṃ trikakun nāma te pitā ||8||
GV00avs___u:1354: (AVŚ_4,9.9a) yad āñjanaṃ traikakudam jātaṃ himavatas pari |
GV00avs___u:1355: (AVŚ_4,9.9c) yātūṃś ca sarvāñ jambhayat sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:1356: (AVŚ_4,9.10a) yadi vāsi traikakudaṃ yadi yāmunam ucyase |
GV00avs___u:1357: (AVŚ_4,9.10c) ubhe te bhadre nāmnī tābhyāṃ naḥ pāhy āñjana ||10||
GV00avs___u:1358: (AVŚ_4,10.1a) vātāj jāto antarikṣād vidyuto jyotiṣas pari |
GV00avs___u:1359: (AVŚ_4,10.1c) sa no hiraṇyajāḥ śaṅkhaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1360: (AVŚ_4,10.2a) yo agrato rocanānāṃ samudrād adhi jajñiṣe |
GV00avs___u:1361: (AVŚ_4,10.2c) śaṅkhena hatvā rakṣāṃsy attriṇo vi ṣahāmahe ||2||
GV00avs___u:1363: (AVŚ_4,10.3c) śaṅkho no viśvabheṣajaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:1364: (AVŚ_4,10.4a) divi jātaḥ samudrajaḥ sindhutas pary ābhṛtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1365: (AVŚ_4,10.4c) sa no hiraṇyajāḥ śaṅkha āyuṣprataraṇo maṇiḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1366: (AVŚ_4,10.5a) samudrāj jāto maṇir vṛtrāj jāto divākaraḥ |
GV00avs___u:1367: (AVŚ_4,10.5c) so asmānt sarvataḥ pātu hetyā devāsurebhyaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:1368: (AVŚ_4,10.6a) hiraṇyānām eko 'si somāt tvam adhi jajñiṣe |
GV00avs___u:1369: (AVŚ_4,10.6c) rathe tvam asi darśata iṣudhau rocanas tvaṃ pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat ||6||
GV00avs___u:1370: (AVŚ_4,10.7a) devānām asthi kṛśanaṃ babhūva tad ātmanvac caraty apsv antaḥ
GV00avs___u:1371: (AVŚ_4,10.7c) tat te badhnāmy āyuṣe varcase balāya dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya kārśanas tvābhi rakṣatu ||7||
GV00avs___u:1372: (AVŚ_4,11.1a) anaḍvān dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām anaḍvān dādhārorv antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:1373: (AVŚ_4,11.1c) anaḍvān dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīr anaḍvān viśvaṃ bhuvanam ā
GV00avs___u:1375: (AVŚ_4,11.2a) anaḍvān indraḥ sa paśubhyo vi caṣṭe trayāṃ chakro vi mimīte adhvanaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1376: (AVŚ_4,11.2c) bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad bhuvanā duhānaḥ sarvā devānām carati vratāni ||2||
GV00avs___u:1377: (AVŚ_4,11.3a) indro jāto manuṣyeṣv antar gharmas taptaś carati śośucānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1378: (AVŚ_4,11.3c) suprajāḥ sant sa udāre na sarṣad yo nāśnīyād anaḍuho vijānan
GV00avs___u:1379: (AVŚ_4,11.4a) anaḍvān duhe sukṛtasya loka ainaṃ pyāyayati pavamānaḥ purastāt |
GV00avs___u:1380: (AVŚ_4,11.4c) parjanyo dhārā maruta ūdho asya yajñaḥ payo dakṣiṇā doho
GV00avs___u:1382: (AVŚ_4,11.5a) yasya neśe yajñapatir na yajño nāsya dāteśe na pratigrahītā
GV00avs___u:1383: (AVŚ_4,11.5c) yo viśvajid viśvabhṛd viśvakarmā gharmaṃ no brūta yatamaś catuṣpāt ||5||
GV00avs___u:1384: (AVŚ_4,11.6a) yena devāḥ svar āruruhur hitvā śarīram amṛtasya nābhim |
GV00avs___u:1385: (AVŚ_4,11.6c) tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ gharmasya vratena tapasā yaśasyavaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1386: (AVŚ_4,11.7a) indro rūpeṇāgnir vahena prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāṭ |
GV00avs___u:1389: (AVŚ_4,11.8a) madhyam etad anaḍuho yatraiṣa vaha āhitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1390: (AVŚ_4,11.8c) etāvad asya prācīnaṃ yāvān pratyaṅ samāhitaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:1392: (AVŚ_4,11.9c) prajāṃ ca lokaṃ cāpnoti tathā saptaṛṣayo viduḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:1393: (AVŚ_4,11.10a) padbhiḥ sedim avakrāmann irāṃ jaṅghābhir utkhidan |
GV00avs___u:1395: (AVŚ_4,11.11a) dvādaśa vā etā rātrīr vratyā āhuḥ prajāpateḥ |
GV00avs___u:1396: (AVŚ_4,11.11c) tatropa brahma yo veda tad vā anaḍuho vratam ||11||
GV00avs___u:1397: (AVŚ_4,11.12a) duhe sāyaṃ duhe prātar duhe madhyaṃdinaṃ pari |
GV00avs___u:1398: (AVŚ_4,11.12c) dohā ye asya saṃyanti tān vidmānupadasvataḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:1399: (AVŚ_4,12.1a) rohaṇy asi rohaṇy asthnaś chinnasya rohaṇī |
GV00avs___u:1401: (AVŚ_4,12.2a) yat te riṣṭaṃ yat te dyuttam asti peṣṭraṃ ta ātmani |
GV00avs___u:1402: (AVŚ_4,12.2c) dhātā tad bhadrayā punaḥ saṃ dadhat paruṣā paruḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1403: (AVŚ_4,12.3a) saṃ te majjā majjñā bhavatu sam u te paruṣā paruḥ |
GV00avs___u:1404: (AVŚ_4,12.3c) saṃ te māṃsasya visrastaṃ sam asthy api rohatu ||3||
GV00avs___u:1405: (AVŚ_4,12.4a) majjā majñā saṃ dhīyatāṃ carmaṇā carma rohatu |
GV00avs___u:1406: (AVŚ_4,12.4c) asṛk te asthi rohatu māṃsaṃ māṃsena rohatu ||4||
GV00avs___u:1407: (AVŚ_4,12.5a) loma lomnā saṃ kalpayā tvacā saṃ kalpayā tvacam |
GV00avs___u:1408: (AVŚ_4,12.5c) asṛk te asthi rohatu chinnaṃ saṃ dhehy oṣadhe ||5||
GV00avs___u:1409: (AVŚ_4,12.6a) sa ut tiṣṭha prehi pra drava rathaḥ sucakraḥ |
GV00avs___u:1411: (AVŚ_4,12.7a) yadi kartaṃ patitvā saṃśaśre yadi vāśmā prahṛto jaghāna |
GV00avs___u:1412: (AVŚ_4,12.7c) ṛbhū rathasyevāṅgāni saṃ dadhat paruṣā paruḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1413: (AVŚ_4,13.1a) uta devā avahitaṃ devā un nayathā punaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1414: (AVŚ_4,13.1c) utāgaś cakruṣaṃ devā devā jīvayathā punaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1415: (AVŚ_4,13.2a) dvāv imau vātau vāta ā sindhor ā parāvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:1416: (AVŚ_4,13.2c) dakṣaṃ te anya āvātu vy anyo vātu yad rapaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1417: (AVŚ_4,13.3a) ā vāta vāhi bheṣajaṃ vi vāta vāhi yad rapaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1418: (AVŚ_4,13.3c) tvaṃ hi viśvabheṣaja devānāṃ dūta īyase ||3||
GV00avs___u:1419: (AVŚ_4,13.4a) trāyantām imaṃ devās trāyantāṃ marutāṃ gaṇāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1420: (AVŚ_4,13.4c) trāyantāṃ viśvā bhūtāni yathāyam arapā asat ||4||
GV00avs___u:1422: (AVŚ_4,13.5c) dakṣaṃ ta ugram ābhāriṣaṃ parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te ||5||
GV00avs___u:1423: (AVŚ_4,13.6a) ayaṃ me hasto bhagavān ayaṃ me bhagavattaraḥ |
GV00avs___u:1427: (AVŚ_4,14.1a) ajo hy agner ajaniṣṭa śokāt so apaśyaj janitāram agre |
GV00avs___u:1428: (AVŚ_4,14.1c) tena devā devatām agrā āyan tena rohān ruruhur medhyāsaḥ
GV00avs___u:1429: (AVŚ_4,14.2a) kramadhvam agninā nākam ukhyān hasteṣu bibhrataḥ |
GV00avs___u:1430: (AVŚ_4,14.2c) divas pṛṣṭhaṃ svar gatvā miśrā devebhir ādhvam ||2||
GV00avs___u:1431: (AVŚ_4,14.3a) pṛṣṭhāt pṛthivyā aham antarikṣam āruham antarikṣād divam āruham |
GV00avs___u:1432: (AVŚ_4,14.3c) divo nākasya pṛṣṭhāt svar jyotir agām aham ||3||
GV00avs___u:1433: (AVŚ_4,14.4a) svar yanto nāpekṣanta ā dyāṃ rohanti rodasī |
GV00avs___u:1435: (AVŚ_4,14.5a) agne prehi prathamo devatānāṃ cakṣur devānām uta mānuṣānām |
GV00avs___u:1436: (AVŚ_4,14.5c) iyakṣamāṇā bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ svar yantu yajamānāḥ svasti
GV00avs___u:1437: (AVŚ_4,14.6a) ajam anajmi payasā ghṛtena divyaṃ suparnaṃ payasaṃ bṛhantam |
GV00avs___u:1438: (AVŚ_4,14.6c) tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ svar ārohanto abhi nākam uttamam
GV00avs___u:1439: (AVŚ_4,14.7a) pañcaudanaṃ pañcabhir aṅgulibhir darvyoddhara pañcadhaitam odanam |
GV00avs___u:1440: (AVŚ_4,14.7c) prācyāṃ diśi śiro ajasya dhehi dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇaṃ dhehi pārśvam ||7||
GV00avs___u:1441: (AVŚ_4,14.8a) pratīcyāṃ diśi bhasadam asya dhehy uttarasyāṃ diśy uttaraṃ dhehi pārśvam
GV00avs___u:1442: (AVŚ_4,14.8c) ūrdhvāyāṃ diśy ajasyānūkaṃ dhehi diśi dhruvāyāṃ dhehi pājasyam antarikṣe madhyato madhyam asya ||8||
GV00avs___u:1443: (AVŚ_4,14.9a) śṛtam ajaṃ śṛtayā prorṇuhi tvacā sarvair aṅgaiḥ saṃbhṛtaṃ viśvarūpam |
GV00avs___u:1444: (AVŚ_4,14.9c) sa ut tisṭheto abhi nākam uttamaṃ padbhiś caturbhiḥ prati
GV00avs___u:1446: (AVŚ_4,15.1a) samutpatantu pradiśo nabhasvatīḥ sam abhrāṇi vātajūtāni
GV00avs___u:1448: (AVŚ_4,15.1c) mahaṛṣabhasya nadato nabhasvato vāśrā āpaḥ pṛthivīṃ
GV00avs___u:1450: (AVŚ_4,15.2a) sam īkṣayantu taviṣāḥ sudānavo 'pāṃ rasā oṣadhībhiḥ sacantām
GV00avs___u:1451: (AVŚ_4,15.2c) varṣasya sargā mahayantu bhūmiṃ pṛthag jāyantām oṣadhayo viśvarūpāḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1452: (AVŚ_4,15.3a) sam īkṣayasva gāyato nabhāṃsy apām vegāsaḥ pṛthag ud vijantām |
GV00avs___u:1453: (AVŚ_4,15.3c) varṣasya sargā mahayantu bhūmiṃ pṛthag jāyantām vīrudho viśvarūpāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:1454: (AVŚ_4,15.4a) gaṇās tvopa gāyantu mārutāḥ parjanya ghoṣiṇaḥ pṛthak |
GV00avs___u:1455: (AVŚ_4,15.4c) sargā varṣasya varṣato varṣantu pṛthivīm anu ||4||
GV00avs___u:1456: (AVŚ_4,15.5a) ud īrayata marutaḥ samudratas tveṣo arko nabha ut pātayātha
GV00avs___u:1457: (AVŚ_4,15.5c) mahaṛṣabhasya nadato nabhasvato vāśrā āpaḥ pṛthivīṃ
GV00avs___u:1459: (AVŚ_4,15.6a) abhi kranda stanayārdayodadhiṃ bhūmiṃ parjanya payasā sam aṅdhi |
GV00avs___u:1460: (AVŚ_4,15.6c) tvayā sṛṣṭaṃ bahulam aitu varṣam āśāraiṣī kṛśagur etv astam
GV00avs___u:1461: (AVŚ_4,15.7a) saṃ vo 'vantu sudānava utsā ajagarā uta |
GV00avs___u:1462: (AVŚ_4,15.7c) marudbhiḥ pracyutā meghā varṣantu pṛthivīm anu ||7||
GV00avs___u:1463: (AVŚ_4,15.8a) āśāmāśāṃ vi dyotatāṃ vātā vāntu diśodiśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1464: (AVŚ_4,15.8c) marudbhiḥ pracyutā meghāḥ saṃ yantu pṛthivīm anu ||8||
GV00avs___u:1465: (AVŚ_4,15.9a) āpo vidyud abhraṃ varṣaṃ saṃ vo 'vantu sudānava utsā ajagarā
GV00avs___u:1467: (AVŚ_4,15.9c) marudbhiḥ pracyutā meghāḥ prāvantu pṛthivīm anu ||9||
GV00avs___u:1468: (AVŚ_4,15.10a) apām agnis tanūbhiḥ saṃvidāno ya oṣadhīnām adhipā babhūva |
GV00avs___u:1469: (AVŚ_4,15.10c) sa no varṣaṃ vanutāṃ jātavedāḥ prāṇaṃ prajābhyo amṛtaṃ divas pari ||10||
GV00avs___u:1470: (AVŚ_4,15.11a) prajāpatiḥ salilād ā samudrād āpa īrayann udadhim ardayāti |
GV00avs___u:1471: (AVŚ_4,15.11c) pra pyāyatāṃ vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto 'rvān etena stanayitnunehi ||11||
GV00avs___u:1472: (AVŚ_4,15.12a) apo niṣiñcann asuraḥ pitā naḥ śvasantu gargarā apāṃ varuṇāva nīcīr apaḥ sṛja |
GV00avs___u:1476: (AVŚ_4,15.14a) upapravada maṇḍūki varṣaṃ ā vada tāduri |
GV00avs___u:1477: (AVŚ_4,15.14c) madhye hradasya plavasva vigṛhya caturaḥ padaḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:1479: (AVŚ_4,15.15c) varṣaṃ vanudhvaṃ pitaro marutāṃ mana ichata ||15||
GV00avs___u:1480: (AVŚ_4,15.16a) mahāntaṃ kośam ud acābhi ṣiñca savidyutaṃ bhavatu vātu vātaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1481: (AVŚ_4,15.16c) tanvatāṃ yajñaṃ bahudhā visṛṣṭā ānandinīr oṣadhayo bhavantu
GV00avs___u:1482: (AVŚ_4,16.1a) bṛhann eṣām adhiṣṭhātā antikād iva paśyati |
GV00avs___u:1483: (AVŚ_4,16.1c) ya stāyan manyate carant sarvaṃ devā idaṃ viduḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1484: (AVŚ_4,16.2a) yas tiṣṭhati carati yaś ca vañcati yo nilāyaṃ carati yaḥ prataṅkam |
GV00avs___u:1485: (AVŚ_4,16.2c) dvau saṃniṣadya yan mantrayete rājā tad veda varuṇas tṛtīyaḥ
GV00avs___u:1486: (AVŚ_4,16.3a) uteyaṃ bhūmir varuṇasya rājña utāsau dyaur bṛhatī dūreantā |
GV00avs___u:1487: (AVŚ_4,16.3c) uto samudrau varuṇasya kukṣī utāsminn alpa udake nilīnaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:1488: (AVŚ_4,16.4a) uta yo dyām atisarpāt parastān na sa mucyātai varuṇasya
GV00avs___u:1490: (AVŚ_4,16.4c) diva spaśaḥ pra carantīdam asya sahasrākṣā ati paśyanti bhūmim ||4||
GV00avs___u:1491: (AVŚ_4,16.5a) sarvaṃ tad rājā varuṇo vi caṣṭe yad antarā rodasī yat parastāt |
GV00avs___u:1492: (AVŚ_4,16.5c) saṃkhyātā asya nimiṣo janānām akṣān iva śvaghnī ni minoti
GV00avs___u:1494: (AVŚ_4,16.6a) ye te pāśā varuṇa saptasapta tredhā tiṣṭhanti viṣitā ruṣantaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1495: (AVŚ_4,16.6c) chinantu sarve anṛtaṃ vadantaṃ yaḥ satyavādy ati taṃ sṛjantu
GV00avs___u:1496: (AVŚ_4,16.7a) śatena pāśair abhi dhehi varuṇainaṃ mā te mocy anṛtavāṅ
GV00avs___u:1498: (AVŚ_4,16.7c) āstāṃ jālma udaraṃ śraṃśayitvā kośa ivābandhaḥ
GV00avs___u:1500: (AVŚ_4,16.8a) yaḥ samābhyo varuṇo yo vyābhyo yaḥ saṃdeśyo varuṇo yo
GV00avs___u:1502: (AVŚ_4,16.8c) yo daivo varuṇo yaś ca mānuṣaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:1503: (AVŚ_4,16.9a) tais tvā sarvair abhi ṣyāmi pāśair asāv āmuṣyāyaṇāmuṣyāḥ putra |
GV00avs___u:1505: (AVŚ_4,17.1a) īśāṇāṃ tvā bheṣajānām ujjeṣa ā rabhāmahe |
GV00avs___u:1508: (AVŚ_4,17.2c) sarvāḥ sam ahvy oṣadhīr ito naḥ pārayād iti ||2||
GV00avs___u:1509: (AVŚ_4,17.3a) yā śaśāpa śapanena yāghaṃ mūram ādadhe |
GV00avs___u:1510: (AVŚ_4,17.3c) yā rasasya haraṇāya jātam ārebhe tokam attu sā ||3||
GV00avs___u:1511: (AVŚ_4,17.4a) yāṃ te cakrur āme pātre yāṃ cakrur nīlalohite |
GV00avs___u:1512: (AVŚ_4,17.4c) āme māṃse kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakrus tayā kṛtyākṛto jahi ||4||
GV00avs___u:1514: (AVŚ_4,17.5c) durṇāmnīḥ sarvā durvācas tā asman nāśayāmasi ||5||
GV00avs___u:1516: (AVŚ_4,17.6c) apāmārga tvayā vayaṃ sarvaṃ tad apa mṛjmahe ||6||
GV00avs___u:1518: (AVŚ_4,17.7c) apāmārga tvayā vayaṃ sarvaṃ tad apa mṛjmahe ||7||
GV00avs___u:1519: (AVŚ_4,17.8a) apāmārga oṣadhīnāṃ sarvāsām eka id vaśī |
GV00avs___u:1520: (AVŚ_4,17.8c) tena te mṛjma āsthitam atha tvam agadaś cara ||8||
GV00avs___u:1523: (AVŚ_4,18.2a) yo devāḥ kṛtyāṃ kṛtvā harād aviduṣo gṛham |
GV00avs___u:1524: (AVŚ_4,18.2c) vatso dhārur iva mātaraṃ taṃ pratyag upa padyatām ||2||
GV00avs___u:1525: (AVŚ_4,18.3a) amā kṛtvā pāpmānaṃ yas tenānyaṃ jighāṃsati |
GV00avs___u:1526: (AVŚ_4,18.3c) aśmānas tasyāṃ dagdhāyāṃ bahulāḥ phaṭ karikrati ||3||
GV00avs___u:1528: (AVŚ_4,18.4c) prati sma cakruṣe kṛtyāṃ priyāṃ priyāvate hara ||4||
GV00avs___u:1530: (AVŚ_4,18.5c) yāṃ kṣetre cakrur yāṃ goṣu yāṃ vā te puruṣeṣu ||5||
GV00avs___u:1531: (AVŚ_4,18.6a) yaś cakāra na śaśāka kartuṃ śaśre pādam aṅgurim |
GV00avs___u:1532: (AVŚ_4,18.6c) cakāra bhadram asmabhyam ātmane tapanam tu saḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1533: (AVŚ_4,18.7a) apāmārgo 'pa mārṣṭu kṣetriyaṃ śapathaś ca yaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1536: (AVŚ_4,18.8c) apāmārga tvayā vayaṃ sarvaṃ tad apa mṛjmahe ||8||
GV00avs___u:1537: (AVŚ_4,19.1a) uto asy abandhukṛd uto asi nu jāmikṛt |
GV00avs___u:1538: (AVŚ_4,19.1c) uto kṛtyākṛtaḥ prajāṃ nadam ivā chindhi vārṣikam ||1||
GV00avs___u:1540: (AVŚ_4,19.2c) senevaiṣi tviṣīmatī na tatra bhayam asti yatra prāpnoṣy oṣadhe ||2||
GV00avs___u:1543: (AVŚ_4,19.4a) yad ado devā asurāṃs tvayāgre nirakurvata |
GV00avs___u:1545: (AVŚ_4,19.5a) vibhindatī śataśākhā vibhindan nāma te pitā |
GV00avs___u:1546: (AVŚ_4,19.5c) pratyag vi bhindhi tvaṃ taṃ yo asmāṃ abhidāsati ||5||
GV00avs___u:1547: (AVŚ_4,19.6a) asad bhūmyāḥ sam abhavat tad yām eti mahad vyacaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1548: (AVŚ_4,19.6c) tad vai tato vidhūpāyat pratyak kartāram ṛchatu ||6||
GV00avs___u:1550: (AVŚ_4,19.7c) sarvān mac chapathām adhi varīyo yāvayā vadham ||7||
GV00avs___u:1551: (AVŚ_4,19.8a) śatena mā pari pāhi sahasreṇābhi rakṣā mā |
GV00avs___u:1552: (AVŚ_4,19.8c) indras te vīrudhāṃ pata ugra ojmānam ā dadhat ||8||
GV00avs___u:1553: (AVŚ_4,20.1a) ā paśyati prati paśyati parā paśyati paśyati |
GV00avs___u:1554: (AVŚ_4,20.1c) divam antarikṣam ād bhūmiṃ sarvaṃ tad devi paśyati ||1||
GV00avs___u:1555: (AVŚ_4,20.2a) tisro divas tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ ṣaṭ cemāḥ pradiśāḥ pṛthak |
GV00avs___u:1556: (AVŚ_4,20.2c) tvayāhaṃ sarvā bhūtāni paśyāni devy oṣadhe ||2||
GV00avs___u:1558: (AVŚ_4,20.3c) sā bhūmim ā rurohitha vahyaṃ śrāntā vadhūr iva ||3||
GV00avs___u:1559: (AVŚ_4,20.4a) tāṃ me sahasrākṣo devo dakṣiṇe hasta ā dadhat |
GV00avs___u:1560: (AVŚ_4,20.4c) tayāhaṃ sarvaṃ paśyāmi yaś ca śūdra utāryaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1561: (AVŚ_4,20.5a) āviṣ kṛṇuṣva rūpāni mātmānam apa gūhathāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1562: (AVŚ_4,20.5c) atho sahasracakṣo tvaṃ prati paśyāḥ kimīdinaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:1564: (AVŚ_4,20.6c) piśācānt sarvān darśayeti tvā rabha oṣadhe ||6||
GV00avs___u:1565: (AVŚ_4,20.7a) kaśyapasya cakṣur asi śunyāś ca caturakṣyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1566: (AVŚ_4,20.7c) vīdhre sūryam iva sarpantaṃ mā piśācaṃ tiras karaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1568: (AVŚ_4,20.8c) tenāhaṃ sarvaṃ paśyāmy uta śūdram utāryam ||8||
GV00avs___u:1569: (AVŚ_4,20.9a) yo antarikṣeṇa patati divam yaś ca atisarpati |
GV00avs___u:1570: (AVŚ_4,20.9c) bhūmiṃ yo manyate nāthaṃ taṃ piśācam pra darśaya ||9||
GV00avs___u:1571: (AVŚ_4,21.1a) ā gāvo agmann uta bhadram akrant sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantv
GV00avs___u:1573: (AVŚ_4,21.1c) prajāvatīḥ pururūpā iha syur indrāya pūrvīr uṣaso duhānāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1574: (AVŚ_4,21.2a) indro yajvane gṛṇate ca śikṣata uped dadāti na svaṃ muṣāyati
GV00avs___u:1575: (AVŚ_4,21.2c) bhūyobhūyo rayim id asya vardhayann abhinne khilye ni dadhāti devayum ||2||
GV00avs___u:1576: (AVŚ_4,21.3a) na tā naśanti na dabhāti taskaro nāsām āmitro vyathir ā dadharṣati |
GV00avs___u:1577: (AVŚ_4,21.3c) devāṃś ca yābhir yajate dadāti ca jyog it tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha ||3||
GV00avs___u:1578: (AVŚ_4,21.4a) na tā arvā reṇukakāṭo 'śnute na saṃskṛtatram upa yanti tā abhi |
GV00avs___u:1579: (AVŚ_4,21.4c) urugāyam abhayaṃ tasya tā anu gāvo martasya vi caranti
GV00avs___u:1581: (AVŚ_4,21.5a) gāvo bhago gāva indro ma ichād gāva somasya prathamasya
GV00avs___u:1583: (AVŚ_4,21.5c) imā yā gāvaḥ sa janāsa indra ichāmi hṛdā manasā cid indram ||5||
GV00avs___u:1584: (AVŚ_4,21.6a) yūyaṃ gāvo medayatha kṛśaṃ cid aśrīraṃ cit kṛṇuthā supratīkam |
GV00avs___u:1585: (AVŚ_4,21.6c) bhadraṃ gṛhaṃ kṛṇutha bhadravāco bṛhad vo vaya ucyate sabhāsu ||6||
GV00avs___u:1586: (AVŚ_4,21.7a) prajāvatīḥ sūyavase ruśantīḥ śuddhā apaḥ suprapāṇe pibantīḥ
GV00avs___u:1587: (AVŚ_4,21.7c) mā va stena īśata māghaśaṃsaḥ pari vo rudrasya hetir vṛṇaktu
GV00avs___u:1588: (AVŚ_4,22.1a) imam indra vardhaya kṣatriyaṃ me imaṃ viśām ekavṛṣaṃ kṛṇu
GV00avs___u:1590: (AVŚ_4,22.1c) nir amitrān akṣṇuhy asya sarvāṃs tān randhayāsmā ahamuttareṣu ||1||
GV00avs___u:1591: (AVŚ_4,22.2a) emaṃ bhaja grāme aśveṣu goṣu niṣ ṭaṃ bhaja yo amitro asya |
GV00avs___u:1592: (AVŚ_4,22.2c) varṣma kṣatrāṇām ayam astu rājendra śatruṃ randhaya sarvam asmai ||2||
GV00avs___u:1593: (AVŚ_4,22.3a) ayam astu dhanapatir dhanānām ayaṃ viśāṃ viśpatir astu rājā
GV00avs___u:1594: (AVŚ_4,22.3c) asminn indra mahi varcāṃsi dhehy avarcasaṃ kṛṇuhi śatrum asya ||3||
GV00avs___u:1595: (AVŚ_4,22.4a) asmai dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri vāmaṃ duhāthāṃ gharmadughe iva dhenū |
GV00avs___u:1596: (AVŚ_4,22.4c) ayaṃ rājā priya indrasya bhūyāt priyo gavām oṣadhīnāṃ paśūnām ||4||
GV00avs___u:1597: (AVŚ_4,22.5a) yunajmi ta uttarāvantam indraṃ yena jayanti na parājayante |
GV00avs___u:1598: (AVŚ_4,22.5c) yas tvā karad ekavṛṣaṃ janānām uta rājñām uttamaṃ mānavānām
GV00avs___u:1599: (AVŚ_4,22.6a) uttaras tvam adhare te sapatnā ye ke ca rājan pratiśatravas te |
GV00avs___u:1600: (AVŚ_4,22.6c) ekavṛṣa indrasakhā jigīvāṃ chatrūyatām ā bharā bhojanāni
GV00avs___u:1601: (AVŚ_4,22.7a) siṃhapratīko viśo addhi sarvā vyāghrapratīko 'va bādhasva śatrūn |
GV00avs___u:1602: (AVŚ_4,22.7c) ekavṛṣa indrasakhā jigīvāṃ chatrūyatām ā khidā bhojanāni
GV00avs___u:1603: (AVŚ_4,23.1a) agner manve prathamasya pracetasaḥ pāñcajanyasya bahudhā yam indhate |
GV00avs___u:1604: (AVŚ_4,23.1c) viśoviśaḥ praviśivāṃsam īmahe sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1605: (AVŚ_4,23.2a) yathā havyaṃ vahasi jātavedo yathā yajñaṃ kalpayasi prajānan |
GV00avs___u:1606: (AVŚ_4,23.2c) evā devebhyaḥ sumatiṃ na ā vaha sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1607: (AVŚ_4,23.3a) yāmanyāmann upayuktaṃ vahiṣṭhaṃ karmaṅkarmann ābhagam agnim
GV00avs___u:1609: (AVŚ_4,23.3c) rakṣohaṇaṃ yajñavṛdhaṃ ghṛtāhutaṃ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1611: (AVŚ_4,23.4c) havyavāhaṃ havāmahe sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1612: (AVŚ_4,23.5a) yena ṛṣayo balam adyotayan yujā yenāsurāṇām ayuvanta māyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1613: (AVŚ_4,23.5c) yenāgninā paṇīn indro jigāya sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:1614: (AVŚ_4,23.6a) yena devā amṛtam anvavindan yenauṣadhīr madhumatīr akṛṇvan |
GV00avs___u:1615: (AVŚ_4,23.6c) yena devāḥ svar ābharant sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1616: (AVŚ_4,23.7a) yasyedaṃ pradiśi yad virocate yaj jātaṃ janitavyaṃ ca kevalam |
GV00avs___u:1617: (AVŚ_4,23.7c) staumy agniṃ nāthito johavīmi sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1618: (AVŚ_4,24.1a) indrasya manmahe śaśvad id asya manmahe vṛtraghna stomā upa
GV00avs___u:1620: (AVŚ_4,24.1c) yo dāśuṣaḥ sukṛto havam eti sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1621: (AVŚ_4,24.2a) ya ugrīṇām ugrabāhur yayur yo dānavānāṃ balam āruroja |
GV00avs___u:1622: (AVŚ_4,24.2c) yena jitāḥ sindhavo yena gāvaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1623: (AVŚ_4,24.3a) yaś carṣaṇipro vṛṣabhaḥ svarvid yasmai grāvāṇaḥ pravadanti nṛmṇam |
GV00avs___u:1624: (AVŚ_4,24.3c) yasyādhvaraḥ saptahotā madiṣṭhaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:1625: (AVŚ_4,24.4a) yasya vaśāsa ṛṣabhāsa ukṣaṇo yasmai mīyante svaravaḥ svarvide |
GV00avs___u:1626: (AVŚ_4,24.4c) yasmai śukraḥ pavate brahmaśumbhitaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1627: (AVŚ_4,24.5a) yasya juṣṭiṃ sominaḥ kāmayante yaṃ havanta iṣumantaṃ gaviṣṭau |
GV00avs___u:1628: (AVŚ_4,24.5c) yasminn arkaḥ śiśriye yasminn ojaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1629: (AVŚ_4,24.6a) yaḥ prathamaḥ karmakṛtyāya jajñe yasya vīryam
GV00avs___u:1631: (AVŚ_4,24.6c) yenodyato vajro 'bhyāyatāhiṃ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1632: (AVŚ_4,24.7a) yaḥ saṃgrāmān nayati saṃ yudhe vaśī yaḥ puṣṭāni saṃsṛjati
GV00avs___u:1634: (AVŚ_4,24.7c) staumīndraṃ nāthito johavīmi sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1635: (AVŚ_4,25.1a) vāyoḥ savitur vidathāni manmahe yāv ātmanvad viśatho yau ca
GV00avs___u:1637: (AVŚ_4,25.1c) yau viśvasya paribhū babhūvathus tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1638: (AVŚ_4,25.2a) yayoḥ saṃkhyātā varimā pārhivāni yābhyāṃ rajo yupitam antarikṣe |
GV00avs___u:1639: (AVŚ_4,25.2c) yayoḥ prāyaṃ nānv ānaśe kaś cana tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1640: (AVŚ_4,25.3a) tava vrate ni viśante janāsas tvayy udite prerate citrabhāno
GV00avs___u:1641: (AVŚ_4,25.3c) yuvaṃ vāyo savitā ca bhuvanāni rakṣathas tau no muñcatam
GV00avs___u:1643: (AVŚ_4,25.4a) apeto vāyo savitā ca duṣkṛtam apa rakṣāṃsi śimidāṃ ca
GV00avs___u:1645: (AVŚ_4,25.4c) saṃ hy ūrjayā sṛjathaḥ saṃ balena tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1646: (AVŚ_4,25.5a) rayiṃ me poṣaṃ savitota vāyus tanū dakṣam ā suvatāṃ suśevam
GV00avs___u:1647: (AVŚ_4,25.5c) ayakṣmatātiṃ maha iha dhattaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:1648: (AVŚ_4,25.6a) pra sumatiṃ savitar vāya ūtaye mahasvantaṃ matsaraṃ mādayāthaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1649: (AVŚ_4,25.6c) arvāg vāmasya pravato ni yachataṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1650: (AVŚ_4,25.7a) upa śreṣṭhā na āśiṣo devayor dhāmann asthiran |
GV00avs___u:1651: (AVŚ_4,25.7c) staumi devaṃ savitāraṃ ca vāyuṃ tau no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1652: (AVŚ_4,26.1a) manve vāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī subhojasau sacetasau ye aprathethām amitā yojanāni |
GV00avs___u:1653: (AVŚ_4,26.1c) pratiṣṭhe hy abhavataṃ vasūnāṃ te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1654: (AVŚ_4,26.2a) pratiṣṭhe hy abhavataṃ vasūnāṃ pravṛddhe devī subhage urūcī |
GV00avs___u:1655: (AVŚ_4,26.2c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1656: (AVŚ_4,26.3a) asantāpe sutapasau huve 'ham urvī gambhīre kavibhir namasye
GV00avs___u:1657: (AVŚ_4,26.3c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:1658: (AVŚ_4,26.4a) ye amṛtaṃ bibhṛtho ye havīṃṣi ye srotyā bibhṛtho ye manuṣyān
GV00avs___u:1659: (AVŚ_4,26.4c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1660: (AVŚ_4,26.5a) ye usriyā bibhṛtho ye vanaspatīn yayor vāṃ viśvā bhuvanāny
GV00avs___u:1662: (AVŚ_4,26.5c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:1663: (AVŚ_4,26.6a) ye kīlālena tarpayatho ye ghṛtena yābhyām ṛte na kiṃ cana śaknuvanti |
GV00avs___u:1664: (AVŚ_4,26.6c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1665: (AVŚ_4,26.7a) yan medam abhiśocati yenayena vā kṛtaṃ pauruṣeyān na daivāt
GV00avs___u:1666: (AVŚ_4,26.7c) staumi dyāvāpṛthivī nāthito johavīmi te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1667: (AVŚ_4,27.1a) marutāṃ manve adhi me bruvantu premaṃ vājaṃ vājasāte avantu
GV00avs___u:1668: (AVŚ_4,27.1c) āśūn iva suyamān ahva ūtaye te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1669: (AVŚ_4,27.2a) utsam akṣitaṃ vyacanti ye sadā ya āsiñcanti rasam oṣadhīṣu |
GV00avs___u:1670: (AVŚ_4,27.2c) puro dadhe marutaḥ pṛśnimātṝṃs te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1671: (AVŚ_4,27.3a) payo dhenūnāṃ rasam oṣadhīnāṃ javam arvatāṃ kavayo ya invatha |
GV00avs___u:1672: (AVŚ_4,27.3c) śagmā bhavantu maruto naḥ syonās te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1673: (AVŚ_4,27.4a) apaḥ samudrād divam ud vahanti divas pṛthivīm abhi ye
GV00avs___u:1675: (AVŚ_4,27.4c) ye adbhir īśānā marutaś caranti te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1676: (AVŚ_4,27.5a) ye kīlālena tarpayanti ye ghṛtena ye vā vayo medasā
GV00avs___u:1678: (AVŚ_4,27.5c) ye adbhir īśānā maruto varṣayanti te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1679: (AVŚ_4,27.6a) yadīd idaṃ maruto mārutena yadi devā daivyenedṛg āra |
GV00avs___u:1680: (AVŚ_4,27.6c) yūyam īśidhve vasavas tasya niṣkṛtes te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1681: (AVŚ_4,27.7a) tigmam anīkam viditaṃ sahasvan mārutaṃ śardhaḥ pṛtanāsūgram
GV00avs___u:1682: (AVŚ_4,27.7c) staumi maruto nāthito johavīmi te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1683: (AVŚ_4,28.1a) bhavāśarvau manve vāṃ tasya vittaṃ yayor vām idaṃ pradiśi
GV00avs___u:1685: (AVŚ_4,28.1c) yāv asyeśāthe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1686: (AVŚ_4,28.2a) yayor abhyabhva uta yad dūre cid yau viditāv iṣubhṛtām
GV00avs___u:1688: (AVŚ_4,28.2c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1689: (AVŚ_4,28.3a) sahasrākṣau vṛtrahanā huvehaṃ dūregavyūtī stuvann emy ugrau
GV00avs___u:1690: (AVŚ_4,28.3c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1691: (AVŚ_4,28.4a) yāv ārebhāthe bahu sākam agre pra ced asrāṣṭram abhibhāṃ
GV00avs___u:1693: (AVŚ_4,28.4c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1694: (AVŚ_4,28.5a) yayor vadhān nāpapadyate kaś canāntar deveṣūta mānuṣeṣu |
GV00avs___u:1695: (AVŚ_4,28.5c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1696: (AVŚ_4,28.6a) yaḥ kṛtyākṛn mūlakṛd yātudhāno ni tasmin dhattaṃ vajram ugrau |
GV00avs___u:1697: (AVŚ_4,28.6c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1698: (AVŚ_4,28.7a) adhi no brūtaṃ pṛtanāsūgrau saṃ vajreṇa sṛjataṃ yaḥ kimīdī |
GV00avs___u:1699: (AVŚ_4,28.7c) staumi bhavāśarvau nāthito johavīmi tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1700: (AVŚ_4,29.1a) manve vāṃ mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvṛdhau sacetasau druhvaṇo yau nudethe |
GV00avs___u:1701: (AVŚ_4,29.1c) pra satyāvānam avatho bhareṣu tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1702: (AVŚ_4,29.2a) sacetasau druhvaṇo yau nudethe pra satyāvānam avatho bhareṣu |
GV00avs___u:1703: (AVŚ_4,29.2c) yau gachatho nṛcakṣasau babhruṇā sutaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1704: (AVŚ_4,29.3a) yāv aṅgirasam avatho yāv agastiṃ mitrāvaruṇā jamadagnim attrim |
GV00avs___u:1705: (AVŚ_4,29.3c) yau kaśyapam avatho yau vasiṣṭhaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1706: (AVŚ_4,29.4a) yau śyāvāśvam avatho vādhryaśvaṃ mitrāvaruṇā purumīḍham
GV00avs___u:1708: (AVŚ_4,29.4c) yau vimadam avatho saptavadhriṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:1709: (AVŚ_4,29.5a) yau bharadvājam avatho yau gaviṣṭhiraṃ viśvāmitraṃ varuṇa mitra kutsam |
GV00avs___u:1710: (AVŚ_4,29.5c) yau kakṣīvantam avatho prota kaṇvaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1711: (AVŚ_4,29.6a) yau medhātithim avatho yau triśokaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv uśanām kāvyaṃ yau |
GV00avs___u:1712: (AVŚ_4,29.6c) yau gotamam avatho prota mugdalaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ
GV00avs___u:1713: (AVŚ_4,29.7a) yayo rathaḥ satyavartma rjuraśmir mithuyā carantam abhiyāti dūṣayan |
GV00avs___u:1714: (AVŚ_4,29.7c) staumi mitrāvaruṇau nāthito johavīmi tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1715: (AVŚ_4,30.1a) ahaṃ rudrebhir vasubhiś carāmy aham ādityair uta viśvadevaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:1716: (AVŚ_4,30.1c) ahaṃ mitrāvarunobhā bibharmy aham indrāgnī aham aśvinobhā
GV00avs___u:1717: (AVŚ_4,30.2a) ahaṃ rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnāṃ cikituṣī prathamā yajñiyānām |
GV00avs___u:1718: (AVŚ_4,30.2c) tāṃ mā devā vy adadhuḥ purutrā bhūristhātrāṃ bhūry āveśayantaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:1719: (AVŚ_4,30.3a) aham eva svayam idaṃ vadāmi juṣṭaṃ devānām uta mānuṣāṇām |
GV00avs___u:1720: (AVŚ_4,30.3c) yaṃ kāmaye tantam ugraṃ kṛṇomi taṃ brahmāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām ||3||
GV00avs___u:1721: (AVŚ_4,30.4a) mayā so 'nnam atti yo vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇati ya īm śṛṇoty uktam |
GV00avs___u:1722: (AVŚ_4,30.4c) amantavo māṃ ta upa kṣiyanti śrudhi śruta śruddheyaṃ te
GV00avs___u:1724: (AVŚ_4,30.5a) ahaṃ rudrāya dhanur ā tanomi brahmadviṣe śarave hantavā u |
GV00avs___u:1725: (AVŚ_4,30.5c) ahaṃ janāya samadaṃ kṛṇomi aham dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa ||5||
GV00avs___u:1726: (AVŚ_4,30.6a) ahaṃ somam āhanasaṃ bibharmy ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram uta pūṣaṇaṃ bhagam |
GV00avs___u:1727: (AVŚ_4,30.6c) ahaṃ dadhāmi draviṇā haviṣmate suprāvyā yajamānāya sunvate
GV00avs___u:1728: (AVŚ_4,30.7a) ahaṃ suve pitaram asya mūrdhan mama yonir apsv antaḥ samudre
GV00avs___u:1729: (AVŚ_4,30.7c) tato vi tiṣṭhe bhuvanāni viśvotāmūṃ dyāṃ varṣmaṇopa spṛśāmi ||7||
GV00avs___u:1730: (AVŚ_4,30.8a) aham eva vātaiva pra vāmy ārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV00avs___u:1731: (AVŚ_4,30.8c) paro divā para enā pṛthivyaitāvatī mahimnā saṃ babhūva ||8||
GV00avs___u:1732: (AVŚ_4,31.1a) tvayā manyo saratham ārujanto harṣamāṇā hṛṣitāso marutvan |
GV00avs___u:1733: (AVŚ_4,31.1c) tigmeṣava āyudhā saṃśiśānā upa pra yantu naro agnirūpāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1734: (AVŚ_4,31.2a) agnir iva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senānīr naḥ sahure hūta
GV00avs___u:1736: (AVŚ_4,31.2c) hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva veda ojo mimāno vi mṛdho nudasva
GV00avs___u:1737: (AVŚ_4,31.3a) sahasva manyo abhimātim asmai rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehi śatrūn |
GV00avs___u:1738: (AVŚ_4,31.3c) ugraṃ te pājo nanv ā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃ nayāsā ekaja tvam ||3||
GV00avs___u:1739: (AVŚ_4,31.4a) eko bahūnām asi manya īḍitā viśaṃviśam yuddhāya saṃ śiśādhi
GV00avs___u:1740: (AVŚ_4,31.4c) akṛttaruk tvayā yujā vayaṃ dyumantaṃ ghoṣam vijayāya kṛṇmasi ||4||
GV00avs___u:1741: (AVŚ_4,31.5a) vijeṣakṛd indra ivānavabravo 'smākaṃ manyo adhipā bhaveha |
GV00avs___u:1742: (AVŚ_4,31.5c) priyaṃ te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidmā tam utsaṃ yata
GV00avs___u:1744: (AVŚ_4,31.6a) ābhūtyā sahajā vajra sāyaka saho bibharṣi sahabhūta uttaram |
GV00avs___u:1745: (AVŚ_4,31.6c) kratvā no manyo saha medy edhi mahādhanasya puruhūta saṃsṛji
GV00avs___u:1746: (AVŚ_4,31.7a) saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dhanam ubhayaṃ samākṛtam asmabhyaṃ dhattāṃ varuṇaś ca manyuḥ |
GV00avs___u:1747: (AVŚ_4,31.7c) bhiyo dadhānā hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitāso apa ni layantām ||7||
GV00avs___u:1748: (AVŚ_4,32.1a) yas te manyo 'vidhad vajra sāyaka saha ojaḥ puṣyati viśvam
GV00avs___u:1750: (AVŚ_4,32.1c) sāhyāma dāsam āryaṃ tvayā yujā vayaṃ sahaskṛtena sahasā sahasvatā ||1||
GV00avs___u:1751: (AVŚ_4,32.2a) manyur indro manyur evāsa devo manyur hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ
GV00avs___u:1752: (AVŚ_4,32.2c) manyuṃ viśa īḍate mānuṣīr yāḥ pahi no manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ
GV00avs___u:1753: (AVŚ_4,32.3a) abhīhi manyo tavasas tavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn |
GV00avs___u:1754: (AVŚ_4,32.3c) amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca viśvā vasūny ā bharā tvaṃ naḥ
GV00avs___u:1755: (AVŚ_4,32.4a) tvaṃ hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ svayaṃbhūr bhāmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1756: (AVŚ_4,32.4c) viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahīyān asmāsv ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi
GV00avs___u:1757: (AVŚ_4,32.5a) abhāgaḥ sann apa pareto asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ
GV00avs___u:1758: (AVŚ_4,32.5c) taṃ tvā manyo akratur jihīḍāhaṃ svā tanūr baladāvā na ehi
GV00avs___u:1759: (AVŚ_4,32.6a) ayaṃ te asmy upa na ehy arvāṅ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadāvan |
GV00avs___u:1760: (AVŚ_4,32.6c) manyo vajrinn abhi na ā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūṃr uta bodhy āpeḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1761: (AVŚ_4,32.7a) abhi prehi dakṣiṇato bhavā no 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri
GV00avs___u:1762: (AVŚ_4,32.7c) juhomi te dharuṇaṃ madhvo agram ubhāv upāṃśu prathamā pibāva
GV00avs___u:1763: (AVŚ_4,33.1a) apa naḥ śośucad agham agne śuśugdhy ā rayim |
GV00avs___u:1767: (AVŚ_4,33.3a) pra yad bhandiṣṭha eṣāṃ prāsmākāsaś ca sūrayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1769: (AVŚ_4,33.4a) pra yat te agne sūrayo jāyemahi pra te vayam |
GV00avs___u:1771: (AVŚ_4,33.5a) pra yad agneḥ sahasvato viśvato yanti bhānavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1773: (AVŚ_4,33.6a) tvaṃ hi viśvatomukha viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
GV00avs___u:1777: (AVŚ_4,33.8a) sa naḥ sindhum iva nāvāti parṣa svastaye |
GV00avs___u:1779: (AVŚ_4,34.1a) brahmāsya śīrṣaṃ bṛhad asya pṛṣṭhaṃ vāmadevyam udaram odanasya |
GV00avs___u:1780: (AVŚ_4,34.1c) chandāṃsi pakṣau mukham asya satyaṃ viṣṭārī jātas tapaso'dhi
GV00avs___u:1782: (AVŚ_4,34.2a) anasthāḥ pūtāḥ pavanena śuddhāḥ śucayaḥ śucim api yanti lokam |
GV00avs___u:1783: (AVŚ_4,34.2c) naiṣāṃ śiśnaṃ pra dahati jātavedāḥ svarge loke bahu straiṇam
GV00avs___u:1785: (AVŚ_4,34.3a) viṣṭāriṇam odanaṃ ye pacanti nainān avartiḥ sacate kadā cana
GV00avs___u:1786: (AVŚ_4,34.3c) āste yama upa yāti devānt saṃ gandharvair madate somyebhiḥ
GV00avs___u:1787: (AVŚ_4,34.4a) viṣṭāriṇam odanam ye pacanti nainān yamaḥ pari muṣṇāti retaḥ
GV00avs___u:1788: (AVŚ_4,34.4c) rathī ha bhūtvā rathayāna īyate pakṣī ha bhūtvāti divaḥ sam eti ||4||
GV00avs___u:1789: (AVŚ_4,34.5a) eṣa yajñānāṃ vitato vahiṣṭho viṣṭāriṇaṃ paktvā divam ā viveśa |
GV00avs___u:1790: (AVŚ_4,34.5c) āṇḍīkaṃ kumudaṃ saṃ tanoti bisaṃ śālūkaṃ śaphako mulālī |
GV00avs___u:1791: (AVŚ_4,34.5e) etās tvā dhārā upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke madhumat
GV00avs___u:1792: pinvamānā upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:1793: (AVŚ_4,34.6a) ghṛtahradā madhukūlāḥ surodakāḥ kṣīreṇa pūrṇā udakena dadhnā
GV00avs___u:1794: (AVŚ_4,34.6c) etās tvā dhārā upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke madhumat
GV00avs___u:1795: pinvamānā upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:1796: (AVŚ_4,34.7a) caturaḥ kumbhāṃś caturdhā dadāmi kṣīreṇa pūrnāṃ udakena dadhnā |
GV00avs___u:1797: (AVŚ_4,34.7c) etās tvā dhārā upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke madhumat
GV00avs___u:1798: pinvamānā upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1799: (AVŚ_4,34.8a) imam odanaṃ ni dadhe brāhmaṇeṣu viṣṭāriṇaṃ lokajitaṃ svargam |
GV00avs___u:1800: (AVŚ_4,34.8c) sa me mā kṣeṣṭa svadhayā pinvamāno viśvarūpā dhenuḥ kāmadughā me astu ||8||
GV00avs___u:1801: (AVŚ_4,35.1a) yam odanaṃ prathamajā ṛtasya prajāpatis tapasā brahmaṇe
GV00avs___u:1803: (AVŚ_4,35.1c) yo lokānāṃ vidhṛtir nābhireṣāt tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum
GV00avs___u:1804: (AVŚ_4,35.2a) yenātaran bhūtakṛto 'ti mṛtyuṃ yam anvavindan tapasā śrameṇa |
GV00avs___u:1805: (AVŚ_4,35.2c) yaṃ papāca brahmaṇe brahma pūrvaṃ tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum ||2||
GV00avs___u:1806: (AVŚ_4,35.3a) yo dādhāra pṛthivīṃ viśvabhojasaṃ yo antarikṣam āpṛṇād rasena |
GV00avs___u:1807: (AVŚ_4,35.3c) yo astabhnād divam ūrdhvo mahimnā tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum ||3||
GV00avs___u:1808: (AVŚ_4,35.4a) yasmān māsā nirmitās triṃśadarāḥ saṃvatsaro yasmān nirmito dvādaśāraḥ |
GV00avs___u:1809: (AVŚ_4,35.4c) ahorātrā yaṃ pariyanto nāpus tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum
GV00avs___u:1810: (AVŚ_4,35.5a) yaḥ prāṇadaḥ prāṇadavān babhūva yasmai lokā ghṛtavantaḥ kṣaranti |
GV00avs___u:1811: (AVŚ_4,35.5c) jyotiṣmatīḥ pradiśo yasya sarvās tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum
GV00avs___u:1812: (AVŚ_4,35.6a) yasmāt pakvād amṛtaṃ saṃbabhūva yo gāyatryā adhipatir babhūva |
GV00avs___u:1813: (AVŚ_4,35.6c) yasmin vedā nihitā viśvarūpās tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum
GV00avs___u:1814: (AVŚ_4,35.7a) ava bādhe dviṣantaṃ devapīyuṃ sapatnā ye me 'pa te bhavantu |
GV00avs___u:1815: (AVŚ_4,35.7c) brahmaudanaṃ viśvajitaṃ pacāmi śṛṇvantu me śraddadhānasya
GV00avs___u:1817: (AVŚ_4,36.1a) tānt satyaujāḥ pra dahatv agnir vaiśvānaro vṛṣā |
GV00avs___u:1818: (AVŚ_4,36.1c) yo no durasyād dipsāc cātho yo no arātiyāt ||1||
GV00avs___u:1819: (AVŚ_4,36.2a) yo no dipsād adipsato dipsato yaś ca dipsati |
GV00avs___u:1820: (AVŚ_4,36.2c) vaiśvānarasya daṃṣṭrayor agner api dadhāmi tam ||2||
GV00avs___u:1822: (AVŚ_4,36.3c) kravyādo anyān dipsataḥ sarvāṃs tānt sahasā sahe ||3||
GV00avs___u:1824: (AVŚ_4,36.4c) sarvān durasyato hanmi saṃ ma ākūtir ṛdhyatām ||4||
GV00avs___u:1825: (AVŚ_4,36.5a) ye devās tena hāsante sūryeṇa mimate javam |
GV00avs___u:1826: (AVŚ_4,36.5c) nadīṣu parvateṣu ye saṃ taiḥ paśubhir vide ||5||
GV00avs___u:1827: (AVŚ_4,36.6a) tapano asmi piśācānāṃ vyāghro gomatām iva |
GV00avs___u:1828: (AVŚ_4,36.6c) śvānaḥ siṃham iva dṛṣṭvā te na vindante nyañcanam ||6||
GV00avs___u:1829: (AVŚ_4,36.7a) na piśācaiḥ saṃ śaknomi na stenaiḥ na vanargubhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:1830: (AVŚ_4,36.7c) piśācās tasmān naśyanti yam ahaṃ grāmam āviśe ||7||
GV00avs___u:1831: (AVŚ_4,36.8a) yaṃ grāmam āviśata idam ugraṃ saho mama |
GV00avs___u:1832: (AVŚ_4,36.8c) piśācās tasmān naśyanti na pāpam upa jānate ||8||
GV00avs___u:1833: (AVŚ_4,36.9a) ye mā krodhayanti lapitā hastinaṃ maśakā iva |
GV00avs___u:1834: (AVŚ_4,36.9c) tān ahaṃ manye durhitān jane alpaśayūn iva ||9||
GV00avs___u:1835: (AVŚ_4,36.10a) abhi taṃ nirṛtir dhattām aśvam iva aśvābhidhānyā |
GV00avs___u:1836: (AVŚ_4,36.10c) malvo yo mahyaṃ krudhyati sa u pāśān na mucyate ||10||
GV00avs___u:1837: (AVŚ_4,37.1a) tvayā pūrvam atharvāṇo jaghnū rakṣāṃsy oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:1838: (AVŚ_4,37.1c) tvayā jaghāna kaśyapas tvayā kaṇvo agastyaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1840: (AVŚ_4,37.2c) ajaśṛṅgy aja rakṣaḥ sarvān gandhena nāśaya ||2||
GV00avs___u:1846: (AVŚ_4,37.5a) yatra vaḥ preṅkhā haritā arjunā uta yatrāghātāḥ karkaryaḥ saṃvadanti |
GV00avs___u:1852: (AVŚ_4,37.8a) bhīmā indrasya hetayaḥ śataṃ ṛṣṭīr ayasmayīḥ |
GV00avs___u:1854: (AVŚ_4,37.9a) bhīmā indrasya hetayaḥ śataṃ ṛṣṭīr hiraṇyayīḥ |
GV00avs___u:1857: (AVŚ_4,37.10c) piśācānt sarvān oṣadhe pra mṛṇīhi sahasva ca ||10||
GV00avs___u:1859: (AVŚ_4,37.11c) priyo dṛśa iva bhūtvā gandharvaḥ sacate striyas |
GV00avs___u:1861: (AVŚ_4,37.12a) jāyā id vo apsaraso gandharvāḥ patayo yuyam |
GV00avs___u:1864: (AVŚ_4,38.1c) glahe kṛtāni kṛṇvānām apsarāṃ tām iha huve ||1||
GV00avs___u:1866: (AVŚ_4,38.2c) glahe kṛtāni gṛhṇānām apsarāṃ tām iha huve ||2||
GV00avs___u:1868: (AVŚ_4,38.3c) sā naḥ kṛtāni sīṣatī prahām āpnotu māyayā |
GV00avs___u:1869: (AVŚ_4,38.3e) sā naḥ payasvaty aitu mā no jaiṣur idaṃ dhanam ||3||
GV00avs___u:1870: (AVŚ_4,38.4a) yā akṣeṣu pramodante śucaṃ krodhaṃ ca bibhratī |
GV00avs___u:1871: (AVŚ_4,38.4c) ānandinīṃ pramodinīm apsarāṃ tām iha huve ||4||
GV00avs___u:1872: (AVŚ_4,38.5a) sūryasya raśmīn anu yāḥ sañcaranti marīcīr vā yā anusañcaranti |
GV00avs___u:1873: (AVŚ_4,38.5c) yāsām ṛṣabho dūrato vājinīvānt sadyaḥ sarvān lokān paryeti rakṣan |
GV00avs___u:1874: (AVŚ_4,38.5e) sa na aitu homam imaṃ jusāṇo 'ntarikṣeṇa saha vājinīvān ||5||
GV00avs___u:1875: (AVŚ_4,38.6a) antarikṣena saha vājinīvan karkīṃ vatsām iha rakṣa vājin |
GV00avs___u:1876: (AVŚ_4,38.6c) ime te stokā bahulā ehy arvāṅ iyaṃ te karkīha te mano 'stu
GV00avs___u:1877: (AVŚ_4,38.7a) antarikṣeṇa saha vājinīvan karkīṃ vatsām iha rakṣa vājin |
GV00avs___u:1878: (AVŚ_4,38.7c) ayaṃ ghāso ayaṃ vraja iha vatsāṃ ni badhnīmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1880: (AVŚ_4,39.1a) pṛthivyām agnaye sam anamant sa ārdhnot |
GV00avs___u:1881: (AVŚ_4,39.1c) yathā pṛthivyām agnaye samanamann evā mahyaṃ saṃnamaḥ saṃ namantu ||1||
GV00avs___u:1883: (AVŚ_4,39.2c) sā me 'gninā vatseneṣam ūrjaṃ kāmaṃ duhām |
GV00avs___u:1884: (AVŚ_4,39.2e) āyuḥ prathamaṃ prajāṃ poṣaṃ rayiṃ svāhā ||2||
GV00avs___u:1885: (AVŚ_4,39.3a) antarikṣe vāyave sam anamant sa ārdhnot |
GV00avs___u:1886: (AVŚ_4,39.3c) yathāntarikṣe vāyave samanamann evā mahyaṃ saṃnamaḥ saṃ namantu ||3||
GV00avs___u:1888: (AVŚ_4,39.4c) sā me vāyunā vatseneṣam ūrjaṃ kāmaṃ duhām |
GV00avs___u:1889: (AVŚ_4,39.4e) āyuḥ prathamaṃ prajāṃ poṣaṃ rayiṃ svāhā ||4||
GV00avs___u:1891: (AVŚ_4,39.5c) yathā divyādityāya samanamann evā mahyaṃ saṃnamaḥ saṃ namantu ||5||
GV00avs___u:1893: (AVŚ_4,39.6c) sā ma ādityena vatseneṣam ūrjaṃ kāmaṃ duhām |
GV00avs___u:1894: (AVŚ_4,39.6e) āyuḥ prathamaṃ prajāṃ poṣaṃ rayiṃ svāhā ||6||
GV00avs___u:1895: (AVŚ_4,39.7a) dikṣu candrāya sam anamant sa ārdhnot |
GV00avs___u:1896: (AVŚ_4,39.7c) yathā dikṣu candrāya samanamann evā mahyaṃ saṃnamaḥ saṃ namantu ||7||
GV00avs___u:1898: (AVŚ_4,39.8c) tā me candreṇa vatseneṣam ūrjaṃ kāmaṃ duhām āyuḥ prathamaṃ
GV00avs___u:1900: (AVŚ_4,39.9a) agnāv agniś carati praviṣṭa ṛṣīṇām putro abhiśastipā u |
GV00avs___u:1901: (AVŚ_4,39.9c) namaskāreṇa namasā te juhomi mā devānāṃ mithuyā karma bhāgam
GV00avs___u:1902: (AVŚ_4,39.10a) hṛdā pūtam manasā jātavedo viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān |
GV00avs___u:1903: (AVŚ_4,39.10c) saptāsyāni tava jātavedas tebhyo juhomi sa juṣasva havyam ||10||
GV00avs___u:1904: (AVŚ_4,40.1a) ye purastāj juhvati jātavedaḥ prācyā diśo 'bhidāsanty asmān
GV00avs___u:1905: (AVŚ_4,40.1c) agnim ṛtvā te parāñco vyathantāṃ pratyag enān pratisareṇa hanmi ||1||
GV00avs___u:1906: (AVŚ_4,40.2a) ye dakṣiṇato juhvati jātavedo dakṣiṇāyā diśo 'bhidāsanty
GV00avs___u:1908: (AVŚ_4,40.2c) yamaṃ ṛtvā te parāñco vyathantāṃ pratyag enā pratisareṇa hanmi ||2||
GV00avs___u:1909: (AVŚ_4,40.3a) ye paścāj juhvati jātavedaḥ pratīcyā diśo 'bhidāsanty asmān
GV00avs___u:1910: (AVŚ_4,40.3c) varuṇam ṛtvā te parāñco vyathantāṃ pratyag enān pratisareṇa hanmi ||3||
GV00avs___u:1911: (AVŚ_4,40.4a) ya uttarato juhvati jātaveda udīcyā diśo 'bhidāsanty asmān |
GV00avs___u:1912: (AVŚ_4,40.4c) somam ṛtvā te parāñco vyathantāṃ pratyag enān pratisareṇa hanmi ||4||
GV00avs___u:1913: (AVŚ_4,40.5a) ye 'dhastāj juhvati jātaveda udīcyā diśo 'bhidāsanty asmān |
GV00avs___u:1914: (AVŚ_4,40.5c) bhūmim ṛtvā te parāñco vyathantāṃ pratyag enān pratisareṇa hanmi ||5||
GV00avs___u:1917: (AVŚ_4,40.6c) vāyum ṛtvā te parāñco vyathantāṃ pratyag enān pratisareṇa hanmi ||6||
GV00avs___u:1918: (AVŚ_4,40.7a) ya upariṣṭāj juhvati jātaveda ūrdhvāyā diśo 'bhidāsanty
GV00avs___u:1920: (AVŚ_4,40.7c) sūryam ṛtvā te parāñco vyathantāṃ pratyag enān pratisareṇa hanmi ||7||
GV00avs___u:1921: (AVŚ_4,40.8a) ye diśām antardeśebhyo juhvati jātavedaḥ sarvābhyo digbhyo
GV00avs___u:1923: (AVŚ_4,40.8c) brahma rtvā te parāñco vyathantāṃ pratyag enān pratisareṇa hanmi ||8||
GV00avs___u:1924: (AVŚ_5,1.1a) ṛdhaṅmantro yoniṃ ya ābabhūvāmṛtāsur vardhamānaḥ sujanmā |
GV00avs___u:1925: (AVŚ_5,1.1c) adabdhāsur bhrājamāno 'heva trito dhartā dādhāra trīṇi ||1||
GV00avs___u:1926: (AVŚ_5,1.2a) ā yo dharmāṇi prathamaḥ sasāda tato vapūṃṣi kṛṇuṣe purūṇi |
GV00avs___u:1927: (AVŚ_5,1.2c) dhāsyur yoniṃ prathama ā viveśā yo vācam anuditāṃ ciketa
GV00avs___u:1928: (AVŚ_5,1.3a) yas te śokāya tanvaṃ rireca kṣarad dhiraṇyaṃ śucayo 'nu svāḥ
GV00avs___u:1929: (AVŚ_5,1.3c) atrā dadhete amṛtāni nāmāsme vastrāṇi viśa erayantām ||3||
GV00avs___u:1930: (AVŚ_5,1.4a) pra yad ete prataraṃ pūrvyaṃ guḥ sadaḥsada ātiṣṭhanto ajuryam
GV00avs___u:1931: (AVŚ_5,1.4c) kaviḥ śuṣasya mātarā rihāṇe jāmyai dhuryaṃ patim erayethām ||4||
GV00avs___u:1932: (AVŚ_5,1.5a) tad ū ṣu te mahat pṛthujman namaḥ kaviḥ kāvyenā kṛṇomi |
GV00avs___u:1933: (AVŚ_5,1.5c) yat samyañcāv abhiyantāv abhi kṣām atrā mahī rodhacakre vāvṛdhete ||5||
GV00avs___u:1934: (AVŚ_5,1.6a) sapta maryādāḥ kavayas tatakṣus tāsām id ekām abhy aṃhuro gāt
GV00avs___u:1935: (AVŚ_5,1.6c) āyor ha skambha upamasya nīḍe pathāṃ visarge dharuṇeṣu tasthau ||6||
GV00avs___u:1936: (AVŚ_5,1.7a) utāmṛtāsur vrata emi kṛnvann asur ātmā tanvas tat sumadguḥ |
GV00avs___u:1937: (AVŚ_5,1.7c) uta vā śakro ratnaṃ dadhāty ūrjayā vā yat sacate havirdāḥ
GV00avs___u:1938: (AVŚ_5,1.8a) uta putraḥ pitaraṃ kṣatram īḍe jyeṣṭhaṃ maryādam ahvayant svastaye |
GV00avs___u:1939: (AVŚ_5,1.8c) darśan nu tā varuṇa yās te viṣṭhā āvarvratataḥ kṛṇavo vapūṃṣi
GV00avs___u:1940: (AVŚ_5,1.9a) ardham ardhena payasā pṛṇakṣy ardhena śuṣma vardhase amura |
GV00avs___u:1941: (AVŚ_5,1.9c) aviṃ vṛdhāma śagmiyaṃ sakhāyaṃ varuṇaṃ putram adityā iṣiram |
GV00avs___u:1942: (AVŚ_5,1.9e) kaviśastāny asmai vapūṃṣy avocāma rodasī satyavācā ||9||
GV00avs___u:1943: (AVŚ_5,2.1a) tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham yato yajña ugras tveṣanṛmṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1944: (AVŚ_5,2.1c) sadyo jajñāno ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yad enaṃ madanti viśva ūmāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:1945: (AVŚ_5,2.2a) vavṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojāḥ śatrur dāsāya bhiyasaṃ dadhāti |
GV00avs___u:1946: (AVŚ_5,2.2c) avyanac ca vyanac ca sasni saṃ te navanta prabhṛtā madeṣu
GV00avs___u:1947: (AVŚ_5,2.3a) tve kratum api pṛñcanti bhūri dvir yad ete trir bhavanty ūmāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1948: (AVŚ_5,2.3c) svadoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛjā sam adaḥ su madhu madhunābhi
GV00avs___u:1950: (AVŚ_5,2.4a) yadi cin nu tvā dhanā jayantaṃ raṇeraṇe anumadanti viprāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1951: (AVŚ_5,2.4c) ojīyaḥ śuṣmint sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan durevāsaḥ
GV00avs___u:1953: (AVŚ_5,2.5a) tvayā vayaṃ śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyanto yudhenyāni bhūri |
GV00avs___u:1954: (AVŚ_5,2.5c) codayāmi ta āyudhā vacobhiḥ saṃ te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi
GV00avs___u:1955: (AVŚ_5,2.6a) ni tad dadhiṣe 'vare pare ca yasminn āvithāvasā duroṇe |
GV00avs___u:1956: (AVŚ_5,2.6c) ā sthāpayata mātaraṃ jigatnum ata invata karvarāṇi bhūri ||6||
GV00avs___u:1957: (AVŚ_5,2.7a) stuṣva varṣman puruvartmānaṃ sam ṛbhvāṇam inatamam āptam āptyānām |
GV00avs___u:1958: (AVŚ_5,2.7c) ā darśati śavasā bhūryojāḥ pra sakṣati pratimānaṃ pṛthivyāḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:1959: (AVŚ_5,2.8a) imā brahma bṛhaddivaḥ kṛṇavad indrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:1960: (AVŚ_5,2.8c) maho gotrasya kṣayati svarājā turaś cid viśvam arṇavat tapasvān ||8||
GV00avs___u:1961: (AVŚ_5,2.9a) evā mahān bṛhaddivo atharvāvocat svāṃ tanvam indram eva |
GV00avs___u:1962: (AVŚ_5,2.9c) svasārau mātaribhvarī aripre hinvanti caine śavasā
GV00avs___u:1964: (AVŚ_5,3.1a) mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astu vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvam puṣema |
GV00avs___u:1965: (AVŚ_5,3.1c) mahyaṃ namantāṃ pradiśaś catasras tvayādhyakṣeṇa pṛtanā
GV00avs___u:1967: (AVŚ_5,3.2a) agne manyuṃ pratinudan pareṣāṃ tvaṃ no gopāḥ pari pāhi
GV00avs___u:1969: (AVŚ_5,3.2c) apāñco yantu nivatā durasyavo 'maiṣāṃ cittaṃ prabudhāṃ vi
GV00avs___u:1971: (AVŚ_5,3.3a) mama devā vihave santu sarva indravanto maruto viṣṇur agniḥ |
GV00avs___u:1972: (AVŚ_5,3.3c) mamāntarikṣam urulokam astu mahyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ kāmāyāsmai
GV00avs___u:1973: (AVŚ_5,3.4a) mahyaṃ yajantāṃ mama yānīṣṭākūtiḥ satyā manaso me astu |
GV00avs___u:1974: (AVŚ_5,3.4c) eno mā ni gāṃ katamac canāhaṃ viśve devā abhi rakṣantu meha ||4||
GV00avs___u:1975: (AVŚ_5,3.5a) mayi devā draviṇam ā yajantāṃ mayi āśīr astu mayi devahūtiḥ |
GV00avs___u:1976: (AVŚ_5,3.5c) daivāḥ hotāraḥ saniṣan na etad ariṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā suvīrāḥ
GV00avs___u:1977: (AVŚ_5,3.6a) daivīḥ ṣaḍ urvīr uru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsa iha mādayadhvam
GV00avs___u:1978: (AVŚ_5,3.6c) mā no vidad abhibhā mo aśastir mā no vidad vṛjinā dveṣyā yā
GV00avs___u:1979: (AVŚ_5,3.7a) tisro devīr mahi naḥ śarma yachata prajāyai nas tanve yac ca puṣṭam |
GV00avs___u:1980: (AVŚ_5,3.7c) mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhir mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan
GV00avs___u:1981: (AVŚ_5,3.8a) uruvyacā no mahiṣaḥ śarma yachatv asmin have puruhūtaḥ purukṣu |
GV00avs___u:1982: (AVŚ_5,3.8c) sa naḥ prajāyai haryaśva mṛḍendra mā no rīriṣo mā parā dāḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:1983: (AVŚ_5,3.9a) dhātā vidhātā bhuvanasya yas patir devaḥ savitābhimātiṣāhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:1984: (AVŚ_5,3.9c) ādityā rudrā aśvinobhā devāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nirṛthāt ||9||
GV00avs___u:1985: (AVŚ_5,3.10a) ye naḥ sapatnā apa te bhavantv indrāgnibhyām ava bādhāmaha
GV00avs___u:1987: (AVŚ_5,3.10c) ādityā rudrā uparispṛśo no ugraṃ cettāram adhirājam akrata ||10||
GV00avs___u:1988: (AVŚ_5,3.11a) arvāñcam indram amuto havāmahe yo gojid dhanajid aśvajid yaḥ
GV00avs___u:1989: (AVŚ_5,3.11c) imaṃ no yajñaṃ vihave śṛṇotv asmākam abhūr haryaśva medī
GV00avs___u:1993: (AVŚ_5,4.2c) dhanair abhi śrutvā yanti vidur hi takmanāśanam ||2||
GV00avs___u:1999: (AVŚ_5,4.5c) nāvo hiraṇyayīr āsan yābhiḥ kuṣṭhaṃ nirāvahan ||5||
GV00avs___u:2000: (AVŚ_5,4.6a) imaṃ me kuṣṭha pūruṣaṃ tam ā vaha taṃ niṣ kuru |
GV00avs___u:2002: (AVŚ_5,4.7a) devebhyo adhi jāto 'si somasyāsi sakhā hitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2003: (AVŚ_5,4.7c) sa prāṇāya vyānāya cakṣuṣe me asmai mṛḍa ||7||
GV00avs___u:2004: (AVŚ_5,4.8a) udaṅ jāto himavataḥ sa prācyāṃ nīyase janam |
GV00avs___u:2005: (AVŚ_5,4.8c) tatra kuṣṭhasya nāmāny uttamāni vi bhejire ||8||
GV00avs___u:2006: (AVŚ_5,4.9a) uttamo nāma kuṣṭhasy uttamo nāma te pitā |
GV00avs___u:2007: (AVŚ_5,4.9c) yakṣmaṃ ca sarvaṃ nāśaya takmānaṃ cārasaṃ kṛdhi ||9||
GV00avs___u:2009: (AVŚ_5,4.10c) kuṣṭhas tat sarvaṃ niṣ karad daivaṃ samaha vṛṣṇyam ||10||
GV00avs___u:2010: (AVŚ_5,5.1a) rātrī mātā nabhaḥ pitāryamā te pitāmahaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2011: (AVŚ_5,5.1c) silācī nāma vā asi sā devānām asi svasā ||1||
GV00avs___u:2012: (AVŚ_5,5.2a) yas tvā pibati jīvati trāyase puruṣaṃ tvam |
GV00avs___u:2013: (AVŚ_5,5.2c) bhartrī hi śaśvatām asi janānāṃ ca nyañcanī ||2||
GV00avs___u:2015: (AVŚ_5,5.3c) jayantī pratyātiṣṭhantī sparaṇī nāma vā asi ||3||
GV00avs___u:2016: (AVŚ_5,5.4a) yad daṇḍena yad iṣvā yad vārur harasā kṛtam |

GV00avs___u:2057: (AVŚ_5,7.1c) namo vīrtsāyā asamṛddhaye namo astv arātaye ||1||

GV00avs___u:2077: (AVŚ_5,8.1c) agne tāṃ iha mādaya sarva ā yantu me havam ||1||
GV00avs___u:2078: (AVŚ_5,8.2a) indrā yāhi me havam idaṃ kariṣyāmi tac chṛṇu |

GV00avs___u:2125: (AVŚ_5,11.1a) kathaṃ mahe asurāyābravīr iha kathaṃ pitre haraye tveṣanṛmṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2126: (AVŚ_5,11.1c) pṛśniṃ varuṇa dakṣiṇāṃ dadāvān punarmagha tvaṃ
GV00avs___u:2128: (AVŚ_5,11.2a) na kāmena punarmagho bhavāmi saṃ cakṣe kaṃ pṛśnim etām upāje
GV00avs___u:2129: (AVŚ_5,11.2c) kena nu tvam atharvan kāvyena kena jātenāsi jātavedāḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2130: (AVŚ_5,11.3a) satyam ahaṃ gabhīraḥ kāvyena satyaṃ jātenāsmi jātavedāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2131: (AVŚ_5,11.3c) na me dāso nāryo mahitvā vrataṃ mīmāya yad ahaṃ dhariṣye
GV00avs___u:2132: (AVŚ_5,11.4a) na tvad anyaḥ kavitaro na medhayā dhīrataro varuṇa svadhāvan
GV00avs___u:2133: (AVŚ_5,11.4c) tvaṃ tā viśvā bhuvanāni vettha sa cin nu tvaj jano māyī bibhāya ||4||

GV00avs___u:2135: (AVŚ_5,11.5c) kiṃ rajasa enā paro anyad asty enā kiṃ pareṇāvaram amura
GV00avs___u:2136: (AVŚ_5,11.6a) ekaṃ rajasa enā paro anyad asty enā para ekena durṇaśaṃ cid arvāk |
GV00avs___u:2137: (AVŚ_5,11.6c) tat te vidvān varuṇa pra bravīmy adhovacasaḥ paṇayo bhavantu
GV00avs___u:2139: (AVŚ_5,11.7a) tvaṃ hy aṅga varuṇa bravīṣi punarmagheṣv avadyāni bhūri |
GV00avs___u:2140: (AVŚ_5,11.7c) mo ṣu paṇīṃr abhy etāvato bhūn mā tvā vocann arādhasaṃ janāsaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:2141: (AVŚ_5,11.8a) mā mā vocann arādhasaṃ janāsaḥ punas te pṛśniṃ jaritar

GV00avs___u:2151: (AVŚ_5,11.11e) tasmā u rādhaḥ kṛṇuhi supraśastaṃ sakhā no asi paramaṃ ca bandhuḥ ||11||

GV00avs___u:2163: (AVŚ_5,12.6a) ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau |
GV00avs___u:2164: (AVŚ_5,12.6c) divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme adhi śriyaṃ śukrapiśaṃ dadhāne ||6||

GV00avs___u:2166: (AVŚ_5,12.7c) pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnaṃ jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā
GV00avs___u:2167: (AVŚ_5,12.8a) ā no yajñaṃ bhāratī tūyam etv iḍā manuṣvad iha cetayantī |

GV00avs___u:2170: (AVŚ_5,12.9c) tam adya hotar iṣito yajīyān devaṃ tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi

GV00avs___u:2173: (AVŚ_5,12.10c) vanaspatiḥ śamitā devo agniḥ svadantu havyaṃ madhunā ghṛtena ||10||

GV00avs___u:2175: (AVŚ_5,12.11c) asya hotuḥ praśiṣy ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtaṃ havir adantu devāḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:2176: (AVŚ_5,13.1a) dadir hi mahyaṃ varuṇo divaḥ kavir vacobhir ugrair ni riṇāmi te viṣam |
GV00avs___u:2177: (AVŚ_5,13.1c) khātam akhātam uta saktam agrabham ireva dhanvan ni jajāsa
GV00avs___u:2179: (AVŚ_5,13.2a) yat te apodakaṃ viṣaṃ tat ta etāsv agrabham |
GV00avs___u:2180: (AVŚ_5,13.2c) gṛhṇāmi te madhyamam uttamaṃ rasam utāvamam bhiyasā neśad ād
GV00avs___u:2182: (AVŚ_5,13.3a) vṛṣā me ravo nabhasā na tanyatur ugreṇa te vacasā bādha ād u
GV00avs___u:2184: (AVŚ_5,13.3c) ahaṃ tam asya nṛbhir agrabham rasaṃ tamasa iva jyotir ud etu sūryaḥ ||3||

GV00avs___u:2186: (AVŚ_5,13.4c) ahe mriyasva mā jīvīḥ pratyag abhy etu tvā viṣam ||4||

GV00avs___u:2188: (AVŚ_5,13.5c) mā me sakhyuḥ stāmānam api ṣṭhātāśrāvayanto ni viṣe ramadhvam ||5||
GV00avs___u:2190: (AVŚ_5,13.6c) sātrāsāhasyāhaṃ manyor ava jyām iva dhanvano vi muñcāmi rathāṃ iva ||6||
GV00avs___u:2191: (AVŚ_5,13.7a) āligī ca viligī ca pitā ca matā ca |

GV00avs___u:2195: (AVŚ_5,13.9a) karṇā śvāvit tad abravīd girer avacarantikā |

GV00avs___u:2197: (AVŚ_5,13.10a) tābuvaṃ na tābuvaṃ na ghet tvam asi tābuvam |
GV00avs___u:2199: (AVŚ_5,13.11a) tastuvaṃ na tastuvaṃ na ghet tvam asi tastuvam |
GV00avs___u:2201: (AVŚ_5,14.1a) suparṇas tvānv avindat sūkaras tvākhanan nasā |
GV00avs___u:2202: (AVŚ_5,14.1c) dipsauṣadhe tvaṃ dipsantam ava kṛtyākṛtaṃ jahi ||1||
GV00avs___u:2203: (AVŚ_5,14.2a) ava jahi yātudhānān ava kṛtyākṛtaṃ jahi |
GV00avs___u:2204: (AVŚ_5,14.2c) atho yo asmān dipsati tam u tvaṃ jahy oṣadhe ||2||
GV00avs___u:2206: (AVŚ_5,14.3c) kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛte devā niṣkam iva prati muñcata ||3||
GV00avs___u:2207: (AVŚ_5,14.4a) punaḥ kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛte hastagṛhya parā ṇaya |
