GV00avs___u:2211: (AVŚ_5,14.6a) yadi strī yadi vā pumān kṛtyāṃ cakāra pāpmane |
GV00avs___u:2212: (AVŚ_5,14.6c) tām u tasmai nayāmasy aśvam ivāśvābhidhānyā ||6||
GV00avs___u:2213: (AVŚ_5,14.7a) yadi vāsi devakṛtā yadi vā puruṣaiḥ kṛtā |
GV00avs___u:2214: (AVŚ_5,14.7c) tāṃ tvā punar ṇayāmasīndreṇa sayujā vayam ||7||
GV00avs___u:2217: (AVŚ_5,14.9a) kṛtavyadhani vidhya taṃ yaś cakāra tam ij jahi |
GV00avs___u:2218: (AVŚ_5,14.9c) na tvām acakruṣe vayaṃ vadhāya saṃ śiśīmahi ||9||
GV00avs___u:2219: (AVŚ_5,14.10a) putra iva pitaraṃ gacha svaja ivābhiṣṭhito daśa |
GV00avs___u:2220: (AVŚ_5,14.10c) bandham ivāvakrāmī gacha kṛtye kṛtyākṛtaṃ punaḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:2223: (AVŚ_5,14.12a) iṣvā ṛjīyaḥ patatu dyāvāpṛthivī taṃ prati |
GV00avs___u:2224: (AVŚ_5,14.12c) sā taṃ mṛgam iva gṛhṇātu kṛtyā kṛtyākṛtaṃ punaḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:2226: (AVŚ_5,14.13c) sukho ratha iva vartatāṃ kṛtyā kṛtyākṛtaṃ punaḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:2227: (AVŚ_5,15.1a) ekā ca me daśa ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2228: (AVŚ_5,15.1c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:2229: (AVŚ_5,15.2a) dve ca me viṃśatiś ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2230: (AVŚ_5,15.2c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2231: (AVŚ_5,15.3a) tisraś ca me triṃśac ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2232: (AVŚ_5,15.3c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:2233: (AVŚ_5,15.4a) catasraś ca me catvāriṃśac ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2234: (AVŚ_5,15.4c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:2235: (AVŚ_5,15.5a) pañca ca me pañcāśac ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2236: (AVŚ_5,15.5c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:2237: (AVŚ_5,15.6a) ṣaṭ ca me ṣaṣṭiś ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2238: (AVŚ_5,15.6c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:2239: (AVŚ_5,15.7a) sapta ca me saptatiś ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2240: (AVŚ_5,15.7c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:2241: (AVŚ_5,15.8a) aṣṭa ca me 'śītiś ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2242: (AVŚ_5,15.8c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:2243: (AVŚ_5,15.9a) nava ca me navatiś ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2244: (AVŚ_5,15.9c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:2245: (AVŚ_5,15.10a) daśa ca me śataṃ ca me 'pavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2246: (AVŚ_5,15.10c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:2247: (AVŚ_5,15.11a) śataṃ ca me sahasraṃ cāpavaktāra oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:2248: (AVŚ_5,15.11c) ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu me madhulā karaḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:2261: (AVŚ_5,17.1c) vīḍuharās tapa ugraṃ mayobhūr āpo devīḥ prathamajā ṛtasya ||1||
GV00avs___u:2262: (AVŚ_5,17.2a) somo rājā prathamo brahmajāyāṃ punaḥ prāyachad ahṛṇīyamānaḥ
GV00avs___u:2263: (AVŚ_5,17.2c) anvartitā varuṇo mitra āsīd agnir hotā hastagṛhyā nināya ||2||
GV00avs___u:2264: (AVŚ_5,17.3a) hastenaiva grāhya ādhir asyā brahmajāyeti ced avocat |
GV00avs___u:2265: (AVŚ_5,17.3c) na dūtāya praheyā tastha eṣā tathā rāṣṭraṃ gupitaṃ kṣatriyasya ||3||
GV00avs___u:2266: (AVŚ_5,17.4a) yām āhus tārakaiṣā vikeśīti duchunāṃ grāmam avapadyamānām |
GV00avs___u:2267: (AVŚ_5,17.4c) sā brahmajāyā vi dunoti rāṣṭraṃ yatra prāpādi śaśa ulkuṣīmān
GV00avs___u:2268: (AVŚ_5,17.5a) brahmacārī carati veviṣad viṣaḥ sa devānāṃ bhavaty ekam aṅgam |
GV00avs___u:2269: (AVŚ_5,17.5c) tena jāyām anv avindad bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītāṃ juhvaṃ na
GV00avs___u:2271: (AVŚ_5,17.6a) devā vā etasyām avadanta pūrve saptaṛṣayas tapasā ye niṣeduḥ
GV00avs___u:2272: (AVŚ_5,17.6c) bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasyāpanītā durdhāṃ dadhāti parame vyoman
GV00avs___u:2273: (AVŚ_5,17.7a) ye garbhā avapadyante jagad yac cāpalupyate |
GV00avs___u:2274: (AVŚ_5,17.7c) vīrā ye tṛhyante mitho brahmajāyā hinasti tān ||7||
GV00avs___u:2275: (AVŚ_5,17.8a) uta yat patayo daśa striyāḥ pūrve abrāhmaṇāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2276: (AVŚ_5,17.8c) brahmā ced dhastam agrahīt sa eva patir ekadhā ||8||
GV00avs___u:2277: (AVŚ_5,17.9a) brāhmaṇa eva patir na rājanyo na vaiśyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2278: (AVŚ_5,17.9c) tat sūryaḥ prabruvann eti pañcabhyo mānavebhyaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:2279: (AVŚ_5,17.10a) punar vai devā adaduḥ punar manuṣyā adaduḥ |
GV00avs___u:2280: (AVŚ_5,17.10c) rājānaḥ satyaṃ gṛhṇānā brahmajāyāṃ punar daduḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:2283: (AVŚ_5,17.12a) nāsya jāyā śatavāhī kalyāṇī talpam ā śaye |
GV00avs___u:2285: (AVŚ_5,17.13a) na vikarṇaḥ pṛthuśirās tasmin veśmani jāyate |
GV00avs___u:2287: (AVŚ_5,17.14a) nāsya kṣattā niṣkagrīvaḥ sūnānām ety agrataḥ |
GV00avs___u:2289: (AVŚ_5,17.15a) nāsya śvetaḥ kṛṣṇakarṇo dhuri yukto mahīyate |
GV00avs___u:2291: (AVŚ_5,17.16a) nāsya kṣetre puṣkariṇī nāṇḍīkaṃ jāyate bisam |
GV00avs___u:2293: (AVŚ_5,17.17a) nāsmai pṛśniṃ vi duhanti ye 'syā doham upāsate |
GV00avs___u:2295: (AVŚ_5,17.18a) nāsya dhenuḥ kalyāṇī nānaḍvānt sahate dhuram |
GV00avs___u:2296: (AVŚ_5,17.18c) vijānir yatra brahmaṇo rātriṃ vasati pāpayā ||18||
GV00avs___u:2297: (AVŚ_5,18.1a) naitāṃ te devā adadus tubhyaṃ nṛpate attave |
GV00avs___u:2298: (AVŚ_5,18.1c) mā brāhmaṇasya rājanya gāṃ jighatso anādyām ||1||
GV00avs___u:2300: (AVŚ_5,18.2c) sa brāhmaṇasya gām adyād adya jīvāni mā śvaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2302: (AVŚ_5,18.3c) sā brāhmaṇasya rājanya tṛṣṭaiṣā gaur anādyā ||3||
GV00avs___u:2303: (AVŚ_5,18.4a) nir vai kṣatraṃ nayati hanti varco 'gnir ivārabdho vi dunoti
GV00avs___u:2305: (AVŚ_5,18.4c) yo brāhmaṇaṃ manyate annam eva sa viṣasya pibati taimātasya
GV00avs___u:2306: (AVŚ_5,18.5a) ya enaṃ hanti mṛduṃ manyamāno devapīyur dhanakāmo na cittāt
GV00avs___u:2307: (AVŚ_5,18.5c) saṃ tasyendro hṛdaye 'gnim indhe ubhe enaṃ dviṣṭo nabhasī carantam ||5||
GV00avs___u:2309: (AVŚ_5,18.6c) somo hy asya dāyāda indro asyābhiśastipāḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:2310: (AVŚ_5,18.7a) śatāpāṣṭhāṃ ni girati tāṃ na śaknoti niḥkhidam |
GV00avs___u:2311: (AVŚ_5,18.7c) annaṃ yo brahmaṇām malvaḥ svādv admīti manyate ||7||
GV00avs___u:2312: (AVŚ_5,18.8a) jihvā jyā bhavati kulmalaṃ vāṅ nāḍīkā dantās tapasābhidigdhāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2313: (AVŚ_5,18.8c) tebhir brahmā vidhyati devapīyūn hṛdbalair dhanurbhir
GV00avs___u:2315: (AVŚ_5,18.9a) tīkṣṇeṣavo brāhmaṇā hetimanto yām asyanti śaravyāṃ na sā mṛṣā |
GV00avs___u:2316: (AVŚ_5,18.9c) anuhāya tapasā manyunā cota durād ava bhindanty enam ||9||
GV00avs___u:2317: (AVŚ_5,18.10a) ye sahasram arājann āsan daśaśatā uta |
GV00avs___u:2318: (AVŚ_5,18.10c) te brāhmaṇasya gāṃ jagdhvā vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan ||10||
GV00avs___u:2319: (AVŚ_5,18.11a) gaur eva tān hanyamānā vaitahavyāṃ avātirat |
GV00avs___u:2321: (AVŚ_5,18.12a) ekaśataṃ tā janatā yā bhūmir vyadhūnuta |
GV00avs___u:2323: (AVŚ_5,18.13a) devapīyuś carati martyeṣu garagīrṇo bhavaty asthibhūyān |
GV00avs___u:2324: (AVŚ_5,18.13c) yo brāhmaṇaṃ devabandhuṃ hinasti na sa pitṛyāṇam apy eti
GV00avs___u:2326: (AVŚ_5,18.14a) agnir vai naḥ padavāyaḥ somo dāyāda ucyate |
GV00avs___u:2328: (AVŚ_5,18.15a) iṣur iva digdhā nṛpate pṛdākūr iva gopate |
GV00avs___u:2329: (AVŚ_5,18.15c) sā brāhmaṇasyeṣur ghorā tayā vidhyati pīyataḥ ||15||
GV00avs___u:2330: (AVŚ_5,19.1a) atimātram avardhanta nod iva divam aspṛśan |
GV00avs___u:2332: (AVŚ_5,19.2a) ye bṛhatsāmānam āṅgirasam ārpayan brāhmaṇaṃ janāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2333: (AVŚ_5,19.2c) petvas teṣām ubhayādam avis tokāny āvayat ||2||
GV00avs___u:2334: (AVŚ_5,19.3a) ye brāhmaṇaṃ pratyaṣṭhīvan ye vāsmiñ chulkam īṣire |
GV00avs___u:2335: (AVŚ_5,19.3c) asnas te madhye kulyāyāḥ keśān khādanta āsate ||3||
GV00avs___u:2337: (AVŚ_5,19.4c) tejo rāṣṭrasya nir hanti na vīro jāyate vṛṣā ||4||
GV00avs___u:2338: (AVŚ_5,19.5a) krūram asyā āśasanaṃ tṛṣṭaṃ piśitam asyate |
GV00avs___u:2339: (AVŚ_5,19.5c) kṣīraṃ yad asyāḥ pīyate tad vai pitṛṣu kilbiṣam ||5||
GV00avs___u:2340: (AVŚ_5,19.6a) ugro rājā manyamāno brāhmaṇaṃ yo jighatsati |
GV00avs___u:2341: (AVŚ_5,19.6c) parā tat sicyate rāṣṭraṃ brāhmaṇo yatra jīyate ||6||
GV00avs___u:2343: (AVŚ_5,19.7c) dvyāsyā dvijihvā bhūtvā sā rāṣṭram ava dhūnute brahmajyasya ||7||
GV00avs___u:2344: (AVŚ_5,19.8a) tad vai rāṣṭram ā sravati nāvaṃ bhinnām ivodakam |
GV00avs___u:2345: (AVŚ_5,19.8c) brahmāṇaṃ yatra hiṃsanti tad rāṣṭraṃ hanti duchunā ||8||
GV00avs___u:2346: (AVŚ_5,19.9a) taṃ vṛkṣā apa sedhanti chāyāṃ no mopa gā iti |
GV00avs___u:2347: (AVŚ_5,19.9c) yo brāhmaṇasya sad dhanam abhi nārada manyate ||9||
GV00avs___u:2349: (AVŚ_5,19.10c) na brāhmaṇasya gāṃ jagdhvā rāstre jāgāra kaś cana ||10||
GV00avs___u:2350: (AVŚ_5,19.11a) navaiva tā navatayo yā bhūmir vyadhūnuta |
GV00avs___u:2353: (AVŚ_5,19.12c) tad vai brahmajya te devā upastaraṇam abruvan ||12||
GV00avs___u:2355: (AVŚ_5,19.13c) taṃ vai brahmajya te devā apāṃ bhāgam adhārayan ||13||
GV00avs___u:2357: (AVŚ_5,19.14c) taṃ vai brahmajya te devā apāṃ bhāgam adhārayan ||14||
GV00avs___u:2358: (AVŚ_5,19.15a) na varṣaṃ maitrāvaruṇaṃ brahmajyam abhi varṣati |
GV00avs___u:2359: (AVŚ_5,19.15c) nāsmai samitiḥ kalpate na mitraṃ nayate vaśam ||15||
GV00avs___u:2360: (AVŚ_5,20.1a) uccairghoṣo dundubhiḥ satvanāyan vānaspatyaḥ saṃbhṛta usṛiyābhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:2361: (AVŚ_5,20.1c) vācaṃ kṣuṇuvāno damayant sapatnānt siṃha iva jeṣyann abhi taṃstanīhi ||1||
GV00avs___u:2362: (AVŚ_5,20.2a) siṃha ivāstānīd druvayo vibaddho 'bhikrandann ṛṣabho vāsitām iva |
GV00avs___u:2363: (AVŚ_5,20.2c) vṛṣā tvaṃ vadhrayas te sapatnā aindras te śuṣmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2364: (AVŚ_5,20.3a) vṛṣeva yūthe sahasā vidāno gavyann abhi ruva saṃdhanājit |
GV00avs___u:2365: (AVŚ_5,20.3c) śucā vidhya hṛdayaṃ pareṣāṃ hitvā grāmān pracyutā yantu śatravaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:2366: (AVŚ_5,20.4a) saṃjayan pṛtanā ūrdhvamāyur gṛhyā gṛhṇāno bahudhā vi cakṣva |
GV00avs___u:2367: (AVŚ_5,20.4c) daivīṃ vācaṃ dundubha ā gurasva vedhāḥ śatrūṇām upa bharasva
GV00avs___u:2369: (AVŚ_5,20.5a) dundubher vācaṃ prayatāṃ vadantīm āśṛṇvatī nāthitā
GV00avs___u:2371: (AVŚ_5,20.5c) nārī putraṃ dhāvatu hastagṛhyāmitrī bhītā samare vadhānām
GV00avs___u:2372: (AVŚ_5,20.6a) pūrvo dundubhe pra vadāsi vācaṃ bhūmyāḥ pṛṣṭhe vada rocamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2373: (AVŚ_5,20.6c) amitrasenām abhijañjabhāno dyumad vada dundubhe sūnṛtāvat
GV00avs___u:2374: (AVŚ_5,20.7a) antareme nabhasī ghoṣo astu pṛthak te dhvanayo yantu śībham
GV00avs___u:2375: (AVŚ_5,20.7c) abhi kranda stanayotpipānaḥ ślokakṛn mitratūryāya svardhī
GV00avs___u:2376: (AVŚ_5,20.8a) dhībhiḥ kṛtaḥ pra vadāti vācam ud dharṣaya satvanām āyudhāni
GV00avs___u:2377: (AVŚ_5,20.8c) indramedī satvano ni hvayasva mitrair amitrāṃ ava jaṅghanīhi ||8||
GV00avs___u:2378: (AVŚ_5,20.9a) saṃkrandanaḥ pravado dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ pravedakṛd bahudhā grāmaghoṣī |
GV00avs___u:2379: (AVŚ_5,20.9c) śriyo vanvano vayunāni vidvān kīrtim bahubhyo vi hara dvirāje ||9||
GV00avs___u:2380: (AVŚ_5,20.10a) śreyaḥketo vasujit sahīyānt saṃgrāmajit saṃśito brahmaṇāsi
GV00avs___u:2381: (AVŚ_5,20.10c) aṃśūn iva grāvādhiṣavaṇe adrir gavyan dundubhe'dhi nṛtya vedaḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:2382: (AVŚ_5,20.11a) śatrūṣāṇ nīṣād abhimātiṣāho gaveṣaṇaḥ sahamāna udbhit |
GV00avs___u:2383: (AVŚ_5,20.11c) vāgvīva mantraṃ pra bharasva vācam sāṃgrāmajityāyeṣam ud vadeha ||11||
GV00avs___u:2384: (AVŚ_5,20.12a) acyutacyut samado gamiṣṭho mṛdho jetā puraetāyodhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2385: (AVŚ_5,20.12c) indreṇa gupto vidathā nicikyad dhṛddyotano dviṣatāṃ yāhi śībham ||12||
GV00avs___u:2387: (AVŚ_5,21.1c) vidveṣaṃ kaśmaśaṃ bhayam amitreṣu ni dadhmasy ava enān dundubhe jahi ||1||
GV00avs___u:2392: (AVŚ_5,21.4a) yathā mṛgāḥ saṃvijanta āraṇyāḥ puruṣād adhi |
GV00avs___u:2393: (AVŚ_5,21.4c) eva tvaṃ dundubhe 'mitrān abhi kranda pra trāsayātho cittāni mohaya ||4||
GV00avs___u:2394: (AVŚ_5,21.5a) yathā vṛkād ajāvayo dhāvanti bahu bibhyatīḥ |
GV00avs___u:2395: (AVŚ_5,21.5c) eva tvaṃ dundubhe 'mitrān abhi kranda pra trāsayātho cittāni mohaya ||5||
GV00avs___u:2396: (AVŚ_5,21.6a) yathā śyenāt patatriṇaḥ saṃvijante ahardivi siṃhasya
GV00avs___u:2398: (AVŚ_5,21.6c) eva tvaṃ dundubhe 'mitrān abhi kranda pra trāsayātho cittāni mohaya ||6||
GV00avs___u:2401: (AVŚ_5,21.8a) yair indraḥ prakrīḍate padghoṣaiś chāyayā saha |
GV00avs___u:2402: (AVŚ_5,21.8c) tair amitrās trasantu no 'mī ye yanty anīkaśaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:2405: (AVŚ_5,21.10a) āditya cakṣur ā datsva marīcayo 'nu dhāvata |
GV00avs___u:2407: (AVŚ_5,21.11a) yūyam ugrā marutaḥ pṛśnimātara indreṇa yujā pra mṛnīta śatrūn |
GV00avs___u:2408: (AVŚ_5,21.11c) somo rājā varuṇo rājā mahādeva uta mṛtyur indraḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:2411: (AVŚ_5,22.1a) agnis takmānam apa bādhatām itaḥ somo grāvā varuṇaḥ pūtadakṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2412: (AVŚ_5,22.1c) vedir barhiḥ samidhaḥ śośucānā apa dveṣāṃsy amuyā bhavantu ||1||
GV00avs___u:2413: (AVŚ_5,22.2a) ayaṃ yo viśvān haritān kṛṇoṣy ucchocayann agnir ivābhidunvan |
GV00avs___u:2414: (AVŚ_5,22.2c) adhā hi takmann araso hi bhūyā adhā nyaṅṅ adharān vā parehi ||2||
GV00avs___u:2417: (AVŚ_5,22.4a) adharāñcam pra hiṇomi namaḥ kṛtvā takmane |
GV00avs___u:2419: (AVŚ_5,22.5a) oko asya mūjavanta oko asya mahāvṛṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2420: (AVŚ_5,22.5c) yāvaj jātas takmaṃs tāvān asi balhikeṣu nyocaraḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:2421: (AVŚ_5,22.6a) takman vyāla vi gada vyaṅga bhūri yāvaya |
GV00avs___u:2422: (AVŚ_5,22.6c) dāsīṃ niṣṭakvarīm icha tām vajreṇa sam arpaya ||6||
GV00avs___u:2423: (AVŚ_5,22.7a) takman mūjavato gacha balhikān vā parastarām |
GV00avs___u:2424: (AVŚ_5,22.7c) śūdrām icha prapharvyaṃ tāṃ takman vīva dhūnuhi ||7||
GV00avs___u:2426: (AVŚ_5,22.8c) praitāni takmane brūmo anyakṣetrāṇi vā imā ||8||
GV00avs___u:2427: (AVŚ_5,22.9a) anyakṣetre na ramase vaśī san mṛḍayāsi naḥ |
GV00avs___u:2428: (AVŚ_5,22.9c) abhūd u prārthas takmā sa gamiṣyati balhikān ||9||
GV00avs___u:2429: (AVŚ_5,22.10a) yat tvaṃ śīto 'tho rūraḥ saha kāsāvepayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2430: (AVŚ_5,22.10c) bhīmās te takman hetayas tābhiḥ sma pari vṛṅgdhi naḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:2431: (AVŚ_5,22.11a) mā smaitānt sakhīn kuruthā balāsaṃ kāsam udyugam |
GV00avs___u:2432: (AVŚ_5,22.11c) mā smāto'rvāṅ aiḥ punas tat tvā takmann upa bruve ||11||
GV00avs___u:2433: (AVŚ_5,22.12a) takman bhrātrā balāsena svasrā kāsikayā saha |
GV00avs___u:2434: (AVŚ_5,22.12c) pāpmā bhrātṛvyeṇa saha gachāmum araṇaṃ janam ||12||
GV00avs___u:2436: (AVŚ_5,22.13c) takmānaṃ śītaṃ rūraṃ graiṣmaṃ nāśaya vārṣikam ||13||
GV00avs___u:2438: (AVŚ_5,22.14c) praiṣyan janam iva śevadhiṃ takmānaṃ pari dadmasi ||14||
GV00avs___u:2439: (AVŚ_5,23.1a) ote me dyāvāpṛthivī otā devī sarasvatī |
GV00avs___u:2440: (AVŚ_5,23.1c) otau ma indraś cāgniś ca krimiṃ jambhayatām iti ||1||
GV00avs___u:2442: (AVŚ_5,23.2c) hatā viśvā arātaya ugreṇa vacasā mama ||2||
GV00avs___u:2443: (AVŚ_5,23.3a) yo akṣyau parisarpati yo nāse parisarpati |
GV00avs___u:2444: (AVŚ_5,23.3c) datāṃ yo madhyaṃ gachati taṃ krimiṃ jambhayāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:2445: (AVŚ_5,23.4a) sarūpau dvau virūpau dvau kṛṣṇau dvau rohitau dvau |
GV00avs___u:2446: (AVŚ_5,23.4c) babhruś ca babhrukarṇaś ca gṛdhraḥ kokaś ca te hatāḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:2447: (AVŚ_5,23.5a) ye krimayaḥ śitikakṣā ye kṛṣṇāḥ śitibāhavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2448: (AVŚ_5,23.5c) ye ke ca viśvarūpās tān krimīn jambhayāmasi ||5||
GV00avs___u:2449: (AVŚ_5,23.6a) ut purastāt sūrya eti viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā |
GV00avs___u:2450: (AVŚ_5,23.6c) dṛṣṭāṃś ca ghnann adṛṣṭāṃś ca sarvāṃś ca pramṛṇan krimīn
GV00avs___u:2452: (AVŚ_5,23.7c) dṛṣṭaś ca hanyatāṃ krimir utādṛṣṭaś ca hanyatām ||7||
GV00avs___u:2454: (AVŚ_5,23.8c) sarvān ni maṣmaṣākaraṃ dṛṣadā khalvāṃ iva ||8||
GV00avs___u:2456: (AVŚ_5,23.9c) śṛṇāmy asya pṛṣṭīr api vṛścāmi yac chiraḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:2457: (AVŚ_5,23.10a) atrivad vaḥ krimayo hanmi kaṇvavaj jamadagnivat |
GV00avs___u:2458: (AVŚ_5,23.10c) agastyasya brahmaṇā saṃ pinaṣmy ahaṃ krimīn ||10||
GV00avs___u:2459: (AVŚ_5,23.11a) hato rājā krimīṇām utaiṣāṃ sthapatir hataḥ |
GV00avs___u:2462: (AVŚ_5,23.12c) atho ye kṣullakā iva sarve te krimayo hatāḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:2463: (AVŚ_5,23.13a) sarveṣāṃ ca krimīṇāṃ sarvāsāṃ ca krimīnām |
GV00avs___u:2464: (AVŚ_5,23.13c) bhinadmy aśmanā śiro dahāmy agninā mukham ||13||

GV00avs___u:2517: (AVŚ_5,25.1c) śepo garbhasya retodhāḥ sarau parṇam ivā dadhat ||1||
GV00avs___u:2518: (AVŚ_5,25.2a) yatheyaṃ pṛthivī mahī bhūtānāṃ garbham ādadhe |
GV00avs___u:2519: (AVŚ_5,25.2c) evā dadhāmi te garbhaṃ tasmai tvām avase huve ||2||
GV00avs___u:2520: (AVŚ_5,25.3a) garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi sarasvati |
GV00avs___u:2522: (AVŚ_5,25.4a) garbhaṃ te mitrāvaruṇau garbham devo bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:2523: (AVŚ_5,25.4c) garbhaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca garbhaṃ dhātā dadhātu te ||4||
GV00avs___u:2524: (AVŚ_5,25.5a) viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu |
GV00avs___u:2525: (AVŚ_5,25.5c) ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te ||5||
GV00avs___u:2526: (AVŚ_5,25.6a) yad veda rājā varuṇo yad vā devī sarasvatī |
GV00avs___u:2527: (AVŚ_5,25.6c) yad indro vṛtrahā veda tad garbhakaraṇaṃ piba ||6||
GV00avs___u:2529: (AVŚ_5,25.7c) garbho viśvasya bhūtasya so agne garbham eha dhāḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:2530: (AVŚ_5,25.8a) adhi skanda vīrayasva garbham ā dhehi yonyām |
GV00avs___u:2532: (AVŚ_5,25.9a) vi jihīṣva bārhatsāme garbhas te yonim ā śayām |
GV00avs___u:2533: (AVŚ_5,25.9c) aduṣ ṭe devāḥ putraṃ somapā ubhayāvinam ||9||
GV00avs___u:2535: (AVŚ_5,25.10c) pumāṃsaṃ putram ā dhehi daśame māsi sūtave ||10||
GV00avs___u:2537: (AVŚ_5,25.11c) pumāṃsaṃ putram ā dhehi daśame māsi sūtave ||11||
GV00avs___u:2539: (AVŚ_5,25.12c) pumāṃsaṃ putram ā dhehi daśame māsi sūtave ||12||
GV00avs___u:2541: (AVŚ_5,25.13c) pumāṃsaṃ putram ā dhehi daśame māsi sūtave ||13||
GV00avs___u:2542: (AVŚ_5,26.1a) yajūṃṣi yajñe samidhaḥ svāhāgniḥ pravidvān iha vo yunaktu ||1||
GV00avs___u:2543: (AVŚ_5,26.2a) yunaktu devaḥ savitā prajānann asmin yajñe mahiṣaḥ svāhā ||2||
GV00avs___u:2544: (AVŚ_5,26.3a) indra ukthāmadāny asmin yajñe pravidvān yunaktu suyujaḥ svāhā ||3||
GV00avs___u:2545: (AVŚ_5,26.4a) praiṣā yajñe nividaḥ svāhā śiṣṭāḥ patnībhir vahateha yuktāḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:2546: (AVŚ_5,26.5a) chandāṃsi yajñe marutaḥ svāhā māteva putraṃ pipṛteha yuktāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:2547: (AVŚ_5,26.6a) eyam agan barhiṣā prokṣaṇībhir yajñaṃ tanvānāditiḥ svāhā
GV00avs___u:2548: (AVŚ_5,26.7a) viṣṇur yunaktu bahudhā tapāṃsy asmin yajñe suyujaḥ svāhā ||7||
GV00avs___u:2549: (AVŚ_5,26.8a) tvaṣṭā yunaktu bahudhā nu rūpā asmin yajñe yunaktu suyujaḥ
GV00avs___u:2551: (AVŚ_5,26.9a) bhago yunaktvāśiṣo nv asmā asmin yajñe pravidvān yunaktu suyujaḥ svāhā ||9||
GV00avs___u:2552: (AVŚ_5,26.10a) somo yunaktu bahudhā payāṃsy asmin yajñe suyujaḥ svāhā ||10||
GV00avs___u:2553: (AVŚ_5,26.11a) indro yunaktu bahudhā payāṃsy asmin yajñe suyujaḥ svāhā ||11||
GV00avs___u:2554: (AVŚ_5,26.12a) aśvinā brahmaṇā yātam arvāñcau vaṣaṭkāreṇa yajñaṃ
GV00avs___u:2556: (AVŚ_5,26.12c) bṛhaspate brahmaṇā yāhy arvāṅ yajño ayaṃ svar idaṃ yajamānāya svāhā ||12||
GV00avs___u:2557: (AVŚ_5,27.1a) ūrdhvā asya samidho bhavanty ūrdhvā śukrā śocīṣy agneḥ |
GV00avs___u:2558: (AVŚ_5,27.1c) dyumattamā supratīkaḥ sasūnus tanūnapād asuro bhūripāṇiḥ
GV00avs___u:2559: (AVŚ_5,27.2a) devo deveṣu devaḥ patho anakti madhvā ghṛtena ||2||
GV00avs___u:2560: (AVŚ_5,27.3a) madhvā yajñam nakṣati praiṇāno narāśaṃso agniḥ sukṛd devaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ
GV00avs___u:2561: (AVŚ_5,27.4a) achāyam eti śavasā ghṛtā cid īdāno vahnir namasā ||4||
GV00avs___u:2562: (AVŚ_5,27.5a) agniḥ sruco adhvareṣu prayakṣu sa yakṣad asya mahimānam agneḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:2563: (AVŚ_5,27.6a) tarī mandrāsu prayakṣu vasavaś cātiṣṭhan vasudhātaraś ca
GV00avs___u:2564: (AVŚ_5,27.7a) dvāro devīr anv asya viśve vrataṃ rakṣanti viśvahā ||7||
GV00avs___u:2566: (AVŚ_5,27.8c) ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktemaṃ yajñam avatām adhvaram naḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:2567: (AVŚ_5,27.9a) daivā hotāra ūrdhvam adhvaraṃ no 'gner jihvayābhi gṛnata gṛnatā naḥ sviṣṭaye
GV00avs___u:2568: (AVŚ_5,27.9c) tisro devīr barhir edaṃ sadantām iḍā sarasvatī mahī bhāratī
GV00avs___u:2571: (AVŚ_5,27.10c) deva tvaṣṭā rāyas poṣaṃ vi ṣya nābhim asya ||10||
GV00avs___u:2573: (AVŚ_5,27.11c) tmanā devebhyo agnir havyaṃ śamitā svadayatu ||11||
GV00avs___u:2575: (AVŚ_5,27.12c) indrāya yajñaṃ viśve devā havir idaṃ juṣantām ||12||
GV00avs___u:2576: (AVŚ_5,28.1a) nava prāṇān navabhiḥ saṃ mimīte dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya |
GV00avs___u:2577: (AVŚ_5,28.1c) harite trīṇi rajate trīṇy ayasi trīṇi tapasāviṣṭitāni ||1||
GV00avs___u:2578: (AVŚ_5,28.2a) agniḥ sūryaś candramā bhūmir āpo dyaur antarikṣaṃ pradiśo diśaś ca |
GV00avs___u:2579: (AVŚ_5,28.2c) ārtavā ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānā anena mā trivṛtā pārayantu ||2||
GV00avs___u:2580: (AVŚ_5,28.3a) trayaḥ poṣās trivṛti śrayantām anaktu pūṣā payasā ghṛtena |
GV00avs___u:2581: (AVŚ_5,28.3c) annasya bhūmā puruṣasya bhūmā bhūmā paśūnāṃ ta iha śrayantām
GV00avs___u:2582: (AVŚ_5,28.4a) imam ādityā vasunā sam ukṣatemam agne vardhaya vavṛdhānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2583: (AVŚ_5,28.4c) imam indra saṃ sṛja vīryeṇāsmin trivṛc chrayatāṃ poṣayiṣṇu ||4||
GV00avs___u:2584: (AVŚ_5,28.5a) bhūmiṣ ṭvā pātu haritena viśvabhṛd agniḥ pipartv ayasā sajoṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2585: (AVŚ_5,28.5c) vīrudbhiṣ ṭe arjunaṃ saṃvidānaṃ dakṣaṃ dadhātu
GV00avs___u:2587: (AVŚ_5,28.6a) tredhā jātam janmanedaṃ hiraṇyam agner ekaṃ priyatamaṃ babhūva somasyaikaṃ hiṃsitasya parāpatat |
GV00avs___u:2588: (AVŚ_5,28.6c) apām ekaṃ vedhasāṃ reta āhus tat te hiraṇyaṃ trivṛd astv āyuṣe ||6||
GV00avs___u:2591: (AVŚ_5,28.8a) trayaḥ suparṇās trivṛtā yad āyann ekākṣaram abhisaṃbhūya śakrāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2592: (AVŚ_5,28.8c) praty auhan mṛtyum amṛtena sākam antardadhānā duritāni viśvā ||8||
GV00avs___u:2593: (AVŚ_5,28.9a) divas tvā pātu haritaṃ madhyāt tvā pātv arjunam |
GV00avs___u:2594: (AVŚ_5,28.9c) bhūmyā ayasmayaṃ pātu prāgād devapurā ayam ||9||
GV00avs___u:2595: (AVŚ_5,28.10a) imās tisro devapurās tās tvā rakṣantu sarvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:2596: (AVŚ_5,28.10c) tās tvaṃ bibhrad varcasvy uttaro dviṣatāṃ bhava ||10||
GV00avs___u:2597: (AVŚ_5,28.11a) puraṃ devānām amṛtaṃ hiraṇyam ya ābedhe prathamo devo agre
GV00avs___u:2598: (AVŚ_5,28.11c) tasmai namo daśa prācīḥ kṛṇomy anu manyatāṃ trivṛd ābadhe
GV00avs___u:2600: (AVŚ_5,28.12a) ā tvā cṛtatv aryamā pūṣā bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:2601: (AVŚ_5,28.12c) aharjātasya yan nāma tena tvāti cṛtāmasi ||12||
GV00avs___u:2604: (AVŚ_5,28.14a) ghṛtād ulluptam madhunā samaktaṃ bhūmidṛṃham acyutam
GV00avs___u:2606: (AVŚ_5,28.14c) bhindat sapatnān adharāṃś ca kṛṇvad ā mā roha mahate
GV00avs___u:2608: (AVŚ_5,29.1a) purastād yukto vaha jātavedo 'gne viddhi kriyamāṇam yathedam
GV00avs___u:2609: (AVŚ_5,29.1c) tvaṃ bhiṣag bheṣajasyāsi kartā tvayā gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ sanema ||1||
GV00avs___u:2610: (AVŚ_5,29.2a) tathā tad agne kṛṇu jātavedo viśvebhir devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2611: (AVŚ_5,29.2c) yo no dideva yatamo jaghāsa yathā so asya paridhiṣ patāti
GV00avs___u:2612: (AVŚ_5,29.3a) yathā so asya paridhiṣ patāti tathā tad agne kṛṇu jātavedaḥ
GV00avs___u:2614: (AVŚ_5,29.4a) akṣyau ni vidhya hṛdayaṃ ni vidhya jihvāṃ ni tṛnddhi pra dato mṛṇīhi |
GV00avs___u:2615: (AVŚ_5,29.4c) piśāco asya yatamo jaghāsāgne yaviṣṭha prati śṛṇīhi ||4||
GV00avs___u:2616: (AVŚ_5,29.5a) yad asya hṛtaṃ vihṛtaṃ yat parābhṛtam ātmano jagdhaṃ yatamat
GV00avs___u:2618: (AVŚ_5,29.5c) tad agne vidvān punar ā bhara tvaṃ śarīre māṃsam asum erayāmaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:2619: (AVŚ_5,29.6a) āme supakve śabale vipakve yo mā piśāco aśane dadambha |
GV00avs___u:2620: (AVŚ_5,29.6c) tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu
GV00avs___u:2621: (AVŚ_5,29.7a) kṣire mā manthe yatamo dadambhākṛṣṭapacye aśane dhānye yaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2622: (AVŚ_5,29.7c) tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu
GV00avs___u:2623: (AVŚ_5,29.8a) apāṃ mā pāne yatamo dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam
GV00avs___u:2624: (AVŚ_5,29.8c) tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu
GV00avs___u:2625: (AVŚ_5,29.9a) divā mā naktaṃ yatamo dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam |
GV00avs___u:2626: (AVŚ_5,29.9c) tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu
GV00avs___u:2627: (AVŚ_5,29.10a) kravyādam agne rudhiraṃ piśācaṃ manohanaṃ jahi jātavedaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2628: (AVŚ_5,29.10c) tam indro vājī vajreṇa hantu chinattu somaḥ śiro asya
GV00avs___u:2630: (AVŚ_5,29.11a) sanād agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ |
GV00avs___u:2631: (AVŚ_5,29.11c) sahamūrān anu daha kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣata daivyāyāḥ
GV00avs___u:2632: (AVŚ_5,29.12a) samāhara jātavedo yad dhṛtaṃ yat parābhṛtam |
GV00avs___u:2633: (AVŚ_5,29.12c) gātrāṇy asya vardhantām aṃśur ivā pyāyatām ayam ||12||
GV00avs___u:2634: (AVŚ_5,29.13a) somasyeva jātavedo aṃśur ā pyāyatām ayam |
GV00avs___u:2635: (AVŚ_5,29.13c) agne virapśinaṃ medhyam ayakṣmaṃ kṛṇu jīvatu ||13||
GV00avs___u:2637: (AVŚ_5,29.14c) tās tvaṃ juṣasva prati cainā gṛhāṇa jātavedaḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:2638: (AVŚ_5,29.15a) tārṣṭāghīr agne samidhaḥ prati gṛhṇāhy arciṣā |
GV00avs___u:2639: (AVŚ_5,29.15c) jahātu kravyād rūpaṃ yo asya māṃsaṃ jihīrṣati ||15||
GV00avs___u:2640: (AVŚ_5,30.1a) āvatas ta āvataḥ parāvatas ta āvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:2641: (AVŚ_5,30.1c) ihaiva bhava mā nu gā mā pūrvān anu gāḥ pitṝn asuṃ badhnāmi
GV00avs___u:2643: (AVŚ_5,30.2a) yat tvābhiceruḥ puruṣaḥ svo yad araṇo janaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2645: (AVŚ_5,30.3a) yad dudrohitha śepiṣe striyai puṃse acittyā |
GV00avs___u:2647: (AVŚ_5,30.4a) yat enaso mātṛkṛtāc cheṣe pitṛkṛtāc ca yat |
GV00avs___u:2649: (AVŚ_5,30.5a) yat te mātā yat te pitā jamir bhrātā ca sarjataḥ |
GV00avs___u:2650: (AVŚ_5,30.5c) pratyak sevasva bheṣajaṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇomi tvā ||5||
GV00avs___u:2652: (AVŚ_5,30.6c) dūtau yamasya mānu gā adhi jīvapurā ihi ||6||
GV00avs___u:2653: (AVŚ_5,30.7a) anuhūtaḥ punar ehi vidvān udayanaṃ pathaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2655: (AVŚ_5,30.8a) mā bibher na mariṣyasi jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇomi tvā |
GV00avs___u:2656: (AVŚ_5,30.8c) nir avocam ahaṃ yakṣmam aṅgebhyo aṅgajvaraṃ tava ||8||
GV00avs___u:2657: (AVŚ_5,30.9a) aṅgabhedo aṅgajvaro yaś ca te hṛdayāmayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2658: (AVŚ_5,30.9c) yakṣmaḥ śyena iva prāpaptad vacā sāḍhaḥ parastarām ||9||
GV00avs___u:2659: (AVŚ_5,30.10a) ṛṣī bodhapratībodhāv asvapno yaś ca jāgṛviḥ |
GV00avs___u:2660: (AVŚ_5,30.10c) tau te prāṇasya goptārau divā naktaṃ ca jāgṛtām ||10||
GV00avs___u:2661: (AVŚ_5,30.11a) ayam agnir upasadya iha sūrya ud etu te |
GV00avs___u:2662: (AVŚ_5,30.11c) udehi mṛtyor gambhīrāt kṛṣṇāc cit tamasas pari ||11||
GV00avs___u:2663: (AVŚ_5,30.12a) namo yamāya namo astu mṛtyave namaḥ pitṛbhya uta ye nayanti
GV00avs___u:2664: (AVŚ_5,30.12c) utpāraṇasya yo veda tam agniṃ puro dadhe 'smā ariṣṭatātaye
GV00avs___u:2665: (AVŚ_5,30.13a) aitu prāṇa aitu mana aitu cakṣur atho balam |
GV00avs___u:2666: (AVŚ_5,30.13c) śarīram asya sam vidāṃ tat padbhyāṃ prati tiṣṭhatu ||13||
GV00avs___u:2667: (AVŚ_5,30.14a) prāṇenāgne cakṣuṣā saṃ sṛjemaṃ sam īraya tanvā saṃ balena |
GV00avs___u:2668: (AVŚ_5,30.14c) vetthāmṛtasya mā nu gān mā nu bhūmigṛho bhuvat ||14||
GV00avs___u:2669: (AVŚ_5,30.15a) mā te prāṇa upa dasan mo apāno 'pi dhāyi te |
GV00avs___u:2671: (AVŚ_5,30.16a) iyam antar vadati jihvā baddhā paniṣpadā |
GV00avs___u:2672: (AVŚ_5,30.16c) tvayā yakṣmam nir avocaṃ śataṃ ropīś ca takmanaḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:2674: (AVŚ_5,30.17c) yasmai tvam iha mṛtyave diṣṭaḥ puruṣa jajñiṣe |
GV00avs___u:2675: (AVŚ_5,30.17e) sa ca tvānu hvayāmasi mā purā jaraso mṛthāḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:2676: (AVŚ_5,31.1a) yāṃ te cakrur āme pātre yāṃ cakrur miśradhānye |
GV00avs___u:2677: (AVŚ_5,31.1c) āme māṃse kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām ||1||
GV00avs___u:2678: (AVŚ_5,31.2a) yāṃ te cakruḥ kṛkavākāv aje vā yāṃ kurīriṇi |
GV00avs___u:2679: (AVŚ_5,31.2c) avyāṃ te kṛtyāṃ yām cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām ||2||
GV00avs___u:2680: (AVŚ_5,31.3a) yāṃ te cakrur ekaśaphe paśūnām ubhayādati |
GV00avs___u:2681: (AVŚ_5,31.3c) gardabhe kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām ||3||
GV00avs___u:2682: (AVŚ_5,31.4a) yāṃ te cakrur amūlāyāṃ valagaṃ vā narācyām |
GV00avs___u:2683: (AVŚ_5,31.4c) kṣetre te kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām ||4||
GV00avs___u:2684: (AVŚ_5,31.5a) yāṃ te cakrur gārhapatye pūrvāgnāv uta duścitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2685: (AVŚ_5,31.5c) śālāyāṃ kṛtyāṃ yām cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām ||5||
GV00avs___u:2686: (AVŚ_5,31.6a) yāṃ te cakruḥ sabhāyāṃ yām cakrur adhidevane |
GV00avs___u:2687: (AVŚ_5,31.6c) akṣeṣu kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām ||6||
GV00avs___u:2688: (AVŚ_5,31.7a) yāṃ te cakruḥ senāyāṃ yāṃ cakrur iṣvāyudhe |
GV00avs___u:2689: (AVŚ_5,31.7c) dundubhau kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām ||7||
GV00avs___u:2690: (AVŚ_5,31.8a) yāṃ te kṛtyām kūpe 'vadadhuḥ śmaśāne vā nicakhnuḥ |
GV00avs___u:2691: (AVŚ_5,31.8c) sadmani kṛtyām yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām ||8||
GV00avs___u:2692: (AVŚ_5,31.9a) yāṃ te cakruḥ puruṣāsthe agnau saṃkasuke ca yām |
GV00avs___u:2693: (AVŚ_5,31.9c) mrokaṃ nirdāhaṃ kravyādaṃ punaḥ prati harāmi tām ||9||
GV00avs___u:2694: (AVŚ_5,31.10a) apathenā jabhāraināṃ tāṃ pathetaḥ pra hiṇmasi |
GV00avs___u:2696: (AVŚ_5,31.11a) yaś cakāra na śaśāka kartuṃ śaśre pādam aṅgurim |
GV00avs___u:2699: (AVŚ_5,31.12c) indras taṃ hantu mahatā vadhenāgnir vidhyatv astayā ||12||
GV00avs___u:2700: (AVŚ_6,1.1a) doṣo gāya bṛhad gāya dyumad dhehi |
GV00avs___u:2702: (AVŚ_6,1.2a) tam u ṣṭuhi yo antaḥ sindhau sūnuḥ |
GV00avs___u:2704: (AVŚ_6,1.3a) sa ghā no devaḥ savitā sāviṣad amṛtāni bhūri |
GV00avs___u:2706: (AVŚ_6,2.1a) indrāya somam ṛtvijaḥ sunotā ca dhāvata |
GV00avs___u:2707: (AVŚ_6,2.1c) stotur yo vacaḥ śṛṇavad dhavaṃ ca me ||1||
GV00avs___u:2708: (AVŚ_6,2.2a) ā yaṃ viśantīndavo vayo na vṛkṣam andhasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2713: (AVŚ_6,3.1c) apāṃ napāt sindhavaḥ sapta pātana pātu no viṣṇur uta dyauḥ
GV00avs___u:2714: (AVŚ_6,3.2a) pātāṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī abhiṣṭaye pātu grāvā pātu somo no
GV00avs___u:2716: (AVŚ_6,3.2c) pātu no devī subhagā sarasvatī pātv agniḥ śivā ye asya pāyavaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2717: (AVŚ_6,3.3a) pātām no devāśvinā śubhas patī uṣāsānaktota na uruṣyatām |
GV00avs___u:2718: (AVŚ_6,3.3c) apāṃ napād abhihrutī gayasya cid deva tvaṣṭar vardhaya sarvatātaye ||3||
GV00avs___u:2719: (AVŚ_6,4.1a) tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ vacaḥ parjanyo brahmaṇas patiḥ |
GV00avs___u:2720: (AVŚ_6,4.1c) putrair bhrātṛbhir aditir nu pātu no duṣṭaraṃ trāyamāṇaṃ sahaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:2721: (AVŚ_6,4.2a) aṃśo bhago varuṇo mitro aryamāditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2722: (AVŚ_6,4.2c) apa tasya dveṣo gamed abhihruto yāvayac chatrum antitam ||2||
GV00avs___u:2723: (AVŚ_6,4.3a) dhiye sam aśvinā prāvataṃ na uruṣyā ṇa urujmann aprayuchan |
GV00avs___u:2726: (AVŚ_6,5.1c) sam enaṃ varcasā sṛja prajayā ca bahuṃ kṛdhi ||1||
GV00avs___u:2727: (AVŚ_6,5.2a) indremaṃ prataraṃ kṛdhi sajātānām asad vaśī |
GV00avs___u:2728: (AVŚ_6,5.2c) rāyas poṣeṇa saṃ sṛja jīvātave jarase naya ||2||
GV00avs___u:2729: (AVŚ_6,5.3a) yasya kṛṇmo havir gṛhe tam agne vardhayā tvam |
GV00avs___u:2730: (AVŚ_6,5.3c) tasmai somo adhi bravad ayaṃ ca brahmaṇas patiḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:2732: (AVŚ_6,6.1c) sarvaṃ tam randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate ||1||
GV00avs___u:2733: (AVŚ_6,6.2a) yo naḥ soma suśaṃsino duḥśaṃsa ādideśati |
GV00avs___u:2734: (AVŚ_6,6.2c) vajreṇāsya mukhe jahi sa saṃpiṣṭo apāyati ||2||
GV00avs___u:2735: (AVŚ_6,6.3a) yo naḥ somābhidāsati sanābhir yaś ca niṣṭyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2736: (AVŚ_6,6.3c) apa tasya balaṃ tira mahīva dyaur vadhatmanā ||3||
GV00avs___u:2737: (AVŚ_6,7.1a) yena somāditiḥ pathā mitrā vā yanty adruhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2744: (AVŚ_6,8.1c) evā pari ṣvajasva māṃ yathā māṃ kāminy aso yathā man nāpagā asaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:2745: (AVŚ_6,8.2a) yathā suparṇaḥ prapatan pakṣau nihanti bhūmyām |
GV00avs___u:2746: (AVŚ_6,8.2c) evā ni hanmi te mano yathā māṃ kāminy aso yathā man nāpagā
GV00avs___u:2749: (AVŚ_6,8.3c) evā pary emi te mano yathā māṃ kāminy aso yathā man nāpagā
GV00avs___u:2751: (AVŚ_6,9.1a) vāñcha me tanvaṃ pādau vāñchākṣyau vāñcha sakthyau |
GV00avs___u:2752: (AVŚ_6,9.1c) akṣyau vṛṣaṇyantyāḥ keśā māṃ te kāmena śuṣyantu ||1||
GV00avs___u:2754: (AVŚ_6,9.2c) yathā mama kratāv aso mama cittam upāyasi ||2||
GV00avs___u:2755: (AVŚ_6,9.3a) yāsāṃ nābhir ārehaṇaṃ hṛdi saṃvananaṃ kṛtam gāvo ghṛtasya mātaro 'mūṃ saṃ vānayantu me ||3||
GV00avs___u:2759: (AVŚ_6,11.1a) śamīm aśvattha ārūḍhas tatra puṃsuvanaṃ kṛtam |
GV00avs___u:2760: (AVŚ_6,11.1c) tad vai putrasya vedanaṃ tat strīṣv ā bharāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:2761: (AVŚ_6,11.2a) puṃsi vai reto bhavati tat striyām anu ṣicyate |
GV00avs___u:2762: (AVŚ_6,11.2c) tad vai putrasya vedanaṃ tat prajāpatir abravīt ||2||
GV00avs___u:2764: (AVŚ_6,11.3c) straiṣūyam anyatra dadhat pumāṃsam u dadhat iha ||3||
GV00avs___u:2766: (AVŚ_6,12.1c) rātrī jagad ivānyad dhaṃsāt tenā te vāraye viṣam ||1||
GV00avs___u:2767: (AVŚ_6,12.2a) yad brahmabhir yad ṛṣibhir yad devair viditaṃ purā |
GV00avs___u:2768: (AVŚ_6,12.2c) yad bhūtaṃ bhavyam āsanvat tenā te vāraye viṣam ||2||
GV00avs___u:2769: (AVŚ_6,12.3a) madhvā pṛñce nadyaḥ parvatā girayo madhu |
GV00avs___u:2770: (AVŚ_6,12.3c) madhu paruṣṇī śīpālā śam āsne astu śaṃ hṛde ||3||
GV00avs___u:2772: (AVŚ_6,13.1c) atho ye viśyānāṃ vadhās tebhyo mṛtyo namo 'stu te ||1||
GV00avs___u:2773: (AVŚ_6,13.2a) namas te adhivākāya parāvākāya te namaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2774: (AVŚ_6,13.2c) sumatyai mṛtyo te namo durmatyai te idaṃ namaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2775: (AVŚ_6,13.3a) namas te yātudhānebhyo namas te bheṣajebhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2776: (AVŚ_6,13.3c) namas te mṛtyo mūlebhyo brāhmaṇebhya idaṃ namaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:2778: (AVŚ_6,14.1c) balāsaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayāṅgeṣṭhā yaś ca parvasu ||1||
GV00avs___u:2779: (AVŚ_6,14.2a) nir balāsaṃ balāsinaḥ kṣiṇomi muṣkaraṃ yathā |
GV00avs___u:2780: (AVŚ_6,14.2c) chinadmy asya bandhanaṃ mūlam urvārvā iva ||2||
GV00avs___u:2781: (AVŚ_6,14.3a) nir balāsetaḥ pra patāśuṅgaḥ śiśuko yathā |
GV00avs___u:2782: (AVŚ_6,14.3c) atho ita iva hāyano 'pa drāhy avīrahā ||3||
GV00avs___u:2783: (AVŚ_6,15.1a) uttamo asy oṣadhīnāṃ tava vṛkṣā upastayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2784: (AVŚ_6,15.1c) upastir astu so 'smākaṃ yo asmāṃ abhidāsati ||1||
GV00avs___u:2785: (AVŚ_6,15.2a) sabandhuś cāsabandhuś ca yo asmāṃ abhidāsati |
GV00avs___u:2786: (AVŚ_6,15.2c) teṣāṃ sā vṛkṣāṇām ivāhaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2787: (AVŚ_6,15.3a) yathā soma oṣadhīnām uttamo haviṣāṃ kṛtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2789: (AVŚ_6,16.1a) ābayo anābayo rasas ta ugra ābayo |
GV00avs___u:2791: (AVŚ_6,16.2a) vihahlo nāma te pitā madāvatī nāma te mātā |
GV00avs___u:2792: (AVŚ_6,16.2c) sa hina tvam asi yas tvam ātmānam āvayaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2794: (AVŚ_6,16.3c) babhruś ca babhrukarṇaś cāpehi nir āla ||3||
GV00avs___u:2797: (AVŚ_6,17.1a) yatheyam pṛthivī mahī bhūtānāṃ garbham ādadhe |
GV00avs___u:2798: (AVŚ_6,17.1c) evā te dhriyatāṃ garbho anu sūtuṃ savitave ||1||
GV00avs___u:2800: (AVŚ_6,17.2c) evā te dhriyatāṃ garbho anu sūtuṃ savitave ||2||
GV00avs___u:2801: (AVŚ_6,17.3a) yatheyaṃ pṛthivī mahī dādhāra parvatān girīn |
GV00avs___u:2802: (AVŚ_6,17.3c) evā te dhriyatāṃ garbho anu sūtuṃ savitave ||3||
GV00avs___u:2803: (AVŚ_6,17.4a) yatheyaṃ pṛthivī mahī dādhāra viṣṭhitaṃ jagat |
GV00avs___u:2804: (AVŚ_6,17.4c) evā te dhriyatāṃ garbho anu sūtuṃ savitave ||4||
GV00avs___u:2806: (AVŚ_6,18.1c) agniṃ hṛdayyaṃ śokaṃ taṃ te nir vāpayāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:2808: (AVŚ_6,18.2c) yathota mamruṣo mana everṣyor mṛtaṃ manaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2809: (AVŚ_6,18.3a) ado yat te hṛdi śritaṃ manaskaṃ patayiṣṇukam |
GV00avs___u:2810: (AVŚ_6,18.3c) tatas ta īrṣyāṃ muñcāmi nir ūṣmāṇaṃ dṛter iva ||3||
GV00avs___u:2811: (AVŚ_6,19.1a) punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manavo dhiyā |
GV00avs___u:2812: (AVŚ_6,19.1c) punantu viśvā bhūtāni pavamānaḥ punātu mā ||1||
GV00avs___u:2813: (AVŚ_6,19.2a) pavamānaḥ punātu mā kratve dakṣāya jīvase |
GV00avs___u:2815: (AVŚ_6,19.3a) ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca |
GV00avs___u:2817: (AVŚ_6,20.1a) agner ivāsya dahata eti śuṣmiṇa uteva matto vilapann apāyati
GV00avs___u:2818: (AVŚ_6,20.1c) anyam asmad ichatu kaṃ cid avratas tapurvadhāya namo astu
GV00avs___u:2820: (AVŚ_6,20.2a) namo rudrāya namo astu takmane namo rājñe varuṇāya tviṣīmate
GV00avs___u:2821: (AVŚ_6,20.2c) namo dive namaḥ pṛthivyai nama oṣadhībhyaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2822: (AVŚ_6,20.3a) ayaṃ yo abhiśocayiṣṇur viśvā rūpāṇi haritā kṛṇoṣi |
GV00avs___u:2823: (AVŚ_6,20.3c) tasmai te 'ruṇāya babhrave namaḥ kṛṇomi vanyāya takmane ||3||
GV00avs___u:2824: (AVŚ_6,21.1a) imā yās tisraḥ pṛthivīs tāsāṃ ha bhūmir uttamā |
GV00avs___u:2825: (AVŚ_6,21.1c) tāsām adhi tvaco ahaṃ bheṣajaṃ sam u jagrabham ||1||
GV00avs___u:2827: (AVŚ_6,21.2c) somo bhaga iva yāmeṣu deveṣu varuṇo yathā ||2||
GV00avs___u:2829: (AVŚ_6,21.3c) uta stha keśadṛmhaṇīr atho ha keśavardhanīḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:2830: (AVŚ_6,22.1a) kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divam ut patanti |
GV00avs___u:2831: (AVŚ_6,22.1c) ta āvavṛtrant sadanād ṛtasyād id ghṛtena pṛthivīṃ vy ūduḥ
GV00avs___u:2832: (AVŚ_6,22.2a) payasvatīḥ kṛṇuthāpa oṣadhīḥ śivā yad ejathā maruto rukmavakṣasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2833: (AVŚ_6,22.2c) ūrjaṃ ca tatra sumatiṃ ca pinvata yatrā naro marutaḥ
GV00avs___u:2835: (AVŚ_6,22.3a) udapruto marutas tāṃ iyarta vṛṣṭir yā viśvā nivatas pṛṇāti |
GV00avs___u:2836: (AVŚ_6,22.3c) ejāti glahā kanyeva tunnairuṃ tundānā patyeva jāyā ||3||
GV00avs___u:2837: (AVŚ_6,23.1a) sasruṣīs tad apaso divā naktaṃ ca sasruṣīḥ |
GV00avs___u:2838: (AVŚ_6,23.1c) vareṇyakratur aham apo devīr upa hvaye ||1||
GV00avs___u:2839: (AVŚ_6,23.2a) otā āpaḥ karmaṇyā muñcantv itaḥ praṇītaye |
GV00avs___u:2841: (AVŚ_6,23.3a) devasya savituḥ save karma kṛṇvantu mānuṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2842: (AVŚ_6,23.3c) śaṃ no bhavantv apa oṣadhīḥ śivāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:2843: (AVŚ_6,24.1a) himavataḥ pra sravanti sindhau samaha saṅgamaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2844: (AVŚ_6,24.1c) āpo ha mahyaṃ tad devīr dadan hṛddyotabheṣajam ||1||
GV00avs___u:2845: (AVŚ_6,24.2a) yan me akṣyor ādidyota pārṣṇyoḥ prapadoś ca yat |
GV00avs___u:2846: (AVŚ_6,24.2c) āpas tat sarvaṃ niṣ karan bhiṣajāṃ subhiṣaktamāḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2847: (AVŚ_6,24.3a) sindhupatnīḥ sindhurājñīḥ sarvā yā nadya sthana |
GV00avs___u:2848: (AVŚ_6,24.3c) datta nas tasya bheṣajaṃ tenā vo bhunajāmahai ||3||
GV00avs___u:2849: (AVŚ_6,25.1a) pañca ca yāḥ pañcāśac ca saṃyanti manyā abhi |
GV00avs___u:2850: (AVŚ_6,25.1c) itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu vākā apacitām iva ||1||
GV00avs___u:2851: (AVŚ_6,25.2a) sapta ca yāḥ saptatiś ca saṃyanti graivyā abhi |
GV00avs___u:2852: (AVŚ_6,25.2c) itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu vākā apacitām iva ||2||
GV00avs___u:2853: (AVŚ_6,25.3a) nava ca yā navatiś ca saṃyanti skandhyā abhi |
GV00avs___u:2854: (AVŚ_6,25.3c) itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu vākā apacitām iva ||3||
GV00avs___u:2855: (AVŚ_6,26.1a) ava mā pāpmant sṛja vaśī san mṛdayāsi naḥ |
GV00avs___u:2856: (AVŚ_6,26.1c) ā mā bhadrasya loke pāpman dhehy avihrutam ||1||
GV00avs___u:2857: (AVŚ_6,26.2a) yo naḥ pāpman na jahāsi tam u tvā jahimo vayam |
GV00avs___u:2860: (AVŚ_6,26.3c) yaṃ dveṣāma tam ṛchatu yam u dviṣmas tam ij jahi ||3||
GV00avs___u:2861: (AVŚ_6,27.1a) devāḥ kapota iṣito yad ichan dūto nirṛtyā idam ājagāma |
GV00avs___u:2862: (AVŚ_6,27.1c) tasmā arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtiṃ śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ
GV00avs___u:2864: (AVŚ_6,27.2a) śivaḥ kapota iṣito no astv anāgā devāḥ śakuno gṛhaṃ naḥ |
GV00avs___u:2865: (AVŚ_6,27.2c) agnir hi vipro juṣatām havir naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī no vṛṇaktu ||2||
GV00avs___u:2866: (AVŚ_6,27.3a) hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāty asmān āṣṭrī padaṃ kṛṇute agnidhāne
GV00avs___u:2867: (AVŚ_6,27.3c) śivo gobhya uta puruṣebhyo no astu mā no devā iha hiṃsīt kapota ||3||
GV00avs___u:2868: (AVŚ_6,28.1a) ṛcā kapotaṃ nudata praṇodam iṣaṃ madantaḥ pari gāṃ nayāmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2869: (AVŚ_6,28.1c) saṃlobhayanto duritā padāni hitvā na ūrjaṃ pra padāt pathiṣṭhaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:2871: (AVŚ_6,28.2c) deveṣv akrata śravaḥ ka imāṃ ā dadharṣati ||2||
GV00avs___u:2872: (AVŚ_6,28.3a) yaḥ prathamaḥ pravatam āsasāda bahubhyaḥ panthām
GV00avs___u:2874: (AVŚ_6,28.3c) yo 'syeśe dvipado yaś catuṣpadas tasmai yamāya namo astu mṛtyave ||3||
GV00avs___u:2875: (AVŚ_6,29.1a) amūn hetiḥ patatriṇī ny etu yad ulūko vadati mogham etat |
GV00avs___u:2876: (AVŚ_6,29.1c) yad vā kapota padam agnau kṛṇoti ||1||
GV00avs___u:2877: (AVŚ_6,29.2a) yau te dūtau nirṛta idam eto 'prahitau prahitau vā gṛhaṃ naḥ
GV00avs___u:2879: (AVŚ_6,29.3a) avairahatyāyedam ā papatyāt suvīratāyā idam ā sasadyāt |
GV00avs___u:2880: (AVŚ_6,29.3c) parāṅ eva parā vada parācīm anu saṃvatam |
GV00avs___u:2881: (AVŚ_6,29.3e) yathā yamasya tvā gṛhe 'rasaṃ praticākaśān ābhūkaṃ praticākaśān ||3||
GV00avs___u:2882: (AVŚ_6,30.1a) devā imaṃ madhunā saṃyutaṃ yavaṃ sarasvatyām adhi maṇāv acarkṛṣuḥ |
GV00avs___u:2883: (AVŚ_6,30.1c) indra āsīt sīrapatiḥ śatakratuḥ kīnāśā āsan marutaḥ sudānavaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:2884: (AVŚ_6,30.2a) yas te mado 'vakeśo vikeśo yenābhihasyaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛṇoṣi |
GV00avs___u:2885: (AVŚ_6,30.2c) ārāt tvad anyā vanāni vṛkṣi tvaṃ śami śatavalśā vi roha
GV00avs___u:2888: (AVŚ_6,31.1a) āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnir akramīd asadan mātaram puraḥ |
GV00avs___u:2890: (AVŚ_6,31.2a) antaś carati rocanā asya prāṇād apānataḥ |
GV00avs___u:2892: (AVŚ_6,31.3a) triṃśad dhāmā vi rājati vāk pataṅgo aśiśriyat |
GV00avs___u:2894: (AVŚ_6,32.1a) antardāve juhuta sv etad yātudhānakṣayaṇaṃ ghṛtena |
GV00avs___u:2895: (AVŚ_6,32.1c) ārād rakṣāṃsi prati daha tvam agne na no gṛhāṇām upa tītapāsi ||1||
GV00avs___u:2896: (AVŚ_6,32.2a) rudro vo grīvā aśarait piśācāḥ pṛṣṭīr vo 'pi śṛṇātu yātudhānāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2897: (AVŚ_6,32.2c) vīrud vo viśvatovīryā yamena sam ajīgamat ||2||
GV00avs___u:2898: (AVŚ_6,32.3a) abhayaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv ihāstu no 'rciṣāttriṇo nudataṃ pratīcaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2899: (AVŚ_6,32.3c) mā jñātāraṃ mā pratiṣṭhāṃ vidanta mitho vighnānā upa yantu
GV00avs___u:2901: (AVŚ_6,33.1a) yasyedam ā rajo yujas tuje janā navaṃ svaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2903: (AVŚ_6,33.2a) nādhṛṣa ā dadhṛṣate dhṛṣāṇo dhṛṣitaḥ śavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2904: (AVŚ_6,33.2c) purā yathā vyathiḥ śrava indrasya nādhṛṣe śavaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2905: (AVŚ_6,33.3a) sa no dadātu tāṃ rayim uruṃ piśaṅgasaṃdṛśam |
GV00avs___u:2909: (AVŚ_6,34.2a) yo rakṣāṃsi nijūrvaty agnis tigmena śociṣā |
GV00avs___u:2913: (AVŚ_6,34.4a) yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati |
GV00avs___u:2915: (AVŚ_6,34.5a) yo asya pāre rajasaḥ śukro agnir ajāyata |
GV00avs___u:2917: (AVŚ_6,35.1a) vaiśvānaro na ūtaya ā pra yātu parāvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:2919: (AVŚ_6,35.2a) vaiśvānaro na āgamad imaṃ yajñaṃ sajūr upa |
GV00avs___u:2925: (AVŚ_6,36.2a) sa viśvā prati cākḷpa ṛtūṃr ut sṛjate vaśī |
GV00avs___u:2927: (AVŚ_6,36.3a) agniḥ pareṣu dhāmasu kāmo bhūtasya bhavyasya |
GV00avs___u:2929: (AVŚ_6,37.1a) upa prāgāt sahasrākṣo yuktvā śapatho ratham |
GV00avs___u:2930: (AVŚ_6,37.1c) śaptāram anvichan mama vṛka ivāvimato gṛham ||1||
GV00avs___u:2931: (AVŚ_6,37.2a) pari ṇo vṛṅgdhi śapatha hradam agnir ivā dahan |
GV00avs___u:2932: (AVŚ_6,37.2c) śaptāram atra no jahi divo vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2933: (AVŚ_6,37.3a) yo naḥ śapād aśapataḥ śapato yaś ca naḥ śapāt |
GV00avs___u:2934: (AVŚ_6,37.3c) śune peṣṭram ivāvakṣāmaṃ taṃ praty asyāmi mṛtyave ||3||
GV00avs___u:2935: (AVŚ_6,38.1a) siṃhe vyāghra uta yā pṛdākau tviṣir agnau brāhmaṇe sūrye yā
GV00avs___u:2936: (AVŚ_6,38.1c) indraṃ yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā saṃvidānā
GV00avs___u:2937: (AVŚ_6,38.2a) yā hastini dvīpini yā hiraṇye tviṣir apsu goṣu yā puruṣeṣu |
GV00avs___u:2938: (AVŚ_6,38.2c) indraṃ yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā saṃvidānā
GV00avs___u:2939: (AVŚ_6,38.3a) rathe akṣeṣv ṛṣabhasya vāje vāte parjanye varuṇasya śuṣme |
GV00avs___u:2940: (AVŚ_6,38.3c) indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā saṃvidānā
GV00avs___u:2941: (AVŚ_6,38.4a) rājanye dundubhāv āyatāyām aśvasya vāje puruṣasya māyau |
GV00avs___u:2942: (AVŚ_6,38.4c) indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā samvidānā
GV00avs___u:2943: (AVŚ_6,39.1a) yaśo havir vardhatām indrajūtaṃ sahasravīryaṃ subhṛtaṃ
GV00avs___u:2945: (AVŚ_6,39.1c) prasarsrāṇam anu dīrghāya cakṣase haviṣmantaṃ mā vardhaya jyeṣṭhatātaye ||1||
GV00avs___u:2946: (AVŚ_6,39.2a) achā na indraṃ yaśasaṃ yaśobhir yaśasvinaṃ namasānā vidhema |
GV00avs___u:2947: (AVŚ_6,39.2c) sa no rāsva rāṣṭram indrajūtaṃ tasya te rātau yaśasaḥ syāma
GV00avs___u:2948: (AVŚ_6,39.3a) yaśā indro yaśā agnir yaśāḥ somo ajāyata |
GV00avs___u:2949: (AVŚ_6,39.3c) yaśā viśvasya bhūtasya aham asmi yaśastamaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:2950: (AVŚ_6,40.1a) abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ihāstu no 'bhayaṃ somaḥ savitā naḥ
GV00avs___u:2952: (AVŚ_6,40.1c) abhayaṃ no 'stūrv antarikṣaṃ saptaṛṣīṇāṃ ca haviṣābhayaṃ no astu ||1||
GV00avs___u:2953: (AVŚ_6,40.2a) asmai grāmāya pradiśaś catasra ūrjaṃ subhūtaṃ svasti savitā naḥ kṛṇotu |
GV00avs___u:2954: (AVŚ_6,40.2c) aśatrv indro abhayaṃ naḥ kṛṇotv anyatra rājñām abhi yātu
GV00avs___u:2956: (AVŚ_6,40.3a) anamitraṃ no adharād anamitraṃ na uttarāt |
GV00avs___u:2957: (AVŚ_6,40.3c) indrānamitraṃ naḥ paścād anamitraṃ puras kṛdhi ||3||
GV00avs___u:2958: (AVŚ_6,41.1a) manase cetase dhiya ākūtaya uta cittaye |
GV00avs___u:2959: (AVŚ_6,41.1c) matyai śrutāya cakṣase vidhema haviṣā vayam ||1||
GV00avs___u:2962: (AVŚ_6,41.3a) mā no hāsiṣur ṛṣayo daivyā ye tanūpā ye nas tanvas tanūjāḥ |
GV00avs___u:2963: (AVŚ_6,41.3c) amartyā martyāṃ abhi naḥ sacadhvam āyur dhatta prataraṃ jīvase naḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:2964: (AVŚ_6,42.1a) ava jyām iva dhanvano manyuṃ tanomi te hṛdaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2965: (AVŚ_6,42.1c) yathā saṃmanasau bhūtvā sakhāyāv iva sacāvahai ||1||
GV00avs___u:2966: (AVŚ_6,42.2a) sakhāyāv iva sacāvahā ava manyuṃ tanomi te |
GV00avs___u:2967: (AVŚ_6,42.2c) adhas te aśmano manyum upāsyāmasi yo guruḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:2968: (AVŚ_6,42.3a) abhi tiṣṭhāmi te manyuṃ pārṣṇyā prapadena ca |
GV00avs___u:2969: (AVŚ_6,42.3c) yathāvaśo na vādiṣo mama cittam upāyasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:2970: (AVŚ_6,43.1a) ayaṃ darbho vimanyukaḥ svāya cāraṇāya ca |
GV00avs___u:2974: (AVŚ_6,43.3a) vi te hanavyāṃ śaraṇiṃ vi te mukhyāṃ nayāmasi |
GV00avs___u:2975: (AVŚ_6,43.3c) yathāvaśo na vādiṣo mama cittam upāyasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:2976: (AVŚ_6,44.1a) asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat |
GV00avs___u:2977: (AVŚ_6,44.1c) asthur vṛkṣā ūrdhvasvapnās tiṣṭhād rogo ayaṃ tava ||1||
GV00avs___u:2978: (AVŚ_6,44.2a) śataṃ yā bheṣajāni te sahasraṃ saṃgatāni ca |
GV00avs___u:2981: (AVŚ_6,44.3c) viṣāṇakā nāma vā asi pitṝṇāṃ mūlād utthitā vātīkṛtanāśanī ||3||
GV00avs___u:2983: (AVŚ_6,45.1c) parehi na tvā kāmaye vṛkṣāṃ vanāni saṃ cara gṛheṣu goṣu me manaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:2984: (AVŚ_6,45.2a) avaśasā niḥśasā yat parāśasopārima jāgrato yat svapantaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2985: (AVŚ_6,45.2c) agnir viśvāny apa duṣkṛtāny ajuṣṭāny āre asmad dadhātu ||2||
GV00avs___u:2986: (AVŚ_6,45.3a) yad indra brahmaṇas pate 'pi mṛṣā carāmasi |
GV00avs___u:2987: (AVŚ_6,45.3c) pracetā na āṅgiraso duritāt pātv aṃhasaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:2988: (AVŚ_6,46.1a) yo na jīvo 'si na mṛto devānām amṛtagarbho 'si svapna |
GV00avs___u:2989: (AVŚ_6,46.1c) varuṇānī te mātā yamaḥ pitārarur nāmāsi ||1||
GV00avs___u:2990: (AVŚ_6,46.2a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ devajāmīnāṃ putro 'si yamasya karaṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:2991: (AVŚ_6,46.2c) antako 'si mṛtyur asi taṃ tvā svapna tathā saṃ vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi ||2||
GV00avs___u:2992: (AVŚ_6,46.3a) yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yatharṇaṃ saṃnayanti |
GV00avs___u:2993: (AVŚ_6,46.3c) evā duṣvapnyaṃ sarvaṃ dviṣate saṃ nayāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:2994: (AVŚ_6,47.1a) agniḥ prātaḥsavane pātv asmān vaiśvānaro viśvakṛd
GV00avs___u:2996: (AVŚ_6,47.1c) sa naḥ pāvako draviṇe dadhātv āyuṣmantaḥ sahabhakṣāḥ syāma ||1||
GV00avs___u:2997: (AVŚ_6,47.2a) viśve devā maruta indro asmān asmin dvitīye savane na jahyuḥ
GV00avs___u:2998: (AVŚ_6,47.2c) āyuṣmantaḥ priyam eṣāṃ vadanto vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma ||2||
GV00avs___u:2999: (AVŚ_6,47.3a) idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ kavīnām ṛtena ye camasam airayanta |
GV00avs___u:3000: (AVŚ_6,47.3c) te saudhanvanāḥ svar ānaśānāḥ sviṣṭiṃ no abhi vasyo nayantu
GV00avs___u:3002: (AVŚ_6,48.1c) svasti mā saṃ vahāsya yajñasyodṛci svāhā ||1||
GV00avs___u:3003: (AVŚ_6,48.2a) ṛbhur asi jagachandā anu tvā rabhe |
GV00avs___u:3004: (AVŚ_6,48.2c) svasti mā saṃ vahāsya yajñasyodṛci svāhā ||2||
GV00avs___u:3006: (AVŚ_6,48.3c) svasti mā saṃ vahāsya yajñasyodṛci svāhā ||3||
GV00avs___u:3007: (AVŚ_6,49.1a) nahi te agne tanvaḥ krūram ānaṃśa martyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3008: (AVŚ_6,49.1c) kapir babhasti tejanaṃ svaṃ jarāyu gaur iva ||1||
GV00avs___u:3009: (AVŚ_6,49.2a) meṣa iva vai saṃ ca vi corv acyase yad uttaradrāv uparaś ca
GV00avs___u:3011: (AVŚ_6,49.2c) śīrṣṇā śiro 'psasāpso ardayann aṃśūn babhasti haritebhir āsabhiḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3012: (AVŚ_6,49.3a) suparṇā vācam akratopa dyavy ākhare kṛṣṇā iṣirā anartiṣuḥ |
GV00avs___u:3013: (AVŚ_6,49.3c) ni yan niyanti uparasya niṣkṛtiṃ purū reto dadhire sūryaśritaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3014: (AVŚ_6,50.1a) hataṃ tardaṃ samaṅkam ākhum aśvinā chintaṃ śiro api pṛṣṭīḥ
GV00avs___u:3016: (AVŚ_6,50.1c) yavān ned adān api nahyataṃ mukham athābhayaṃ kṛṇutaṃ dhānyāya ||1||
GV00avs___u:3017: (AVŚ_6,50.2a) tarda hai pataṅga hai jabhya hā upakvasa |
GV00avs___u:3018: (AVŚ_6,50.2c) brahmevāsaṃsthitaṃ havir anadanta imān yavān ahiṃsanto
GV00avs___u:3020: (AVŚ_6,50.3a) tardāpate vaghāpate tṛṣṭajambhā ā śṛṇota me |
GV00avs___u:3021: (AVŚ_6,50.3c) ya āraṇyā vyadvarā ye ke ca stha vyadvarās tānt sarvān jambhayāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3022: (AVŚ_6,51.1a) vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅ somo ati drutaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3024: (AVŚ_6,51.2a) āpo asmān mātaraḥ sūdayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapvaḥ punantu |
GV00avs___u:3025: (AVŚ_6,51.2c) viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīr ud id ābhyaḥ śucir ā pūta emi ||2||
GV00avs___u:3026: (AVŚ_6,51.3a) yat kiṃ cedaṃ varuṇa daivye jane 'bhidrohaṃ manuṣyāś caranti |
GV00avs___u:3027: (AVŚ_6,51.3c) acittyā cet tava dharma yuyopima mā nas tasmād enaso deva rīriṣaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3028: (AVŚ_6,52.1a) ut sūryo diva eti puro rakṣāṃsi nijūrvan |
GV00avs___u:3030: (AVŚ_6,52.2a) ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata |
GV00avs___u:3031: (AVŚ_6,52.2c) ny ūrmayo nadīnaṃ ny adṛṣṭā alipsata ||2||
GV00avs___u:3034: (AVŚ_6,53.1a) dyauś ca ma idaṃ pṛthivī ca pracetasau śukro bṛhan dakṣiṇayā pipartu |
GV00avs___u:3035: (AVŚ_6,53.1c) anu svadhā cikitāṃ somo agnir vāyur naḥ pātu savitā bhagaś ca ||1||
GV00avs___u:3036: (AVŚ_6,53.2a) punaḥ prāṇaḥ punar ātmā na aitu punaś cakṣuḥ punar asur na aitu |
GV00avs___u:3037: (AVŚ_6,53.2c) vaiśvānaro no adabdhas tanūpā antas tiṣṭhāti duritāni viśvā ||2||
GV00avs___u:3038: (AVŚ_6,53.3a) saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tanūbhir aganmahi manasā saṃ śivena |
GV00avs___u:3039: (AVŚ_6,53.3c) tvaṣṭā no atra varīyaḥ kṛṇotv anu no mārṣṭu tanvo yad viriṣṭam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3040: (AVŚ_6,54.1a) idaṃ tad yuja uttaram indraṃ śumbhāmy aṣṭaye |
GV00avs___u:3041: (AVŚ_6,54.1c) asya kṣatraṃ śriyaṃ mahīṃ vṛṣṭir iva vardhayā tṛṇam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3042: (AVŚ_6,54.2a) asmai kṣatram agnīṣomāv asmai dhārayataṃ rayim |
GV00avs___u:3044: (AVŚ_6,54.3a) sabandhuś cāsabandhuś ca yo asmāṃ abhidāsati |
GV00avs___u:3045: (AVŚ_6,54.3c) sarvaṃ taṃ randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate ||3||
GV00avs___u:3046: (AVŚ_6,55.1a) ye panthāno bahavo devayānā antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti |
GV00avs___u:3047: (AVŚ_6,55.1c) teṣām ajyāniṃ yatamo vahāti tasmai mā devāḥ pari datteha
GV00avs___u:3049: (AVŚ_6,55.2a) grīṣmo hemantaḥ śiśiro vasantaḥ śarad varṣāḥ svite no dadhāta |
GV00avs___u:3050: (AVŚ_6,55.2c) ā no goṣu bhajatā prajāyāṃ nivāta id vaḥ śaraṇe syāma ||2||
GV00avs___u:3051: (AVŚ_6,55.3a) idāvatsarāya parivatsarāya saṃvatsarāya kṛṇutā bṛhan namaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3052: (AVŚ_6,55.3c) teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre sau manase syāma
GV00avs___u:3053: (AVŚ_6,56.1a) mā no devā ahir vadhīt satokānt sahapuruṣān |
GV00avs___u:3054: (AVŚ_6,56.1c) samyataṃ na vi ṣparad vyāttaṃ na saṃ yaman namo
GV00avs___u:3058: (AVŚ_6,56.3a) saṃ te hanmi datā dataḥ sam u te hanvā hanū |
GV00avs___u:3059: (AVŚ_6,56.3c) saṃ te jihvayā jihvāṃ sam v āsnāha āsyam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3060: (AVŚ_6,57.1a) idam id vā u bheṣajam idaṃ rudrasya bheṣajam |
GV00avs___u:3063: (AVŚ_6,57.2c) jālāṣam ugraṃ bheṣajaṃ tena no mṛḍa jīvase ||2||
GV00avs___u:3064: (AVŚ_6,57.3a) śaṃ ca no mayaś ca no mā ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamat |
GV00avs___u:3065: (AVŚ_6,57.3c) kṣamā rapo viśvaṃ no astu bheṣajaṃ sarvaṃ no astu bheṣajam
GV00avs___u:3066: (AVŚ_6,58.1a) yaśasaṃ mendro maghavān kṛṇotu yaśasaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime |
GV00avs___u:3067: (AVŚ_6,58.1c) yaśasaṃ mā devaḥ savitā kṛṇotu priyo dātur dakṣiṇāyā iha
GV00avs___u:3069: (AVŚ_6,58.2a) yathendro dyāvāpṛthivyor yaśasvān yathāpa oṣadhīṣu yaśasvatīḥ |
GV00avs___u:3070: (AVŚ_6,58.2c) evā viśveṣu deveṣu vayaṃ sarveṣu yaśasaḥ syāma ||2||
GV00avs___u:3071: (AVŚ_6,58.3a) yaśā indro yaśā agnir yaśāḥ somo ajāyata |
GV00avs___u:3073: (AVŚ_6,59.1a) anaḍudbhyas tvaṃ prathamaṃ dhenubhyas tvam arundhati |
GV00avs___u:3075: (AVŚ_6,59.2a) śarma yachatv oṣadhiḥ saha devīr arundhatī |
GV00avs___u:3076: (AVŚ_6,59.2c) karat payasvantaṃ goṣṭham ayakṣmāṃ uta pūruṣān ||2||
GV00avs___u:3078: (AVŚ_6,59.3c) sā no rudrasyāstāṃ hetiṃ dūraṃ nayatu gobhyaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3079: (AVŚ_6,60.1a) ayam ā yāty aryamā purastād viṣitastupaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3080: (AVŚ_6,60.1c) asyā ichann agruvai patim uta jāyām ajānaye ||1||
GV00avs___u:3081: (AVŚ_6,60.2a) aśramad iyam aryamann anyāsāṃ samanaṃ yatī |
GV00avs___u:3082: (AVŚ_6,60.2c) aṅgo nv aryamann asyā anyāḥ samanam āyati ||2||
GV00avs___u:3083: (AVŚ_6,60.3a) dhātā dādhāra pṛthivīm dhātā dyām uta sūryam |
GV00avs___u:3085: (AVŚ_6,61.1a) mahyam āpo madhumad erayantāṃ mahyaṃ sūro abharaj jyotiṣe kam |
GV00avs___u:3086: (AVŚ_6,61.1c) mahyaṃ devā uta viśve tapojā mahyaṃ devaḥ savitā vyaco dhāt
GV00avs___u:3087: (AVŚ_6,61.2a) ahaṃ viveca pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayaṃ sapta
GV00avs___u:3089: (AVŚ_6,61.2c) ahaṃ satyam anṛtaṃ yad vadāmy ahaṃ daivīṃ pari vācam viśaś ca ||2||
GV00avs___u:3090: (AVŚ_6,61.3a) ahaṃ jajāna pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayaṃ sapta
GV00avs___u:3092: (AVŚ_6,61.3c) ahaṃ satvam anṛtaṃ yad vadāmi yo agnīṣomāv ajuṣe sakhāyā
GV00avs___u:3093: (AVŚ_6,62.1a) vaiśvānaro raśmibhir naḥ punātu vātaḥ prāṇeneṣiro nabhobhiḥ
GV00avs___u:3094: (AVŚ_6,62.1c) dyāvāpṛthivī payasā payasvatī ṛtāvarī yajñiye na punītām
GV00avs___u:3095: (AVŚ_6,62.2a) vaiśvānarīṃ sūnṛtām ā rabhadhvaṃ yasyā āśās tanvo vītapṛṣṭhāḥ |
GV00avs___u:3096: (AVŚ_6,62.2c) tayā gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīnām ||2||
GV00avs___u:3097: (AVŚ_6,62.3a) vaiśvānarīṃ varcasa ā rabhadhvaṃ śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ |
GV00avs___u:3098: (AVŚ_6,62.3c) iheḍayā sadhamādaṃ madanto jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam
GV00avs___u:3099: (AVŚ_6,63.1a) yat te devī nirṛtir ābabandha dāma grīvāsv avimokyaṃ yat |
GV00avs___u:3100: (AVŚ_6,63.1c) tat te vi ṣyāmy āyuṣe varcase balāyādomadam annam addhi
GV00avs___u:3102: (AVŚ_6,63.2a) namo 'stu te nirṛte tigmatejo 'yasmayān vi cṛtā bandhapāśān
GV00avs___u:3103: (AVŚ_6,63.2c) yamo mahyam punar it tvām dadāti tasmai yamāya namo astu mṛtyave ||2||
GV00avs___u:3104: (AVŚ_6,63.3a) ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣa ihābhihito mṛtyubhir ye sahasram |
GV00avs___u:3105: (AVŚ_6,63.3c) yamena tvaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāna uttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3106: (AVŚ_6,63.4a) saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣann agne viśvāny arya ā |
GV00avs___u:3107: (AVŚ_6,63.4c) iḍas pade sam idhyase sa no vasūny ā bhara ||4||
GV00avs___u:3108: (AVŚ_6,64.1a) saṃ jānīdhvaṃ saṃ pṛcyadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām |
GV00avs___u:3109: (AVŚ_6,64.1c) devā bhāgaṃ yathā pūrve samjānānā upāsate ||1||
GV00avs___u:3110: (AVŚ_6,64.2a) samāno mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānaṃ vrataṃ saha cittam eṣām |
GV00avs___u:3111: (AVŚ_6,64.2c) samānena vo haviṣā juhomi samānaṃ ceto abhisaṃviśadhvam
GV00avs___u:3112: (AVŚ_6,64.3a) samānī va ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3113: (AVŚ_6,64.3c) samānam astu vo manaḥ yathā vaḥ susahāsati ||3||
GV00avs___u:3115: (AVŚ_6,65.1c) parāśara tvaṃ teṣām parāñcaṃ śuṣmam ardayādhā no rayim ā
GV00avs___u:3117: (AVŚ_6,65.2a) nirhastebhyo nairhastam yaṃ devāḥ śarum asyatha |
GV00avs___u:3121: (AVŚ_6,66.1a) nirhastaḥ śatrur abhidāsann astu ye senābhir yudham āyanty asmān |
GV00avs___u:3122: (AVŚ_6,66.1c) sam arpayendra mahatā vadhena drātv eṣām aghahāro vividdhaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3126: (AVŚ_6,66.3c) athaiṣām indra vedāṃsi śataśo vi bhajāmahai ||3||
GV00avs___u:3127: (AVŚ_6,67.1a) pari vartmāni sarvata indraḥ pūṣā ca sasratuḥ |
GV00avs___u:3130: (AVŚ_6,67.2c) teṣāṃ vo agnimūḍhānām indro hantu varaṃvaram ||2||
GV00avs___u:3131: (AVŚ_6,67.3a) aiṣu nahya vṛṣājinaṃ hariṇasya bhiyaṃ kṛdhi |
GV00avs___u:3132: (AVŚ_6,67.3c) parāṅ amitra eṣatv arvācī gaur upeṣatu ||3||
GV00avs___u:3133: (AVŚ_6,68.1a) āyam agant savitā kṣureṇoṣṇena vāya udakenehi |
GV00avs___u:3134: (AVŚ_6,68.1c) ādityā rudrā vasava undantu sacetasaḥ somasya rājño vapata pracetasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3135: (AVŚ_6,68.2a) aditiḥ śmaśru vapatv āpa undantu varcasā |
GV00avs___u:3137: (AVŚ_6,68.3a) yenāvapat savitā kṣureṇa somasya rājño varuṇasya vidvān |
GV00avs___u:3138: (AVŚ_6,68.3c) tena brahmāṇo vapatedam asya gomān aśvavān ayam astu prajāvān ||3||
GV00avs___u:3139: (AVŚ_6,69.1a) girāv aragarāṭeṣu hiranye goṣu yad yaśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3140: (AVŚ_6,69.1c) surāyāṃ sicyamānāyāṃ kīlāle madhu tan mayi ||1||
GV00avs___u:3141: (AVŚ_6,69.2a) aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunāṅktaṃ śubhas patī |
GV00avs___u:3142: (AVŚ_6,69.2c) yathā bhargasvatīṃ vācam āvadāni janāṃ anu ||2||
GV00avs___u:3143: (AVŚ_6,69.3a) mayi varco atho yaśo 'tho yajñasya yat payaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3144: (AVŚ_6,69.3c) tan mayi prajāpatir divi dyām iva dṛṃhatu ||3||
GV00avs___u:3145: (AVŚ_6,70.1a) yathā māṃsam yathā surā yathākṣā adhidevane |
GV00avs___u:3146: (AVŚ_6,70.1c) yathā puṃso vṛṣaṇyata striyāṃ nihanyate manaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3147: (AVŚ_6,70.1e) evā te aghnye mano 'dhi vatse ni hanyatām ||1||
GV00avs___u:3148: (AVŚ_6,70.2a) yathā hastī hastinyāḥ padena padam udyuje |
GV00avs___u:3149: (AVŚ_6,70.2c) yathā puṃso vṛṣaṇyata striyāṃ nihanyate manaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3150: (AVŚ_6,70.2e) evā te aghnye mano 'dhi vatse ni hanyatām ||2||
GV00avs___u:3151: (AVŚ_6,70.3a) yathā pradhir yathopadhir yathā nabhyaṃ pradhāv adhi |
GV00avs___u:3152: (AVŚ_6,70.3c) yathā puṃso vṛṣaṇyata striyāṃ nihanyate manaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3153: (AVŚ_6,70.3e) evā te aghnye mano 'dhi vatse ni hanyatām ||3||
GV00avs___u:3154: (AVŚ_6,71.1a) yad annam admi bahudhā virūpaṃ hiraṇyam aśvam uta gām ajām avim |
GV00avs___u:3155: (AVŚ_6,71.1c) yad eva kiṃ ca pratijagrahāham agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ
GV00avs___u:3157: (AVŚ_6,71.2a) yan mā hutam ahutam ājagāma dattaṃ pitṛbhir anumataṃ manuṣyaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:3158: (AVŚ_6,71.2c) yasmān me mana ud iva rārajīty agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu ||2||
GV00avs___u:3159: (AVŚ_6,71.3a) yad annam admy anṛtena devā dāsyann adāsyann uta saṃgṛṇāmi |
GV00avs___u:3160: (AVŚ_6,71.3c) vaiśvānarasya mahato mahimnā śivaṃ mahyaṃ madhumad astv annam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3161: (AVŚ_6,72.1a) yathāsitaḥ prathayate vaśām anu vapūṃṣi kṛṇvann asurasya māyayā |
GV00avs___u:3162: (AVŚ_6,72.1c) evā te śepaḥ sahasāyam arko 'ṅgenāṅgaṃ saṃsamakaṃ kṛṇotu ||1||
GV00avs___u:3163: (AVŚ_6,72.2a) yathā pasas tāyādaraṃ vātena sthūlabhaṃ kṛtam |
GV00avs___u:3164: (AVŚ_6,72.2c) yāvat parasvataḥ pasas tāvat te vardhatāṃ pasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3165: (AVŚ_6,72.3a) yāvadaṅgīnaṃ pārasvataṃ hāstinaṃ gārdabham ca yat |
GV00avs___u:3166: (AVŚ_6,72.3c) yāvad aśvasya vājinas tāvat te vardhatāṃ pasaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3167: (AVŚ_6,73.1a) eha yātu varuṇaḥ somo agnir bṛhaspatir vasubhir eha yātu |
GV00avs___u:3168: (AVŚ_6,73.1c) asya śriyam upasaṃyāta sarva ugrasya cettuḥ saṃmanasaḥ sajātāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3169: (AVŚ_6,73.2a) yo vaḥ śuṣmo hṛdayeṣv antar ākūtir yā vo manasi praviṣṭā |
GV00avs___u:3170: (AVŚ_6,73.2c) tānt sīvayāmi haviṣā ghṛtena mayi sajātā ramatir vo astu
GV00avs___u:3171: (AVŚ_6,73.3a) ihaiva sta māpa yātādhy asmat pūṣā parastād apatham vaḥ
GV00avs___u:3173: (AVŚ_6,73.3c) vāstoṣ patir anu vo johavītu mayi sajātā ramatiḥ vo astu
GV00avs___u:3174: (AVŚ_6,74.1a) saṃ vaḥ pṛcyantāṃ tanvaḥ saṃ manāṃsi sam u vratā |
GV00avs___u:3175: (AVŚ_6,74.1c) sam vo 'yam brahmaṇas patir bhagaḥ saṃ vo ajīgamat ||1||
GV00avs___u:3177: (AVŚ_6,74.2c) atho bhagasya yac chrāntaṃ tena saṃjñapayāmi vaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3178: (AVŚ_6,74.3a) yathādityā vasubhiḥ sambabhūvur marudbhir ugrā ahṛṇīyamānāḥ
GV00avs___u:3179: (AVŚ_6,74.3c) evā triṇāmann ahṛṇīyamāna imān janānt saṃmanasas kṛdhīha
GV00avs___u:3180: (AVŚ_6,75.1a) nir amuṃ nuda okasaḥ sapatno yaḥ pṛtanyati |
GV00avs___u:3182: (AVŚ_6,75.2a) paramāṃ taṃ parāvatam indro nudatu vṛtrahā |
GV00avs___u:3183: (AVŚ_6,75.2c) yato na punar āyati śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3184: (AVŚ_6,75.3a) etu tisraḥ parāvata etu pañca janāṃ ati |
GV00avs___u:3185: (AVŚ_6,75.3c) etu tisro 'ti rocanā yato na punar āyati |
GV00avs___u:3186: (AVŚ_6,75.3e) śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyo yāvat sūryo asad divi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3188: (AVŚ_6,76.1c) saṃpreddho agnir jihvābhir ud etu hṛdayād adhi ||1||
GV00avs___u:3189: (AVŚ_6,76.2a) agneḥ sāmtapanasyāham āyuṣe padam ā rabhe |
GV00avs___u:3190: (AVŚ_6,76.2c) addhātir yasya paśyati dhūmam udyantam āsyataḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3191: (AVŚ_6,76.3a) yo asya samidhaṃ veda kṣatriyeṇa samāhitām |
GV00avs___u:3192: (AVŚ_6,76.3c) nābhihvāre padaṃ ni dadhāti sa mṛtyave ||3||
GV00avs___u:3193: (AVŚ_6,76.4a) nainaṃ ghnanti paryāyiṇo na sannāṃ ava gachati |
GV00avs___u:3194: (AVŚ_6,76.4c) agner yaḥ kṣatriyo vidvān nāma gṛhnāti āyuṣe ||4||
GV00avs___u:3195: (AVŚ_6,77.1a) asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat |
GV00avs___u:3196: (AVŚ_6,77.1c) āsthāne parvatā asthu sthāmny aśvāṃ atiṣṭhipam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3197: (AVŚ_6,77.2a) ya udānat parāyaṇaṃ ya udānaṇ nyāyanam |
GV00avs___u:3198: (AVŚ_6,77.2c) āvartanam nivartanaṃ yo gopā api taṃ huve ||2||
GV00avs___u:3199: (AVŚ_6,77.3a) jātavedo ni vartaya śataṃ te santv āvṛtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3200: (AVŚ_6,77.3c) sahasraṃ ta upāvṛtas tābhir naḥ punar ā kṛdhi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3201: (AVŚ_6,78.1a) tena bhūtena haviṣāyam ā pyāyatāṃ punaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3202: (AVŚ_6,78.1c) jāyām yām asmā āvākṣus tām rasenābhi vardhatām ||1||
GV00avs___u:3205: (AVŚ_6,78.3a) tvaṣṭā jāyām ajanayat tvaṣṭāsyai tvāṃ patim |
GV00avs___u:3206: (AVŚ_6,78.3c) tvaṣṭā sahasram āyuṃṣi dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu vām ||3||
GV00avs___u:3207: (AVŚ_6,79.1a) ayaṃ no nabhasas patiḥ saṃsphāno abhi rakṣatu |
GV00avs___u:3209: (AVŚ_6,79.2a) tvaṃ no nabhasas pate ūrjaṃ gṛhesu dhāraya |
GV00avs___u:3212: (AVŚ_6,79.3c) tasya no rāsva tasya no dhehi tasya te bhaktivāmsaḥ syāma
GV00avs___u:3214: (AVŚ_6,80.1c) śuno divyasya yan mahas tenā te haviṣā vidhema ||1||
GV00avs___u:3215: (AVŚ_6,80.2a) ye trayaḥ kālakāñjā divi devā iva śritāḥ |
GV00avs___u:3217: (AVŚ_6,80.3a) apsu te janma divi te sadhasthaṃ samudre antar mahimā te pṛthivyām |
GV00avs___u:3218: (AVŚ_6,80.3c) śuno divyasya yan mahas tenā te haviṣā vidhema ||3||
GV00avs___u:3219: (AVŚ_6,81.1a) yantāsi yachase hastāv apa rakṣāṃsi sedhasi |
GV00avs___u:3220: (AVŚ_6,81.1c) prajāṃ dhanaṃ ca gṛhṇānaḥ parihasto abhūd ayam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3221: (AVŚ_6,81.2a) parihasta vi dhāraya yoniṃ garbhāya dhātave |
GV00avs___u:3222: (AVŚ_6,81.2c) maryāde putram ā dhehi taṃ tvam ā gamayāgame ||2||
GV00avs___u:3224: (AVŚ_6,81.3c) tvaṣṭā tam asyā ā badhnād yathā putraṃ janād ||3||
GV00avs___u:3228: (AVŚ_6,82.2c) tena mām abravīd bhago jayām ā vahatād iti ||2||
GV00avs___u:3229: (AVŚ_6,82.3a) yas te 'ṅkuśo vasudāno bṛhann indra hiraṇyayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3230: (AVŚ_6,82.3c) tenā janiyate jāyāṃ mahyaṃ dhehi śacīpate ||3||
GV00avs___u:3231: (AVŚ_6,83.1a) apacitaḥ pra patata suparṇo vasater iva |
GV00avs___u:3233: (AVŚ_6,83.2a) eny ekā śyeny ekā kṛṣṇaikā rohiṇī dve |
GV00avs___u:3236: (AVŚ_6,83.3c) glaur itaḥ pra patiṣyati sa galunto naśiṣyati ||3||
GV00avs___u:3237: (AVŚ_6,83.4a) vīhi svām āhutiṃ juṣāno manasā svāhā manasā yad idaṃ juhomi
GV00avs___u:3238: (AVŚ_6,84.1a) yasyās ta āsani ghore juhomy eṣāṃ baddhānām avasarjanāya kam
GV00avs___u:3239: (AVŚ_6,84.1c) bhūmir iti tvābhipramanvate janā nirṛtir iti tvāhaṃ pari veda sarvataḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3240: (AVŚ_6,84.2a) bhūte haviṣmatī bhavaiṣa te bhāgo yo asmāsu |
GV00avs___u:3242: (AVŚ_6,84.3a) evo ṣv asman nirṛte 'nehā tvam ayasmayān vi cṛtā bandhapāśān |
GV00avs___u:3243: (AVŚ_6,84.3c) yamo mahyaṃ punar it tvāṃ dadāti tasmai yamāya namo astu mṛtyave ||3||
GV00avs___u:3244: (AVŚ_6,84.4a) ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣa ihābhihito mṛtyubhir ye sahasram |
GV00avs___u:3245: (AVŚ_6,84.4c) yamena tvaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāna uttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam ||4||
GV00avs___u:3247: (AVŚ_6,85.1c) yakṣmo yo asminn āviṣṭas tam u devā avīvaran ||1||
GV00avs___u:3248: (AVŚ_6,85.2a) indrasya vacasā vayaṃ mitrasya varuṇasya ca |
GV00avs___u:3249: (AVŚ_6,85.2c) devānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vācā yakṣmaṃ te vārayāmahe ||2||
GV00avs___u:3250: (AVŚ_6,85.3a) yathā vṛtra imā āpas tastambha viśvadhā yatīḥ |
GV00avs___u:3251: (AVŚ_6,85.3c) evā te agninā yakṣmaṃ vaiśvānareṇa vāraye ||3||
GV00avs___u:3252: (AVŚ_6,86.1a) vṛṣendrasya vṛṣā divo vṛsā pṛthivyā ayam |
GV00avs___u:3253: (AVŚ_6,86.1c) vṛṣā viśvasya bhūtasya tvam ekavṛṣo bhava ||1||
GV00avs___u:3254: (AVŚ_6,86.2a) samudra īśe sravatām agniḥ pṛthivyā vaśī |
GV00avs___u:3255: (AVŚ_6,86.2c) candramā nakṣatrāṇām īśe tvam ekavṛṣo bhava ||2||
GV00avs___u:3257: (AVŚ_6,86.3c) devānām ardhabhāg asi tvam ekavṛṣo bhava ||3||
GV00avs___u:3258: (AVŚ_6,87.1a) ā tvāhārṣam antar abhūr dhruvas tiṣṭhāvicācalat |
GV00avs___u:3259: (AVŚ_6,87.1c) viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantu mā tvad rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat ||1||
GV00avs___u:3261: (AVŚ_6,87.2c) indra iveha dhruvas tiṣṭheha rāṣṭram u dhāraya ||2||
GV00avs___u:3262: (AVŚ_6,87.3a) indra etam adīdharat dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣā |
GV00avs___u:3263: (AVŚ_6,87.3c) tasmai somo adhi bravad ayaṃ ca brahmaṇas patiḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3264: (AVŚ_6,88.1a) dhruvā dyaur dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagat |
GV00avs___u:3265: (AVŚ_6,88.1c) dhruvāsaḥ parvatā ime dhruvo rājā viśām ayam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3266: (AVŚ_6,88.2a) dhruvaṃ te rājā varuṇo dhruvam devo bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:3267: (AVŚ_6,88.2c) dhruvaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca rāṣṭraṃ dhārayatāṃ dhruvam ||2||
GV00avs___u:3270: (AVŚ_6,88.3c) sarvā diśaḥ saṃmanasaḥ sadhrīcīr dhruvāya te samitiḥ kalpatām iha ||3||
GV00avs___u:3271: (AVŚ_6,89.1a) idaṃ yat preṇyaḥ śiro dattaṃ somena vṛṣṇyam |
GV00avs___u:3272: (AVŚ_6,89.1c) tataḥ pari prajātena hārdiṃ te śocayāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:3273: (AVŚ_6,89.2a) śocayāmasi te hārdiṃ śocayāmasi te manaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3274: (AVŚ_6,89.2c) vātaṃ dhūma iva sadhryaṅ mām evānv etu ye manaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3275: (AVŚ_6,89.3a) mahyaṃ tvā mitrāvaruṇau mahyaṃ devī sarasvatī |
GV00avs___u:3276: (AVŚ_6,89.3c) mahyaṃ tvā madhyaṃ bhūmyā ubhāv antau sam asyatām ||3||
GV00avs___u:3277: (AVŚ_6,90.1a) yāṃ te rudra iṣum āsyad aṅgebhyo hṛdayāya ca |
GV00avs___u:3278: (AVŚ_6,90.1c) idaṃ tām adya tvad vayaṃ viṣūcīṃ vi vṛhāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:3279: (AVŚ_6,90.2a) yās te śataṃ dhamanayo 'ṅgāny anu viṣṭhitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:3280: (AVŚ_6,90.2c) tāsāṃ te sarvāsām vayaṃ nir viṣāṇi hvayāmasi ||2||
GV00avs___u:3284: (AVŚ_6,91.1c) tenā te tanvo rapo 'pācīnam apa vyaye ||1||
GV00avs___u:3285: (AVŚ_6,91.2a) nyag vāto vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3286: (AVŚ_6,91.2c) nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyag bhavatu te rapaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3287: (AVŚ_6,91.3a) āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ |
GV00avs___u:3288: (AVŚ_6,91.3c) āpo viśvasya bheṣajīs tās te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3289: (AVŚ_6,92.1a) vātaraṃhā bhava vājin yujamāna indrasya yāhi prasave manojavāḥ |
GV00avs___u:3290: (AVŚ_6,92.1c) yuñjantu tvā maruto viśvavedasa ā te tvastā patsu javaṃ
GV00avs___u:3292: (AVŚ_6,92.2a) javas te arvan nihito guhā yaḥ śyene vāte uta yo 'carat
GV00avs___u:3294: (AVŚ_6,92.2c) tena tvaṃ vājin balavān balenājiṃ jaya samane parayiṣṇuḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3295: (AVŚ_6,92.3a) tanūṣ ṭe vājin tanvaṃ nayantī vāmam asmabhyaṃ dhāvatu śarma
GV00avs___u:3297: (AVŚ_6,92.3c) ahruto maho dharuṇāya devo divīva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāt
GV00avs___u:3298: (AVŚ_6,93.1a) yamo mṛtyur aghamāro nirṛtho babhruḥ śarvo 'stā
GV00avs___u:3300: (AVŚ_6,93.1c) devajanāḥ senayottasthivāṃsas te asmākaṃ pari vṛñjantu vīrān
GV00avs___u:3301: (AVŚ_6,93.2a) manasā homair harasā ghṛtena śarvāyāstra uta rājñe bhavāya |
GV00avs___u:3302: (AVŚ_6,93.2c) namasyebhyo nama ebhyaḥ kṛṇomy anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā nayantu
GV00avs___u:3303: (AVŚ_6,93.3a) trāyadhvaṃ no aghaviṣābhyo vadhād viśve devā maruto viśvavedasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3304: (AVŚ_6,93.3c) agnīṣomā varuṇaḥ pūtadakṣā vātāparjanyayoḥ sumatau syāma
GV00avs___u:3305: (AVŚ_6,94.1a) saṃ vo manāṃsi saṃ vratā sam ākūtīr namāmasi |
GV00avs___u:3306: (AVŚ_6,94.1c) amī ye vivratā sthana tān vaḥ saṃ namayāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:3307: (AVŚ_6,94.2a) ahaṃ gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhir eta |
GV00avs___u:3308: (AVŚ_6,94.2c) mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmāna eta
GV00avs___u:3309: (AVŚ_6,94.3a) ote me dyāvāpṛthivī otā devī sarasvatī |
GV00avs___u:3310: (AVŚ_6,94.3c) otau ma indraś cāgniś ca rdhyāsmedaṃ sarasvati ||3||
GV00avs___u:3315: (AVŚ_6,95.3a) garbho asy oṣadhīnāṃ garbho himavatām uta |
GV00avs___u:3316: (AVŚ_6,95.3c) garbho viśvasya bhūtasyemaṃ me agadaṃ kṛdhi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3319: (AVŚ_6,96.2a) muñcantu mā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta |
GV00avs___u:3321: (AVŚ_6,96.3a) yac cakṣuṣā manasā yac ca vācopārima jāgrato yat svapantaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3323: (AVŚ_6,97.1a) abhibhūr yajño abhibhūr agnir abhibhūḥ somo abhibhūr indraḥ |
GV00avs___u:3324: (AVŚ_6,97.1c) abhy ahaṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā yathāsāny evā vidhemāgnihotrā idaṃ haviḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3325: (AVŚ_6,97.2a) svadhāstu mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā prajāvat kṣatraṃ madhuneha
GV00avs___u:3327: (AVŚ_6,97.2c) bādhethāṃ dūraṃ nirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ pra mumuktam
GV00avs___u:3329: (AVŚ_6,97.3a) imaṃ vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indraṃ sakhāyo anu saṃ
GV00avs___u:3331: (AVŚ_6,97.3c) grāmajitaṃ gojitaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam
GV00avs___u:3333: (AVŚ_6,98.1a) indro jayāti na parā jayātā adhirājo rājasu rājayātai |
GV00avs___u:3334: (AVŚ_6,98.1c) carkṛtya īḍyo vandyaś copasadyo namasyś bhaveha ||1||
GV00avs___u:3335: (AVŚ_6,98.2a) tvam indrādhirājaḥ śravasyus tvaṃ bhūr abhibhūtir janānām |
GV00avs___u:3336: (AVŚ_6,98.2c) tvaṃ daivīr viśa imā vi rājāyuṣmat kṣatram ajaraṃ te astu
GV00avs___u:3337: (AVŚ_6,98.3a) prācyā diśas tvam indrāsi rājotodīcyā diśo vṛtrahan chatruho 'si |
GV00avs___u:3338: (AVŚ_6,98.3c) yatra yanti srotyās taj jitaṃ te dakṣiṇato vṛṣabha eṣi
GV00avs___u:3340: (AVŚ_6,99.1a) abhi tvendra varimataḥ purā tvāṃhūraṇād dhuve |
GV00avs___u:3342: (AVŚ_6,99.2a) yo adya senyo vadho jighāṃsan na udīrate |
GV00avs___u:3343: (AVŚ_6,99.2c) indrasya tatra bāhū samantaṃ pari dadmaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3344: (AVŚ_6,99.3a) pari dadma indrasya bāhū samantaṃ trātus trāyatāṃ naḥ |
GV00avs___u:3345: (AVŚ_6,99.3c) deva savitaḥ soma rājant sumanasaṃ mā kṛṇu svastaye ||3||
GV00avs___u:3346: (AVŚ_6,100.1a) devā aduḥ sūryo dyaur adāt pṛthivy adāt |
GV00avs___u:3348: (AVŚ_6,100.2a) yad vo devā upajīkā āsiñcan dhanvany udakam |
GV00avs___u:3350: (AVŚ_6,100.3a) asurāṇāṃ duhitāsi sā devānām asi svasā |
GV00avs___u:3351: (AVŚ_6,100.3c) divas pṛthivyāḥ saṃbhūtā sā cakarthārasaṃ viṣam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3352: (AVŚ_6,101.1a) ā vṛṣāyasva śvasihi vardhasva prathayasva ca |
GV00avs___u:3353: (AVŚ_6,101.1c) yathāṅgaṃ vardhatāṃ śepas tena yoṣitam ij jahi ||1||
GV00avs___u:3354: (AVŚ_6,101.2a) yena kṛṣaṃ vājayanti yena hinvanty āturam |
GV00avs___u:3355: (AVŚ_6,101.2c) tenāsya brahmaṇas pate dhanur ivā tānayā pasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3356: (AVŚ_6,101.3a) āhaṃ tanomi te paso adhi jyām iva dhanvani |
GV00avs___u:3357: (AVŚ_6,101.3c) kramasva ṛṣa iva rohitam anavaglāyatā sadā ||3||
GV00avs___u:3358: (AVŚ_6,102.1a) yathāyaṃ vāho aśvinā samaiti saṃ ca vartate |
GV00avs___u:3359: (AVŚ_6,102.1c) evā mām abhi te manaḥ samaitu saṃ ca vartatām ||1||
GV00avs___u:3360: (AVŚ_6,102.2a) āhaṃ khidāmi te mano rājāśvaḥ pṛṣṭyām iva |
GV00avs___u:3361: (AVŚ_6,102.2c) reṣmachinnam yathā tṛṇaṃ mayi te veṣṭatāṃ manaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3363: (AVŚ_6,102.3c) turo bhagasya hastābhyām anurodhanam ud bhare ||3||
GV00avs___u:3364: (AVŚ_6,103.1a) saṃdānaṃ vo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃdānaṃ savitā karat |
GV00avs___u:3365: (AVŚ_6,103.1c) saṃdānaṃ mitro aryamā saṃdānaṃ bhago aśvinā ||1||
GV00avs___u:3366: (AVŚ_6,103.2a) sam paramānt sam avamān atho saṃ dyāmi madhyamān |
GV00avs___u:3367: (AVŚ_6,103.2c) indras tān pary ahār dāmnā tān agne saṃ dyā tvam ||2||
GV00avs___u:3368: (AVŚ_6,103.3a) amī ye yudham āyanti ketūn kṛtvānīkaśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3369: (AVŚ_6,103.3c) indras tān pary ahār dāmna tān agne saṃ dyā tvam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3371: (AVŚ_6,104.1c) apānā ye caiṣāṃ prāṇā asunāsūnt sam achidan ||1||
GV00avs___u:3373: (AVŚ_6,104.2c) amitrā ye 'tra naḥ santi tān agna ā dyā tvam ||2||
GV00avs___u:3374: (AVŚ_6,104.3a) ainān dyatām indrāgnī somo rājā ca medinau |
GV00avs___u:3375: (AVŚ_6,104.3c) indro marutvān ādānam amitrebhyaḥ kṛṇotu naḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3377: (AVŚ_6,105.1c) evā tvaṃ kāse pra pata manaso 'nu pravāyyam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3379: (AVŚ_6,105.2c) evā tvaṃ kāse pra pata pṛthivyā anu saṃvatam ||2||
GV00avs___u:3381: (AVŚ_6,105.3c) evā tvaṃ kāse pra pata samudrasyānu vikṣaram ||3||
GV00avs___u:3382: (AVŚ_6,106.1a) āyane te parāyane dūrvā rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ |
GV00avs___u:3383: (AVŚ_6,106.1c) utso vā tatra jāyatām hrado vā puṇḍarīkavān ||1||
GV00avs___u:3385: (AVŚ_6,106.2c) madhye hradasya no gṛhāḥ parācīnā mukhā kṛdhi ||2||
GV00avs___u:3386: (AVŚ_6,106.3a) himasya tvā jarāyuṇā śāle pari vyayāmasi |
GV00avs___u:3387: (AVŚ_6,106.3c) śītahradā hi no bhuvo 'gniṣ kṛṇotu bheṣajam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3389: (AVŚ_6,107.1c) trāyamāṇe dvipāc ca sarvaṃ no rakṣa catuṣpāḍ yac ca naḥ svam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3391: (AVŚ_6,107.2c) viśvajid dvipāc ca sarvaṃ no rakṣa catuṣpāḍ yac ca naḥ svam ||2||
GV00avs___u:3393: (AVŚ_6,107.3c) kalyāṇi dvipāc ca sarvaṃ no rakṣa catuṣpāḍ yac ca naḥ svam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3395: (AVŚ_6,107.4c) sarvavid dvipāc ca sarvaṃ no rakṣa catuṣpāḍ yac ca naḥ svam ||4||
GV00avs___u:3396: (AVŚ_6,108.1a) tvaṃ no medhe prathamā gobhir aśvebhir ā gahi |
GV00avs___u:3397: (AVŚ_6,108.1c) tvaṃ sūryasya raśmibhis tvam no asi yajñiyā ||1||
GV00avs___u:3398: (AVŚ_6,108.2a) medhām ahaṃ prathamāṃ brahmaṇvatīṃ brahmajūtām ṛṣiṣṭutām |
GV00avs___u:3400: (AVŚ_6,108.3a) yāṃ medhām ṛbhavo vidur yāṃ medhām asurā viduḥ |
GV00avs___u:3401: (AVŚ_6,108.3c) ṛṣayo bhadrāṃ medhāṃ yāṃ vidus tāṃ mayy ā veśayāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3402: (AVŚ_6,108.4a) yām ṛṣayo bhūtakṛto medhāṃ medhāvino viduḥ |
GV00avs___u:3403: (AVŚ_6,108.4c) tayā mām adya medhayāgne medhāvinaṃ kṛṇu ||4||
GV00avs___u:3404: (AVŚ_6,108.5a) medhāṃ sāyaṃ medhāṃ prātar medhāṃ madhyandinaṃ pari |
GV00avs___u:3407: (AVŚ_6,109.1c) tāṃ devāḥ sam akalpayann iyaṃ jīvitavā alam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3409: (AVŚ_6,109.2c) yaṃ jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3410: (AVŚ_6,109.3a) asurās tvā ny akhanan devās tvod avapan punaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3412: (AVŚ_6,110.1a) pratno hi kam īḍyo adhvareṣu sanāc ca hotā navyaś ca satsi |
GV00avs___u:3413: (AVŚ_6,110.1c) svām cāgne tanvaṃ piprāyasvāsmabhyaṃ ca saubhagam ā yajasva ||1||
GV00avs___u:3414: (AVŚ_6,110.2a) jyeṣṭhaghnyāṃ jāto vicṛtor yamasya mūlabarhaṇāt pari pāhy enam |
GV00avs___u:3415: (AVŚ_6,110.2c) aty enam neṣad duritāni viśvā dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya
GV00avs___u:3416: (AVŚ_6,110.3a) vyāghre 'hny ajaniṣṭa vīro nakṣatrajā jāyamānaḥ suvīraḥ |
GV00avs___u:3417: (AVŚ_6,110.3c) sa mā vadhīt pitaraṃ vardhamāno mā mātaraṃ pra minīj
GV00avs___u:3419: (AVŚ_6,111.1a) imam me agne puruṣam mumugdhy ayaṃ yo baddhaḥ suyato
GV00avs___u:3422: (AVŚ_6,111.2a) agniṣ ṭe ni śamayatu yadi te mana udyutam |
GV00avs___u:3426: (AVŚ_6,111.4a) punas tvā dur apsarasaḥ punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3427: (AVŚ_6,111.4c) punas tvā dur viśve devā yathānunmadito 'sasi ||4||
GV00avs___u:3428: (AVŚ_6,112.1a) mā jyeṣṭhaṃ vadhīd ayam agna eṣām mūlabarhaṇāt pari pāhy
GV00avs___u:3430: (AVŚ_6,112.1c) sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan tubhyaṃ devā anu jānantu viśve ||1||
GV00avs___u:3431: (AVŚ_6,112.2a) un muñca pāśāṃs tvam agna eṣāṃ trayas tribhir utsitā yebhir āsan |
GV00avs___u:3432: (AVŚ_6,112.2c) sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan pitāputrau mātaraṃ muñca
GV00avs___u:3434: (AVŚ_6,112.3a) yebhiḥ pāśaiḥ parivitto vibaddho 'ṅgeaṅga ārpita utsitaś ca
GV00avs___u:3435: (AVŚ_6,112.3c) vi te mucyantaṃ vimuco hi santi bhrūṇaghni pūṣan duritāni
GV00avs___u:3437: (AVŚ_6,113.1a) trite devā amṛjataitad enas trita enan manuṣyeṣu mamṛje |
GV00avs___u:3438: (AVŚ_6,113.1c) tato yadi tvā grāhir ānaśe tāṃ te devā brahmaṇā nāśayantu
GV00avs___u:3439: (AVŚ_6,113.2a) marīcīr dhūmān pra viśānu pāpmann udārān gachota vā nīhārān
GV00avs___u:3440: (AVŚ_6,113.2c) nadīnaṃ phenāṃ anu tān vi naśya bhrūṇaghni pūṣan duritāni
GV00avs___u:3443: (AVŚ_6,113.3c) tato yadi tvā grāhir ānaśe tāṃ te devā brahmaṇā nāśayantu
GV00avs___u:3444: (AVŚ_6,114.1a) yad devā devaheḍanaṃ devāsaś cakṛma vayam |
GV00avs___u:3445: (AVŚ_6,114.1c) ādityās tasmān no yuyam ṛtasya ṛtena muñcata ||1||
GV00avs___u:3449: (AVŚ_6,114.3c) akāmā viśve vo devāḥ śikṣanto nopa śekima ||3||
GV00avs___u:3450: (AVŚ_6,115.1a) yad vidvāṃso yad avidvāṃsa enāṃsi cakṛmā vayam |
GV00avs___u:3451: (AVŚ_6,115.1c) yūyaṃ nas tasmān muñcata viśve devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3452: (AVŚ_6,115.2a) yadi jāgrad yadi svapann ena enasyo 'karam |
GV00avs___u:3453: (AVŚ_6,115.2c) bhūtaṃ mā tasmād bhavyaṃ ca drupadād iva muñcatām ||2||
GV00avs___u:3454: (AVŚ_6,115.3a) drupadād iva mumucānaḥ svinnaḥ snātvā malād iva |
GV00avs___u:3456: (AVŚ_6,116.1a) yad yāmaṃ cakrur nikhananto agre kārṣīvaṇā annavido na vidyayā |
GV00avs___u:3457: (AVŚ_6,116.1c) vaivasvate rājani taj juhomy atha yajñiyaṃ madhumad astu no
GV00avs___u:3459: (AVŚ_6,116.2a) vaivasvataḥ kṛṇavad bhāgadheyaṃ madhubhāgo madhunā saṃ
GV00avs___u:3461: (AVŚ_6,116.2c) mātur yad ena iṣitaṃ na āgan yad vā pitā 'parāddho jihīde
GV00avs___u:3462: (AVŚ_6,116.3a) yadīdaṃ mātur yadi pitur naḥ pari bhrātuḥ putrāc cetasa ena āgan |
GV00avs___u:3463: (AVŚ_6,116.3c) yāvanto asmān pitaraḥ sacante teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śivo astu manyuḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3464: (AVŚ_6,117.1a) apamityam apratīttaṃ yad asmi yamasya yena balinā carāmi |
GV00avs___u:3465: (AVŚ_6,117.1c) idaṃ tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmi tvaṃ pāśān vicṛtaṃ vettha
GV00avs___u:3467: (AVŚ_6,117.2a) ihaiva santaḥ prati dadma enaj jīvā jīvebhyo ni harāma enat
GV00avs___u:3468: (AVŚ_6,117.2c) apamitya dhānyaṃ yaj jaghasāham idaṃ tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmi
GV00avs___u:3469: (AVŚ_6,117.3a) anṛṇā asminn anṛṇāḥ parasmin tṛtīye loke anṛṇāḥ syāma |
GV00avs___u:3470: (AVŚ_6,117.3c) ye devayānāḥ pitṛyāṇaś ca lokāḥ sarvān patho anṛṇā ā
GV00avs___u:3472: (AVŚ_6,118.1a) yad dhastābhyāṃ cakṛma kilbiṣāṇy akṣāṇāṃ gatnum
GV00avs___u:3474: (AVŚ_6,118.1c) ugraṃpaśye ugrajitau tad adyāpsarasāv anu dattām ṛṇaṃ naḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3475: (AVŚ_6,118.2a) ugraṃpaśye rāṣṭrabhṛt kilbiṣāṇi yad akṣavṛttam anu dattam na etat |
GV00avs___u:3476: (AVŚ_6,118.2c) ṛṇān no na ṛṇam ertsamāno yamasya loke adhirajjur āyat
GV00avs___u:3477: (AVŚ_6,118.3a) yasmā ṛṇaṃ yasya jāyām upaimi yaṃ yācamāno abhyaimi devāḥ |
GV00avs___u:3478: (AVŚ_6,118.3c) te vācaṃ vādiṣur mottarāṃ mad devapatnī apsarasāv adhītam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3479: (AVŚ_6,119.1a) yad adīvyann ṛṇam ahaṃ kṛṇomy adāsyann agne uta saṃgṛṇāmi |
GV00avs___u:3480: (AVŚ_6,119.1c) vaiśvānaro no adhipā vasiṣṭha ud in nayāti sukṛtasya lokam
GV00avs___u:3481: (AVŚ_6,119.2a) vaiśvānarāya prati vedayāmi yadi ṛṇaṃ saṃgaro devatāsu |
GV00avs___u:3482: (AVŚ_6,119.2c) sa etān pāśān vicṛtam veda sarvān atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||2||
GV00avs___u:3483: (AVŚ_6,119.3a) vaiśvānaraḥ pavitā mā punātu yat saṃgaram abhidhāvāmy āśām |
GV00avs___u:3484: (AVŚ_6,119.3c) anājānan manasā yācamāno yat tatraino apa tat suvāmi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3485: (AVŚ_6,120.1a) yad antarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyām yan mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā
GV00avs___u:3487: (AVŚ_6,120.1c) ayaṃ tasmād gārhapatyo no agnir ud in nayāti sukṛtasya
GV00avs___u:3489: (AVŚ_6,120.2a) bhūmir mātāditir no janitraṃ bhrātāntarikṣam abhiśastyā naḥ
GV00avs___u:3490: (AVŚ_6,120.2c) dyaur naḥ pitā pitryāc chaṃ bhavāti jāmim ṛtvā māva patsi lokāt ||2||
GV00avs___u:3491: (AVŚ_6,120.3a) yatrā suhārdaḥ sukṛto madanti vihāya rogaṃ tanvaḥ svāyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:3492: (AVŚ_6,120.3c) aślonā aṅgair ahrutāḥ svarge tatra paśyema pitarau ca putrān ||3||
GV00avs___u:3493: (AVŚ_6,121.1a) viṣāṇā pāśān vi ṣyādhy asmad ya uttamā adhamā vāruṇā ye |
GV00avs___u:3494: (AVŚ_6,121.1c) duṣvapnyaṃ duritaṃ ni ṣvāsmad atha gachema sukṛtasya lokam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3495: (AVŚ_6,121.2a) yad dāruṇi badhyase yac ca rajjvāṃ yad bhūmyāṃ badhyase yac ca vācā |
GV00avs___u:3496: (AVŚ_6,121.2c) ayaṃ tasmād gārhapatyo no agnir ud in nayāti sukṛtasya
GV00avs___u:3498: (AVŚ_6,121.3a) ud agātāṃ bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake |
GV00avs___u:3500: (AVŚ_6,121.4a) vi jihīṣva lokam kṛṇu bandhān muñcāsi baddhakam |
GV00avs___u:3501: (AVŚ_6,121.4c) yonyā iva pracyuto garbhaḥ pathaḥ sarvāṃ anu kṣiya ||4||
GV00avs___u:3502: (AVŚ_6,122.1a) etaṃ bhāgaṃ pari dadāmi vidvān viśvakarman prathamajā ṛtasya |
GV00avs___u:3503: (AVŚ_6,122.1c) asmābhir dattaṃ jarasaḥ parastād achinnaṃ tantum anu saṃ tarema ||1||
GV00avs___u:3504: (AVŚ_6,122.2a) tataṃ tantum anv eke taranti yeṣāṃ dattaṃ pitryam āyanena |
