GV00avs___u:3505: (AVŚ_6,122.2c) abandhv eke dadataḥ prayachanto dātuṃ cec chikṣānt sa svarga eva ||2||
GV00avs___u:3506: (AVŚ_6,122.3a) anvārabhethām anusaṃrabhethām etaṃ lokaṃ śraddadhānāḥ sacante |
GV00avs___u:3507: (AVŚ_6,122.3c) yad vāṃ pakvaṃ pariviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye dampatī saṃ
GV00avs___u:3509: (AVŚ_6,122.4a) yajñam yantaṃ manasā bṛhantam anvārohāmi tapasā sayoniḥ |
GV00avs___u:3510: (AVŚ_6,122.4c) upahūtā agne jarasaḥ parastāt tṛtīye nāke sadhamādaṃ madema ||4||
GV00avs___u:3511: (AVŚ_6,122.5a) śuddhāḥ pūtā yoṣito yajñiyā imā brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi |
GV00avs___u:3512: (AVŚ_6,122.5c) yatkāma idaṃ abhiṣiñcāmi vo 'haṃ indro marutvānt sa dadātu tan me ||5||
GV00avs___u:3513: (AVŚ_6,123.1a) etaṃ sadhasthāḥ pari vo dadāmi yaṃ śevadhim āvahāj jātavedaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3514: (AVŚ_6,123.1c) anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti taṃ sma jānīta parame vyoman ||1||
GV00avs___u:3515: (AVŚ_6,123.2a) jānīta smainaṃ parame vyoman devāḥ sadhasthā vida lokam atra |
GV00avs___u:3516: (AVŚ_6,123.2c) anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svastīṣṭāpūrtaṃ sma kṛṇutāvir asmai
GV00avs___u:3520: (AVŚ_6,123.4c) sa yaje sa dattān mā yūṣam ||4||
GV00avs___u:3521: (AVŚ_6,123.5a) nāke rājan prati tiṣṭha tatraitat prati tiṣṭhatu |
GV00avs___u:3522: (AVŚ_6,123.5c) viddhi pūrtasya no rājant sa deva sumanā bhava ||5||
GV00avs___u:3523: (AVŚ_6,124.1a) divo nu mām bṛhato antarikṣād apāṃ stoko abhy apaptad
GV00avs___u:3525: (AVŚ_6,124.1c) sam indriyena payasāham agne chandobhir yajñaiḥ sukṛtāṃ kṛtena ||1||
GV00avs___u:3526: (AVŚ_6,124.2a) yadi vṛkṣād abhyapaptat phalaṃ tad yady antarikṣāt sa u
GV00avs___u:3528: (AVŚ_6,124.2c) yatrāspṛkṣat tanvo yac ca vāsasa āpo nudantu nirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3529: (AVŚ_6,124.3a) abhyañjanaṃ surabhi sā samṛddhir hiraṇyaṃ varcas tad u pūtrimam eva |
GV00avs___u:3530: (AVŚ_6,124.3c) sarvā pavitrā vitatādhy asmat tan mā tārīn nirṛtir mo
GV00avs___u:3532: (AVŚ_6,125.1a) vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ |
GV00avs___u:3533: (AVŚ_6,125.1c) gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḍayasvāsthātā te jayatu jetvāni
GV00avs___u:3534: (AVŚ_6,125.2a) divas pṛthivyāḥ pary oja udbhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ pary ābhṛtaṃ sahaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3535: (AVŚ_6,125.2c) apām ojmānaṃ pari gobhir āvṛtam indrasya vajraṃ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja ||2||
GV00avs___u:3536: (AVŚ_6,125.3a) indrasyaujo marutām anīkaṃ mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ
GV00avs___u:3537: (AVŚ_6,125.3c) sa imāṃ no havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya
GV00avs___u:3538: (AVŚ_6,126.1a) upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyaṃ purutrā te vanvatāṃ viṣṭhitam
GV00avs___u:3540: (AVŚ_6,126.1c) sa dundubhe sajūr indreṇa devair dūrād davīyo apa sedha
GV00avs___u:3542: (AVŚ_6,126.2a) ā krandaya balam ojo na ā dhā abhi ṣṭana duritā bādhamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3543: (AVŚ_6,126.2c) apa sedha dundubhe duchunām ita indrasya muṣṭir asi vīḍayasva ||2||
GV00avs___u:3544: (AVŚ_6,126.3a) prāmūṃ jayābhīme jayantu ketumad dundubhir vāvadītu |
GV00avs___u:3545: (AVŚ_6,126.3c) sam aśvaparṇāḥ patantu no naro 'smākam indra rathino jayantu ||3||
GV00avs___u:3548: (AVŚ_6,127.2a) yau te balāsa tiṣṭhataḥ kakṣe muṣkāv apaśritau |
GV00avs___u:3550: (AVŚ_6,127.3a) yo aṅgyo yaḥ karṇyo yo akṣyor visalpakaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3552: (AVŚ_6,127.3e) parā tam ajñātam yakṣmam adharāñcaṃ suvāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3554: (AVŚ_6,128.1c) bhadrāham asmai prāyachan idaṃ rāṣṭram asād iti ||1||
GV00avs___u:3555: (AVŚ_6,128.2a) bhadrāhaṃ no madhyaṃdine bhadrāhaṃ sāyam astu naḥ |
GV00avs___u:3556: (AVŚ_6,128.2c) bhadrāhaṃ no ahnāṃ prātā rātrī bhadrāham astu naḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3558: (AVŚ_6,128.3c) bhadrāham asmabhyaṃ rājan chakadhūma tvaṃ kṛdhi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3559: (AVŚ_6,128.4a) yo no bhadrāham akaraḥ sāyaṃ naktam atho divā |
GV00avs___u:3560: (AVŚ_6,128.4c) tasmai te nakṣatrarāja śakadhūma sadā namaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:3561: (AVŚ_6,129.1a) bhagena mā śāṃśapena sākam indreṇa medinā |
GV00avs___u:3563: (AVŚ_6,129.2a) yena vṛkṣāṃ abhyabhavo bhagena varcasā saha |
GV00avs___u:3564: (AVŚ_6,129.2c) tena mā bhaginaṃ kṛṇv apa drāntv arātayaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3565: (AVŚ_6,129.3a) yo andho yaḥ punaḥsaro bhago vṛkṣeṣv āhitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3566: (AVŚ_6,129.3c) tena mā bhaginaṃ kṛṇv apa drāntv arātayaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3568: (AVŚ_6,130.1c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu ||1||
GV00avs___u:3569: (AVŚ_6,130.2a) asau me smaratād iti priyo me smaratād iti |
GV00avs___u:3570: (AVŚ_6,130.2c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu ||2||
GV00avs___u:3571: (AVŚ_6,130.3a) yathā mama smarād asau nāmuṣyāhaṃ kadā cana |
GV00avs___u:3572: (AVŚ_6,130.3c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu ||3||
GV00avs___u:3573: (AVŚ_6,130.4a) un mādayata maruta ud antarikṣa mādaya |
GV00avs___u:3574: (AVŚ_6,130.4c) agna un mādayā tvam asau mām anu śocatu ||4||
GV00avs___u:3575: (AVŚ_6,131.1a) ni śīrṣato ni pattata ādhyo ni tirāmi te |
GV00avs___u:3576: (AVŚ_6,131.1c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu ||1||
GV00avs___u:3577: (AVŚ_6,131.2a) anumate 'nv idaṃ manyasvākute sam idaṃ namaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3578: (AVŚ_6,131.2c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu ||2||
GV00avs___u:3580: (AVŚ_6,131.3c) tatas tvaṃ punar āyasi putrāṇāṃ no asaḥ pitā ||3||
GV00avs___u:3581: (AVŚ_6,132.1a) yaṃ devāḥ smaram asiñcann apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā |
GV00avs___u:3583: (AVŚ_6,132.2a) yaṃ viśve devāḥ smaram asiñcann apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā |
GV00avs___u:3585: (AVŚ_6,132.3a) yam indrāṇī smaram asiñcad apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā |
GV00avs___u:3587: (AVŚ_6,132.4a) yam indrāgnī smaram asiñcatām apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā |
GV00avs___u:3589: (AVŚ_6,132.5a) yam mitrāvaruṇau smaram asiñcatām apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā |
GV00avs___u:3591: (AVŚ_6,133.1a) ya imāṃ devo mekhalām ābabandha yaḥ saṃnanāha ya u no yuyoja |
GV00avs___u:3592: (AVŚ_6,133.1c) yasya devasya praśiṣā carāmaḥ sa pāram ichāt sa u no vi muñcāt ||1||
GV00avs___u:3594: (AVŚ_6,133.2c) pūrvā vratasya prāśnatī vīraghnī bhava mekhale ||2||
GV00avs___u:3595: (AVŚ_6,133.3a) mṛtyor ahaṃ brahmacārī yad asmi niryācan bhūtāt puruṣaṃ yamāya |
GV00avs___u:3596: (AVŚ_6,133.3c) tam ahaṃ brahmaṇā tapasā śrameṇānayainaṃ mekhalayā sināmi
GV00avs___u:3597: (AVŚ_6,133.4a) śraddhāyā duhitā tapaso 'dhi jātā svasā ṛṣīṇāṃ bhūtakṛtāṃ babhūva |
GV00avs___u:3598: (AVŚ_6,133.4c) sā no mekhale matim ā dhehi medhām atho no dhehi tapa indriyaṃ ca ||4||
GV00avs___u:3599: (AVŚ_6,133.5a) yāṃ tvā pūrve bhūtakṛta ṛṣayaḥ paribedhire |
GV00avs___u:3600: (AVŚ_6,133.5c) sā tvaṃ pari ṣvajasva māṃ dīrghāyutvāya mekhale ||5||
GV00avs___u:3601: (AVŚ_6,134.1a) ayaṃ vajras tarpayatām ṛtasyāvāsya rāṣṭram apa hantu jīvitam |
GV00avs___u:3602: (AVŚ_6,134.1c) śṛṇātu grīvāḥ pra śṛṇātūṣṇihā vṛtrasyeva śacīpatiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3603: (AVŚ_6,134.2a) adharo'dhara uttarebhyo gūḍhaḥ pṛthivyā mot sṛpat |
GV00avs___u:3605: (AVŚ_6,134.3a) yo jināti tam anvicha yo jināti tam ij jahi |
GV00avs___u:3606: (AVŚ_6,134.3c) jinato vajra tvaṃ sīmantam anvañcam anu pātaya ||3||
GV00avs___u:3607: (AVŚ_6,135.1a) yad aśnāmi balaṃ kurva itthaṃ vajram ā dade |
GV00avs___u:3609: (AVŚ_6,135.2a) yat pibāmi saṃ pibāmi samudra iva saṃpibaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3610: (AVŚ_6,135.2c) prāṇān amuṣya saṃpāya saṃ pibāmo amuṃ vayam ||2||
GV00avs___u:3611: (AVŚ_6,135.3a) yad girāmi saṃ girāmi samudra iva saṃgiraḥ |
GV00avs___u:3612: (AVŚ_6,135.3c) prāṇān amuṣya saṃgīrya saṃ girāmo amum vayam ||3||
GV00avs___u:3613: (AVŚ_6,136.1a) devī devyām adhi jātā pṛthivyām asy oṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:3614: (AVŚ_6,136.1c) tāṃ tvā nitatni keśebhyo dṛṃhaṇāya khanāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:3615: (AVŚ_6,136.2a) dṛṃha pratnān janayājātān jātān u varṣīyasas kṛdhi ||2||
GV00avs___u:3616: (AVŚ_6,136.3a) yas te keśo 'vapadyate samūlo yaś ca vṛścate |
GV00avs___u:3621: (AVŚ_6,137.2c) keśā naḍā iva vardhantāṃ śīrṣṇas te asitāḥ pari ||2||
GV00avs___u:3622: (AVŚ_6,137.3a) dṛṃha mūlam āgraṃ yacha vi madhyaṃ yāmayauṣadhe |
GV00avs___u:3623: (AVŚ_6,137.3c) keśā naḍā iva vardhantām śīrṣṇas te asitāḥ pari ||3||
GV00avs___u:3625: (AVŚ_6,138.1c) imaṃ me adya puruṣaṃ klībam opaśinaṃ kṛdhi ||1||
GV00avs___u:3626: (AVŚ_6,138.2a) klībaṃ kṛdhy opaśinam atho kurīriṇaṃ kṛdhi |
GV00avs___u:3628: (AVŚ_6,138.3a) klība klībaṃ tvākaraṃ vadhre vadhriṃ tvākaram arasārasaṃ tvākaram |
GV00avs___u:3630: (AVŚ_6,138.4a) ye te nādyau devakṛte yayos tiṣṭhati vṛṣṇyam |
GV00avs___u:3631: (AVŚ_6,138.4c) te te bhinadmi śamyayāmuṣyā adhi muṣkayoḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:3632: (AVŚ_6,138.5a) yathā naḍam kaśipune striyo bhindanty aśmanā |
GV00avs___u:3633: (AVŚ_6,138.5c) evā bhinadmi te śepo 'muṣyā adhi muṣkayoḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:3637: (AVŚ_6,139.2a) śuṣyatu mayi te hṛdayam atho śuṣyatv āsyam |
GV00avs___u:3638: (AVŚ_6,139.2c) atho ni śuṣya māṃ kāmenātho śuṣkāsyā cara ||2||
GV00avs___u:3639: (AVŚ_6,139.3a) saṃvananī samuṣpalā babhru kalyāṇi saṃ nuda |
GV00avs___u:3640: (AVŚ_6,139.3c) amūṃ ca māṃ ca saṃ nuda samānaṃ hṛdayaṃ kṛdhi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3642: (AVŚ_6,139.4c) evā ni śuṣya māṃ kāmenātho śuṣkāsyā cara ||4||
GV00avs___u:3643: (AVŚ_6,139.5a) yathā nakulo vichidya saṃdadhāty ahiṃ punaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3644: (AVŚ_6,139.5c) evā kāmasya vichinnaṃ saṃ dhehi vīryāvati ||5||
GV00avs___u:3645: (AVŚ_6,140.1a) yau vyāghrāv avarūdhau jighatsataḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca |
GV00avs___u:3646: (AVŚ_6,140.1c) tau dantaṃ brahmaṇas pate śivau kṛṇu jātavedaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3647: (AVŚ_6,140.2a) vrīhim attaṃ yavam attam atho māṣam atho tilam |
GV00avs___u:3648: (AVŚ_6,140.2c) eṣa vāṃ bhāgo nihito ratnadheyāya dantau mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ pitaram mātaraṃ ca
GV00avs___u:3650: (AVŚ_6,140.3c) anyatra vāṃ ghoraṃ tanvaḥ paraitu dantau mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
GV00avs___u:3651: (AVŚ_6,141.1a) vāyur enāḥ samākarat tvaṣṭā poṣāya dhriyatām |
GV00avs___u:3652: (AVŚ_6,141.1c) indra ābhyo adhi bravad rudro bhūmne cikitsatu ||1||
GV00avs___u:3654: (AVŚ_6,141.2c) akartām aśvinā lakṣma tad astu prajayā bahu ||2||
GV00avs___u:3655: (AVŚ_6,141.3a) yathā cakrur devāsurā yathā manuṣyā uta |
GV00avs___u:3657: (AVŚ_6,142.1a) uc chrayasva bahur bhava svena mahasā yava |
GV00avs___u:3658: (AVŚ_6,142.1c) mṛṇīhi viśvā pātrāṇi mā tvā divyāśanir vadhīt ||1||
GV00avs___u:3660: (AVŚ_6,142.2c) tad uc chrayasva dyaur iva samudra ivaidhy akṣitaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3662: (AVŚ_6,142.3c) pṛṇanto akṣitāḥ santv attāraḥ santv akṣitāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3663: (AVŚ_7,1.1a) dhītī vā ye anayan vāco agraṃ manasā vā ye 'vadann ṛtāni |
GV00avs___u:3664: (AVŚ_7,1.1c) tṛtīyena brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānās turīyeṇāmanvata nāma dhenoḥ
GV00avs___u:3665: (AVŚ_7,1.2a) sa veda putraḥ pitaraṃ sa mātaraṃ sa sūnur bhuvat sa bhuvat punarmaghaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3666: (AVŚ_7,1.2c) sa dyām aurṇod antarikṣaṃ svaḥ sa idaṃ viśvam abhavat sa ābharat ||2||
GV00avs___u:3667: (AVŚ_7,2.1a) atharvāṇaṃ pitaraṃ devabandhuṃ mātur garbhaṃ pitur asuṃ yuvānam |
GV00avs___u:3668: (AVŚ_7,2.1c) ya imaṃ yajñam manasā ciketa pra ṇo vocas tam iheha bravaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3669: (AVŚ_7,3.1a) ayā viṣṭhā janayan karvarāṇi sa hi ghṛṇir urur varāya gātuḥ |
GV00avs___u:3670: (AVŚ_7,3.1c) sa pratyudaid dharuṇaṃ madhvo agraṃ svayā tanvā tanvam airayata ||1||
GV00avs___u:3671: (AVŚ_7,4.1a) ekayā ca daśabhiś ca suhute dvābhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatyā ca |
GV00avs___u:3672: (AVŚ_7,4.1c) tisṛbhiś ca vahase triṃśatā ca viyugbhir vāya iha tā vi muñca ||1||
GV00avs___u:3673: (AVŚ_7,5.1a) yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan |
GV00avs___u:3674: (AVŚ_7,5.1c) te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ
GV00avs___u:3675: (AVŚ_7,5.2a) yajño babhūva sa ā babhūva sa pra jajñe sa u vāvṛdhe punaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3676: (AVŚ_7,5.2c) sa devānām adhipatir babhūva so asmāsu draviṇam ā dadhātu
GV00avs___u:3677: (AVŚ_7,5.3a) yad devā devān haviṣā 'yajantāmartyān manasā martyena |
GV00avs___u:3678: (AVŚ_7,5.3c) madema tatra parame vyoman paśyema tad uditau sūryasya ||3||
GV00avs___u:3679: (AVŚ_7,5.4a) yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā yajñaṃ devā atanvata |
GV00avs___u:3680: (AVŚ_7,5.4c) asti nu tasmād ojīyo yad vihavyenejire ||4||
GV00avs___u:3681: (AVŚ_7,5.5a) mugdhā devā uta śunā 'yajantota gor aṅgaiḥ purudhā 'yajanta |
GV00avs___u:3682: (AVŚ_7,5.5c) ya imaṃ yajñaṃ manasā ciketa pra ṇo vocas tam iheha bravaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:3683: (AVŚ_7,6.1a) aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣam aditir mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ
GV00avs___u:3684: (AVŚ_7,6.1c) viśve devā aditir pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam
GV00avs___u:3685: (AVŚ_7,6.2a) mahīm ū ṣu mātaraṃ suvratānām ṛtasya patnīm avase havāmahe |
GV00avs___u:3686: (AVŚ_7,6.2c) tuvikṣatrām ajarantīm urūcīṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim
GV00avs___u:3687: (AVŚ_7,6.3a) sutrāmāṇaṃ pṛthivīṃ dyām anehasaṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ
GV00avs___u:3689: (AVŚ_7,6.3c) daivīṃ nāvaṃ svaritrām anāgaso asravantīm ā ruhemā svastaye ||1||
GV00avs___u:3690: (AVŚ_7,6.4a) vājasya nu prasave mātaraṃ mahīm aditiṃ nāma vacasā karāmahe
GV00avs___u:3691: (AVŚ_7,6.4c) yasyā upastha urv antarikṣaṃ sā naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ ni
GV00avs___u:3693: (AVŚ_7,7.1a) diteḥ putrāṇām aditer akāriṣam ava devānāṃ bṛhatām anarmaṇām |
GV00avs___u:3694: (AVŚ_7,7.1c) teṣāṃ hi dhāma gabhiṣak samudriyaṃ nainān namasā paro asti
GV00avs___u:3696: (AVŚ_7,8.1a) bhadrād adhi śreyaḥ prehi bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu |
GV00avs___u:3697: (AVŚ_7,8.1c) athemam asyā vara ā pṛthivyā āreśatruṃ kṛṇuhi sarvavīram ||1||
GV00avs___u:3698: (AVŚ_7,9.1a) prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:3699: (AVŚ_7,9.1c) ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan
GV00avs___u:3700: (AVŚ_7,9.2a) pūṣemā āśā anu veda sarvāḥ so asmāṃ abhayatamena neṣat |
GV00avs___u:3701: (AVŚ_7,9.2c) svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro 'prayuchan pura etu prajānan ||2||
GV00avs___u:3702: (AVŚ_7,9.3a) pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana |
GV00avs___u:3704: (AVŚ_7,9.4a) pari pūṣā parastād dhastaṃ dadhātu dakṣiṇam |
GV00avs___u:3705: (AVŚ_7,9.4c) punar no naṣṭam ājatu saṃ naṣṭena gamemahi ||4||
GV00avs___u:3706: (AVŚ_7,10.1a) yas te stanaḥ śaśayur yo mayobhūr yaḥ sumnayuḥ suhavo yaḥ sudatraḥ |
GV00avs___u:3707: (AVŚ_7,10.1c) yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvati tam iha dhātave kaḥ
GV00avs___u:3708: (AVŚ_7,11.1a) yas te pṛthu stanayitnur ya ṛṣvo daivaḥ ketur viśvam
GV00avs___u:3710: (AVŚ_7,11.1c) mā no vadhīr vidyutā deva sasyaṃ mota vadhī raśmibhiḥ
GV00avs___u:3712: (AVŚ_7,12.1a) sabhā ca mā samitiś cāvatāṃ prajāpater duhitarau saṃvidāne |
GV00avs___u:3713: (AVŚ_7,12.1c) yenā saṃgachā upa mā sa śikṣāc cāru vadāni pitaraḥ saṃgateṣu
GV00avs___u:3714: (AVŚ_7,12.2a) vidma te sabhe nāma nariṣṭā nāma vā asi |
GV00avs___u:3715: (AVŚ_7,12.2c) ye te ke ca sabhāsadas te me santu savācasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3716: (AVŚ_7,12.3a) eṣām ahaṃ samāsīnānāṃ varco vijñānam ā dade |
GV00avs___u:3717: (AVŚ_7,12.3c) asyāḥ sarvasyāḥ saṃsado mām indra bhaginaṃ kṛṇu ||3||
GV00avs___u:3718: (AVŚ_7,12.4a) yad vo manaḥ parāgataṃ yad baddham iha veha vā |
GV00avs___u:3719: (AVŚ_7,12.4c) tad va ā vartayāmasi mayi vo ramatāṃ manaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:3720: (AVŚ_7,13.1a) yathā sūryo nakṣatrāṇām udyaṃs tejāṃsy ādade |
GV00avs___u:3721: (AVŚ_7,13.1c) evā strīṇāṃ ca puṃsāṃ ca dviṣatāṃ varca ā dade ||1||
GV00avs___u:3723: (AVŚ_7,13.2c) udyant sūrya iva suptānāṃ dviṣatām varca ā dade ||2||
GV00avs___u:3724: (AVŚ_7,14.1a) abhi tyaṃ devaṃ savitāram oṇyoḥ kavikratum |
GV00avs___u:3725: (AVŚ_7,14.1c) arcāmi satyasavaṃ ratnadhām abhi priyaṃ matim ||1||
GV00avs___u:3728: (AVŚ_7,14.3a) sāvīr hi deva prathamāya pitre varṣmāṇam asmai varimāṇam asmai |
GV00avs___u:3729: (AVŚ_7,14.3c) athāsmabhyaṃ savitar vāryāṇi divodiva ā suvā bhūri paśvaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:3730: (AVŚ_7,14.4a) damūnā devaḥ savitā vareṇyo dadhad ratnaṃ pitṛbhya āyūṃṣi |
GV00avs___u:3731: (AVŚ_7,14.4c) pibāt somaṃ mamadad enam iṣṭe parijmā cit kramate asya
GV00avs___u:3733: (AVŚ_7,15.1a) tāṃ savitaḥ satyasavāṃ sucitrām āhaṃ vṛṇe sumatiṃ viśvavārām |
GV00avs___u:3734: (AVŚ_7,15.1c) yām asya kaṇvo aduhat prapīnāṃ sahasradhārāṃ mahiṣo bhagāya ||1||
GV00avs___u:3735: (AVŚ_7,16.1a) bṛhaspate savitar vardhayainaṃ jyotayainaṃ mahate saubhagāya
GV00avs___u:3736: (AVŚ_7,16.1c) saṃśitaṃ cit saṃtaraṃ saṃ śiśādhi viśva enam anu madantu
GV00avs___u:3738: (AVŚ_7,17.1a) dhātā dadhātu no rayim īśāno jagatas patiḥ |
GV00avs___u:3740: (AVŚ_7,17.2a) dhātā dadhātu dāśuṣe prācīṃ jīvātum akṣitām |
GV00avs___u:3742: (AVŚ_7,17.3a) dhātā viśvā vāryā dadhātu prajākāmāya dāśuṣe duroṇe |
GV00avs___u:3743: (AVŚ_7,17.3c) tasmai devā amṛtaṃ saṃ vyayantu viśve devā aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ
GV00avs___u:3744: (AVŚ_7,17.4a) dhātā rātiḥ savitedaṃ juṣantāṃ prajāpatir nidhipatir no agniḥ |
GV00avs___u:3745: (AVŚ_7,17.4c) tvaṣṭā viṣṇuḥ prajayā saṃrarāṇo yajamānāya draviṇaṃ dadhātu
GV00avs___u:3746: (AVŚ_7,18.1a) pra nabhasva pṛthivi bhinddhīdaṃ divyaṃ nabhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3747: (AVŚ_7,18.1c) udno divyasya no dhātar īśāno vi ṣyā dṛtim ||1||
GV00avs___u:3748: (AVŚ_7,18.2a) na ghraṃs tatāpa na himo jaghāna pra nabhatāṃ pṛthivī
GV00avs___u:3750: (AVŚ_7,18.2c) āpaś cid asmai ghṛtam it kṣaranti yatra somaḥ sadam it tatra bhadram ||2||
GV00avs___u:3751: (AVŚ_7,19.1a) prajāpatir janayati prajā imā dhātā dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3752: (AVŚ_7,19.1c) saṃjānānāḥ saṃmanasaḥ sayonayo mayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir
GV00avs___u:3754: (AVŚ_7,20.1a) anv adya no 'numatir yajñaṃ deveṣu manyatām |
GV00avs___u:3755: (AVŚ_7,20.1c) agniś ca havyavāhano bhavatāṃ dāśuṣe mama ||1||
GV00avs___u:3756: (AVŚ_7,20.2a) anv id anumate tvaṃ maṃsase śaṃ ca nas kṛdhi |
GV00avs___u:3757: (AVŚ_7,20.2c) juṣasva havyam āhutaṃ prajāṃ devi rarāsva naḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3758: (AVŚ_7,20.3a) anu manyatām anumanyamānaḥ prajāvantaṃ rayim akṣīyamāṇam |
GV00avs___u:3759: (AVŚ_7,20.3c) tasya vayaṃ heḍasi māpi bhūma sumṛḍīke asya sumatau syāma
GV00avs___u:3760: (AVŚ_7,20.4a) yat te nāma suhavaṃ supraṇīte 'numate anumataṃ sudānu |
GV00avs___u:3761: (AVŚ_7,20.4c) tenā no yajñaṃ pipṛhi viśvavāre rayiṃ no dhehi subhage
GV00avs___u:3763: (AVŚ_7,20.5a) emaṃ yajñam anumatir jagāma sukṣetratāyai suvīratāyai
GV00avs___u:3765: (AVŚ_7,20.5c) bhadrā hy asyāḥ pramatir babhūva semam yajñam avatu devagopā
GV00avs___u:3766: (AVŚ_7,20.6a) anumatiḥ sarvam idaṃ babhūva yat tiṣṭhati carati yad u ca viśvam ejati |
GV00avs___u:3767: (AVŚ_7,20.6c) tasyās te devi sumatau syāmānumate anu hi maṃsase naḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:3768: (AVŚ_7,21.1a) sameta viśve vacasā patiṃ diva eko vibhūr atithir janānām |
GV00avs___u:3769: (AVŚ_7,21.1c) sa pūrvyo nūtanam āvivāsat taṃ vartanir anu vāvṛta ekam it puru ||1||
GV00avs___u:3770: (AVŚ_7,22.1a) ayaṃ sahasram ā no dṛśe kavīnāṃ matir jyotir vidharmaṇi
GV00avs___u:3772: (AVŚ_7,22.2c) arepasaḥ sacetasaḥ svasare manyumattamāś cite goḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3774: (AVŚ_7,23.1c) durṇāmnīḥ sarvā durvācas tā asman nāśayāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:3775: (AVŚ_7,24.1a) yan na indro akhanad yad agnir viśve devā maruto yat svarkāḥ |
GV00avs___u:3776: (AVŚ_7,24.1c) tad asmabhyaṃ savitā satyadharmā prajāpatir anumatir ni yachāt ||1||
GV00avs___u:3777: (AVŚ_7,25.1a) yayor ojasā skabhitā rajāṃsi yau vīryair vīratamā śaviṣṭhā |
GV00avs___u:3778: (AVŚ_7,25.1c) yau patyete apratītau sahobhir viṣṇum agan varuṇaṃ pūrvahūtiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3779: (AVŚ_7,25.2a) yasyedaṃ pradiśi yad virocate pra cānati vi ca caṣṭe
GV00avs___u:3781: (AVŚ_7,25.2c) purā devasya dharmaṇā sahobhir viṣṇum agan varuṇaṃ pūrvahūtiḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:3782: (AVŚ_7,26.1a) viṣṇor nu kaṃ prā vocaṃ vīryāṇi yaḥ pārthivāni vimame
GV00avs___u:3784: (AVŚ_7,26.1c) yo askabhāyad uttaraṃ sadhasthaṃ vicakramāṇas tredhorugāyaḥ
GV00avs___u:3785: (AVŚ_7,26.2a) pra tad viṣṇu stavate vīryāṇi mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro
GV00avs___u:3788: (AVŚ_7,26.3a) yasyoruṣu triṣu vikramaneṣv adhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV00avs___u:3789: (AVŚ_7,26.3c) uru viṣṇo vi kramasvoru kṣayāya nas kṛdhi |
GV00avs___u:3790: (AVŚ_7,26.3e) ghṛtam ghṛtayone piba prapra yajñapatiṃ tira ||3||
GV00avs___u:3791: (AVŚ_7,26.4a) idaṃ viṣṇur vi cakrame tredhā ni dadhe padā |
GV00avs___u:3793: (AVŚ_7,26.5a) trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇur gopā adābhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3795: (AVŚ_7,26.6a) viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yato vratāni paspaśe |
GV00avs___u:3797: (AVŚ_7,26.7a) tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3799: (AVŚ_7,26.8a) divo viṣṇa uta pṛthivyā maho viṣṇa uror antarikṣāt |
GV00avs___u:3800: (AVŚ_7,26.8c) hastau pṛṇasva bahubhir vasavyair āprayacha dakṣiṇād ota savyāt ||8||
GV00avs___u:3801: (AVŚ_7,27.1a) iḍaivāsmāṃ anu vastāṃ vratena yasyāḥ pade punate devayantaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3802: (AVŚ_7,27.1c) ghṛtapadī śakvarī somapṛṣṭhopa yajñam asthita vaiśvadevī
GV00avs___u:3803: (AVŚ_7,28.1a) vedaḥ svastir drughaṇaḥ svastiḥ paraśur vediḥ paraśur naḥ svasti |
GV00avs___u:3804: (AVŚ_7,28.1c) haviṣkṛto yajñiyā yajñakāmās te devāso yajñam imaṃ juṣantām ||1||
GV00avs___u:3805: (AVŚ_7,29.1a) agnāviṣṇū mahi tad vāṃ mahitvam pātho ghṛtasya guhyasya nāma
GV00avs___u:3806: (AVŚ_7,29.1c) damedame sapta ratnā dadhānau prati vāṃ jihvā ghṛtam ā
GV00avs___u:3808: (AVŚ_7,29.2a) agnāviṣṇū mahi dhāma priyam vāṃ vītho ghṛtasya guhyā juṣāṇau
GV00avs___u:3809: (AVŚ_7,29.2c) damedame suṣṭutyā vāvṛdhānau prati vāṃ jihvā ghṛtam uc caraṇyāt ||2||
GV00avs___u:3810: (AVŚ_7,30.1a) svāktaṃ me dyāvāpṛthivī svāktaṃ mitro akar ayam |
GV00avs___u:3811: (AVŚ_7,30.1c) svāktaṃ me brahmaṇas patiḥ svāktaṃ savitā karat ||1||
GV00avs___u:3812: (AVŚ_7,31.1a) indrotibhir bahulābhir no adya yāvacchreṣṭhābhir maghavan
GV00avs___u:3814: (AVŚ_7,31.1c) yo no dveṣṭy adhara sas padīṣṭa yam u dviṣmas tam u prāṇo
GV00avs___u:3817: (AVŚ_7,32.1c) aganma bibhrato namo dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu me ||1||
GV00avs___u:3818: (AVŚ_7,33.1a) saṃ mā siñcantu marutaḥ saṃ pūṣā saṃ bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:3819: (AVŚ_7,33.1c) saṃ māyam agniḥ siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu me ||1||
GV00avs___u:3820: (AVŚ_7,34.1a) agne jātān pra ṇudā me sapatnān praty ajātān jātavedo
GV00avs___u:3822: (AVŚ_7,34.1c) adhaspadaṃ kṛṇuṣva ye pṛtanyavo 'nāgasas te vayam aditaye
GV00avs___u:3824: (AVŚ_7,35.1a) prānyānt sapatnānt sahasā sahasva praty ajātān jātavedo nudasva |
GV00avs___u:3825: (AVŚ_7,35.1c) idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pipṛhi saubhagāya viśva enam anu madantu devāḥ
GV00avs___u:3826: (AVŚ_7,35.2a) imā yās te śataṃ hirāḥ sahasraṃ dhamanīr uta |
GV00avs___u:3827: (AVŚ_7,35.2c) tāsāṃ te sarvāsām aham aśmanā bilam apy adhām ||2||
GV00avs___u:3828: (AVŚ_7,35.3a) paraṃ yoner avaraṃ te kṛṇomi mā tvā prajābhi bhūn mota sūtuḥ |
GV00avs___u:3829: (AVŚ_7,35.3c) asvaṃ tvāprajasaṃ kṛṇomy aśmānaṃ te apidhānam kṛṇomi ||3||
GV00avs___u:3830: (AVŚ_7,36.1a) akṣyau nau madhusaṃkāśe anīkam nau samañjanam |
GV00avs___u:3831: (AVŚ_7,36.1c) antaḥ kṛṣṇuṣva māṃ hṛdi mana in nau sahāsati ||1||
GV00avs___u:3832: (AVŚ_7,37.1a) abhi tvā manujātena dadhāmi mama vāsasā |
GV00avs___u:3833: (AVŚ_7,37.1c) yāthā 'so mama kevalo nānyāsāṃ kīrtayāś cana ||1||
GV00avs___u:3837: (AVŚ_7,38.2c) tenā ni kurve tvām ahaṃ yathā te 'sāni supriyā ||2||
GV00avs___u:3838: (AVŚ_7,38.3a) pratīcī somam asi pratīcī uta sūryam |
GV00avs___u:3840: (AVŚ_7,38.4a) ahaṃ vadāmi net tvaṃ sabhāyām aha tvaṃ vada |
GV00avs___u:3841: (AVŚ_7,38.4c) mamed asas tvaṃ kevalo nānyāsāṃ kīrtayāś cana ||4||
GV00avs___u:3842: (AVŚ_7,38.5a) yadi vāsi tirojanaṃ yadi vā nadyas tiraḥi |
GV00avs___u:3843: (AVŚ_7,38.5c) iyaṃ ha mahyaṃ tvām oṣadhir baddhveva nyānayat ||5||
GV00avs___u:3844: (AVŚ_7,39.1a) divyaṃ suparṇaṃ payasaṃ bṛhantam apāṃ garbhaṃ vṛṣabham oṣadhīnām |
GV00avs___u:3845: (AVŚ_7,39.1c) abhīpato vṛṣṭyā tarpayantam ā no goṣṭhe rayiṣṭhāṃ sthāpayāti ||1||
GV00avs___u:3846: (AVŚ_7,40.1a) yasya vrataṃ paśavo yanti sarve yasya vrata upatiṣṭhanta āpaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3847: (AVŚ_7,40.1c) yasya vrate puṣṭapatir niviṣṭas taṃ sarasvantam avase havāmahe ||1||
GV00avs___u:3848: (AVŚ_7,40.2a) ā pratyañcaṃ dāśuṣe dāśvaṃsaṃ sarasvantaṃ puṣṭapatiṃ
GV00avs___u:3850: (AVŚ_7,40.2c) rāyas poṣaṃ śravasyuṃ vasānā iha sadanaṃ rayīṇām ||2||
GV00avs___u:3851: (AVŚ_7,41.1a) ati dhanvāny aty apas tatarda śyeno nṛcakṣā avasānadarśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3852: (AVŚ_7,41.1c) taran viśvāny avarā rajaṃsīndreṇa sakhyā śiva ā jagamyāt ||1||
GV00avs___u:3853: (AVŚ_7,41.2a) śyeno nṛcakṣā divyaḥ suparṇaḥ sahasrapāc chatayonir vayodhāḥ
GV00avs___u:3854: (AVŚ_7,41.2c) sa no ni yachād vasu yat parābhṛtam asmākam astu pitṛṣu svadhāvat ||2||
GV00avs___u:3855: (AVŚ_7,42.1a) somārudrā vi vṛhataṃ viṣūcīm amīvā yā no gayam āviveśa |
GV00avs___u:3856: (AVŚ_7,42.1c) bādhethāṃ dūraṃ nirṛtim parācaiḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ pra mumuktam
GV00avs___u:3858: (AVŚ_7,42.2a) somārudrā yuvam etāny asmad viśvā tanūṣu bheṣajāni dhattam |
GV00avs___u:3859: (AVŚ_7,42.2c) ava syataṃ muñcataṃ yan no asat tanūṣu baddhaṃ kṛtam eno asmat ||2||
GV00avs___u:3860: (AVŚ_7,43.1a) śivās ta ekā aśivās ta ekāḥ sarvā bibharṣi sumanasyamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3861: (AVŚ_7,43.1c) tisro vāco nihitā antar asmin tāsām ekā vi papātānu ghoṣam
GV00avs___u:3862: (AVŚ_7,44.1a) ubhā jigyathur na parā jayethe na parā jigye kataraś
GV00avs___u:3864: (AVŚ_7,44.1c) indraś ca viṣṇo yad apaspṛdhethāṃ tredhā sahasraṃ vi tad
GV00avs___u:3867: (AVŚ_7,45.1c) dūrāt tvā manya udbhṛtam īrṣyāyā nāma bheṣajam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3868: (AVŚ_7,45.2a) agner ivāsya dahato dāvasya dahataḥ pṛthak |
GV00avs___u:3870: (AVŚ_7,46.1a) sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā |
GV00avs___u:3871: (AVŚ_7,46.1c) juṣasva havyam āhutaṃ prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3874: (AVŚ_7,46.3a) yā viśpatnīndram asi pratīcī sahasrastukābhiyantī devī |
GV00avs___u:3875: (AVŚ_7,46.3c) viṣṇoḥ patni tubhyaṃ rātā havīṃṣi patiṃ devi rādhase codayasva ||3||
GV00avs___u:3876: (AVŚ_7,47.1a) kuhūṃ devīṃ sukṛtaṃ vidmanāpasam asmin yajñe suhavā johavīmi |
GV00avs___u:3877: (AVŚ_7,47.1c) sā no rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ ni yachād dadātu vīram śatadāyam
GV00avs___u:3879: (AVŚ_7,47.2a) kuhūr devānām amṛtasya patnī havyā no asya haviṣo juṣeta |
GV00avs___u:3880: (AVŚ_7,47.2c) śṛnotu yajñam uśatī no adya rāyas poṣaṃ cikituṣī dadhātu
GV00avs___u:3881: (AVŚ_7,48.1a) rākām ahaṃ suhavā suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu
GV00avs___u:3883: (AVŚ_7,48.1c) sīvyatv apaḥ sūcyāchidyamānayā dadātu vīraṃ śatadāyam
GV00avs___u:3885: (AVŚ_7,48.2a) yās te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśaso yābhir dadāsi dāśuṣe vasūni |
GV00avs___u:3886: (AVŚ_7,48.2c) tābhir no adya sumanā upāgahi sahasrāpoṣam subhage rarāṇā ||2||
GV00avs___u:3887: (AVŚ_7,49.1a) devānāṃ patnīr uśatīr avantu naḥ prāvantu nas tujaye vājasātaye |
GV00avs___u:3888: (AVŚ_7,49.1c) yāḥ pārthivāso yā apām api vrate tā no devīḥ suhavāḥ śarma yachantu ||1||
GV00avs___u:3889: (AVŚ_7,49.2a) uta gnā vyantu devapatnīr indrāṇy agnāyy aśvinī rāṭ |
GV00avs___u:3890: (AVŚ_7,49.2c) ā rodasī varunānī śṛṇotu vyantu devīr ya ṛtur janīnām ||2||
GV00avs___u:3891: (AVŚ_7,50.1a) yathā vṛkṣam aśanir viśvāhā hanty aprati |
GV00avs___u:3892: (AVŚ_7,50.1c) evāham adya kitavān akṣair badhyāsam aprati ||1||
GV00avs___u:3894: (AVŚ_7,50.2c) samaitu viśvato bhago antarhastaṃ kṛtaṃ mama ||2||
GV00avs___u:3895: (AVŚ_7,50.3a) īḍe agniṃ svāvasuṃ namobhir iha prasakto vi cayat kṛtaṃ naḥ
GV00avs___u:3896: (AVŚ_7,50.3c) rathair iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ marutāṃ stomam ṛdhyām ||3||
GV00avs___u:3897: (AVŚ_7,50.4a) vayaṃ jayema tvayā yujā vṛtam asmākam aṃśam ud ava
GV00avs___u:3899: (AVŚ_7,50.4c) asmabhyam indra varīyaḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi pra śatrūṇāṃ maghavan vṛṣṇyā ruja ||4||
GV00avs___u:3900: (AVŚ_7,50.5a) ajaiṣaṃ tvā saṃlikhitam ajaiṣam uta saṃrudham |
GV00avs___u:3901: (AVŚ_7,50.5c) aviṃ vṛko yathā mathad evā mathnāmi te kṛtam ||5||
GV00avs___u:3902: (AVŚ_7,50.6a) uta prahām atidīvā jayati kṛtam iva śvaghnī vi cinoti kāle |
GV00avs___u:3903: (AVŚ_7,50.6c) yo devakāmo na dhanam ruṇaddhi sam it taṃ rāyaḥ sṛjati svadhābhiḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:3904: (AVŚ_7,50.7a) gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena vā kṣudhaṃ puruhūta viśve |
GV00avs___u:3905: (AVŚ_7,50.7c) vayaṃ rājasu prathamā dhanāny ariṣṭāso vṛjanībhir jayema
GV00avs___u:3906: (AVŚ_7,50.8a) kṛtaṃ me dakṣiṇe haste jayo me savya āhitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3908: (AVŚ_7,50.9a) akṣāḥ phalavatīm dyuvaṃ datta gāṃ kṣīriṇīm iva |
GV00avs___u:3909: (AVŚ_7,50.9c) saṃ mā kṛtasya dhārayā dhanuḥ snāvneva nahyata ||9||
GV00avs___u:3910: (AVŚ_7,51.1a) bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghayoḥ |
GV00avs___u:3911: (AVŚ_7,51.1c) indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varīyaḥ kṛṇotu ||1||
GV00avs___u:3913: (AVŚ_7,52.1c) saṃjñānam aśvinā yuvam ihāsmāsu ni yachatam ||1||
GV00avs___u:3914: (AVŚ_7,52.2a) saṃ jānāmahai manasā saṃ cikitvā mā yuṣmahi manasā daivyena
GV00avs___u:3915: (AVŚ_7,52.2c) mā ghoṣā ut sthur bahule vinirhate meṣuḥ paptad indrasyāhany
GV00avs___u:3917: (AVŚ_7,53.1a) amutrabhūyād adhi yad yamasya bṛhaspate abhiśaster amuñcaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3918: (AVŚ_7,53.1c) praty auhatām aśvinā mṛtyum asmad devānām agne bhiṣajā śacībhiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3919: (AVŚ_7,53.2a) saṃ krāmataṃ mā jahītaṃ śarīraṃ prāṇāpānau te sayujāv iha
GV00avs___u:3921: (AVŚ_7,53.2c) śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamāno 'gniṣ ṭe gopā adhipā vasiṣṭhaḥ
GV00avs___u:3922: (AVŚ_7,53.3a) āyur yat te atihitaṃ parācair apānaḥ prāṇaḥ punar ā tāv itām |
GV00avs___u:3923: (AVŚ_7,53.3c) agniṣ ṭad āhār nirṛter upasthāt tad ātmani punar ā veśayāmi te ||3||
GV00avs___u:3924: (AVŚ_7,53.4a) memaṃ prāṇo hāsīn mo apāno 'vahāya parā gāt |
GV00avs___u:3925: (AVŚ_7,53.4c) saptarṣibhya enaṃ pari dadāmi te enaṃ svasti jarase vahantu
GV00avs___u:3926: (AVŚ_7,53.5a) pra viṣataṃ prāṇāpānāv anaḍvāhāv iva vrajam |
GV00avs___u:3927: (AVŚ_7,53.5c) ayaṃ jarimnaḥ śevadhir ariṣṭa iha vardhatām ||5||
GV00avs___u:3928: (AVŚ_7,53.6a) ā te prāṇaṃ suvāmasi parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te |
GV00avs___u:3929: (AVŚ_7,53.6c) āyur no viśvato dadhad ayam agnir vareṇyaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:3930: (AVŚ_7,53.7a) ud vayaṃ tamasas pari rohanto nākam uttamam |
GV00avs___u:3931: (AVŚ_7,53.7c) devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam ||7||
GV00avs___u:3932: (AVŚ_7,54.1a) ṛcaṃ sāma yajāmahe yābhyāṃ karmāṇi kurvate |
GV00avs___u:3933: (AVŚ_7,54.1c) ete sadasi rājato yajñaṃ deveṣu yachataḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:3934: (AVŚ_7,54.2a) ṛcaṃ sāma yad aprākṣaṃ havir ojo yajur balam |
GV00avs___u:3935: (AVŚ_7,54.2c) eṣa mā tasmān mā hiṃsīd vedaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ śacīpate ||1||
GV00avs___u:3936: (AVŚ_7,55.1a) ye te panthāno 'va divo yebhir viśvam airayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3939: (AVŚ_7,56.1c) tat kaṅkaparvaṇo viṣam iyaṃ vīrud anīnaśat ||1||
GV00avs___u:3940: (AVŚ_7,56.2a) iyaṃ vīrun madhujātā madhuścun madhulā madhūḥ |
GV00avs___u:3942: (AVŚ_7,56.3a) yato daṣṭaṃ yato dhītaṃ tatas te nir hvayāmasi |
GV00avs___u:3944: (AVŚ_7,56.4a) ayaṃ yo vakro viparur vyaṅgo mukhāni vakrā vṛjinā kṛṇoṣi |
GV00avs___u:3945: (AVŚ_7,56.4c) tāni tvaṃ brahmaṇas pate iṣīkām iva saṃ namaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:3947: (AVŚ_7,56.5c) viṣaṃ hy asyādiṣy atho enam ajījabham ||5||
GV00avs___u:3948: (AVŚ_7,56.6a) na te bāhvor balam asti na śīrṣe nota madhyataḥ |
GV00avs___u:3949: (AVŚ_7,56.6c) atha kiṃ pāpayā 'muyā puche bibharṣy arbhakam ||6||
GV00avs___u:3950: (AVŚ_7,56.7a) adanti tvā pipīlikā vi vṛścanti mayūryaḥ |
GV00avs___u:3951: (AVŚ_7,56.7c) sarve bhala bravātha śārkoṭam arasaṃ viṣam ||7||
GV00avs___u:3952: (AVŚ_7,56.8a) ya ubhābhyāṃ praharasi puchena cāsyena ca |
GV00avs___u:3953: (AVŚ_7,56.8c) āsye na te viṣaṃ kim u te puchadhāv asat ||8||
GV00avs___u:3954: (AVŚ_7,57.1a) yad āśasā vadato me vicukṣubhe yad yācamānasya carato janāṃ
GV00avs___u:3956: (AVŚ_7,57.1c) yad ātmani tanvo me viriṣṭaṃ sarasvatī tad ā pṛṇad ghṛtena
GV00avs___u:3957: (AVŚ_7,57.2a) sapta kṣaranti siśave marutvate pitre putrāso apy avīvṛtann ṛtāni |
GV00avs___u:3958: (AVŚ_7,57.2c) ubhe id asyobhe asya rājata ubhe yatete ubhe asya puṣyataḥ
GV00avs___u:3959: (AVŚ_7,58.1a) indrāvaruṇā sutapāv imaṃ sutaṃ somaṃ pibataṃ madyaṃ dhṛtavratau |

GV00avs___u:4031: (AVŚ_7,73.1a) samiddho agnir vṛṣaṇā rathī divas tapto gharmo duhyate vām
GV00avs___u:4033: (AVŚ_7,73.1c) vayaṃ hi vāṃ purudamāso aśvinā havāmahe sadhamādeṣu kāravaḥ ||1||

GV00avs___u:4035: (AVŚ_7,73.2c) duhyante nūnaṃ vṛṣaṇeha dhenavo dasrā madanti vedhasaḥ ||2||

GV00avs___u:4037: (AVŚ_7,73.3c) tam u viśve amṛtāso juṣāṇā gandharvasya praty āsnā rihanti
GV00avs___u:4038: (AVŚ_7,73.4a) yad usriyāsv āhutaṃ ghṛtaṃ payo 'yaṃ sa vām aśvinā bhāga ā gatam |
GV00avs___u:4039: (AVŚ_7,73.4c) mādhvī dhartārā vidathasya satpatī taptaṃ gharmaṃ pibatam divaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:4040: (AVŚ_7,73.5a) tapto vāṃ gharmo nakṣatu svahotā pra vām adhvaryuś caratu
GV00avs___u:4042: (AVŚ_7,73.5c) madhor dugdhasyāśvinā tanāyā vītaṃ pātaṃ payasa usriyāyāḥ
GV00avs___u:4043: (AVŚ_7,73.6a) upa drava payasā godhug oṣam ā gharme siñca paya usriyāyāḥ |

GV00avs___u:4083: (AVŚ_7,77.2c) druhaḥ pāśān prati muñcatāṃ sas tapiṣṭhena tapasā hantanā tam ||2||

GV00avs___u:4091: (AVŚ_7,79.1c) tenā no yajñaṃ pipṛhi viśvavāre rayiṃ no dhehi subhage
GV00avs___u:4093: (AVŚ_7,79.2a) aham evāsmy amāvāsyā mām ā vasanti sukṛto mayīme |
GV00avs___u:4094: (AVŚ_7,79.2c) mayi devā ubhaye sādyāś cendrajyeṣṭhāḥ sam agachanta sarve ||2||
GV00avs___u:4095: (AVŚ_7,79.3a) āgan rātrī saṅgamanī vasūnām ūrjaṃ puṣṭaṃ vasv āveśayantī |
GV00avs___u:4096: (AVŚ_7,79.3c) amāvāsyāyai haviṣa vidhemorjaṃ duhānā payasā na āgan ||3||

GV00avs___u:4100: (AVŚ_7,80.1c) tasyāṃ devaiḥ saṃvasanto mahitvā nākasya pṛṣṭhe sam iṣā madema ||1||
GV00avs___u:4102: (AVŚ_7,80.2c) sa no dadātv akṣitāṃ rayim anupadasvatīm ||2||
GV00avs___u:4103: (AVŚ_7,80.3a) prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā rūpāṇi paribhūr jajāna |

GV00avs___u:4106: (AVŚ_7,80.4c) ye tvām yajñair yajñiye ardhayanty amī te nāke sukṛtaḥ
GV00avs___u:4108: (AVŚ_7,81.1a) pūrvāparaṃ carato mayayaitau śiśū krīḍantau pari yāto
GV00avs___u:4110: (AVŚ_7,81.1c) viśvānyo bhuvanā vicaṣṭa ṛtūṃr anyo vidadhaj jāyase navaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:4111: (AVŚ_7,81.2a) navonavo bhavasi jāyamāno 'hnāṃ ketur uṣasām eṣy agram |
GV00avs___u:4112: (AVŚ_7,81.2c) bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhāsy āyan pra candramas tirase dhīrgham āyuḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:4113: (AVŚ_7,81.3a) somasyāmśo yudhāṃ pate 'nūno nāma vā asi |
GV00avs___u:4114: (AVŚ_7,81.3c) anūnam darśa mā kṛdhi prajayā ca dhanena ca ||3||
GV00avs___u:4116: (AVŚ_7,81.4c) samagraḥ samanto bhūyāsaṃ gobhir aśvaiḥ prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena ||4||
GV00avs___u:4117: (AVŚ_7,81.5a) yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya tvaṃ prāṇenā pyāyasva |
GV00avs___u:4118: (AVŚ_7,81.5c) ā vayaṃ pyāsiṣīmahi gobhir aśvaiḥ prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena ||5||
GV00avs___u:4119: (AVŚ_7,81.6a) yaṃ devā aṃśum āpyāyayanti yam akṣitam akṣitā bhakṣayanti |
GV00avs___u:4120: (AVŚ_7,81.6c) tenāsmān indro varuṇo bṛhaspatir ā pyāyayantu bhuvanasya gopāḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:4121: (AVŚ_7,82.1a) abhy arcata suṣṭutiṃ gavyam ājim asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta |
GV00avs___u:4122: (AVŚ_7,82.1c) imaṃ yajñaṃ nayata devatā no ghṛtasya dhārā madhumat pavantām ||1||
GV00avs___u:4123: (AVŚ_7,82.2a) mayy agre agniṃ gṛhṇāmi saha kṣatreṇa varcasā balena |
GV00avs___u:4124: (AVŚ_7,82.2c) mayi prajāṃ mayy āyur dadhāmi svāhā mayy agnim ||2||
GV00avs___u:4125: (AVŚ_7,82.3a) ihaivāgne adhy dhārayā rayim mā tvā ni kran pūrvacittā
GV00avs___u:4127: (AVŚ_7,82.3c) kṣatreṇāgne suyamam astu tubhyam upasattā vardhatāṃ te aniṣṭṛtaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:4128: (AVŚ_7,82.4a) anv agnir uṣasām agram akhyad anv ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4129: (AVŚ_7,82.4c) anu sūrya uṣaso anu raśmīn anu dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa ||4||
GV00avs___u:4130: (AVŚ_7,82.5a) praty agnir uṣasām agram akhyat prati ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4131: (AVŚ_7,82.5c) prati sūryasya purudhā ca raśmīn prati dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatāna
GV00avs___u:4132: (AVŚ_7,82.6a) ghṛtaṃ te agne divye sadhasthe ghṛtena tvāṃ manur adyā sam indhe |
GV00avs___u:4133: (AVŚ_7,82.6c) ghṛtaṃ te devīr naptya ā vahantu ghṛtaṃ tubhyaṃ duhratāṃ
GV00avs___u:4135: (AVŚ_7,83.1a) apsu te rājan varuṇa gṛho hiraṇyayo mitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4136: (AVŚ_7,83.1c) tato dhṛtavrato rājā sarvā dhāmāni muñcatu ||1||
GV00avs___u:4137: (AVŚ_7,83.2a) dāmnodāmno rājann ito varuṇa muñca naḥ |
GV00avs___u:4138: (AVŚ_7,83.2c) yad āpo aghnyā iti varuṇeti yad ūcima tato varuṇa muñca naḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:4139: (AVŚ_7,83.3a) ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya |

GV00avs___u:4197: (AVŚ_7,97.4a) sugā vo devāḥ sadanā akarma ya ājagma savane mā juṣāṇāḥ |

GV00avs___u:4229: (AVŚ_7,108.1a) yo na stāyad dipsati yo na āviḥ svo vidvān araṇo vā no agne
GV00avs___u:4230: (AVŚ_7,108.1c) pratīcy etv araṇī datvatī tān maiṣām agne vāstu bhūn mo apatyam ||1||
GV00avs___u:4231: (AVŚ_7,108.2a) yo naḥ suptān jāgrato vābhidāsāt tiṣṭhato vā carato jātavedaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4232: (AVŚ_7,108.2c) vaiśvānareṇa sayujā sajoṣās tān pratīco nir daha jātavedaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:4233: (AVŚ_7,109.1a) idam ugrāya babhrave namo yo akṣeṣu tanūvaśī |
GV00avs___u:4234: (AVŚ_7,109.1c) ghṛtena kaliṃ śikṣāmi sa no mṛḍātīdṛśe ||1||
GV00avs___u:4235: (AVŚ_7,109.2a) ghṛtam apsarābhyo vaha tvam agne pāṃsūn akṣebhyaḥ sikatā apaś ca |
GV00avs___u:4236: (AVŚ_7,109.2c) yathābhagaṃ havyadātiṃ juṣāṇā madanti devā ubhayāni havyā
GV00avs___u:4237: (AVŚ_7,109.3a) apsarasaḥ sadhamādaṃ madanti havirdhānam antarā sūryaṃ ca |
GV00avs___u:4238: (AVŚ_7,109.3c) tā me hastau saṃ sṛjantu ghṛtena sapatnaṃ me kitavam
GV00avs___u:4241: (AVŚ_7,109.4c) vṛkṣam ivāśanyā jahi yo asmān pratidīvyati ||4||

GV00avs___u:4246: (AVŚ_7,109.7a) devān yan nāthito huve brahmacaryaṃ yad ūṣima |

GV00avs___u:4261: (AVŚ_7,113.1a) tṛṣṭike tṛṣṭavandana ud amūṃ chindhi tṛṣṭike |
GV00avs___u:4265: (AVŚ_7,114.1a) ā te dade vakṣaṇābhya ā te 'haṃ hṛdayād dade |
GV00avs___u:4266: (AVŚ_7,114.1c) ā te mukhasya saṅkāśāt sarvaṃ te varca ā dade ||1||
GV00avs___u:4267: (AVŚ_7,114.2a) preto yantu vyādhyaḥ prānudhyāḥ pro aśastayaḥ |

GV00avs___u:4272: (AVŚ_7,115.2c) anyatrāsmat savitas tām ito dhā hiraṇyahasto vasu no rarāṇaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:4273: (AVŚ_7,115.3a) ekaśataṃ lakṣmyo martyasya sākaṃ tanvā januṣo 'dhi jātāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4274: (AVŚ_7,115.3c) tāsāṃ pāpiṣṭhā nir itaḥ pra hiṇmaḥ śivā asmabhyaṃ jātavedo
GV00avs___u:4276: (AVŚ_7,115.4a) etā enā vyākaraṃ khile gā viṣṭhitā iva |
GV00avs___u:4277: (AVŚ_7,115.4c) ramantāṃ puṇyā lakṣmīr yāḥ pāpīs tā anīnaśam ||4||
GV00avs___u:4282: (AVŚ_7,117.1a) ā mandrair indra haribhir yāhi mayūraromabhiḥ |
