GV00avs___u:4286: (AVŚ_8,1.1a) antakāya mṛtyave namaḥ prānā apānā iha te ramantām |
GV00avs___u:4287: (AVŚ_8,1.1c) ihāyam astu puruṣaḥ sahāsunā sūryasya bhāge amṛtasya loke ||1||
GV00avs___u:4288: (AVŚ_8,1.2a) ud enaṃ bhago agrabhīd ud enaṃ somo aṃśumān |
GV00avs___u:4289: (AVŚ_8,1.2c) ud enaṃ maruto devā ud indrāgnī svastaye ||2||
GV00avs___u:4290: (AVŚ_8,1.3a) iha te 'sur iha prāṇa ihāyur iha te manaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4291: (AVŚ_8,1.3c) ut tvā nirṛtyāḥ pāśebhyo daivyā vacā bharāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:4292: (AVŚ_8,1.4a) ut krāmātaḥ puruṣa māva patthā mṛtyoḥ paḍvīṣam avamuñcamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4293: (AVŚ_8,1.4c) mā chitthā asmāl lokād agneḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:4294: (AVŚ_8,1.5a) tubhyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ mātariśvā tubhyaṃ varṣantv amṛtāny āpaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4295: (AVŚ_8,1.5c) sūryas te tanve śaṃ tapāti tvām mṛtyur dayatāṃ mā pra meṣṭhāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:4296: (AVŚ_8,1.6a) udyānaṃ te puruṣa nāvayānaṃ jīvātuṃ te dakṣatātiṃ kṛnomi |
GV00avs___u:4297: (AVŚ_8,1.6c) ā hi rohemam amṛtaṃ sukhaṃ ratham atha jirvir vidatham ā vadāsi ||6||
GV00avs___u:4298: (AVŚ_8,1.7a) mā te manas tatra gān mā tiro bhūn mā jīvebhyaḥ pra mado mānu gāḥ pitṝn |
GV00avs___u:4300: (AVŚ_8,1.8a) mā gatānām ā dīdhīthā ye nayanti parāvatam |
GV00avs___u:4301: (AVŚ_8,1.8c) ā roha tamaso jyotir ehy ā te hastau rabhāmahe ||8||
GV00avs___u:4302: (AVŚ_8,1.9a) śyāmaś ca tvā mā śabalaś ca preṣitau yamasya yau pathirakṣī śvānau |
GV00avs___u:4303: (AVŚ_8,1.9c) arvāṅ ehi mā vi dīdhyo mātra tiṣṭhaḥ parāṅmanāḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:4304: (AVŚ_8,1.10a) maitaṃ panthām anu gā bhīma eṣa yena pūrvaṃ neyatha taṃ bravīmi |
GV00avs___u:4305: (AVŚ_8,1.10c) tama etat puruṣa mā pra patthā bhayaṃ parastād abhayaṃ te arvāk ||10|| {1}
GV00avs___u:4306: (AVŚ_8,1.11a) rakṣantu tvāgnayo ye apsv antā rakṣatu tvā manuṣyā yam
GV00avs___u:4308: (AVŚ_8,1.11c) vaiśvānaro rakṣatu jātavedā divyas tvā mā pra dhāg vidyutā
GV00avs___u:4310: (AVŚ_8,1.12a) mā tvā kravyād abhi maṃstārāt saṃkasukāc cara rakṣatu tvā
GV00avs___u:4312: (AVŚ_8,1.12c) pṛthivī sūryaś ca tvā rakṣatāṃ candramāś ca |
GV00avs___u:4314: (AVŚ_8,1.13a) bodhaś ca tvā pratibodhaś ca rakṣatām asvapnaś ca tvānavadrāṇaś ca rakṣatām
GV00avs___u:4315: (AVŚ_8,1.13c) gopāyaṃś ca tvā jāgṛviś ca rakṣatām ||13||
GV00avs___u:4316: (AVŚ_8,1.14a) te tvā rakṣantu te tvā gopāyantu tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā
GV00avs___u:4317: (AVŚ_8,1.15a) jīvebhyas tvā samude vāyur indro dhātā dadhātu savitā trāyamāṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4318: (AVŚ_8,1.15c) mā tvā prāṇo balaṃ hāsīd asuṃ te 'nu hvayāmasi ||15||
GV00avs___u:4319: (AVŚ_8,1.16a) mā tvā jambhaḥ saṃhanur mā tamo vidan mā jihvā barhis pramayuḥ kathā syāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4320: (AVŚ_8,1.16c) ut tvādityā vasavo bharantūd indrāgnī svastaye ||16||
GV00avs___u:4321: (AVŚ_8,1.17a) ut tvā dyaur ut pṛthivy ut prajāpatir agrabhīt |
GV00avs___u:4322: (AVŚ_8,1.17c) ut tvā mṛtyor oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīr apīparan ||17||
GV00avs___u:4323: (AVŚ_8,1.18a) ayaṃ devā ihaivāstv ayaṃ māmutra gād itaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4325: (AVŚ_8,1.19a) ut tvā mṛtyor apīparaṃ saṃ dhamantu vayodhasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4326: (AVŚ_8,1.19c) mā tvā vyastakeśyo mā tvāgharudo rudan ||19||
GV00avs___u:4327: (AVŚ_8,1.20a) āhārṣam avidaṃ tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4328: (AVŚ_8,1.20c) sarvāṅga sarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuś ca te 'vidam ||20||
GV00avs___u:4329: (AVŚ_8,1.21a) vy avāt te jyotir abhūd apa tvat tamo akramīt |
GV00avs___u:4330: (AVŚ_8,1.21c) apa tvan mṛtyuṃ nirṛtim apa yakṣmaṃ ni dadhmasi ||21|| {2}
GV00avs___u:4331: (AVŚ_8,2.1a) ā rabhasvemām amṛtasya śnuṣṭim achidyamānā jaradaṣṭir astu te |
GV00avs___u:4332: (AVŚ_8,2.1c) asuṃ ta āyuḥ punar ā bharāmi rajas tamo mopa gā mā pra
GV00avs___u:4334: (AVŚ_8,2.2a) jīvatāṃ jyotir abhyehy arvāṅ ā tvā harāmi śataśāradāya |
GV00avs___u:4335: (AVŚ_8,2.2c) avamuñcan mṛtyupāśān aśastiṃ drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ te dadhāmi ||2||
GV00avs___u:4336: (AVŚ_8,2.3a) vātāt te prānam avidaṃ sūryāc cakṣur ahaṃ tava |
GV00avs___u:4337: (AVŚ_8,2.3c) yat te manas tvayi tad dhārayāmi saṃ vitsvāṅgair vada
GV00avs___u:4339: (AVŚ_8,2.4a) prāṇena tvā dvipadāṃ catuṣpadām agnim iva jātam abhi saṃ
GV00avs___u:4341: (AVŚ_8,2.4c) namas te mṛtyo cakṣuṣe namaḥ prāṇāya te 'karam ||4||
GV00avs___u:4342: (AVŚ_8,2.5a) ayaṃ jīvatu mā mṛtemaṃ sam īrayāmasi |
GV00avs___u:4343: (AVŚ_8,2.5c) kṛṇomy asmai bheṣajaṃ mṛtyo mā puruṣaṃ vadhīḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:4345: (AVŚ_8,2.6c) trāyamāṇāṃ sahamānāṃ sahasvatīm iha huve 'smā ariṣṭatātaye
GV00avs___u:4346: (AVŚ_8,2.7a) adhi brūhi mā rabhathāḥ sṛjemaṃ tavaiva sant sarvahāyāḥ ihāstu |
GV00avs___u:4347: (AVŚ_8,2.7c) bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ śarma yachatam apasidhya duritaṃ dhattam āyuḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:4348: (AVŚ_8,2.8a) asmai mṛtyo adhi brūhīmaṃ dayasvod ito 'yam etu |
GV00avs___u:4349: (AVŚ_8,2.8c) ariṣṭaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ suśruj jarasā śatahāyana ātmanā bhujam aśnutām ||8||
GV00avs___u:4350: (AVŚ_8,2.9a) devānāṃ hetiḥ pari tvā vṛṇaktu pārayāmi tvā rajasa ut tvā mṛtyor apīparam |
GV00avs___u:4351: (AVŚ_8,2.9c) ārād agniṃ kravyādaṃ nirūhaṃ jīvātave te paridhiṃ dadhāmi ||9||
GV00avs___u:4352: (AVŚ_8,2.10a) yat te niyānaṃ rajasaṃ mṛtyo anavadharṣyam |
GV00avs___u:4353: (AVŚ_8,2.10c) patha imaṃ tasmād rakṣanto brahmāsmai varma kṛṇmasi ||10||
GV00avs___u:4354: (AVŚ_8,2.11a) kṛṇomi te prāṇāpānau jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ dīrgham āyuḥ svasti |
GV00avs___u:4355: (AVŚ_8,2.11c) vaivasvatena prahitān yamadūtāṃś carato 'pa sedhāmi sarvān ||11||
GV00avs___u:4356: (AVŚ_8,2.12a) ārād arātiṃ nirṛtiṃ paro grāhiṃ kravyādaḥ piśācān |
GV00avs___u:4357: (AVŚ_8,2.12c) rakṣo yat sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ tat tama ivāpa hanmasi ||12||
GV00avs___u:4358: (AVŚ_8,2.13a) agneṣ ṭa prānam amṛtād āyuṣmato vanve jātavedasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4359: (AVŚ_8,2.13c) yathā na riṣyā amṛtaḥ sajūr asas tat te kṛṇomi tad u te sam ṛdhyatām ||13||
GV00avs___u:4360: (AVŚ_8,2.14a) śive te stāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī asaṃtāpe abhiśriyau |
GV00avs___u:4361: (AVŚ_8,2.14c) śaṃ te sūrya ā tapatu śaṃ vāto vātu te hṛde |
GV00avs___u:4362: (AVŚ_8,2.14e) śivā abhi kṣarantu tvāpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:4363: (AVŚ_8,2.15a) śivās te santv oṣadhaya ut tvāhārṣam adharasyā uttarāṃ pṛthivīm abhi |
GV00avs___u:4365: (AVŚ_8,2.16a) yat te vāsaḥ paridhānaṃ yāṃ nīviṃ kṛṇuṣe tvam |
GV00avs___u:4366: (AVŚ_8,2.16c) śivaṃ te tanve tat kṛṇmaḥ saṃsparśe 'drūkṣṇam astu te ||16||
GV00avs___u:4367: (AVŚ_8,2.17a) yat kṣureṇa marcayatā sutejasā vaptā vapasi keśaśmaśru |
GV00avs___u:4368: (AVŚ_8,2.17c) śubhaṃ mukhaṃ mā na āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:4369: (AVŚ_8,2.18a) śivau te stāṃ vrīhiyavāv abalāsāv adomadhau |
GV00avs___u:4370: (AVŚ_8,2.18c) etau yakṣmaṃ vi bādhete etau muñcato aṃhasaḥ ||18||
GV00avs___u:4371: (AVŚ_8,2.19a) yad aśnāsi yat pibasi dhānyaṃ kṛṣyāḥ payaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4372: (AVŚ_8,2.19c) yad ādyaṃ yad anādyaṃ sarvaṃ te annam aviṣaṃ kṛṇomi ||19||
GV00avs___u:4373: (AVŚ_8,2.20a) ahne ca tvā rātraye cobhābhyāṃ pari dadmasi |
GV00avs___u:4374: (AVŚ_8,2.20c) arāyebhyo jighatsubhya imaṃ me pari rakṣata ||20|| {4}
GV00avs___u:4375: (AVŚ_8,2.21a) śataṃ te 'yutaṃ hāyanān dve yuge trīṇi catvāri kṛṇmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4376: (AVŚ_8,2.21c) indrāgnī viśve devās te 'nu manyantām ahṛṇīyamānāḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:4377: (AVŚ_8,2.22a) śarade tvā hemantāya vasantāya grīṣmāya pari dadmasi |
GV00avs___u:4378: (AVŚ_8,2.22c) varṣāṇi tubhyaṃ syonāni yeṣu vardhanta oṣadhīḥ ||22||
GV00avs___u:4379: (AVŚ_8,2.23a) mṛtyur īśe dvipadāṃ mṛtyur īśe catuṣpadām |
GV00avs___u:4380: (AVŚ_8,2.23c) tasmāt tvāṃ mṛtyor gopater ud bharāmi sa mā bibheḥ ||23||
GV00avs___u:4381: (AVŚ_8,2.24a) so 'riṣṭa na mariṣyasi na mariṣyasi mā bibheḥ |
GV00avs___u:4382: (AVŚ_8,2.24c) na vai tatra mriyante no yanti adhamaṃ tamaḥ ||24||
GV00avs___u:4383: (AVŚ_8,2.25a) sarvo vai tatra jīvati gaur aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ |
GV00avs___u:4384: (AVŚ_8,2.25c) yatredaṃ brahma kriyate paridhir jīvanāya kam ||25||
GV00avs___u:4386: (AVŚ_8,2.26c) amamrir bhavāmṛto 'tijīvo mā te hāsiṣur asavaḥ śarīram ||26||
GV00avs___u:4387: (AVŚ_8,2.27a) ye mṛtyava ekaśataṃ yā nāṣṭrā atitāryāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4388: (AVŚ_8,2.27c) muñcantu tasmāt tvāṃ devā agner vaiśvānarād adhi ||27||
GV00avs___u:4389: (AVŚ_8,2.28a) agneḥ śarīram asi pārayiṣṇu rakṣohāsi sapatnahā |
GV00avs___u:4391: (AVŚ_8,3.1a) rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinam ā jigharmi mitraṃ prathiṣṭham upa yāmi śarma |
GV00avs___u:4392: (AVŚ_8,3.1c) śiśāno agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa no divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam ||1||
GV00avs___u:4393: (AVŚ_8,3.2a) ayodaṃṣṭro arciṣā yātudhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4394: (AVŚ_8,3.2c) ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva kravyādo vṛṣṭvāpi dhatsvāsan
GV00avs___u:4395: (AVŚ_8,3.3a) ubhobhayāvinn upa dhehi daṃṣṭrau hiṃsraḥ śiśāno 'varaṃ paraṃ ca |
GV00avs___u:4396: (AVŚ_8,3.3c) utāntarikṣe pari yāhy agne jambhaiḥ saṃ dhehy abhi yātudhānān
GV00avs___u:4397: (AVŚ_8,3.4a) agne tvacaṃ yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsrāśanir harasā hantv enam |
GV00avs___u:4398: (AVŚ_8,3.4c) pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyāt kraviṣṇur vi cinotv enam
GV00avs___u:4399: (AVŚ_8,3.5a) yatredānīṃ paśyasi jātavedas tiṣṭhantam agna uta vā carantam |
GV00avs___u:4400: (AVŚ_8,3.5c) utāntarikṣe patantaṃ yātudhānaṃ tam astā vidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:4401: (AVŚ_8,3.6a) yajñair iṣūḥ saṃnamamāno agne ivācā śalyāṃ aśanibhir dihānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4402: (AVŚ_8,3.6c) tābhir vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīco bāhūn prati bhaṅgdhy eṣām ||6||
GV00avs___u:4403: (AVŚ_8,3.7a) utārabdhānt spṛnuhi jātaveda utārebhāṇāṃ ṛṣṭibhir yātudhānān
GV00avs___u:4404: (AVŚ_8,3.7c) agne pūrvo ni jahi śośucāna āmādaḥ kṣviṅkās tam adantv enīḥ
GV00avs___u:4405: (AVŚ_8,3.8a) iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ so agne yātudhāno ya idaṃ kṛṇoti |
GV00avs___u:4406: (AVŚ_8,3.8c) tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛcakṣasaś cakṣuṣe randhayainam ||8||
GV00avs___u:4407: (AVŚ_8,3.9a) tīkṣṇenāgne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñaṃ prāñcaṃ vasubhyaḥ pra ṇaya pracetaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4408: (AVŚ_8,3.9c) hiṃsraṃ rakṣāṃsy abhi śośucānaṃ mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:4409: (AVŚ_8,3.10a) nṛcakṣā rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi prati śṛṇīhy
GV00avs___u:4411: (AVŚ_8,3.10c) tasyāgne pṛṣṭīr harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlaṃ yātudhānasya vṛśca ||10|| {6}
GV00avs___u:4412: (AVŚ_8,3.11a) trir yātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ ta etv ṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti |
GV00avs___u:4413: (AVŚ_8,3.11c) tam arciṣā sphūrjayan jātavedaḥ samakṣam enam gṛṇate ni yuṅgdhi ||11||
GV00avs___u:4414: (AVŚ_8,3.12a) yad agne adya mithunā śapāto yad vācas tṛṣṭaṃ janayanta
GV00avs___u:4416: (AVŚ_8,3.12c) manyor manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān ||12||
GV00avs___u:4417: (AVŚ_8,3.13a) parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parāgne rakṣo harasā śṛṇīhi |
GV00avs___u:4418: (AVŚ_8,3.13c) parārciṣā mūradevān chṛṇīhi parāsutṛpaḥ śośucataḥ śṛṇīhi
GV00avs___u:4419: (AVŚ_8,3.14a) parādya devā vṛjinaṃ śṛṇantu pratyag enaṃ śapathā yantu sṛṣṭāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4420: (AVŚ_8,3.14c) vācāstenaṃ śarava ṛchantu marman viśvasyaitu prasitiṃ
GV00avs___u:4422: (AVŚ_8,3.15a) yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yo aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4423: (AVŚ_8,3.15c) yo aghnyāyā bharati kṣīram agne teṣāṃ śīrṣāṇi harasāpi vṛśca
GV00avs___u:4424: (AVŚ_8,3.16a) viṣaṃ gavāṃ yātudhānā bharantām ā vṛścantām aditaye durevāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4425: (AVŚ_8,3.16c) paraiṇān devaḥ savitā dadātu parā bhāgam oṣadhīnāṃ jayantām ||16||
GV00avs___u:4426: (AVŚ_8,3.17a) saṃvatsarīṇaṃ paya usriyāyās tasya māśīd yātudhāno nṛcakṣaḥ
GV00avs___u:4427: (AVŚ_8,3.17c) pīyūṣam agne yatamas titṛpsāt taṃ pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marmaṇi ||17||
GV00avs___u:4428: (AVŚ_8,3.18a) sanād agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ
GV00avs___u:4429: (AVŚ_8,3.18c) sahamūrān anu daha kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣata daivyāyāḥ
GV00avs___u:4430: (AVŚ_8,3.19a) tvaṃ no agne adharād udaktas tvaṃ paścād uta rakṣā purastāt
GV00avs___u:4431: (AVŚ_8,3.19c) prati tye te ajarāsas tapiṣṭhā aghaśaṃsaṃ śośucato dahantu ||19||
GV00avs___u:4432: (AVŚ_8,3.20a) paścāt purastād adharād utottarāt kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhy agne |
GV00avs___u:4433: (AVŚ_8,3.20c) sakhā sakhāyam ajaro jarimne agne martāṃ amartyas tvaṃ naḥ
GV00avs___u:4434: (AVŚ_8,3.21a) tad agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujo yena paśyasi
GV00avs___u:4436: (AVŚ_8,3.21c) atharvavaj jyotiṣā daivyena satyaṃ dhūrvantam acitaṃ nyoṣa
GV00avs___u:4437: (AVŚ_8,3.22a) pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi |
GV00avs___u:4439: (AVŚ_8,3.23a) viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati sma rakṣaso jahi |
GV00avs___u:4441: (AVŚ_8,3.24a) vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāty agnir āvir viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā |
GV00avs___u:4442: (AVŚ_8,3.24c) prādevīr māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣobhyo vinikṣe ||24||
GV00avs___u:4443: (AVŚ_8,3.25a) ye te śṛṅge ajare jātavedas tigmahetī brahmasaṃśite |
GV00avs___u:4448: (AVŚ_8,4.1a) indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ubjataṃ ny arpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4449: (AVŚ_8,4.1c) parā śṛṇītam acito ny oṣataṃ hataṃ nudethāṃ ni śiśītam
GV00avs___u:4451: (AVŚ_8,4.2a) indrāsomā sam aghaśaṃsam abhy aghaṃ tapur yayastu carur agnimāṃ iva |
GV00avs___u:4452: (AVŚ_8,4.2c) brahmadviṣe kravyāde ghoracakṣase dveṣo dhattam anavāyaṃ
GV00avs___u:4454: (AVŚ_8,4.3a) indrāsomā duṣkṛto vavre antar anārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam |
GV00avs___u:4455: (AVŚ_8,4.3c) yato naiṣāṃ punar ekaś canodayat tad vām astu sahase manyumac chavaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:4456: (AVŚ_8,4.4a) indrāsomā vartayataṃ divo vadhaṃ saṃ pṛthivyā aghaśaṃsāya tarhaṇam |
GV00avs___u:4457: (AVŚ_8,4.4c) ut takṣataṃ svaryaṃ1 parvatebhyo yena rakṣo vāvṛdhānaṃ nijūrvathaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:4458: (AVŚ_8,4.5a) indrāsomā vartayataṃ divas pary agnitaptebhir yuvam
GV00avs___u:4460: (AVŚ_8,4.5c) tapurvadhebhir ajarebhir attriṇo ni parśāne vidhyataṃ yantu nisvaram ||5||
GV00avs___u:4461: (AVŚ_8,4.6a) indrāsomā pari vāṃ bhūtu viśvata iyaṃ matiḥ kakṣyāśveva vājinā |
GV00avs___u:4462: (AVŚ_8,4.6c) yāṃ vāṃ hotrāṃ parihinomi medhayemā brahmāṇi nṛpatī iva jinvatam ||6||
GV00avs___u:4463: (AVŚ_8,4.7a) prati smarethāṃ tujayadbhir evair hataṃ druho rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:4464: (AVŚ_8,4.7c) indrāsomā duṣkṛte mā sugaṃ bhūd yo mā kadā cid abhidāsati druhuḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:4465: (AVŚ_8,4.8a) yo mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhir vacobhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:4466: (AVŚ_8,4.8c) āpa iva kāśinā samgṛbhītā asann astv asataḥ indra vaktā ||8||
GV00avs___u:4467: (AVŚ_8,4.9a) ye pākaśaṃsaṃ viharanta evair ye vā bhadraṃ dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:4468: (AVŚ_8,4.9c) ahaye vā tān pradadātu soma ā vā dadhātu nirṛter upaṣṭhe
GV00avs___u:4469: (AVŚ_8,4.10a) yo no rasaṃ dipsati pitvo agne aśvānāṃ gavāṃ yas tanūnām |
GV00avs___u:4470: (AVŚ_8,4.10c) ripu stena steyakṛd dabhram etu ni ṣa hīyatāṃ tanvā tanā ca ||10|| {9}
GV00avs___u:4471: (AVŚ_8,4.11a) paraḥ so astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīr adho astu viśvāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4472: (AVŚ_8,4.11c) prati śuṣyatu yaśo asya devā yo mā divā dipsati yaś ca naktam ||11||
GV00avs___u:4473: (AVŚ_8,4.12a) suvijñānaṃ cikituṣe janāya sac cāsac ca vacasī paspṛdhāte |
GV00avs___u:4474: (AVŚ_8,4.12c) tasyor yat satyaṃ yatarad ṛjīyas tad it somo 'vati hanty asat ||12||
GV00avs___u:4475: (AVŚ_8,4.13a) na vā u somo vṛjinaṃ hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam
GV00avs___u:4476: (AVŚ_8,4.13c) hanti rakṣo hanty āsad vadantam ubhāv indrasya prasitau śayāte ||13||
GV00avs___u:4477: (AVŚ_8,4.14a) yadi vāham anṛtadevo asmi moghaṃ vā devāṃ apyūhe agne |
GV00avs___u:4478: (AVŚ_8,4.14c) kim asmabhyaṃ jātavedo hṛṇīṣe droghavācas te nirṛthaṃ sacantām ||14||
GV00avs___u:4479: (AVŚ_8,4.15a) adyā murīya yadi yātudhāno asmi yadi vāyus tatapa puruṣasya
GV00avs___u:4480: (AVŚ_8,4.15c) adhā sa vīrair daśabhir vi yūyā yo mā moghaṃ yātudhānety āha ||15||
GV00avs___u:4481: (AVŚ_8,4.16a) yo māyātuṃ yātudhānety āha yo vā rakṣāḥ śicir asmīty āha |
GV00avs___u:4482: (AVŚ_8,4.16c) indras taṃ hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantor adhamas padīṣṭa ||16||
GV00avs___u:4483: (AVŚ_8,4.17a) pra yā jigāti khargaleva naktam apa druhus tanvaṃ1 gūhamānā
GV00avs___u:4484: (AVŚ_8,4.17c) vavram anantam ava sā padīṣṭia grāvāṇo ghnantu rakṣasa upabdaiḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:4485: (AVŚ_8,4.18a) vi tiṣṭhadhvam maruto vikṣv ichata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ saṃ pinaṣṭan |
GV00avs___u:4486: (AVŚ_8,4.18c) vayo ye bhūtvā patayanti naktabhir ye vā ripo dadhire deve adhvare ||18||
GV00avs___u:4487: (AVŚ_8,4.19a) pra vartaya divo 'śmānam indra somaśitaṃ maghavant saṃ śiśādhi |
GV00avs___u:4488: (AVŚ_8,4.19c) prākto apākto adharād udakto 'bhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena
GV00avs___u:4489: (AVŚ_8,4.20a) eta u tye patayanti śvayātava indraṃ dipsanti dipsavo 'dābhyam |
GV00avs___u:4490: (AVŚ_8,4.20c) śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyo vadhaṃ nunaṃ sṛjad aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ ||20|| {10}
GV00avs___u:4491: (AVŚ_8,4.21a) indro yātūnām abhavat parāśaro havirmathīnām abhy āvivāsatām
GV00avs___u:4492: (AVŚ_8,4.21c) abhīd u śakraḥ paraśur yathā vanaṃ pātreva bhindant sata etu rakṣasaḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:4493: (AVŚ_8,4.22a) ulūkayātuṃ śuśulūkayātuṃ jahi śvayātum uta kokayātum |
GV00avs___u:4494: (AVŚ_8,4.22c) suparṇayātum uta gṛdhrayātuṃ dṛṣadeva pra mṛṇa rakṣa indra ||22||
GV00avs___u:4495: (AVŚ_8,4.23a) mā no rakṣo abhi naḍ yātumāvad apochantu mithunā ye
GV00avs___u:4497: (AVŚ_8,4.23c) pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso 'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān ||23||
GV00avs___u:4498: (AVŚ_8,4.24a) indra jahi pumāṃsaṃ yātudhānam uta striyaṃ māyayā śāśadānām |
GV00avs___u:4499: (AVŚ_8,4.24c) vigrīvāso mūradevā ṛdantu mā te dṛśant sūryam uccarantam ||24||
GV00avs___u:4500: (AVŚ_8,4.25a) prati cakṣva vi cakṣvendraś ca soma jāgṛtam |
GV00avs___u:4502: (AVŚ_8,5.1a) ayaṃ pratisaro maṇir vīro vīrāya badhyate |
GV00avs___u:4504: (AVŚ_8,5.2a) ayaṃ maṇiḥ sapatnahā suvīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ |
GV00avs___u:4506: (AVŚ_8,5.3a) anenendro maṇinā vṛtram ahann anenāsurān parābhāvayan manīṣī
GV00avs___u:4507: (AVŚ_8,5.3c) anenājayad dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime anenājayat pradiśaś catasraḥ
GV00avs___u:4509: (AVŚ_8,5.4c) ojasvān vimṛdho vaśī so asmān pātu sarvataḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:4510: (AVŚ_8,5.5a) tad agnir āha tad u soma āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tad indraḥ |
GV00avs___u:4511: (AVŚ_8,5.5c) te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisarair ajantu ||5||
GV00avs___u:4512: (AVŚ_8,5.6a) antar dadhe dyāvāpṛthivī utāhar uta sūryam |
GV00avs___u:4513: (AVŚ_8,5.6c) te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisarair ajantu ||6||
GV00avs___u:4514: (AVŚ_8,5.7a) ye srāktyaṃ maṇiṃ janā varmāṇi kṛṇvate |
GV00avs___u:4515: (AVŚ_8,5.7c) sūrya iva divam āruhya vi kṛtyā bādhate vaśī ||7||
GV00avs___u:4517: (AVŚ_8,5.8c) ajaiṣaṃ sarvāḥ pṛtanā vi mṛdho hanmi rakṣasaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:4518: (AVŚ_8,5.9a) yāḥ kṛtyā āṅgirasīr yāḥ kṛtyā āsurīr yāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4519: (AVŚ_8,5.9c) kṛtyāḥ svayaṃkṛtā yā u cānyebhir ābhṛtāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4520: (AVŚ_8,5.9e) ubhayīs tāḥ parā yantu parāvato navatiṃ nāvyā ati ||9||
GV00avs___u:4521: (AVŚ_8,5.10a) asmai maṇiṃ varma badhnantu devā indro viṣṇuḥ savitā rudro
GV00avs___u:4523: (AVŚ_8,5.10c) prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāḍ vaiśvānara ṛṣayaś ca sarve
GV00avs___u:4524: (AVŚ_8,5.11a) uttamo asy oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva |
GV00avs___u:4526: (AVŚ_8,5.12a) sa id vyāghro bhavaty atho siṃho atho vṛṣā |
GV00avs___u:4528: (AVŚ_8,5.13a) nainaṃ ghnanty apsaraso na gandharvā na martyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4529: (AVŚ_8,5.13c) sarvā diśo vi rājati yo bibhartīmaṃ maṇim ||13||
GV00avs___u:4530: (AVŚ_8,5.14a) kaśyapas tvām asṛjata kaśyapas tvā sam airayat |
GV00avs___u:4533: (AVŚ_8,5.15a) yas tvā kṛtyābhir yas tvā dīkṣābhir yajñair yas tvā
GV00avs___u:4535: (AVŚ_8,5.15c) pratyak tvam indra taṃ jahi vajreṇa śataparvaṇā ||15||
GV00avs___u:4536: (AVŚ_8,5.16a) ayam id vai pratīvarta ojasvān saṃjayo maṇiḥ |
GV00avs___u:4537: (AVŚ_8,5.16c) prajāṃ dhanaṃ ca rakṣatu paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:4538: (AVŚ_8,5.17a) asapatnaṃ no adharād asapatnaṃ na uttarāt |
GV00avs___u:4539: (AVŚ_8,5.17c) indrāsapatnaṃ naḥ paścāj jyotiḥ śūra puras kṛdhi ||17||
GV00avs___u:4540: (AVŚ_8,5.18a) varma me dyāvāpṛthivī varmāhar varma sūryaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4541: (AVŚ_8,5.18c) varma ma indraś cāgniś ca varma dhātā dadhātu me ||18||
GV00avs___u:4542: (AVŚ_8,5.19a) aindrāgnaṃ varma bahulaṃ yad ugraṃ viśve devā nātividhyanti sarve |
GV00avs___u:4543: (AVŚ_8,5.19c) tan me tanvaṃ trāyatāṃ sarvato bṛhad āyuṣmāṃ jaradaṣṭir yathāsāni ||19||
GV00avs___u:4545: (AVŚ_8,5.20c) imaṃ methim abhisaṃviśadhvaṃ tanūpānaṃ trivarūtham ojase
GV00avs___u:4546: (AVŚ_8,5.21a) asminn indro ni dadhātu nṛmṇam imaṃ devāso abhisaṃviśadhvam |
GV00avs___u:4548: (AVŚ_8,5.22a) svastidā viśāṃ patir vṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī |
GV00avs___u:4549: (AVŚ_8,5.22c) indro badhnātu te maṇiṃ jigīvāṃ aparājitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4552: (AVŚ_8,6.1c) durṇāmā tatra mā gṛdhad aliṃśa uta vatsapaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:4555: (AVŚ_8,6.3a) mā saṃ vṛto mopa sṛpa ūrū māva sṛpo 'ntarā |
GV00avs___u:4557: (AVŚ_8,6.4a) durṇāmā ca sunāmā cobhā samvṛtam ichataḥ |
GV00avs___u:4558: (AVŚ_8,6.4c) arāyān apa hanmaḥ sunāmā straiṇam ichatām ||4||
GV00avs___u:4559: (AVŚ_8,6.5a) yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ keśy asura stambaja uta tuṇḍikaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4563: (AVŚ_8,6.7a) yas tvā svapne nipadyate bhrātā bhūtvā piteva ca |
GV00avs___u:4564: (AVŚ_8,6.7c) bajas tānt sahatām itaḥ klībarūpāṃs tirīṭinaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:4565: (AVŚ_8,6.8a) yas tvā svapantīṃ tsarati yas tvā dipsati jāgratīm |
GV00avs___u:4566: (AVŚ_8,6.8c) chāyām iva pra tānt sūryaḥ parikrāmann anīnaśat ||8||
GV00avs___u:4567: (AVŚ_8,6.9a) yaḥ kṛṇoti mṛtavatsām avatokām imāṃ striyam |
GV00avs___u:4568: (AVŚ_8,6.9c) tam oṣadhe tvaṃ nāśayāsyāḥ kamalam añjivam ||9||
GV00avs___u:4570: (AVŚ_8,6.10c) kusūlā ye ca kukṣilāḥ kakubhāḥ karumāḥ srimāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4571: (AVŚ_8,6.10e) tān oṣadhe tvaṃ gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya ||10|| {14}
GV00avs___u:4572: (AVŚ_8,6.11a) ye kukundhāḥ kukirabhāḥ kṛttīr dūrśāni bibhrati |
GV00avs___u:4573: (AVŚ_8,6.11c) klībā iva pranṛtyanto vane ye kurvate ghoṣaṃ tān ito
GV00avs___u:4575: (AVŚ_8,6.12a) ye sūryaṃ na titikṣanta ātapantam amuṃ divaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4576: (AVŚ_8,6.12c) arāyān bastavāsino durgandhīṃl lohitāsyān makakān nāśayāmasi
GV00avs___u:4577: (AVŚ_8,6.13a) ya ātmānam atimātram aṃsa ādhāya bibhrati |
GV00avs___u:4579: (AVŚ_8,6.14a) ye pūrve badhvo yanti haste śṛṅgāni bibhrataḥ |
GV00avs___u:4580: (AVŚ_8,6.14c) āpākesthāḥ prahāsina stambe ye kurvate jyotis tān ito nāśayāmasi ||14||
GV00avs___u:4581: (AVŚ_8,6.15a) yeṣām paścāt prapadāni puraḥ pārṣṇīḥ puro mukhā |
GV00avs___u:4582: (AVŚ_8,6.15c) khalajāḥ śakadhūmajā uruṇḍā ye ca maṭmaṭāḥ kumbhamuṣkā ayāśavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4583: (AVŚ_8,6.15e) tān asyā brahmaṇas pate pratībodhena nāśaya ||15||
GV00avs___u:4585: (AVŚ_8,6.16c) ava bheṣaja pādaya ya imāṃ saṃvivṛtsaty apatiḥ svapatiṃ striyam ||16||
GV00avs___u:4588: (AVŚ_8,6.17e) padā pra vidhya pārṣṇyā sthālīṃ gaur iva spandanā ||17||
GV00avs___u:4589: (AVŚ_8,6.18a) yas te garbhaṃ pratimṛśāj jātaṃ vā mārayāti te |
GV00avs___u:4591: (AVŚ_8,6.19a) ye amno jatān mārayanti sūtikā anuśerate |
GV00avs___u:4592: (AVŚ_8,6.19c) strībhāgān piṅgo gandharvān vāto abhram ivājatu ||19||
GV00avs___u:4593: (AVŚ_8,6.20a) parisṛṣṭaṃ dharayatu yad dhitaṃ māva pādi tat |
GV00avs___u:4594: (AVŚ_8,6.20c) garbhaṃ ta ugrau rakṣatām bheṣajau nīvibhāryau ||20|| {15}
GV00avs___u:4596: (AVŚ_8,6.21c) prajāyai patye tvā piṅgaḥ pari pātu kimīdinaḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:4598: (AVŚ_8,6.22c) vṛntād abhi prasarpataḥ pari pāhi varīvṛtāt ||22||
GV00avs___u:4599: (AVŚ_8,6.23a) ya āmaṃ māṃsam adanti pauruṣeyaṃ ca ye kraviḥ |
GV00avs___u:4600: (AVŚ_8,6.23c) garbhān khādanti keśavās tān ito nāśayāmasi ||23||
GV00avs___u:4601: (AVŚ_8,6.24a) ye sūryāt parisarpanti snuṣeva śvaśurād adhi |
GV00avs___u:4602: (AVŚ_8,6.24c) bajaś ca teṣāṃ piṅgaś ca hṛdaye 'dhi ni vidhyatām ||24||
GV00avs___u:4603: (AVŚ_8,6.25a) piṅga rakṣa jāyamānaṃ mā pumāṃsaṃ striyaṃ kran |
GV00avs___u:4604: (AVŚ_8,6.25c) āṇḍādo garbhān mā dabhan bādhasvetaḥ kimīdinaḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:4605: (AVŚ_8,6.26a) aprajāstvaṃ mārtavatsam ād rodam agham āvayam |
GV00avs___u:4606: (AVŚ_8,6.26c) vṛkṣād iva srajam kṛtvāpriye prati muñca tat ||26|| {16}
GV00avs___u:4607: (AVŚ_8,7.1a) yā babhravo yāś ca śukrā rohiṇīr uta pṛśnayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4609: (AVŚ_8,7.2a) trāyantām imaṃ purusaṃ yakṣmād deveṣitād adhi |
GV00avs___u:4610: (AVŚ_8,7.2c) yāsām dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudro mūlaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva
GV00avs___u:4612: (AVŚ_8,7.3c) tās te yakṣmam enasyam aṅgādaṅgād anīnaśan ||3||
GV00avs___u:4613: (AVŚ_8,7.4a) prastṛṇatī stambinīr ekaśuṅgāḥ pratanvatīr oṣadhīr ā vadāmi |
GV00avs___u:4614: (AVŚ_8,7.4c) aṃśumatīḥ kaṇḍinīr yā viśākhā hvayāmi te vīrudho vaiśvadevīr ugrāḥ puruṣajīvanīḥ
GV00avs___u:4615: (AVŚ_8,7.5a) yad vaḥ sahaḥ sahamānā vīryaṃ1 yac ca vo balam |
GV00avs___u:4616: (AVŚ_8,7.5c) tenemam asmād yakṣmāt puruṣaṃ muñcatauṣadhīr atho kṛṇomi bheṣajam ||5||
GV00avs___u:4618: (AVŚ_8,7.6c) arundhatīm unnayantīṃ puṣpām madhumatīm iha huve 'smā
GV00avs___u:4620: (AVŚ_8,7.7a) ihā yantu pracetaso medinīr vacaso mama |
GV00avs___u:4622: (AVŚ_8,7.8a) agner ghāso apāṃ garbho yā rohanti punarṇavāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4627: (AVŚ_8,7.10c) atho balāsanāśanīḥ kṛtyādūṣaṇīś ca yās tā ihā yantv oṣadhīḥ
GV00avs___u:4629: (AVŚ_8,7.11c) trāyantām asmin grāme gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ paśum ||11||
GV00avs___u:4630: (AVŚ_8,7.12a) madhuman mūlaṃ madhumad agram āsām madhuman madhyaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva |
GV00avs___u:4631: (AVŚ_8,7.12c) madhumat parṇaṃ madhumat puṣpam āsāṃ madhoḥ sambhaktā amṛtasya bhakṣo ghṛtam annaṃ duhratāṃ gopurogavam ||12||
GV00avs___u:4632: (AVŚ_8,7.13a) yāvatīḥ kiyatīś cemāḥ pṛthivyām adhy oṣadhīḥ |
GV00avs___u:4633: (AVŚ_8,7.13c) tā mā sahasraparṇyo mṛtyor muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:4635: (AVŚ_8,7.14c) amīvāḥ sarvā rakṣāṃsy apa hantv adhi dūram asmat ||14||
GV00avs___u:4636: (AVŚ_8,7.15a) siṃhasyeva stanathoḥ saṃ vijante 'gner iva vijante ābhṛtābhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4637: (AVŚ_8,7.15c) gavāṃ yakṣmaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ vīrudbhir atinutto nāvyā etu srotyāḥ ||15||
GV00avs___u:4639: (AVŚ_8,7.16c) bhūmiṃ saṃtanvatīr ita yāsāṃ rājā vanaspatiḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:4640: (AVŚ_8,7.17a) yā rohanty āṅgirasīḥ parvateṣu sameṣu ca |
GV00avs___u:4641: (AVŚ_8,7.17c) tā naḥ payasvatīḥ śivā oṣadhīḥ santu śaṃ hṛde ||17||
GV00avs___u:4642: (AVŚ_8,7.18a) yāś cāhaṃ veda vīrudho yāś ca paśyāmi cakṣuṣā |
GV00avs___u:4643: (AVŚ_8,7.18c) ajñātā jānīmaś ca yā yāsu vidma ca saṃbhṛtam ||18||
GV00avs___u:4644: (AVŚ_8,7.19a) sarvāḥ samagrā oṣadhīr bodhantu vacaso mama |
GV00avs___u:4646: (AVŚ_8,7.20a) aśvattho darbho vīrudhāṃ somo rājāmṛtaṃ haviḥ |
GV00avs___u:4647: (AVŚ_8,7.20c) vrīhir yavaś ca bheṣajau divasi putrāv amartyau ||20|| {18}
GV00avs___u:4652: (AVŚ_8,7.23a) varāho veda vīrudhaṃ nakulo veda bheṣajīm |
GV00avs___u:4653: (AVŚ_8,7.23c) sarpā gandharvā yā vidus tā asmā avase huve ||23||
GV00avs___u:4654: (AVŚ_8,7.24a) yāḥ suparṇā āṅgirasīr divyā yā raghato viduḥ |
GV00avs___u:4655: (AVŚ_8,7.24c) vayāṃsi haṃsā yā vidur yās ca sarve patatriṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4656: (AVŚ_8,7.24e) mṛgā yā vidur oṣadhīs tā asmā avase huve ||24||
GV00avs___u:4657: (AVŚ_8,7.25a) yāvatīnām oṣadhīnāṃ gāvaḥ prāśnanty aghnyā yavatīnām
GV00avs___u:4659: (AVŚ_8,7.25c) tāvatīs tubhyam oṣadhīḥ śarma yachantv ābhṛtāḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:4661: (AVŚ_8,7.26c) tāvatīr viśvabheṣajīr ā bharāmi tvām abhi ||26||
GV00avs___u:4664: (AVŚ_8,7.28a) ut tvāhārṣaṃ pañcaśalād atho daśaśalād uta |
GV00avs___u:4666: (AVŚ_8,8.1a) indro manthatu manthitā śakraḥ śūraḥ puraṃdaraḥ |
GV00avs___u:4668: (AVŚ_8,8.2a) pūtirajjur upadhmānī pūtiṃ senāṃ kṛṇotv amūm |
GV00avs___u:4669: (AVŚ_8,8.2c) dhūmam agnim parādṛśyā 'mitrā hṛtsv ā dadhatāṃ bhayam ||2||
GV00avs___u:4670: (AVŚ_8,8.3a) amūn aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi khādāmūn khadirājiram |
GV00avs___u:4671: (AVŚ_8,8.3c) tājadbhaṅga iva bhajantāṃ hantv enān vadhako vadhaiḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:4672: (AVŚ_8,8.4a) paruṣān amūn paruṣāhvaḥ kṛṇotu hantv enān vadhako vadhaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:4673: (AVŚ_8,8.4c) kṣipraṃ śara iva bhajantāṃ bṛhajjālena saṃditāḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:4674: (AVŚ_8,8.5a) antarikṣaṃ jālam āsīj jāladaṇḍā diśo mahīḥ |
GV00avs___u:4676: (AVŚ_8,8.6a) bṛhad dhi jālaṃ bṛhataḥ śakrasya vājinīvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:4677: (AVŚ_8,8.6c) tena śatrūn abhi sarvān ny ubja yathā na mucyātai katamaś canaiṣām ||6||
GV00avs___u:4678: (AVŚ_8,8.7a) bṛhat te jālaṃ bṛhata indra śūra sahasrārghasya śatavīryasya |
GV00avs___u:4679: (AVŚ_8,8.7c) tena śataṃ sahasram ayutaṃ nyarbudaṃ jaghāna śakro dasyūnām abhidhāya senayā
GV00avs___u:4680: (AVŚ_8,8.8a) ayaṃ loko jālam āsīc chakrasya mahato mahān |
GV00avs___u:4683: (AVŚ_8,8.9c) śramas tandrīś ca mohaś ca tair amūn abhi dadhāmi sarvān
GV00avs___u:4684: (AVŚ_8,8.10a) mṛtyave 'mūn pra yachāmi mṛtyupāśair amī sitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4685: (AVŚ_8,8.10c) mṛtyor ye aghalā dūtās tebhya enān prati nayāmi baddhvā
GV00avs___u:4687: (AVŚ_8,8.11c) paraḥsahasrā hanyantāṃ tṛṇeḍhv enān matyaṃ bhavasya ||11||
GV00avs___u:4688: (AVŚ_8,8.12a) sādhyā ekaṃ jāladaṇḍam udyatya yanty ojasā |
GV00avs___u:4689: (AVŚ_8,8.12c) rudrā ekaṃ vasava ekam ādityair eka udyataḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:4690: (AVŚ_8,8.13a) viśve devāḥ upariṣṭād ubjanto yantv ojasā |
GV00avs___u:4691: (AVŚ_8,8.13c) madhyena ghnanto yantu senām aṅgiraso mahīm ||13||
GV00avs___u:4693: (AVŚ_8,8.14c) dvipāc catuṣpād iṣṇāmi yathā senām amūṃ hanan ||14||
GV00avs___u:4695: (AVŚ_8,8.15c) dṛṣṭān adṛṣṭān iṣṇāmi yathā senām amūṃ hanan ||15||
GV00avs___u:4696: (AVŚ_8,8.16a) ima uptā mṛtyupāśā yān ākramya na mucyase |
GV00avs___u:4697: (AVŚ_8,8.16c) amuṣyā hantu senāyā idaṃ kūṭaṃ sahasraśaḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:4699: (AVŚ_8,8.17c) bhavaś ca pṛśnibāhuś ca śarva senām amūṃ hatam ||17||
GV00avs___u:4700: (AVŚ_8,8.18a) mṛtyor āṣam ā padyantāṃ kṣudhaṃ sediṃ vadham bhayam |
GV00avs___u:4701: (AVŚ_8,8.18c) indraś cākṣujālābhyāṃ śarva senām amūṃ hatam ||18||
GV00avs___u:4702: (AVŚ_8,8.19a) parājitāḥ pra trasatāmitrā nuttā dhāvata brahmaṇā |
GV00avs___u:4704: (AVŚ_8,8.20a) ava padyantām eṣām āyudhāni mā śakan pratidhām iṣum |
GV00avs___u:4705: (AVŚ_8,8.20c) athaiṣāṃ bahu bibhyatām iṣavaḥ ghnantu marmaṇi ||20||
GV00avs___u:4706: (AVŚ_8,8.21a) saṃ krośatām enān dyāvāpṛthivī sam antarikṣaṃ saha devatābhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:4707: (AVŚ_8,8.21c) mā jñātāraṃ mā pratiṣṭhāṃ vidanta mitho vighnānā upa yantu
GV00avs___u:4711: (AVŚ_8,8.22c) dyāvāpṛthivī pakṣasī ṛtavo 'bhīśavo 'ntardeśāḥ kimkarā vāk parirathyam ||22||
GV00avs___u:4712: (AVŚ_8,8.23a) saṃvatsaro rathaḥ parivatsaro rathopastho virāḍ īṣāgnī
GV00avs___u:4715: (AVŚ_8,8.24a) ito jayeto vi jaya saṃ jaya jaya svāhā |
GV00avs___u:4716: (AVŚ_8,8.24c) ime jayantu parāmī jayantāṃ svāhaibhyo durāhāmībhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4718: (AVŚ_8,9.1a) kutas tau jātau katamaḥ so ardhaḥ kasmāl lokāt katamasyāḥ
GV00avs___u:4720: (AVŚ_8,9.1c) vatsau virājaḥ salilād ud aitāṃ tau tvā pṛchāmi katareṇa
GV00avs___u:4722: (AVŚ_8,9.2a) yo akrandayat salilaṃ mahitvā yoniṃ kṛtvā tribhujaṃ śayānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4723: (AVŚ_8,9.2c) vatsaḥ kāmadugho virājaḥ sa guhā cakre tanvaḥ parācaiḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:4724: (AVŚ_8,9.3a) yāni trīṇi bṛhanti yeṣāṃ caturthaṃ viyunakti vācam |
GV00avs___u:4725: (AVŚ_8,9.3c) brahmainad vidyāt tapasā vipaścid yasminn ekaṃ yujyate yasminn ekam ||3||
GV00avs___u:4726: (AVŚ_8,9.4a) bṛhataḥ pari sāmāni ṣaṣṭhāt pañcādhi nirmitā |
GV00avs___u:4727: (AVŚ_8,9.4c) bṛhad bṛhatyā nirmitaṃ kuto 'dhi bṛhatī mitā ||4||
GV00avs___u:4728: (AVŚ_8,9.5a) bṛhatī pari mātrāyā mātur mātrādhi nirmitā |
GV00avs___u:4729: (AVŚ_8,9.5c) māyā ha jajñe māyāyā māyāyā mātalī pari ||5||
GV00avs___u:4730: (AVŚ_8,9.6a) vaiśvānarasya pratimopari dyaur yāvad rodasī vibabādhe agniḥ
GV00avs___u:4731: (AVŚ_8,9.6c) tataḥ ṣaṣṭhād āmuto yanti stomā ud ito yanty abhi ṣaṣṭham ahnaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:4732: (AVŚ_8,9.7a) ṣaṭ tvā pṛchāma ṛṣayaḥ kaśyapeme tvaṃ hi yuktaṃ yuyukṣe
GV00avs___u:4734: (AVŚ_8,9.7c) virājam āhur brahmaṇaḥ pitaraṃ tāṃ no vi dhehi yatidhā
GV00avs___u:4736: (AVŚ_8,9.8a) yāṃ pracyutām anu yajñāḥ pracyavanta upatiṣṭhanta
GV00avs___u:4738: (AVŚ_8,9.8c) yasyā vrate prasave yakṣam ejati sā virāṭ ṛṣayaḥ parame
GV00avs___u:4740: (AVŚ_8,9.9a) aprāṇaiti prāṇena prāṇatīnāṃ virāṭ svarājam abhy eti paścāt |
GV00avs___u:4741: (AVŚ_8,9.9c) viśvaṃ mṛśantīm abhirūpāṃ virājaṃ paśyanti tve na tve paśyanty enām ||9||
GV00avs___u:4742: (AVŚ_8,9.10a) ko virājo mithunatvaṃ pra veda ka ṛtūn ka u kalpam asyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4743: (AVŚ_8,9.10c) kramān ko asyāḥ katidhā vidugdhān ko asyā dhāma katidhā
GV00avs___u:4745: (AVŚ_8,9.11a) iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyauchad āsv itarāsu carati praviṣṭā
GV00avs___u:4746: (AVŚ_8,9.11c) mahānto asyāṃ mahimāno antar vadhūr jigāya navagaj janitrī ||11||
GV00avs___u:4747: (AVŚ_8,9.12a) chandaḥpakṣe uṣasā pepiśāne samānaṃ yonim anu saṃ careme |
GV00avs___u:4748: (AVŚ_8,9.12c) sūryapatnī saṃ carataḥ prajānatī ketumatī ajare bhūriretasā
GV00avs___u:4749: (AVŚ_8,9.13a) ṛtasya panthām anu tisra āgus trayo gharmā anu reta āguḥ |
GV00avs___u:4750: (AVŚ_8,9.13c) prajām ekā jinvaty ūrjam ekā rāṣṭram ekā rakṣati devayūnām
GV00avs___u:4751: (AVŚ_8,9.14a) agnīṣomāv adadhur yā turīyāsīd yajñasya pakṣāv ṛṣayaḥ kalpayantaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4752: (AVŚ_8,9.14c) gāyatrīṃ triṣṭubhaṃ jagatīm anuṣṭubhaṃ bṛhadarkīṃ yajamānāya
GV00avs___u:4754: (AVŚ_8,9.15a) pañca vyuṣṭīr anu pañca dohā gāṃ pañcanāmnīm ṛtavo 'nu pañca
GV00avs___u:4755: (AVŚ_8,9.15c) pañca diśaḥ pañcadaśena kḷptās tā ekamūrdhnīr abhi lokam ekam ||15||
GV00avs___u:4756: (AVŚ_8,9.16a) ṣaṭ jātā bhūtā prathamajā ṛtasya ṣaṭ u sāmāni ṣaṭahaṃ
GV00avs___u:4758: (AVŚ_8,9.16c) ṣaṭyogaṃ sīram anu sāmasāma ṣaṭ āhur dyāvāpṛthivīḥ ṣaṭ urvīḥ
GV00avs___u:4759: (AVŚ_8,9.17a) ṣaḍ āhuḥ śītān ṣaḍ u māsa uṣṇān ṛtuṃ no brūta yatamo 'tiriktaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4760: (AVŚ_8,9.17c) sapta suparṇāḥ kavayo ni ṣeduḥ sapta chandāṃsy anu sapta
GV00avs___u:4762: (AVŚ_8,9.18a) sapta homāḥ samidho ha sapta madhūni sapta ṛtavo ha sapta |
GV00avs___u:4763: (AVŚ_8,9.18c) saptājyāni pari bhūtam āyan tāḥ saptagṛdhrā iti śuśrumā vayam ||18||
GV00avs___u:4764: (AVŚ_8,9.19a) sapta chandāṃsi caturuttarāṇy anyo anyasminn adhy ārpitāni |
GV00avs___u:4765: (AVŚ_8,9.19c) kathaṃ stomāḥ prati tiṣṭhanti teṣu tāni stomeṣu katham ārpitāni ||19||
GV00avs___u:4766: (AVŚ_8,9.20a) kathaṃ gāyatrī trivṛtaṃ vy āpa kathaṃ triṣṭup pañcadaśena kalpate |
GV00avs___u:4767: (AVŚ_8,9.20c) trayastriṃśena jagatī katham anuṣṭup katham ekaviṃśaḥ ||20||
GV00avs___u:4768: (AVŚ_8,9.21a) aṣṭa jātā bhūtā prathamajā ṛtasyāṣṭendra ṛtvijo daivyā ye |
GV00avs___u:4769: (AVŚ_8,9.21c) aṣṭayonir aditir aṣṭaputrāstamīṃ rātrim abhi havyam eti
GV00avs___u:4770: (AVŚ_8,9.22a) itthaṃ śreyo manyamānedam āgamaṃ yuṣmākaṃ sakhye aham asmi śevā |
GV00avs___u:4771: (AVŚ_8,9.22c) samānajanmā kratur asti vaḥ śivaḥ sa vaḥ sarvāḥ saṃ carati prajānan ||22||
GV00avs___u:4772: (AVŚ_8,9.23a) aṣṭendrasya ṣaḍ yamasya ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta saptadhā |
GV00avs___u:4773: (AVŚ_8,9.23c) apo manuṣyān oṣadhīs tāṃ u pañcānu secire ||23||
GV00avs___u:4774: (AVŚ_8,9.24a) kevalīndrāya duduhe hi gṛṣṭir vaśam pīyūṣaṃ prathamaṃ duhānā |
GV00avs___u:4775: (AVŚ_8,9.24c) athātarpayac caturaś caturdhā devān manuṣyāṃ asurān uta ṛṣīn ||24||
GV00avs___u:4776: (AVŚ_8,9.25a) ko nu gauḥ ka ekaṛṣiḥ kim u dhāma kā āśiṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4777: (AVŚ_8,9.25c) yakṣam pṛthivyām ekavṛd ekartuḥ katamo nu saḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:4778: (AVŚ_8,9.26a) eko gaur eka ekaṛṣir ekaṃ dhāmaikadhāśiṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4779: (AVŚ_8,9.26c) yakṣaṃ pṛthivyām ekavṛd ekartur nāti ricyate ||26|| {24}
GV00avs___u:4780: (AVŚ_8,10.1a) virāḍ vā idam agra āsīt tasyā jātāyāḥ sarvam abibhed iyam evedaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
GV00avs___u:4781: (AVŚ_8,10.2a) sod akrāmat sā gārhapatye ny akrāmat |
GV00avs___u:4782: (AVŚ_8,10.2c) gṛhamedhī gṛhapatir bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||2||
GV00avs___u:4784: (AVŚ_8,10.3c) yanty asya devā devahūtiṃ priyo devānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV00avs___u:4785: (AVŚ_8,10.4a) sod akrāmat sā dakṣiṇāgnau ny akrāmat |
GV00avs___u:4786: (AVŚ_8,10.4c) yajñarto dakṣiṇīyo vāsateyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||4||
GV00avs___u:4787: (AVŚ_8,10.5a) sod akrāmat sā sabhāyāṃ ny akrāmat |
GV00avs___u:4788: (AVŚ_8,10.5c) yanty asya sabhāṃ sabhyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||5||
GV00avs___u:4789: (AVŚ_8,10.6a) sod akrāmat sā samitau ny akrāmat |
GV00avs___u:4790: (AVŚ_8,10.6c) yanty asya samitiṃ sāmityo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||6||
GV00avs___u:4792: (AVŚ_8,10.7c) yanty asyāmantraṇam āmantraṇīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||7||
GV00avs___u:4794: (AVŚ_8,10.9a) tāṃ devamanuṣyā abruvann iyam eva tad veda yad ubhaya
GV00avs___u:4797: (AVŚ_8,10.11a) ūrja ehi svadha ehi sūnṛta ehīrāvaty ehīti ||11||
GV00avs___u:4798: (AVŚ_8,10.12a) tasyā indro vatsa āsīd gāyatry abhidhāny abhram ūdhaḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:4799: (AVŚ_8,10.13a) bṛhac ca rathaṃtaraṃ ca dvau stanāv āstāṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ ca
GV00avs___u:4801: (AVŚ_8,10.14a) oṣadhīr eva rathaṃtareṇa devā aduhran vyaco bṛhatā ||14||
GV00avs___u:4803: (AVŚ_8,10.16a) oṣadhīr evāsmai rathaṃtaraṃ duhe vyaco bṛhat ||16||
GV00avs___u:4804: (AVŚ_8,10.17a) apo vāmadevyaṃ yajñaṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ ya veda ||17|| {26}
GV00avs___u:4805: (AVŚ_8,10.18a) sod akrāmat sā vanaspatīn āgachat tāṃ vanaspatayo 'ghnata
GV00avs___u:4807: (AVŚ_8,10.18c) tasmād vanaspatīnāṃ saṃvatsare vṛkṇam api rohati vṛścate
GV00avs___u:4809: (AVŚ_8,10.19a) sod akrāmat sā pitṝn āgachat tāṃ pitaro 'ghnata sā māsi sam
GV00avs___u:4811: (AVŚ_8,10.19c) tasmāt pitṛbhyo māsy upamāsyaṃ dadati pra pitṛyāṇaṃ panthāṃ jānāti ya evaṃ veda ||19||
GV00avs___u:4812: (AVŚ_8,10.20a) sod akrāmat sā devān āgachat tāṃ devā aghnata sārdhamāse
GV00avs___u:4814: (AVŚ_8,10.20c) tasmād devebhyo 'rdhamāse vaṣaṭ kurvanti pra devayānaṃ panthāṃ jānāti ya evaṃ veda ||20||
GV00avs___u:4815: (AVŚ_8,10.21a) sod akrāmat sā manuṣyān āgachat tāṃ manuṣyā aghnata sā
GV00avs___u:4817: (AVŚ_8,10.21c) tasmān manuṣyebhya ubhayadyur upa haranty upāsya gṛhe haranti ya evaṃ veda (AVŚ_8,10.22a) sod akrāmat sāsurān āgachat tām asurā upāhvayanta māya ehīti |
GV00avs___u:4818: (AVŚ_8,10.22c) tasyā virocanaḥ prāhrādir vatsa āsīd ayaspātraṃ pātram |
GV00avs___u:4820: (AVŚ_8,10.22g) tāṃ māyām asurā upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ
GV00avs___u:4822: (AVŚ_8,10.23a) sod akrāmat sā pitṝn āgachat tāṃ pitara upāhvayanta svadha
GV00avs___u:4824: (AVŚ_8,10.23c) tasyā yamo rājā vatsa āsīd rajatapātraṃ pātram |
GV00avs___u:4825: (AVŚ_8,10.23e) tām antako mārtyavo 'dhok tāṃ svadhām evādhok |
GV00avs___u:4826: (AVŚ_8,10.23g) tāṃ svadhāṃ pitara upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ
GV00avs___u:4828: (AVŚ_8,10.24a) sod akrāmat sā manuṣyān āgachat tāṃ manuṣyā upāhvayanterāvaty ehīti |
GV00avs___u:4829: (AVŚ_8,10.24c) tasyā manur vaivasvato vatsa āsīt pṛthivī pātram |
GV00avs___u:4830: (AVŚ_8,10.24e) tāṃ pṛthī vainyo 'dhok tāṃ kṛṣiṃ ca sasyaṃ cādhok |
GV00avs___u:4831: (AVŚ_8,10.24g) te svadhāṃ kṛṣiṃ ca sasyaṃ ca manuṣyā upa jīvanti
GV00avs___u:4832: kṛṣṭarādhir upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||24||
GV00avs___u:4833: (AVŚ_8,10.25a) sod akrāmat sā saptaṛṣīn āgachat tāṃ saptaṛṣaya upāhvayanta brahmaṇvaty ehīti |
GV00avs___u:4834: (AVŚ_8,10.25c) tasyāḥ somo rājā vatsa āsīc chandaḥ pātram |
GV00avs___u:4835: (AVŚ_8,10.25e) tāṃ bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso 'dhok tāṃ brahma ca tapaś cādhok |
GV00avs___u:4836: (AVŚ_8,10.25g) tad brahma ca tapaś ca saptaṛṣaya upa jīvanti brahmavarcasy
GV00avs___u:4838: (AVŚ_8,10.26a) sod akrāmat sā devān āgachat tāṃ devā upāhvayantorja ehīti
GV00avs___u:4839: (AVŚ_8,10.26c) tasyā indro vatsa āsīc camasaḥ pātram |
GV00avs___u:4840: (AVŚ_8,10.26e) tāṃ devaḥ savitādhok tām ūrjām evādhok |
GV00avs___u:4841: (AVŚ_8,10.26g) tāṃ ūrjāṃ devā upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV00avs___u:4842: (AVŚ_8,10.27a) sod akrāmat sā gandharvāpsarasa āgachat tāṃ
GV00avs___u:4844: (AVŚ_8,10.27c) tasyāś citrarathaḥ sauryavarcaso vatsa āsīt puṣkaraparṇaṃ
GV00avs___u:4846: (AVŚ_8,10.27e) tāṃ vasuruciḥ sauryavarcaso 'dhok tāṃ puṇyam eva gandham adhok |
GV00avs___u:4847: (AVŚ_8,10.27g) taṃ puṇyaṃ gandhaṃ gandharvāpsarasa upa jīvanti
GV00avs___u:4848: puṇyagandhir upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||27||
GV00avs___u:4849: (AVŚ_8,10.28a) sod akrāmat setarajanān āgachat tām itarajanā upāhvayanta tirodha ehīti |
GV00avs___u:4850: (AVŚ_8,10.28c) tasyāḥ kubero vaiśravaṇo vatsa āsīd āmapātraṃ pātram |
GV00avs___u:4851: (AVŚ_8,10.28e) tāṃ rajatanābhiḥ kaberako 'dhok tāṃ tirodhām evādhok |
GV00avs___u:4852: (AVŚ_8,10.28g) tāṃ tirodhām atirajanā pitara upa jīvanti tiro dhatte sarvaṃ pāpmānam upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||28||
GV00avs___u:4853: (AVŚ_8,10.29a) sod akrāmat sā sarpān āgachat tāṃ sarpā upāhvayanta viṣavaty ehīti |
GV00avs___u:4854: (AVŚ_8,10.29c) tasyās takṣako vaiśaleyo vatsa āsīd alābupātraṃ pātraṃ |
GV00avs___u:4855: (AVŚ_8,10.29e) tāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭra airāvato 'dhok tāṃ viṣam evādhok |
GV00avs___u:4856: (AVŚ_8,10.29g) tad viṣaṃ sarvā upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ
GV00avs___u:4859: (AVŚ_8,10.31a) na ca pratyāhanyān manasā tvā pratyāhanmīti pratyāhanyāt
GV00avs___u:4860: (AVŚ_8,10.32a) yat pratyāhanti viṣam eva tat pratyāhanti ||32||
GV00avs___u:4861: (AVŚ_8,10.33a) viṣam evāsyāpriyaṃ bhrātṛvyam anuviṣicyate ya evaṃ veda
GV00avs___u:4862: (AVŚ_9,1.1a) divas pṛthivyā antarikṣāt samudrād agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe |
GV00avs___u:4863: (AVŚ_9,1.1c) tāṃ cāyitvāmṛtaṃ vasānāṃ hṛdbhiḥ prajāḥ prati nandanti sarvāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:4864: (AVŚ_9,1.2a) mahat payo viśvarūpam asyāḥ samudrasya tvota reta āhuḥ |
GV00avs___u:4865: (AVŚ_9,1.2c) yata aiti madhukaśā rarāṇā tat prāṇas tad amṛtaṃ niviṣṭam
GV00avs___u:4866: (AVŚ_9,1.3a) paśyanty asyāś caritaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthaṅ naro bahudhā mīmāṃsamānāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4867: (AVŚ_9,1.3c) agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:4868: (AVŚ_9,1.4a) mātādityānāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ prāṇaḥ prajānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:4869: (AVŚ_9,1.4c) hiraṇyavarṇā madhukaśā ghṛtācī mahān bhargaś carati martyeṣu
GV00avs___u:4870: (AVŚ_9,1.5a) madhoḥ kaśām ajanayanta devās tasyā garbho abhavad viśvarūpaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4871: (AVŚ_9,1.5c) taṃ jātaṃ taruṇaṃ piparti mātā sa jāto viśvā bhuvanā vi caṣṭe ||5||
GV00avs___u:4872: (AVŚ_9,1.6a) kas taṃ pra veda ka u taṃ ciketa yo asyā hṛdaḥ kalaśaḥ
GV00avs___u:4875: (AVŚ_9,1.7a) sa tau pra veda sa u tau ciketa yāv asyāḥ stanau sahasradhārāv akṣitau |
GV00avs___u:4877: (AVŚ_9,1.8a) hiṅkarikratī bṛhatī vayodhā uccairghoṣābhyeti yā vratam |
GV00avs___u:4878: (AVŚ_9,1.8c) trīn gharmān abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyuṃ payate payobhiḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:4879: (AVŚ_9,1.9a) yām āpīnām upasīdanty āpaḥ śākvarā vṛṣabhā ye svarājaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4880: (AVŚ_9,1.9c) te varṣanti te varṣayanti tadvide kāmam ūrjam āpaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:4881: (AVŚ_9,1.10a) stanayitnus te vāk prajāpate vṛṣā śuṣmaṃ kṣipasi bhūmyām adhi |
GV00avs___u:4882: (AVŚ_9,1.10c) agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:4883: (AVŚ_9,1.11a) yathā somaḥ prātaḥsavane aśvinor bhavati priyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4884: (AVŚ_9,1.11c) evā me aśvinā varca ātmani dhriyatām ||11||
GV00avs___u:4885: (AVŚ_9,1.12a) yathā somo dvitīye savana indrāgnyor bhavati priyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4886: (AVŚ_9,1.12c) evā ma indrāgnī varca ātmani dhriyatām ||12||
GV00avs___u:4887: (AVŚ_9,1.13a) yathā somas tṛtīye savana ṛbhūṇāṃ bhavati priyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4888: (AVŚ_9,1.13c) evā ma ṛbhavo varca ātmani dhriyatām ||13||
GV00avs___u:4890: (AVŚ_9,1.14c) payasvān agna āgamaṃ taṃ mā saṃ sṛja varcasā ||14||
GV00avs___u:4891: (AVŚ_9,1.15a) saṃ māgne varcasā sṛja saṃ prajayā sam āyuṣā |
GV00avs___u:4892: (AVŚ_9,1.15c) vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ ||15||
GV00avs___u:4893: (AVŚ_9,1.16a) yathā madhu madhukṛtaḥ saṃbharanti madhāv adhi |
GV00avs___u:4894: (AVŚ_9,1.16c) evā me aśvinā varca ātmani dhriyatām ||16||
GV00avs___u:4895: (AVŚ_9,1.17a) yathā makṣāḥ idaṃ madhu nyañjanti madhāv adhi |
GV00avs___u:4896: (AVŚ_9,1.17c) evā me aśvinā varcas tejo balam ojaś ca dhriyatām ||17||
GV00avs___u:4897: (AVŚ_9,1.18a) yad giriṣu parvateṣu goṣv aśveṣu yan madhu |
GV00avs___u:4898: (AVŚ_9,1.18c) surāyāṃ sicyamānāyāṃ yat tatra madhu tan mayi ||18||
GV00avs___u:4899: (AVŚ_9,1.19a) aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunāṅktaṃ śubhas patī |
GV00avs___u:4900: (AVŚ_9,1.19c) yathā varcasvatīṃ vācam āvadāni janāṃ anu ||19||
GV00avs___u:4901: (AVŚ_9,1.20a) stanayitnus te vāk prajāpate vṛṣā śuṣmaṃ kṣipasi bhūmyāṃ divi |
GV00avs___u:4902: (AVŚ_9,1.20c) tāṃ paśava upa jīvanti sarve teno seṣam ūrjaṃ piparti ||20||
GV00avs___u:4903: (AVŚ_9,1.21a) pṛthivī daṇḍo 'ntarikṣaṃ garbho dyauḥ kaśā vidyut prakaśo hiraṇyayo binduḥ
GV00avs___u:4904: (AVŚ_9,1.22a) yo vai kaśāyāḥ sapta madhūni veda madhumān bhavati |
GV00avs___u:4905: (AVŚ_9,1.22c) brāhmaṇaś ca rājā ca dhenuś cānaḍvāṃś ca vrīhiś ca yavaś ca madhu saptamam
GV00avs___u:4907: (AVŚ_9,1.23c) madhumato lokān jayati ya evaṃ veda ||23||
GV00avs___u:4908: (AVŚ_9,1.24a) yad vīdhre stanayati prajāpatir eva tat prajābhyaḥ prādur bhavati |
GV00avs___u:4909: (AVŚ_9,1.24c) tasmāt prācīnopavītas tiṣṭhe prajāpate 'nu mā budhyasveti |
GV00avs___u:4910: (AVŚ_9,1.24e) anv enaṃ prajā anu prajāpatir budhyate ya evaṃ veda ||24||
GV00avs___u:4911: (AVŚ_9,2.1a) sapatnahanam ṛṣabhaṃ ghṛtena kāmaṃ śikṣāmi haviṣājyena |
GV00avs___u:4912: (AVŚ_9,2.1c) nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama padaya tvam abhiṣṭuto mahatā vīryeṇa ||1||
GV00avs___u:4913: (AVŚ_9,2.2a) yan me manaso na priyaṃ cakṣuṣo yan me babhasti nābhinandati
GV00avs___u:4914: (AVŚ_9,2.2c) tad duṣvapnyaṃ prati muñcāmi sapatne kāmaṃ stutvod ahaṃ bhideyam ||2||
GV00avs___u:4915: (AVŚ_9,2.3a) duṣvapnyaṃ kāma duritaṃ ca kamāprajastām asvagatām avartim |
GV00avs___u:4916: (AVŚ_9,2.3c) ugra īśānaḥ prati muñca tasmin yo asmabhyam aṃhūraṇā cikitsāt
GV00avs___u:4917: (AVŚ_9,2.4a) nudasva kāma pra ṇudasva kāmāvartiṃ yantu mama ye sapatnāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4918: (AVŚ_9,2.4c) teṣāṃ nuttānām adhamā tamāṃsy agne vāstūni nir daha tvam
GV00avs___u:4919: (AVŚ_9,2.5a) sā te kāma duhitā dhenur ucyate yām āhur vācaṃ kavayo virājam |
GV00avs___u:4920: (AVŚ_9,2.5c) tayā sapatnān pari vṛṅgdhi ye mama pary enān prāṇaḥ paśavo jīvanaṃ vṛṇaktu ||5||
GV00avs___u:4921: (AVŚ_9,2.6a) kāmasyendrasya varuṇasya rājño viṣṇor balena savituḥ savena |
GV00avs___u:4922: (AVŚ_9,2.6c) agner hotreṇa pra ṇude sapatnāṃ chambīva nāvam udakeṣu dhīraḥ
GV00avs___u:4923: (AVŚ_9,2.7a) adhyakṣo vājī mama kāma ugraḥ kṛṇotu mahyam asapatnam eva |
GV00avs___u:4924: (AVŚ_9,2.7c) viśve devā mama nāthaṃ bhavantu sarve devā havam ā yantu ma imam ||7||
GV00avs___u:4925: (AVŚ_9,2.8a) idam ājyaṃ ghṛtavaj juṣāṇāḥ kāmajyeṣṭhā iha mādayadhvam |
GV00avs___u:4927: (AVŚ_9,2.9a) indrāgnī kāma sarathaṃ hi bhūtvā nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama pādayāthaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4928: (AVŚ_9,2.9c) teṣāṃ pannānām adhamā tamāṃsy agne vāstūny anunirdaha tvam ||9||
GV00avs___u:4929: (AVŚ_9,2.10a) jahi tvam kāma mama ye sapatnā andhā tamāṃsy ava pādayainān
GV00avs___u:4930: (AVŚ_9,2.10c) nirindriyā arasāḥ santu sarve mā te jīviṣuḥ katamac canāhaḥ
GV00avs___u:4931: (AVŚ_9,2.11a) avadhīt kāmo mama ye sapatnā uruṃ lokam akaran mahyam
GV00avs___u:4933: (AVŚ_9,2.11c) mahyaṃ namantāṃ pradiśaś catasro mahyaṃ ṣaḍ urvīr ghṛtam ā
GV00avs___u:4935: (AVŚ_9,2.12a) te 'dharāñcaḥ pra plavantāṃ chinnā naur iva bandhanāt |
GV00avs___u:4937: (AVŚ_9,2.13a) agnir yava indro yavaḥ somo yavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4939: (AVŚ_9,2.14a) asarvavīraś caratu praṇutto dveṣyo mitrānāṃ parivargyaḥ
GV00avs___u:4941: (AVŚ_9,2.14c) uta pṛthivyām ava syanti vidyuta ugro vo devaḥ pra mṛṇat sapatnān ||14||
GV00avs___u:4942: (AVŚ_9,2.15a) cyutā ceyaṃ bṛhaty acyutā ca vidyud bibharti stanayitnūṃś ca
GV00avs___u:4944: (AVŚ_9,2.15c) udyann ādityo draviṇena tejasā nīcaiḥ sapatnān nudatāṃ me sahasvān ||15||
GV00avs___u:4945: (AVŚ_9,2.16a) yat te kāma śarma trivarūtham udbhu brahma varma vitatam
GV00avs___u:4947: (AVŚ_9,2.16c) tena sapatnān pari vṛṅgdhi ye mama pary enān prāṇaḥ paśavo jīvanaṃ vṛṇaktu ||16||
GV00avs___u:4948: (AVŚ_9,2.17a) yena devā asurān prāṇudanta yenendro dasyūn adhamaṃ tamo nināya |
GV00avs___u:4949: (AVŚ_9,2.17c) tena tvaṃ kāma mama ye sapatnās tān asmāl lokāt pra ṇudasva dūram ||17||
GV00avs___u:4950: (AVŚ_9,2.18a) yathā devā asurān prāṇudanta yathendro dasyūn adhamaṃ tamo babādhe |
GV00avs___u:4951: (AVŚ_9,2.18c) tathā tvaṃ kāma mama ye sapatnās tān asmāl lokāt pra ṇudasva dūram ||18||
GV00avs___u:4952: (AVŚ_9,2.19a) kāmo jajñe prathamo nainaṃ devā āpuḥ pitaro na martyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4953: (AVŚ_9,2.19c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛnomi ||19||
GV00avs___u:4954: (AVŚ_9,2.20a) yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvad āpaḥ siṣyadur yāvad agniḥ |
GV00avs___u:4955: (AVŚ_9,2.20c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi ||20||
GV00avs___u:4956: (AVŚ_9,2.21a) yāvatīr diśaḥ pradiśo viṣūcīr yāvatīr āśā abhicakṣaṇā divaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4957: (AVŚ_9,2.21c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi ||21||
GV00avs___u:4958: (AVŚ_9,2.22a) yāvatīr bhṛṅgā jatvaḥ kurūravo yāvatīr vaghā vṛkṣasarpyo babhūvuḥ |
GV00avs___u:4959: (AVŚ_9,2.22c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi ||22||
GV00avs___u:4960: (AVŚ_9,2.23a) jyāyān nimiṣato 'si tiṣṭhato jyāyānt samudrād asi kāma manyo
GV00avs___u:4961: (AVŚ_9,2.23c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛnomi ||23||
GV00avs___u:4962: (AVŚ_9,2.24a) na vai vātaś cana kāmam āpnoti nāgniḥ sūryo nota candramāḥ |
GV00avs___u:4963: (AVŚ_9,2.24c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi ||24||
GV00avs___u:4964: (AVŚ_9,2.25a) yās te śivās tanvaḥ kāma bhadrā yābhiḥ satyaṃ bhavati yad vṛṇiṣe |
GV00avs___u:4965: (AVŚ_9,2.25c) tābhiṣ ṭvam asmāṃ abhisaṃviśasvānyatra pāpīr apa veśayā dhiyaḥ ||25|| {5}
GV00avs___u:4968: (AVŚ_9,3.2a) yat te naddhaṃ viśvavāre pāśo granthiś ca yaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4969: (AVŚ_9,3.2c) bṛhaspatir ivāhaṃ balaṃ vācā vi sraṃsayāmi tat ||2||
GV00avs___u:4970: (AVŚ_9,3.3a) ā yayāma saṃ babarha granthīṃś cakāra te dṛḍhān |
GV00avs___u:4972: (AVŚ_9,3.4a) vaṃśānāṃ te nahanānāṃ prāṇāhasya tṛṇasya ca |
GV00avs___u:4973: (AVŚ_9,3.4c) pakṣāṇāṃ viśvavāre te naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi ||4||
GV00avs___u:4975: (AVŚ_9,3.5c) idaṃ mānasya patnyā naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi ||5||
GV00avs___u:4976: (AVŚ_9,3.6a) yāni te 'ntaḥ śikyāny ābedhū raṇyāya kam |
GV00avs___u:4977: (AVŚ_9,3.6c) pra te tāni cṛtāmasi śivā mānasya patni na uddhitā tanve bhava ||6||
GV00avs___u:4982: (AVŚ_9,3.9a) yas tvā śāle pratigṛhṇāti yena cāsi mitā tvam |
GV00avs___u:4983: (AVŚ_9,3.9c) ubhau mānasya patni tau jīvatāṃ jaradaṣṭī ||9||
GV00avs___u:4984: (AVŚ_9,3.10a) amutrainam ā gachatād dṛḍhā naddhā pariṣkṛtā |
GV00avs___u:4986: (AVŚ_9,3.11a) yas tvā śāle nimimāya saṃjabhāra vanaspatīn |
GV00avs___u:4987: (AVŚ_9,3.11c) prajāyai cakre tvā śāle parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:4988: (AVŚ_9,3.12a) namas tasmai namo dātre śālāpataye ca kṛṇmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4989: (AVŚ_9,3.12c) namo 'gnaye pracarate puruṣāya ca te namaḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:4990: (AVŚ_9,3.13a) gobhyo aśvebhyo namo yac chālāyāṃ vijāyate |
GV00avs___u:4991: (AVŚ_9,3.13c) vijāvati prajāvati vi te pāśāṃś cṛtāmasi ||13||
GV00avs___u:4992: (AVŚ_9,3.14a) agnim antaś chādayasi puruṣān paśubhiḥ saha |
GV00avs___u:4993: (AVŚ_9,3.14c) vijāvati prajāvati vi te pāśāṃś cṛtāmasi ||14||
GV00avs___u:4994: (AVŚ_9,3.15a) antarā dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca yad vyacas tena śālāṃ prati gṛhṇāmi ta imām |
GV00avs___u:4995: (AVŚ_9,3.15c) yad antarikṣaṃ rajaso vimānaṃ tat kṛṇve 'ham udaraṃ śevadhibhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:4998: (AVŚ_9,3.16c) viśvānnaṃ bibhratī śāle mā hiṃsīḥ pratigṛhṇataḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:4999: (AVŚ_9,3.17a) tṛṇair āvṛtā paladān vasānā rātrīva śālā jagato niveśanī |
GV00avs___u:5001: (AVŚ_9,3.18a) iṭasya te vi cṛtāmy apinaddham aporṇuvan |
GV00avs___u:5002: (AVŚ_9,3.18c) varuṇena samubjitāṃ mitraḥ prātar vy ubjatu ||18||
GV00avs___u:5003: (AVŚ_9,3.19a) brahmaṇā śālāṃ nimitāṃ kavibhir nimitāṃ mitām |
GV00avs___u:5004: (AVŚ_9,3.19c) indrāgnī rakṣatāṃ śālām amṛtau somyaṃ sadaḥ ||19||
GV00avs___u:5006: (AVŚ_9,3.20c) tatra marto vi jāyate yasmād viśvaṃ prajāyate ||20|| {7}
GV00avs___u:5007: (AVŚ_9,3.21a) yā dvipakṣā catuṣpakṣā ṣaṭpakṣā yā nimīyate |
GV00avs___u:5008: (AVŚ_9,3.21c) aṣṭāpakṣāṃ daśapakṣāṃ śālāṃ mānasya patnīm agnir garbha ivā śaye ||21||
GV00avs___u:5009: (AVŚ_9,3.22a) pratīcīṃ tvā pratīcīnaḥ śāle praimy ahiṃsatīm |
GV00avs___u:5010: (AVŚ_9,3.22c) agnir hy antar āpaś ca ṛtasya prathamā dvāḥ ||22||
GV00avs___u:5011: (AVŚ_9,3.23a) imā āpaḥ pra bharāmy ayakṣmā yakṣmanāśanīḥ |
GV00avs___u:5012: (AVŚ_9,3.23c) gṛhān upa pra sīdāmy amṛtena sahāgninā ||23||
GV00avs___u:5013: (AVŚ_9,3.24a) mā naḥ pāśaṃ prati muco gurur bhāro laghur bhava |
GV00avs___u:5014: (AVŚ_9,3.24c) vadhūm iva tvā śāle yatrakāmaṃ bharāmasi ||24||
GV00avs___u:5015: (AVŚ_9,3.25a) prācyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyaḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:5016: (AVŚ_9,3.26a) dakṣiṇāyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyaḥ ||26||
GV00avs___u:5017: (AVŚ_9,3.27a) pratīcyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyaḥ ||27||
GV00avs___u:5018: (AVŚ_9,3.28a) udīcyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyaḥ ||28||
GV00avs___u:5019: (AVŚ_9,3.29a) dhruvāyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyaḥ ||29||
GV00avs___u:5020: (AVŚ_9,3.30a) ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyaḥ ||30||
GV00avs___u:5021: (AVŚ_9,3.31a) diśodiśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyaḥ
GV00avs___u:5022: (AVŚ_9,4.1a) sāhasras tveṣa ṛṣabhaḥ payasvān viśvā rūpāṇi vakṣaṇāsu bibhrat |
GV00avs___u:5023: (AVŚ_9,4.1c) bhadraṃ dātre yajamānāya śīkṣan bārhaspatya usriyas tantum ātān ||1||
GV00avs___u:5024: (AVŚ_9,4.2a) apāṃ yo agne pratimā babhūva prabhūḥ sarvasmai pṛthivīva devī
GV00avs___u:5025: (AVŚ_9,4.2c) pitā vatsānāṃ patir aghnyānāṃ sāhasre poṣe api naḥ kṛṇotu
GV00avs___u:5026: (AVŚ_9,4.3a) pumān antarvānt sthaviraḥ payasvān vasoḥ kabandhaṃ ṛṣabho bibharti |
GV00avs___u:5027: (AVŚ_9,4.3c) tam indrāya pathibhir devayānair hutam agnir vahatu jātavedāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:5028: (AVŚ_9,4.4a) pitā vatsānāṃ patir aghnyānāṃ atho pitā mahatāṃ gargarāṇām |
GV00avs___u:5029: (AVŚ_9,4.4c) vatso jarāyu pratidhuk pīyūṣa āmikṣā ghṛtaṃ tad v asya retaḥ
GV00avs___u:5030: (AVŚ_9,4.5a) devānāṃ bhāga upanāha eṣo 'pāṃ rasa oṣadhīnāṃ ghṛtasya |
GV00avs___u:5031: (AVŚ_9,4.5c) somasya bhakṣam avṛṇīta śakro bṛhann adrir abhavad yac charīram ||5||
GV00avs___u:5032: (AVŚ_9,4.6a) somena pūrṇaṃ kalaśaṃ bibharṣi tvastā rupāṇāṃ janitā paśūnām |

GV00avs___u:5040: (AVŚ_9,4.9c) sahasraṃ sa ekamukhā dadāti yo brāhmaṇa ṛṣabham ājuhoti ||9||

GV00avs___u:5072: (AVŚ_9,5.1a) ā nayaitam ā rabhasva sukṛtāṃ lokam api gachatu prajānan |

GV00avs___u:5196: (AVŚ_9,6.34a) prajāṃ vā eṣa paśūṃś ca gṛhāṇām aśnāti yaḥ pūrvo 'tither

GV00avs___u:5565: (AVŚ_10,3.1c) tenā rabhasva tvaṃ śatrūn pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:5566: (AVŚ_10,3.2a) praiṇān chṛṇīhi pra mṛṇā rabhasva maṇis te astu puraetā
GV00avs___u:5568: (AVŚ_10,3.2c) avārayanta varaṇena devā abhyācāram asurāṇāṃ śvaḥśvaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:5569: (AVŚ_10,3.3a) ayaṃ maṇir varaṇo viśvabheṣajaḥ sahasrākṣo harito hiraṇyayaḥ
GV00avs___u:5570: (AVŚ_10,3.3c) sa te śatrūn adharān pādayāti pūrvas tān dabhnuhi ye tvā dviṣanti ||3||
GV00avs___u:5571: (AVŚ_10,3.4a) ayaṃ te kṛtyāṃ vitatām pauruṣeyād ayaṃ bhayāt |
GV00avs___u:5572: (AVŚ_10,3.4c) ayaṃ tvā sarvasmāt pāpād varaṇo vārayiṣyate ||4||
GV00avs___u:5574: (AVŚ_10,3.5c) yakṣmo yo asminn āviṣṭas tam u devā avīvaran ||5||
GV00avs___u:5575: (AVŚ_10,3.6a) svapnaṃ suptvā yadi paśyāsi pāpaṃ mṛgaḥ sṛtiṃ yati dhāvād
GV00avs___u:5577: (AVŚ_10,3.6c) parikṣavāc chakuneḥ pāpavādād ayaṃ maṇir varaṇo vārayiṣyate
GV00avs___u:5578: (AVŚ_10,3.7a) arātyās tvā nirṛtyā abhicārād atho bhayāt |
GV00avs___u:5580: (AVŚ_10,3.8a) yan me mātā yan me pitā bhrātaro yac ca me svā yad enaś cakṛmā vayam |
GV00avs___u:5583: (AVŚ_10,3.9c) asūrtaṃ rajo apy agus te yantv adhamaṃ tamaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:5585: (AVŚ_10,3.10c) tam māyaṃ varaṇo maṇiḥ pari pātu diśodiśaḥ ||10|| {7}
GV00avs___u:5586: (AVŚ_10,3.11a) ayaṃ me varaṇa urasi rājā devo vanaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:5587: (AVŚ_10,3.11c) sa me śatrūn vi bādhatām indro dasyūn ivāsurān ||11||
GV00avs___u:5589: (AVŚ_10,3.12c) sa me rāṣṭraṃ ca kṣatraṃ ca paśūn ojaś ca me dadhat ||12||
GV00avs___u:5590: (AVŚ_10,3.13a) yathā vāto vanaspatīn vṛkṣān bhanakty ojasā |
GV00avs___u:5591: (AVŚ_10,3.13c) evā sapatnān me bhaṅgdhi pūrvān jātāṃ utāparān varaṇas tvābhi rakṣatu ||13||
GV00avs___u:5592: (AVŚ_10,3.14a) yathā vātaś cāgniś ca vṛkṣān psāto vanaspatīn |
GV00avs___u:5593: (AVŚ_10,3.14c) evā sapatnān me psāhi pūrvān jātāṃ utāparān varaṇas tvābhi
GV00avs___u:5595: (AVŚ_10,3.15a) yathā vātena prakṣīṇā vṛkṣāḥ śere nyarpitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:5596: (AVŚ_10,3.15c) evā sapatnāṃs tvaṃ mama pra kṣiṇīhi ny arpaya |
GV00avs___u:5597: (AVŚ_10,3.15e) pūrvān jātāṃ utāparān varaṇas tvābhi rakṣatu ||15||
GV00avs___u:5598: (AVŚ_10,3.16a) tāṃs tvaṃ pra chinddhi varaṇa purā diṣṭāt purāyuṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5599: (AVŚ_10,3.16c) ya enaṃ paśuṣu dipsanti ye cāsya rāṣṭradipsavaḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:5600: (AVŚ_10,3.17a) yathā sūryo atibhāti yathāsmin teja āhitam |
GV00avs___u:5601: (AVŚ_10,3.17c) evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yachatu |
GV00avs___u:5602: (AVŚ_10,3.17e) tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mā ||17||
GV00avs___u:5603: (AVŚ_10,3.18a) yathā yaśaś candramasy āditye ca nṛcakṣasi |
GV00avs___u:5604: (AVŚ_10,3.18c) evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yachatu |
GV00avs___u:5605: (AVŚ_10,3.18e) tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mā ||18||
GV00avs___u:5607: (AVŚ_10,3.19c) evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yachatu |
GV00avs___u:5608: (AVŚ_10,3.19e) tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mā ||19||
GV00avs___u:5609: (AVŚ_10,3.20a) yathā yaśaḥ kanyāyāṃ yathāsmint saṃbhṛte rathe |
GV00avs___u:5610: (AVŚ_10,3.20c) evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yachatu |
GV00avs___u:5611: (AVŚ_10,3.20e) tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mā ||20|| {8}
GV00avs___u:5612: (AVŚ_10,3.21a) yathā yaśaḥ somapīthe madhuparke yathā yaśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5613: (AVŚ_10,3.21c) evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yachatu |
GV00avs___u:5614: (AVŚ_10,3.21e) tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mā ||21||
GV00avs___u:5616: (AVŚ_10,3.22c) evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yachatu |
GV00avs___u:5617: (AVŚ_10,3.22e) tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mā ||22||
GV00avs___u:5618: (AVŚ_10,3.23a) yathā yaśo yajamāne yathāsmin yajña āhitam |
GV00avs___u:5619: (AVŚ_10,3.23c) evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yachatu |
GV00avs___u:5620: (AVŚ_10,3.23e) tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mā ||23||
GV00avs___u:5622: (AVŚ_10,3.24c) evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yachatu |
GV00avs___u:5623: (AVŚ_10,3.24e) tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mā ||24||
GV00avs___u:5624: (AVŚ_10,3.25a) yathā deveṣv amṛtaṃ yathaiṣu satyam āhitam |
GV00avs___u:5625: (AVŚ_10,3.25c) evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yachatu |
GV00avs___u:5626: (AVŚ_10,3.25e) tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mā ||25|| {9}
GV00avs___u:5627: (AVŚ_10,4.1a) indrasya prathamo ratho devānām aparo ratho varuṇasya tṛtīya it |
GV00avs___u:5628: (AVŚ_10,4.1c) ahīnām apamā ratha sthānum ārad athārṣat ||1||
GV00avs___u:5629: (AVŚ_10,4.2a) darbhaḥ śocis tarūṇakam aśvasya vāraḥ paruṣasya vāraḥ |
GV00avs___u:5631: (AVŚ_10,4.3a) ava śveta padā jahi pūrveṇa cāpareṇa ca |
GV00avs___u:5632: (AVŚ_10,4.3c) udaplutam iva dārv ahīnām arasaṃ viṣaṃ vār ugram ||3||
GV00avs___u:5634: (AVŚ_10,4.4c) udaplutam iva dārv ahīnām arasaṃ viṣaṃ vār ugram ||4||
GV00avs___u:5635: (AVŚ_10,4.5a) paidvo hanti kasarṇīlaṃ paidvaḥ śvitram utāsitam |
GV00avs___u:5636: (AVŚ_10,4.5c) paidvo ratharvyāḥ śiraḥ saṃ bibheda pṛdākvāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:5637: (AVŚ_10,4.6a) paidva prehi prathamo 'nu tvā vayam emasi |
GV00avs___u:5638: (AVŚ_10,4.6c) ahīn vy asyatāt patho yena smā vayam emasi ||6||
GV00avs___u:5641: (AVŚ_10,4.8a) saṃyataṃ na vi ṣparad vyāttaṃ na saṃ yamat |
GV00avs___u:5642: (AVŚ_10,4.8c) asmin kṣetre dvāv ahī strī ca pumāṃś ca tāv ubhāv arasā ||8||
GV00avs___u:5643: (AVŚ_10,4.9a) arasāsa ihāhayo ye anti ye ca dūrake |
GV00avs___u:5646: (AVŚ_10,4.10c) indro me 'him aghāyantam ahiṃ paidvo arandhayat ||10|| {10}
GV00avs___u:5652: (AVŚ_10,4.13c) darviṃ karikrataṃ śvitraṃ darbheṣv asitaṃ jahi ||13||
GV00avs___u:5656: (AVŚ_10,4.15c) sa vai svajasya jambhana ubhayor vṛścikasya ca ||15||
GV00avs___u:5657: (AVŚ_10,4.16a) indro me 'him arandhayan mitraś ca varuṇaś ca |
GV00avs___u:5659: (AVŚ_10,4.17a) indro me 'him arandhayat pṛdākuṃ ca pṛdākvam |
GV00avs___u:5661: (AVŚ_10,4.18a) indro jaghāna prathamaṃ janitāram ahe tava |
GV00avs___u:5662: (AVŚ_10,4.18c) teṣām u tṛhyamāṇānāṃ kaḥ svit teṣām asad rasaḥ ||18||
GV00avs___u:5663: (AVŚ_10,4.19a) saṃ hi śīrṣāṇy agrabhaṃ pauñjiṣṭha iva karvaram |
GV00avs___u:5664: (AVŚ_10,4.19c) sindhor madhyaṃ paretya vy anijam aher viṣam ||19||
GV00avs___u:5665: (AVŚ_10,4.20a) ahīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ parā vahantu sindhavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5667: (AVŚ_10,4.21a) oṣadhīnām ahaṃ vṛṇa urvarīr iva sādhuyā |
GV00avs___u:5669: (AVŚ_10,4.22a) yad agnau sūrye viṣaṃ pṛthivyām oṣadhīṣu yat |
GV00avs___u:5670: (AVŚ_10,4.22c) kāndāviṣaṃ kanaknakaṃ niraitv aitu te viṣam ||22||
GV00avs___u:5671: (AVŚ_10,4.23a) ye agnijā oṣadhijā ahīnāṃ ye apsujā vidyuta ābabhūvuḥ |
GV00avs___u:5672: (AVŚ_10,4.23c) yeṣāṃ jātāni bahudhā mahānti tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo namasā vidhema ||23||
GV00avs___u:5673: (AVŚ_10,4.24a) taudī nāmāsi kanyā ghṛtācī nāma vā asi |
GV00avs___u:5674: (AVŚ_10,4.24c) adhaspadena te padam ā dade viṣadūṣaṇam ||24||
GV00avs___u:5675: (AVŚ_10,4.25a) aṅgādaṅgāt pra cyāvaya hṛdayam pari varjaya |
GV00avs___u:5676: (AVŚ_10,4.25c) adhā viṣasya yat tejo 'vācīnaṃ tad etu te ||25||
GV00avs___u:5677: (AVŚ_10,4.26a) āre abhūd viṣam araud viṣe viṣam aprāg api |
GV00avs___u:5678: (AVŚ_10,4.26c) agnir viṣam aher nir adhāt somo nir aṇayīt |
GV00avs___u:5679: (AVŚ_10,4.26e) daṃṣṭāram anv agād viṣam ahir amṛta ||26|| {12}
GV00avs___u:5680: (AVŚ_10,5.1a) indrasyauja sthendrasya saha sthendrasya balaṃ sthendrasya

GV00avs___u:5697: (AVŚ_10,5.6c) jiṣṇave yogāya viśvāni mā bhūtāny upa tiṣṭhantu yuktā ma āpa stha ||6||
GV00avs___u:5698: (AVŚ_10,5.7a) agner bhāga stha apāṃ śukram āpo devīr varco asmāsu dhatta |
GV00avs___u:5700: (AVŚ_10,5.8a) indrasya bhāga stha apāṃ śukram āpo devīr varco asmāsu
GV00avs___u:5703: (AVŚ_10,5.9a) somasya bhāga stha apāṃ śukram āpo devīr varco asmāsu dhatta
GV00avs___u:5705: (AVŚ_10,5.10a) varuṇasya bhāga stha apāṃ śukram āpo devīr varco asmāsu
GV00avs___u:5708: (AVŚ_10,5.11a) mitrāvaruṇayor bhāga stha apāṃ śukram āpo devīr varco asmāsu dhatta |
GV00avs___u:5710: (AVŚ_10,5.12a) yamasya bhāga stha apām śukram āpo devīr varco asmāsu
GV00avs___u:5713: (AVŚ_10,5.13a) pitṝṇāṃ bhāga stha apāṃ śukram āpo devīr varco asmāsu
GV00avs___u:5716: (AVŚ_10,5.14a) devasya savitur bhāga stha apāṃ śukram āpo devīr varco
GV00avs___u:5719: (AVŚ_10,5.15a) yo va āpo 'pāṃ bhāgo 'psv antar yajuṣyo devayajanaḥ |

GV00avs___u:5721: (AVŚ_10,5.15e) tena tam abhyatisṛjāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5722: (AVŚ_10,5.15g) taṃ vadheyaṃ taṃ stṛṣīyānena brahmaṇānena karmaṇānayā menyā

GV00avs___u:5740: (AVŚ_10,5.20c) idaṃ tam ati sṛjāmi taṃ mābhyavanikṣi |
