GV00avs___u:5743: (AVŚ_10,5.21a) yo va āpo 'pāṃ agnayo 'psv antar yajuṣyo devayajanaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5744: (AVŚ_10,5.21c) idaṃ tam ati sṛjāmi taṃ mābhyavanikṣi |
GV00avs___u:5745: (AVŚ_10,5.21e) tena tam abhyatisṛjāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5746: (AVŚ_10,5.21g) taṃ vadheyaṃ taṃ stṛṣīyānena brahmaṇānena karmaṇānayā menyā
GV00avs___u:5747: (AVŚ_10,5.22a) yad arvācīnaṃ traihāyaṇād anṛtaṃ kiṃ codima |
GV00avs___u:5748: (AVŚ_10,5.22c) āpo mā tasmāt sarvasmād duritāt pāntv aṃhasaḥ ||22||
GV00avs___u:5749: (AVŚ_10,5.23a) samudraṃ vaḥ pra hiṇomi svāṃ yonim apītana |
GV00avs___u:5750: (AVŚ_10,5.23c) ariṣṭāḥ sarvahāyaso mā ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamat ||23||
GV00avs___u:5752: (AVŚ_10,5.24c) prāsmad eno duritaṃ supratīkāḥ pra duṣvapnyam pra malaṃ vahantu ||24||
GV00avs___u:5754: (AVŚ_10,5.25c) pṛthivīm anu vi krame 'haṃ pṛthivyās taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5755: (AVŚ_10,5.25e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||25||
GV00avs___u:5757: (AVŚ_10,5.26c) antarikṣam anu vi krame 'haṃ antarikṣāt taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5758: (AVŚ_10,5.26e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||26||
GV00avs___u:5760: (AVŚ_10,5.27c) divam anu vi krame 'haṃ divas taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān
GV00avs___u:5762: (AVŚ_10,5.27e) sa mā jivīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||27||
GV00avs___u:5764: (AVŚ_10,5.28c) diśo anu vi krame 'haṃ digbhyas taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān
GV00avs___u:5766: (AVŚ_10,5.28e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||28||
GV00avs___u:5768: (AVŚ_10,5.29c) āśā anu vi krame 'haṃ āśābhyas taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān
GV00avs___u:5770: (AVŚ_10,5.29e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||29||
GV00avs___u:5772: (AVŚ_10,5.30c) ṛco 'nu vi krame 'haṃ ṛgbhyas taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān
GV00avs___u:5774: (AVŚ_10,5.30e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||30|| {15}
GV00avs___u:5776: (AVŚ_10,5.31c) yajñam anu vi krame 'haṃ yajñāt taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān
GV00avs___u:5778: (AVŚ_10,5.31e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||31||
GV00avs___u:5780: (AVŚ_10,5.32c) oṣadhīr anu vi krame 'haṃ oṣadhībhyas taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5781: (AVŚ_10,5.32e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||32||
GV00avs___u:5783: (AVŚ_10,5.33c) apo 'nu vi krame 'haṃ adbhyas taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān
GV00avs___u:5785: (AVŚ_10,5.33e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||33||
GV00avs___u:5787: (AVŚ_10,5.34c) kṛṣim anu vi krame 'haṃ kṛṣyās taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān
GV00avs___u:5789: (AVŚ_10,5.34e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||34||
GV00avs___u:5791: (AVŚ_10,5.35c) prāṇam anu vi krame 'haṃ prāṇāt taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān
GV00avs___u:5793: (AVŚ_10,5.35e) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāno jahātu ||35||
GV00avs___u:5794: (AVŚ_10,5.36a) jitam asmākam udbhinnam asmākam abhy aṣṭhāṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā arātīḥ |
GV00avs___u:5795: (AVŚ_10,5.36c) idam aham āmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasya varcas tejaḥ prāṇam āyur ni veṣṭayāmīdam enam adharāñcaṃ pādayāmi ||36||
GV00avs___u:5797: (AVŚ_10,5.37c) sā me draviṇaṃ yachatu sā me brāhmaṇavarcasam ||37||
GV00avs___u:5799: (AVŚ_10,5.38c) tā me draviṇaṃ yachantu tā me brāhmaṇavarcasam ||38||
GV00avs___u:5801: (AVŚ_10,5.39c) te me draviṇaṃ yachantu te me brāhmaṇavarcasam ||39||
GV00avs___u:5803: (AVŚ_10,5.40c) tan me draviṇaṃ yachantu tan me brāhmaṇavarcasam ||40||
GV00avs___u:5805: (AVŚ_10,5.41c) te me draviṇaṃ yachantu te me brāhmaṇavarcasam ||41||
GV00avs___u:5806: (AVŚ_10,5.42a) yam vayaṃ mṛgayāmahe taṃ vadhai stṛṇavāmahai |
GV00avs___u:5808: (AVŚ_10,5.43a) vaiśvānarasya daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ hetis taṃ sam adhād abhi |
GV00avs___u:5809: (AVŚ_10,5.43c) iyaṃ taṃ psātv āhutiḥ samid devī sahīyasī ||43||
GV00avs___u:5811: (AVŚ_10,5.44c) so 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram anne prāṇe badhāna
GV00avs___u:5812: (AVŚ_10,5.45a) yat te annaṃ bhuvas pata ākṣiyati pṛthivīm anu |
GV00avs___u:5813: (AVŚ_10,5.45c) tasya nas tvaṃ bhuvas pate saṃprayacha prajāpate ||45||
GV00avs___u:5814: (AVŚ_10,5.46a) apo divyā acāyiṣaṃ rasena sam apṛkṣmahi |
GV00avs___u:5815: (AVŚ_10,5.46c) payasvān agna āgamaṃ taṃ mā saṃ sṛja varcasā ||46||
GV00avs___u:5816: (AVŚ_10,5.47a) saṃ māgne varcasā sṛja saṃ prajayā sam āyuṣā |
GV00avs___u:5817: (AVŚ_10,5.47c) vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ ||47||
GV00avs___u:5818: (AVŚ_10,5.48a) yad agne adya mithunā śapato yad vācas tṛṣṭaṃ janayanta
GV00avs___u:5820: (AVŚ_10,5.48c) manyor manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān ||48||
GV00avs___u:5821: (AVŚ_10,5.49a) parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parāgne rakṣo harasā śṛṇīhi |
GV00avs___u:5822: (AVŚ_10,5.49c) parārciṣā mūradevāṃ chṛṇīhi parāsutṛpaḥ śośucataḥ śṛṇīhi
GV00avs___u:5823: (AVŚ_10,5.50a) apām asmai vajraṃ pra harāmi caturbhṛṣṭiṃ śīrṣabhidyāya vidvān |
GV00avs___u:5824: (AVŚ_10,5.50c) so asyāṅgāni pra śṛṇātu sarvā tan me devā anu jānantu viśve ||50|| {17}
GV00avs___u:5827: (AVŚ_10,6.2a) varma mahyam ayaṃ maṇiḥ phālāj jātaḥ kariṣyati |
GV00avs___u:5828: (AVŚ_10,6.2c) pūrṇo manthena māgamad rasena saha varcasā ||2||
GV00avs___u:5829: (AVŚ_10,6.3a) yat tvā śikvaḥ parāvadhīt takṣā hastena vāsyā |
GV00avs___u:5830: (AVŚ_10,6.3c) āpas tvā tasmaj jīvalāḥ punantu śucayaḥ śucim ||3||
GV00avs___u:5831: (AVŚ_10,6.4a) hiraṇyasrag ayaṃ maṇiḥ śraddhāṃ yajñaṃ maho dadhat |
GV00avs___u:5833: (AVŚ_10,6.5a) tasmai ghṛtaṃ suraṃ madhv annamannam kṣadāmahe |
GV00avs___u:5834: (AVŚ_10,6.5c) sa naḥ piteva putrebhyaḥ śreyaḥśreyaś cikitsatu bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvo devebhyo maṇir etya ||5||
GV00avs___u:5835: (AVŚ_10,6.6a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir maṇiṃ phālaṃ ghṛtaścutam ugraṃ kadhiram ojase |
GV00avs___u:5836: (AVŚ_10,6.6c) tam agniḥ praty amuñcata so asmai duha ājyaṃ bhūyobhūyaḥ
GV00avs___u:5838: (AVŚ_10,6.7a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir maṇiṃ phālaṃ ghṛtaścutam ugraṃ kadhiram ojase |
GV00avs___u:5839: (AVŚ_10,6.7c) tam indraḥ praty amuñcataujase vīryāya kam |
GV00avs___u:5840: (AVŚ_10,6.7e) so asmai balam id duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ
GV00avs___u:5842: (AVŚ_10,6.8a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir maṇiṃ phālaṃ ghṛtaścutam ugram kadhiram ojase |
GV00avs___u:5843: (AVŚ_10,6.8c) taṃ somaḥ praty amuñcata mahe śrotrāya cakṣase |
GV00avs___u:5844: (AVŚ_10,6.8e) so asmai varca id duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvam
GV00avs___u:5846: (AVŚ_10,6.9a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir maṇiṃ phālaṃ ghṛtaścutam ugraṃ khadiram ojase |
GV00avs___u:5847: (AVŚ_10,6.9c) taṃ sūryaḥ praty amuñcata tenemā ajayad diśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5848: (AVŚ_10,6.9e) so asmai bhūtim id duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ
GV00avs___u:5850: (AVŚ_10,6.10a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir maṇiṃ phālaṃ ghṛtaścutam ugram khadiram ojase |
GV00avs___u:5851: (AVŚ_10,6.10c) tam bibhrac candramā maṇim asurāṇāṃ puro 'jayad dānavānāṃ hiraṇyayīḥ |
GV00avs___u:5852: (AVŚ_10,6.10e) so asmai śriyam id duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ
GV00avs___u:5854: (AVŚ_10,6.11a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir vātāya maṇim āśave |
GV00avs___u:5855: (AVŚ_10,6.11c) so asmai vājinam id duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ
GV00avs___u:5857: (AVŚ_10,6.12a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir vātāya maṇim āśave |
GV00avs___u:5858: (AVŚ_10,6.12c) tenemāṃ maṇinā kṛṣim aśvināv abhi rakṣataḥ |
GV00avs___u:5859: (AVŚ_10,6.12e) sa bhiṣagbhyāṃ maho duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi ||12||
GV00avs___u:5860: (AVŚ_10,6.13a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir vātāya maṇim āśave |
GV00avs___u:5861: (AVŚ_10,6.13c) tam bibhrat savitā maṇiṃ tenedam ajayat svaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5862: (AVŚ_10,6.13e) so asmai sūnṛtāṃ duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi ||13||
GV00avs___u:5863: (AVŚ_10,6.14a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir vātāya maṇim āśave |
GV00avs___u:5864: (AVŚ_10,6.14c) tam āpo bibhratīr maṇiṃ sadā dhāvanty akṣitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:5865: (AVŚ_10,6.14e) sa ābhyo 'mṛtam id duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ
GV00avs___u:5867: (AVŚ_10,6.15a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir vātāya maṇim āśave |
GV00avs___u:5868: (AVŚ_10,6.15c) tam rājā varuṇo maṇiṃ praty amuñcata śaṃbhuvam |
GV00avs___u:5869: (AVŚ_10,6.15e) so asmai satyam id duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ
GV00avs___u:5871: (AVŚ_10,6.16a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir vātāya maṇim āśave |
GV00avs___u:5872: (AVŚ_10,6.16c) taṃ devā bibhrato maṇiṃ sarvāṃl lokān yudhājayan |
GV00avs___u:5873: (AVŚ_10,6.16e) sa ebhyo jitim id duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ
GV00avs___u:5875: (AVŚ_10,6.17a) yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir vātāya maṇim āśave |
GV00avs___u:5876: (AVŚ_10,6.17c) tam imaṃ devatā maṇiṃ praty amuñcanta śambhuvam |
GV00avs___u:5877: (AVŚ_10,6.17e) sa ābhyo viśvam id duhe bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ
GV00avs___u:5880: (AVŚ_10,6.18c) saṃvatsaras taṃ baddhvā sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ vi rakṣati ||18||
GV00avs___u:5884: (AVŚ_10,6.20c) tair medino aṅgiraso dasyūnāṃ bibhiduḥ puras tena tvam dviṣato jahi ||20||
GV00avs___u:5885: (AVŚ_10,6.21a) taṃ dhātā praty amuñcata sa bhūtaṃ vy akalpayat |
GV00avs___u:5888: (AVŚ_10,6.22c) sa māyaṃ maṇir āgamad rasena saha varcasā ||22||
GV00avs___u:5890: (AVŚ_10,6.23c) sa māyaṃ maṇir āgamat saha gobhir ajāvibhir annena prajayā
GV00avs___u:5893: (AVŚ_10,6.24c) sa māyaṃ maṇir āgamat saha vrīhiyavābhyāṃ mahasā bhūtyā saha ||24||
GV00avs___u:5895: (AVŚ_10,6.25c) sa māyaṃ maṇir āgaman madhor ghṛtasya dhārayā kīlālena maṇiḥ saha ||25||
GV00avs___u:5897: (AVŚ_10,6.26c) sa māyaṃ maṇir āgamad ūrjayā payasā saha draviṇena śriyā
GV00avs___u:5900: (AVŚ_10,6.27c) sa māyaṃ maṇir āgamat tejasā tviṣyā saha yaśasā kīrtyā saha
GV00avs___u:5902: (AVŚ_10,6.28c) sa māyaṃ maṇir āgamat sarvābhir bhūtibhiḥ saha ||28||
GV00avs___u:5903: (AVŚ_10,6.29a) tam imaṃ devatā maṇiṃ mahyaṃ dadatu puṣṭaye |
GV00avs___u:5905: (AVŚ_10,6.30a) brahmaṇā tejasā saha prati muñcāmi me śivam |
GV00avs___u:5907: (AVŚ_10,6.31a) uttaraṃ dviṣato mām ayaṃ maṇiḥ kṛṇotu devajāḥ |
GV00avs___u:5908: (AVŚ_10,6.31c) yasya lokā ime trayaḥ payo dugdham upāsate |
GV00avs___u:5909: (AVŚ_10,6.31e) sa māyam adhi rohatu maṇiḥ śraiṣṭhyāya mūrdhataḥ ||31||
GV00avs___u:5910: (AVŚ_10,6.32a) yaṃ devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā upajīvanti sarvadā |
GV00avs___u:5911: (AVŚ_10,6.32c) sa māyam adhi rohatu maṇiḥ śraiṣṭhyāya mūrdhataḥ ||32||
GV00avs___u:5912: (AVŚ_10,6.33a) yathā bījam urvarāyāṃ kṛṣṭe phālena rohati |
GV00avs___u:5913: (AVŚ_10,6.33c) evā mayi prajā paśavo 'nnamannaṃ vi rohatu ||33||
GV00avs___u:5914: (AVŚ_10,6.34a) yasmai tvā yajñavardhana maṇe pratyamucaṃ śivam |
GV00avs___u:5915: (AVŚ_10,6.34c) taṃ tvaṃ śatadakṣiṇa maṇe śraiṣṭhyāya jinvatāt ||34||
GV00avs___u:5916: (AVŚ_10,6.35a) etam idhmaṃ samāhitaṃ juṣaṇo agne prati harya homaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:5917: (AVŚ_10,6.35c) tasmin vidhema sumatiṃ svasti prajām cakṣuḥ paśūnt samiddhe jātavedasi brahmaṇā (AVŚ_10,7.1a) kasminn aṅge tapo asyādhi tiṣṭhati kasminn aṅga ṛtam asyādhy
GV00avs___u:5919: (AVŚ_10,7.1c) kva vrataṃ kva śraddhāsya tiṣṭhati kasminn aṅge satyam asya
GV00avs___u:5921: (AVŚ_10,7.2a) kasmād aṅgād dīpyate agnir asya kasmād aṅgāt pavate mātariśva |
GV00avs___u:5922: (AVŚ_10,7.2c) kasmād aṅgād vi mimīte 'dhi candramā maha skambhasya mimāno aṅgam ||2||
GV00avs___u:5923: (AVŚ_10,7.3a) kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhati bhūmir asya kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:5924: (AVŚ_10,7.3c) kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty āhitā dyauḥ kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty uttaraṃ divaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:5925: (AVŚ_10,7.4a) kva prepsan dīpyata ūrdhvo agniḥ kva prepsan pavate mātariśvā |
GV00avs___u:5926: (AVŚ_10,7.4c) yatra prepsantīr abhiyanty āvṛtaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ
GV00avs___u:5927: (AVŚ_10,7.5a) kvārdhamāsāḥ kva yanti māsāḥ saṃvatsareṇa saha saṃvidānāḥ |
GV00avs___u:5928: (AVŚ_10,7.5c) yatra yanty ṛtavo yatrārtavāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:5929: (AVŚ_10,7.6a) kva prepsantī yuvatī virūpe ahorātre dravataḥ saṃvidāne |
GV00avs___u:5930: (AVŚ_10,7.6c) yatra prepsantīr abhiyanty āpaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:5931: (AVŚ_10,7.7a) yasmint stabdhvā prajāpatir lokānt sarvāṃ adhārayat |
GV00avs___u:5932: (AVŚ_10,7.7c) skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:5933: (AVŚ_10,7.8a) yat paramam avamam yac ca madhyamaṃ prajāpatiḥ sasṛje viśvarūpam |
GV00avs___u:5934: (AVŚ_10,7.8c) kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa tatra yan na prāviśat kiyat tad babhūva ||8||
GV00avs___u:5935: (AVŚ_10,7.9a) kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa bhūtam kiyad bhaviṣyad anvāśaye 'sya |
GV00avs___u:5936: (AVŚ_10,7.9c) ekaṃ yad aṅgam akṛṇot sahasradhā kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa
GV00avs___u:5938: (AVŚ_10,7.10a) yatra lokāmś ca kośāṃś cāpo brahma janā viduḥ |
GV00avs___u:5939: (AVŚ_10,7.10c) asac ca yatra sac cānta skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||10|| {22}
GV00avs___u:5940: (AVŚ_10,7.11a) yatra tapaḥ parākramya vrataṃ dhārayaty uttaram |
GV00avs___u:5941: (AVŚ_10,7.11c) ṛtaṃ ca yatra śraddhā cāpo brahma samāhitāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ
GV00avs___u:5943: (AVŚ_10,7.12a) yasmin bhūmir antarikṣaṃ dyaur yasminn adhy āhitā |
GV00avs___u:5944: (AVŚ_10,7.12c) yatrāgniś candramāḥ sūryo vātas tiṣṭhanty ārpitāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:5945: (AVŚ_10,7.13a) yasya trayastriṃśad devā aṅge sarve samāhitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:5946: (AVŚ_10,7.13c) skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:5947: (AVŚ_10,7.14a) yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathamajā ṛcaḥ sāma yajur mahī |
GV00avs___u:5948: (AVŚ_10,7.14c) ekarṣir yasminn ārpitaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva
GV00avs___u:5950: (AVŚ_10,7.15a) yatrāmṛtaṃ ca mṛtyuś ca puruṣe 'dhi samāhite |
GV00avs___u:5951: (AVŚ_10,7.15c) samudro yasya nāḍyaḥ puruṣe 'dhi samāhitāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ
GV00avs___u:5953: (AVŚ_10,7.16a) yasya catasraḥ pradiśo nāḍyas tiṣṭhanti prathamāḥ |
GV00avs___u:5954: (AVŚ_10,7.16c) yajño yatra parākrāntaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva
GV00avs___u:5956: (AVŚ_10,7.17a) ye puruṣe brahma vidus te viduḥ parameṣṭhinam |
GV00avs___u:5957: (AVŚ_10,7.17c) yo veda parameṣṭhinaṃ yaś ca veda prajāpatim |
GV00avs___u:5958: (AVŚ_10,7.17e) jyeṣṭhaṃ ye brāhmaṇaṃ vidus te skambham anusaṃviduḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:5960: (AVŚ_10,7.18c) aṅgāni yasya yātavaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva
GV00avs___u:5962: (AVŚ_10,7.19a) yasya brahma mukham āhur jihvāṃ madhukaśām uta |
GV00avs___u:5963: (AVŚ_10,7.19c) virājam ūdho yasyāhuḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva
GV00avs___u:5965: (AVŚ_10,7.20a) yasmād ṛco apātakṣan yajur yasmād apākaṣan |
GV00avs___u:5966: (AVŚ_10,7.20c) sāmāni yasya lomāny atharvāṅgiraso mukhaṃ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||20|| {23}
GV00avs___u:5967: (AVŚ_10,7.21a) asaccākhāṃ pratiṣṭhantīṃ paramam iva janā viduḥ |
GV00avs___u:5968: (AVŚ_10,7.21c) uto san manyante 'vare ye te śākhām upāsate ||21||
GV00avs___u:5969: (AVŚ_10,7.22a) yatrādityāś ca rudrāś ca vasavaś ca samāhitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:5970: (AVŚ_10,7.22c) bhūtaṃ ca yatra bhavyaṃ ca sarve lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||22||
GV00avs___u:5971: (AVŚ_10,7.23a) yasya trayastriṃśad devā nidhiṃ rakṣanti sarvadā |
GV00avs___u:5972: (AVŚ_10,7.23c) nidhiṃ tam adya ko veda yaṃ devā abhirakṣatha ||23||
GV00avs___u:5973: (AVŚ_10,7.24a) yatra devā brahmavido brahma jyeṣṭham upāsate |
GV00avs___u:5974: (AVŚ_10,7.24c) yo vai tān vidyāt pratyakṣaṃ sa brahmā veditā syāt ||24||
GV00avs___u:5975: (AVŚ_10,7.25a) bṛhanto nāma te devā ye 'sataḥ pari jajñire |
GV00avs___u:5976: (AVŚ_10,7.25c) ekaṃ tad aṅgaṃ skambhasyāsad āhuḥ paro janāḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:5978: (AVŚ_10,7.26c) ekaṃ tad aṅgaṃ skambhasya purāṇam anusaṃviduḥ ||26||
GV00avs___u:5979: (AVŚ_10,7.27a) yasya trayastriṃśad devā aṅge gātrā vibhejire |
GV00avs___u:5980: (AVŚ_10,7.27c) tān vai trayastriṃśad devān eke brahamvido viduḥ ||27||
GV00avs___u:5982: (AVŚ_10,7.28c) skambhas tad agre prāsiñcad dhiraṇyaṃ loke antarā ||28||
GV00avs___u:5983: (AVŚ_10,7.29a) skambhe lokāḥ skambhe tapaḥ skambhe 'dhy ṛtam āhitam |
GV00avs___u:5984: (AVŚ_10,7.29c) skambha tvā veda pratyakṣam indre sarvaṃ samāhitam ||29||
GV00avs___u:5985: (AVŚ_10,7.30a) indre lokā indre tapa indre 'dhy ṛtam āhitam |
GV00avs___u:5986: (AVŚ_10,7.30c) indraṃ tvā veda pratyakṣaṃ skambhe sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GV00avs___u:5987: (AVŚ_10,7.31a) nāma nāmnā johavīti purā sūryāt puroṣasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5988: (AVŚ_10,7.31c) yad ajaḥ prathamaṃ saṃbabhūva sa ha tat svarājyam iyāya
GV00avs___u:5991: (AVŚ_10,7.32c) divaṃ yaś cakre mūrdhānaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ ||32||
GV00avs___u:5992: (AVŚ_10,7.33a) yasya sūryaś cakṣuś candramāś ca punarṇavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:5993: (AVŚ_10,7.33c) agniṃ yaś cakra āsyaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ ||33||
GV00avs___u:5995: (AVŚ_10,7.34c) diśo yaś cakre prajñānīs tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ ||34||
GV00avs___u:5996: (AVŚ_10,7.35a) skambho dādhāra dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime skambho dādhārorv antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:5997: (AVŚ_10,7.35c) skambho dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ skambha idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam ā viveśa
GV00avs___u:5998: (AVŚ_10,7.36a) yaḥ śramāt tapaso jāto lokānt sarvānt samānaśe |
GV00avs___u:5999: (AVŚ_10,7.36c) somaṃ yaś cakre kevalaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ ||36||
GV00avs___u:6000: (AVŚ_10,7.37a) kathaṃ vāto nelayati kathaṃ na ramate manaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6001: (AVŚ_10,7.37c) kim āpaḥ satyaṃ prepsantīr nelayanti kadā cana ||37||
GV00avs___u:6002: (AVŚ_10,7.38a) mahad yakṣaṃ bhuvanasya madhye tapasi krāntaṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe |
GV00avs___u:6003: (AVŚ_10,7.38c) tasmin chrayante ya u ke ca devā vṛkṣasya skandhaḥ parita iva śākhāḥ ||38||
GV00avs___u:6004: (AVŚ_10,7.39a) yasmai hastābhyāṃ pādābhyāṃ vācā śrotreṇa cakṣuṣā |
GV00avs___u:6005: (AVŚ_10,7.39c) yasmai devāḥ sadā baliṃ prayachanti vimite 'mitaṃ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||39||
GV00avs___u:6006: (AVŚ_10,7.40a) apa tasya hataṃ tamo vyāvṛttaḥ sa pāpmanā |
GV00avs___u:6007: (AVŚ_10,7.40c) sarvāṇi tasmin jyotīṃṣi yāni trīṇi prajāpatau ||40||
GV00avs___u:6008: (AVŚ_10,7.41a) yo vetasaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ salile veda |
GV00avs___u:6010: (AVŚ_10,7.42a) tantram eke yuvatī virūpe abhyākrāmaṃ vayataḥ ṣaṇmayūkham |
GV00avs___u:6011: (AVŚ_10,7.42c) prānyā tantūṃs tirate dhatte anyā nāpa vṛñjāte na gamāto
GV00avs___u:6013: (AVŚ_10,7.43a) tayor ahaṃ parinṛtyantyor iva na vi jānāmi yatarā parastāt
GV00avs___u:6014: (AVŚ_10,7.43c) pumān enad vayaty ud gṛṇanti pumān enad vi jabhārādhi nāke
GV00avs___u:6015: (AVŚ_10,7.44a) ime mayūkhā upa tastabhur divaṃ sāmāni cakrus tasarāṇi vātave ||44|| {25}
GV00avs___u:6016: (AVŚ_10,8.1a) yo bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca sarvaṃ yaś cādhitiṣṭhati |
GV00avs___u:6017: (AVŚ_10,8.1c) sv aryasya ca kevalaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:6018: (AVŚ_10,8.2a) skambheneme viṣṭabhite dyauś ca bhūmiś ca tiṣṭhataḥ |
GV00avs___u:6019: (AVŚ_10,8.2c) skambha idaṃ sarvam ātmanvad yat prāṇan nimiṣac ca yat ||2||
GV00avs___u:6020: (AVŚ_10,8.3a) tisro ha prajā atyāyam āyan ny anyā arkam abhito 'viśanta |
GV00avs___u:6021: (AVŚ_10,8.3c) bṛhan ha tasthau rajaso vimāno harito hariṇīr ā viveśa ||3||
GV00avs___u:6022: (AVŚ_10,8.4a) dvādaśa pradhayaś cakram ekaṃ trīṇi nabhyāni ka u tac ciketa
GV00avs___u:6023: (AVŚ_10,8.4c) tatrāhatās trīṇi śatāni śaṅkavaḥ ṣaṣṭiś ca khīlā avicācalā ye ||4||
GV00avs___u:6024: (AVŚ_10,8.5a) idaṃ savitar vi jānīhi ṣaḍ yamā eka ekajaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6025: (AVŚ_10,8.5c) tasmin hāpitvam ichante ya eṣām eka ekajaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:6026: (AVŚ_10,8.6a) āviḥ san nihitaṃ guhā jaran nāma mahat padam |
GV00avs___u:6027: (AVŚ_10,8.6c) tatredaṃ sarvam ārpitam ejat prāṇat pratiṣṭhitam ||6||
GV00avs___u:6028: (AVŚ_10,8.7a) ekacakraṃ vartata ekanemi sahasrākṣaraṃ pra puro ni paścā |
GV00avs___u:6029: (AVŚ_10,8.7c) ardhena viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna yad asyārdhaṃ kva tad babhūva
GV00avs___u:6030: (AVŚ_10,8.8a) pañcavāhī vahatyagram eṣāṃ praṣṭayo yuktā anusaṃvahanti |
GV00avs___u:6031: (AVŚ_10,8.8c) ayātam asya dadṛśe na yātaṃ paraṃ nedīyo 'varaṃ davīyaḥ
GV00avs___u:6032: (AVŚ_10,8.9a) tiryagbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnas tasmin yaśo nihitaṃ
GV00avs___u:6034: (AVŚ_10,8.9c) tad āsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta sākaṃ ye asya gopā mahato babhūvuḥ
GV00avs___u:6035: (AVŚ_10,8.10a) yā purastād yujyate yā ca paścād yā viśvato yujyate yā ca sarvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:6036: (AVŚ_10,8.10c) yayā yajñaḥ prāṅ tāyate tāṃ tvā pṛchāmi katamā sā ṛcām
GV00avs___u:6037: (AVŚ_10,8.11a) yad ejati patati yac ca tiṣṭhati prāṇad aprāṇan nimiṣac ca yad bhuvat |
GV00avs___u:6038: (AVŚ_10,8.11c) tad dādhāra pṛthivīṃ viśvarūpaṃ tat saṃbhūya bhavaty ekam eva ||11||
GV00avs___u:6039: (AVŚ_10,8.12a) anantaṃ vitataṃ purutrānantam antavac cā samante |
GV00avs___u:6040: (AVŚ_10,8.12c) te nākapālaś carati vicinvan vidvān bhūtam uta bhavyam asya
GV00avs___u:6041: (AVŚ_10,8.13a) prajāpatiś carati garbhe antar adṛśyamāno bahudhā vi jāyate |
GV00avs___u:6042: (AVŚ_10,8.13c) ardhena viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna yad asyārdhaṃ katamaḥ sa ketuḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:6044: (AVŚ_10,8.14c) paśyanti sarve cakṣuṣā na sarve manasā viduḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:6045: (AVŚ_10,8.15a) dūre pūrṇena vasati dūra ūnena hīyate |
GV00avs___u:6046: (AVŚ_10,8.15c) mahad yakṣaṃ bhuvanasya madhye tasmai baliṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto bharanti ||15||
GV00avs___u:6047: (AVŚ_10,8.16a) yataḥ sūryaḥ udety astaṃ yatra ca gachati |
GV00avs___u:6048: (AVŚ_10,8.16c) tad eva manye 'haṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tad u nāty eti kiṃ cana ||16||
GV00avs___u:6049: (AVŚ_10,8.17a) ye arvāṅ madhya uta vā purāṇaṃ vedaṃ vidvāṃsam abhito
GV00avs___u:6051: (AVŚ_10,8.17c) ādityam eva te pari vadanti sarve agniṃ dvitīyaṃ trivṛtaṃ
GV00avs___u:6053: (AVŚ_10,8.18a) sahasrāhṇyaṃ viyatāv asya pakṣau harer haṃsasya patataḥ svargam |
GV00avs___u:6054: (AVŚ_10,8.18c) sa devānt sarvān urasy upadadya saṃpaśyan yāti bhuvanāni viśvā ||18||
GV00avs___u:6056: (AVŚ_10,8.19c) prāṇena tiryaṅ prāṇati yasmin jyeṣṭham adhi śritam ||19||
GV00avs___u:6057: (AVŚ_10,8.20a) yo vai te vidyād araṇī yābhyāṃ nirmathyate vasu |
GV00avs___u:6058: (AVŚ_10,8.20c) sa vidvān jyeṣṭhaṃ manyeta sa vidyād brāhmaṇaṃ mahat ||20||
GV00avs___u:6059: (AVŚ_10,8.21a) apād agre sam abhavat so agre svar ābharat |
GV00avs___u:6060: (AVŚ_10,8.21c) catuṣpād bhūtvā bhogyaḥ sarvam ādatta bhojanam ||21||
GV00avs___u:6061: (AVŚ_10,8.22a) bhogyo bhavad atho annam adad bahu |
GV00avs___u:6063: (AVŚ_10,8.23a) sanātanam enam āhur utādya syāt punarṇavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6064: (AVŚ_10,8.23c) ahorātre pra jāyete anyo anyasya rūpayoḥ ||23||
GV00avs___u:6065: (AVŚ_10,8.24a) śataṃ sahasram ayutaṃ nyarbudam asaṃkhyeyaṃ svam asmin niviṣṭam |
GV00avs___u:6066: (AVŚ_10,8.24c) tad asya ghnanty abhipaśyata eva tasmād devo rocat eṣa etat
GV00avs___u:6067: (AVŚ_10,8.25a) bālād ekam aṇīyaskam utaikaṃ neva dṛśyate |
GV00avs___u:6068: (AVŚ_10,8.25c) tataḥ pariṣvajīyasī devatā sā mama priyā ||25||
GV00avs___u:6070: (AVŚ_10,8.26c) yasmai kṛtā śaye sa yaś cakāra jajāra saḥ ||26||
GV00avs___u:6071: (AVŚ_10,8.27a) tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumān asi tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī||
GV00avs___u:6072: (AVŚ_10,8.27b) tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ ||27||
GV00avs___u:6073: (AVŚ_10,8.28a) utaiṣāṃ pitota vā putra eṣām utaiṣāṃ jyeṣṭha uta vā
GV00avs___u:6075: (AVŚ_10,8.28c) eko ha devo manasi praviṣṭaḥ prathamo jātaḥ sa u garbhe antaḥ ||28||
GV00avs___u:6076: (AVŚ_10,8.29a) pūrṇāt pūrṇam ud acati pūrṇaṃ pūrṇena sicyate |
GV00avs___u:6077: (AVŚ_10,8.29c) uto tad adya vidyāma yatas tat pariṣicyate ||29||
GV00avs___u:6078: (AVŚ_10,8.30a) eṣā sanatnī sanam eva jātaiṣā purāṇī pari sarvaṃ babhūva |
GV00avs___u:6079: (AVŚ_10,8.30c) mahī devy uṣaso vibhātī saikenaikena miṣatā vi caṣṭe ||30||
GV00avs___u:6082: (AVŚ_10,8.32a) anti santaṃ na jahāty anti santaṃ na paśyati |
GV00avs___u:6083: (AVŚ_10,8.32c) devasya paśya kāvyaṃ na mamāra na jīryati ||32||
GV00avs___u:6085: (AVŚ_10,8.33c) vadantīr yatra gachanti tad āhur brāhmaṇaṃ mahat ||33||
GV00avs___u:6086: (AVŚ_10,8.34a) yatra devāś ca manuṣyāś cārā nābhāv iva śritāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6087: (AVŚ_10,8.34c) apāṃ tvā puṣpaṃ pṛchāmi yatra tan māyayā hitam ||34||
GV00avs___u:6088: (AVŚ_10,8.35a) yebhir vāta iṣitaḥ pravāti ye dadante pañca diśaḥ sadhrīcīḥ
GV00avs___u:6089: (AVŚ_10,8.35c) ya āhutim atyamanyanta devā apāṃ netāraḥ katame ta āsan
GV00avs___u:6090: (AVŚ_10,8.36a) imām eṣāṃ pṛthivīṃ vasta eko 'ntarikṣaṃ pary eko babhūva |
GV00avs___u:6091: (AVŚ_10,8.36c) divam eṣāṃ dadate yo vidhartā viśvā āśāḥ prati rakṣanty eke
GV00avs___u:6092: (AVŚ_10,8.37a) yo vidyāt sūtraṃ vitataṃ yasminn otāḥ prajā imāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6093: (AVŚ_10,8.37c) sūtraṃ sūtrasya yo vidyād sa vidyād brāhmaṇaṃ mahat ||37||
GV00avs___u:6094: (AVŚ_10,8.38a) vedāhaṃ sūtraṃ vitataṃ yasminn otāḥ prajā imāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6095: (AVŚ_10,8.38c) sūtraṃ sūtrasyāhaṃ vedātho yad brāhmaṇaṃ mahad ||38||
GV00avs___u:6096: (AVŚ_10,8.39a) yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī agnir ait pradahan viśvadāvyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6097: (AVŚ_10,8.39c) yatrātiṣṭhann ekapatnīḥ parastāt kvevāsīn mātariśvā tadānīm
GV00avs___u:6098: (AVŚ_10,8.40a) apsv āsīn mātariśvā praviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭā devāḥ salilāny
GV00avs___u:6100: (AVŚ_10,8.40b) bṛhan ha tasthau rajaso vimānaḥ pavamāno harita ā viveśa
GV00avs___u:6102: (AVŚ_10,8.41c) sāmnā ye sāma saṃvidur ajas tad dadṛśe kva ||41||
GV00avs___u:6103: (AVŚ_10,8.42a) niveśanaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ deva iva savitā satyadharmā |
GV00avs___u:6106: (AVŚ_10,8.43c) tasmin yad yakṣam ātmanvat tad vai brahmavido viduḥ ||43||
GV00avs___u:6107: (AVŚ_10,8.44a) akāmo dhīro amṛtaḥ svayaṃbhū rasena tṛpto na kutaś canonaḥ
GV00avs___u:6108: (AVŚ_10,8.44c) tam eva vidvān na bibhāya mṛtyor ātmānaṃ dhīram ajaraṃ
GV00avs___u:6110: (AVŚ_10,9.1a) aghāyatām api nahyā mukhāni sapatneṣu vajram arpayaitam |
GV00avs___u:6111: (AVŚ_10,9.1c) indreṇa dattā prathamā śataudanā bhrātṛvyaghnī yajamānasya
GV00avs___u:6113: (AVŚ_10,9.2a) vediṣ ṭe carma bhavatu barhir lomāni yāni te |
GV00avs___u:6114: (AVŚ_10,9.2c) eṣā tvā raśanāgrabhīd grāvā tvaiṣo 'dhi nṛtyatu ||2||
GV00avs___u:6115: (AVŚ_10,9.3a) bālās te prokṣaṇīḥ santu jīhvā saṃ mārṣṭu aghnye |
GV00avs___u:6116: (AVŚ_10,9.3c) śuddhā tvaṃ yajñiyā bhūtvā divaṃ prehi śataudane ||3||
GV00avs___u:6117: (AVŚ_10,9.4a) yaḥ śataudanāṃ pacati kāmapreṇa sa kalpate |
GV00avs___u:6118: (AVŚ_10,9.4c) prītā hy asya ṛtvijaḥ sarve yanti yathāyatham ||4||
GV00avs___u:6119: (AVŚ_10,9.5a) sa svargam ā rohati yatrādas tridivaṃ divaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6121: (AVŚ_10,9.6a) sa tāṃl lokānt sam āpnoti ye divyā ye ca pārthivāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6123: (AVŚ_10,9.7a) ye te devi śamitāraḥ paktāro ye ca te janāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6124: (AVŚ_10,9.7c) te tvā sarve gopsyanti maibhyo bhaiṣīḥ śataudane ||7||
GV00avs___u:6125: (AVŚ_10,9.8a) vasavas tvā dakṣiṇata uttarān marutas tvā |
GV00avs___u:6126: (AVŚ_10,9.8c) ādityāḥ paścād gopsyanti sāgniṣṭomam ati drava ||8||
GV00avs___u:6127: (AVŚ_10,9.9a) devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā gandharvāpsarasaś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:6128: (AVŚ_10,9.9c) te tvā sarve gopsyanti sātirātram ati drava ||9||
GV00avs___u:6129: (AVŚ_10,9.10a) antarikṣaṃ divaṃ bhūmim ādityān maruto diśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6130: (AVŚ_10,9.10c) lokānt sa sarvān āpnoti yo dadāti śataudanām ||10|| {30}
GV00avs___u:6131: (AVŚ_10,9.11a) ghṛtaṃ prokṣantī subhagā devī devān gamiṣyati |
GV00avs___u:6132: (AVŚ_10,9.11c) paktāram aghnye mā hiṃsīr divaṃ prehi śataudane ||11||
GV00avs___u:6133: (AVŚ_10,9.12a) ye devā diviṣado antarikṣasadaś ca ye ye ceme bhūmyām adhi
GV00avs___u:6134: (AVŚ_10,9.12c) tebhyas tvaṃ dhukṣva sarvadā kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||12||
GV00avs___u:6135: (AVŚ_10,9.13a) yat te śiro yat te mukhaṃ yau karṇau ye ca te hanū |
GV00avs___u:6136: (AVŚ_10,9.13c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||13||
GV00avs___u:6137: (AVŚ_10,9.14a) yau ta oṣṭhau ye nāsike ye śṛṅge ye ca te 'kṣiṇī |
GV00avs___u:6138: (AVŚ_10,9.14c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||14||
GV00avs___u:6139: (AVŚ_10,9.15a) yat te klomā yad dhṛdayaṃ purītat sahakaṇṭhikā |
GV00avs___u:6140: (AVŚ_10,9.15c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||15||
GV00avs___u:6141: (AVŚ_10,9.16a) yat te yakṛd ye matasne yad āntram yāś ca te gudāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6142: (AVŚ_10,9.16c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||16||
GV00avs___u:6143: (AVŚ_10,9.17a) yas te plāśir yo vaniṣṭhur yau kukṣī yac ca carma te |
GV00avs___u:6144: (AVŚ_10,9.17c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||17||
GV00avs___u:6145: (AVŚ_10,9.18a) yat te majjā yad asthi yan maṃsaṃ yac ca lohitam |
GV00avs___u:6146: (AVŚ_10,9.18c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||18||
GV00avs___u:6147: (AVŚ_10,9.19a) yau te bāhū ye doṣaṇī yāv aṃsau yā ca te kakut |
GV00avs___u:6148: (AVŚ_10,9.19c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||19||
GV00avs___u:6149: (AVŚ_10,9.20a) yās te grīvā ye skandhā yāḥ pṛṣṭīr yāś ca parśavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6150: (AVŚ_10,9.20c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||20|| {31}
GV00avs___u:6151: (AVŚ_10,9.21a) yau ta urū aṣṭhīvantau ye śroṇī yā ca te bhasat |
GV00avs___u:6152: (AVŚ_10,9.21c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||21||
GV00avs___u:6153: (AVŚ_10,9.22a) yat te puchaṃ ye te bālā yad ūdho ye ca te stanāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6154: (AVŚ_10,9.22c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||22||
GV00avs___u:6155: (AVŚ_10,9.23a) yās te jaṅghāḥ yāḥ kuṣṭhikā ṛcharā ye ca te śaphāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6156: (AVŚ_10,9.23c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||23||
GV00avs___u:6157: (AVŚ_10,9.24a) yat te carma śataudane yāni lomāny aghnye |
GV00avs___u:6158: (AVŚ_10,9.24c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||24||
GV00avs___u:6160: (AVŚ_10,9.25c) tau pakṣau devi kṛtvā sā paktāraṃ divaṃ vaha ||25||
GV00avs___u:6161: (AVŚ_10,9.26a) ulūkhale musale yaś ca carmaṇi yo vā śūrpe taṇḍulaḥ kaṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6162: (AVŚ_10,9.26c) yaṃ vā vāto mātariśvā pavamāno mamāthāgniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu ||26||
GV00avs___u:6163: (AVŚ_10,9.27a) apo devīr madhumatīr ghṛtaścuto brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi |
GV00avs___u:6164: (AVŚ_10,9.27c) yatkāma idam abhiṣiñcāmi vo 'haṃ tan me sarvaṃ saṃ padyatāṃ vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||27|| {32}
GV00avs___u:6165: (AVŚ_10,10.1a) namas te jāyamānāyai jātāyā uta te namaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6167: (AVŚ_10,10.2a) yo vidyāt sapta pravataḥ sapta vidyāt parāvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:6168: (AVŚ_10,10.2c) śiro yajñasya yo vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt ||2||
GV00avs___u:6169: (AVŚ_10,10.3a) vedāhaṃ sapta pravataḥ sapta veda parāvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:6170: (AVŚ_10,10.3c) śiro yajñasyāhaṃ veda somaṃ cāsyāṃ vicakṣaṇam ||3||
GV00avs___u:6171: (AVŚ_10,10.4a) yayā dyaur yayā pṛthivī yayāpo gupitā imāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6173: (AVŚ_10,10.5a) śataṃ kaṃsāḥ śataṃ dogdhāraḥ śataṃ goptāro adhi pṛṣṭhe asyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6174: (AVŚ_10,10.5c) ye devās tasyāṃ prāṇanti te vaśāṃ vidur ekadhā ||5||
GV00avs___u:6176: (AVŚ_10,10.6c) vaśā parjanyapatnī devāṃ apy eti brahmaṇā ||6||
GV00avs___u:6177: (AVŚ_10,10.7a) anu tvāgniḥ prāviśad anu somo vaśe tvā |
GV00avs___u:6178: (AVŚ_10,10.7c) ūdhas te bhadre parjanyo vidyutas te stanā vaśe ||7||
GV00avs___u:6179: (AVŚ_10,10.8a) apas tvaṃ dhukṣe prathamā urvarā aparā vaśe |
GV00avs___u:6180: (AVŚ_10,10.8c) tṛtīyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ dhukṣe 'nnaṃ kṣīraṃ vaśe tvam ||8||
GV00avs___u:6182: (AVŚ_10,10.9c) indraḥ sahasraṃ pātrānt somaṃ tvāpāyayad vaśe ||9||
GV00avs___u:6183: (AVŚ_10,10.10a) yad anūcīndram air āt tvā ṛṣabho 'hvayat |
GV00avs___u:6184: (AVŚ_10,10.10c) tasmāt te vṛtrahā payaḥ kṣīraṃ kruddho 'harad vaśe ||10||
GV00avs___u:6185: (AVŚ_10,10.11a) yat te kruddho dhanapatir ā kṣīram aharad vaśe |
GV00avs___u:6186: (AVŚ_10,10.11c) idaṃ tad adya nākas triṣu pātreṣu rakṣati ||11||
GV00avs___u:6187: (AVŚ_10,10.12a) triṣu pātreṣu taṃ somam ā devy aharad vaśā |
GV00avs___u:6188: (AVŚ_10,10.12c) atharvā yatra dīkṣito barhiṣy āsta hiraṇyaye ||12||
GV00avs___u:6189: (AVŚ_10,10.13a) saṃ hi somenāgata sam u sarveṇa padvatā |
GV00avs___u:6190: (AVŚ_10,10.13c) vaśā samudram adhy aṣṭhad gandharvaiḥ kalibhiḥ saha ||13||
GV00avs___u:6191: (AVŚ_10,10.14a) saṃ hi vātenāgata sam u sarvaiḥ patatribhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:6192: (AVŚ_10,10.14c) vaśā samudre prānṛtyad ṛcaḥ sāmāni bibhratī ||14||
GV00avs___u:6193: (AVŚ_10,10.15a) saṃ hi sūryeṇāgata sam u sarveṇa cakṣuṣā |
GV00avs___u:6194: (AVŚ_10,10.15c) vaśā samudram aty akhyad bhadrā jyotīṃṣi bibhratī ||15||
GV00avs___u:6196: (AVŚ_10,10.16c) aśvaḥ samudro bhūtvādhy askandad vaśe tvā ||16||
GV00avs___u:6197: (AVŚ_10,10.17a) tad bhadrāḥ sam agachanta vaśā deṣṭry atho svadhā |
GV00avs___u:6198: (AVŚ_10,10.17c) atharvā yatra dīkṣito barhiṣy āsta hiraṇyaye ||17||
GV00avs___u:6199: (AVŚ_10,10.18a) vaśā mātā rājanyasya vaśā mātā svadhe tava |
GV00avs___u:6200: (AVŚ_10,10.18c) vaśāyā yajña āyudhaṃ tataś cittam ajāyata ||18||
GV00avs___u:6201: (AVŚ_10,10.19a) ūrdhvo bindur ud acarad brahmaṇaḥ kakudād adhi |
GV00avs___u:6202: (AVŚ_10,10.19c) tatas tvaṃ jajñiṣe vaśe tato hotājāyata ||19||
GV00avs___u:6203: (AVŚ_10,10.20a) āsnas te gāthā abhavann uṣṇihābhyo balaṃ vaśe |
GV00avs___u:6204: (AVŚ_10,10.20c) pājasyāj jajñe yajña stanebhyo raśmayas tava ||20|| {34}
GV00avs___u:6205: (AVŚ_10,10.21a) īrmābhyām ayanaṃ jātaṃ sakthibhyāṃ ca vaśe tava |
GV00avs___u:6206: (AVŚ_10,10.21c) āntrebhyo jajñire atrā udarād adhi vīrudhaḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:6208: (AVŚ_10,10.22c) tatas tvā brahmod ahvayat sa hi netram avet tava ||22||
GV00avs___u:6210: (AVŚ_10,10.23c) sasūva hi tām āhu vaśeti brahmabhiḥ kḷptaḥ sa hy asyā bandhuḥ ||23||
GV00avs___u:6211: (AVŚ_10,10.24a) yudha ekaḥ saṃ sṛjati yo asyā eka id vaśī |
GV00avs___u:6212: (AVŚ_10,10.24c) tarāṃsi yajñā abhavan tarasāṃ cakṣur abhavad vaśā ||24||
GV00avs___u:6213: (AVŚ_10,10.25a) vaśā yajñaṃ praty agṛhṇād vaśā sūryam adhārayat |
GV00avs___u:6214: (AVŚ_10,10.25c) vaśāyām antar aviśad odano brahmaṇā saha ||25||
GV00avs___u:6215: (AVŚ_10,10.26a) vaśām evāmṛtam āhur vaśāṃ mṛtyum upāsate |
GV00avs___u:6216: (AVŚ_10,10.26c) vaśedaṃ sarvam abhavad devā manuṣyā asurāḥ pitara ṛṣayaḥ ||26||
GV00avs___u:6217: (AVŚ_10,10.27a) ya evaṃ vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt |
GV00avs___u:6218: (AVŚ_10,10.27c) tathā hi yajñaḥ sarvapād duhe dātre 'napasphuran ||27||
GV00avs___u:6220: (AVŚ_10,10.28c) tāsāṃ yā madhye rājati sā vaśā duṣpratigrahā ||28||
GV00avs___u:6222: (AVŚ_10,10.29c) āpas turīyam amṛtaṃ turīyaṃ yajñas turīyaṃ paśavas turīyam ||29||
GV00avs___u:6223: (AVŚ_10,10.30a) vaśā dyaur vaśā pṛthivī vaśā viṣṇuḥ prajāpatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:6224: (AVŚ_10,10.30c) vaśāyā dugdham apibant sādhyā vasavaś ca ye ||30||
GV00avs___u:6225: (AVŚ_10,10.31a) vaśāyā dugdhaṃ pītvā sādhyā vasavaś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:6226: (AVŚ_10,10.31c) te vai bradhnasya viṣṭapi payo asyā upāsate ||31||
GV00avs___u:6227: (AVŚ_10,10.32a) somam enām eke duhre ghṛtam eka upāsate |
GV00avs___u:6228: (AVŚ_10,10.32c) ya evaṃ viduṣe vaśāṃ dadus te gatās tridivaṃ divaḥ ||32||
GV00avs___u:6229: (AVŚ_10,10.33a) brāhmaṇebhyo vaśāṃ dattvā sarvāṃl lokānt sam aśnute |
GV00avs___u:6230: (AVŚ_10,10.33c) ṛtaṃ hy asyām ārpitam api brahmātho tapaḥ ||33||
GV00avs___u:6231: (AVŚ_10,10.34a) vaśāṃ devā upa jīvanti vaśāṃ manuṣyā uta |
GV00avs___u:6232: (AVŚ_10,10.34c) vaśedaṃ sarvam abhavad yāvat sūryo vipaśyati ||34|| {35}
GV00avs___u:6233: (AVŚ_11,1.1a) agne jāyasvāditir nāthiteyaṃ brahmaudanaṃ pacati putrakāmā |
GV00avs___u:6234: (AVŚ_11,1.1c) saptaṛṣayo bhūtakṛtas te tvā manthantu prajayā saheha ||1||
GV00avs___u:6235: (AVŚ_11,1.2a) kṛṇuta dhūmaṃ vṛṣaṇaḥ sakhāyo 'droghāvitā vācam acha |
GV00avs___u:6236: (AVŚ_11,1.2c) ayam agniḥ pṛtanāṣāṭ suvīro yena devā asahanta dasyūn ||2||
GV00avs___u:6237: (AVŚ_11,1.3a) agne 'janiṣṭhā mahate vīryāya brahmaudanāya paktave jātavedaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6238: (AVŚ_11,1.3c) saptaṛṣayo bhūtakṛtas te tvājījanann asyai rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yacha ||3||
GV00avs___u:6239: (AVŚ_11,1.4a) samiddho agne samidhā sam idhyasva vidvān devān yajñiyāṃ eha
GV00avs___u:6241: (AVŚ_11,1.4c) tebhyo haviḥ śrapayaṃ jātaveda uttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam ||4||
GV00avs___u:6242: (AVŚ_11,1.5a) tredhā bhāgo nihito yaḥ purā vo devānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ martyānām |
GV00avs___u:6243: (AVŚ_11,1.5c) aṃśāṃ jānīdhvaṃ vi bhajāmi tān vo yo devānāṃ sa imāṃ pārayāti ||5||
GV00avs___u:6244: (AVŚ_11,1.6a) agne sahasvān abhibhūr abhīd asi nīco ny ubja dviṣataḥ
GV00avs___u:6246: (AVŚ_11,1.6c) iyaṃ mātrā mīyamānā mitā ca sajātāṃs te balihṛtaḥ kṛṇotu
GV00avs___u:6247: (AVŚ_11,1.7a) sākaṃ sajātaiḥ payasā sahaidhy ud ubjaināṃ mahate vīryāya |
GV00avs___u:6248: (AVŚ_11,1.7c) ūrdhvo nākasyādhi roha viṣṭapaṃ svargo loka iti yaṃ vadanti
GV00avs___u:6249: (AVŚ_11,1.8a) iyaṃ mahī prati gṛhṇātu carma pṛthivī devī sumanasyamānā |
GV00avs___u:6251: (AVŚ_11,1.9a) etau grāvāṇau sayujā yuṅdhi carmaṇi nirbindhy aṃśūn yajamānāya sādhu |
GV00avs___u:6252: (AVŚ_11,1.9c) avaghnatī ni jahi ya imāṃ pṛtanyava ūrdhvaṃ prajām udbharanty ud ūha ||9||
GV00avs___u:6253: (AVŚ_11,1.10a) gṛhāṇa grāvāṇau sakṛtau vīra hasta ā te devā yajñiyā yajñam aguḥ |
GV00avs___u:6254: (AVŚ_11,1.10c) trayo varā yatamāṃs tvaṃ vṛṇīṣe tās te samṛddhīr iha
GV00avs___u:6256: (AVŚ_11,1.11a) iyaṃ te dhītir idam u te janitraṃ gṛhṇātu tvām aditiḥ śūraputrā |
GV00avs___u:6257: (AVŚ_11,1.11c) parā punīhi ya imāṃ pṛtanyavo 'syai rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni
GV00avs___u:6259: (AVŚ_11,1.12a) upaśvase druvaye sīdatā yūyaṃ vi vicyadhvaṃ yajñiyāsas tuṣaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:6260: (AVŚ_11,1.12c) śriyā samānān ati sarvānt syāmādhaspadaṃ dviṣatas pādayāmi
GV00avs___u:6261: (AVŚ_11,1.13a) parehi nāri punar ehi kṣipram apāṃ tvā goṣṭho adhy arukṣad bharāya |
GV00avs___u:6262: (AVŚ_11,1.13c) tāsāṃ gṛhṇītād yatamā yajñiyā asan vibhājya dhīrītarā jahītāt ||13||
GV00avs___u:6263: (AVŚ_11,1.14a) emā agur yoṣitaḥ śumbhamānā ut tiṣṭha nāri tavasaṃ rabhasva
GV00avs___u:6264: (AVŚ_11,1.14c) supatnī patyā prajayā prajāvaty ā tvāgan yajñaḥ prati kumbhaṃ gṛbhāya ||14||
GV00avs___u:6265: (AVŚ_11,1.15a) ūrjo bhāgo nihito yaḥ purā va ṛṣipraśiṣṭāpa ā bharaitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6266: (AVŚ_11,1.15c) ayaṃ yajño gātuvin nāthavit prajāvid ugraḥ paśuvid vīravid vo astu ||15||
GV00avs___u:6267: (AVŚ_11,1.16a) agne carur yajñiyas tvādhy arukṣac chucis tapiṣṭhas tapasā tapainam |
GV00avs___u:6268: (AVŚ_11,1.16c) ārṣeyā daivā abhisaṃgatya bhāgam imaṃ tapiṣṭhā ṛtubhis tapantu ||16||
GV00avs___u:6269: (AVŚ_11,1.17a) śuddhāḥ pūtā yoṣito yajñiyā imā āpaś carum ava sarpantu
GV00avs___u:6271: (AVŚ_11,1.17c) aduḥ prajāṃ bahulāṃ paśūn naḥ paktaudanasya sukṛtām etu lokam ||17||
GV00avs___u:6272: (AVŚ_11,1.18a) brahmaṇā śuddhā uta pūtā ghṛtena somasyāṃśavas taṇḍulā yajñiyā ime |
GV00avs___u:6273: (AVŚ_11,1.18c) apaḥ pra viśata prati gṛhṇātu vaś carur imaṃ paktvā sukṛtām eta lokam ||18||
GV00avs___u:6274: (AVŚ_11,1.19a) uruḥ prathasva mahatā mahimnā sahasrapṛṣṭhaḥ sukṛtasya loke
GV00avs___u:6275: (AVŚ_11,1.19c) pitāmahāḥ pitaraḥ prajopajāhaṃ paktā pañcadaśas te asmi
GV00avs___u:6276: (AVŚ_11,1.20a) sahasrapṛṣṭhaḥ śatadhāro akṣito brahmaudano devayānaḥ svargaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6277: (AVŚ_11,1.20c) amūṃs ta ā dadhāmi prajayā reṣayainān balihārāya mṛḍatān mahyam eva ||20||
GV00avs___u:6278: (AVŚ_11,1.21a) udehi vediṃ prajayā vardhayaināṃ nudasva rakṣaḥ prataraṃ dhehy enām |
GV00avs___u:6279: (AVŚ_11,1.21c) śriyā samānān ati sarvānt syāmādhaspadaṃ dviṣatas pādayāmi
GV00avs___u:6280: (AVŚ_11,1.22a) abhyāvartasva paśubhiḥ sahaināṃ pratyaṅṅ enāṃ devatābhiḥ
GV00avs___u:6282: (AVŚ_11,1.22c) mā tvā prāpac chapatho mābhicāraḥ sve kṣetre anamīvā vi
GV00avs___u:6284: (AVŚ_11,1.23a) ṛtena taṣṭā manasā hitaiṣā brahmaudanasya vihitā vedir agre |
GV00avs___u:6285: (AVŚ_11,1.23c) aṃsadhrīṃ śuddhām upa dhehi nāri tatraudanaṃ sādaya daivānām ||23||
GV00avs___u:6286: (AVŚ_11,1.24a) aditer hastāṃ srucam etāṃ dvitīyāṃ saptaṛṣayo bhūtakṛto yām akṛṇvan |
GV00avs___u:6287: (AVŚ_11,1.24c) sā gātrāṇi viduṣy odanasya darvir vedyām adhy enaṃ cinotu
GV00avs___u:6288: (AVŚ_11,1.25a) śṛtaṃ tvā havyam upa sīdantu daivā niḥsṛpyāgneḥ punar enān
GV00avs___u:6290: (AVŚ_11,1.25c) somena pūto jaṭhare sīda brahmaṇām ārṣeyās te mā riṣan
GV00avs___u:6292: (AVŚ_11,1.26a) soma rājant saṃjñānam ā vapaibhyaḥ subrāhmaṇā yatame tvopasīdān |
GV00avs___u:6293: (AVŚ_11,1.26c) ṛṣīn ārṣeyāṃs tapaso 'dhi jātān brahmaudane suhavā johavīmi
GV00avs___u:6294: (AVŚ_11,1.27a) śuddhāḥ pūtā yoṣito yajñiyā imā brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi |
GV00avs___u:6295: (AVŚ_11,1.27c) yatkāma idam abhiṣiñcāmi vo 'ham indro marutvānt sa dadād idaṃ me ||27||
GV00avs___u:6296: (AVŚ_11,1.28a) idaṃ me jyotir amṛtaṃ hiraṇyaṃ pakvaṃ kṣetrāt kāmadughā ma
GV00avs___u:6298: (AVŚ_11,1.28c) idaṃ dhanaṃ ni dadhe brāhmaṇeṣu kṛṇve panthāṃ pitṛṣu yaḥ
GV00avs___u:6300: (AVŚ_11,1.29a) agnau tuṣān ā vapa jātavedasi paraḥ kambūkāṃ apa mṛḍḍhi
GV00avs___u:6302: (AVŚ_11,1.29c) etaṃ śuśruma gṛharājasya bhāgam atho vidma nirṛter bhāgadheyam ||29||
GV00avs___u:6303: (AVŚ_11,1.30a) śrāmyataḥ pacato viddhi sunvataḥ panthāṃ svargam adhi rohayainam |
GV00avs___u:6304: (AVŚ_11,1.30c) yena rohāt param āpadya yad vaya uttamaṃ nākaṃ paramaṃ
GV00avs___u:6306: (AVŚ_11,1.31a) babhrer adhvaryo mukham etad vi mṛḍḍhy ājyāya lokaṃ kṛṇuhi
GV00avs___u:6308: (AVŚ_11,1.31c) ghṛtena gātrānu sarvā vi mṛḍḍhi kṛṇve panthāṃ pitṛṣu yaḥ
GV00avs___u:6310: (AVŚ_11,1.32a) babhre rakṣaḥ samadam ā vapaibhyo 'brāhmaṇā yatame tvopasīdān |
GV00avs___u:6311: (AVŚ_11,1.32c) purīṣiṇaḥ prathamānāḥ purastād ārṣeyās te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ ||32||
GV00avs___u:6312: (AVŚ_11,1.33a) ārṣeyeṣu ni dadha odana tvā nānārṣeyāṇām apy asty atra |
GV00avs___u:6313: (AVŚ_11,1.33c) agnir me goptā marutaś ca sarve viśve devā abhi rakṣantu pakvam ||33||
GV00avs___u:6314: (AVŚ_11,1.34a) yajñaṃ duhānaṃ sadam it prapīnaṃ pumāṃsaṃ dhenuṃ sadanaṃ rayīṇām |
GV00avs___u:6315: (AVŚ_11,1.34c) prajāmṛtatvam uta dīrgham āyū rāyaś ca poṣair upa tvā
GV00avs___u:6318: (AVŚ_11,1.35c) sukṛtāṃ loke sīda tatra nau saṃskṛtam ||35||
GV00avs___u:6320: (AVŚ_11,1.36c) etaiḥ sukṛtair anu gachema yajñaṃ nāke tiṣṭhantam adhi saptaraśmau ||36||
GV00avs___u:6321: (AVŚ_11,1.37a) yena devā jyotiṣā dyām udāyan brahmaudanaṃ paktvā sukṛtasya lokam |
GV00avs___u:6322: (AVŚ_11,1.37c) tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ svar ārohanto abhi nākam uttamam
GV00avs___u:6323: (AVŚ_11,2.1a) bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ mābhi yātaṃ bhūtapatī paśupatī namo vām |
GV00avs___u:6324: (AVŚ_11,2.1c) pratihitām āyatāṃ mā vi srāṣṭaṃ mā no hiṃsiṣṭaṃ dvipado mā catuṣpadaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:6325: (AVŚ_11,2.2a) śune kroṣṭre mā śarīrāṇi kartam aliklavebhyo gṛdhrebhyo ye ca kṛṣṇā aviṣyavaḥ
GV00avs___u:6326: (AVŚ_11,2.2c) makṣikās te paśupate vayāṃsi te vighase mā vidanta ||2||
GV00avs___u:6327: (AVŚ_11,2.3a) krandāya te prāṇāya yāś ca te bhava ropayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6329: (AVŚ_11,2.4a) purastāt te namaḥ kṛṇma uttarād adharād uta |
GV00avs___u:6330: (AVŚ_11,2.4c) abhīvargād divas pary antarikṣāya te namaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:6331: (AVŚ_11,2.5a) mukhāya te paśupate yāni cakṣūṃṣi te bhava |
GV00avs___u:6332: (AVŚ_11,2.5c) tvace rūpāya saṃdṛśe pratīcīnāya te namaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:6333: (AVŚ_11,2.6a) aṅgebhyas ta udarāya jihvāyā āsyāya te |
GV00avs___u:6337: (AVŚ_11,2.8a) sa no bhavaḥ pari vṛṇaktu viśvata āpa ivāgniḥ pari vṛṇaktu no bhavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6338: (AVŚ_11,2.8c) mā no 'bhi māṃsta namo astv asmai ||8||
GV00avs___u:6339: (AVŚ_11,2.9a) catur namo aṣṭakṛtvo bhavāya daśa kṛtvaḥ paśupate namas te |
GV00avs___u:6340: (AVŚ_11,2.9c) taveme pañca paśavo vibhaktā gāvo aśvāḥ puruṣā ajāvayaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:6341: (AVŚ_11,2.10a) tava catasraḥ pradiśas tava dyaus tava pṛthivī tavedam ugrorv antarikṣam
GV00avs___u:6342: (AVŚ_11,2.10c) tavedaṃ sarvam ātmanvad yat prāṇat pṛthivīm anu ||10|| {5}
GV00avs___u:6343: (AVŚ_11,2.11a) uruḥ kośo vasudhānas tavāyaṃ yasminn imā viśvā bhuvanāny antaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6344: (AVŚ_11,2.11c) sa no mṛḍa paśupate namas te paraḥ kroṣṭāro abhibhāḥ śvānaḥ paro yantv agharudo vikeśyaḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:6345: (AVŚ_11,2.12a) dhanur bibharṣi haritaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ sahasraghniṃ śatavadhaṃ
GV00avs___u:6347: (AVŚ_11,2.12c) rudrasyeṣuś carati devahetis tasyai namo yatamasyāṃ diśītaḥ
GV00avs___u:6349: (AVŚ_11,2.13c) paścād anuprayuṅkṣe taṃ viddhasya padanīr iva ||13||
GV00avs___u:6350: (AVŚ_11,2.14a) bhavārudrau sayujā saṃvidānāv ubhāv ugrau carato vīryāya |
GV00avs___u:6352: (AVŚ_11,2.15a) namas te astv āyate namo astu parāyate |
GV00avs___u:6353: (AVŚ_11,2.15c) namas te rudra tiṣṭhata āsīnāyota te namaḥ ||15||
GV00avs___u:6354: (AVŚ_11,2.16a) namaḥ sāyaṃ namaḥ prātar namo rātryā namo divā |
GV00avs___u:6355: (AVŚ_11,2.16c) bhavāya ca śarvāya cobhābhyām akaraṃ namaḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:6356: (AVŚ_11,2.17a) sahasrākṣam atipaśyaṃ purastād rudram asyantaṃ bahudhā
GV00avs___u:6359: (AVŚ_11,2.18a) śyāvāśvaṃ kṛṣṇam asitaṃ mṛṇantaṃ bhīmaṃ rathaṃ keśinaḥ pādayantam |
GV00avs___u:6361: (AVŚ_11,2.19a) mā no 'bhi srā matyaṃ devahetiṃ mā naḥ krudhaḥ paśupate namas te |
GV00avs___u:6363: (AVŚ_11,2.20a) mā no hiṃsīr adhi no brūhi pari ṇo vṛṅdhi mā krudhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6365: (AVŚ_11,2.21a) mā no goṣu puruṣeṣu mā gṛdho no ajāviṣu |
GV00avs___u:6366: (AVŚ_11,2.21c) anyatrogra vi vartaya piyārūṇāṃ prajāṃ jahi ||21||
GV00avs___u:6367: (AVŚ_11,2.22a) yasya takmā kāsikā hetir ekam aśvasyeva vṛṣaṇaḥ kranda eti
GV00avs___u:6371: (AVŚ_11,2.24a) tubhyam āraṇyāḥ paśavo mṛgā vane hitā haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunā vayāṃsi |
GV00avs___u:6372: (AVŚ_11,2.24c) tava yakṣaṃ paśupate apsv antas tubhyaṃ kṣaranti divyā āpo
GV00avs___u:6374: (AVŚ_11,2.25a) śiṃśumārā ajagarāḥ purīkayā jaṣā matsyā rajasā yebhyo asyasi |
GV00avs___u:6375: (AVŚ_11,2.25c) na te dūraṃ na pariṣṭhāsti te bhava sadyaḥ sarvāṃ pari paśyasi bhūmiṃ pūrvasmād dhaṃsy uttarasmint samudre ||25||
GV00avs___u:6376: (AVŚ_11,2.26a) mā no rudra takmanā mā viṣeṇa mā naḥ saṃ srā divyenāgninā |
GV00avs___u:6378: (AVŚ_11,2.27a) bhavo divo bhava īśe pṛthivyā bhava ā papra urv antarikṣam
GV00avs___u:6380: (AVŚ_11,2.28a) bhava rājan yajamānāya mṛḍa paśūnāṃ hi paśupatir babhūtha |
GV00avs___u:6381: (AVŚ_11,2.28c) yaḥ śraddadhāti santi devā iti catuṣpade dvipade 'sya mṛḍa
GV00avs___u:6382: (AVŚ_11,2.29a) mā no mahāntam uta mā no arbhakaṃ mā no vahantam uta mā no vakṣyataḥ |
GV00avs___u:6383: (AVŚ_11,2.29c) mā no hiṃsīḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca svāṃ tanvaṃ rudra mā rīriṣo naḥ ||29||
GV00avs___u:6386: (AVŚ_11,2.31a) namas te ghoṣiṇībhyo namas te keśinībhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6388: (AVŚ_11,2.31e) namas te deva senābhyaḥ svasti no abhayaṃ ca naḥ ||31|| {7}
GV00avs___u:6390: (AVŚ_11,3.2a) dyāvāpṛthivī śrotre sūryācandramasāv akṣiṇī saptaṛṣayaḥ prāṇāpānāḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:6393: (AVŚ_11,3.5a) aśvāḥ kaṇā gāvas taṇḍulā maśakās tuṣāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:6395: (AVŚ_11,3.7a) śyāmam ayo 'sya māṃsāni lohitam asya lohitam ||7||
GV00avs___u:6396: (AVŚ_11,3.8a) trapu bhasma haritaṃ varṇaḥ puṣkaram asya gandhaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:6397: (AVŚ_11,3.9a) khalaḥ pātraṃ sphyāv aṃsāv īṣe anūkye ||9||
GV00avs___u:6399: (AVŚ_11,3.11a) iyam eva pṛthivī kumbhī bhavati rādhyamānasyaudanasya dyaur apidhānam ||11||
GV00avs___u:6409: (AVŚ_11,3.20a) yasmint samudro dyaur bhūmis trayo 'varaparaṃ śritāḥ ||20||
GV00avs___u:6411: (AVŚ_11,3.22a) taṃ tvaudanasya pṛchāmi yo asya mahimā mahān ||22||
GV00avs___u:6413: (AVŚ_11,3.24a) nālpa iti brūyān nānupasecana iti nedaṃ ca kiṃ ceti ||24||
GV00avs___u:6415: (AVŚ_11,3.26a) brahmavādino vadanti parāñcam odanaṃ prāśī3ḥ pratyañcā3m
GV00avs___u:6417: (AVŚ_11,3.27a) tvam odanaṃ prāśī3s tvām odanā3 iti ||27||
GV00avs___u:6418: (AVŚ_11,3.28a) parāñcaṃ cainaṃ prāśīḥ prāṇās tvā hāsyantīty enam āha ||28||
GV00avs___u:6419: (AVŚ_11,3.29a) pratyañcaṃ cainaṃ prāśīr apānās tvā hāsyantīty enam āha ||29||
GV00avs___u:6422: (AVŚ_11,3.32[4.1]a) tataś cainam anyena śīrṣṇā prāśīr yena caitaṃ pūrva ṛṣayaḥ prāśnan

GV00avs___u:6424: (AVŚ_11,3.32[4.1]c) taṃ vā ahaṃ nārvāñcaṃ na parāñcaṃ na pratyañcam |

GV00avs___u:6428: (AVŚ_11,3.32[4.1]g) sarvāṅga eva sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ saṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||32||

GV00avs___u:6536: (AVŚ_11,3.47[4.16]f) eṣa vā odanaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ |
GV00avs___u:6537: (AVŚ_11,3.47[4.16]g) sarvāṅga eva sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ saṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||47|| [16]
GV00avs___u:6538: (AVŚ_11,3.48[4.17]a) tataś cainam anyābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyāṃ
GV00avs___u:6541: (AVŚ_11,3.48[4.17]c) taṃ vā ahaṃ nārvāñcaṃ na parāñcaṃ na pratyañcam |
GV00avs___u:6543: (AVŚ_11,3.48[4.17]e) tābhyām enaṃ prāśiṣaṃ tābhyām enam ajīgamam |
GV00avs___u:6544: (AVŚ_11,3.48[4.17]f) eṣa vā odanaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ |
GV00avs___u:6545: (AVŚ_11,3.48[4.17]g) sarvāṅga eva sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ saṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||48|| [17]
GV00avs___u:6546: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]a) tataś cainam anyayā pratiṣṭhayā prāśīr yayā caitaṃ pūrva ṛṣayaḥ prāśnan
GV00avs___u:6548: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]c) taṃ vā ahaṃ nārvāñcaṃ na parāñcaṃ na pratyañcam |
GV00avs___u:6551: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]f) eṣa vā odanaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ |
GV00avs___u:6552: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]g) sarvāṅga eva sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ saṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||49|| [18]
GV00avs___u:6553: (AVŚ_11,3.50[5.1]a) etad vai bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ yad odanaḥ ||50|| [1]
GV00avs___u:6554: (AVŚ_11,3.51[5.2]a) bradhnaloko bhavati bradhnasya viṣṭapi śrayate ya evaṃ veda ||51|| [2]
GV00avs___u:6555: (AVŚ_11,3.52[5.3]a) etasmād vā odanāt trayastriṃśataṃ lokān nir amimīta prajāpatiḥ ||52||
GV00avs___u:6557: (AVŚ_11,3.54[5.5]a) sa ya evaṃ viduṣa upadraṣṭā bhavati prāṇaṃ ruṇaddhi ||54|| [5]
GV00avs___u:6558: (AVŚ_11,3.55[5.6]a) na ca prāṇaṃ ruṇaddhi sarvajyāniṃ jīyate ||55|| [6]
GV00avs___u:6559: (AVŚ_11,3.56[5.7]a) na ca sarvajyāniṃ jīyate purainaṃ jarasaḥ prāṇo jahāti ||56|| [7] {10}
GV00avs___u:6560: (AVŚ_11,4[6].1a) prāṇāya namo yasya sarvam idaṃ vaśe |
GV00avs___u:6561: (AVŚ_11,4[6].1c) yo bhūtaḥ sarvasyeśvaro yasmint sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam ||1||
GV00avs___u:6562: (AVŚ_11,4[6].2a) namas te prāṇa krandāya namas te stanayitnave |
GV00avs___u:6563: (AVŚ_11,4[6].2c) namas te prāṇa vidyute namas te prāṇa varṣate ||2||
GV00avs___u:6565: (AVŚ_11,4[6].3c) pra vīyante garbhān dadhate 'tho bahvīr vi jāyante ||3||
GV00avs___u:6567: (AVŚ_11,4[6].4c) sarvaṃ tadā pra modate yat kiṃ ca bhūmyām adhi ||4||
GV00avs___u:6568: (AVŚ_11,4[6].5a) yadā prāṇo abhyavarṣīd varṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ mahīm |
GV00avs___u:6569: (AVŚ_11,4[6].5c) paśavas tat pra modante maho vai no bhaviṣyati ||5||
GV00avs___u:6571: (AVŚ_11,4[6].6c) āyur vai naḥ prātītaraḥ sarvā naḥ surabhīr akaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:6572: (AVŚ_11,4[6].7a) namas te astv āyate namo astu parāyate |
GV00avs___u:6573: (AVŚ_11,4[6].7c) namas te prāṇa tiṣṭhata āsīnāyota te namaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:6574: (AVŚ_11,4[6].8a) namas te prāṇa prāṇate namo astv apānate |
GV00avs___u:6575: (AVŚ_11,4[6].8c) parācīnāya te namaḥ pratīcīnāya te namaḥ sarvasmai ta idaṃ namaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:6576: (AVŚ_11,4[6].9a) yā te prāṇa priyā tanūr yo te prāṇa preyasī |
GV00avs___u:6577: (AVŚ_11,4[6].9c) atho yad bheṣajaṃ tava tasya no dhehi jīvase ||9||
GV00avs___u:6578: (AVŚ_11,4[6].10a) prāṇaḥ prajā anu vaste pitā putram iva priyam |
GV00avs___u:6579: (AVŚ_11,4[6].10c) prāṇo ha sarvasyeśvaro yac ca prāṇati yac ca na ||10||
GV00avs___u:6580: (AVŚ_11,4[6].11a) prāṇo mṛtyuḥ prāṇas takmā prāṇaṃ devā upāsate |
GV00avs___u:6581: (AVŚ_11,4[6].11c) prāṇo ha satyavādinam uttame loka ā dadhat ||11||
GV00avs___u:6582: (AVŚ_11,4[6].12a) prāṇo virāṭ prāṇo deṣṭrī prāṇaṃ sarva upāsate |
GV00avs___u:6583: (AVŚ_11,4[6].12c) prāṇo ha sūryaś candramāḥ prāṇam āhuḥ prajāpatim ||12||
GV00avs___u:6585: (AVŚ_11,4[6].13c) yave ha prāṇa āhito 'pāno vrīhir ucyate ||13||
GV00avs___u:6587: (AVŚ_11,4[6].14c) yadā tvaṃ prāṇa jinvasy atha sa jāyate punaḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:6588: (AVŚ_11,4[6].15a) prāṇam āhur mātariśvānaṃ vāto ha prāṇa ucyate |
GV00avs___u:6589: (AVŚ_11,4[6].15c) prāṇe ha bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca prāṇe sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam ||15||
GV00avs___u:6591: (AVŚ_11,4[6].16c) oṣadhayaḥ pra jāyante yadā tvaṃ prāṇa jinvasi ||16||
GV00avs___u:6592: (AVŚ_11,4[6].17a) yadā prāṇo abhyavarṣīd varṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ mahīm |
GV00avs___u:6593: (AVŚ_11,4[6].17c) oṣadhayaḥ pra jāyante 'tho yāḥ kāś ca vīrudhaḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:6594: (AVŚ_11,4[6].18a) yas te prāṇedaṃ veda yasmiṃś cāsi pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6595: (AVŚ_11,4[6].18c) sarve tasmai baliṃ harān amuṣmiṃl loka uttame ||18||
GV00avs___u:6596: (AVŚ_11,4[6].19a) yathā prāṇa balihṛtas tubhyaṃ sarvāḥ prajā imāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6597: (AVŚ_11,4[6].19c) evā tasmai baliṃ harān yas tvā śṛṇavat suśravaḥ ||19||
GV00avs___u:6598: (AVŚ_11,4[6].20a) antar garbhaś carati devatāsv ābhūto bhūtaḥ sa u jāyate
GV00avs___u:6600: (AVŚ_11,4[6].20c) sa bhūto bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyat pitā putraṃ pra viveśā śacībhiḥ ||20|| {12}
GV00avs___u:6601: (AVŚ_11,4[6].21a) ekaṃ pādaṃ not khidati salilād dhaṃsa uccaran |
GV00avs___u:6602: (AVŚ_11,4[6].21c) yad aṅga sa tam utkhiden naivādya na śvaḥ syāt |
GV00avs___u:6603: (AVŚ_11,4[6].21e) na rātrī nāhaḥ syān na vy uchet kadā cana ||21||
GV00avs___u:6604: (AVŚ_11,4[6].22a) aṣṭācakraṃ vartata ekanemi sahasrākṣaraṃ pra puro ni paścā |
GV00avs___u:6605: (AVŚ_11,4[6].22c) ardhena viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna yad asyārdhaṃ katamaḥ sa ketuḥ ||22||
GV00avs___u:6606: (AVŚ_11,4[6].23a) yo asya viśvajanmana īśe viśvasya ceṣṭataḥ |
GV00avs___u:6607: (AVŚ_11,4[6].23c) anyeṣu kṣipradhanvane tasmai prāṇa namo 'stu te ||23||
GV00avs___u:6608: (AVŚ_11,4[6].24a) yo asya sarvajanmana īśe sarvasya ceṣṭataḥ |
GV00avs___u:6609: (AVŚ_11,4[6].24c) atandro brahmaṇā dhīraḥ prāṇo mānu tiṣṭhatu ||24||
GV00avs___u:6610: (AVŚ_11,4[6].25a) ūrdhvaḥ supteṣu jāgāra nanu tiryaṅ ni padyate |
GV00avs___u:6611: (AVŚ_11,4[6].25c) na suptam asya supteṣv anu śuśrāva kaś cana ||25||
GV00avs___u:6612: (AVŚ_11,4[6].26a) prāṇa mā mat paryāvṛto na mad anyo bhaviṣyasi |
GV00avs___u:6613: (AVŚ_11,4[6].26c) apāṃ garbham iva jīvase prāṇa badhnāmi tvā mayi ||26||
GV00avs___u:6614: (AVŚ_11,5[7].1a) brahmacārīṣṇaṃś carati rodasī ubhe tasmin devāḥ saṃmanaso bhavanti |
GV00avs___u:6615: (AVŚ_11,5[7].1c) sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca sa ācāryaṃ tapasā piparti
GV00avs___u:6616: (AVŚ_11,5[7].2a) brahmacāriṇaṃ pitaro devajanāḥ pṛthag devā anusaṃyanti
GV00avs___u:6618: (AVŚ_11,5[7].2c) gandharvā enam anv āyan trayastriṃśat triśatāḥ
GV00avs___u:6619: ṣaṭsahasrāḥ sarvānt sa devāṃs tapasā piparti ||2||
GV00avs___u:6620: (AVŚ_11,5[7].3a) ācārya upanayamāno brahmacāriṇaṃ kṛṇute garbham antaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6621: (AVŚ_11,5[7].3c) taṃ rātrīs tisra udare bibharti taṃ jātaṃ draṣṭum abhisaṃyanti devāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:6622: (AVŚ_11,5[7].4a) iyaṃ samit pṛthivī dyaur dvitīyotāntarikṣaṃ samidhā
GV00avs___u:6624: (AVŚ_11,5[7].4c) brahmacārī samidhā mekhalayā śrameṇa lokāṃs tapasā
GV00avs___u:6626: (AVŚ_11,5[7].5a) pūrvo jāto brahmaṇo brahmacārī gharmaṃ vasānas tapasod atiṣṭhat |
GV00avs___u:6627: (AVŚ_11,5[7].5c) tasmāj jātaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ devāś ca sarve amṛtena sākam ||5||
GV00avs___u:6628: (AVŚ_11,5[7].6a) brahmacāry eti samidhā samiddhaḥ kārṣṇaṃ vasāno dīkṣito dīrghaśmaśruḥ |
GV00avs___u:6629: (AVŚ_11,5[7].6c) sa sadya eti pūrvasmād uttaraṃ samudraṃ lokānt saṃgṛbhya muhur ācarikrat
GV00avs___u:6630: (AVŚ_11,5[7].7a) brahmacārī janayan brahmāpo lokaṃ prajāpatiṃ parameṣṭhinaṃ virājam |
GV00avs___u:6631: (AVŚ_11,5[7].7c) garbho bhūtvāmṛtasya yonāv indro ha bhūtvāsurāṃs tatarha
GV00avs___u:6632: (AVŚ_11,5[7].8a) ācāryas tatakṣa nabhasī ubhe ime urvī gambhīre pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca |
GV00avs___u:6633: (AVŚ_11,5[7].8c) te rakṣati tapasā brahmacārī tasmin devāḥ saṃmanaso bhavanti ||8||
GV00avs___u:6634: (AVŚ_11,5[7].9a) imāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīṃ brahmacārī bhikṣām ā jabhāra prathamo divaṃ ca |
GV00avs___u:6635: (AVŚ_11,5[7].9c) te kṛtvā samidhāv upāste tayor ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā ||9||
GV00avs___u:6636: (AVŚ_11,5[7].10a) arvāg anyaḥ paro anyo divas pṛṣṭhād guhā nidhī nihitau
GV00avs___u:6638: (AVŚ_11,5[7].10c) tau rakṣati tapasā brahmacārī tat kevalaṃ kṛṇute brahma vidvān ||10||
GV00avs___u:6639: (AVŚ_11,5[7].11a) arvāg anya ito anyaḥ pṛthivyā agnī sameto nabhasī antareme |
GV00avs___u:6640: (AVŚ_11,5[7].11c) tayoḥ śrayante raśmayo 'dhi dṛḍhās tān ā tiṣṭhati tapasā brahmacārī ||11||
GV00avs___u:6641: (AVŚ_11,5[7].12a) abhikrandan stanayann aruṇaḥ śitiṅgo bṛhac chepo 'nu
GV00avs___u:6643: (AVŚ_11,5[7].12c) brahmacārī siñcati sānau retaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ
GV00avs___u:6644: (AVŚ_11,5[7].13a) agnau sūrye candramasi mātariśvan brahmacāry apsu
GV00avs___u:6646: (AVŚ_11,5[7].13c) tāsām arcīṃṣi pṛthag abhre caranti tāsām ājyaṃ puruṣo varṣam āpaḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:6647: (AVŚ_11,5[7].14a) ācāryo mṛtyur varuṇaḥ soma oṣadhayaḥ payaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6648: (AVŚ_11,5[7].14c) jīmūtā āsant satvānas tair idaṃ svar ābhṛtam ||14||
GV00avs___u:6649: (AVŚ_11,5[7].15a) amā ghṛtaṃ kṛṇute kevalam ācāryo bhūtvā varuṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6650: (AVŚ_11,5[7].15c) yadyad aichat prajāpatau tad brahmacārī prāyachat svān mitro adhy ātmanaḥ
GV00avs___u:6652: (AVŚ_11,5[7].16c) prajāpatir vi rājati virāḍ indro 'bhavad vaśī ||16||
GV00avs___u:6653: (AVŚ_11,5[7].17a) brahmacaryeṇa tapasā rājā rāṣṭraṃ vi rakṣati |
GV00avs___u:6658: (AVŚ_11,5[7].19c) indro ha brahmacaryeṇa devebhyaḥ svar ābharat ||19||
GV00avs___u:6660: (AVŚ_11,5[7].20c) saṃvatsaraḥ saha ṛtubhis te jātā brahmacāriṇaḥ ||20||
GV00avs___u:6661: (AVŚ_11,5[7].21a) pārthivā divyāḥ paśava āraṇyā grāmyāś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:6662: (AVŚ_11,5[7].21c) apakṣāḥ pakṣiṇaś ca ye te jātā brahmacāriṇaḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:6663: (AVŚ_11,5[7].22a) pṛthak sarve prājāpatyāḥ prāṇān ātmasu bibhrati |
GV00avs___u:6664: (AVŚ_11,5[7].22c) tānt sarvān brahma rakṣati brahmacāriṇy ābhṛtam ||22||
GV00avs___u:6665: (AVŚ_11,5[7].23a) devānām etat pariṣūtam anabhyārūḍhaṃ carati rocamānam |
GV00avs___u:6666: (AVŚ_11,5[7].23c) tasmāj jātaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ devāś ca sarve amṛtena sākam ||23||
GV00avs___u:6667: (AVŚ_11,5[7].24a) brahmacārī brahma bhrājad bibharti tasmin devā adhi viśve samotāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6668: (AVŚ_11,5[7].24c) prāṇāpānau janayann ād vyānaṃ vācaṃ mano hṛdayaṃ brahma medhām ||24||
GV00avs___u:6669: (AVŚ_11,5[7].25a) cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ yaśo asmāsu dhehy annaṃ reto lohitam udaram ||25||
GV00avs___u:6670: (AVŚ_11,5[7].26a) tāni kalpan brahmacārī salilasya pṛṣṭhe tapo 'tiṣṭhat
GV00avs___u:6672: (AVŚ_11,5[7].26c) sa snāto babhruḥ piṅgalaḥ pṛthivyāṃ bahu rocate ||26||
GV00avs___u:6673: (AVŚ_11,6[8].1a) agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn oṣadhīr uta vīrudhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6674: (AVŚ_11,6[8].1c) indraṃ bṛhaspatiṃ sūryaṃ te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:6675: (AVŚ_11,6[8].2a) brūmo rājānaṃ varuṇaṃ mitraṃ viṣṇum atho bhagam |
GV00avs___u:6676: (AVŚ_11,6[8].2c) aṃśaṃ vivasvantaṃ brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:6677: (AVŚ_11,6[8].3a) brūmo devaṃ savitāraṃ dhātāram uta pūṣaṇam |
GV00avs___u:6678: (AVŚ_11,6[8].3c) tvaṣṭāram agriyaṃ brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:6680: (AVŚ_11,6[8].4c) aryamā nāma yo devas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:6682: (AVŚ_11,6[8].5c) viśvān ādityān brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:6683: (AVŚ_11,6[8].6a) vātaṃ brūmaḥ parjanyam antarikṣam atho diśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6684: (AVŚ_11,6[8].6c) āśāś ca sarvā brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:6685: (AVŚ_11,6[8].7a) muñcantu mā śapathyād ahorātre atho uṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6686: (AVŚ_11,6[8].7c) somo mā devo muñcatu yam āhuś candramā iti ||7||
GV00avs___u:6687: (AVŚ_11,6[8].8a) pārthivā divyāḥ paśava āraṇyā uta ye mṛgāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6688: (AVŚ_11,6[8].8c) śakuntān pakṣiṇo brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:6689: (AVŚ_11,6[8].9a) bhavāśarvāv idaṃ brūmo rudraṃ paśupatiś ca yaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6690: (AVŚ_11,6[8].9c) iṣūr yā eṣāṃ saṃvidma tā naḥ santu sadā śivāḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:6691: (AVŚ_11,6[8].10a) divaṃ brūmo nakṣatrāṇi bhūmiṃ yakṣāṇi parvatān |
GV00avs___u:6692: (AVŚ_11,6[8].10c) samudrā nadyo veśantās te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:6693: (AVŚ_11,6[8].11a) saptaṛṣīn vā idaṃ brūmo 'po devīḥ prajāpatim |
GV00avs___u:6694: (AVŚ_11,6[8].11c) pitṝn yamaśreṣṭhān brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ |11||
GV00avs___u:6695: (AVŚ_11,6[8].12a) ye devā diviṣado antarikṣasadaś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:6696: (AVŚ_11,6[8].12c) pṛthivyāṃ śakrā ye śritās te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:6697: (AVŚ_11,6[8].13a) ādityā rudrā vasavo divi devā atharvāṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6698: (AVŚ_11,6[8].13c) aṅgiraso manīṣiṇas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:6699: (AVŚ_11,6[8].14a) yajñaṃ brūmo yajamānam ṛcaḥ sāmāni bheṣajā |
GV00avs___u:6700: (AVŚ_11,6[8].14c) yajūṃṣi hotrā brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:6702: (AVŚ_11,6[8].15c) darbho bhaṅgo yavaḥ sahas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||15||
GV00avs___u:6703: (AVŚ_11,6[8].16a) arāyān brūmo rakṣāṃsi sarpān puṇyajanān pitṝn |
GV00avs___u:6704: (AVŚ_11,6[8].16c) mṛtyūn ekaśataṃ brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:6705: (AVŚ_11,6[8].17a) ṛtūn brūma ṛtupatīn ārtavān uta hāyanān |
GV00avs___u:6706: (AVŚ_11,6[8].17c) samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsāṃs te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:6707: (AVŚ_11,6[8].18a) eta devā dakṣiṇataḥ paścāt prāñca udeta |
GV00avs___u:6708: (AVŚ_11,6[8].18c) purastād uttarāc chakrā viśve devāḥ sametya te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||18||
GV00avs___u:6709: (AVŚ_11,6[8].19a) viśvān devān idaṃ brūmaḥ satyasandhān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6710: (AVŚ_11,6[8].19c) viśvābhiḥ patnībhiḥ saha te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||19||
GV00avs___u:6711: (AVŚ_11,6[8].20a) sarvān devān idaṃ brūmaḥ satyasandhān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6712: (AVŚ_11,6[8].20c) sarvābhiḥ patnībhiḥ saha te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||20||
GV00avs___u:6713: (AVŚ_11,6[8].21a) bhūtaṃ brūmo bhūtapatiṃ bhūtānām uta yo vaśī |
GV00avs___u:6714: (AVŚ_11,6[8].21c) bhūtāni sarvā saṃgatya te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:6715: (AVŚ_11,6[8].22a) yā devīḥ pañca pradiśo ye devā dvādaśa ṛtavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6716: (AVŚ_11,6[8].22c) saṃvatsarasya ye daṃṣṭrās te naḥ santu sadā śivāḥ ||22||
GV00avs___u:6717: (AVŚ_11,6[8].23a) yan mātalī rathakrītam amṛtaṃ veda bheṣajam |
GV00avs___u:6718: (AVŚ_11,6[8].23c) tad indro apsu prāveśayat tad āpo datta bheṣajam ||23||
GV00avs___u:6719: (AVŚ_11,7[9].1a) ucchiṣṭe nāma rūpaṃ cocchiṣṭe loka āhitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6720: (AVŚ_11,7[9].1c) ucchiṣṭa indraś cāgniś ca viśvam antaḥ samāhitam ||1||
GV00avs___u:6722: (AVŚ_11,7[9].2c) āpaḥ samudra ucchiṣṭe candramā vāta āhitaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:6723: (AVŚ_11,7[9].3a) sann ucchiṣṭe asaṃś cobhau mṛtyur vājaḥ prajāpatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:6724: (AVŚ_11,7[9].3c) laukyā ucchiṣṭa āyattā vraś ca draś cāpi śrīr mayi ||3||
GV00avs___u:6725: (AVŚ_11,7[9].4a) dṛḍho dṛṃha sthiro nyo brahma viśvasṛjo daśa |
GV00avs___u:6726: (AVŚ_11,7[9].4c) nābhim iva sarvataś cakram ucchiṣṭe devatāḥ śritāḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:6727: (AVŚ_11,7[9].5a) ṛk sāma yajur ucchiṣṭa udgīthaḥ prastutaṃ stutam |
GV00avs___u:6728: (AVŚ_11,7[9].5c) hiṅkāra ucchiṣṭe svaraḥ sāmno meḍiś ca tan mayi ||5||
GV00avs___u:6730: (AVŚ_11,7[9].6c) ucchiṣṭe yajñasyāṅgāny antar garbha iva mātari ||6||
GV00avs___u:6733: (AVŚ_11,7[9].8a) agnyādheyam atho dīkṣā kāmapraś chandasā saha |
GV00avs___u:6735: (AVŚ_11,7[9].9a) agnihotraṃ ca śraddhā ca vaṣaṭkāro vrataṃ tapaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6740: (AVŚ_11,7[9].11c) ṣoḍaśī saptarātraś cocchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve ye yajñā amṛte hitāḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:6741: (AVŚ_11,7[9].12a) pratīhāro nidhanaṃ viśvajic cābhijic ca yaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6744: (AVŚ_11,7[9].13c) ucchiṣṭe sarve pratyañcaḥ kāmāḥ kāmena tātṛpuḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:6745: (AVŚ_11,7[9].14a) nava bhūmīḥ samudrā ucchiṣṭe 'dhi śritā divaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6746: (AVŚ_11,7[9].14c) ā sūryo bhāty ucchiṣṭe 'horātre api tan mayi ||14||
GV00avs___u:6747: (AVŚ_11,7[9].15a) upahavyaṃ viṣūvantaṃ ye ca yajñā guhā hitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6750: (AVŚ_11,7[9].16c) sa kṣiyati viśvasyeśāno vṛṣā bhūmyām atighnyaḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:6751: (AVŚ_11,7[9].17a) ṛtaṃ satyaṃ tapo rāṣṭraṃ śramo dharmaś ca karma ca |
GV00avs___u:6752: (AVŚ_11,7[9].17c) bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad ucchiṣṭe vīryaṃ lakṣmīr balaṃ bale
GV00avs___u:6753: (AVŚ_11,7[9].18a) samṛddhir oja ākūtiḥ kṣatraṃ rāṣṭraṃ ṣaḍ urvyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6754: (AVŚ_11,7[9].18c) saṃvatsaro 'dhy ucchiṣṭa iḍā praiṣā grahā haviḥ ||18||
GV00avs___u:6756: (AVŚ_11,7[9].19c) ucchiṣṭe yajñā hotrāḥ paśubandhās tad iṣṭayaḥ ||19||
GV00avs___u:6757: (AVŚ_11,7[9].20a) ardhamāsāś ca māsāś cārtavā ṛtubhiḥ saha |
GV00avs___u:6758: (AVŚ_11,7[9].20c) ucchiṣṭe ghoṣiṇīr āpa stanayitnuḥ śrutir mahī ||20||
GV00avs___u:6759: (AVŚ_11,7[9].21a) śarkarāḥ sikatā aśmāna oṣadhayo vīrudhas tṛṇā |
GV00avs___u:6760: (AVŚ_11,7[9].21c) abhrāṇi vidyuto varṣam ucchiṣṭe saṃśritā śritā ||21||
GV00avs___u:6761: (AVŚ_11,7[9].22a) rāddhiḥ prāptiḥ samāptir vyāptir maha edhatuḥ |
GV00avs___u:6762: (AVŚ_11,7[9].22c) atyāptir ucchiṣṭe bhūtiś cāhitā nihitā hitā ||22||
GV00avs___u:6763: (AVŚ_11,7[9].23a) yac ca prāṇati prāṇena yac ca paśyati cakṣuṣā |
GV00avs___u:6764: (AVŚ_11,7[9].23c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ ||23||
GV00avs___u:6765: (AVŚ_11,7[9].24a) ṛcaḥ sāmāni chandāṃsi purāṇaṃ yajuṣā saha |
GV00avs___u:6766: (AVŚ_11,7[9].24c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ ||24||
GV00avs___u:6767: (AVŚ_11,7[9].25a) prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā |
GV00avs___u:6768: (AVŚ_11,7[9].25c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:6770: (AVŚ_11,7[9].26c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ ||26||
GV00avs___u:6771: (AVŚ_11,7[9].27a) devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā gandharvāpsarasaś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:6772: (AVŚ_11,7[9].27c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ ||27|| {21}
GV00avs___u:6773: (AVŚ_11,8[10].1a) yan manyur jāyām āvahat saṃkalpasya gṛhād adhi |
GV00avs___u:6774: (AVŚ_11,8[10].1c) ka āsaṃ janyāḥ ke varāḥ ka u jyeṣṭhavaro 'bhavat ||1||
GV00avs___u:6775: (AVŚ_11,8[10].2a) tapaś caivāstāṃ karma cāntar mahaty arṇave |
GV00avs___u:6776: (AVŚ_11,8[10].2c) ta āsaṃ janyās te varā brahma jyeṣṭhavaro 'bhavat ||2||
GV00avs___u:6777: (AVŚ_11,8[10].3a) daśa sākam ajāyanta devā devebhyaḥ purā |
GV00avs___u:6778: (AVŚ_11,8[10].3c) yo vai tān vidyāt pratyakṣaṃ sa vā adya mahad vadet
GV00avs___u:6779: (AVŚ_11,8[10].4a) prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā |
GV00avs___u:6780: (AVŚ_11,8[10].4c) vyānodānau vāṅ manas te vā ākūtim āvahan ||4||
GV00avs___u:6782: (AVŚ_11,8[10].5c) indrāgnī aśvinā tarhi kaṃ te jyeṣṭham upāsata ||5||
GV00avs___u:6783: (AVŚ_11,8[10].6a) tapaś caivāstāṃ karma cāntar mahaty arṇave |
GV00avs___u:6784: (AVŚ_11,8[10].6c) tapo ha jajñe karmaṇas tat te jyeṣṭham upāsata ||6||
GV00avs___u:6785: (AVŚ_11,8[10].7a) yeta āsīd bhūmiḥ pūrvā yām addhātaya id viduḥ |
GV00avs___u:6786: (AVŚ_11,8[10].7c) yo vai tāṃ vidyān nāmathā sa manyeta purāṇavit ||7||
GV00avs___u:6787: (AVŚ_11,8[10].8a) kuta indraḥ kutaḥ somaḥ kuto agnir ajāyata |
GV00avs___u:6788: (AVŚ_11,8[10].8c) kutas tvaṣṭā sam abhavat kuto dhātājāyata ||8||
GV00avs___u:6789: (AVŚ_11,8[10].9a) indrād indraḥ somāt somo agner agnir ajāyata |
GV00avs___u:6790: (AVŚ_11,8[10].9c) tvaṣṭā ha jajñe tvaṣṭur dhātur dhātājāyata ||9||
GV00avs___u:6791: (AVŚ_11,8[10].10a) ye ta āsan daśa jātā devā devebhyaḥ purā |
GV00avs___u:6792: (AVŚ_11,8[10].10c) putrebhyo lokaṃ dattvā kasmiṃs te loka āsate ||10||
GV00avs___u:6793: (AVŚ_11,8[10].11a) yadā keśān asthi snāva māṃsaṃ majjānam ābharat |
GV00avs___u:6794: (AVŚ_11,8[10].11c) śarīraṃ kṛtvā pādavat kaṃ lokam anu prāviśat ||11||
GV00avs___u:6795: (AVŚ_11,8[10].12a) kutaḥ keśān kutaḥ snāva kuto asthīny ābharat |
GV00avs___u:6796: (AVŚ_11,8[10].12c) aṅgā parvāṇi majjānaṃ ko māṃsaṃ kuta ābharat ||12||
GV00avs___u:6797: (AVŚ_11,8[10].13a) saṃsico nāma te devā ye saṃbhārānt samabharan |
GV00avs___u:6798: (AVŚ_11,8[10].13c) sarvaṃ saṃsicya martyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan ||13||
GV00avs___u:6799: (AVŚ_11,8[10].14a) ūrū pādāv aṣṭhīvantau śiro hastāv atho mukham |
GV00avs___u:6800: (AVŚ_11,8[10].14c) pṛṣṭīr barjahye pārśve kas tat sam adadhād ṛṣiḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:6801: (AVŚ_11,8[10].15a) śiro hastāv atho mukhaṃ jihvāṃ grīvāś ca kīkasāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6802: (AVŚ_11,8[10].15c) tvacā prāvṛtya sarvaṃ tat saṃdhā sam adadhān mahī ||15||
GV00avs___u:6803: (AVŚ_11,8[10].16a) yat tac charīram aśayat saṃdhayā saṃhitaṃ mahat |
GV00avs___u:6804: (AVŚ_11,8[10].16c) yenedam adya rocate ko asmin varṇam ābharat ||16||
GV00avs___u:6805: (AVŚ_11,8[10].17a) sarve devā upāśikṣan tad ajānād vadhūḥ satī |
GV00avs___u:6806: (AVŚ_11,8[10].17c) īśā vaśasya yā jāyā sāsmin varṇam ābharat ||17||
GV00avs___u:6807: (AVŚ_11,8[10].18a) yadā tvaṣṭā vyatṛṇat pitā tvaṣṭur ya uttaraḥ |
GV00avs___u:6808: (AVŚ_11,8[10].18c) gṛhaṃ kṛtvā martyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan ||18||
GV00avs___u:6809: (AVŚ_11,8[10].19a) svapno vai tandrīr nirṛtiḥ pāpmāno nāma devatāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6810: (AVŚ_11,8[10].19c) jarā khālatyaṃ pālityaṃ śarīram anu prāviśan ||19||
GV00avs___u:6811: (AVŚ_11,8[10].20a) steyaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vṛjinaṃ satyaṃ yajño yaśo bṛhat |
GV00avs___u:6812: (AVŚ_11,8[10].20c) balaṃ ca kṣatram ojaś ca śarīram anu prāviśan ||20||
GV00avs___u:6813: (AVŚ_11,8[10].21a) bhūtiś ca vā abhūtiś ca rātayo 'rātayaś ca yāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6814: (AVŚ_11,8[10].21c) kṣudhaś ca sarvās tṛṣṇāś ca śarīram anu prāviśan ||21||
GV00avs___u:6815: (AVŚ_11,8[10].22a) nindāś ca vā anindāś ca yac ca hanteti neti ca |
GV00avs___u:6817: (AVŚ_11,8[10].23a) vidyāś ca vā avidyāś ca yac cānyad upadeśyam |
GV00avs___u:6818: (AVŚ_11,8[10].23c) śarīraṃ brahma prāviśad ṛcaḥ sāmātho yajuḥ ||23||
GV00avs___u:6820: (AVŚ_11,8[10].24c) haso nariṣṭā nṛttāni śarīram anu prāviśan ||24||
GV00avs___u:6821: (AVŚ_11,8[10].25a) ālāpāś ca pralāpāś cābhīlāpalapaś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:6822: (AVŚ_11,8[10].25c) śarīraṃ sarve prāviśann āyujaḥ prayujo yujaḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:6823: (AVŚ_11,8[10].26a) prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā |
GV00avs___u:6824: (AVŚ_11,8[10].26c) vyānodānau vāṅ manaḥ śarīreṇa ta īyante ||26||
GV00avs___u:6825: (AVŚ_11,8[10].27a) āśiṣaś ca praśiṣaś ca saṃśiṣo viśiṣaś ca yāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6826: (AVŚ_11,8[10].27c) cittāni sarve saṃkalpāḥ śarīram anu prāviśan ||27||
GV00avs___u:6827: (AVŚ_11,8[10].28a) āsteyīś ca vāsteyīś ca tvaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇāś ca yāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6828: (AVŚ_11,8[10].28c) guhyāḥ śukrā sthūlā apas tā bībhatsāv asādayan ||28||
GV00avs___u:6829: (AVŚ_11,8[10].29a) asthi kṛtvā samidhaṃ tad aṣṭāpo asādayan |
GV00avs___u:6831: (AVŚ_11,8[10].30a) yā āpo yāś ca devatā yā virāḍ brahmaṇā saha |
GV00avs___u:6833: (AVŚ_11,8[10].31a) sūryaś cakṣur vātaḥ prāṇaṃ puruṣasya vi bhejire |
GV00avs___u:6835: (AVŚ_11,8[10].32a) tasmād vai vidvān puruṣam idaṃ brahmeti manyate |
GV00avs___u:6836: (AVŚ_11,8[10].32c) sarvā hy asmin devatā gāvo goṣṭha ivāsate ||32||
GV00avs___u:6837: (AVŚ_11,8[10].33a) prathamena pramāreṇa tredhā viṣvaṅ vi gachati |
GV00avs___u:6838: (AVŚ_11,8[10].33c) ada ekena gachaty ada ekena gachatīhaikena ni ṣevate ||33||
GV00avs___u:6839: (AVŚ_11,8[10].34a) apsu stīmāsu vṛddhāsu śarīram antarā hitam |
GV00avs___u:6840: (AVŚ_11,8[10].34c) tasmiṃ chavo 'dhy antarā tasmāc chavo 'dhy ucyate
GV00avs___u:6841: (AVŚ_11,9[11].1a) ye bāhavo yā iṣavo dhanvanāṃ vīryāṇi ca |
GV00avs___u:6842: (AVŚ_11,9[11].1c) asīn paraśūn āyudhaṃ cittākūtaṃ ca yad dhṛdi |
GV00avs___u:6843: (AVŚ_11,9[11].1e) sarvaṃ tad arbude tvam amitrebhyo dṛśe kurūdārāṃś ca pra
GV00avs___u:6845: (AVŚ_11,9[11].2a) ut tiṣṭhata saṃ nahyadhvaṃ mitrā devajanā yūyam |
GV00avs___u:6846: (AVŚ_11,9[11].2c) saṃdṛṣṭā guptā vaḥ santu yā no mitrāṇy arbude ||2||
GV00avs___u:6849: (AVŚ_11,9[11].4a) arbudir nāma yo deva īśānaś ca nyarbudiḥ |
GV00avs___u:6850: (AVŚ_11,9[11].4c) yābhyām antarikṣam āvṛtam iyaṃ ca pṛthivī mahī |
GV00avs___u:6851: (AVŚ_11,9[11].4e) tābhyām indramedibhyām ahaṃ jitam anv emi senayā ||4||
GV00avs___u:6852: (AVŚ_11,9[11].5a) ut tiṣṭha tvaṃ devajanārbude senayā saha |
GV00avs___u:6853: (AVŚ_11,9[11].5c) bhañjann amitrāṇāṃ senāṃ bhogebhiḥ pari vāraya ||5||
GV00avs___u:6855: (AVŚ_11,9[11].6c) tebhiṣ ṭvam ājye hute sarvair ut tiṣṭha senayā ||6||
GV00avs___u:6857: (AVŚ_11,9[11].7c) vikeśī puruṣe hate radite arbude tava ||7||
GV00avs___u:6859: (AVŚ_11,9[11].8c) patiṃ bhrātaram āt svān radite arbude tava ||8||
GV00avs___u:6861: (AVŚ_11,9[11].9c) dhvāṅkṣāḥ śakunayas tṛpyantv amitreṣu samīkṣayan radite
GV00avs___u:6863: (AVŚ_11,9[11].10a) atho sarvaṃ śvāpadaṃ makṣikā tṛpyatu krimiḥ |
GV00avs___u:6865: (AVŚ_11,9[11].11a) ā gṛhṇītaṃ saṃ bṛhataṃ prāṇāpānān nyarbude |
GV00avs___u:6866: (AVŚ_11,9[11].11c) nivāśā ghoṣāḥ saṃ yantv amitreṣu samīkṣayan radite arbude tava ||11||
GV00avs___u:6867: (AVŚ_11,9[11].12a) ud vepaya saṃ vijantāṃ bhiyāmitrānt saṃ sṛja |
GV00avs___u:6869: (AVŚ_11,9[11].13a) muhyantv eṣāṃ bāhavaś cittākūtaṃ ca yad dhṛdi |
GV00avs___u:6870: (AVŚ_11,9[11].13c) maiṣām uc cheṣi kiṃ cana radite arbude tava ||13||
GV00avs___u:6872: (AVŚ_11,9[11].14c) aghāriṇīr vikeśyo rudatyaḥ puruṣe hate radite arbude tava ||14||
GV00avs___u:6875: (AVŚ_11,9[11].15e) sarvās tā arbude tvam amitrebhyo dṛśe kurūdārāṃś ca pra
GV00avs___u:6878: (AVŚ_11,9[11].16c) ya udārā antarhitā gandharvāpsarasaś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:6882: (AVŚ_11,9[11].18a) ud vepaya tvam arbude 'mitrāṇām amūḥ sicaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6883: (AVŚ_11,9[11].18c) jayaṃś ca jiṣṇuś cāmitrāṃ jayatām indramedinau ||18||
GV00avs___u:6887: (AVŚ_11,9[11].20c) amitrāṇāṃ śacīpatir māmīṣāṃ moci kaś cana ||20|| {26}
GV00avs___u:6888: (AVŚ_11,9[11].21a) ut kasantu hṛdayāny ūrdhvaḥ prāṇa ud īṣatu |
GV00avs___u:6889: (AVŚ_11,9[11].21c) śauṣkāsyam anu vartatām amitrān mota mitriṇaḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:6890: (AVŚ_11,9[11].22a) ye ca dhīrā ye cādhīrāḥ parāñco badhirāś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:6891: (AVŚ_11,9[11].22c) tamasā ye ca tūparā atho bastābhivāsinaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6892: (AVŚ_11,9[11].22e) sarvāṃs tāṃ arbude tvam amitrebhyo dṛśe kurūdārāṃś ca pra darśaya ||22||
GV00avs___u:6893: (AVŚ_11,9[11].23a) arbudiś ca triṣandhiś cāmitrān no vi vidhyatām |
GV00avs___u:6898: (AVŚ_11,9[11].24e) sarvāṃs tāṃ arbude tvam amitrebhyo dṛśe kurūdārāṃś ca pra darśaya ||24||
GV00avs___u:6899: (AVŚ_11,9[11].25a) īśāṃ vo maruto deva ādityo brahmaṇaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:6900: (AVŚ_11,9[11].25c) īśāṃ va indraś cāgniś ca dhātā mitraḥ prajāpatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:6901: (AVŚ_11,9[11].25e) īśāṃ va ṛṣayaś cakrur amitreṣu samīkṣayan radite arbude tava ||25||
GV00avs___u:6902: (AVŚ_11,9[11].26a) teṣāṃ sarveṣām īśānā ut tiṣṭhata saṃ nahyadhvam |
GV00avs___u:6903: (AVŚ_11,9[11].26c) mitrā devajanā yūyam imaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ saṃjitya yathālokaṃ vi tiṣṭhadhvam (AVŚ_11,10[12].1a) ut tiṣṭhata saṃ nahyadhvam udārāḥ ketubhiḥ saha |
GV00avs___u:6904: (AVŚ_11,10[12].1c) sarpā itarajanā rakṣāṃsy amitrān anu dhāvata ||1||
GV00avs___u:6905: (AVŚ_11,10[12].2a) īśāṃ vo veda rājyaṃ triṣandhe aruṇaiḥ ketubhiḥ saha |
GV00avs___u:6906: (AVŚ_11,10[12].2c) ye antarikṣe ye divi pṛthivyāṃ ye ca mānavāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6909: (AVŚ_11,10[12].3c) kravyādo vātaraṃhasa ā sajantv amitrān vajreṇa
GV00avs___u:6911: (AVŚ_11,10[12].4a) antar dhehi jātaveda āditya kuṇapaṃ bahu |
GV00avs___u:6912: (AVŚ_11,10[12].4c) triṣandher iyaṃ senā suhitāstu me vaśe ||4||
GV00avs___u:6913: (AVŚ_11,10[12].5a) ut tiṣṭha tvaṃ devajanārbude senayā saha |
GV00avs___u:6914: (AVŚ_11,10[12].5c) ayaṃ balir va āhutas triṣandher āhutiḥ priyā ||5||
GV00avs___u:6917: (AVŚ_11,10[12].7a) dhūmākṣī saṃ patatu kṛdhukarṇī ca krośatu |
GV00avs___u:6918: (AVŚ_11,10[12].7c) triṣandheḥ senayā jite aruṇāḥ santu ketavaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:6919: (AVŚ_11,10[12].8a) avāyantāṃ pakṣiṇo ye vayāṃsy antarikṣe divi ye caranti |
GV00avs___u:6920: (AVŚ_11,10[12].8c) śvāpado makṣikāḥ saṃ rabhantām āmādo gṛdhrāḥ kuṇape radantām ||8||
GV00avs___u:6921: (AVŚ_11,10[12].9a) yām indreṇa saṃdhāṃ samadhatthā brahmaṇā ca bṛhaspate |
GV00avs___u:6922: (AVŚ_11,10[12].9c) tayāham indrasaṃdhayā sarvān devān iha huva ito jayata māmutaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:6925: (AVŚ_11,10[12].11a) yenāsau gupta āditya ubhāv indraś ca tiṣṭhataḥ |
GV00avs___u:6926: (AVŚ_11,10[12].11c) triṣandhiṃ devā abhajantaujase ca balāya ca ||11||
GV00avs___u:6927: (AVŚ_11,10[12].12a) sarvāṃl lokānt sam ajayan devā āhutyānayā |
GV00avs___u:6928: (AVŚ_11,10[12].12c) bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso vajraṃ yam asiñcatāsurakṣayaṇaṃ vadham ||12||
GV00avs___u:6929: (AVŚ_11,10[12].13a) bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso vajraṃ yam asiñcatāsurakṣayaṇaṃ vadham |
GV00avs___u:6930: (AVŚ_11,10[12].13c) tenāham amūṃ senāṃ ni limpāmi bṛhaspate 'mitrān hanmy ojasā ||13||
GV00avs___u:6931: (AVŚ_11,10[12].14a) sarve devā atyāyanti ye aśnanti vaṣaṭkṛtam |
GV00avs___u:6932: (AVŚ_11,10[12].14c) imāṃ juṣadhvam āhutim ito jayata māmutaḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:6933: (AVŚ_11,10[12].15a) sarve devā atyāyantu triṣandher āhutiḥ priyā |
GV00avs___u:6934: (AVŚ_11,10[12].15c) saṃdhāṃ mahatīṃ rakṣata yayāgre asurā jitāḥ ||15||
GV00avs___u:6936: (AVŚ_11,10[12].16c) indra eṣāṃ bāhūn prati bhanaktu mā śakan pratidhām iṣum |
GV00avs___u:6937: (AVŚ_11,10[12].16e) āditya eṣām astraṃ vi nāśayatu candramā yutām agatasya panthām ||16||
GV00avs___u:6938: (AVŚ_11,10[12].17a) yadi preyur devapurā brahma varmāṇi cakrire |
GV00avs___u:6939: (AVŚ_11,10[12].17c) tanūpānaṃ paripāṇaṃ kṛṇvānā yad upocire sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ kṛdhi ||17||
GV00avs___u:6941: (AVŚ_11,10[12].18c) triṣandhe prehi senayā jayāmitrān pra padyasva ||18||
GV00avs___u:6942: (AVŚ_11,10[12].19a) triṣandhe tamasā tvam amitrān pari vāraya |
GV00avs___u:6944: (AVŚ_11,10[12].20a) śitipadī saṃ patatv amitrāṇām amūḥ sicaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6946: (AVŚ_11,10[12].21a) mūḍhā amitrā nyarbude jahy eṣāṃ varaṃvaram |
GV00avs___u:6948: (AVŚ_11,10[12].22a) yaś ca kavacī yaś cākavaco 'mitro yaś cājmani |
GV00avs___u:6950: (AVŚ_11,10[12].23a) ye varmiṇo ye 'varmāṇo amitrā ye ca varmiṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6951: (AVŚ_11,10[12].23c) sarvāṃs tāṃ arbude hatāṃ chvāno 'dantu bhūmyām ||23||
GV00avs___u:6952: (AVŚ_11,10[12].24a) ye rathino ye arathā asādā ye ca sādinaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6953: (AVŚ_11,10[12].24c) sarvān adantu tān hatān gṛdhrāḥ śyenāḥ patatriṇaḥ
GV00avs___u:6954: (AVŚ_11,10[12].25a) sahasrakuṇapā śetām āmitrī senā samare vadhānām |
GV00avs___u:6956: (AVŚ_11,10[12].26a) marmāvidhaṃ roruvataṃ suparṇair adantu duścitaṃ mṛditaṃ śayānam |
GV00avs___u:6957: (AVŚ_11,10[12].26c) ya imāṃ pratīcīm āhutim amitro no yuyutsati ||26||
GV00avs___u:6958: (AVŚ_11,10[12].27a) yāṃ devā anutiṣṭhanti yasyā nāsti virādhanam |
GV00avs___u:6960: (AVŚ_12,1.1a) satyaṃ bṛhad ṛtam ugraṃ dīkṣā tapo brahma yajñaḥ pṛthivīṃ
GV00avs___u:6962: (AVŚ_12,1.1c) sā no bhūtasya bhavyasya patny uruṃ lokaṃ pṛthivī naḥ kṛṇotu
GV00avs___u:6963: (AVŚ_12,1.2a) asaṃbādhaṃ madhyato mānavānāṃ yasyā udvataḥ pravataḥ samaṃ bahu |
GV00avs___u:6964: (AVŚ_12,1.2c) nānāvīryā oṣadhīr yā bibharti pṛthivī naḥ prathatāṃ rādhyatāṃ naḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:6965: (AVŚ_12,1.3a) yasyāṃ samudra uta sindhur āpo yasyām annaṃ kṛṣṭayaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ |
GV00avs___u:6966: (AVŚ_12,1.3c) yasyām idaṃ jinvati prāṇad ejat sā no bhūmiḥ pūrvapeye
GV00avs___u:6968: (AVŚ_12,1.4a) yasyāś catasraḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyā yasyām annam kṛṣṭayaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ |
GV00avs___u:6969: (AVŚ_12,1.4c) yā bibharti bahudhā prāṇad ejat sā no bhūmir goṣv apy anne dadhātu ||4||
GV00avs___u:6970: (AVŚ_12,1.5a) yasyāṃ pūrve pūrvajanā vicakrire yasyāṃ devā asurān abhyavartayan |
GV00avs___u:6971: (AVŚ_12,1.5c) gavām aśvānāṃ vayasaś ca viṣṭhā bhagaṃ varcaḥ pṛthivī no
GV00avs___u:6973: (AVŚ_12,1.6a) viśvaṃbharā vasudhānī pratiṣṭhā hiraṇyavakṣā jagato niveśanī
GV00avs___u:6974: (AVŚ_12,1.6c) vaiśvānaraṃ bibhratī bhūmir agnim indraṛṣabhā draviṇe no dadhātu ||6||
GV00avs___u:6975: (AVŚ_12,1.7a) yāṃ rakṣanty asvapnā viśvadānīṃ devā bhūmiṃ pṛthivīm apramādam |
GV00avs___u:6976: (AVŚ_12,1.7c) sā no madhu priyaṃ duhām atho ukṣatu varcasā ||7||
GV00avs___u:6977: (AVŚ_12,1.8a) yārṇave 'dhi salilam agra āsīt yāṃ māyābhir anvacaran
GV00avs___u:6979: (AVŚ_12,1.8c) yasyā hṛdayaṃ parame vyomant satyenāvṛtam amṛtaṃ pṛthivyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:6980: (AVŚ_12,1.8e) sā no bhūmis tviṣiṃ balaṃ rāṣṭre dadhātūttame ||8||
GV00avs___u:6981: (AVŚ_12,1.9a) yasyām āpaḥ paricarāḥ samānīr ahorātre apramādaṃ kṣaranti |
GV00avs___u:6982: (AVŚ_12,1.9c) sā no bhūmir bhūridhārā payo duhām atho ukṣatu varcasā ||9||
GV00avs___u:6983: (AVŚ_12,1.10a) yām aśvināv amimātāṃ viṣṇur yasyāṃ vicakrame |
GV00avs___u:6985: (AVŚ_12,1.10e) sā no bhūmir vi sṛjatāṃ mātā putrāya me payaḥ ||10|| {1}
GV00avs___u:6986: (AVŚ_12,1.11a) girayas te parvatā himavanto 'raṇyaṃ te pṛthivi syonam astu
GV00avs___u:6987: (AVŚ_12,1.11c) babhruṃ kṛṣṇāṃ rohiṇīṃ viśvarūpāṃ dhruvāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīm indraguptām |
GV00avs___u:6989: (AVŚ_12,1.12a) yat te madhyaṃ pṛthivi yac ca nabhyaṃ yās ta ūrjas tanvaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ |
GV00avs___u:6990: (AVŚ_12,1.12c) tāsu no dhehy abhi naḥ pavasva mātā bhūmiḥ putro ahaṃ pṛthivyāḥ parjanyaḥ pitā sa u naḥ pipartu ||12||
GV00avs___u:6991: (AVŚ_12,1.13a) yasyāṃ vediṃ parigṛhṇanti bhūmyāṃ yasyāṃ yajñaṃ tanvate viśvakarmāṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:6992: (AVŚ_12,1.13c) yasyāṃ mīyante svaravaḥ pṛthivyām ūrdhvāḥ śukrā āhutyāḥ purastāt |
GV00avs___u:6994: (AVŚ_12,1.14a) yo no dveṣat pṛthivi yaḥ pṛtanyād yo 'bhidāsān manasā yo vadhena |
GV00avs___u:6996: (AVŚ_12,1.15a) tvaj jātās tvayi caranti martyās tvaṃ bibharṣi dvipadas tvaṃ catuṣpadaḥ
GV00avs___u:6997: (AVŚ_12,1.15c) taveme pṛthivi pañca mānavā yebhyo jyotir amṛtaṃ martyebhya udyant sūryo raśmibhir ātanoti ||15||
GV00avs___u:6998: (AVŚ_12,1.16a) tā naḥ prajāḥ saṃ duhratāṃ samagrā vāco madhu pṛthivi dhehi mahyam ||16||
GV00avs___u:6999: (AVŚ_12,1.17a) viśvasvaṃ mātaram oṣadhīnāṃ dhruvāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīṃ
GV00avs___u:7002: (AVŚ_12,1.18a) mahat sadhasthaṃ mahatī babhūvitha mahān vega ejathur vepathuṣ ṭe |
GV00avs___u:7004: (AVŚ_12,1.18e) sā no bhūme pra rocaya hiraṇyasyeva saṃdṛśi mā no dvikṣata kaś cana ||18||
GV00avs___u:7005: (AVŚ_12,1.19a) agnir bhūmyām oṣadhīṣv agnim āpo bibhraty agnir aśmasu |
GV00avs___u:7006: (AVŚ_12,1.19c) agnir antaḥ puruṣeṣu goṣv aśveṣv agnayaḥ ||19||
