GV00avs___u:7007: (AVŚ_12,1.20a) agnir diva ā tapaty agner devasyorv antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:7009: (AVŚ_12,1.21a) agnivāsāḥ pṛthivy asitajñūs tviṣīmantaṃ saṃśitaṃ mā kṛṇotu
GV00avs___u:7010: (AVŚ_12,1.22a) bhūmyāṃ devebhyo dadati yajñaṃ havyam araṃkṛtam |
GV00avs___u:7012: (AVŚ_12,1.22e) sā no bhūmiḥ prāṇam āyur dadhātu jaradaṣṭiṃ mā pṛthivī
GV00avs___u:7014: (AVŚ_12,1.23a) yas te gandhaḥ pṛthivi saṃbabhūva yaṃ bibhraty oṣadhayo yam
GV00avs___u:7016: (AVŚ_12,1.23c) yaṃ gandharvā apsarasaś ca bhejire tena mā surabhiṃ kṛṇu mā no dvikṣata kaś cana ||23||
GV00avs___u:7017: (AVŚ_12,1.24a) yas te gandhaḥ puṣkaram āviveśa yaṃ saṃjabhruḥ sūryāyā vivāhe |
GV00avs___u:7018: (AVŚ_12,1.24c) amartyāḥ pṛthivi gandham agre tena mā surabhiṃ kṛṇu mā no dvikṣata kaś cana
GV00avs___u:7019: (AVŚ_12,1.25a) yas te gandhaḥ puruṣeṣu strīṣu puṃsu bhago ruciḥ |
GV00avs___u:7020: (AVŚ_12,1.25c) yo aśveṣu vīreṣu yo mṛgeṣūta hastiṣu |
GV00avs___u:7021: (AVŚ_12,1.25e) kanyāyāṃ varco yad bhūme tenāsmāṃ api saṃ sṛja mā no dvikṣata kaś cana ||25||
GV00avs___u:7022: (AVŚ_12,1.26a) śilā bhūmir aśmā pāṃsuḥ sā bhūmiḥ saṃdhṛtā dhṛtā |
GV00avs___u:7024: (AVŚ_12,1.27a) yasyāṃ vṛkṣā vānaspatyā dhruvās tiṣṭhanti viśvahā |
GV00avs___u:7028: (AVŚ_12,1.29a) vimṛgvarīṃ pṛthivīm ā vadāmi kṣamāṃ bhūmiṃ brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānām |
GV00avs___u:7029: (AVŚ_12,1.29c) ūrjaṃ puṣṭaṃ bibhratīm annabhāgaṃ ghṛtaṃ tvābhi ni ṣīdema bhūme ||29||
GV00avs___u:7030: (AVŚ_12,1.30a) śuddhā na āpas tanve kṣarantu yo naḥ sedur apriye taṃ ni dadhmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7032: (AVŚ_12,1.31a) yās te prācīḥ pradiśo yā udīcīr yās te bhūme adharād yāś ca
GV00avs___u:7034: (AVŚ_12,1.31c) syonās tā mahyaṃ carate bhavantu mā ni paptaṃ bhuvane
GV00avs___u:7036: (AVŚ_12,1.32a) mā naḥ paścān mā purastān nudiṣṭhā mottarād adharād uta |
GV00avs___u:7037: (AVŚ_12,1.32c) svasti bhūme no bhava mā vidan paripanthino varīyo yāvayā
GV00avs___u:7039: (AVŚ_12,1.33a) yāvat te 'bhi vipaśyāmi bhūme sūryeṇa medinā |
GV00avs___u:7040: (AVŚ_12,1.33c) tāvan me cakṣur mā meṣṭottarāmuttarāṃ samām ||33||
GV00avs___u:7041: (AVŚ_12,1.34a) yac chayānaḥ paryāvarte dakṣiṇaṃ sakhyam abhi bhūme pārśvam uttānās tvā pratīcīṃ yat pṛṣṭībhir adhiśemahe |
GV00avs___u:7042: (AVŚ_12,1.34c) mā hiṃsīs tatra no bhūme sarvasya pratiśīvari ||34||
GV00avs___u:7043: (AVŚ_12,1.35a) yat te bhūme vikhanāmi kṣipraṃ tad api rohatu |
GV00avs___u:7044: (AVŚ_12,1.35c) mā te marma vimṛgvari mā te hṛdayam arpipam ||35||
GV00avs___u:7045: (AVŚ_12,1.36a) grīṣmas te bhūme varṣāṇi śarad dhemantaḥ śiśiro vasantaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7046: (AVŚ_12,1.36c) ṛtavas te vihitā hāyanīr ahorātre pṛthivi no duhātām ||36||
GV00avs___u:7047: (AVŚ_12,1.37a) yāpa sarpaṃ vijamānā vimṛgvarī yasyām āsann agnayo ye apsv
GV00avs___u:7049: (AVŚ_12,1.37c) parā dasyūn dadatī devapīyūn indraṃ vṛṇānā pṛthivī na vṛtram śakrāya dadhre vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe ||37||
GV00avs___u:7051: (AVŚ_12,1.38c) brahmāṇo yasyām arcanty ṛgbhiḥ sāmnā yajurvidaḥ yujyante yasyām ṛtvijaḥ somam indrāya pātave ||38||
GV00avs___u:7052: (AVŚ_12,1.39a) yasyāṃ pūrve bhūtakṛta ṛṣayo gā udānṛcuḥ |
GV00avs___u:7053: (AVŚ_12,1.39c) sapta satreṇa vedhaso yajñena tapasā saha ||39||
GV00avs___u:7054: (AVŚ_12,1.40a) sā no bhūmir ā diśatu yad dhanaṃ kāmayāmahe |
GV00avs___u:7056: (AVŚ_12,1.41a) yasyāṃ gāyanti nṛtyanti bhūmyāṃ martyā vyailabāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7057: (AVŚ_12,1.41c) yudhyante yasyām ākrando yasyām vadati dundubhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:7058: (AVŚ_12,1.41e) sā no bhūmiḥ pra ṇudatāṃ sapatnān asapatnaṃ mā pṛthivī
GV00avs___u:7060: (AVŚ_12,1.42a) yasyām annaṃ vrīhiyavau yasyā imāḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7062: (AVŚ_12,1.43a) yasyāḥ puro devakṛtāḥ kṣetre yasyā vikurvate |
GV00avs___u:7063: (AVŚ_12,1.43c) prajāpatiḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvagarbhām āśāmāśāṃ raṇyāṃ naḥ kṛṇotu
GV00avs___u:7064: (AVŚ_12,1.44a) nidhiṃ bibhratī bahudhā guhā vasu maṇiṃ hiraṇyaṃ pṛthivī dadātu me |
GV00avs___u:7065: (AVŚ_12,1.44c) vasūni no vasudā rāsamānā devī dadhātu sumanasyamānā ||44||
GV00avs___u:7066: (AVŚ_12,1.45a) janaṃ bibhratī bahudhā vivācasaṃ nānādharmāṇaṃ pṛthivī
GV00avs___u:7068: (AVŚ_12,1.45c) sahasraṃ dhārā draviṇasya me duhāṃ dhruveva dhenur anapasphurantī ||45||
GV00avs___u:7069: (AVŚ_12,1.46a) yas te sarpo vṛścikas tṛṣṭadaṃśmā hemantajabdho bhṛmalo guhā śaye |
GV00avs___u:7070: (AVŚ_12,1.46c) krimir jinvat pṛthivi yadyad ejati prāvṛṣi tan naḥ sarpan
GV00avs___u:7071: mopa sṛpad yac chivaṃ tena no mṛḍa ||46||
GV00avs___u:7072: (AVŚ_12,1.47a) ye te panthāno bahavo janāyanā rathasya vartmānasaś ca yātave |
GV00avs___u:7073: (AVŚ_12,1.47c) yaiḥ saṃcaranty ubhaye bhadrapāpās taṃ panthānaṃ
GV00avs___u:7074: jayemānamitram ataskaraṃ yac chivaṃ tena no mṛḍa ||47||
GV00avs___u:7075: (AVŚ_12,1.48a) malvaṃ bibhratī gurubhṛd bhadrapāpasya nidhanaṃ titikṣuḥ |
GV00avs___u:7076: (AVŚ_12,1.48c) varāheṇa pṛthivī saṃvidānā sūkarāya vi jihīte mṛgāya ||48||
GV00avs___u:7077: (AVŚ_12,1.49a) ye ta āraṇyāḥ paśavo mṛgā vane hitāḥ siṃhā vyāghrāḥ
GV00avs___u:7079: (AVŚ_12,1.49c) ulaṃ vṛkaṃ pṛthivi duchunām ita ṛkṣīkāṃ rakṣo apa bādhayāsmat ||49||
GV00avs___u:7080: (AVŚ_12,1.50a) ye gandharvā apsaraso ye cārāyāḥ kimīdinaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7081: (AVŚ_12,1.50c) piśācānt sarvā rakṣāṃsi tān asmad bhūme yāvaya ||50|| {5}
GV00avs___u:7082: (AVŚ_12,1.51a) yāṃ dvipādaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃpatanti haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunā vayāṃsi |
GV00avs___u:7083: (AVŚ_12,1.51c) yasyāṃ vāto mātariśveyate rajāṃsi kṛṇvaṃś cyāvayaṃś ca vṛkṣān |
GV00avs___u:7084: (AVŚ_12,1.51e) vātasya pravām upavām anu vāty arciḥ ||51||
GV00avs___u:7085: (AVŚ_12,1.52a) yasyāṃ kṛṣṇam aruṇaṃ ca saṃhite ahorātre vihite bhūmyām adhi |
GV00avs___u:7086: (AVŚ_12,1.52c) varṣeṇa bhūmiḥ pṛthivī vṛtāvṛtā sā no dadhātu bhadrayā priye dhāmanidhāmani
GV00avs___u:7087: (AVŚ_12,1.53a) dyauś ca ma idaṃ pṛthivī cāntarikṣaṃ ca me vyacaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7088: (AVŚ_12,1.53c) agniḥ sūrya āpo medhāṃ viśve devāś ca saṃ daduḥ ||53||
GV00avs___u:7089: (AVŚ_12,1.54a) aham asmi sahamāna uttaro nāma bhūmyām |
GV00avs___u:7091: (AVŚ_12,1.55a) ado yad devi prathamānā purastād devair uktā vyasarpo mahitvam |
GV00avs___u:7092: (AVŚ_12,1.55c) ā tvā subhūtam aviśat tadānīm akalpayathāḥ pradiśaś catasraḥ ||55||
GV00avs___u:7093: (AVŚ_12,1.56a) ye grāmā yad araṇyaṃ yāḥ sabhā adhi bhūmyām |
GV00avs___u:7094: (AVŚ_12,1.56c) ye saṃgrāmāḥ samitayas teṣu cāru vadema te ||56||
GV00avs___u:7095: (AVŚ_12,1.57a) aśva iva rajo dudhuve vi tān janān ya ākṣiyan pṛthivīṃ yād ajāyata |
GV00avs___u:7096: (AVŚ_12,1.57c) mandrāgretvarī bhuvanasya gopā vanaspatīnāṃ gṛbhir oṣadhīnām ||57||
GV00avs___u:7097: (AVŚ_12,1.58a) yad vadāmi madhumat tad vadāmi yad īkṣe tad vananti mā |
GV00avs___u:7098: (AVŚ_12,1.58c) tviṣīmān asmi jūtimān avānyān hanmi dodhataḥ ||58||
GV00avs___u:7100: (AVŚ_12,1.59c) bhūmir adhi bravītu me pṛthivī payasā saha ||59||
GV00avs___u:7101: (AVŚ_12,1.60a) yām anvaichad dhaviṣā viśvakarmāntar arṇave rajasi
GV00avs___u:7103: (AVŚ_12,1.60c) bhujiṣyaṃ pātraṃ nihitaṃ guhā yad āvir bhoge abhavan mātṛmadbhyaḥ ||60||
GV00avs___u:7104: (AVŚ_12,1.61a) tvam asy āvapanī janānām aditiḥ kāmadughā paprathānā |
GV00avs___u:7105: (AVŚ_12,1.61c) yat ta ūnaṃ tat ta ā pūrayāti prajāpatiḥ prathamajā ṛtasya
GV00avs___u:7106: (AVŚ_12,1.62a) upasthās te anamīvā ayakṣmā asmabhyaṃ santu pṛthivi prasūtāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7107: (AVŚ_12,1.62c) dīrghaṃ na āyuḥ pratibudhyamānā vayaṃ tubhyaṃ balihṛtaḥ syāma ||62||
GV00avs___u:7108: (AVŚ_12,1.63a) bhūme mātar ni dhehi mā bhadrayā supratiṣṭhitam |
GV00avs___u:7109: (AVŚ_12,1.63c) saṃvidānā divā kave śriyāṃ mā dhehi bhūtyām ||63|| {6}
GV00avs___u:7110: (AVŚ_12,2.1a) naḍam ā roha na te atra loka idaṃ sīsaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ ta ehi |
GV00avs___u:7111: (AVŚ_12,2.1c) yo goṣu yakṣmaḥ puruṣeṣu yakṣmas tena tvaṃ sākam adharāṅ
GV00avs___u:7114: (AVŚ_12,2.2c) yakṣmaṃ ca sarvaṃ teneto mṛtyuṃ ca nir ajāmasi ||2||
GV00avs___u:7115: (AVŚ_12,2.3a) nir ito mṛtyuṃ nirṛtiṃ nir arātim ajāmasi |
GV00avs___u:7116: (AVŚ_12,2.3c) yo no dveṣṭi tam addhy agne akravyād yam u dviṣmas tam u te pra suvāmasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:7117: (AVŚ_12,2.4a) yady agniḥ kravyād yadi vā vyāghra imaṃ goṣṭhaṃ praviveśānyokāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7118: (AVŚ_12,2.4c) taṃ māṣājyaṃ kṛtvā pra hiṇomi dūraṃ sa gachatv apsuṣado 'py
GV00avs___u:7120: (AVŚ_12,2.5a) yat tvā kruddhāḥ pracakrur manyunā puruṣe mṛte |
GV00avs___u:7121: (AVŚ_12,2.5c) sukalpam agne tat tvayā punas tvod dīpayāmasi ||5||
GV00avs___u:7122: (AVŚ_12,2.6a) punas tvādityā rudrā vasavaḥ punar brahmā vasunītir agne |
GV00avs___u:7123: (AVŚ_12,2.6c) punas tvā brahmaṇas patir ādhād dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya
GV00avs___u:7124: (AVŚ_12,2.7a) yo agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa no gṛham imaṃ paśyann itaraṃ
GV00avs___u:7126: (AVŚ_12,2.7c) taṃ harāmi pitṛyajñāya dūraṃ sa gharmam indhāṃ parame sadhasthe ||7||
GV00avs___u:7127: (AVŚ_12,2.8a) kravyādam agniṃ pra hiṇomi dūram yamarājño gachatu ripravāhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7128: (AVŚ_12,2.8c) ihāyam itaro jātavedā devo devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan ||8||
GV00avs___u:7129: (AVŚ_12,2.9a) kravyādam agnim iṣito harāmi janān dṛṃhantaṃ vajreṇa mṛtyum |
GV00avs___u:7130: (AVŚ_12,2.9c) ni taṃ śāsmi gārhapatyena vidvān pitṝṇāṃ loke 'pi bhāgo astu ||9||
GV00avs___u:7131: (AVŚ_12,2.10a) kravyādam agniṃ śaśamānam ukthyaṃ pra hiṇomi pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:7132: (AVŚ_12,2.10c) mā devayānaiḥ punar ā gā atraivaidhi pitṛṣu jāgṛhi tvam
GV00avs___u:7133: (AVŚ_12,2.11a) sam indhate saṃkasukaṃ svastaye śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7134: (AVŚ_12,2.11c) jahāti ripram aty ena eti samiddho agniḥ supunā punāti
GV00avs___u:7135: (AVŚ_12,2.12a) devo agniḥ saṃkasuko divas pṛṣṭhāny āruhat |
GV00avs___u:7137: (AVŚ_12,2.13a) asmin vayaṃ saṃkasuke agnau riprāṇi mṛjmahe |
GV00avs___u:7138: (AVŚ_12,2.13c) abhūma yajñiyāḥ śuddhāḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat ||13||
GV00avs___u:7139: (AVŚ_12,2.14a) saṃkasuko vikasuko nirṛtho yaś ca nisvaraḥ |
GV00avs___u:7140: (AVŚ_12,2.14c) te te yakṣmaṃ savedaso dūrād dūram anīnaśan ||14||
GV00avs___u:7141: (AVŚ_12,2.15a) yo no aśveṣu vīreṣu yo no goṣv ajāviṣu |
GV00avs___u:7142: (AVŚ_12,2.15c) kravyādaṃ nir ṇudāmasi yo agnir janayopanaḥ ||15||
GV00avs___u:7143: (AVŚ_12,2.16a) anyebhyas tvā puruṣebhyo gobhyo aśvebhyas tvā |
GV00avs___u:7144: (AVŚ_12,2.16c) niḥ kravyādaṃ nudāmasi yo agnir jīvitayopanaḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:7145: (AVŚ_12,2.17a) yasmin devā amṛjata yasmin manuṣyā uta |
GV00avs___u:7146: (AVŚ_12,2.17c) tasmin ghṛtastāvo mṛṣṭvā tvam agne divaṃ ruha ||17||
GV00avs___u:7147: (AVŚ_12,2.18a) samiddho agna āhuta sa no mābhyapakramīḥ |
GV00avs___u:7148: (AVŚ_12,2.18c) atraiva dīdihi dyavi jyok ca sūryaṃ dṛśe ||18||
GV00avs___u:7149: (AVŚ_12,2.19a) sīse mṛḍḍhvaṃ naḍe mṛḍḍhvam agnau saṃkasuke ca yat |
GV00avs___u:7152: (AVŚ_12,2.20c) avyām asiknyāṃ mṛṣṭvā śuddhā bhavata yajñiyāḥ ||20|| {8}
GV00avs___u:7153: (AVŚ_12,2.21a) paraṃ mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yas ta eṣa itaro devayānāt |
GV00avs___u:7154: (AVŚ_12,2.21c) cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmīheme vīrā bahavo bhavantu
GV00avs___u:7155: (AVŚ_12,2.22a) ime jīvā vi mṛtair āvavṛtrann abhūd bhadrā devahutir no
GV00avs___u:7157: (AVŚ_12,2.22c) prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema ||22||
GV00avs___u:7158: (AVŚ_12,2.23a) imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gād aparo artham
GV00avs___u:7160: (AVŚ_12,2.23c) śataṃ jīvantaḥ śaradaḥ purūcīs tiro mṛtyuṃ dadhatām parvatena ||23||
GV00avs___u:7161: (AVŚ_12,2.24a) ā rohatāyur jarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yati stha |
GV00avs___u:7162: (AVŚ_12,2.24c) tān vas tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣāḥ sarvam āyur nayatu jīvanāya
GV00avs___u:7163: (AVŚ_12,2.25a) yathāhāny anupūrvaṃ bhavanti yatha rtava ṛtubhir yanti sākam |
GV00avs___u:7164: (AVŚ_12,2.25c) yathā na pūrvam aparo jahāty evā dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpayaiṣām
GV00avs___u:7165: (AVŚ_12,2.26a) aśmanvatī rīyate saṃ rabhadhvaṃ vīrayadhvaṃ pra taratā sakhāyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7166: (AVŚ_12,2.26c) atrā jahīta ye asan durevā anamīvān ut taremābhi vājān
GV00avs___u:7167: (AVŚ_12,2.27a) ut tiṣṭhatā pra taratā sakhāyo 'śmanvatī nadī syandata iyam
GV00avs___u:7168: (AVŚ_12,2.27c) atrā jahīta ye asann aśivāḥ śivānt syonān ut taremābhi
GV00avs___u:7170: (AVŚ_12,2.28a) vaiśvadevīṃ varcasā ā rabhadhvaṃ śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7171: (AVŚ_12,2.28c) atikrāmanto duritā padāni śataṃ himāḥ sarvavīrā madema
GV00avs___u:7173: (AVŚ_12,2.29c) triḥ sapta kṛtva ṛṣayaḥ paretā mṛtyuṃ praty auhan padayopanena ||29||
GV00avs___u:7174: (AVŚ_12,2.30a) mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanta eta drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7175: (AVŚ_12,2.30c) āsīnā mṛtyuṃ nudatā sadhasthe 'tha jīvāso vidatham ā vadema
GV00avs___u:7176: (AVŚ_12,2.31a) imā nārīr avidhavāḥ supatnīr āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ spṛśantām |
GV00avs___u:7177: (AVŚ_12,2.31c) anaśravo anamīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayo yonim agre ||31||
GV00avs___u:7178: (AVŚ_12,2.32a) vyākaromi haviṣāham etau tau brahmaṇā vy ahaṃ kalpayāmi |
GV00avs___u:7179: (AVŚ_12,2.32c) svadhāṃ pitṛbhyo ajarāṃ kṛṇomi dīrgheṇāyuṣā sam imānt sṛjāmi ||32||
GV00avs___u:7180: (AVŚ_12,2.33a) yo no agniḥ pitaro hṛtsv antar āviveśāmṛto martyeṣu |
GV00avs___u:7181: (AVŚ_12,2.33c) mayy ahaṃ taṃ pari gṛhṇāmi devaṃ mā so asmān dvikṣata mā vayaṃ tam ||33||
GV00avs___u:7183: (AVŚ_12,2.34c) priyaṃ pitṛbhya ātmane brahmabhyaḥ kṛṇutā priyam ||34||
GV00avs___u:7185: (AVŚ_12,2.35c) agniḥ putrasya jyeṣṭhasya yaḥ kravyād anirāhitaḥ ||35||
GV00avs___u:7186: (AVŚ_12,2.36a) yat kṛṣate yad vanute yac ca vasnena vindate |
GV00avs___u:7187: (AVŚ_12,2.36c) sarvaṃ martyasya tan nāsti kravyāc ced anirāhitaḥ ||36||
GV00avs___u:7188: (AVŚ_12,2.37a) ayajñiyo hatavarcā bhavati nainena havir attave |
GV00avs___u:7189: (AVŚ_12,2.37c) chinatti kṛṣyā gor dhanād yaṃ kravyād anuvartate ||37||
GV00avs___u:7190: (AVŚ_12,2.38a) muhur gṛdhyaiḥ pra vadaty ārtim martyo nītya |
GV00avs___u:7191: (AVŚ_12,2.38c) kravyād yān agnir antikād anuvidvān vitāvati ||38||
GV00avs___u:7192: (AVŚ_12,2.39a) grāhyā gṛhāḥ saṃ sṛjyante striyā yan mriyate patiḥ |
GV00avs___u:7193: (AVŚ_12,2.39c) brahmaiva vidvān eṣyo yaḥ kravyādaṃ nirādadhat ||39||
GV00avs___u:7194: (AVŚ_12,2.40a) yad ripraṃ śamalaṃ cakṛma yac ca duṣkṛtam |
GV00avs___u:7195: (AVŚ_12,2.40c) āpo mā tasmāc chumbhantv agneḥ saṃkasukāc ca yat ||40||
GV00avs___u:7196: (AVŚ_12,2.41a) tā adharād udīcīr āvavṛtran prajānaitīḥ pathibhir
GV00avs___u:7198: (AVŚ_12,2.41c) parvatasya vṛṣabhasyādhi pṛṣṭhe navāś caranti saritaḥ
GV00avs___u:7200: (AVŚ_12,2.42a) agne akravyān niḥ kravyādaṃ nudā devayajanaṃ vaha ||42||
GV00avs___u:7201: (AVŚ_12,2.43a) imaṃ kravyād ā viveśāyaṃ kravyādam anv agāt |
GV00avs___u:7202: (AVŚ_12,2.43c) vyāghrau kṛtvā nānānaṃ taṃ harāmi śivāparam ||43||
GV00avs___u:7203: (AVŚ_12,2.44a) antardhir devānāṃ paridhir manuṣyāṇām agnir gārhapatya
GV00avs___u:7205: (AVŚ_12,2.45a) jīvānām āyuḥ pra tira tvam agne pitṝṇāṃ lokam api gachantu ye mṛtāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7206: (AVŚ_12,2.45c) sugārhapatyo vitapann arātim uṣāmuṣāṃ śreyasīṃ dhehy asmai
GV00avs___u:7207: (AVŚ_12,2.46a) sarvān agne sahamānaḥ sapatnān aiṣām ūrjaṃ rayim asmāsu dhehi ||46||
GV00avs___u:7208: (AVŚ_12,2.47a) imam indraṃ vahniṃ paprim anvārabhadhvaṃ sa vo nir vakṣad
GV00avs___u:7210: (AVŚ_12,2.47c) tenāpa hata śarum āpatantaṃ tena rudrasya pari pātāstām ||47||
GV00avs___u:7211: (AVŚ_12,2.48a) anaḍvāhaṃ plavam anvārabhadhvaṃ sa vo nir vakṣad duritād avadyāt |
GV00avs___u:7212: (AVŚ_12,2.48c) ā rohata savitur nāvam etāṃ ṣaḍbhir urvībhir amatiṃ tarema
GV00avs___u:7213: (AVŚ_12,2.49a) ahorātre anv eṣi bibhrat kṣemyas tiṣṭhan prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ |
GV00avs___u:7214: (AVŚ_12,2.49c) anāturānt sumanasas talpa bibhraj jyog eva naḥ puruṣagandhir edhi ||49||
GV00avs___u:7215: (AVŚ_12,2.50a) te devebhya ā vṛścante pāpaṃ jīvanti sarvadā |
GV00avs___u:7216: (AVŚ_12,2.50c) kravyād yān agnir antikād aśva ivānuvapate naḍam ||50||
GV00avs___u:7218: (AVŚ_12,2.51c) te vā anyeṣāṃ kumbhīṃ paryādadhati sarvadā ||51||
GV00avs___u:7219: (AVŚ_12,2.52a) preva pipatiṣati manasā muhur ā vartate punaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7220: (AVŚ_12,2.52c) kravyād yān agnir antikād anuvidvān vitāvati ||52||
GV00avs___u:7221: (AVŚ_12,2.53a) aviḥ kṛṣṇā bhāgadheyaṃ paśūnāṃ sīsaṃ kravyād api candraṃ ta
GV00avs___u:7223: (AVŚ_12,2.53c) māṣāḥ piṣṭā bhāgadheyaṃ te havyam araṇyānyā gahvaraṃ sacasva ||53||
GV00avs___u:7224: (AVŚ_12,2.54a) iṣīkāṃ jaratīm iṣṭvā tilpiñjaṃ daṇḍanaṃ naḍam |
GV00avs___u:7225: (AVŚ_12,2.54c) tam indra idhmam kṛtvā yamasyāgniṃ nirādadhau ||54||
GV00avs___u:7226: (AVŚ_12,2.55a) pratyañcam arkaṃ pratyarpayitvā pravidvān panthāṃ vi hy āviveśa |
GV00avs___u:7227: (AVŚ_12,2.55c) parāmīṣām asūn dideśa dīrgheṇāyuṣā sam imānt sṛjāmi ||55||
GV00avs___u:7228: (AVŚ_12,3.1a) pumān puṃso 'dhi tiṣṭha carmehi tatra hvayasva yatamā priyā
GV00avs___u:7230: (AVŚ_12,3.1c) yāvantāv agre prathamaṃ sameyathus tad vāṃ vayo yamarājye samānam ||1||
GV00avs___u:7231: (AVŚ_12,3.2a) tāvad vāṃ cakṣus tati vīryāṇi tāvat tejas tatidhā vājināni |
GV00avs___u:7232: (AVŚ_12,3.2c) agniḥ śarīraṃ sacate yadaidho 'dhā pakvān mithunā saṃ
GV00avs___u:7234: (AVŚ_12,3.3a) sam asmiṃl loke sam u devayāne saṃ smā sametaṃ yamarājyeṣu |
GV00avs___u:7235: (AVŚ_12,3.3c) pūtau pavitrair upa tad dhvayethāṃ yadyad reto adhi vāṃ
GV00avs___u:7237: (AVŚ_12,3.4a) āpas putrāso abhi saṃ viśadhvam imaṃ jīvaṃ jīvadhanyāḥ sametya |
GV00avs___u:7238: (AVŚ_12,3.4c) tāsāṃ bhajadhvam amṛtaṃ yam āhur odanaṃ pacati vāṃ janitrī
GV00avs___u:7239: (AVŚ_12,3.5a) yaṃ vāṃ pitā pacati yaṃ ca mātā riprān nirmuktyai śamalāc ca vācaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7240: (AVŚ_12,3.5c) sa odanaḥ śatadhāraḥ svarga ubhe vy āpa nabhasī mahitvā
GV00avs___u:7241: (AVŚ_12,3.6a) ubhe nabhasī ubhayāṃś ca lokān ye yajvanām abhijitāḥ svargāḥ
GV00avs___u:7242: (AVŚ_12,3.6c) teṣāṃ jyotiṣmān madhumān yo agre tasmin putrair jarasi saṃ
GV00avs___u:7244: (AVŚ_12,3.7a) prācīṃprācīṃ pradiśam ā rabhethām etaṃ lokaṃ śraddadhānāḥ sacante |
GV00avs___u:7245: (AVŚ_12,3.7c) yad vāṃ pakvaṃ pariviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye daṃpatī saṃ
GV00avs___u:7247: (AVŚ_12,3.8a) dakṣiṇāṃ diśam abhi nakṣamāṇau paryāvartethām abhi pātram etat |
GV00avs___u:7248: (AVŚ_12,3.8c) tasmin vāṃ yamaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ pakvāya śarma bahulaṃ ni yachāt ||8||
GV00avs___u:7249: (AVŚ_12,3.9a) pratīcī diśām iyam id varaṃ yasyāṃ somo adhipā mṛḍitā ca |
GV00avs___u:7250: (AVŚ_12,3.9c) tasyāṃ śrayethāṃ sukṛtaḥ sacethām adhā pakvān mithunā saṃ bhavāthaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:7251: (AVŚ_12,3.10a) uttaraṃ rāṣṭraṃ prajayottarāvad diśām udīcī kṛṇavan no agram |
GV00avs___u:7252: (AVŚ_12,3.10c) pāṅktaṃ chandaḥ puruṣo babhūva viśvair viśvāṅgaiḥ saha saṃ bhavema ||10||
GV00avs___u:7253: (AVŚ_12,3.11a) dhruveyaṃ virāṇ namo astv asyai śivā putrebhya uta mahyam
GV00avs___u:7255: (AVŚ_12,3.11c) sā no devy adite viśvavāra irya iva gopā abhi rakṣa pakvam ||11||
GV00avs___u:7256: (AVŚ_12,3.12a) piteva putrān abhi saṃ svajasva naḥ śivā no vātā iha vāntu bhūmau |
GV00avs___u:7257: (AVŚ_12,3.12c) yam odanaṃ pacato devate iha taṃ nas tapa uta satyaṃ ca vettu ||12||
GV00avs___u:7258: (AVŚ_12,3.13a) yadyad kṛṣṇaḥ śakuna eha gatvā tsaran viṣaktaṃ bila āsasāda
GV00avs___u:7259: (AVŚ_12,3.13c) yad vā dāsy ārdrahastā samaṅkta ulūkhalaṃ musalaṃ śumbhatāpaḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:7260: (AVŚ_12,3.14a) ayaṃ grāvā pṛthubudhno vayodhāḥ pūtaḥ pavitrair apa hantu rakṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7261: (AVŚ_12,3.14c) ā roha carma mahi śarma yacha mā daṃpatī pautram aghaṃ ni gātām ||14||
GV00avs___u:7262: (AVŚ_12,3.15a) vanaspatiḥ saha devair na āgan rakṣaḥ piśācāṃ apabādhamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7263: (AVŚ_12,3.15c) sa uc chrayātai pra vadāti vācaṃ tena lokāṃ abhi sarvān jayema ||15||
GV00avs___u:7264: (AVŚ_12,3.16a) sapta medhān paśavaḥ pary agṛhṇan ya eṣāṃ jyotiṣmāṃ uta yaś cakarśa |
GV00avs___u:7265: (AVŚ_12,3.16c) trayastriṃśad devatās tānt sacante sa naḥ svargam abhi neṣa
GV00avs___u:7267: (AVŚ_12,3.17a) svargaṃ lokam abhi no nayāsi saṃ jāyayā saha putraiḥ syāma
GV00avs___u:7268: (AVŚ_12,3.17c) gṛhṇāmi hastam anu maitv atra mā nas tārīn nirṛtir mo arātiḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:7269: (AVŚ_12,3.18a) grāhiṃ pāpmānam ati tāṃ ayāma tamo vy asya pra vadāsi valgu |
GV00avs___u:7270: (AVŚ_12,3.18c) vānaspatya udyato mā jihiṃsīr mā taṇḍulaṃ vi śarīr devayantam ||18||
GV00avs___u:7271: (AVŚ_12,3.19a) viśvavyacā ghṛtapṛṣṭho bhaviṣyant sayonir lokam upa yāhy etam |
GV00avs___u:7272: (AVŚ_12,3.19c) varṣavṛddham upa yacha śūrpaṃ tuṣaṃ palāvān apa tad vinaktu
GV00avs___u:7273: (AVŚ_12,3.20a) trayo lokāḥ saṃmitā brāhmaṇena dyaur evāsau pṛthivy antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:7274: (AVŚ_12,3.20c) aṃśūn gṛbhītvānvārabhethām ā pyāyantāṃ punar ā yantu śūrpam ||20|| {14}
GV00avs___u:7275: (AVŚ_12,3.21a) pṛthag rūpāṇi bahudhā paśūnām ekarūpo bhavasi saṃ samṛddhyā |
GV00avs___u:7276: (AVŚ_12,3.21c) etāṃ tvacaṃ lohinīṃ tāṃ nudasva grāvā śumbhāti malaga iva
GV00avs___u:7278: (AVŚ_12,3.22a) pṛthivīṃ tvā pṛthivyām ā veśayāmi tanūḥ samānī vikṛtā ta
GV00avs___u:7280: (AVŚ_12,3.22c) yadyad dyuttaṃ likhitam arpaṇena tena mā susror brahmaṇāpi tad vapāmi ||22||
GV00avs___u:7281: (AVŚ_12,3.23a) janitrīva prati haryāsi sūnuṃ saṃ tvā dadhāmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthivyā |
GV00avs___u:7282: (AVŚ_12,3.23c) ukhā kumbhī vedyāṃ mā vyathiṣṭhā yajñāyudhair ājyenātiṣaktā
GV00avs___u:7283: (AVŚ_12,3.24a) agniḥ pacan rakṣatu tvā purastād indro rakṣatu dakṣiṇato marutvān |
GV00avs___u:7284: (AVŚ_12,3.24c) varuṇas tvā dṛṃhād dharuṇe pratīcyā uttarāt tvā somaḥ saṃ
GV00avs___u:7286: (AVŚ_12,3.25a) pūtāḥ pavitraiḥ pavante abhrād divaṃ ca yanti pṛthivīṃ ca
GV00avs___u:7288: (AVŚ_12,3.25c) tā jīvalā jīvadhanyāḥ pratiṣṭhāḥ pātra āsiktāḥ pary agnir indhām ||25||
GV00avs___u:7289: (AVŚ_12,3.26a) ā yanti divaḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante bhūmyāḥ sacante adhy antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:7290: (AVŚ_12,3.26c) śuddhāḥ satīs tā u śumbhanta eva tā naḥ svargam abhi lokaṃ nayantu ||26||
GV00avs___u:7291: (AVŚ_12,3.27a) uteva prabhvīr uta saṃmitāsa uta śukrāḥ śucayaś cāmṛtāsaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7292: (AVŚ_12,3.27c) tā odanaṃ daṃpatibhyāṃ praśiṣṭā āpaḥ śikṣantīḥ pacatā sunāthāḥ ||27||
GV00avs___u:7293: (AVŚ_12,3.28a) saṃkhyātā stokāḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante prāṇāpānaiḥ saṃmitā
GV00avs___u:7295: (AVŚ_12,3.28c) asaṃkhyātā opyamānāḥ suvarṇāḥ sarvaṃ vyāpuḥ śucayaḥ
GV00avs___u:7297: (AVŚ_12,3.29a) ud yodhanty abhi valganti taptāḥ phenam asyanti bahulāṃś ca
GV00avs___u:7299: (AVŚ_12,3.29c) yoṣeva dṛṣṭvā patim ṛtviyāyaitais taṇḍulair bhavatā sam āpaḥ ||29||
GV00avs___u:7300: (AVŚ_12,3.30a) ut thāpaya sīdato budhna enān adbhir ātmānam abhi saṃ
GV00avs___u:7302: (AVŚ_12,3.30c) amāsi pātrair udakaṃ yad etan mitās taṇḍulāḥ pradiśo yadīmāḥ ||30|| {15}
GV00avs___u:7303: (AVŚ_12,3.31a) pra yacha parśuṃ tvarayā harausam ahiṃsanta oṣadhīr dāntu parvan |
GV00avs___u:7304: (AVŚ_12,3.31c) vāsāṃ somaḥ pari rājyaṃ babhūvāmanyutā no vīrudho bhavantu ||31||
GV00avs___u:7305: (AVŚ_12,3.32a) navaṃ barhir odanāya stṛṇīta priyaṃ hṛdaś cakṣuṣo valgv astu |
GV00avs___u:7306: (AVŚ_12,3.32c) tasmin devāḥ saha daivīr viśantv imaṃ prāśnantv ṛtubhir niṣadya ||32||
GV00avs___u:7307: (AVŚ_12,3.33a) vanaspate stīrṇam ā sīda barhir agniṣṭobhaiḥ saṃmito devatābhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:7308: (AVŚ_12,3.33c) tvaṣṭreva rūpaṃ sukṛtaṃ svadhityainā ehāḥ pari pātre dadṛśrām ||33||
GV00avs___u:7309: (AVŚ_12,3.34a) ṣaṣṭyāṃ śaratsu nidhipā abhīchāt svaḥ pakvenābhy aśnavātai
GV00avs___u:7310: (AVŚ_12,3.34c) upainaṃ jīvān pitaraś ca putrā etaṃ svargaṃ gamayāntam agneḥ ||34||
GV00avs___u:7311: (AVŚ_12,3.35a) dhartā dhriyasva dharuṇe pṛthivyā acyutaṃ tvā devatāś cyāvayantu |
GV00avs___u:7312: (AVŚ_12,3.35c) taṃ tvā daṃpatī jīvantau jīvaputrāv ud vāsayātaḥ pary agnidhānāt ||35||
GV00avs___u:7313: (AVŚ_12,3.36a) sarvānt samāgā abhijitya lokān yāvantaḥ kāmāḥ sam atītṛpas tān |
GV00avs___u:7314: (AVŚ_12,3.36c) vi gāhethām āyavanaṃ ca darvir ekasmin pātre adhy ud
GV00avs___u:7316: (AVŚ_12,3.37a) upa stṛṇīhi prathaya purastād ghṛtena pātram abhi ghārayaitat |
GV00avs___u:7317: (AVŚ_12,3.37c) vāśrevosrā taruṇaṃ stanasyum imaṃ devāso abhihiṅkṛṇota
GV00avs___u:7318: (AVŚ_12,3.38a) upāstarīr akaro lokam etam uruḥ prathatām asamaḥ svargaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7319: (AVŚ_12,3.38c) tasmiṃ chrayātai mahiṣaḥ suparṇo devā enaṃ devatābhyaḥ pra yachān ||38||
GV00avs___u:7320: (AVŚ_12,3.39a) yadyaj jāyā pacati tvat paraḥparaḥ patir vā jāye tvat tiraḥ
GV00avs___u:7321: (AVŚ_12,3.39c) saṃ tat sṛjethāṃ saha vāṃ tad astu saṃpādayantau saha lokam ekam ||39||
GV00avs___u:7322: (AVŚ_12,3.40a) yāvanto asyāḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante asmat putrāḥ pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ |
GV00avs___u:7323: (AVŚ_12,3.40c) sarvāṃs tāṃ upa pātre hvayethāṃ nābhiṃ jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān ||40|| {16}
GV00avs___u:7324: (AVŚ_12,3.41a) vasor yā dhārā madhunā prapīnā ghṛtena miśrā amṛtasya nābhayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7325: (AVŚ_12,3.41c) sarvās tā ava rundhe svargaḥ ṣaṣṭyāṃ śaratsu nidhipā abhīchāt ||41||
GV00avs___u:7326: (AVŚ_12,3.42a) nidhiṃ nidhipā abhy enam ichād anīśvarā abhitaḥ santu ye
GV00avs___u:7328: (AVŚ_12,3.42c) asmābhir datto nihitaḥ svargas tribhiḥ kāṇḍais trīnt svargān arukṣat ||42||
GV00avs___u:7329: (AVŚ_12,3.43a) agnī rakṣas tapatu yad videvaṃ kravyād piśāca iha mā pra pāsta |
GV00avs___u:7330: (AVŚ_12,3.43c) nudāma enam apa rudhmo asmad ādityā enam aṅgirasaḥ sacantām
GV00avs___u:7331: (AVŚ_12,3.44a) ādityebhyo aṅgirobhyo madhv idaṃ ghṛtena miśraṃ prati vedayāmi |
GV00avs___u:7333: (AVŚ_12,3.45a) idaṃ prāpam uttamaṃ kāṇḍam asya yasmāl lokāt parameṣṭhī samāpa |
GV00avs___u:7334: (AVŚ_12,3.45c) ā siñca sarpir ghṛtavat sam aṅgdhy eṣa bhāgo aṅgiraso no atra ||45||
GV00avs___u:7335: (AVŚ_12,3.46a) satyāya ca tapase devatābhyo nidhiṃ śevadhiṃ pari dadma etam |
GV00avs___u:7336: (AVŚ_12,3.46c) mā no dyūte 'va gān mā samityāṃ mā smānyasmā ut sṛjatā purā mat ||46||
GV00avs___u:7337: (AVŚ_12,3.47a) ahaṃ pacāmy ahaṃ dadāmi mamed u karman karuṇe 'dhi jāyā |
GV00avs___u:7338: (AVŚ_12,3.47c) kaumāro loko ajaniṣṭa putro 'nvārabhethāṃ vaya uttarāvat ||47||
GV00avs___u:7339: (AVŚ_12,3.48a) na kilbiṣam atra nādhāro asti na yan mitraiḥ samamamāna eti
GV00avs___u:7340: (AVŚ_12,3.48c) anūnaṃ pātraṃ nihitaṃ na etat paktāraṃ pakvaḥ punar ā
GV00avs___u:7342: (AVŚ_12,3.49a) priyaṃ priyāṇāṃ kṛṇavāma tamas te yantu yatame dviṣanti |
GV00avs___u:7343: (AVŚ_12,3.49c) dhenur anaḍvān vayovaya āyad eva pauruṣeyam apa mṛtyuṃ nudantu ||49||
GV00avs___u:7344: (AVŚ_12,3.50a) sam agnayaḥ vidur anyo anyaṃ ya oṣadhīḥ sacate yaś ca sindhūn |
GV00avs___u:7345: (AVŚ_12,3.50c) yāvanto devā divy ātapanti hiraṇyaṃ jyotiḥ pacato babhūva ||50|| {17}
GV00avs___u:7346: (AVŚ_12,3.51a) eṣā tvacāṃ puruṣe saṃ babhūvānagnāḥ sarve paśavo ye anye |
GV00avs___u:7347: (AVŚ_12,3.51c) kṣatreṇātmānaṃ pari dhāpayātho 'motaṃ vāso mukham odanasya
GV00avs___u:7348: (AVŚ_12,3.52a) yad akṣeṣu vadā yat samityāṃ yad vā vadā anṛtaṃ vittakāmyā
GV00avs___u:7349: (AVŚ_12,3.52c) samānaṃ tantum abhi samvasānau tasmint sarvaṃ śamalaṃ sādayāthaḥ ||52||
GV00avs___u:7350: (AVŚ_12,3.53a) varṣaṃ vanuṣvāpi gacha devāṃs tvaco dhūmaṃ pary ut pātayāsi
GV00avs___u:7351: (AVŚ_12,3.53c) viśvavyacā ghṛtapṛṣṭho bhaviṣyant sayonir lokam upa yāhy etam ||53||
GV00avs___u:7352: (AVŚ_12,3.54a) tanvaṃ svargo bahudhā vi cakre yathā vida ātmann anyavarṇām
GV00avs___u:7353: (AVŚ_12,3.54c) apājait kṛṣṇāṃ ruśatīṃ punāno yā lohinī tāṃ te agnau juhomi
GV00avs___u:7355: (AVŚ_12,3.55c) etaṃ pari dadmas taṃ no gopāyatāsmākam aitoḥ |
GV00avs___u:7356: (AVŚ_12,3.55e) diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣaj jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadātv atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||55||
GV00avs___u:7357: (AVŚ_12,3.56a) dakṣiṇāyai tvā diśa indrāyādhipataye tiraścirājaye rakṣitre
GV00avs___u:7359: (AVŚ_12,3.56c) etaṃ pari dadmas taṃ no gopāyatāsmākam aitoḥ |
GV00avs___u:7360: (AVŚ_12,3.56e) diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣaj jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadātv atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||56||
GV00avs___u:7361: (AVŚ_12,3.57a) pratīcyai tvā diśe varuṇāyādhipataye pṛdākave rakṣitre
GV00avs___u:7363: (AVŚ_12,3.57c) etaṃ pari dadmas taṃ no gopāyatāsmākam aitoḥ |
GV00avs___u:7364: (AVŚ_12,3.57e) diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣaj jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadātv atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||57||
GV00avs___u:7365: (AVŚ_12,3.58a) udīcyai tvā diśe somāyādhipataye svajāya rakṣitre 'śanyā
GV00avs___u:7367: (AVŚ_12,3.58c) etaṃ pari dadmas taṃ no gopāyatāsmākam aitoḥ |
GV00avs___u:7368: (AVŚ_12,3.58e) diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣaj jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadātv atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||58||
GV00avs___u:7369: (AVŚ_12,3.59a) dhruvāyai tvā diśe viṣṇave 'dhipataye kalmāṣagrīvāya rakṣitra oṣadhībhya iṣumatībhyaḥ
GV00avs___u:7370: (AVŚ_12,3.59c) etaṃ pari dadmas taṃ no gopāyatāsmākam aitoḥ |
GV00avs___u:7371: (AVŚ_12,3.59e) diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣaj jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadātv atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||59||
GV00avs___u:7372: (AVŚ_12,3.60a) ūrdhvāyai tvā diśe bṛhaspataye 'dhipataye śvitrāya rakṣitre varṣāyeṣumate
GV00avs___u:7373: (AVŚ_12,3.60c) etaṃ pari dadmas taṃ no gopāyatāsmākam aitoḥ |
GV00avs___u:7374: (AVŚ_12,3.60e) diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣaj jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadātv atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||60|| {18}
GV00avs___u:7375: (AVŚ_12,4.1a) dadāmīty eva brūyād anu cainām abhutsata |
GV00avs___u:7376: (AVŚ_12,4.1c) vaśāṃ brahmabhyo yācadbhyas tat prajāvad apatyavat ||1||
GV00avs___u:7377: (AVŚ_12,4.2a) prajayā sa vi krīṇīte paśubhiś copa dasyati |
GV00avs___u:7378: (AVŚ_12,4.2c) ya ārṣeyebhyo yācadbhyo devānāṃ gāṃ na ditsati ||2||
GV00avs___u:7379: (AVŚ_12,4.3a) kūṭayāsya saṃ śīryante śloṇayā kāṭam ardati |
GV00avs___u:7380: (AVŚ_12,4.3c) baṇḍayā dahyante gṛhāḥ kāṇayā dīyate svam ||3||
GV00avs___u:7382: (AVŚ_12,4.4c) tathā vaśāyāḥ saṃvidyaṃ duradabhnā hy ucyase ||4||
GV00avs___u:7383: (AVŚ_12,4.5a) pador asyā adhiṣṭhānād viklindur nāma vindati |
GV00avs___u:7385: (AVŚ_12,4.6a) yo asyāḥ karṇāv āskunoty ā sa deveṣu vṛścate |
GV00avs___u:7386: (AVŚ_12,4.6c) lakṣma kurva iti manyate kanīyaḥ kṛṇute svam ||6||
GV00avs___u:7387: (AVŚ_12,4.7a) yad asyāḥ kasmai cid bhogāya bālān kaś cit prakṛntati |
GV00avs___u:7388: (AVŚ_12,4.7c) tataḥ kiśorā mriyante vatsāṃś ca ghātuko vṛkaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:7389: (AVŚ_12,4.8a) yad asyā gopatau satyā loma dhvāṅkṣo ajīhiḍat |
GV00avs___u:7390: (AVŚ_12,4.8c) tataḥ kumārā mriyante yakṣmo vindaty anāmanāt ||8||
GV00avs___u:7391: (AVŚ_12,4.9a) yad asyāḥ palpūlanaṃ śakṛd dāsī samasyati |
GV00avs___u:7394: (AVŚ_12,4.10c) tasmād brahmabhyo deyaiṣā tad āhuḥ svasya gopanam ||10||
GV00avs___u:7395: (AVŚ_12,4.11a) ya enāṃ vanim āyanti teṣāṃ devakṛtā vaśā |
GV00avs___u:7396: (AVŚ_12,4.11c) brahmajyeyaṃ tad abruvan ya enāṃ nipriyāyate ||11||
GV00avs___u:7397: (AVŚ_12,4.12a) ya ārṣeyebhyo yācadbhyo devānāṃ gāṃ na ditsati |
GV00avs___u:7398: (AVŚ_12,4.12c) ā sa deveṣu vṛścate brāhmaṇānāṃ ca manyave ||12||
GV00avs___u:7399: (AVŚ_12,4.13a) yo asya syād vaśābhogo anyām icheta tarhi saḥ |
GV00avs___u:7400: (AVŚ_12,4.13c) hiṃste adattā puruṣaṃ yācitāṃ ca na ditsati ||13||
GV00avs___u:7401: (AVŚ_12,4.14a) yathā śevadhir nihito brāhmaṇānāṃ tathā vaśā |
GV00avs___u:7402: (AVŚ_12,4.14c) tām etad achāyanti yasmin kasmiṃś ca jāyate ||14||
GV00avs___u:7403: (AVŚ_12,4.15a) svam etad achāyanti yad vaśāṃ brāhmaṇā abhi |
GV00avs___u:7406: (AVŚ_12,4.16c) vaśāṃ ca vidyān nārada brāhmaṇās tarhy eṣyāḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:7407: (AVŚ_12,4.17a) ya enām avaśām āha devānāṃ nihitaṃ nidhim |
GV00avs___u:7409: (AVŚ_12,4.18a) yo asyā ūdho na vedātho asyā stanān uta |
GV00avs___u:7410: (AVŚ_12,4.18c) ubhayenaivāsmai duhe dātuṃ ced aśakad vaśām ||18||
GV00avs___u:7411: (AVŚ_12,4.19a) duradabhnainam ā śaye yācitāṃ ca na ditsati |
GV00avs___u:7412: (AVŚ_12,4.19c) nāsmai kāmāḥ sam ṛdhyante yām adattvā cikīrṣati ||19||
GV00avs___u:7413: (AVŚ_12,4.20a) devā vaśām ayācan mukhaṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇam |
GV00avs___u:7414: (AVŚ_12,4.20c) teṣāṃ sarveṣām adadad dheḍaṃ ny eti mānuṣaḥ ||20|| {20}
GV00avs___u:7415: (AVŚ_12,4.21a) heḍaṃ paśūnāṃ ny eti brāhmaṇebhyo 'dadad vaśām |
GV00avs___u:7416: (AVŚ_12,4.21c) devānāṃ nihitaṃ bhāgaṃ martyaś cen nipriyāyate ||21||
GV00avs___u:7417: (AVŚ_12,4.22a) yad anye śataṃ yāceyur brāhmaṇā gopatiṃ vaśām |
GV00avs___u:7418: (AVŚ_12,4.22c) athaināṃ devā abruvann evaṃ ha viduṣo vaśā ||22||
GV00avs___u:7421: (AVŚ_12,4.24a) devā vaśām ayācan yasminn agre ajāyata |
GV00avs___u:7422: (AVŚ_12,4.24c) tām etāṃ vidyān nāradaḥ saha devair ud ājata ||24||
GV00avs___u:7426: (AVŚ_12,4.26c) tebhyo yācanti brāhmaṇās teṣv ā vṛścate 'dadat ||26||
GV00avs___u:7427: (AVŚ_12,4.27a) yāvad asyā gopatir nopaśṛṇuyād ṛcaḥ svayam |
GV00avs___u:7428: (AVŚ_12,4.27c) cared asya tāvad goṣu nāsya śrutvā gṛhe vaset ||27||
GV00avs___u:7429: (AVŚ_12,4.28a) yo asyā ṛca upaśrutyātha goṣv acīcarat |
GV00avs___u:7430: (AVŚ_12,4.28c) āyuś ca tasya bhūtiṃ ca devā vṛścanti hīḍitāḥ ||28||
GV00avs___u:7431: (AVŚ_12,4.29a) vaśā carantī bahudhā devānāṃ nihito nidhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:7432: (AVŚ_12,4.29c) āviṣ kṛṇuṣva rūpāṇi yadā sthāma jighāṃsati ||29||
GV00avs___u:7433: (AVŚ_12,4.30a) āvir ātmānaṃ kṛṇute yadā sthāma jighāṃsati |
GV00avs___u:7434: (AVŚ_12,4.30c) atho ha brahmabhyo vaśā yāñcyāya kṛṇute manaḥ ||30|| {21}
GV00avs___u:7435: (AVŚ_12,4.31a) manasā saṃ kalpayati tad devāṃ api gachati |
GV00avs___u:7436: (AVŚ_12,4.31c) tato ha brahmāṇo vaśām upaprayanti yācitum ||31||
GV00avs___u:7438: (AVŚ_12,4.32c) dānena rājanyo vaśāyā mātur heḍam na gachati ||32||
GV00avs___u:7439: (AVŚ_12,4.33a) vaśā mātā rājanyasya tathā saṃbhūtam agraśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7440: (AVŚ_12,4.33c) tasyā āhur anarpaṇaṃ yad brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate ||33||
GV00avs___u:7442: (AVŚ_12,4.34c) evā ha brahmabhyo vaśām agnaya ā vṛścate 'dadat ||34||
GV00avs___u:7444: (AVŚ_12,4.35c) sāsmai sarvān kāmān vaśā pradaduṣe duhe ||35||
GV00avs___u:7445: (AVŚ_12,4.36a) sarvān kāmān yamarājye vaśā pradaduṣe duhe |
GV00avs___u:7448: (AVŚ_12,4.37c) vehataṃ mā manyamāno mṛtyoḥ pāśeṣu badhyatām ||37||
GV00avs___u:7449: (AVŚ_12,4.38a) yo vehataṃ manyamāno 'mā ca pacate vaśām |
GV00avs___u:7450: (AVŚ_12,4.38c) apy asya putrān pautrāṃś ca yācayate bṛhaspatiḥ ||38||
GV00avs___u:7451: (AVŚ_12,4.39a) mahad eṣāva tapati carantī goṣu gaur api |
GV00avs___u:7452: (AVŚ_12,4.39c) atho ha gopataye vaśādaduṣe viṣaṃ duhe ||39||
GV00avs___u:7453: (AVŚ_12,4.40a) priyaṃ paśūnāṃ bhavati yad brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate |
GV00avs___u:7454: (AVŚ_12,4.40c) atho vaśāyās tat priyaṃ yad devatrā haviḥ syāt ||40|| {22}
GV00avs___u:7455: (AVŚ_12,4.41a) yā vaśā udakalpayan devā yajñād udetya |
GV00avs___u:7458: (AVŚ_12,4.42c) tām abravīn nārada eṣā vaśānāṃ vaśatameti ||42||
GV00avs___u:7459: (AVŚ_12,4.43a) kati nu vaśā nārada yās tvaṃ vettha manuṣyajāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7460: (AVŚ_12,4.43c) tās tvā pṛchāmi vidvāṃsaṃ kasyā nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇaḥ ||43||
GV00avs___u:7461: (AVŚ_12,4.44a) viliptyā bṛhaspate yā ca sūtavaśā vaśā |
GV00avs___u:7462: (AVŚ_12,4.44c) tasyā nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇo ya āśaṃseta bhūtyām ||44||
GV00avs___u:7463: (AVŚ_12,4.45a) namas te astu nāradānuṣṭhu viduṣe vaśā |
GV00avs___u:7466: (AVŚ_12,4.46c) tasyā nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇo ya āśaṃseta bhūtyām ||46||
GV00avs___u:7467: (AVŚ_12,4.47a) trīṇi vai vaśājātāni viliptī sūtavaśā vaśā |
GV00avs___u:7468: (AVŚ_12,4.47c) tāḥ pra yached brahmabhyaḥ so 'nāvraskaḥ prajāpatau ||47||
GV00avs___u:7469: (AVŚ_12,4.48a) etad vo brāhmaṇā havir iti manvīta yācitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7470: (AVŚ_12,4.48c) vaśāṃ ced enaṃ yāceyur yā bhīmādaduṣo gṛhe ||48||
GV00avs___u:7471: (AVŚ_12,4.49a) devā vaśāṃ pary avadan na no 'dād iti hīḍitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7472: (AVŚ_12,4.49c) etābhir ṛgbhir bhedaṃ tasmād vai sa parābhavat ||49||
GV00avs___u:7473: (AVŚ_12,4.50a) utaināṃ bhedo nādadād vaśām indreṇa yācitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7476: (AVŚ_12,4.51c) indrasya manyave jālmā ā vṛścante acittyā ||51||
GV00avs___u:7477: (AVŚ_12,4.52a) ye gopatiṃ parāṇīyāthāhur mā dadā iti |
GV00avs___u:7478: (AVŚ_12,4.52c) rudrasyāstāṃ te hetīṃ pari yanty acittyā ||52||
GV00avs___u:7479: (AVŚ_12,4.53a) yadi hutaṃ yady ahutām amā ca pacate vaśām |
GV00avs___u:7480: (AVŚ_12,4.53c) devānt sabrāhmaṇān ṛtvā jihmo lokān nir ṛchati ||53|| {23}
GV00avs___u:7481: (AVŚ_12,5.53a) śrameṇa tapasā sṛṣṭā brahmaṇā vittā rte śritā ||1||
GV00avs___u:7483: (AVŚ_12,5.3a) svadhayā parihitā śraddhayā paryūḍhā dīkṣayā guptā yajñe pratiṣṭhitā loko nidhanam
GV00avs___u:7485: (AVŚ_12,5.5a) tām ādadānasya brahmagavīṃ jinato brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyasya
GV00avs___u:7486: (AVŚ_12,5.6a) apa krāmati sūnṛtā vīryaṃ punyā lakṣmīḥ ||6|| {24}
GV00avs___u:7487: (AVŚ_12,5.7a) ojaś ca tejaś ca sahaś ca balaṃ ca vāk cendriyaṃ ca śrīś ca dharmaś ca ||7||
GV00avs___u:7488: (AVŚ_12,5.8a) brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca viśaś ca tviṣiś ca yaśaś ca
GV00avs___u:7490: (AVŚ_12,5.9a) āyuś ca rūpaṃ ca nāma ca kīrtiś ca prāṇaś cāpānaś ca cakṣuś
GV00avs___u:7492: (AVŚ_12,5.10a) payaś ca rasaś cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca rtaṃ ca satyaṃ ceṣṭaṃ ca pūrtaṃ ca prajā ca paśavaś ca ||10||
GV00avs___u:7493: (AVŚ_12,5.11a) tāni sarvāṇy apa krāmanti brahmagavīm ādadānasya jinato brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyasya (AVŚ_12,5.12a) saiṣā bhīmā brahmagavy aghaviṣā sākṣāt kṛtyā kūlbajam āvṛtā ||12||
GV00avs___u:7494: (AVŚ_12,5.13a) sarvāṇy asyāṃ ghorāṇi sarve ca mṛtyavaḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:7496: (AVŚ_12,5.15a) sā brahmajyaṃ devapīyuṃ brahmagavy ādīyamānā mṛtyoḥ padvīṣa ā dyati ||15||
GV00avs___u:7497: (AVŚ_12,5.16a) meniḥ śatavadhā hi sā brahmajyasya kṣitir hi sā ||16||
GV00avs___u:7498: (AVŚ_12,5.17a) tasmād vai brāhmaṇānāṃ gaur durādharṣā vijānatā ||17||
GV00avs___u:7502: (AVŚ_12,5.21a) mṛtyur hiṅkṛṇvaty ugro devaḥ puchaṃ paryasyantī ||21||
GV00avs___u:7508: (AVŚ_12,5.27a) anugachantī prāṇān upa dāsayati brahmagavī brahmajyasya
GV00avs___u:7519: (AVŚ_12,5.38a) aśitā lokāc chinatti brahmagavī brahmajyam asmāc cāmuṣmāc ca ||38|| {27}
GV00avs___u:7520: (AVŚ_12,5.39a) tasyā āhananaṃ kṛtyā menir āśasanaṃ valaga ūbadhyam ||39||
GV00avs___u:7522: (AVŚ_12,5.41a) agniḥ kravyād bhūtvā brahmagavī brahmajyaṃ praviśyātti
GV00avs___u:7524: (AVŚ_12,5.43a) chinatty asya pitṛbandhu parā bhāvayati mātṛbandhu ||43||
GV00avs___u:7525: (AVŚ_12,5.44a) vivāhāṃ jñātīnt sarvān api kṣāpayati brahmagavī
GV00avs___u:7527: (AVŚ_12,5.45a) avāstum enam asvagam aprajasaṃ karoty aparāparaṇo bhavati kṣīyate ||45||
GV00avs___u:7528: (AVŚ_12,5.46a) ya evaṃ viduṣo brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyo gām ādatte ||46|| {28}
GV00avs___u:7529: (AVŚ_12,5.47a) kṣipraṃ vai tasyāhanane gṛdhrāḥ kurvata ailabam ||47||
GV00avs___u:7530: (AVŚ_12,5.48a) kṣipraṃ vai tasyādahanaṃ pari nṛtyanti keśinīr āghnānāḥ pāṇinorasi kurvāṇāḥ pāpam ailabam ||48||
GV00avs___u:7531: (AVŚ_12,5.49a) kṣipraṃ vai tasya vāstuṣu vṛkāḥ kurvata ailabam ||49||
GV00avs___u:7532: (AVŚ_12,5.50a) kṣipraṃ vai tasya pṛchanti yat tad āsī3d idaṃ nu tā3d iti
GV00avs___u:7533: (AVŚ_12,5.51a) chindhy ā chindhi pra chindhy api kṣāpaya kṣāpaya ||51||
GV00avs___u:7535: (AVŚ_12,5.53a) vaiśvadevī hy ucyase kṛtyā kūlbajam āvṛtā ||53||
GV00avs___u:7537: (AVŚ_12,5.55a) kṣurapavir mṛtyur bhūtvā vi dhāva tvam ||55||
GV00avs___u:7538: (AVŚ_12,5.56a) ā datse jinatāṃ varca iṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ cāśiṣaḥ ||56||
GV00avs___u:7539: (AVŚ_12,5.57a) ādāya jītaṃ jītāya loke 'muṣmin pra yachasi ||57||
GV00avs___u:7542: (AVŚ_12,5.60a) aghnye pra śiro jahi brahmajyasya kṛtāgaso devapīyor arādhasaḥ ||60||
GV00avs___u:7543: (AVŚ_12,5.61a) tvayā pramūrṇaṃ mṛditam agnir dahatu duścitam ||61|| {29}
GV00avs___u:7544: (AVŚ_12,5.62a) vṛśca pra vṛśca saṃ vṛśca daha pra daha saṃ daha ||62||
GV00avs___u:7545: (AVŚ_12,5.63a) brahmajyaṃ devy aghnya ā mūlād anusaṃdaha ||63||
GV00avs___u:7547: (AVŚ_12,5.65a) evā tvaṃ devy aghnye brahmajyasya kṛtāgaso devapīyor arādhasaḥ ||65||
GV00avs___u:7550: (AVŚ_12,5.68a) lomāny asya saṃ chindhi tvacam asya vi veṣṭaya ||68||
GV00avs___u:7551: (AVŚ_12,5.69a) māṃsāny asya śātaya snāvāny asya saṃ vṛha ||69||
GV00avs___u:7552: (AVŚ_12,5.70a) asthīny asya pīḍaya majjānam asya nir jahi ||70||
GV00avs___u:7554: (AVŚ_12,5.72a) agnir enaṃ kravyāt pṛthivyā nudatām ud oṣatu vāyur antarikṣān mahato varimṇaḥ
GV00avs___u:7555: (AVŚ_12,5.73a) sūrya enaṃ divaḥ pra ṇudatāṃ ny oṣatu ||73|| {30}
GV00avs___u:7556: (AVŚ_13,1.1a) udehi vājin yo apsv antar idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pra viśa sūnṛtāvat |
GV00avs___u:7557: (AVŚ_13,1.1c) yo rohito viśvam idaṃ jajāna sa tvā rāṣṭrāya subhṛtaṃ
GV00avs___u:7559: (AVŚ_13,1.2a) ud vāja ā gan yo apsv antar viśa ā roha tvadyonayo yāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7560: (AVŚ_13,1.2c) somaṃ dadhāno 'pa oṣadhīr gāś catuṣpado dvipada ā veśayeha
GV00avs___u:7561: (AVŚ_13,1.3a) yūyam ugrā marutaḥ pṛśnimātara indreṇa yujā pra mṛṇīta śatrūn |
GV00avs___u:7562: (AVŚ_13,1.3c) ā vo rohitaḥ śṛṇavat sudānavas triṣaptāso marutaḥ svādusaṃmudaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:7563: (AVŚ_13,1.4a) ruho ruroha rohita ā ruroha garbho janīnāṃ januṣām upastham
GV00avs___u:7564: (AVŚ_13,1.4c) tābhiḥ saṃrabdham anv avindan ṣaḍ urvīr gātuṃ prapaśyann iha
GV00avs___u:7566: (AVŚ_13,1.5a) ā te rāṣṭram iha rohito 'hārṣīd vy āsthan mṛdho abhayaṃ te abhūt |
GV00avs___u:7567: (AVŚ_13,1.5c) tasmai te dyāvāpṛthivī revatībhiḥ kāmaṃ duhātām iha śakvarībhiḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:7568: (AVŚ_13,1.6a) rohito dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna tatra tantuṃ parameṣṭhī tatāna |
GV00avs___u:7570: (AVŚ_13,1.7a) rohito dyāvāpṛthivī adṛṃhat tena sva stabhitaṃ tena nākaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7571: (AVŚ_13,1.7c) tenāntarikṣaṃ vimitā rajāṃsi tena devā amṛtam anv avindan ||7||
GV00avs___u:7572: (AVŚ_13,1.8a) vi rohito amṛśad viśvarūpaṃ samākurvāṇaḥ praruho ruhaś ca |
GV00avs___u:7573: (AVŚ_13,1.8c) divaṃ rūḍhvā mahatā mahimnā saṃ te rāṣṭram anaktu payasā
GV00avs___u:7575: (AVŚ_13,1.9a) yās te ruhaḥ praruho yās ta āruho yābhir āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:7576: (AVŚ_13,1.9c) tāsāṃ brahmaṇā payasā vavṛdhāno viśi rāṣṭre jāgṛhi rohitasya ||9||
GV00avs___u:7577: (AVŚ_13,1.10a) yas te viśas tapasaḥ saṃbabhūvur vatsaṃ gāyatrīm anu tā
GV00avs___u:7579: (AVŚ_13,1.10c) tās tvā viśantu manasā śivena saṃmātā vatso abhy etu
GV00avs___u:7581: (AVŚ_13,1.11a) ūrdhvo rohito adhi nāke asthād viśvā rūpāṇi janayan yuvā
GV00avs___u:7583: (AVŚ_13,1.11c) tigmenāgnir jyotiṣā vi bhāti tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi ||11||
GV00avs___u:7584: (AVŚ_13,1.12a) sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho jātavedā ghṛtāhutaḥ somapṛṣṭhaḥ suvīraḥ |
GV00avs___u:7585: (AVŚ_13,1.12c) mā mā hāsīn nāthito net tvā jahāni gopoṣaṃ ca me vīrapoṣaṃ ca dhehi ||12||
GV00avs___u:7586: (AVŚ_13,1.13a) rohito yajñasya janitā mukhaṃ ca rohitāya vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi |
GV00avs___u:7587: (AVŚ_13,1.13c) rohitaṃ devā yanti sumanasyamānāḥ sa mā rohaiḥ sāmityai rohayatu ||13||
GV00avs___u:7588: (AVŚ_13,1.14a) rohito yajñaṃ vy adadhād viśvakarmaṇe tasmāt tejāṃsy upa memāny āguḥ |
GV00avs___u:7590: (AVŚ_13,1.15a) ā tvā ruroha bṛhaty uta paṅktir ā kakub varcasā jātavedaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7591: (AVŚ_13,1.15c) ā tvā rurohoṣṇihākṣaro vaṣaṭkāra ā tvā ruroha rohito retasā
GV00avs___u:7593: (AVŚ_13,1.16a) ayaṃ vaste garbhaṃ pṛthivyā divaṃ vaste 'yam antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:7594: (AVŚ_13,1.16c) ayaṃ bradhnasya viṣṭapi svar lokān vy ānaśe ||16||
GV00avs___u:7595: (AVŚ_13,1.17a) vācas pate pṛthivī naḥ syonā syonā yonis talpā naḥ suśevā |
GV00avs___u:7596: (AVŚ_13,1.17c) ihaiva prāṇaḥ sakhye no astu taṃ tvā parameṣṭhin pary agnir āyuṣā varcasā dadhātu
GV00avs___u:7597: (AVŚ_13,1.18a) vācas pata ṛtavaḥ pañca ye nau vaiśvakarmaṇāḥ pari ye
GV00avs___u:7599: (AVŚ_13,1.18c) ihaiva prāṇaḥ sakhye no astu taṃ tvā parameṣṭhin pari
GV00avs___u:7601: (AVŚ_13,1.19a) vācas pate saumanasaṃ manaś ca goṣṭhe no gā janaya yoniṣu prajāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7602: (AVŚ_13,1.19c) ihaiva prāṇaḥ sakhye no astu taṃ tvā parameṣṭhin pary aham āyuṣā varcasā dadhātu
GV00avs___u:7603: (AVŚ_13,1.20a) pari tvā dhāt savitā devo agnir varcasā mitrāvaruṇāv abhi
GV00avs___u:7605: (AVŚ_13,1.20c) sarvā arātīr avakrāmann ehīdaṃ rāṣṭram akaraḥ sunṛtāvat
GV00avs___u:7606: (AVŚ_13,1.21a) yaṃ tvā pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭir vahati rohita |
GV00avs___u:7608: (AVŚ_13,1.22a) anuvratā rohiṇī rohitasya sūriḥ suvarṇā bṛhatī suvarcāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7609: (AVŚ_13,1.22c) tayā vājān viśvarūpāṃ jayema tayā viśvāḥ pṛtanā abhi ṣyāma
GV00avs___u:7610: (AVŚ_13,1.23a) idaṃ sado rohiṇī rohitasyāsau panthāḥ pṛṣatī yena yāti |
GV00avs___u:7611: (AVŚ_13,1.23c) tāṃ gandharvāḥ kaśyapā un nayanti tāṃ rakṣanti kavayo 'pramādam ||23||
GV00avs___u:7612: (AVŚ_13,1.24a) sūryasyāśvā harayaḥ ketumantaḥ sadā vahanty amṛtāḥ sukhaṃ ratham |
GV00avs___u:7613: (AVŚ_13,1.24c) ghṛtapāvā rohito bhrājamāno divaṃ devaḥ pṛṣatīm ā viveśa ||24||
GV00avs___u:7614: (AVŚ_13,1.25a) yo rohito vṛṣabhas tigmaśṛṅgaḥ pary agniṃ pari sūryaṃ babhūva |
GV00avs___u:7615: (AVŚ_13,1.25c) yo viṣṭabhnāti pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca tasmād devā adhi sṛṣṭīḥ
GV00avs___u:7617: (AVŚ_13,1.26a) rohito divam āruhan mahataḥ pary arṇavāt |
GV00avs___u:7619: (AVŚ_13,1.27a) vi mimīṣva payasvatīṃ ghṛtācīṃ devānāṃ dhenur anapaspṛg eṣā |
GV00avs___u:7620: (AVŚ_13,1.27c) indraḥ somaṃ pibatu kṣemo astv agniḥ pra stautu vi mṛdho nudasva ||27||
GV00avs___u:7622: (AVŚ_13,1.28c) abhīṣāṭ viśvāṣāḍ agniḥ sapatnān hantu ye mama ||28||
GV00avs___u:7623: (AVŚ_13,1.29a) hantv enān pra dahatv arir yo naḥ pṛtanyati |
GV00avs___u:7626: (AVŚ_13,1.30c) adhā sapatnān māmakān agnes tejobhir ādiṣi ||30|| {3}
GV00avs___u:7627: (AVŚ_13,1.31a) agne sapatnān adharān pādayāsmad vyathayā sajātam utpipānaṃ bṛhaspate |
GV00avs___u:7629: (AVŚ_13,1.32a) udyaṃs tvaṃ deva sūrya sapatnān ava me jahi |
GV00avs___u:7630: (AVŚ_13,1.32c) avainān aśmanā jahi te yantv adhamaṃ tamaḥ ||32||
GV00avs___u:7631: (AVŚ_13,1.33a) vatso virājo vṛṣabho matīnām ā ruroha śukrapṛṣṭho
GV00avs___u:7633: (AVŚ_13,1.33c) ghṛtenārkam abhy arcanti vatsaṃ brahma santaṃ brahmaṇā vardhayanti ||33||
GV00avs___u:7634: (AVŚ_13,1.34a) divaṃ ca roha pṛthivīṃ ca roha rāṣṭraṃ ca roha draviṇaṃ ca roha |
GV00avs___u:7635: (AVŚ_13,1.34c) prajāṃ ca rohāmṛtaṃ ca roha rohitena tanvaṃ saṃ spṛṣasva
GV00avs___u:7637: (AVŚ_13,1.35c) taiṣ ṭe rohitaḥ samvidāno rāṣṭraṃ dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ
GV00avs___u:7638: (AVŚ_13,1.36a) ut tvā yajñā brahmapūtā vahanty adhvagato harayas tvā vahanti |
GV00avs___u:7640: (AVŚ_13,1.37a) rohite dyāvāpṛthivī adhi śrite vasujiti gojiti saṃdhanājiti
GV00avs___u:7641: (AVŚ_13,1.37c) sahasraṃ yasya janimāni sapta ca voceyaṃ te nābhiṃ bhuvanasyādhi majmani
GV00avs___u:7642: (AVŚ_13,1.38a) yaśā yāsi pradiśo diśaś ca yaśāḥ paśūnām uta carṣaṇīnām |
GV00avs___u:7643: (AVŚ_13,1.38c) yaśāḥ pṛthivyā adityā upasthe 'haṃ bhūyāsaṃ saviteva cāruḥ
GV00avs___u:7644: (AVŚ_13,1.39a) amutra sann iha vetthetaḥ saṃs tāni paśyasi |
GV00avs___u:7645: (AVŚ_13,1.39c) itaḥ paśyanti rocanaṃ divi sūryaṃ vipaścitam ||39||
GV00avs___u:7646: (AVŚ_13,1.40a) devo devān marcayasy antaś carasy arṇave |
GV00avs___u:7647: (AVŚ_13,1.40c) samānam agnim indhate taṃ viduḥ kavayaḥ pare ||40|| {4}
GV00avs___u:7648: (AVŚ_13,1.41a) avaḥ pareṇa para enāvareṇa padā vatsaṃ bibratī gaur ud
GV00avs___u:7650: (AVŚ_13,1.41c) sā kadrīcī kaṃ svid ardhaṃ parāgāt kva svit sūte nahi yūthe asmin ||41||
GV00avs___u:7651: (AVŚ_13,1.42a) ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpady aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī |
GV00avs___u:7652: (AVŚ_13,1.42c) sahasrākṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktis tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti ||42||
GV00avs___u:7653: (AVŚ_13,1.43a) ārohan dyām amṛtaḥ prāva me vacaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7654: (AVŚ_13,1.43c) ut tvā yajñā brahmapūtā vahanty adhvagato harayas tvā vahanti ||43||
GV00avs___u:7655: (AVŚ_13,1.44a) veda tat te amartya yat ta ākramaṇaṃ divi |
GV00avs___u:7657: (AVŚ_13,1.45a) sūryo dyāṃ sūryaḥ pṛṭhivīṃ sūrya āpo'ti paśyati |
GV00avs___u:7658: (AVŚ_13,1.45c) sūryo bhūtasyaikaṃ cakṣur ā ruroha divaṃ mahīm ||45||
GV00avs___u:7659: (AVŚ_13,1.46a) urvīr āsan paridhayo vedir bhūmir akalpata |
GV00avs___u:7660: (AVŚ_13,1.46c) tatraitāv agnī ādhatta himaṃ ghraṃsaṃ ca rohitaḥ ||46||
GV00avs___u:7661: (AVŚ_13,1.47a) himaṃ ghraṃsaṃ cādhāya yūpān kṛtvā parvatān |
GV00avs___u:7664: (AVŚ_13,1.48c) tasmād ghraṃsas tasmād dhimas tasmād yajño 'jāyata ||48||
GV00avs___u:7667: (AVŚ_13,1.50a) satye anyaḥ samāhito 'psv anyaḥ sam idhyate |
GV00avs___u:7669: (AVŚ_13,1.51a) yaṃ vātaḥ pariśumbhati yaṃ vendro brahmaṇaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:7671: (AVŚ_13,1.52a) vediṃ bhūmiṃ kalpayitvā divaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇām |
GV00avs___u:7672: (AVŚ_13,1.52c) ghraṃsaṃ tad agniṃ kṛtvā cakāra viśvam ātmanvad varṣeṇājyena rohitaḥ ||52||
GV00avs___u:7673: (AVŚ_13,1.53a) varṣam ājam ghraṃso agnir vedir bhūmir akalpata |
GV00avs___u:7674: (AVŚ_13,1.53c) tatraitān parvatān agnir gīrbhir ūrdhvāṃ akalpayat ||53||
GV00avs___u:7675: (AVŚ_13,1.54a) gīrbhir ūrdhvān kalpayitvā rohito bhūmim abravīt |
GV00avs___u:7676: (AVŚ_13,1.54c) tvayīdaṃ sarvaṃ jāyatāṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam ||54||
GV00avs___u:7677: (AVŚ_13,1.55a) sa yajñaḥ prathamo bhūto bhavyo ajāyata |
GV00avs___u:7678: (AVŚ_13,1.55c) tasmād dha jajña idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiṃ cedaṃ virocate
GV00avs___u:7680: (AVŚ_13,1.56a) yaś ca gāṃ padā sphurati pratyaṅ sūryaṃ ca mehati |
GV00avs___u:7681: (AVŚ_13,1.56c) tasya vṛścāmi te mūlaṃ na chāyāṃ karavo 'param ||56||
GV00avs___u:7682: (AVŚ_13,1.57a) yo mābhichāyam atyeṣi māṃ cāgniṃ cāntarā |
GV00avs___u:7683: (AVŚ_13,1.57c) tasya vṛścāmi te mūlaṃ na chāyāṃ karavo 'param ||57||
GV00avs___u:7684: (AVŚ_13,1.58a) yo adya deva sūrya tvāṃ ca māṃ cāntarāyati |
GV00avs___u:7685: (AVŚ_13,1.58c) duṣvapnyaṃ tasmiṃ chamalaṃ duritāni ca mṛjmahe ||58||
GV00avs___u:7686: (AVŚ_13,1.59a) mā pra gāma patho vayaṃ mā yajñād indra sominaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7688: (AVŚ_13,1.60a) yo yajñasya prasādhanas tantur deveṣv ātataḥ |
GV00avs___u:7690: (AVŚ_13,2.1a) ud asya ketavo divi śukrā bhrājanta īrate |
GV00avs___u:7692: (AVŚ_13,2.2a) diśāṃ prajñānāṃ svarayantam arciṣā supakṣam āśuṃ patayantam arṇave |
GV00avs___u:7693: (AVŚ_13,2.2c) stavāma sūryaṃ bhuvanasya gopāṃ yo raśmibhir diśa ābhāti sarvāḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:7694: (AVŚ_13,2.3a) yat prāṅ pratyaṅ svadhayā yāsi śībhaṃ nānārūpe ahanī karṣi
GV00avs___u:7696: (AVŚ_13,2.3c) tad āditya mahi tat te mahi śravo yad eko viśvaṃ pari bhūma
GV00avs___u:7698: (AVŚ_13,2.4a) vipaścitaṃ taraṇiṃ bhrājamānaṃ vahanti yaṃ haritaḥ sapta bahvīḥ |
GV00avs___u:7699: (AVŚ_13,2.4c) srutād yam attrir divam unnināya taṃ tvā paśyanti pariyāntam
GV00avs___u:7701: (AVŚ_13,2.5a) mā tvā dabhan pariyāntam ājiṃ svasti durgāṃ ati yāhi śībham
GV00avs___u:7702: (AVŚ_13,2.5c) divaṃ ca sūrya pṛthivīṃ ca devīm ahorātre vimimāno yad eṣi
GV00avs___u:7703: (AVŚ_13,2.6a) svasti te sūrya carase rathāya yenobhāv antau pariyāsi sadyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7704: (AVŚ_13,2.6c) yaṃ te vahanti harito vahiṣṭhāḥ śatam aśvā yadi vā sapta bahvīḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:7705: (AVŚ_13,2.7a) sukhaṃ sūrya ratham aṃśumantaṃ syonaṃ suvahnim adhi tiṣṭha vājinam |
GV00avs___u:7706: (AVŚ_13,2.7c) yaṃ te vahanti harito vahiṣṭhāḥ śatam aśvā yadi vā sapta bahvīḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:7707: (AVŚ_13,2.8a) sapta sūryo harito yātave rathe hiraṇyatvacaso bṛhatīr ayukta |
GV00avs___u:7708: (AVŚ_13,2.8c) amoci śukro rajasaḥ parastād vidhūya devas tamo divam āruhat
GV00avs___u:7709: (AVŚ_13,2.9a) ut ketunā bṛhatā deva āgann apāvṛk tamo 'bhi jyotir aśrait |
GV00avs___u:7710: (AVŚ_13,2.9c) divyaḥ suparṇaḥ sa vīro vy akhyad aditeḥ putro bhuvanāni
GV00avs___u:7712: (AVŚ_13,2.10a) udyan raśmīn ā tanuṣe viśvā rupāṇi puṣyasi |
GV00avs___u:7713: (AVŚ_13,2.10c) ubhā samudrau kratunā vi bhāsi sarvāṃl lokān paribhūr bhrājamānaḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:7714: (AVŚ_13,2.11a) pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśū krīḍantau pari yāto
GV00avs___u:7716: (AVŚ_13,2.11c) viśvānyo bhuvanā vicaṣṭe hairaṇyair anyaṃ harito vahanti
GV00avs___u:7717: (AVŚ_13,2.12a) divi tvāttrir adhārayat sūryā māsāya kartave |
GV00avs___u:7718: (AVŚ_13,2.12c) sa eṣi sudhṛtas tapan viśvā bhūtāvacākaśat ||12||
GV00avs___u:7719: (AVŚ_13,2.13a) ubhāv antau sam arṣasi vatsaḥ saṃmātarāv iva |
GV00avs___u:7720: (AVŚ_13,2.13c) nanv etad itaḥ purā brahma devā amī viduḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:7721: (AVŚ_13,2.14a) yat samudram anu śritaṃ tat siṣāsati sūryaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7722: (AVŚ_13,2.14c) adhvāsya vitato mahān pūrvaś cāparaś ca yaḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:7723: (AVŚ_13,2.15a) taṃ sam āpnoti jūtibhis tato nāpa cikitsati |
GV00avs___u:7725: (AVŚ_13,2.16a) ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7727: (AVŚ_13,2.17a) apa tye tāyavo yathā nakṣatrā yanty aktubhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:7729: (AVŚ_13,2.18a) adṛśrann asya ketavo vi raśmayo janāṃ anu |
GV00avs___u:7733: (AVŚ_13,2.20a) pratyaṅ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ ud eṣi mānuṣīḥ |
GV00avs___u:7735: (AVŚ_13,2.21a) yenā pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantaṃ janāṃ anu |
GV00avs___u:7737: (AVŚ_13,2.22a) vi dyām eṣi rajas pṛthv ahar mimāno aktubhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:7739: (AVŚ_13,2.23a) sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya |
GV00avs___u:7741: (AVŚ_13,2.24a) ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7744: (AVŚ_13,2.25c) sa yonim aiti sa u jāyate punaḥ sa devānām adhipatir babhūva ||25||
GV00avs___u:7745: (AVŚ_13,2.26a) yo viśvacarṣaṇir uta viśvatomukho yo viśvataspāṇir uta viśvataspṛthaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7746: (AVŚ_13,2.26c) saṃ bāhubhyāṃ bharati saṃ patatrair dyāvāpṛthivī janayan deva ekaḥ ||26||
GV00avs___u:7747: (AVŚ_13,2.27a) ekapād dvipado bhūyo vi cakrame dvipāt tripādam abhy eti
GV00avs___u:7749: (AVŚ_13,2.27c) dvipād dha ṣaṭpado bhūyo vi cakrame ta ekapadas tanvaṃ sam āsate ||27||
GV00avs___u:7750: (AVŚ_13,2.28a) atandro yāsyan harito yad āsthād dve rūpe kṛṇute rocamānaḥ
GV00avs___u:7751: (AVŚ_13,2.28c) ketumān udyant sahamāno rajāṃsi viśvā āditya pravato vi bhāsi ||28||
GV00avs___u:7752: (AVŚ_13,2.29a) baṇ mahāṃ asi sūrya baḍ āditya mahāṃ asi |
GV00avs___u:7753: (AVŚ_13,2.29c) mahāṃs te mahato mahimā tvam āditya mahāṃ asi ||29||
GV00avs___u:7754: (AVŚ_13,2.30a) rocase divi rocase antarikṣe pataṅga pṛthivyāṃ rocase rocase apsv antaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7755: (AVŚ_13,2.30c) ubhā samudrau rucyā vy āpitha devo devāsi mahiṣaḥ svarjit
GV00avs___u:7756: (AVŚ_13,2.31a) arvāṅ parastāt prayato vyadhva āśur vipaścit patayan pataṅgaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7757: (AVŚ_13,2.31c) viṣṇur vicittaḥ śavasādhitiṣṭhan pra ketunā sahate viśvam ejat ||31||
GV00avs___u:7758: (AVŚ_13,2.32a) citrāś cikitvān mahiṣaḥ suparṇa ārocayan rodasī antarikṣam
GV00avs___u:7759: (AVŚ_13,2.32c) ahorātre pari sūryaṃ vasāne prāsya viśvā tirato vīryāṇi ||32||
GV00avs___u:7760: (AVŚ_13,2.33a) tigmo vibhrājan tanvaṃ śiśāno 'raṃgamāsaḥ pravato rarāṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7761: (AVŚ_13,2.33c) jyotiṣmān pakṣī mahiṣo vayodhā viśvā āsthāt pradiśaḥ kalpamānaḥ ||33||
GV00avs___u:7762: (AVŚ_13,2.34a) citraṃ devānām ketur anīkaṃ jyotiṣmān pradiśaḥ sūrya udyan |
GV00avs___u:7763: (AVŚ_13,2.34c) divākaro 'ti dyumnais tamāṃsi viśvātārīd duritāni śukraḥ ||34||
GV00avs___u:7764: (AVŚ_13,2.35a) citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ |
GV00avs___u:7765: (AVŚ_13,2.35c) āprād dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca ||35||
GV00avs___u:7766: (AVŚ_13,2.36a) uccā patantam aruṇaṃ suparṇaṃ madhye divas taraṇiṃ bhrājamānam |
GV00avs___u:7767: (AVŚ_13,2.36c) paśyama tvā savitāraṃ yam āhur ajasraṃ jyotir yad avindad
GV00avs___u:7769: (AVŚ_13,2.37a) divas pṛṣṭhe dhāvamānaṃ suparṇam adityāḥ putraṃ nāthakāma upa yāmi bhītaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7770: (AVŚ_13,2.37c) sa naḥ sūrya pra tira dīrgham āyur mā riṣāma sumatau te syāma ||37||
GV00avs___u:7771: (AVŚ_13,2.38a) sahasrāhṇyaṃ viyatāv asya pakṣau harer haṃsasya patataḥ svargam |
GV00avs___u:7772: (AVŚ_13,2.38c) sa devānt sarvān urasy upadadya saṃpaśyan yāti bhuvanāni viśvā ||38||
GV00avs___u:7774: (AVŚ_13,2.39c) rohito yajñānāṃ mukhaṃ rohitaḥ svar ābharat ||39||
GV00avs___u:7775: (AVŚ_13,2.40a) rohito loko abhavad rohito 'ty atapad divam |
GV00avs___u:7776: (AVŚ_13,2.40c) rohito raśmibhir bhūmiṃ samudram anu saṃ carat ||40|| {10}
GV00avs___u:7777: (AVŚ_13,2.41a) sarvā diśaḥ sam acarad rohito 'dhipatir divaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7778: (AVŚ_13,2.41c) divaṃ samudram ād bhūmiṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ vi rakṣati ||41||
GV00avs___u:7779: (AVŚ_13,2.42a) ārohan chukro bṛhatīr atandro dve rūpe kṛṇute rocamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7780: (AVŚ_13,2.42c) citraś cikitvān mahiṣo vātamāyā yāvato lokān abhi yad vibhāti ||42||
GV00avs___u:7781: (AVŚ_13,2.43a) abhy anyad eti pary anyad asyate 'horātrābhyāṃ mahiṣaḥ kalpamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7782: (AVŚ_13,2.43c) sūryaṃ vayaṃ rajasi kṣiyantaṃ gātuvidaṃ havāmahe nādhamānāḥ
GV00avs___u:7783: (AVŚ_13,2.44a) pṛthivīpro mahiṣo nādhamānasya gātur adabdhacakṣuḥ pari
GV00avs___u:7785: (AVŚ_13,2.44c) viśvaṃ saṃpaśyant suvidatro yajatra idaṃ śṛṇotu yad ahaṃ bravīmi ||44||
GV00avs___u:7786: (AVŚ_13,2.45a) pary asya mahimā pṛthivīṃ samudraṃ jyotiṣā vibhrājan pari dyām antarikṣam
GV00avs___u:7787: (AVŚ_13,2.45c) sarvaṃ saṃpaśyant suvidatro yajatra idaṃ śṛṇotu yad ahaṃ bravīmi ||45||
GV00avs___u:7788: (AVŚ_13,2.46a) abodhy agniḥ samidhā janānāṃ prati dhenum ivāyatīm uṣasam |
GV00avs___u:7789: (AVŚ_13,2.46c) yahvā iva pra vayām ujjihānāḥ pra bhānavaḥ sisrate nākam
GV00avs___u:7791: (AVŚ_13,3.1a) ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna yo drāpim kṛtvā bhuvanāni vaste |
GV00avs___u:7792: (AVŚ_13,3.1c) yasmin kṣiyanti pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīr yāḥ pataṅgo anu vicākaśīti |
GV00avs___u:7793: (AVŚ_13,3.1e) tasya devasya kruddhasyaitad āgo ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ jināti |
GV00avs___u:7794: (AVŚ_13,3.2a) yasmād vātā ṛtuthā pavante yasmāt samudrā adhi vikṣaranti |
