GV00avs___u:7875: (AVŚ_13,4.26a) sa eti savitā svar divas pṛṣṭhe 'vacākaśat ||1||
GV00avs___u:7876: (AVŚ_13,4.2a) raśmibhir nabha ābhṛtaṃ mahendra ety āvṛtaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:7877: (AVŚ_13,4.3a) sa dhātā sa vidhartā sa vāyur nabha ucchritam ||3||
GV00avs___u:7878: (AVŚ_13,4.4a) so 'ryamā sa varuṇaḥ sa rudraḥ sa mahādevaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:7879: (AVŚ_13,4.5a) so agniḥ sa u sūryaḥ sa u eva mahāyamaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:7880: (AVŚ_13,4.6a) taṃ vatsā upa tiṣṭhanty ekaśīrṣāṇo yutā daśa ||6||
GV00avs___u:7881: (AVŚ_13,4.7a) paścāt prāñca ā tanvanti yad udeti vi bhāsati ||7||
GV00avs___u:7882: (AVŚ_13,4.8a) tasyaiṣa māruto gaṇaḥ sa eti śikyākṛtaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:7883: (AVŚ_13,4.9a) raśmibhir nabha ābhṛtaṃ mahendra ety āvṛtaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:7884: (AVŚ_13,4.10a) tasyeme nava kośā viṣṭambhā navadhā hitāḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:7885: (AVŚ_13,4.11a) sa prajābhyo vi paśyati yac ca prāṇati yac ca na ||11||
GV00avs___u:7886: (AVŚ_13,4.12a) tam idaṃ nigataṃ sahaḥ sa eṣa eka ekavṛd eka eva ||12||
GV00avs___u:7888: (AVŚ_13,4.14a) kīrtiś ca yaśaś cāmbhaś ca nabhaś ca brāhmaṇavarcasaṃ cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca
GV00avs___u:7890: (AVŚ_13,4.16a) na dvitīyo na tṛtīyaś caturtho nāpy ucyate ||16||
GV00avs___u:7891: (AVŚ_13,4.17a) na pañcamo na ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptamo nāpy ucyate ||17||
GV00avs___u:7892: (AVŚ_13,4.18a) nāṣṭamo na navamo daśamo nāpy ucyate ||18||
GV00avs___u:7893: (AVŚ_13,4.19a) sa sarvasmai vi paśyati yac ca prāṇati yac ca na ||19||
GV00avs___u:7894: (AVŚ_13,4.20a) tam idaṃ nigataṃ sahaḥ sa eṣa eka ekavṛd eka eva ||20||
GV00avs___u:7896: (AVŚ_13,4.22a) brahma ca tapaś ca kīrtiś ca yaśaś cāmbhaś ca nabhaś ca brāhmaṇavarcasaṃ cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca ||2||
GV00avs___u:7897: (AVŚ_13,4.23a) bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca śraddhā ca ruciś ca svargaś ca svadhā ca ||23||
GV00avs___u:7899: (AVŚ_13,4.25a) sa eva mṛtyuḥ so 'mṛtaṃ so 'bhvaṃ sa rakṣaḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:7900: (AVŚ_13,4.26a) sa rudro vasuvanir vasudeye namovāke vaṣaṭkāro 'nu saṃhitaḥ
GV00avs___u:7901: (AVŚ_13,4.27a) tasyeme sarve yātava upa praśiṣam āsate ||27||
GV00avs___u:7902: (AVŚ_13,4.28a) tasyāmū sarvā nakṣatrā vaśe candramasā saha ||28|| {17}
GV00avs___u:7903: (AVŚ_13,4.29a) sa vā ahno 'jāyata tasmād ahar ajāyata ||29||
GV00avs___u:7904: (AVŚ_13,4.30a) sa vai rātryā ajāyata tasmād rātrir ajāyata ||30||
GV00avs___u:7905: (AVŚ_13,4.31a) sa vā antarikṣād ajāyata tasmād antarikṣam ajāyata ||31||
GV00avs___u:7906: (AVŚ_13,4.32a) sa vai vāyor ajāyata tasmād vāyur ajāyata ||32||
GV00avs___u:7907: (AVŚ_13,4.33a) sa vai divo 'jāyata tasmād dyaur adhi ajāyata ||33||
GV00avs___u:7909: (AVŚ_13,4.35a) sa vai bhūmer ajāyata tasmād bhūmir ajāyata ||35||
GV00avs___u:7910: (AVŚ_13,4.36a) sa vā agner ajāyata tasmād agnir ajāyata ||36||
GV00avs___u:7913: (AVŚ_13,4.39a) sa vai yajñād ajāyata tasmād yajño 'jāyata ||39||
GV00avs___u:7914: (AVŚ_13,4.40a) sa yajñas tasya yajñaḥ sa yajñasya śiras kṛtam ||40||
GV00avs___u:7915: (AVŚ_13,4.41a) sa stanayati sa vi dyotate sa u aśmānam asyati ||41||
GV00avs___u:7916: (AVŚ_13,4.42a) pāpāya vā bhadrāya vā puruṣāyāsurāya vā ||42||
GV00avs___u:7917: (AVŚ_13,4.43a) yad vā kṛṇoṣy oṣadhīr yad vā varṣasi bhadrayā yad vā janyam avīvṛdhaḥ ||43||
GV00avs___u:7918: (AVŚ_13,4.44a) tāvāṃs te maghavan mahimopo te tanvaḥ śatam ||44||
GV00avs___u:7919: (AVŚ_13,4.45a) upo te badhve baddhāni yadi vāsi nyarbudam ||45|| {18}
GV00avs___u:7920: (AVŚ_13,4.46a) bhūyān indro namurād bhūyān indrāsi mṛtyubhyaḥ ||46||
GV00avs___u:7921: (AVŚ_13,4.47a) bhūyān arātyāḥ śacyāḥ patis tvam indrāsi vibhūḥ prabhūr iti
GV00avs___u:7923: (AVŚ_13,4.48a) namas te astu paśyata paśya mā paśyata ||48||
GV00avs___u:7925: (AVŚ_13,4.50a) ambho amo mahaḥ saha iti tvopāsmahe vayam ||50||
GV00avs___u:7926: (AVŚ_13,4.51a) ambho aruṇaṃ rajataṃ rajaḥ saha iti tvopāsmahe vayam ||51||
GV00avs___u:7927: (AVŚ_13,4.52a) uruḥ pṛthuḥ subhūr bhuva iti tvopāsmahe vayam ||52||
GV00avs___u:7928: (AVŚ_13,4.53a) pratho varo vyaco loka iti tvopāsmahe vayam ||53||
GV00avs___u:7929: (AVŚ_13,4.54a) bhavadvasur idadvasuḥ saṃyadvasur āyadvasur iti tvopāsmahe
GV00avs___u:7931: (AVŚ_13,4.55a) namas te astu paśyata paśya mā paśyata ||55||
GV00avs___u:7934: (AVŚ_14,1.1c) ṛtenādityās tiṣṭhanti divi somo adhi śritaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:7936: (AVŚ_14,1.2c) atho nakṣatrāṇām eṣām upasthe soma āhitaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:7937: (AVŚ_14,1.3a) somaṃ manyate papivān yat saṃpiṃṣanty oṣadhim |
GV00avs___u:7938: (AVŚ_14,1.3c) somaṃ yaṃ brahmāṇo vidur na tasyāśnāti pārthivaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:7939: (AVŚ_14,1.4a) yat tvā soma prapibanti tata ā pyāyase punaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7940: (AVŚ_14,1.4c) vāyuḥ somasya rakṣitā samānāṃ māsa ākṛtiḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:7942: (AVŚ_14,1.5c) grāvṇām ic chṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:7943: (AVŚ_14,1.6a) cittir ā upabarhaṇaṃ cakṣur ā abhyañjanam |
GV00avs___u:7944: (AVŚ_14,1.6c) dyaur bhūmiḥ kośa āsīd yad ayāt sūryā patim ||6||
GV00avs___u:7946: (AVŚ_14,1.7c) suryāyā bhadram id vāso gāthayati pariṣkṛtā ||7||
GV00avs___u:7947: (AVŚ_14,1.8a) stomā āsan pratidhayaḥ kurīraṃ chanda opaśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:7949: (AVŚ_14,1.9a) somo vadhūyur abhavad aśvināstām ubhā varā |
GV00avs___u:7950: (AVŚ_14,1.9c) sūryāṃ yat patye śaṃsantīṃ manasā savitādadāt ||9||
GV00avs___u:7951: (AVŚ_14,1.10a) mano asyā ana āsīd dyaur āsīd uta chadiḥ |
GV00avs___u:7952: (AVŚ_14,1.10c) śukrāv anaḍvāhāv āstāṃ yad ayāt sūryā patim ||10|| {1}
GV00avs___u:7953: (AVŚ_14,1.11a) ṛksāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau te sāmanāv aitām |
GV00avs___u:7954: (AVŚ_14,1.11c) śrotre te cakre āstāṃ divi panthāś carācaraḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:7955: (AVŚ_14,1.12a) śucī te cakre yātyā vyāno akṣa āhataḥ |
GV00avs___u:7957: (AVŚ_14,1.13a) sūryāyā vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat |
GV00avs___u:7958: (AVŚ_14,1.13c) maghāsu hanyante gāvaḥ phalgunīṣu vy uhyate ||13||
GV00avs___u:7959: (AVŚ_14,1.14a) yad aśvinā pṛchamānāv ayātaṃ tricakreṇa vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7960: (AVŚ_14,1.14c) kvaikaṃ cakraṃ vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:7961: (AVŚ_14,1.15a) yad ayātaṃ śubhas patī vareyaṃ sūryām upa |
GV00avs___u:7962: (AVŚ_14,1.15c) viśve devā anu tad vām ajānan putraḥ pitaram avṛṇīta pūṣā
GV00avs___u:7963: (AVŚ_14,1.16a) dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇa ṛtuthā viduḥ |
GV00avs___u:7964: (AVŚ_14,1.16c) athaikaṃ cakraṃ yad guhā tad addhātaya id viduḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:7966: (AVŚ_14,1.17c) urvārukam iva bandhanāt preto muñcāmi nāmutaḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:7967: (AVŚ_14,1.18a) preto muñcāmi nāmutaḥ subaddhām amutas karam |
GV00avs___u:7969: (AVŚ_14,1.19a) pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevāḥ |
GV00avs___u:7970: (AVŚ_14,1.19c) ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke syonaṃ te astu sahasaṃbhalāyai ||19||
GV00avs___u:7971: (AVŚ_14,1.20a) bhagas tveto nayatu hastagṛhyāśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃ rathena |
GV00avs___u:7972: (AVŚ_14,1.20c) gṛhān gacha gṛhapatnī yathāso vaśinī tvaṃ vidatham ā vadāsi
GV00avs___u:7973: (AVŚ_14,1.21a) iha priyaṃ prajāyai te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya
GV00avs___u:7975: (AVŚ_14,1.21c) enā patyā tanvaṃ saṃ spṛśasvātha jirvir vidatham ā vadāsi
GV00avs___u:7976: (AVŚ_14,1.22a) ihaiva staṃ mā vi yauṣṭaṃ viśvam āyur vy aśnutam |
GV00avs___u:7978: (AVŚ_14,1.23a) pūrvāparaṃ carato māyaitau śiśū krīḍantau pari yāto 'rṇavam
GV00avs___u:7979: (AVŚ_14,1.23c) viśvānyo bhuvanā vicaṣṭa ṛtūṃr anyo vidadhaj jāyase navaḥ ||23||
GV00avs___u:7980: (AVŚ_14,1.24a) navonavo bhavasi jāyamāno 'hnāṃ ketur uṣasām eṣy agram |
GV00avs___u:7981: (AVŚ_14,1.24c) bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhāsy āyan pra candramas tirase dīrgham āyuḥ ||24||
GV00avs___u:7982: (AVŚ_14,1.25a) parā dehi śāmulyaṃ brahmabhyo vi bhajā vasu |
GV00avs___u:7983: (AVŚ_14,1.25c) kṛtyaiṣā padvatī bhūtvā jāyā viśate patim ||25||
GV00avs___u:7985: (AVŚ_14,1.26c) edhante asyā jñātayaḥ patir bandheṣu badhyate ||26||
GV00avs___u:7987: (AVŚ_14,1.27c) patir yad vadhvo vāsasaḥ svam aṅgam abhyūrṇute ||27||
GV00avs___u:7989: (AVŚ_14,1.28c) sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmota śumbhati ||28||
GV00avs___u:7990: (AVŚ_14,1.29a) tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam apāṣṭhavad viṣavan naitad attave |
GV00avs___u:7991: (AVŚ_14,1.29c) sūryāṃ yo brahmā veda sa id vādhūyam arhati ||29||
GV00avs___u:7992: (AVŚ_14,1.30a) sa it tat syonaṃ harati brahmā vāsaḥ sumaṅgalam |
GV00avs___u:7993: (AVŚ_14,1.30c) prāyaścittiṃ yo adhyeti yena jāyā na riṣyati ||30|| {3}
GV00avs___u:7994: (AVŚ_14,1.31a) yuvaṃ bhagaṃ saṃ bharataṃ samṛddham ṛtaṃ vadantāv ṛtodyeṣu |
GV00avs___u:7995: (AVŚ_14,1.31c) brahmaṇas pate patim asyai rocaya cāru saṃbhalo vadatu vācam etām ||31||
GV00avs___u:7996: (AVŚ_14,1.32a) ihed asātha na paro gamāthemaṃ gāvaḥ prajayā vardhayātha |
GV00avs___u:7997: (AVŚ_14,1.32c) śubhaṃ yatīr usriyāḥ somavarcaso viśve devāḥ krann iha vo
GV00avs___u:7999: (AVŚ_14,1.33a) imaṃ gāvaḥ prajayā saṃ viśāthāyaṃ devānāṃ na mināti bhāgam
GV00avs___u:8000: (AVŚ_14,1.33c) asmai vaḥ pūṣā marutaś ca sarve asmai vo dhātā savitā suvāti ||33||
GV00avs___u:8001: (AVŚ_14,1.34a) anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthano yebhiḥ sakhāyo yanti no vareyam |
GV00avs___u:8002: (AVŚ_14,1.34c) saṃ bhagena sam aryamṇā saṃ dhātā sṛjatu varcasā ||34||
GV00avs___u:8003: (AVŚ_14,1.35a) yac ca varco akṣeṣu surāyāṃ ca yad āhitam |
GV00avs___u:8004: (AVŚ_14,1.35c) yad goṣv aśvinā varcas tenemāṃ varcasāvatam ||35||
GV00avs___u:8005: (AVŚ_14,1.36a) yena mahānaghnyā jaghanam aśvinā yena vā surā |
GV00avs___u:8007: (AVŚ_14,1.37a) yo anidhmo dīdayad apsv antar yaṃ viprāsa īḍate adhvareṣu |
GV00avs___u:8008: (AVŚ_14,1.37c) apāṃ napān madhumatīr apo dā yābhir indro vāvṛdhe vīryāvān
GV00avs___u:8009: (AVŚ_14,1.38a) idam ahaṃ ruśantaṃ grābhaṃ tanūdūṣim apohāmi |
GV00avs___u:8010: (AVŚ_14,1.38c) yo bhadro rocanas tam ud acāmi ||38||
GV00avs___u:8011: (AVŚ_14,1.39a) āsyai brāhmaṇāḥ snapanīr harantv avīraghnīr ud ajantv āpaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8012: (AVŚ_14,1.39c) aryamṇo agniṃ pary etu pūṣan pratīkṣante śvaśuro devaraś ca
GV00avs___u:8013: (AVŚ_14,1.40a) śaṃ te hiraṇyaṃ śam u santv āpaḥ śaṃ methir bhavatu śaṃ yugasya tardma |
GV00avs___u:8014: (AVŚ_14,1.40c) śaṃ ta āpaḥ śatapavitrā bhavantu śam u patyā tanvaṃ saṃ spṛśasva ||40|| {4}
GV00avs___u:8015: (AVŚ_14,1.41a) khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato |
GV00avs___u:8018: (AVŚ_14,1.42c) patyur anuvratā bhūtvā saṃ nahyasvāmṛtāya kam ||42||
GV00avs___u:8019: (AVŚ_14,1.43a) yathā sindhur nadīnāṃ sāmrājyaṃ suṣuve vṛṣā |
GV00avs___u:8020: (AVŚ_14,1.43c) evā tvaṃ samrājñy edhi patyur astaṃ paretya ||43||
GV00avs___u:8021: (AVŚ_14,1.44a) samrājñy edhi śvaśureṣu samrājñy uta devṛṣu |
GV00avs___u:8022: (AVŚ_14,1.44c) nanānduḥ samrājñy edhi samrājñy uta śvaśrvāḥ ||44||
GV00avs___u:8023: (AVŚ_14,1.45a) yā akṛntann avayan yāś ca tatnire yā devīr antāṃ abhito
GV00avs___u:8025: (AVŚ_14,1.45c) tās tvā jarase saṃ vyayantv āyuṣmatīdaṃ pari dhatsva vāsaḥ
GV00avs___u:8026: (AVŚ_14,1.46a) jīvaṃ rudanti vi nayanty adhvaraṃ dīrghām anu prasitiṃ dīdhyur naraḥ |
GV00avs___u:8027: (AVŚ_14,1.46c) vāmaṃ pitṛbhyo ya idaṃ samīrire mayaḥ patibhyo janaye pariṣvaje ||46||
GV00avs___u:8028: (AVŚ_14,1.47a) syonaṃ dhruvaṃ prajāyai dhārayāmi te 'śmānaṃ devyāḥ pṛthivyā upasthe |
GV00avs___u:8029: (AVŚ_14,1.47c) tam ā tiṣṭhānumādyā suvarcā dīrghaṃ ta āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu
GV00avs___u:8030: (AVŚ_14,1.48a) yenāgnir asyā bhūmyā hastaṃ jagrāha dakṣiṇam |
GV00avs___u:8031: (AVŚ_14,1.48c) tena gṛhṇāmi te hastaṃ mā vyathiṣṭhā mayā saha prajayā ca dhanena ca ||48||
GV00avs___u:8032: (AVŚ_14,1.49a) devas te savitā hastaṃ gṛhṇātu somo rājā suprajasaṃ kṛṇotu
GV00avs___u:8033: (AVŚ_14,1.49c) agniḥ subhagāṃ jatavedāḥ patye patnīṃ jaradaṣṭim kṛṇotu
GV00avs___u:8034: (AVŚ_14,1.50a) gṛhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastaṃ mayā patyā jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8035: (AVŚ_14,1.50c) bhago aryamā savitā puraṃdhir mahyaṃ tvādur gārhapatyāya devāḥ ||50|| {5}
GV00avs___u:8036: (AVŚ_14,1.51a) bhagas te hastam agrahīt savitā hastam agrahīt |
GV00avs___u:8037: (AVŚ_14,1.51c) patnī tvam asi dharmaṇāhaṃ gṛhapatis tava ||51||
GV00avs___u:8038: (AVŚ_14,1.52a) mameyam astu poṣyā mahyaṃ tvādād bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:8039: (AVŚ_14,1.52c) mayā patyā prajāvati saṃ jīva śaradaḥ śatam ||52||
GV00avs___u:8040: (AVŚ_14,1.53a) tvaṣṭā vāso vy adadhāc chubhe kaṃ bṛhaspateḥ praśiṣā kavīnām |
GV00avs___u:8041: (AVŚ_14,1.53c) tenemāṃ nārīṃ savitā bhagaś ca sūryām iva pari dhattāṃ
GV00avs___u:8043: (AVŚ_14,1.54a) indrāgnī dyāvāpṛthivī mātariśvā mitrāvaruṇā bhago aśvinobhā
GV00avs___u:8044: (AVŚ_14,1.54c) bṛhaspatir maruto brahma soma imāṃ nāriṃ prajayā vardhayantu ||54||
GV00avs___u:8045: (AVŚ_14,1.55a) bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ sūryāyāḥ śīrṣe keśāṃ akalpayat |
GV00avs___u:8046: (AVŚ_14,1.55c) tenemām aśvinā nārīṃ patye saṃ śobhayāmasi ||55||
GV00avs___u:8047: (AVŚ_14,1.56a) idaṃ tad rūpaṃ yad avasta yoṣā jāyāṃ jijñāse manasā
GV00avs___u:8049: (AVŚ_14,1.56c) tām anv artiṣye sakhibhir navagvaiḥ ka imān vidvān vi
GV00avs___u:8051: (AVŚ_14,1.57a) ahaṃ vi ṣyāmi mayi rūpam asyā vedad it paśyan manasaḥ kulāyam |
GV00avs___u:8052: (AVŚ_14,1.57c) na steyam admi manasod amucye svayaṃ śrathnāno varuṇasya pāśān ||57||
GV00avs___u:8053: (AVŚ_14,1.58a) pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevāḥ |
GV00avs___u:8054: (AVŚ_14,1.58c) uruṃ lokaṃ sugam atra panthāṃ kṛṇomi tubhyaṃ sahapatnyai vadhu ||58||
GV00avs___u:8055: (AVŚ_14,1.59a) ud yachadhvam apa rakṣo hanāthemaṃ nārīṃ sukṛte dadhāta |
GV00avs___u:8056: (AVŚ_14,1.59c) dhātā vipaścit patim asyai viveda bhago rājā pura etu
GV00avs___u:8058: (AVŚ_14,1.60a) bhagas tatakṣa caturaḥ pādān bhagas tatakṣa catvāry uṣpalāni |
GV00avs___u:8059: (AVŚ_14,1.60c) tvaṣṭā pipeśa madhyato 'nu vardhrānt sā no astu sumaṅgalī ||60||
GV00avs___u:8060: (AVŚ_14,1.61a) sukiṃśukaṃ vahatuṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ suvṛtaṃ sucakram |
GV00avs___u:8061: (AVŚ_14,1.61c) ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokaṃ syonaṃ patibhyo vahatuṃ kṛṇu
GV00avs___u:8065: (AVŚ_14,1.63a) mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ kumāryaṃ sthūṇe devakṛte pathi |
GV00avs___u:8066: (AVŚ_14,1.63c) śālāyā devyā dvāraṃ syonaṃ kṛṇmo vadhūpatham ||63||
GV00avs___u:8067: (AVŚ_14,1.64a) brahmāparaṃ yujyatāṃ brahma pūrvaṃ brahmāntato madhyato
GV00avs___u:8069: (AVŚ_14,1.64c) anāvyādhāṃ devapurāṃ prapadya śivā syonā patiloke vi rāja ||64|| {6}
GV00avs___u:8070: (AVŚ_14,2.1a) tubhyam agre pary avahant sūryāṃ vahatunā saha |
GV00avs___u:8071: (AVŚ_14,2.1c) sa naḥ patibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha ||1||
GV00avs___u:8072: (AVŚ_14,2.2a) punaḥ patnīm agnir adād āyuṣā saha varcasā |
GV00avs___u:8073: (AVŚ_14,2.2c) dīrghāyur asyā yaḥ patir jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam ||2||
GV00avs___u:8074: (AVŚ_14,2.3a) somasya jāyā prathamaṃ gandharvas te 'paraḥ patiḥ |
GV00avs___u:8075: (AVŚ_14,2.3c) tṛtīyo agniṣ ṭe patis turīyas te manuṣyajāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:8076: (AVŚ_14,2.4a) somo dadad gandharvāya gandharvo dadad agnaye |
GV00avs___u:8077: (AVŚ_14,2.4c) rayiṃ ca putrāṃs cādād agnir mahyam atho imām ||4||
GV00avs___u:8078: (AVŚ_14,2.5a) ā vām agant sumatir vājinīvasū ny aśvinā hṛtsu kāmā araṃsata
GV00avs___u:8079: (AVŚ_14,2.5c) abhūtaṃ gopā mithunā śubhas patī priyā aryamṇo duryāṃ aśīmahi ||5||
GV00avs___u:8080: (AVŚ_14,2.6a) sā mandasānā manasā śivena rayiṃ dhehi sarvavīraṃ vacasyam |
GV00avs___u:8081: (AVŚ_14,2.6c) sugaṃ tīrthaṃ suprapāṇaṃ śubhas patī sthāṇuṃ pathiṣṭhām apa durmatiṃ hatam
GV00avs___u:8082: (AVŚ_14,2.7a) yā oṣadhayo yā nadyo yāni kṣetrāṇi yā vanā |
GV00avs___u:8083: (AVŚ_14,2.7c) tās tvā vadhu prajāvatīṃ patye rakṣantu rakṣasaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:8085: (AVŚ_14,2.8c) yasmin vīro na riṣyaty anyeṣāṃ vindate vasu ||8||
GV00avs___u:8086: (AVŚ_14,2.9a) idaṃ su me naraḥ śṛṇuta yayāśiṣā daṃpatī vāmam aśnutaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8087: (AVŚ_14,2.9c) ye gandharvā apsarasaś ca devīr eṣu vānaspatyeṣu ye 'dhi
GV00avs___u:8089: (AVŚ_14,2.9e) syonās te asyai vadhvai bhavantu mā hiṃsiṣur vahatum uhyamānam ||9||
GV00avs___u:8090: (AVŚ_14,2.10a) ye vadhvaś candraṃ vahatuṃ yakṣmā yanti janāṃ anu |
GV00avs___u:8091: (AVŚ_14,2.10c) punas tān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ ||10|| {7}
GV00avs___u:8092: (AVŚ_14,2.11a) mā vidan paripanthino ya āsīdanti daṃpatī |
GV00avs___u:8093: (AVŚ_14,2.11c) sugena durgam atītām apa drāntv arātayaḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:8094: (AVŚ_14,2.12a) saṃ kāśayāmi vahatuṃ brahmaṇā gṛhair aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitriyeṇa |
GV00avs___u:8095: (AVŚ_14,2.12c) paryāṇaddhaṃ viśvarūpaṃ yad asti syonaṃ patibhyaḥ savitā tat kṛṇotu ||12||
GV00avs___u:8096: (AVŚ_14,2.13a) śivā nārīyam astam āgann imaṃ dhātā lokam asyai dideśa |
GV00avs___u:8097: (AVŚ_14,2.13c) tām aryamā bhago aśvinobhā prajāpatiḥ prajayā vardhayantu
GV00avs___u:8098: (AVŚ_14,2.14a) ātmanvaty urvarā nārīyam āgan tasyāṃ naro vapata bījam asyām |
GV00avs___u:8099: (AVŚ_14,2.14c) sā vaḥ prajāṃ janayad vakṣaṇābhyo bibhratī dugdham ṛṣabhasya retaḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:8100: (AVŚ_14,2.15a) prati tiṣṭha virāḍ asi viṣṇur iveha sarasvati |
GV00avs___u:8101: (AVŚ_14,2.15c) sinīvāli pra jāyatāṃ bhagasya sumatāv asat ||15||
GV00avs___u:8102: (AVŚ_14,2.16a) ud va ūrmiḥ śamyā hantv āpo yoktrāṇi muñcata |
GV00avs___u:8104: (AVŚ_14,2.17a) aghoracakṣur apatighnī syonā śagmā suśevā suyamā gṛhebhyaḥ
GV00avs___u:8106: (AVŚ_14,2.18a) adevṛghny apatighnīhaidhi śivā paśubhyaḥ suyamā suvarcāḥ |
GV00avs___u:8107: (AVŚ_14,2.18c) prajāvatī vīrasūr devṛkāmā syonemam agniṃ gārhapatyaṃ
GV00avs___u:8109: (AVŚ_14,2.19a) ut tiṣṭhetaḥ kim ichantīdam āgā ahaṃ tveḍe abhibhūḥ svād
GV00avs___u:8111: (AVŚ_14,2.19c) śūnyaiṣī nirṛte yājaganthot tiṣṭhārāte pra pata meha raṃsthāḥ ||19||
GV00avs___u:8112: (AVŚ_14,2.20a) yadā gārhapatyam asaparyait pūrvam agniṃ vadhūr iyam |
GV00avs___u:8113: (AVŚ_14,2.20c) adhā sarasvatyai nāri pitṛbhyaś ca namas kuru ||20|| {8}
GV00avs___u:8114: (AVŚ_14,2.21a) śarma varmaitad ā harāsyai nāryā upastire |
GV00avs___u:8115: (AVŚ_14,2.21c) sinīvāli pra jāyatāṃ bhagasya sumatāv asat ||21||
GV00avs___u:8117: (AVŚ_14,2.22c) tad ā rohatu suprajā yā kanyā vindate patim ||22||
GV00avs___u:8118: (AVŚ_14,2.23a) upa stṛṇīhi balbajam adhi carmaṇi rohite |
GV00avs___u:8120: (AVŚ_14,2.24a) ā roha carmopa sīdāgnim eṣa devo hanti rakṣāṃsi sarvā |
GV00avs___u:8121: (AVŚ_14,2.24c) iha prajāṃ janaya patye asmai sujyaiṣṭhyo bhavat putras ta
GV00avs___u:8123: (AVŚ_14,2.25a) vi tiṣṭhantāṃ mātur asyā upasthān nānārūpāḥ paśavo jāyamānāḥ |
GV00avs___u:8124: (AVŚ_14,2.25c) sumaṅgaly upa sīdemam agniṃ saṃpatnī prati bhūṣeha devān ||25||
GV00avs___u:8125: (AVŚ_14,2.26a) sumaṅgalī prataraṇī gṛhāṇāṃ suśevā patye śvaśurāya śaṃbhūḥ
GV00avs___u:8127: (AVŚ_14,2.27a) syonā bhava śvaśurebhyaḥ syonā patye gṛhebhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8128: (AVŚ_14,2.27c) syonāsyai sarvasyai viśe syonā puṣṭāyaiṣāṃ bhava ||27||
GV00avs___u:8129: (AVŚ_14,2.28a) sumaṅgalīr iyaṃ vadhūr imāṃ sameta paśyata |
GV00avs___u:8131: (AVŚ_14,2.29a) yā durhārdo yuvatayo yāś ceha jaratīr api |
GV00avs___u:8132: (AVŚ_14,2.29c) varco nv asyai saṃ dattāthāstaṃ viparetana ||29||
GV00avs___u:8134: (AVŚ_14,2.30c) ārohat sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam ||30|| {9}
GV00avs___u:8135: (AVŚ_14,2.31a) ā roha talpaṃ sumanasyamāneha prajāṃ janaya patye asmai |
GV00avs___u:8136: (AVŚ_14,2.31c) indrāṇīva subudhā budhyamānā jyotiragrā uṣasaḥ prati
GV00avs___u:8138: (AVŚ_14,2.32a) devā agre ny apadyanta patnīḥ sam aspṛśanta tanvas tanūbhiḥ
GV00avs___u:8139: (AVŚ_14,2.32c) sūryeva nāri viśvarūpā mahitvā prajāvatī patyā saṃ bhaveha ||32||
GV00avs___u:8141: (AVŚ_14,2.33c) jāmim icha pitṛṣadaṃ nyaktāṃ sa te bhāgo januṣā tasya
GV00avs___u:8143: (AVŚ_14,2.34a) apsarasaḥ sadhamādaṃ madanti havirdhānam antarā sūryaṃ ca |
GV00avs___u:8144: (AVŚ_14,2.34c) tās te janitram abhi tāḥ parehi namas te gandharvartunā
GV00avs___u:8146: (AVŚ_14,2.35a) namo gandharvasya namase namo bhāmāya cakṣuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8147: (AVŚ_14,2.35c) viśvāvaso brahmaṇā te namo 'bhi jāyā apsarasaḥ parehi
GV00avs___u:8148: (AVŚ_14,2.36a) rāyā vayaṃ sumanasaḥ syāmod ito gandharvam āvīvṛtāma |
GV00avs___u:8149: (AVŚ_14,2.36c) agant sa devaḥ paramaṃ sadhastham aganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ ||36||
GV00avs___u:8150: (AVŚ_14,2.37a) saṃ pitarāv ṛtviye sṛjethāṃ mātā pitā ca retaso bhavāthaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8151: (AVŚ_14,2.37c) marya iva yoṣām adhi rohayaināṃ prajāṃ kṛṇvāthām iha puṣyataṃ rayim ||37||
GV00avs___u:8152: (AVŚ_14,2.38a) tāṃ pūṣaṃ chivatamām erayasva yasyāṃ bījaṃ manuṣyā vapanti |
GV00avs___u:8153: (AVŚ_14,2.38c) yā na ūrū uśatī viśrayāti yasyām uśantaḥ praharema śepaḥ
GV00avs___u:8154: (AVŚ_14,2.39a) ā rohorum upa dhatsva hastaṃ pari ṣvajasva jāyāṃ sumanasyamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8155: (AVŚ_14,2.39c) prajāṃ kṛṇvāthām iha modamānau dīrghaṃ vām āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu ||39||
GV00avs___u:8156: (AVŚ_14,2.40a) ā vāṃ prajāṃ janayatu prajāpatir ahorātrābhyāṃ sam anaktv aryamā |
GV00avs___u:8157: (AVŚ_14,2.40c) adurmaṅgalī patilokam ā viśemaṃ śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ
GV00avs___u:8159: (AVŚ_14,2.41a) devair dattaṃ manunā sākam etad vādhūyaṃ vāso vadhvaś ca
GV00avs___u:8161: (AVŚ_14,2.41c) yo brahmaṇe cikituṣe dadāti sa id rakṣāṃsi talpāni hanti
GV00avs___u:8162: (AVŚ_14,2.42a) yaṃ me datto brahmabhāgaṃ vadhūyor vādhūyaṃ vāso vadhvaś ca
GV00avs___u:8164: (AVŚ_14,2.42c) yuvaṃ brahmaṇe 'numanyamānau bṛhaspate sākam indraś ca dattam ||42||
GV00avs___u:8165: (AVŚ_14,2.43a) syonād yoner adhi badhyamānau hasāmudau mahasā modamānau |
GV00avs___u:8166: (AVŚ_14,2.43c) sugū suputrau sugṛhau tarātho jīvāv uṣaso vibhātīḥ ||43||
GV00avs___u:8167: (AVŚ_14,2.44a) navaṃ vasānaḥ surabhiḥ suvāsā udāgāṃ jīva uṣaso vibhātīḥ |
GV00avs___u:8170: (AVŚ_14,2.45c) āpaḥ sapta susruvur devīs tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||45||
GV00avs___u:8172: (AVŚ_14,2.46c) ye bhūtasya pracetasas tebhya idam akaraṃ namaḥ ||46||
GV00avs___u:8173: (AVŚ_14,2.47a) ya ṛte cid abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhya ātṛdaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8174: (AVŚ_14,2.47c) saṃdhātā saṃdhiṃ maghavā purūvasur niṣkartā vihrutaṃ punaḥ
GV00avs___u:8175: (AVŚ_14,2.48a) apāsmat tama uchatu nīlaṃ piśaṅgam uta lohitaṃ yat |
GV00avs___u:8176: (AVŚ_14,2.48c) nirdahanī yā pṛṣātaky asmin tāṃ sthāṇāv adhy ā sajāmi
GV00avs___u:8177: (AVŚ_14,2.49a) yāvatīḥ kṛtyā upavāsane yāvanto rājño varuṇasya pāśāḥ |
GV00avs___u:8178: (AVŚ_14,2.49c) vyṛddhayo yā asamṛddhayo yā asmin tā sthāṇāv adhi sādayāmi
GV00avs___u:8179: (AVŚ_14,2.50a) yā me priyatamā tanūḥ sā me bibhāya vāsasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8180: (AVŚ_14,2.50c) tasyāgre tvaṃ vanaspate nīviṃ kṛṇuṣva mā vayaṃ riṣāma ||50|| {11}
GV00avs___u:8181: (AVŚ_14,2.51a) ye antā yāvatīḥ sico ya otavo ye ca tantavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8182: (AVŚ_14,2.51c) vāso yat patnībhir utaṃ tan na syonam upa spṛśāt ||51||
GV00avs___u:8183: (AVŚ_14,2.52a) uśatīḥ kanyalā imāḥ pitṛlokāt patiṃ yatīḥ |
GV00avs___u:8186: (AVŚ_14,2.53c) varco goṣu praviṣṭaṃ yat tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||53||
GV00avs___u:8188: (AVŚ_14,2.54c) tejo goṣu praviṣṭaṃ yat tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||54||
GV00avs___u:8190: (AVŚ_14,2.55c) bhajo goṣu praviṣṭo yas tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||55||
GV00avs___u:8192: (AVŚ_14,2.56c) yaśo goṣu praviṣṭaṃ yat tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||56||
GV00avs___u:8194: (AVŚ_14,2.57c) payo goṣu praviṣṭaṃ yat tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||57||
GV00avs___u:8196: (AVŚ_14,2.58c) raso goṣu praviṣṭo yas tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||58||
GV00avs___u:8197: (AVŚ_14,2.59a) yadīme keśino janā gṛhe te samanartiṣū rodena kṛṇvanto 'gham |
GV00avs___u:8198: (AVŚ_14,2.59c) agniṣ ṭvā tasmād enasaḥ savitā ca pra muñcatām ||59||
GV00avs___u:8199: (AVŚ_14,2.60a) yadīyaṃ duhitā tava vikeśy arudad gṛhe rodena kṛṇvaty agham
GV00avs___u:8200: (AVŚ_14,2.60c) agniṣ ṭvā tasmād enasaḥ savitā ca pra muñcatām ||60|| {12}
GV00avs___u:8201: (AVŚ_14,2.61a) yaj jāmayo yad yuvatayo gṛhe te samanartiṣū rodena kṛṇvatīr
GV00avs___u:8203: (AVŚ_14,2.61c) agniṣ ṭvā tasmād enasaḥ savitā ca pra muñcatām ||61||
GV00avs___u:8204: (AVŚ_14,2.62a) yat te prajāyāṃ paśuṣu yad vā gṛheṣu niṣṭhitam aghakṛdbhir
GV00avs___u:8206: (AVŚ_14,2.62c) agniṣ ṭvā tasmād enasaḥ savitā ca pra muñcatām ||62||
GV00avs___u:8207: (AVŚ_14,2.63a) iyaṃ nāry upa brūte pūlyāny āvapantikā |
GV00avs___u:8208: (AVŚ_14,2.63c) dīrghāyur astu me patir jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam ||63||
GV00avs___u:8209: (AVŚ_14,2.64a) ihemāv indra saṃ nuda cakravākeva daṃpatī |
GV00avs___u:8210: (AVŚ_14,2.64c) prajayainau svastakau viśvam āyur vy aśnutām ||64||
GV00avs___u:8211: (AVŚ_14,2.65a) yad āsandyām upadhāne yad vopavāsane kṛtam |
GV00avs___u:8212: (AVŚ_14,2.65c) vivāhe kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakrur āsnāne tāṃ ni dadhmasi ||65||
GV00avs___u:8213: (AVŚ_14,2.66a) yad duṣkṛtaṃ yac chamalaṃ vivāhe vahatau ca yat |
GV00avs___u:8214: (AVŚ_14,2.66c) tat saṃbhalasya kambale mṛjmahe duritaṃ vayam ||66||
GV00avs___u:8215: (AVŚ_14,2.67a) saṃbhale malaṃ sādayitvā kambale duritaṃ vayam |
GV00avs___u:8216: (AVŚ_14,2.67c) abhūma yajñiyāḥ śuddhāḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat ||67||
GV00avs___u:8218: (AVŚ_14,2.68c) apāsyāḥ keśyaṃ malam apa śīrṣaṇyaṃ likhāt ||68||
GV00avs___u:8219: (AVŚ_14,2.69a) aṅgādaṅgād vayam asyā apa yakṣmaṃ ni dadhmasi |
GV00avs___u:8220: (AVŚ_14,2.69c) tan mā prāpat pṛthivīṃ mota devān divaṃ mā prāpad urv antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:8221: (AVŚ_14,2.69e) apo mā prāpan malam etad agne yamam mā prāpat pitṝṃś ca sarvān ||69||
GV00avs___u:8222: (AVŚ_14,2.70a) saṃ tvā nahyāmi payasā pṛthivyāḥ saṃ tvā nahyāmi payasauṣadhīnām |
GV00avs___u:8223: (AVŚ_14,2.70c) saṃ tvā nahyāmi prajayā dhanena sā saṃnaddhā sanuhi vājam
GV00avs___u:8225: (AVŚ_14,2.71a) amo 'ham asmi sā tvaṃ sāmāham asmy ṛk tvaṃ dyaur ahaṃ
GV00avs___u:8227: (AVŚ_14,2.71c) tāv iha saṃ bhavāva prajām ā janayāvahai ||71||
GV00avs___u:8230: (AVŚ_14,2.73a) ye pitaro vadhūdarśā imaṃ vahatum āgaman |
GV00avs___u:8231: (AVŚ_14,2.73c) te asyai vadhvai saṃpatnyai prajāvac charma yachantu ||73||
GV00avs___u:8232: (AVŚ_14,2.74a) yedaṃ pūrvāgan raśanāyamānā prajām asyai draviṇaṃ ceha dattvā |
GV00avs___u:8233: (AVŚ_14,2.74c) tāṃ vahantv agatasyānu panthāṃ virāḍ iyaṃ suprajā aty ajaiṣīt ||74||
GV00avs___u:8234: (AVŚ_14,2.75a) pra budhyasva subudhā budhyamānā dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya
GV00avs___u:8235: (AVŚ_14,2.75c) gṛhān gacha gṛhapatnī yathāso dīrghaṃ ta āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu
GV00avs___u:8236: (AVŚ_15,1.1a) vrātya āsīd īyamāna eva sa prajāpatiṃ sam airayat ||1||
GV00avs___u:8237: (AVŚ_15,1.2a) sa prajāpatiḥ suvarṇam ātmann apaśyat tat prājanayat ||2||
GV00avs___u:8238: (AVŚ_15,1.3a) tad ekam abhavat tal lalāmam abhavat tan mahad abhavat taj jyeṣṭham abhavat tad brahmābhavat tat tapo 'bhavat tat satyam abhavat tena prājāyata ||3||
GV00avs___u:8239: (AVŚ_15,1.4a) so 'vardhata sa mahān abhavat sa mahādevo 'bhavat ||4||
GV00avs___u:8240: (AVŚ_15,1.5a) sa devānām īśāṃ pary ait sa īśāno 'bhavat ||5||
GV00avs___u:8241: (AVŚ_15,1.6a) sa ekavrātyo 'bhavat sa dhanur ādatta tad evendradhanuḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:8243: (AVŚ_15,1.8a) nīlenaivāpriyaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ prorṇoti lohitena dviṣantaṃ vidhyatīti brahmavādino vadanti ||8||
GV00avs___u:8244: (AVŚ_15,2.1[2.1]a) sa ud atiṣṭhat sa prācīṃ diśam anu vy acalat |
GV00avs___u:8245: (AVŚ_15,2.1[2.2]b) taṃ bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cādityāś ca viśve ca devā
GV00avs___u:8247: (AVŚ_15,2.1[2.3]c) bṛhate ca vai sa rathantarāya cādityebhyaś ca viśvebhyaś ca devebhya ā vṛścate ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati |
GV00avs___u:8248: (AVŚ_15,2.1[2.4]d) bṛhataś ca vai sa rathantarasya cādityānāṃ ca viśveṣāṃ ca devānāṃ priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda |
GV00avs___u:8249: (AVŚ_15,2.1[2.5]e) tasya prācyāṃ diśi śraddhā puṃścalī mitro māgadho vijñānaṃ vāso 'har uṣṇīṣaṃ rātrī keśā haritau pravartau kalmalir maṇiḥ |
GV00avs___u:8250: (AVŚ_15,2.1[2.6-7]f) bhūtaṃ ca bhaviṣyac ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā ca pavamānaś ca vipathavāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ kīrtiś ca yaśaś ca puraḥsarau |
GV00avs___u:8251: (AVŚ_15,2.1[2.8]g) ainaṃ kīrtir gachaty ā yaśo gachati ya evaṃ veda ||1||

GV00avs___u:8254: (AVŚ_15,2.2[2.11]c) yajñāyajñiyāya ca vai sa vāmadevyāya ca yajñāya ca yajamānāya ca paśubhyaś cā vṛścate ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati |

GV00avs___u:8257: (AVŚ_15,2.2[2.14]f) amāvāsyā ca paurṇamāsī ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā ca pavamānaś ca vipathavāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ kīrtiś ca yaśaś ca puraḥsarau |

GV00avs___u:8264: rājñaḥ priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda |

GV00avs___u:8266: (AVŚ_15,2.3[2.20]f) ahaś ca rātrī ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā ca pavamānaś ca vipathavāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ kīrtiś ca yaśaś ca puraḥsarau |
GV00avs___u:8267: (AVŚ_15,2.3[2.20]g) ainaṃ kīrtir gachaty ā yaśo gachati ya evaṃ veda ||3||

GV00avs___u:8271: (AVŚ_15,2.4[2.23]c) śyaitāya ca vai sa naudhasāya ca saptarṣibhyaś ca somāya ca rājña ā vṛścate ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati |

GV00avs___u:8274: vijñānaṃ vāso 'har uṣṇīṣaṃ rātrī keśā haritau pravartau kalmalir maṇiḥ |
GV00avs___u:8275: (AVŚ_15,2.4[2.26-27]f) śrutaṃ ca viśrutaṃ ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā ca pavamānaś ca vipathavāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ kīrtiś ca yaśaś ca puraḥsarau |

GV00avs___u:8277: (AVŚ_15,3.1a) sa saṃvatsaram ūrdhvo 'tiṣṭhat taṃ devā abruvan vrātya kiṃ nu tiṣṭhasīti
GV00avs___u:8278: (AVŚ_15,3.2a) so 'bravīd āsandīṃ me saṃ bharantv iti ||2||
GV00avs___u:8280: (AVŚ_15,3.4a) tasyā grīṣmaś ca vasantaś ca dvau pādāv āstāṃ śarac ca varṣāś ca dvau ||4||
GV00avs___u:8281: (AVŚ_15,3.5a) bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cānūcye āstāṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ ca vāmadevyaṃ ca tiraścye ||5||
GV00avs___u:8286: (AVŚ_15,3.10a) tasya devajanāḥ pariṣkandā āsant saṃkalpāḥ prahāyyā viśvāni bhūtāny upasadaḥ
GV00avs___u:8287: (AVŚ_15,3.11a) viśvāny evāsya bhūtāny upasado bhavanti ya evaṃ veda ||11||
GV00avs___u:8289: (AVŚ_15,4.1[4.2]b) vāsantau māsau goptārāv akurvan bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cānuṣṭhātārau |
GV00avs___u:8290: (AVŚ_15,4.1[4.3]c) vāsantāv enaṃ māsau prācyā diśo gopāyato bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda ||1|| [3]
GV00avs___u:8292: (AVŚ_15,4.2[4.5]b) graiṣmau māsau goptārāv akurvan yajñāyajñiyaṃ ca
GV00avs___u:8294: (AVŚ_15,4.2[4.6]c) graiṣmāv enaṃ māsau dakṣiṇāyā diśo gopāyato
GV00avs___u:8295: yajñāyajñiyaṃ ca vāmadevyaṃ cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda ||2|| [6]
GV00avs___u:8297: (AVŚ_15,4.3[4.8]b) vārṣikau māsau goptārāv akurvan vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau |
GV00avs___u:8298: (AVŚ_15,4.3[4.9]c) vārṣikāv enaṃ māsau pratīcyā diśo gopāyato vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda ||3|| [9]
GV00avs___u:8300: (AVŚ_15,4.4[4.11]b) śāradau māsau goptārāv akurvaṃ chyaitaṃ ca naudhasaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau |
GV00avs___u:8301: (AVŚ_15,4.4[4.12]c) śāradāv enaṃ māsāv udīcyā diśo gopāyataḥ śyaitaṃ ca naudhasaṃ cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda ||4|| [12]
GV00avs___u:8303: (AVŚ_15,4.5[4.14]b) haimanau māsau goptārāv akurvan bhūmiṃ cāgniṃ
GV00avs___u:8305: (AVŚ_15,4.5[4.15]c) haimanāv enaṃ māsau dhruvāyā diśo gopāyato bhūmiś cāgniś cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda ||5|| [15]
GV00avs___u:8307: (AVŚ_15,4.6[4.17]b) śaiśirau māsau goptārāv akurvan divaṃ cādityaṃ
GV00avs___u:8309: (AVŚ_15,4.6[4.18]c) śaiśirāv enaṃ māsāv ūrdhvāyā diśo gopāyato dyauś cādityaś cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda ||6|| [18]
GV00avs___u:8310: (AVŚ_15,5.1[5.1]a) tasmai prācyā diśo antardeśād bhavam iṣvāsam
GV00avs___u:8312: (AVŚ_15,5.1[5.2-3]b) bhava enam iṣvāsaḥ prācyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti ya evaṃ veda ||1|| [2-3]
GV00avs___u:8313: (AVŚ_15,5.2[5.4]a) tasmai dakṣiṇāyā diśo antardeśāc charvam iṣvāsam
GV00avs___u:8315: (AVŚ_15,5.2[5.5]b) śarva enam iśvāso dakṣiṇāyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti ya evaṃ veda ||2|| [5]
GV00avs___u:8316: (AVŚ_15,5.3[5.6]a) tasmai pratīcyā diśo antardeśāt paśupatim iṣvāsam
GV00avs___u:8318: (AVŚ_15,5.3[5.7]b) paśupatir enam iṣvāsaḥ pratīcyā diśo antardeśād
GV00avs___u:8319: anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti ya evaṃ veda (AVŚ_15,5.4[5.8]a) tasmā udīcyā diśo antardeśād ugraṃ devam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan |
GV00avs___u:8320: (AVŚ_15,5.4[5.9]b) ugra enaṃ deva iṣvāsa udīcyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān
GV00avs___u:8322: (AVŚ_15,5.5[5.10]a) tasmai dhruvāyā diśo antardeśād rudram iṣvāsam
GV00avs___u:8324: (AVŚ_15,5.5[5.11]b) rudra enam iṣvāso dhruvāyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti ya evaṃ veda ||5|| [11]
GV00avs___u:8325: (AVŚ_15,5.6[5.12]a) tasmā ūrdhvāyā diśo antardeśān mahādevam iṣvāsam
GV00avs___u:8327: (AVŚ_15,5.6[5.13]b) mahādeva enam iṣvāsa ūrdhvāyā diśo antardeśād
GV00avs___u:8328: anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti ya evaṃ veda (AVŚ_15,5.7[5.14]a) tasmai sarvebhyo antardeśebhya īśānam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan
GV00avs___u:8329: (AVŚ_15,5.7[5.15-16]b) īśāna enam iṣvāsaḥ sarvebhyo antardeśebhyo 'nuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti ya evaṃ veda ||7|| [15-16]
GV00avs___u:8330: (AVŚ_15,6.1[6.1]a) sa dhruvāṃ diśam anu vy acalat |
GV00avs___u:8331: (AVŚ_15,6.1[6.2]b) taṃ bhūmiś cāgniś cauṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś ca vānaspatyāś ca vīrudhaś cānuvyacalan |
GV00avs___u:8332: (AVŚ_15,6.1[6.3]c) bhūmeś ca vai so 'gneś cauṣadhīnāṃ ca vanaspatīnāṃ ca vānaspatyānāṃ ca vīrudhāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||1|| [3]
GV00avs___u:8333: (AVŚ_15,6.2[6.4]a) sa ūrdhvāṃ diśam anu vy acalat |
GV00avs___u:8334: (AVŚ_15,6.2[6.5]b) tam ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ca sūryaś ca candraś ca nakṣatrāṇi cānuvyacalan |
GV00avs___u:8335: (AVŚ_15,6.2[6.6]c) ṛtasya ca vai sa satyasya ca sūryasya ca candrasya ca nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||2|| [6]
GV00avs___u:8336: (AVŚ_15,6.3[6.7]a) sa uttamāṃ diśam anu vy acalat |
GV00avs___u:8337: (AVŚ_15,6.3[6.8]b) tam ṛcaś ca sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca brahma cānuvyacalan |
GV00avs___u:8338: (AVŚ_15,6.3[6.9]c) ṛcāṃ ca vai sa sāmnāṃ ca yajuṣāṃ ca brahmaṇaś ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||3|| [9]
GV00avs___u:8339: (AVŚ_15,6.4[6.10]a) sa bṛhatīṃ diśam anu vy acalat |
GV00avs___u:8340: (AVŚ_15,6.4[6.11]b) tam itihāsaś ca purāṇaṃ ca gāthāś ca nārāśaṃsīś cānuvyacalan |
GV00avs___u:8341: (AVŚ_15,6.4[6.12]c) itihāsasya ca vai sa purāṇasya ca gāthānāṃ ca nārāśaṃsīnāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||4|| [12]
GV00avs___u:8342: (AVŚ_15,6.5[6.13]a) sa paramāṃ diśam anu vy acalat |
GV00avs___u:8343: (AVŚ_15,6.5[6.14]b) tam āhavanīyaś ca gārhapatyaś ca dakṣiṇāgniś ca yajñaś ca yajamānaś ca paśavaś cānuvyacalan |
GV00avs___u:8344: (AVŚ_15,6.5[6.15]c) āhavanīyasya ca vai sa gārhapatyasya ca dakṣiṇāgneś ca yajñasya ca yajamānasya ca paśūnāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV00avs___u:8346: (AVŚ_15,6.6[6.17]b) tam ṛtavaś cārtavāś ca lokāś ca laukyāś ca māsāś
GV00avs___u:8348: (AVŚ_15,6.6[6.18]c) ṛtūnāṃ ca vai sa ārtavānāṃ ca lokānāṃ ca laukyānāṃ ca māsānāṃ cārdhamāsānāṃ cāhorātrayoś ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||6|| [18]
GV00avs___u:8349: (AVŚ_15,6.7[6.19]a) so 'nāvṛttāṃ diśam anu vy acalat tato nāvartsyann
GV00avs___u:8351: (AVŚ_15,6.7[6.20]b) taṃ ditiś cāditiś ceḍā cendrāṇī cānuvyacalan |
GV00avs___u:8352: (AVŚ_15,6.7[6.21]c) diteś ca vai so 'diteś ceḍāyāś cendrāṇyāś ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||7|| [21]
GV00avs___u:8353: (AVŚ_15,6.8[6.22]a) sa diśo 'nu vy acalat taṃ virāḍ anu vy acalat sarve ca
GV00avs___u:8355: (AVŚ_15,6.8[6.23]b) virājaś ca vai sa sarveṣāṃ ca devānāṃ sarvāsāṃ ca
GV00avs___u:8356: devatānāṃ priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||8|| [23]
GV00avs___u:8357: (AVŚ_15,6.9[6.24]a) sa sarvān antardeśān anu vy acalat |
GV00avs___u:8358: (AVŚ_15,6.9[6.25]b) taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaś cānuvyacalan |
GV00avs___u:8359: (AVŚ_15,6.9[6.26]c) prajāpateś ca vai sa parameṣṭhinaś ca pituś ca pitāmahasya ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||9|| [26]
GV00avs___u:8360: (AVŚ_15,7.1a) sa mahimā sadrur bhūtvāntaṃ pṛthivyā agachat samudro 'bhavat
GV00avs___u:8361: (AVŚ_15,7.2a) taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaś cāpaś ca śraddhā ca varṣaṃ bhūtvānuvyavartayanta ||2||
GV00avs___u:8362: (AVŚ_15,7.3a) ainam āpo gachanty ainaṃ śraddhā gachaty ainaṃ varṣaṃ gachati ya evaṃ veda
GV00avs___u:8363: (AVŚ_15,7.4a) taṃ śraddhā ca yajñaś ca lokaś cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca
GV00avs___u:8365: (AVŚ_15,7.5a) ainaṃ śraddhā gachaty ainaṃ yajño gachaty ainaṃ loko gachaty
GV00avs___u:8366: ainam annaṃ gachaty ainam annādyaṃ gachati ya evaṃ veda ||5||
GV00avs___u:8368: (AVŚ_15,8.2a) sa viśaḥ sabandhūn annam annādyam abhyudatiṣṭhat ||2||
GV00avs___u:8369: (AVŚ_15,8.3a) viśāṃ ca vai sa sabandhūnāṃ cānnasya cānnādyasya ca priyaṃ
GV00avs___u:8372: (AVŚ_15,9.2a) taṃ sabhā ca samitiś ca senā ca surā cānuvyacalan ||2||
GV00avs___u:8373: (AVŚ_15,9.3a) sabhāyāś ca vai sa samiteś ca senāyāś ca surāyāś ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||3||
GV00avs___u:8374: (AVŚ_15,10.1a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo rājño 'tithir gṛhān āgachet ||1||
GV00avs___u:8375: (AVŚ_15,10.2a) śreyāṃsam enam ātmano mānayet tathā kṣatrāya nā vṛścate tathā rāṣṭrāya nā vṛścate ||2||
GV00avs___u:8376: (AVŚ_15,10.3a) ato vai brahma ca kṣatraṃ cod atiṣṭhatāṃ te abrūtāṃ kaṃ pra viśāveti ||3||
GV00avs___u:8377: (AVŚ_15,10.4a) bṛhaspatim eva brahma praviśatv indraṃ kṣatraṃ tathā vā iti
GV00avs___u:8378: (AVŚ_15,10.5a) ato vai bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśad indraṃ kṣatram ||5||
GV00avs___u:8379: (AVŚ_15,10.6a) iyaṃ vā u pṛthivī bṛhaspatir dyaur evendraḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:8380: (AVŚ_15,10.7a) ayaṃ vā u agnir brahmāsāv ādityaḥ kṣatram ||7||
GV00avs___u:8382: (AVŚ_15,10.9a) yaḥ pṛthivīṃ bṛhaspatim agniṃ brahma veda ||9||
GV00avs___u:8384: (AVŚ_15,10.11a) ya ādityaṃ kṣatraṃ divam indraṃ veda ||11||
GV00avs___u:8385: (AVŚ_15,11.1a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'tithir gṛhān āgachet ||1||
GV00avs___u:8386: (AVŚ_15,11.2a) svayam enam abhyudetya brūyād vrātya kvāvātsīr vrātyodakaṃ vrātya tarpayantu vrātya yathā te priyaṃ tathāstu vrātya yathā te vaśas
GV00avs___u:8387: tathāstu vrātya yathā te nikāmas tathāstv iti ||2||
GV00avs___u:8388: (AVŚ_15,11.3a) yad enam āha vrātya kvāvātsīr iti patha eva tena devayānān ava rundhe ||3||
GV00avs___u:8389: (AVŚ_15,11.4a) yad enam āha vrātyodakam ity apa eva tenāva rundhe ||4||
GV00avs___u:8390: (AVŚ_15,11.5a) yad enam āha vrātya tarpayantv iti prāṇam eva tena
GV00avs___u:8392: (AVŚ_15,11.6a) yad enam āha vrātya yathā te priyaṃ tathāstv iti priyam eva tenāva rundhe
GV00avs___u:8393: (AVŚ_15,11.7a) ainaṃ priyaṃ gachati priyaḥ priyasya bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV00avs___u:8394: (AVŚ_15,11.8a) yad enam āha vrātya yathā te vaśas tathāstv iti vaśam eva tenāva rundhe
GV00avs___u:8395: (AVŚ_15,11.9a) ainaṃ vaśo gachati vaśī vaśināṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||9||
GV00avs___u:8396: (AVŚ_15,11.10a) yad enam āha vrātya yathā te nikāmas tathāstv iti nikāmam eva tenāva rundhe
GV00avs___u:8397: (AVŚ_15,11.11a) ainaṃ nikāmo gachati nikāme nikāmasya bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV00avs___u:8398: (AVŚ_15,12.1a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātya uddhṛteṣv agniṣv adhiśrite
GV00avs___u:8400: (AVŚ_15,12.2a) svayam enam abhyudetya brūyād vrātyāti sṛja hoṣyāmīti ||2||
GV00avs___u:8401: (AVŚ_15,12.3a) sa cātisṛjej juhuyān na cātisṛjen na juhuyāt ||3||
GV00avs___u:8402: (AVŚ_15,12.4a) sa ya evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenātisṛṣṭo juhoti ||4||
GV00avs___u:8403: (AVŚ_15,12.5a) pra pitṛyāṇaṃ panthāṃ jānāti pra devayānam ||5||
GV00avs___u:8404: (AVŚ_15,12.6a) na deveṣv ā vṛścate hutam asya bhavati ||6||
GV00avs___u:8405: (AVŚ_15,12.7a) pary asyāsmiṃl loka āyatanaṃ śiṣyate ya evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenātisṛṣṭo juhoti
GV00avs___u:8406: (AVŚ_15,12.8a) atha ya evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenānatisṛṣṭo juhoti ||8||
GV00avs___u:8407: (AVŚ_15,12.9a) na pitṛyāṇaṃ panthāṃ jānāti na devayānam ||9||
GV00avs___u:8408: (AVŚ_15,12.10a) ā deveṣu vṛścate ahutam asya bhavati ||10||
GV00avs___u:8409: (AVŚ_15,12.11a) nāsyāsmiṃl loka āyatanaṃ śiṣyate ya evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenānatisṛṣṭo juhoti ||11||
GV00avs___u:8410: (AVŚ_15,13.1[13.1]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātya ekāṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati |
GV00avs___u:8411: (AVŚ_15,13.1[13.2]b) ye pṛthivyāṃ puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe ||1||
GV00avs___u:8412: (AVŚ_15,13.2[13.3]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo dvitīyāṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati |
GV00avs___u:8413: (AVŚ_15,13.2[13.4]b) ye 'ntarikṣe puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe ||2||
GV00avs___u:8414: (AVŚ_15,13.3[13.5]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyas tṛtīyāṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati |
GV00avs___u:8415: (AVŚ_15,13.3[13.6]b) ye divi puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe ||3|| [6]
GV00avs___u:8416: (AVŚ_15,13.4[13.7]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyaś caturthīṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati |
GV00avs___u:8417: (AVŚ_15,13.4[13.8]b) ye puṇyānāṃ puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe ||4||
GV00avs___u:8418: (AVŚ_15,13.5[13.9]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'parimitā rātrīr atithir gṛhe vasati |
GV00avs___u:8419: (AVŚ_15,13.5[13.10]b) ya evāparimitāḥ puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe ||5|| [10]
GV00avs___u:8420: (AVŚ_15,13.6[13.11]a) atha yasyāvrātyo vrātyabruvo nāmabibhraty atithir gṛhān āgachet ||6||
GV00avs___u:8422: (AVŚ_15,13.8[13.13]a) asyai devatāyā udakaṃ yācāmīmāṃ devatāṃ vāsaya imām imāṃ devatāṃ pari veveṣmīty enaṃ pari veviṣyāt ||8|| [13]
GV00avs___u:8423: (AVŚ_15,13.9[13.14]a) tasyām evāsya tad devatāyāṃ hutaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||9|| [14]
GV00avs___u:8424: (AVŚ_15,14.1[14.1]a) sa yat prācīṃ diśam anu vyacalan mārutaṃ śardho bhūtvānuvyacalan mano 'nnādaṃ kṛtvā |
GV00avs___u:8426: (AVŚ_15,14.2[14.3]a) sa yad dakṣiṇāṃ diśam anu vyacalad indro bhūtvānuvyacalad balam annādaṃ kṛtvā |
GV00avs___u:8428: (AVŚ_15,14.3[14.5]a) sa yat pratīcīṃ diśam anu vyacalad varuṇo rājā bhūtvānuvyacalad apo 'nnādīḥ kṛtvā |
GV00avs___u:8429: (AVŚ_15,14.3[14.6]b) adbhir annādībhir annam atti ya evaṃ veda ||3|| [6]
GV00avs___u:8430: (AVŚ_15,14.4[14.7]a) sa yad udīcīṃ diśam anu vyacalat somo rājā bhūtvānuvyacalat saptarṣibhir huta āhutim annādīṃ kṛtvā |
GV00avs___u:8432: (AVŚ_15,14.5[14.9]a) sa yad dhruvāṃ diśam anu vyacalad viṣṇur bhūtvānuvyacalad virājam annādīṃ kṛtvā |
GV00avs___u:8434: (AVŚ_15,14.6[14.11]a) sa yat paśūn anu vyacalad rudro bhūtvānuvyacalad oṣadhīr annādīḥ kṛtvā
GV00avs___u:8435: (AVŚ_15,14.6[14.12]b) oṣadhībhir annādībhir annam atti ya evaṃ veda ||6||
GV00avs___u:8436: (AVŚ_15,14.7[14.13]a) sa yat pitṝn anu vyacalad yamo rājā bhūtvānuvyacalat svadhākāram annādaṃ kṛtvā |
GV00avs___u:8438: (AVŚ_15,14.8[14.15]a) sa yan manuṣyān anu vyacalad agnir bhūtvānuvyacalat svāhākāram annādaṃ kṛtvā |
GV00avs___u:8440: (AVŚ_15,14.9[14.17]a) sa yad ūrdhvāṃ diśam anu vyacalad bṛhaspatir bhūtvānuvyacalad vaṣaṭkāram annādaṃ kṛtvā |
GV00avs___u:8442: (AVŚ_15,14.10[14.19]a) sa yad devān anu vyacalad īśāno bhūtvānuvyacalan manyum annādaṃ kṛtvā
GV00avs___u:8444: (AVŚ_15,14.11[14.21]a) sa yat prajā anu vyacalat prajāpatir
GV00avs___u:8447: (AVŚ_15,14.12[14.23]a) sa yat sarvān antardeśān anu vyacalat parameṣṭhī bhūtvānuvyacalad brahmānnādaṃ kṛtvā |
GV00avs___u:8451: (AVŚ_15,15.3a) yo 'sya prathamaḥ prāṇa ūrdhvo nāmāyaṃ so agniḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:8452: (AVŚ_15,15.4a) yo 'sya dvitīyaḥ prāṇaḥ prauḍho nāmāsau sa ādityaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:8453: (AVŚ_15,15.5a) yo 'sya tṛtīyaḥ prāṇo 'bhyūḍho nāmāsau sa candramāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:8454: (AVŚ_15,15.6a) yo 'sya caturthaḥ prāṇo vibhūr nāmāyaṃ sa pavamānaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:8455: (AVŚ_15,15.7a) yo 'sya pañcamaḥ prāṇo yonir nāma tā imā āpaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:8456: (AVŚ_15,15.8a) yo 'sya ṣaṣṭhaḥ prāṇaḥ priyo nāma ta ime paśavaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:8457: (AVŚ_15,15.9a) yo 'sya saptamaḥ prāṇo 'parimito nāma tā imāḥ prajāḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:8472: (AVŚ_15,17.8a) samānam arthaṃ pari yanti devāḥ saṃvatsaraṃ vā etad ṛtavo
GV00avs___u:8474: (AVŚ_15,17.9a) yad ādityam abhisaṃviśanty amāvāsyāṃ caiva tat paurṇamāsīṃ ca ||9||
GV00avs___u:8475: (AVŚ_15,17.10a) ekaṃ tad eṣām amṛtatvam ity āhutir eva ||10||
GV00avs___u:8477: (AVŚ_15,18.2a) yad asya dakṣiṇam akṣy asau sa ādityo yad asya savyam akṣy asau sa candramāḥ
GV00avs___u:8478: (AVŚ_15,18.3a) yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ karṇo 'yaṃ so agnir yo 'sya savyaḥ karṇo 'yaṃ sa pavamānaḥ
GV00avs___u:8479: (AVŚ_15,18.4a) ahorātre nāsike ditiś cāditiś ca śīrṣakapāle saṃvatsaraḥ śiraḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:8480: (AVŚ_15,18.5a) ahnā pratyaṅ vrātyo rātryā prāṅ namo vrātyāya ||5||
GV00avs___u:8483: (AVŚ_16,1.3a) mroko manohā khano nirdāha ātmadūṣis tanūdūṣiḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:8484: (AVŚ_16,1.4a) idaṃ tam ati sṛjāmi taṃ mābhyavanikṣi ||4||
GV00avs___u:8485: (AVŚ_16,1.5a) tena tam abhyatisṛjāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ
GV00avs___u:8487: (AVŚ_16,1.7a) yo 'psv agnir ati taṃ sṛjāmi mrokaṃ khaniṃ tanūdūṣim ||7||
GV00avs___u:8488: (AVŚ_16,1.8a) yo va āpo 'gnir āviveśa sa eṣa yad vo ghoraṃ tad etat ||8||
GV00avs___u:8491: (AVŚ_16,1.11a) prāsmad eno vahantu pra duṣvapnyaṃ vahantu ||11||
GV00avs___u:8492: (AVŚ_16,1.12a) śivena mā cakṣuṣā paśyatāpaḥ śivayā tanvopa spṛśata tvacaṃ me ||12||
GV00avs___u:8493: (AVŚ_16,1.13a) śivān agnīn apsuṣado havāmahe mayi kṣatraṃ varca ā dhatta
GV00avs___u:8498: (AVŚ_16,2.4a) suśrutau karṇau bhadraśrutau karṇau bhadraṃ ślokaṃ śrūyāsam
GV00avs___u:8499: (AVŚ_16,2.5a) suśrutiś ca mopaśrutiś ca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ sauparṇaṃ cakṣur ajasraṃ jyotiḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:8502: (AVŚ_16,3.2a) rujaś ca mā venaś ca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ mūrdhā ca mā vidharmā ca mā hāsiṣṭām ||2||
GV00avs___u:8503: (AVŚ_16,3.3a) urvaś ca mā camasaś ca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ dhartā ca mā dharuṇaś ca
GV00avs___u:8505: (AVŚ_16,3.4a) vimokaś ca mārdrapaviś ca mā hāsiṣṭām ārdradānuś ca mā
GV00avs___u:8507: (AVŚ_16,3.5a) bṛhaspatir ma ātmā nṛmaṇā nāma hṛdyaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:8508: (AVŚ_16,3.6a) asaṃtāpaṃ me hṛdayam urvī gavyūtiḥ samudro asmi vidharmaṇā ||6||
GV00avs___u:8509: (AVŚ_16,4.1a) nābhir ahaṃ rayīṇāṃ nābhiḥ samānānāṃ bhūyāsam ||1||
GV00avs___u:8510: (AVŚ_16,4.2a) svāsad asi sūṣā amṛto martyeśv ā ||2||
GV00avs___u:8511: (AVŚ_16,4.3a) mā māṃ prāṇo hāsīn mo apāno 'vahāya parā gāt ||3||
GV00avs___u:8512: (AVŚ_16,4.4a) sūryo māhnaḥ pātv agniḥ pṛthivyā vāyur antarikṣād yamo manuṣyebhyaḥ sarasvatī pārthivebhyaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:8513: (AVŚ_16,4.5a) prāṇāpanau mā mā hāsiṣṭam mā jane pra meṣi ||5||
GV00avs___u:8514: (AVŚ_16,4.6a) svasty adyoṣaso doṣasaś ca sarva āpaḥ sarvagaṇo aśīya ||6||
GV00avs___u:8515: (AVŚ_16,4.7a) śakvarī stha paśavo mopa stheṣur mitrāvaruṇau me prāṇāpānāv agnir me dakṣaṃ dadhātu ||7||
GV00avs___u:8516: (AVŚ_16,5.1a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ grāhyāḥ putro 'si yamasya karaṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8518: (AVŚ_16,5.1c) taṃ tvā svapna tathā saṃ vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi ||1||
GV00avs___u:8519: (AVŚ_16,5.2a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ nirṛtyāḥ putro 'si yamasya karaṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8520: (AVŚ_16,5.3a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ abhūtyāḥ putro 'si yamasya [...] ||
GV00avs___u:8521: (AVŚ_16,5.4a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ nirbhūtyāḥ putro 'si [...] || 4 ||
GV00avs___u:8522: (AVŚ_16,5.5a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ parābhūtyāḥ putro 'si [...] || 5 ||
GV00avs___u:8523: (AVŚ_16,5.6a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ devajāmīnāṃ putro 'si yamasya karaṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8525: (AVŚ_16,5.6c) taṃ tvā svapna tathā saṃ vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi ||6||
GV00avs___u:8527: (AVŚ_16,6.2a) uṣo yasmād duṣvapnyād abhaiṣmāpa tad uchatu ||2||
GV00avs___u:8528: (AVŚ_16,6.3a) dviṣate tat parā vaha śapate tat parā vaha ||3||
GV00avs___u:8529: (AVŚ_16,6.4a) yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no dveṣṭi tasmā enad gamayāmaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:8530: (AVŚ_16,6.5a) uṣā devī vācā saṃvidānā vāg devy uṣasā saṃvidānā ||5||
GV00avs___u:8531: (AVŚ_16,6.6a) uṣas patir vācas patinā saṃvidāno vācas patinā saṃvidānaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:8532: (AVŚ_16,6.7a) te 'muṣmai parā vahantv arāyān durṇāmnaḥ sadānvāḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:8535: (AVŚ_16,6.10a) anāgamiṣyato varān avitteḥ saṃkalpān amucyā druhaḥ pāśān
GV00avs___u:8536: (AVŚ_16,6.11a) tad amuṣmā agne devāḥ parā vahantu vaghrir yathāsad vithuro
GV00avs___u:8538: (AVŚ_16,7.1a) tenainaṃ vidhyāmy abhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmi nirbhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmi parābhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmi grāhyainaṃ vidhyāmi tamasainaṃ vidhyāmi
GV00avs___u:8539: (AVŚ_16,7.2a) devānām enaṃ ghoraiḥ krūraiḥ praiṣair abhipreṣyāmi ||2||
GV00avs___u:8542: (AVŚ_16,7.5a) yo 'smān dveṣṭi tam ātmā dveṣṭu yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ sa ātmānaṃ
GV00avs___u:8544: (AVŚ_16,7.6a) nir dviṣantaṃ divo niḥ pṛthivyā nir antarikṣād bhajāma ||6||
GV00avs___u:8546: (AVŚ_16,7.8a) idam aham āmuṣyāyaṇe 'muṣyāḥ putre duṣvapnyaṃ mṛje ||8||
GV00avs___u:8547: (AVŚ_16,7.9a) yad adoado abhyagachaṃ yad doṣā yat pūrvāṃ rātrim ||9||
GV00avs___u:8548: (AVŚ_16,7.10a) yaj jāgrad yat supto yad divā yan naktam ||10||
GV00avs___u:8549: (AVŚ_16,7.11a) yad aharahar abhigachāmi tasmād enam ava daye ||11||
GV00avs___u:8550: (AVŚ_16,7.12a) taṃ jahi tena mandasva tasya pṛṣṭīr api śṛṇīhi ||12||
GV00avs___u:8551: (AVŚ_16,7.13a) sa mā jīvīt taṃ prāṇo jahātu ||13||

GV00avs___u:8787: (AVŚ_18,1.1a) o cit sakhāyaṃ sakhyā vavṛtyāṃ tiraḥ puru cid arṇavaṃ
GV00avs___u:8789: (AVŚ_18,1.1c) pitur napātam ā dadhīta vedhā adhi kṣami prataraṃ dīdhyānaḥ
GV00avs___u:8790: (AVŚ_18,1.2a) na te sakhā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭy etat salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavati
GV00avs___u:8791: (AVŚ_18,1.2c) mahas putrāso asurasya vīrā divo dhartāra urviyā pari khyan
GV00avs___u:8792: (AVŚ_18,1.3a) uśanti ghā te amṛtāsa etad ekasya cit tyajasaṃ martyasya |
GV00avs___u:8793: (AVŚ_18,1.3c) ni te mano manasi dhāyy asme janyuḥ patis tanvam ā viviṣyāḥ ||3||

GV00avs___u:8798: (AVŚ_18,1.5c) nakir asya pra minanti vratāni veda nāv asya pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||5||

GV00avs___u:8810: (AVŚ_18,1.11c) upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum anyam ichasva subhage patiṃ mat

GV00avs___u:8813: (AVŚ_18,1.13a) na te nāthaṃ yamy atrāham asmi na te tanūṃ tanvā sam papṛcyām |

GV00avs___u:8827: (AVŚ_18,1.18c) viśvaṃ sa veda varuṇo yathā dhiyā sa yajñiyo yajati

GV00avs___u:8830: (AVŚ_18,1.19c) iṣṭasya madhye aditir ni dhātu no bhrātā no jyeṣṭhaḥ
GV00avs___u:8832: (AVŚ_18,1.20a) so cit nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvaty uṣā uvāsa manave

GV00avs___u:8837: (AVŚ_18,1.21c) yadī viśo vṛṇate dasmam āryā agniṃ hotāram adha dhīr
GV00avs___u:8839: (AVŚ_18,1.22a) sadāsi raṇvo yavaseva puṣyate hotrābhir agne manuṣaḥ svadhvaraḥ |
GV00avs___u:8840: (AVŚ_18,1.22c) viprasya vā yac chaśamāna ukthyo vājaṃ sasavāṃ upayāsi bhūribhiḥ ||22||
GV00avs___u:8841: (AVŚ_18,1.23a) ud īraya pitarā jāra ā bhagam iyakṣati haryato hṛtta iṣyati
GV00avs___u:8842: (AVŚ_18,1.23c) vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhas taviṣyate asuro vepate matī ||23||
GV00avs___u:8843: (AVŚ_18,1.24a) yas te agne sumatiṃ marto akhyat sahasaḥ sūno ati sa pra śṛṇve |
GV00avs___u:8844: (AVŚ_18,1.24c) iṣaṃ dadhāno vahamāno aśvair ā sa dyumāṃ amavān bhūṣati
GV00avs___u:8846: (AVŚ_18,1.25a) śrudhī no agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum |
GV00avs___u:8847: (AVŚ_18,1.25c) ā no vaha rodasī devaputre mākir devānām apa bhūr iha syāḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:8848: (AVŚ_18,1.26a) yad agna eṣā samitir bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra |
GV00avs___u:8849: (AVŚ_18,1.26c) ratnā ca yad vibhajāsi svadhāvo bhāgaṃ no atra vasumantaṃ
GV00avs___u:8851: (AVŚ_18,1.27a) anv agnir uṣasām agram akhyad anv ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ
GV00avs___u:8852: (AVŚ_18,1.27c) anu sūrya uṣaso anu raśmīn dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa ||27||
GV00avs___u:8853: (AVŚ_18,1.28a) praty agnir uṣasām agram akhyat praty ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ |
GV00avs___u:8854: (AVŚ_18,1.28c) prati sūryasya purudhā ca raśmīn prati dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatāna ||28||
GV00avs___u:8855: (AVŚ_18,1.29a) dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtenābhiśrāve bhavataḥ satyavācā |
GV00avs___u:8856: (AVŚ_18,1.29c) devo yan martān yajathāya kṛṇvant sīdad dhotā pratyaṅ svam
GV00avs___u:8858: (AVŚ_18,1.30a) devo devān paribhūr ṛtena vahā no havyaṃ prathamaś cikitvān
GV00avs___u:8859: (AVŚ_18,1.30c) dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīko mandro hotā nityo vācā yajīyān ||30|| {3}
GV00avs___u:8860: (AVŚ_18,1.31a) arcāmi vāṃ vardhāyāpo ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutaṃ rodasī me |
GV00avs___u:8861: (AVŚ_18,1.31c) ahā yad devā asunītim āyan madhvā no atra pitarā śiśītām
GV00avs___u:8862: (AVŚ_18,1.32a) svāvṛg devasyāmṛtaṃ yadī gor ato jātāso dhārayanta urvī |
GV00avs___u:8863: (AVŚ_18,1.32c) viśve devā anu tat te yajur gur duhe yad enī divyaṃ ghṛtam
GV00avs___u:8865: (AVŚ_18,1.33a) kiṃ svin no rājā jagṛhe kad asyāti vrataṃ cakṛmā ko vi veda
GV00avs___u:8866: (AVŚ_18,1.33c) mitras cid dhi ṣmā juhurāṇo devāṃ chloko na yātām api vājo asti ||33||
GV00avs___u:8867: (AVŚ_18,1.34a) durmantv atrāmṛtasya nāma salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavāti |
GV00avs___u:8868: (AVŚ_18,1.34c) yamasya yo manavate sumantv agne tam ṛṣva pāhy aprayuchan
GV00avs___u:8869: (AVŚ_18,1.35a) yasmin devā vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante
GV00avs___u:8870: (AVŚ_18,1.35c) sūrye jyotir adadhur māsy aktūn pari dyotaniṃ carato ajasrā
GV00avs___u:8871: (AVŚ_18,1.36a) yasmin devā manmani saṃcaranty apīcye na vayam asya vidma |
GV00avs___u:8872: (AVŚ_18,1.36c) mitro no atrāditir anāgānt savitā devo varuṇāya vocat ||36||
GV00avs___u:8875: (AVŚ_18,1.38a) śavasā hy asi śruto vṛtrahatyena vṛtrahā |
GV00avs___u:8877: (AVŚ_18,1.39a) stego na kṣām aty eṣi pṛthivīṃ mahī no vātā iha vāntu bhūmau |
GV00avs___u:8878: (AVŚ_18,1.39c) mitro no atra varuṇo yujamāno agnir vane na vy asṛṣṭa śokam ||39||
GV00avs___u:8879: (AVŚ_18,1.40a) stuhi śrutaṃ gartasadaṃ janānāṃ rājānaṃ bhīmam upahatnum ugram |
GV00avs___u:8880: (AVŚ_18,1.40c) mṛḍā jaritre rudra stavāno anyam asmat te ni vapantu senyam
GV00avs___u:8881: (AVŚ_18,1.41a) sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne |
GV00avs___u:8882: (AVŚ_18,1.41c) sarasvatīṃ sukṛto havante sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryaṃ dāt
GV00avs___u:8883: (AVŚ_18,1.42a) sarasvatīṃ pitaro havante dakṣinā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ |
GV00avs___u:8884: (AVŚ_18,1.42c) āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam anamīvā iṣa ā dhehy asme ||42||
GV00avs___u:8885: (AVŚ_18,1.43a) sarasvati yā sarathaṃ yayāthokthaiḥ svadhābhir devi
GV00avs___u:8887: (AVŚ_18,1.43c) sahasrārgham iḍo atra bhāgaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamānāya dhehi ||43||
GV00avs___u:8888: (AVŚ_18,1.44a) ud īratām avara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8889: (AVŚ_18,1.44c) asuṃ ya īyur avṛkā ṛtajñās te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu ||44||
GV00avs___u:8890: (AVŚ_18,1.45a) āhaṃ pitṝnt suvidatrāṃ avitsi napātaṃ ca vikramaṇaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ |
GV00avs___u:8891: (AVŚ_18,1.45c) barhiṣado ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvas ta ihāgamiṣṭhāḥ ||45||
GV00avs___u:8892: (AVŚ_18,1.46a) idaṃ pitṛbhyo namo astv adya ye pūrvāso ye aparāsa īyuḥ |
GV00avs___u:8893: (AVŚ_18,1.46c) ye pārthive rajasy ā niṣaktā ye vā nūnaṃ suvṛjanāsu dikṣu
GV00avs___u:8894: (AVŚ_18,1.47a) mātalī kavyair yamo aṅgirobhir bṛhaspatir ṛkvabhir
GV00avs___u:8896: (AVŚ_18,1.47c) yāṃś ca devā vāvṛdhur ye ca devāṃs te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu ||47||
GV00avs___u:8897: (AVŚ_18,1.48a) svāduṣ kilāyaṃ madhumāṃ utāyaṃ tīvraḥ kilāyaṃ rasavāṃ utāyam |
GV00avs___u:8898: (AVŚ_18,1.48c) uto nv asya papivāṃsam indraṃ na kaś cana sahata āhaveṣu
GV00avs___u:8899: (AVŚ_18,1.49a) pareyivāṃsaṃ pravato mahīr iti bahubhyaḥ panthām
GV00avs___u:8901: (AVŚ_18,1.49c) vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃ rājānaṃ haviṣā
GV00avs___u:8903: (AVŚ_18,1.50a) yamo no gātuṃ prathamo viveda naiṣā gavyūtir apabhartavā u
GV00avs___u:8904: (AVŚ_18,1.50c) yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretā enā jajñānāḥ pathyā anu svāḥ
GV00avs___u:8905: (AVŚ_18,1.51a) barhiṣadaḥ pitara ūty arvāg imā vo havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam |
GV00avs___u:8906: (AVŚ_18,1.51c) ta ā gatāvasā śaṃtamenādhā naḥ śaṃ yor arapo dadhāta ||51||
GV00avs___u:8907: (AVŚ_18,1.52a) ācyā jānu dakṣiṇato niṣadyedaṃ no havir abhi gṛṇantu viśve
GV00avs___u:8908: (AVŚ_18,1.52c) mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cin no yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma ||52||
GV00avs___u:8909: (AVŚ_18,1.53a) tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatuṃ kṛṇoti tenedaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ sam eti |
GV00avs___u:8910: (AVŚ_18,1.53c) yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā maho jāyā vivasvato nanāśa ||53||
GV00avs___u:8911: (AVŚ_18,1.54a) prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūryāṇair yenā te pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ |
GV00avs___u:8912: (AVŚ_18,1.54c) ubhā rājānau svadhayā madantau yamaṃ paśyāsi varuṇaṃ ca devam ||54||
GV00avs___u:8913: (AVŚ_18,1.55a) apeta vīta vi ca sarpatāto 'smā etaṃ pitaro lokam akran |
GV00avs___u:8914: (AVŚ_18,1.55c) ahobhir adbhir aktubhir vyaktaṃ yamo dadāty avasānam asmai ||55||
GV00avs___u:8916: (AVŚ_18,1.56c) uśann uśata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave ||56||
GV00avs___u:8918: (AVŚ_18,1.57c) dyumān dyumata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave ||57||
GV00avs___u:8919: (AVŚ_18,1.58a) aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvā atharvāṇo bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8920: (AVŚ_18,1.58c) teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma ||58||
GV00avs___u:8921: (AVŚ_18,1.59a) aṅgirobhir yajñiyair ā gahīha yama vairūpair iha mādayasva |
GV00avs___u:8922: (AVŚ_18,1.59c) vivasvantaṃ huve yaḥ pitā te 'smin barhiṣy ā niṣadya ||59||
GV00avs___u:8923: (AVŚ_18,1.60a) imaṃ yama prastaram ā hi rohāṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8924: (AVŚ_18,1.60c) ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastā vahantv enā rājan haviṣo mādayasva
GV00avs___u:8925: (AVŚ_18,1.61a) ita eta udāruhan divas pṛṣṭhānv āruhan |
GV00avs___u:8926: (AVŚ_18,1.61c) pra bhūrjayo yathā pathā dyām aṅgiraso yayuḥ ||61|| {6}
GV00avs___u:8927: (AVŚ_18,2.1a) yamāya somaḥ pavate yamāya kriyate haviḥ |
GV00avs___u:8928: (AVŚ_18,2.1c) yamaṃ ha yajño gachaty agnidūto araṃkṛtaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:8929: (AVŚ_18,2.2a) yamāya madhumattamaṃ juhotā pra ca tiṣṭhata |
GV00avs___u:8930: (AVŚ_18,2.2c) idaṃ nama ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ
GV00avs___u:8931: (AVŚ_18,2.3a) yamāya ghṛtavat payo rājñe havir juhotana |
GV00avs___u:8932: (AVŚ_18,2.3c) sa no jīveṣv ā yamed dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase ||3||
GV00avs___u:8933: (AVŚ_18,2.4a) mainam agne vi daho mābhi śūśuco māsya tvacaṃ cikṣipo mā śarīram |
GV00avs___u:8934: (AVŚ_18,2.4c) śṛtaṃ yadā karasi jātavedo 'them enaṃ pra hiṇutāt pitṝṃr upa ||4||
GV00avs___u:8935: (AVŚ_18,2.5a) yadā śṛtaṃ kṛṇavo jātavedo 'themam enaṃ pari dattāt
GV00avs___u:8937: (AVŚ_18,2.5c) yado gachāty asunītim etām atha devānāṃ vaśanīr bhavāti ||5||
GV00avs___u:8938: (AVŚ_18,2.6a) trikadrukebhiḥ pavate ṣaḍ urvīr ekam id bṛhat |
GV00avs___u:8939: (AVŚ_18,2.6c) triṣṭub gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yama ārpitā ||6||
GV00avs___u:8940: (AVŚ_18,2.7a) sūryaṃ cakṣuṣā gacha vātam ātmanā divaṃ ca gacha pṛthivīṃ ca dharmabhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:8941: (AVŚ_18,2.7c) apo vā gacha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:8942: (AVŚ_18,2.8a) ajo bhāgas tapasas taṃ tapasva taṃ te śocis tapatu taṃ te arciḥ |
GV00avs___u:8943: (AVŚ_18,2.8c) yās te śivās tanvo jātavedas tābhir vahainaṃ sukṛtām u lokam
GV00avs___u:8944: (AVŚ_18,2.9a) yās te śocayo raṃhayo jātavedo yābhir āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:8945: (AVŚ_18,2.9c) ajaṃ yantam anu tāḥ sam ṛṇvatām athetarābhiḥ śivatamābhiḥ śṛtaṃ kṛdhi ||9||
GV00avs___u:8946: (AVŚ_18,2.10a) ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyo yas ta āhutaś carati svadhāvān
GV00avs___u:8947: (AVŚ_18,2.10c) āyur vasāna upa yātu śeṣaḥ saṃ gachatāṃ tanvā suvarcāḥ
GV00avs___u:8948: (AVŚ_18,2.11a) ati drava śvānau sārameyau caturakṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā |
GV00avs___u:8949: (AVŚ_18,2.11c) adhā pitṝnt suvidatrāṃ apīhi yamena ye sadhamādaṃ madanti ||11||
GV00avs___u:8950: (AVŚ_18,2.12a) yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau caturakṣau pathiṣadī nṛcakṣasā |
GV00avs___u:8951: (AVŚ_18,2.12c) tābhyāṃ rājan pari dhehy enaṃ svasty asmā anamīvaṃ ca dhehi
GV00avs___u:8952: (AVŚ_18,2.13a) urūṇasāv asutṛpāv udumbalau yamasya dūtau carato janāṃ anu |
GV00avs___u:8953: (AVŚ_18,2.13c) tāv asmabhyaṃ dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adyeha bhadram ||13||
GV00avs___u:8954: (AVŚ_18,2.14a) soma ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtam eka upāsate |
GV00avs___u:8955: (AVŚ_18,2.14c) yebhyo madhu pradhāvati tāṃś cid evāpi gachatāt ||14||
GV00avs___u:8956: (AVŚ_18,2.15a) ye cit pūrva ṛtasātā ṛtajātā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8957: (AVŚ_18,2.15c) ṛṣīn tapasvato yama tapojāṃ api gachatāt ||15||
GV00avs___u:8958: (AVŚ_18,2.16a) tapasā ye anādhṛṣyās tapasā ye svar yayuḥ |
GV00avs___u:8959: (AVŚ_18,2.16c) tapo ye cakrire mahas tāṃś cid evāpi gachatāt ||16||
GV00avs___u:8960: (AVŚ_18,2.17a) ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāso ye svar tanūtyajaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8961: (AVŚ_18,2.17c) ye vā sahasradakṣiṇās tāṃ cid evāpi gachatāt ||17||
GV00avs___u:8963: (AVŚ_18,2.18c) ṛṣīn tapasvato yama tapojāṃ api gachatāt ||18||
GV00avs___u:8966: (AVŚ_18,2.20a) asaṃbādhe pṛthivyā urau loke ni dhīyasva |
GV00avs___u:8967: (AVŚ_18,2.20c) svadhā yāś cakṛṣe jīvan tās te santu madhuścutaḥ ||20|| {8}
GV00avs___u:8968: (AVŚ_18,2.21a) hvayāmi te manasā mana ihemān gṛhām upa jujuṣāṇa ehi |
GV00avs___u:8969: (AVŚ_18,2.21c) saṃ gachasva pitṛbhiḥ saṃ yamena syonās tvā vātā upa vāntu śagmāḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:8970: (AVŚ_18,2.22a) ut tvā vahantu maruta udavāhā udaprutaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8971: (AVŚ_18,2.22c) ajena kṛṇvantaḥ śītaṃ varṣeṇokṣantu bāl iti ||22||
GV00avs___u:8972: (AVŚ_18,2.23a) ud ahvam āyur āyuṣe kratve dakṣāya jīvase |
GV00avs___u:8973: (AVŚ_18,2.23c) svān gachatu te mano adhā pitṝṃr upa drava ||23||
GV00avs___u:8974: (AVŚ_18,2.24a) mā te mano māsor māṅgānāṃ mā rasasya te |
GV00avs___u:8975: (AVŚ_18,2.24c) mā te hāsta tanvaḥ kiṃ caneha ||24||
GV00avs___u:8976: (AVŚ_18,2.25a) mā tvā vṛkṣaḥ saṃ bādhiṣṭa mā devī pṛthivī mahī |
GV00avs___u:8978: (AVŚ_18,2.26a) yat te aṅgam atihitaṃ parācair apānaḥ prāṇo ya u vā te paretaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8979: (AVŚ_18,2.26c) tat te saṃgatya pitaraḥ sanīḍā ghāsād ghāsaṃ punar ā
GV00avs___u:8981: (AVŚ_18,2.27a) apemaṃ jīvā arudhan gṛhebhyas taṃ nir vahata pari grāmād
GV00avs___u:8983: (AVŚ_18,2.27c) mṛtyur yamasyāsīd dūtaḥ pracetā asūn pitṛbhyo gamayāṃ cakāra ||27||
GV00avs___u:8984: (AVŚ_18,2.28a) ye dasyavaḥ pitṛṣu praviṣṭā jñātimukhā ahutādaś caranti |
GV00avs___u:8985: (AVŚ_18,2.28c) parāpuro nipuro ye bharanty agniṣ ṭān asmāt pra dhamāti
GV00avs___u:8987: (AVŚ_18,2.29a) saṃ viśantv iha pitaraḥ svā naḥ syonaṃ kṛṇvantaḥ pratiranta
GV00avs___u:8989: (AVŚ_18,2.29c) tebhyaḥ śakema haviṣā nakṣamāṇā jyog jīvantaḥ śaradaḥ purūcīḥ ||29||
GV00avs___u:8990: (AVŚ_18,2.30a) yāṃ te dhenuṃ nipṛṇāmi yam u kṣīra odanam |
GV00avs___u:8992: (AVŚ_18,2.31a) aśvāvatīṃ pra tara yā suśevā rkṣākaṃ vā prataraṃ navīyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:8993: (AVŚ_18,2.31c) yas tvā jaghāna vadhyaḥ so astu mā so anyad vidata bhāgadheyam ||31||
GV00avs___u:8994: (AVŚ_18,2.32a) yamaḥ paro 'varo vivasvān tataḥ paraṃ nāti paśyāmi kiṃ cana
GV00avs___u:8995: (AVŚ_18,2.32c) yame adhvaro adhi me niviṣṭo bhuvo vivasvān anvātatāna ||32||
GV00avs___u:8996: (AVŚ_18,2.33a) apāgūhann amṛtāṃ martyebhyaḥ kṛtvā savarṇām adadhur
GV00avs___u:8998: (AVŚ_18,2.33c) utāśvināv abharad yat tad āsīd ajahād u dvā mithunā
GV00avs___u:9000: (AVŚ_18,2.34a) ye nikhātā ye paroptā ye dagdhā ye coddhitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9001: (AVŚ_18,2.34c) sarvāṃs tān agna ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave ||34||
GV00avs___u:9002: (AVŚ_18,2.35a) ye agnidagdhā ye anagnidagdhā madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante |
GV00avs___u:9003: (AVŚ_18,2.35c) tvaṃ tān vettha yadi te jātavedaḥ svadhayā yajñaṃ svadhitiṃ
GV00avs___u:9005: (AVŚ_18,2.36a) śaṃ tapa māti tapo agne mā tanvaṃ tapaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9006: (AVŚ_18,2.36c) vaṇeṣu śuṣmo astu te pṛthivyām astu yad dharaḥ ||36||
GV00avs___u:9007: (AVŚ_18,2.37a) dadāmy asmā avasānam etad ya eṣa āgan mama ced abhūd iha |
GV00avs___u:9008: (AVŚ_18,2.37c) yamaś cikitvān praty etad āha mamaiṣa rāya upa tiṣṭhatām
GV00avs___u:9010: (AVŚ_18,2.38a) imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai |
GV00avs___u:9012: (AVŚ_18,2.39a) premāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai |
GV00avs___u:9014: (AVŚ_18,2.40a) apemāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai |
GV00avs___u:9016: (AVŚ_18,2.41a) vīmāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai |
GV00avs___u:9018: (AVŚ_18,2.42a) nir imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai |
GV00avs___u:9020: (AVŚ_18,2.43a) ud imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai |
GV00avs___u:9022: (AVŚ_18,2.44a) sam imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai |
GV00avs___u:9024: (AVŚ_18,2.45a) amāsi mātrāṃ svar agām āyuṣmān bhūyāsam |
GV00avs___u:9025: (AVŚ_18,2.45c) yathāparaṃ na māsātai śate śaratsu no purā ||45||
GV00avs___u:9026: (AVŚ_18,2.46a) prāṇo apāno vyāna āyuś cakṣur dṛśaye sūryāya |
GV00avs___u:9028: (AVŚ_18,2.47a) ye agravaḥ śaśamānāḥ pareyur hitvā dveṣāṃsy anapatyavantaḥ
GV00avs___u:9029: (AVŚ_18,2.47c) te dyām udityāvidanta lokaṃ nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi dīdhyānāḥ ||47||
GV00avs___u:9031: (AVŚ_18,2.48c) tṛtīyā ha pradyaur iti yasyāṃ pitara āsate ||48||
GV00avs___u:9032: (AVŚ_18,2.49a) ye na pituḥ pitaro ye pitāmahā ya āviviśur urv antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:9033: (AVŚ_18,2.49c) ya ākṣiyanti pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ tebhyaḥ pitṛbhyo namasā vidhema ||49||
GV00avs___u:9034: (AVŚ_18,2.50a) idam id vā u nāparaṃ divi paśyasi sūryam |
GV00avs___u:9035: (AVŚ_18,2.50c) mātā putraṃ yathā sicābhy enaṃ bhūma ūrṇuhi ||50|| {11}
GV00avs___u:9036: (AVŚ_18,2.51a) idam id vā u nāparaṃ jarasy anyad ito 'param |
GV00avs___u:9037: (AVŚ_18,2.51c) jāyā patim iva vāsasābhy enaṃ bhūma ūrṇuhi ||51||
GV00avs___u:9038: (AVŚ_18,2.52a) abhi tvorṇomi pṛthivyā mātur vastreṇa bhadrayā |
GV00avs___u:9039: (AVŚ_18,2.52c) jīveṣu bhadraṃ tan mayi svadhā pitṛṣu sā tvayi ||52||
GV00avs___u:9040: (AVŚ_18,2.53a) agnīṣomā pathikṛtā syonaṃ devebhyo ratnaṃ dadhathur vi lokam |
GV00avs___u:9041: (AVŚ_18,2.53c) upa preṣyantaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ yo vahāty añjoyānaiḥ pathibhis tatra gachatam ||53||
GV00avs___u:9042: (AVŚ_18,2.54a) pūṣā tvetaś cyāvayatu pra vidvān anaṣṭapaśur bhuvanasya gopāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9043: (AVŚ_18,2.54c) sa tvaitebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyo 'gnir devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ ||54||
GV00avs___u:9044: (AVŚ_18,2.55a) āyur viśvāyuḥ pari pātu tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt
GV00avs___u:9045: (AVŚ_18,2.55c) yatrāsate sukṛto yatra ta īyus tatra tvā devaḥ savitā
GV00avs___u:9047: (AVŚ_18,2.56a) imau yunajmi te vahnī asunītāya voḍhave |
GV00avs___u:9048: (AVŚ_18,2.56c) tābhyāṃ yamasya sādanaṃ samitiś cāva gachatāt ||56||
GV00avs___u:9049: (AVŚ_18,2.57a) etat tvā vāsaḥ prathamaṃ nv āgann apaitad ūha yad ihābibhaḥ purā |
GV00avs___u:9050: (AVŚ_18,2.57c) iṣṭāpūrtam anusaṃkrāma vidvān yatra te dattaṃ bahudhā vibandhuṣu ||57||
GV00avs___u:9051: (AVŚ_18,2.58a) agner varma pari gobhir vyayasva saṃ prorṇuṣva medasā pīvasā ca |
GV00avs___u:9052: (AVŚ_18,2.58c) net tvā dhṛṣṇur harasā jarhṛṣāṇo dadhṛg vidhakṣan parīṅkhayātai ||58||
GV00avs___u:9053: (AVŚ_18,2.59a) daṇḍaṃ hastād ādadāno gatāsoḥ saha śrotreṇa varcasā balena |
GV00avs___u:9054: (AVŚ_18,2.59c) atraiva tvam iha vayaṃ suvīrā viśvā mṛdho abhimātīr jayema

GV00avs___u:9069: (AVŚ_18,3.7a) idaṃ ta ekam pura ū ta ekaṃ tṛtīyena jyotiṣā saṃ viśasva |
