GV00avs___u:9210: (AVŚ_18,3.70c) yathā yamasya sādana āsātau vidathā vadan ||70||
GV00avs___u:9211: (AVŚ_18,3.71a) ā rabhasva jātavedas tejasvad dharo astu te |
GV00avs___u:9212: (AVŚ_18,3.71c) śarīram asya saṃ dahāthainaṃ dehi sukṛtām u loke ||71||
GV00avs___u:9213: (AVŚ_18,3.72a) ye te pūrve parāgatā apare pitaraś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:9215: (AVŚ_18,3.73a) etad ā roha vaya unmṛjānaḥ svā iha bṛhad u dīdayante |
GV00avs___u:9216: (AVŚ_18,3.73c) abhi prehi madhyato māpa hāsthāḥ pitṝnāṃ lokaṃ prathamo yo
GV00avs___u:9218: (AVŚ_18,4.1a) ā rohata janitrīṃ jātavedasaḥ pitṛyānaiḥ saṃ va ā rohayāmi |
GV00avs___u:9219: (AVŚ_18,4.1c) avāḍ ḍhavyeṣito havyavāha ījānaṃ yuktāḥ sukṛtāṃ dhatta loke ||1||
GV00avs___u:9220: (AVŚ_18,4.2a) devā yajñam ṛtavaḥ kalpayanti haviḥ puroḍāśaṃ sruco yajñāyudhāni |
GV00avs___u:9221: (AVŚ_18,4.2c) tebhir yāhi pathibhir devayānair yair ījānāḥ svargaṃ yanti lokam ||2||
GV00avs___u:9222: (AVŚ_18,4.3a) ṛtasya panthām anu paśya sādhv aṅgirasaḥ sukṛto yena yanti |
GV00avs___u:9223: (AVŚ_18,4.3c) tebhir yāhi pathibhiḥ svargaṃ yatrādityā madhu bhakṣayanti tṛtīye nāke adhi vi śrayasva ||3||
GV00avs___u:9224: (AVŚ_18,4.4a) trayaḥ suparṇā uparasya māyū nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi viṣṭapi śritāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9225: (AVŚ_18,4.4c) svargā lokā amṛtena viṣṭhā iṣam ūrjaṃ yajamānāya duhrām ||4||
GV00avs___u:9226: (AVŚ_18,4.5a) juhūr dādhāra dyām upabhṛd antarikṣaṃ dhruvā dādhāra pṛthivīṃ pratiṣṭhām |
GV00avs___u:9227: (AVŚ_18,4.5c) pratīmāṃ lokā ghṛtapṛṣṭhāḥ svargāḥ kāmaṃkāmaṃ yajamānāya
GV00avs___u:9229: (AVŚ_18,4.6a) dhruva ā roha pṛthivīṃ viśvabhojasam antarikṣam upabhṛd ā kramasva |
GV00avs___u:9230: (AVŚ_18,4.6c) juhu dyāṃ gacha yajamānena sākaṃ sruveṇa vatsena diśaḥ prapīnāḥ sarvā dhukṣvāhṛṇyamānaḥ
GV00avs___u:9231: (AVŚ_18,4.7a) tīrthais taranti pravato mahīr iti yajñakṛtaḥ sukṛto yena yanti |
GV00avs___u:9232: (AVŚ_18,4.7c) atrādadhur yajamānāya lokaṃ diśo bhūtāni yad akalpayanta
GV00avs___u:9233: (AVŚ_18,4.8a) aṅgirasām ayanaṃ pūrvo agnir ādityānām ayanaṃ gārhapatyo dakṣiṇānām ayanaṃ dakṣiṇāgniḥ
GV00avs___u:9234: (AVŚ_18,4.8c) mahimānam agner vihitasya brahmaṇā samaṅgaḥ sarva upa yāhi śagmaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:9235: (AVŚ_18,4.9a) pūrvo agniṣ ṭvā tapatu śaṃ purastāc chaṃ paścāt tapatu
GV00avs___u:9237: (AVŚ_18,4.9c) dakṣiṇāgniṣ ṭe tapatu śarma varmottarato madhyato antarikṣād diśodiśo agne pari pāhi ghorāt ||9||
GV00avs___u:9238: (AVŚ_18,4.10a) yūyam agne śaṃtamābhis tanūbhir ījānam abhi lokaṃ svargam |
GV00avs___u:9239: (AVŚ_18,4.10c) aśvā bhūtvā pṛṣṭivāho vahātha yatra devaiḥ sadhamādaṃ madanti ||10|| {20}
GV00avs___u:9240: (AVŚ_18,4.11a) śam agne paścāt tapa śaṃ purastāc cham uttarāc cham adharāt tapainam |
GV00avs___u:9241: (AVŚ_18,4.11c) ekas tredhā vihito jātavedaḥ samyag enaṃ dhehi sukṛtām u
GV00avs___u:9243: (AVŚ_18,4.12a) śam agnayaḥ samiddhā ā rabhantāṃ prājāpatyaṃ medhyaṃ jātavedasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9245: (AVŚ_18,4.13a) yajña eti vitataḥ kalpamāna ījānam abhi lokaṃ svargam |
GV00avs___u:9246: (AVŚ_18,4.13c) tam agnayaḥ sarvahutaṃ juṣantāṃ prājāpatyaṃ medhyaṃ
GV00avs___u:9248: (AVŚ_18,4.14a) ījānaś citam ārukṣad agniṃ nākasya pṛṣṭhād divam utpatiṣyan |
GV00avs___u:9249: (AVŚ_18,4.14c) tasmai pra bhāti nabhaso jyotiṣīmānt svargaḥ panthāḥ sukṛte devayānaḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:9250: (AVŚ_18,4.15a) agnir hotādhvaryuṣ ṭe bṛhaspatir indro brahmā dakṣiṇatas te astu |
GV00avs___u:9251: (AVŚ_18,4.15c) huto 'yaṃ saṃsthito yajña eti yatra pūrvam ayanaṃ hutānām
GV00avs___u:9253: (AVŚ_18,4.16c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha ||16||
GV00avs___u:9255: (AVŚ_18,4.17c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha ||17||
GV00avs___u:9257: (AVŚ_18,4.18c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha ||18||
GV00avs___u:9259: (AVŚ_18,4.19c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha ||19||
GV00avs___u:9261: (AVŚ_18,4.20c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha ||20|| {21}
GV00avs___u:9263: (AVŚ_18,4.21c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha ||21||
GV00avs___u:9265: (AVŚ_18,4.22c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha ||22||
GV00avs___u:9267: (AVŚ_18,4.23c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha ||23||
GV00avs___u:9269: (AVŚ_18,4.24c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha ||24||
GV00avs___u:9270: (AVŚ_18,4.25a) apūpāpihitān kumbhān yāṃs te devā adhārayan |
GV00avs___u:9271: (AVŚ_18,4.25c) te te santu svadhāvanto madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ ||25||
GV00avs___u:9272: (AVŚ_18,4.26a) yās te dhānā anukirāmi tilamiśrāḥ svadhāvatīḥ |
GV00avs___u:9273: (AVŚ_18,4.26c) tās te santūdbhvīḥ prabhvīs tās te yamo rājānu manyatām
GV00avs___u:9275: (AVŚ_18,4.28a) drapsaś caskanda pṛthivīm anu dyām imaṃ ca yonim anu yaś ca pūrvaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9276: (AVŚ_18,4.28c) samānaṃ yonim anu samcarantaṃ drapsam juhomy anu sapta hotrāḥ ||28||
GV00avs___u:9277: (AVŚ_18,4.29a) śatadhāraṃ vāyum arkaṃ svarvidaṃ nṛcakṣasas te abhi cakṣate rayim |
GV00avs___u:9278: (AVŚ_18,4.29c) ye pṛnanti pra ca yachanti sarvadā te duhrate dakṣiṇāṃ
GV00avs___u:9280: (AVŚ_18,4.30a) kośaṃ duhanti kalaśaṃ caturbilam iḍāṃ dhenuṃ madhumatīṃ svastaye |
GV00avs___u:9281: (AVŚ_18,4.30c) ūrjaṃ madantīm aditiṃ janeṣv agne mā hiṃsīḥ parame vyoman
GV00avs___u:9282: (AVŚ_18,4.31a) etat te devaḥ savitā vāso dadāti bhartave |
GV00avs___u:9283: (AVŚ_18,4.31c) tat tvaṃ yamasya rājye vasānas tārpyaṃ cara ||31||
GV00avs___u:9284: (AVŚ_18,4.32a) dhānā dhenur abhavad vatso asyās tilo 'bhavat |
GV00avs___u:9285: (AVŚ_18,4.32c) tāṃ vai yamasya rājye akṣitām upa jīvati ||32||
GV00avs___u:9286: (AVŚ_18,4.33a) etās te asau dhenavaḥ kāmadughā bhavantu |
GV00avs___u:9287: (AVŚ_18,4.33c) enīḥ śyenīḥ sarūpā virūpās tilavatsā upa tiṣṭhantu tvātra ||33||
GV00avs___u:9288: (AVŚ_18,4.34a) enīr dhānā hariṇīḥ śyenīr asya kṛṣṇā dhānā rohiṇīr dhenavas
GV00avs___u:9290: (AVŚ_18,4.34c) tilavatsā ūrjam asmai duhānā viśvāhā santv anapasphurantīḥ
GV00avs___u:9291: (AVŚ_18,4.35a) vaiśvānare havir idaṃ juhomi sāhasraṃ śatadhāram utsam |
GV00avs___u:9292: (AVŚ_18,4.35c) sa bibharti pitaraṃ pitāmahān prapitāmahān bibharti
GV00avs___u:9294: (AVŚ_18,4.36a) sahasradhāraṃ śatadhāram utsam akṣitaṃ vyacyamānaṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe |
GV00avs___u:9295: (AVŚ_18,4.36c) ūrjaṃ duhānam anapasphurantam upāsate pitaraḥ svadhābhiḥ
GV00avs___u:9296: (AVŚ_18,4.37a) idaṃ kasāmbu cayanena citaṃ tat sajātā ava paśyateta |
GV00avs___u:9297: (AVŚ_18,4.37c) martyo 'yam amṛtatvam eti tasmai gṛhān kṛṇuta yāvatsabandhu
GV00avs___u:9300: (AVŚ_18,4.39a) putraṃ pautram abhitarpayantīr āpo madhumatīr imāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9301: (AVŚ_18,4.39c) svadhāṃ pitṛbhyo amṛtaṃ duhānā āpo devīr ubhayāṃs tarpayantu ||39||
GV00avs___u:9302: (AVŚ_18,4.40a) āpo agniṃ pra hiṇuta pitṝṃr upemaṃ yajñaṃ pitaro me
GV00avs___u:9304: (AVŚ_18,4.40c) āsīnām ūrjam upa ye sacante te no rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yachān ||40|| {23}
GV00avs___u:9306: (AVŚ_18,4.41c) sa veda nihitān nidhīn pitṝn parāvato gatān ||41||
GV00avs___u:9307: (AVŚ_18,4.42a) yaṃ te manthaṃ yam odananaṃ yan māṃsaṃ nipṛṇāmi te |
GV00avs___u:9308: (AVŚ_18,4.42c) te te santu svadhāvanto madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ ||42||
GV00avs___u:9309: (AVŚ_18,4.43a) yās te dhānā anukirāmi tilamiśrāḥ svadhāvatīḥ |
GV00avs___u:9310: (AVŚ_18,4.43c) tās te santūdbhvīḥ prabhvīs tās te yamo rājānu manyatām
GV00avs___u:9311: (AVŚ_18,4.44a) idaṃ pūrvam aparaṃ niyānaṃ yenā te pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9312: (AVŚ_18,4.44c) purogavā ye abhisāco asya te tvā vahanti sukṛtām u lokam
GV00avs___u:9313: (AVŚ_18,4.45a) sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne |
GV00avs___u:9314: (AVŚ_18,4.45c) sarasvatīṃ sukṛto havante sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryaṃ dāt
GV00avs___u:9315: (AVŚ_18,4.46a) sarasvatīṃ pitaro havante dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9316: (AVŚ_18,4.46c) āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam anamīvā iṣa ā dhehy asme ||46||
GV00avs___u:9317: (AVŚ_18,4.47a) sarasvati yā sarathaṃ yayāthokthaiḥ svadhābhir devi
GV00avs___u:9319: (AVŚ_18,4.47c) sahasrārgham iḍo atra bhāgaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamānāya dhehi ||47||
GV00avs___u:9320: (AVŚ_18,4.48a) pṛthivīṃ tvā pṛthivyām ā veśayāmi devo no dhātā pra tirāty āyuḥ |
GV00avs___u:9321: (AVŚ_18,4.48c) parāparaitā vasuvid vo astv adhā mṛtāḥ pitṛṣu saṃ bhavantu
GV00avs___u:9322: (AVŚ_18,4.49a) ā pra cyavethām apa tan mṛjethāṃ yad vām abhibhā atrocuḥ |
GV00avs___u:9323: (AVŚ_18,4.49c) asmād etam aghnyau tad vaśīyo dātuḥ pitṛṣv ihabhojanau mama
GV00avs___u:9324: (AVŚ_18,4.50a) eyam agan dakṣiṇā bhadrato nā anena dattā sudughā vayodhāḥ
GV00avs___u:9325: (AVŚ_18,4.50c) yauvane jīvān upapṛñcatī jarā pitṛbhya upasaṃparāṇayād imān
GV00avs___u:9326: (AVŚ_18,4.51a) idaṃ pitṛbhyaḥ pra bharāmi barhir jīvaṃ devebhya uttaraṃ stṛṇāmi |
GV00avs___u:9327: (AVŚ_18,4.51c) tad ā roha puruṣa medhyo bhavan prati tvā jānantu pitaraḥ paretam ||51||
GV00avs___u:9328: (AVŚ_18,4.52a) edaṃ barhir asado medhyo 'bhūḥ prati tvā jānantu pitaraḥ paretam |
GV00avs___u:9329: (AVŚ_18,4.52c) yathāparu tanvaṃ saṃ bharasva gātrāṇi te brahmaṇā kalpayāmi ||52||
GV00avs___u:9330: (AVŚ_18,4.53a) parṇo rājāpidhānaṃ carūṇām ūrjo balaṃ saha ojo na āgan |
GV00avs___u:9332: (AVŚ_18,4.54a) ūrjo bhāgo ya imaṃ jajānāśmānnānām ādhipatyaṃ jagāma |
GV00avs___u:9333: (AVŚ_18,4.54c) tam arcata viśvamitrā havirbhiḥ sa no yamaḥ prataraṃ jīvase
GV00avs___u:9335: (AVŚ_18,4.55a) yathā yamāya harmyam avapan pañca mānavāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9336: (AVŚ_18,4.55c) evā vapāmi harmyaṃ yathā me bhūrayo 'sata ||55||
GV00avs___u:9337: (AVŚ_18,4.56a) idaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bibhṛhi yat te pitābibhaḥ purā |
GV00avs___u:9338: (AVŚ_18,4.56c) svargaṃ yataḥ pitur hastaṃ nir mṛḍḍhi dakṣiṇam ||56||
GV00avs___u:9339: (AVŚ_18,4.57a) ye ca jīvā ye ca mṛtā ye jātā ye ca yajñiyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9341: (AVŚ_18,4.58a) vṛṣā matīnāṃ pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ sūro ahnāṃ pratarītoṣasāṃ divaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9342: (AVŚ_18,4.58c) prāṇaḥ sindhūnāṃ kalaśāṃ acikradad indrasya hārdim āviśan manīṣayā ||58||
GV00avs___u:9343: (AVŚ_18,4.59a) tveṣas te dhūma ūrṇotu divi ṣaṃ chukra ātataḥ |
GV00avs___u:9344: (AVŚ_18,4.59c) sūro na hi dyutā tvaṃ kṛpā pāvaka rocase ||59||
GV00avs___u:9345: (AVŚ_18,4.60a) pra vā etīndur indrasya niṣkṛtiṃ sakhā sakhyur na pra
GV00avs___u:9347: (AVŚ_18,4.60c) marya iva yoṣāḥ sam arṣase somaḥ kalaśe śatayāmanā pathā
GV00avs___u:9348: (AVŚ_18,4.61a) akṣann amīmadanta hy ava priyāṃ adhūṣata |
GV00avs___u:9350: (AVŚ_18,4.62a) ā yāta pitaraḥ somyāso gambhīraiḥ pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:9351: (AVŚ_18,4.62c) āyur asmabhyaṃ dadhataḥ prajāṃ ca rāyaś ca poṣair abhi naḥ sacadhvam ||62||
GV00avs___u:9352: (AVŚ_18,4.63a) parā yāta pitaraḥ somyāso gambhīraiḥ pathibhiḥ pūryāṇaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:9353: (AVŚ_18,4.63c) adhā māsi punar ā yāta no gṛhān havir attuṃ suprajasaḥ suvīrāḥ ||63||
GV00avs___u:9354: (AVŚ_18,4.64a) yad vo agnir ajahād ekam aṅgaṃ pitṛlokaṃ gamayaṃ jātavedāḥ
GV00avs___u:9355: (AVŚ_18,4.64c) tad va etat punar ā pyāyayāmi sāṅgāḥ svarge pitaro
GV00avs___u:9357: (AVŚ_18,4.65a) abhūd dūtaḥ prahito jātavedāḥ sāyaṃ nyahna upavandyo nṛbhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:9358: (AVŚ_18,4.65c) prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣann addhi tvaṃ deva prayatā
GV00avs___u:9360: (AVŚ_18,4.66a) asau hā iha te manaḥ kakutsalam iva jāmayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9362: (AVŚ_18,4.67a) śumbhantāṃ lokāḥ pitṛṣadanāḥ pitṛṣadane tvā loka ā sādayāmi ||67||
GV00avs___u:9363: (AVŚ_18,4.68a) ye asmākaṃ pitaras teṣāṃ barhir asi ||68||
GV00avs___u:9364: (AVŚ_18,4.69a) ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ śrathāya |
GV00avs___u:9365: (AVŚ_18,4.69c) adhā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma ||69||
GV00avs___u:9366: (AVŚ_18,4.70a) prāsmat pāśān varuṇa muñca sarvān yaiḥ samāme badhyate yair
GV00avs___u:9368: (AVŚ_18,4.70c) adhā jīvema śaradaṃ śatāni tvayā rājan gupitā rakṣamāṇāḥ ||70|| {26}
GV00avs___u:9373: (AVŚ_18,4.75a) etat te pratatāmaha svadhā ye ca tvām anu ||75||
GV00avs___u:9374: (AVŚ_18,4.76a) etat te tatāmaha svadhā ye ca tvām anu ||76||
GV00avs___u:9379: (AVŚ_18,4.81a) namo vaḥ pitara ūrje namo vaḥ pitaro rasāya ||81||
GV00avs___u:9380: (AVŚ_18,4.82a) namo vaḥ pitaro bhāmāya namo vaḥ pitaro manyave ||82||
GV00avs___u:9381: (AVŚ_18,4.83a) namo vaḥ pitaro yad ghoraṃ tasmai namo vaḥ pitaro yat krūraṃ tasmai ||83||
GV00avs___u:9382: (AVŚ_18,4.84a) namo vaḥ pitaro yac chivaṃ tasmai namo vaḥ pitaro yat syonaṃ tasmai ||84||
GV00avs___u:9383: (AVŚ_18,4.85a) namo vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhā vaḥ pitaraḥ ||85||
GV00avs___u:9384: (AVŚ_18,4.86a) ye 'tra pitaraḥ pitaro ye 'tra yūyaṃ stha yuṣmāṃs te 'nu
GV00avs___u:9386: (AVŚ_18,4.87a) ya iha pitaro jīvā iha vayaṃ smaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9387: (AVŚ_18,4.87c) asmāṃs te 'nu vayaṃ teṣāṃ śreṣṭhā bhūyāsma ||87||
GV00avs___u:9389: (AVŚ_18,4.88c) yad gha sā te panīyasī samid dīdayati dyavi |
GV00avs___u:9391: (AVŚ_18,4.89a) candramā apsv antar ā suparṇo dhāvate divi |
GV00avs___u:9392: (AVŚ_18,4.89c) na vo hiraṇyanemayaḥ padaṃ vindanti vidyuto vittaṃ me asya
GV00avs___u:9394: (AVŚ_19,1.1a) saṃsaṃ sravantu nadyaḥ saṃ vātāḥ saṃ patatriṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9395: (AVŚ_19,1.1c) yajñam imaṃ vardhayatā giraḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi ||1||
GV00avs___u:9396: (AVŚ_19,1.2a) imaṃ homā yajñam avatemaṃ saṃsrāvaṇā uta yajñam imaṃ vardhayatā giraḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi ||2||
GV00avs___u:9398: (AVŚ_19,1.3c) yajñam imaṃ catasraḥ pradiśo vardhayantu saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi ||3||
GV00avs___u:9399: (AVŚ_19,2.1a) śaṃ ta āpo haimavatīḥ śam u te santūtsyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9400: (AVŚ_19,2.1c) śaṃ te saniṣyadā āpaḥ śam u te santu varṣyāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:9401: (AVŚ_19,2.2a) śaṃ ta āpo dhanvanyāḥ śaṃ te santv anūpyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9402: (AVŚ_19,2.2c) śaṃ te khanitrimā āpaḥ śaṃ yāḥ kumbhebhir ābhṛtāḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:9408: (AVŚ_19,2.5c) yathaiva tṛpyate mayas tās ta ā datta bhesajīḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:9409: (AVŚ_19,3.1a) divas pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣād vanaspatibhyo adhy
GV00avs___u:9411: (AVŚ_19,3.1c) yatrayatra vibhṛto jātavedās tata stuto juṣamāṇo na ehi ||1||
GV00avs___u:9412: (AVŚ_19,3.2a) yas te apsu mahimā yo vaneṣu ya oṣadhīṣu paśuṣv apsv antaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9413: (AVŚ_19,3.2c) agne sarvās tanvaḥ saṃ rabhasva tābhir na ehi draviṇodā
GV00avs___u:9415: (AVŚ_19,3.3a) yas te deveṣu mahimā svargo yā te tanuḥ pitṛṣv āviveśa |
GV00avs___u:9416: (AVŚ_19,3.3c) puṣṭir yā te manuṣyeṣu paprathe 'gne tayā rayim asmāsu dhehi
GV00avs___u:9417: (AVŚ_19,3.4a) śrutkarṇāya kavaye vedyāya vacobhir vākair upa yāmi rātim |
GV00avs___u:9418: (AVŚ_19,3.4c) yato bhayam abhayaṃ tan no astv ava devānāṃ yaja heḍo agne ||4||
GV00avs___u:9419: (AVŚ_19,4.1a) yām āhutiṃ prathamām atharvā yā jātā yā havyam akṛṇoj
GV00avs___u:9421: (AVŚ_19,4.1c) tāṃ ta etāṃ prathamo johavīmi tābhiṣ ṭupto vahatu havyam
GV00avs___u:9423: (AVŚ_19,4.2a) ākūtiṃ devīṃ subhagāṃ puro dadhe cittasya mātā suhavā no
GV00avs___u:9425: (AVŚ_19,4.2c) yām āśām emi kevalī sā me astu videyam enāṃ manasi praviṣṭām ||2||
GV00avs___u:9426: (AVŚ_19,4.3a) ākūtyā no bṛhaspata ākūtyā na upā gahi |
GV00avs___u:9427: (AVŚ_19,4.3c) atho bhagasya no dhehy atho naḥ suhavo bhava ||3||
GV00avs___u:9428: (AVŚ_19,4.4a) bṛhaspatir ma ākūtim āṅgirasaḥ prati jānātu vācam etām |
GV00avs___u:9429: (AVŚ_19,4.4c) yasya devā devatāḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ sa supraṇītāḥ kāmo anv etv
GV00avs___u:9431: (AVŚ_19,5.1a) indro rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yad asti
GV00avs___u:9432: (AVŚ_19,5.1c) tato dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaś cid arvāk
GV00avs___u:9434: (AVŚ_19,6.1c) sa bhūmiṃ viśvato vṛtvāty atiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam ||1||
GV00avs___u:9435: (AVŚ_19,6.2a) tribhiḥ padbhir dyām arohat pād asyehābhavat punaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9436: (AVŚ_19,6.2c) tathā vy akrāmad viṣvaṅ aśanānaśane anu ||2||
GV00avs___u:9437: (AVŚ_19,6.3a) tāvanto asya mahimānas tato jyāyāṃś ca pūruṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9438: (AVŚ_19,6.3c) pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripād asyāmṛtaṃ divi ||3||
GV00avs___u:9439: (AVŚ_19,6.4a) puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam |
GV00avs___u:9441: (AVŚ_19,6.5a) yat puruṣaṃ vy adadhuḥ katidhā vy akalpayan |
GV00avs___u:9442: (AVŚ_19,6.5c) mukhaṃ kim asya kim bāhū kim ūrū pādā ucyate ||5||
GV00avs___u:9444: (AVŚ_19,6.6c) madhyaṃ tad asya yad vaiśyaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata ||6||
GV00avs___u:9445: (AVŚ_19,6.7a) candramā manaso jātaś cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata |
GV00avs___u:9446: (AVŚ_19,6.7c) mukhād indraś cāgniś ca prāṇād vāyur ajāyata ||7||
GV00avs___u:9447: (AVŚ_19,6.8a) nābhyā āsīd antarikṣaṃ śīrṣṇo dyauḥ sam avartata |
GV00avs___u:9448: (AVŚ_19,6.8c) padbhyāṃ bhūmir diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā lokāṃ akalpayan ||8||
GV00avs___u:9449: (AVŚ_19,6.9a) virāḍ agre sam abhavad virājo adhi pūruṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9450: (AVŚ_19,6.9c) sa jāto aty aricyata paścād bhūmim atho puraḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:9451: (AVŚ_19,6.10a) yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñam atanvata |
GV00avs___u:9452: (AVŚ_19,6.10c) vasanto asyāsīd ājyaṃ grīṣma idhmaḥ śarad dhaviḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:9453: (AVŚ_19,6.11a) taṃ yajñaṃ prāvṛṣā praukṣan puruṣaṃ jātam agraśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9454: (AVŚ_19,6.11c) tena devā ayajanta sādhyā vasavaś ca ye ||11||
GV00avs___u:9455: (AVŚ_19,6.12a) tasmād aśvā ajāyanta ye ca ke cobhayādataḥ |
GV00avs___u:9456: (AVŚ_19,6.12c) gāvo ha jajñire tasmāt tasmāj jātā ajāvayaḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:9457: (AVŚ_19,6.13a) tasmād yajñāt sarvahuta ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire |
GV00avs___u:9458: (AVŚ_19,6.13c) chando ha jajñire tasmād yajus tasmād ajāyata ||13||
GV00avs___u:9460: (AVŚ_19,6.14c) paśūṃs tāṃś cakre vāyavyān āraṇyā grāmyāś ca ye ||14||
GV00avs___u:9461: (AVŚ_19,6.15a) saptāsyāsan paridhayas triḥ sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9462: (AVŚ_19,6.15c) devā yad yajñaṃ tanvānā abadhnan puruṣaṃ paśum ||15||
GV00avs___u:9463: (AVŚ_19,6.16a) mūrdhno devasya bṛhato aṃśavaḥ sapta saptatīḥ |
GV00avs___u:9465: (AVŚ_19,7.1a) citrāṇi sākaṃ divi rocanāni sarīsṛpāṇi bhuvane javāni |
GV00avs___u:9466: (AVŚ_19,7.1c) turmiśaṃ sumatim ichamāno ahāni gīrbhiḥ saparyāmi nākam
GV00avs___u:9467: (AVŚ_19,7.2a) suhavam agne kṛttikā rohiṇī cāstu bhadraṃ mṛgaśiraḥ śam ārdrā |
GV00avs___u:9468: (AVŚ_19,7.2c) punarvasū sūnṛtā cāru puṣyo bhānur āśleṣā ayanaṃ maghā me
GV00avs___u:9469: (AVŚ_19,7.3a) puṇyaṃ pūrvā phalgunyau cātra hastaś citrā śivā svāti sukho
GV00avs___u:9471: (AVŚ_19,7.3c) rādhe viśākhe suhavānurādhā jyeṣṭhā sunakṣatram ariṣṭa mūlam
GV00avs___u:9472: (AVŚ_19,7.4a) annaṃ pūrvā rāsatāṃ me aṣādhā ūrjaṃ devy uttarā ā vahantu |
GV00avs___u:9473: (AVŚ_19,7.4c) abhijin me rāsatāṃ puṇyam eva śravaṇaḥ śraviṣṭhāḥ kurvatāṃ supuṣṭim ||4||
GV00avs___u:9474: (AVŚ_19,7.5a) ā me mahac chatabhiṣag varīya ā me dvayā proṣṭhapadā suśarma
GV00avs___u:9475: (AVŚ_19,7.5c) ā revatī cāśvayujau bhagaṃ ma ā me rayiṃ bharaṇya ā vahantu ||5||
GV00avs___u:9476: (AVŚ_19,8.1a) yāni nakṣatrāṇi divy antarikṣe apsu bhūmau yāni nageṣu dikṣu
GV00avs___u:9477: (AVŚ_19,8.1c) prakalpayaṃś candramā yāny eti sarvāṇi mamaitāni śivāni santu ||1||
GV00avs___u:9478: (AVŚ_19,8.2a) aṣṭāviṃśāni śivāni śagmāni saha yogaṃ bhajantu me |
GV00avs___u:9479: (AVŚ_19,8.2c) yogaṃ pra padye kṣemaṃ ca kṣemaṃ pra padye yogaṃ ca namo 'horātrābhyām astu
GV00avs___u:9480: (AVŚ_19,8.3a) svastitaṃ me suprātaḥ susāyaṃ sudivaṃ sumṛgaṃ suśakunaṃ me astu |
GV00avs___u:9481: (AVŚ_19,8.3c) suhavam agne svasty amartyaṃ gatvā punar āyābhinandan ||3||
GV00avs___u:9483: (AVŚ_19,8.4c) sarvair me riktakumbhān parā tānt savitaḥ suva ||4||
GV00avs___u:9485: (AVŚ_19,8.5c) śivā te pāpa nāsikāṃ puṇyagaś cābhi mehatām ||5||
GV00avs___u:9486: (AVŚ_19,8.6a) imā yā brahmaṇas pate viṣucīr vāta īrate |
GV00avs___u:9487: (AVŚ_19,8.6c) sadhrīcīr indra tāḥ kṛtvā mahyaṃ śivatamās kṛdhi ||6||
GV00avs___u:9488: (AVŚ_19,8.7a) svasti no astv abhayaṃ no astu namo 'horatrābhyām astu ||7||
GV00avs___u:9489: (AVŚ_19,9.1a) śāntā dyauḥ śāntā pṛthivī śāntam idam urv antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:9490: (AVŚ_19,9.1c) śāntā udanvatīr āpaḥ śāntā naḥ santv oṣadhīḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:9491: (AVŚ_19,9.2a) śāntāni pūrvarūpāṇi śāntaṃ no astu kṛtākṛtam |
GV00avs___u:9492: (AVŚ_19,9.2c) śāntaṃ bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca sarvam eva śam astu naḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:9493: (AVŚ_19,9.3a) iyaṃ yā parameṣṭhinī vāg devī brahmasaṃśitā |
GV00avs___u:9494: (AVŚ_19,9.3c) yayaiva sasṛje ghoraṃ tayaiva śāntir astu naḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:9495: (AVŚ_19,9.4a) idaṃ yat parameṣṭhinaṃ mano vāṃ brahmasaṃśitam |
GV00avs___u:9496: (AVŚ_19,9.4c) yenaiva sasṛje ghoraṃ tenaiva śāntir astu naḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:9497: (AVŚ_19,9.5a) imāni yāni pañcendriyāni manaḥṣaṣṭhāni me hṛdi brahmaṇā saṃśitāni |
GV00avs___u:9498: (AVŚ_19,9.5c) yair eva sasṛje ghoraṃ tair eva śāntir astu naḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:9499: (AVŚ_19,9.6a) śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ viṣṇuḥ śaṃ prajāpatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:9500: (AVŚ_19,9.6c) śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā ||6||
GV00avs___u:9501: (AVŚ_19,9.7a) śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ vivasvāṃ cham antakaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9502: (AVŚ_19,9.7c) utpātāḥ pārthivāntarikṣāḥ śaṃ no divicarā grahāḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:9503: (AVŚ_19,9.8a) śaṃ no bhūmir vepyamānā śam ulkā nirhataṃ ca yat |
GV00avs___u:9504: (AVŚ_19,9.8c) śaṃ gāvo lohitakṣīrāḥ śaṃ bhūmir ava tīryatīḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:9505: (AVŚ_19,9.9a) nakṣatram ulkābhihataṃ śam astu naḥ śaṃ no 'bhicārāḥ śam u santu kṛtyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9506: (AVŚ_19,9.9c) śaṃ no nikhātā valgāḥ śam ulkā deśopasargāḥ śam u no bhavantu ||9||
GV00avs___u:9507: (AVŚ_19,9.10a) śaṃ no grahāś cāndramasāḥ śam ādityaś ca rāhuṇā |
GV00avs___u:9508: (AVŚ_19,9.10c) śaṃ no mṛtyur dhūmaketuḥ śaṃ rudrās tigmatejasaḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:9509: (AVŚ_19,9.11a) śaṃ rudrāḥ śaṃ vasavaḥ śam ādityāḥ śam agnayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9510: (AVŚ_19,9.11c) śaṃ no maharṣayo devāḥ śaṃ devāḥ śaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:9511: (AVŚ_19,9.12a) brahma prajāpatir dhātā lokā vedāḥ saptaṛṣayo 'gnayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9512: (AVŚ_19,9.12c) tair me kṛtaṃ svastyayanam indro me śarma yachatu brahmā me śarma yachatu |
GV00avs___u:9513: (AVŚ_19,9.12e) viśve me devāḥ śarma yachantu sarve me devāḥ śarma yachantu
GV00avs___u:9514: (AVŚ_19,9.13a) yāni kāni cic chāntāni loke saptaṛṣayo viduḥ |
GV00avs___u:9515: (AVŚ_19,9.13c) sarvāṇi śaṃ bhavantu me śaṃ me astv abhayaṃ me astu ||13||
GV00avs___u:9516: (AVŚ_19,9.14a) pṛthivī śāntir antarikṣaṃ śāntir dyauḥ śāntir āpaḥ śāntir oṣadhayaḥ śāntir vanaspatayaḥ śāntir viśve me devāḥ śāntiḥ sarve me devāḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntibhiḥ (AVŚ_19,9.14c) yad iha ghoraṃ yad iha krūraṃ yad iha pāpaṃ tac chāntaṃ tac
GV00avs___u:9517: chivaṃ sarvam eva śam astu naḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:9518: (AVŚ_19,10.1a) śaṃ na indrāgnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śaṃ na indrāvaruṇā rātahavyā |
GV00avs___u:9519: (AVŚ_19,10.1c) śam indrāsomā suvitāya śaṃ yoḥ śaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau
GV00avs___u:9520: (AVŚ_19,10.2a) śaṃ no bhagaḥ śam u naḥ śaṃso astu śaṃ naḥ puraṃdhiḥ śam u santu rāyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9521: (AVŚ_19,10.2c) śaṃ naḥ satyasya suyamasya śaṃsaḥ śaṃ no aryamā purujāto
GV00avs___u:9523: (AVŚ_19,10.3a) śaṃ no dhātā śam u dhartā no astu śaṃ na urūcī bhavatu
GV00avs___u:9525: (AVŚ_19,10.3c) śaṃ rodasī bṛhatī śaṃ no adriḥ śaṃ no devānāṃ suhavāni santu ||3||
GV00avs___u:9526: (AVŚ_19,10.4a) śaṃ no agnir jyotiranīko astu śaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāv aśvinā
GV00avs___u:9528: (AVŚ_19,10.4c) śaṃ naḥ sukṛtāṃ sukṛtāni santu śaṃ na iṣiro abhi vātu vātaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:9529: (AVŚ_19,10.5a) śaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvahūtau śam antarikṣaṃ dṛśaye no astu |
GV00avs___u:9530: (AVŚ_19,10.5c) śaṃ na oṣadhīr vanino bhavantu śaṃ no rajasas patir astu jiṣṇuḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:9531: (AVŚ_19,10.6a) śaṃ na indro vasubhir devo astu śam ādityebhir varuṇaḥ
GV00avs___u:9533: (AVŚ_19,10.6c) śaṃ no rudro rudrebhir jalāṣaḥ śaṃ nas tvaṣṭā gnābhir iha śṛṇotu ||6||
GV00avs___u:9534: (AVŚ_19,10.7a) śaṃ naḥ somo bhavatu brahma śaṃ naḥ śaṃ no grāvāṇaḥ śam u
GV00avs___u:9536: (AVŚ_19,10.7c) śaṃ naḥ svarūnāṃ mitayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ prasvaḥ śam v astu vediḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:9537: (AVŚ_19,10.8a) śaṃ naḥ sūrya urucakṣā ud etu śaṃ no bhavantu pradiśaś catasraḥ |
GV00avs___u:9538: (AVŚ_19,10.8c) śaṃ naḥ parvatā dhruvayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ sindhavaḥ śam u santv āpaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:9539: (AVŚ_19,10.9a) śaṃ no aditir bhavatu vratebhiḥ śaṃ no bhavantu marutaḥ
GV00avs___u:9541: (AVŚ_19,10.9c) śaṃ no viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā no astu śaṃ no bhavitraṃ śam v astu vāyuḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:9542: (AVŚ_19,10.10a) śaṃ no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavantūṣaso vibhātīḥ |
GV00avs___u:9543: (AVŚ_19,10.10c) śaṃ naḥ parjanyo bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śaṃ naḥ kṣetrasya patir astu śaṃbhuḥ
GV00avs___u:9544: (AVŚ_19,11.1a) śaṃ naḥ satyasya patayo bhavantu śaṃ no arvantaḥ śam u santu gāvaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9545: (AVŚ_19,11.1c) śaṃ na ṛbhavaḥ sukṛtaḥ suhastāḥ śaṃ no bhavatu pitaro
GV00avs___u:9547: (AVŚ_19,11.2a) śaṃ no devā viśvadevā bhavantu śaṃ sarasvatī saha dhībhir
GV00avs___u:9549: (AVŚ_19,11.2c) śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śaṃ no divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śaṃ no apyāḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:9550: (AVŚ_19,11.3a) śaṃ no aja ekapād devo astu śam ahir budhnyaḥ śaṃ samudraḥ |
GV00avs___u:9551: (AVŚ_19,11.3c) śaṃ no apāṃ napāt perur astu śaṃ naḥ pṛṣṇir bhavatu devagopā ||3||
GV00avs___u:9552: (AVŚ_19,11.4a) ādityā rudrā vasavo juṣantām idaṃ brahma kriyamāṇaṃ navīyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9553: (AVŚ_19,11.4c) sṛṇvantu no divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:9554: (AVŚ_19,11.5a) ye devānām ṛtvijo yajñiyāso manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9555: (AVŚ_19,11.5c) te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV00avs___u:9556: (AVŚ_19,11.6a) tad astu mitrāvaruṇā tad agne śaṃ yor asmabhyam idam astu śastam |
GV00avs___u:9557: (AVŚ_19,11.6c) aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣṭhāṃ namo dive bṛhate sādanāya ||6||
GV00avs___u:9558: (AVŚ_19,12.1a) uṣā apa svasus tamaḥ saṃ vartayati vartaniṃ sujātatā |
GV00avs___u:9559: (AVŚ_19,12.1c) ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:9560: (AVŚ_19,13.1a) indrasya bāhū sthavirau vṛṣāṇau citrā imā vṛṣabhau pārayiṣṇū |
GV00avs___u:9561: (AVŚ_19,13.1c) tau yokṣe prathamo yoga āgate yābhyāṃ jitam asurāṇāṃ svar
GV00avs___u:9563: (AVŚ_19,13.2a) āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś carṣaṇīnām |
GV00avs___u:9564: (AVŚ_19,13.2c) saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śataṃ senā ajayat sākam indraḥ
GV00avs___u:9566: (AVŚ_19,13.3c) tad indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho nara iṣuhastena vṛṣṇā ||3||
GV00avs___u:9567: (AVŚ_19,13.4a) sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhir vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudha indro
GV00avs___u:9569: (AVŚ_19,13.4c) saṃsṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhy ugradhanvā pratihitābhir astā
GV00avs___u:9570: (AVŚ_19,13.5a) balavijñāyaḥ sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna
GV00avs___u:9572: (AVŚ_19,13.5c) abhivīro abhiṣatvā sahojij jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha govidam ||5||
GV00avs___u:9573: (AVŚ_19,13.6a) imaṃ vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indraṃ sakhāyo anu saṃ
GV00avs___u:9575: (AVŚ_19,13.6c) grāmajitaṃ gojitaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam
GV00avs___u:9577: (AVŚ_19,13.7a) abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dāya ugraḥ śatamanyur indraḥ
GV00avs___u:9578: (AVŚ_19,13.7c) duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḍ ayodhyo 'smākaṃ senā avatu pra yutsu
GV00avs___u:9579: (AVŚ_19,13.8a) bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrāṃ apabādhamānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9580: (AVŚ_19,13.8c) prabhañjaṃ chatrūn pramṛṇann amitrān asmākam edhy avitā tanūnām ||8||
GV00avs___u:9581: (AVŚ_19,13.9a) indra eṣāṃ netā bṛhaspatir dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etu somaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9582: (AVŚ_19,13.9c) devasenānām abhibhañjatīnāṃ jayantīnāṃ maruto yantu madhye
GV00avs___u:9583: (AVŚ_19,13.10a) indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānāṃ marutāṃ śardha ugram |
GV00avs___u:9584: (AVŚ_19,13.10c) mahāmanasāṃ bhuvanacyavānāṃ ghoṣo devānāṃ jayatām ud
GV00avs___u:9586: (AVŚ_19,13.11a) asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣv asmākaṃ yā iṣavas tā jayantu |
GV00avs___u:9587: (AVŚ_19,13.11c) asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantv asmān devāso 'vatā haveṣu
GV00avs___u:9588: (AVŚ_19,14.1a) idam ucchreyo 'vasānam āgāṃ śive me dyāvāpṛthivī abhūtām |
GV00avs___u:9589: (AVŚ_19,14.1c) asapatnāḥ pradiśo me bhavantu na vai tvā dviṣmo abhayaṃ no astu ||1||
GV00avs___u:9590: (AVŚ_19,15.1a) yata indra bhayāmahe tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi |
GV00avs___u:9591: (AVŚ_19,15.1c) maghavaṃ chagdhi tava tvaṃ na ūtibhir vi dviṣo vi mṛdho jahi ||1||
GV00avs___u:9592: (AVŚ_19,15.2a) indraṃ vayam anūrādhaṃ havāmahe 'nu rādhyāsma dvipadā catuṣpadā |
GV00avs___u:9593: (AVŚ_19,15.2c) mā naḥ senā araruṣīr upa gur viṣūcir indra druho vi nāśaya ||2||
GV00avs___u:9595: (AVŚ_19,15.3c) sa rakṣitā caramataḥ sa madhyataḥ sa paścāt sa purastān no astu ||3||
GV00avs___u:9596: (AVŚ_19,15.4a) uruṃ no lokam anu neṣi vidvānt svar yaj jyotir abhayaṃ svasti |
GV00avs___u:9597: (AVŚ_19,15.4c) ugrā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū upa kṣayema śaraṇā bṛhantā
GV00avs___u:9598: (AVŚ_19,15.5a) abhayaṃ naḥ karaty antarikṣam abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime |
GV00avs___u:9599: (AVŚ_19,15.5c) abhayaṃ paścād abhayaṃ purastād uttarād adharād abhayaṃ no astu ||5||
GV00avs___u:9600: (AVŚ_19,15.6a) abhayaṃ mitrād abhayam amitrād abhayaṃ jñātād abhayaṃ puro yaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9601: (AVŚ_19,15.6c) abhayaṃ naktam abhayaṃ divā naḥ sarvā āśā mama mitraṃ
GV00avs___u:9603: (AVŚ_19,16.1a) asapatnaṃ purastāt paścān no abhayaṃ kṛtam |
GV00avs___u:9604: (AVŚ_19,16.1c) savitā mā dakṣiṇata uttarān mā śacīpatiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:9605: (AVŚ_19,16.2a) divo mādityā rakṣatu bhūmyā rakṣantv agnayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9606: (AVŚ_19,16.2c) indrāgnī rakṣatāṃ mā purastād aśvināv abhitaḥ śarma yachatām |
GV00avs___u:9607: (AVŚ_19,16.2e) tiraścīn aghnyā rakṣatu jātavedā bhūtakṛto me sarvataḥ santu varma ||2||
GV00avs___u:9608: (AVŚ_19,17.1a) agnir mā pātu vasubhiḥ purastāt tasmin krame tasmiṃ chraye
GV00avs___u:9610: (AVŚ_19,17.1c) sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||1||
GV00avs___u:9611: (AVŚ_19,17.2a) vāyur māntarikṣeṇaitasyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krame tasmiṃ chraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi
GV00avs___u:9612: (AVŚ_19,17.2c) sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||2||
GV00avs___u:9613: (AVŚ_19,17.3a) somo mā rudrair dakṣiṇāyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krame tasmiṃ
GV00avs___u:9615: (AVŚ_19,17.3c) sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||3||
GV00avs___u:9616: (AVŚ_19,17.4a) varuṇo mādityair etasyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krame tasmiṃ chraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi |
GV00avs___u:9617: (AVŚ_19,17.4c) sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānam pari dade svāhā ||4||
GV00avs___u:9618: (AVŚ_19,17.5a) sūryo mā dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ pratīcyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krame tasmiṃ chraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi |
GV00avs___u:9619: (AVŚ_19,17.5c) sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||5||
GV00avs___u:9620: (AVŚ_19,17.6a) āpo mauṣadhīmatīr etasyā diśaḥ pāntu tāsu krame tāsu śraye
GV00avs___u:9622: (AVŚ_19,17.6c) tā mā rakṣantu tā mā gopāyantu tābhya ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||6||
GV00avs___u:9623: (AVŚ_19,17.7a) viśvakarmā mā saptaṛṣibhir udīcyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krame tasmiṃ chraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi |
GV00avs___u:9624: (AVŚ_19,17.7c) sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||7||

GV00avs___u:9627: (AVŚ_19,17.8c) sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||8||
GV00avs___u:9628: (AVŚ_19,17.9a) prajāpatir mā prajananavānt saha pratiṣṭhayā dhruvāyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krame tasmiṃ chraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi |
GV00avs___u:9629: (AVŚ_19,17.9c) sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||9||
GV00avs___u:9630: (AVŚ_19,17.10a) bṛhaspatir mā viśvair devair ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krame tasmiṃ chraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi |

GV00avs___u:9747: (AVŚ_19,23.30c) bhūtānāṃ brahmā prathamota jajñe tenārhati brahmaṇā
GV00avs___u:9749: (AVŚ_19,24.1a) yena devaṃ savitāraṃ pari devā adhārayan |
GV00avs___u:9750: (AVŚ_19,24.1c) tenemaṃ brahmaṇas pate pari rāṣṭrāya dhattana ||1||
GV00avs___u:9751: (AVŚ_19,24.2a) parīmam indram āyuṣe mahe kṣatrāya dhattana |
GV00avs___u:9752: (AVŚ_19,24.2c) yathainaṃ jarase nayāj jyok kṣatre 'dhi jāgarat ||2||
GV00avs___u:9753: (AVŚ_19,24.3a) parīmam indram āyuṣe mahe śrotrāya dhattana |
GV00avs___u:9754: (AVŚ_19,24.3c) yathainaṃ jarase nayāj jyok śrotre 'dhi jāgarat ||3||
GV00avs___u:9755: (AVŚ_19,24.4a) pari dhatta dhatta no varcasemaṃ jarāmṛtyuṃ kṛṇuta dīrgham āyuḥ |
GV00avs___u:9756: (AVŚ_19,24.4c) bṛhaspatiḥ prāyachad vāsa etat somāya rājñe paridhātavā u ||4||
GV00avs___u:9757: (AVŚ_19,24.5a) jarāṃ su gacha pari dhatsva vāso bhavā gṛṣṭīnām abhiśastipā
GV00avs___u:9759: (AVŚ_19,24.5c) śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ purūcī rāyaś ca poṣam upasaṃvyayasva
GV00avs___u:9760: (AVŚ_19,24.6a) parīdaṃ vāso adhithāḥ svastaye 'bhūr vāpīnām abhiśastipā u
GV00avs___u:9761: (AVŚ_19,24.6c) śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ purūcīr vasūni cārur vi bhajāsi jīvan
GV00avs___u:9764: (AVŚ_19,24.8a) hiraṇyavarṇo ajaraḥ suvīro jarāmṛtyuḥ prajayā saṃ viśasva |
GV00avs___u:9765: (AVŚ_19,24.8c) tad agnir āha tad u soma āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tad indraḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:9766: (AVŚ_19,25.1a) aśrāntasya tvā manasā yunajmi prathamasya ca |
GV00avs___u:9768: (AVŚ_19,26.1a) agneḥ prajātaṃ pari yad dhiraṇyam amṛtaṃ dadhre adhi martyeṣu |
GV00avs___u:9769: (AVŚ_19,26.1c) ya enad veda sa id enam arhati jarāmṛtyur bhavati yo bibharti ||1||
GV00avs___u:9770: (AVŚ_19,26.2a) yad dhiraṇyaṃ sūryeṇa suvarṇam prajāvanto manavaḥ pūrva īṣire |
GV00avs___u:9771: (AVŚ_19,26.2c) tat tvā candraṃ varcasā saṃ sṛjaty āyuṣmān bhavati yo
GV00avs___u:9773: (AVŚ_19,26.3a) āyuṣe tvā varcase tvaujase ca balāya ca |
GV00avs___u:9775: (AVŚ_19,26.4a) yad veda rājā varuṇo veda devo bṛhaspatiḥ |
GV00avs___u:9776: (AVŚ_19,26.4c) indro yad vṛtrahā veda tat ta āyuṣyaṃ bhuvat tat te varcasyaṃ bhuvat ||4||
GV00avs___u:9777: (AVŚ_19,27.1a) gobhiṣ ṭvā pātv ṛṣabho vṛṣā tvā pātu vājibhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:9778: (AVŚ_19,27.1c) vāyuṣ ṭvā brahmaṇā pātv indras tvā pātv indriyaiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:9779: (AVŚ_19,27.2a) somas tvā pātv oṣadhībhir nakṣatraiḥ pātu sūryaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9780: (AVŚ_19,27.2c) mādbhyas tvā candro vṛtrahā vātaḥ prāṇena rakṣatu ||2||
GV00avs___u:9781: (AVŚ_19,27.3a) tisro divas tisraḥ pṛthivīs trīṇy antarikṣāṇi caturaḥ samudrān |
GV00avs___u:9782: (AVŚ_19,27.3c) trivṛtaṃ stomaṃ trivṛta āpa āhus tās tvā rakṣantu trivṛtā
GV00avs___u:9784: (AVŚ_19,27.4a) trīn nākāṃs trīn samudrāṃs trīn bradhnāṃs trīn vaiṣṭapān |
GV00avs___u:9785: (AVŚ_19,27.4c) trīn mātariśvanas trīnt sūryān goptṝn kalpayāmi te ||4||
GV00avs___u:9786: (AVŚ_19,27.5a) ghṛtena tvā sam ukṣāmy agne ājyena vardhayan |
GV00avs___u:9787: (AVŚ_19,27.5c) agneś candrasya sūryasya mā prāṇaṃ māyino dabhan ||5||
GV00avs___u:9788: (AVŚ_19,27.6a) mā vaḥ prāṇaṃ mā vo 'pānaṃ mā haro māyino dabhan |
GV00avs___u:9790: (AVŚ_19,27.7a) prāṇenāgniṃ saṃ sṛjati vātaḥ prāṇena saṃhitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9793: (AVŚ_19,27.8c) prāṇenātmanvatām jīva mā mṛtyor ud agā vaśam ||8||
GV00avs___u:9794: (AVŚ_19,27.9a) devānāṃ nihitaṃ nidhiṃ yam indro 'nvavindat pathibhir devayānaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:9795: (AVŚ_19,27.9c) āpo hiraṇyaṃ jugupus trivṛdbhis tās tvā rakṣantu trivṛtā trivṛdbhiḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:9796: (AVŚ_19,27.10a) trayastriṃśad devatās trīṇi ca vīryāṇi priyāyamāṇā jugupur apsv antaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9797: (AVŚ_19,27.10c) asmiṃś candre adhi yad dhiraṇyaṃ tenāyaṃ kṛṇavad vīryāṇi ||10||

GV00avs___u:9846: (AVŚ_19,30.1a) yat te darbha jarāmṛtyu śataṃ varmasu varma te |
GV00avs___u:9847: (AVŚ_19,30.1c) tenemaṃ varmiṇaṃ kṛtvā sapatnāṃ jahi vīryaiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:9848: (AVŚ_19,30.2a) śataṃ te darbha varmāṇi sahasraṃ vīryāṇi te |
GV00avs___u:9849: (AVŚ_19,30.2c) tam asmai viśve tvāṃ devā jarase bhartavā aduḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:9850: (AVŚ_19,30.3a) tvām āhur devavarma tvāṃ darbha brahmaṇas patim |
GV00avs___u:9851: (AVŚ_19,30.3c) tvām indrasyāhur varma tvaṃ rāṣṭrāṇi rakṣasi ||3||
GV00avs___u:9853: (AVŚ_19,30.4c) maṇiṃ kṣatrasya vardhanaṃ tanūpānaṃ kṛṇomi te ||4||
GV00avs___u:9854: (AVŚ_19,30.5a) yat samudro abhyakrandat parjanyo vidyutā saha |
GV00avs___u:9855: (AVŚ_19,30.5c) tato hiranyayo bindus tato darbho ajāyata ||5||
GV00avs___u:9857: (AVŚ_19,31.1c) paśūṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sphātiṃ goṣṭhe me savitā karat ||1||
GV00avs___u:9858: (AVŚ_19,31.2a) yo no agnir gārhapatyaḥ paśūnām adhipā asat |
GV00avs___u:9859: (AVŚ_19,31.2c) audumbaro vṛṣā maṇiḥ saṃ mā sṛjatu puṣṭyā ||2||
GV00avs___u:9860: (AVŚ_19,31.3a) karīṣiṇīṃ phalavatīṃ svadhām irāṃ ca no gṛhe |
GV00avs___u:9861: (AVŚ_19,31.3c) audumbarasya tejasā dhātā puṣṭiṃ dadhātu me ||3||
GV00avs___u:9862: (AVŚ_19,31.4a) yad dvipāc ca catuṣpāc ca yāny annāni ye rasāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9863: (AVŚ_19,31.4c) gṛhṇe 'haṃ tv eṣāṃ bhūmānaṃ bibhrad audumbaraṃ maṇim ||4||
GV00avs___u:9864: (AVŚ_19,31.5a) puṣṭiṃ paśūnām pari jagrabhāhaṃ catuṣpadāṃ dvipadāṃ yac ca dhānyam |
GV00avs___u:9865: (AVŚ_19,31.5c) payaḥ paśūnāṃ rasam oṣadhīnāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ savitā me ni yachāt ||5||
GV00avs___u:9866: (AVŚ_19,31.6a) ahaṃ paśūnām adhipā asāni mayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir dadhātu |
GV00avs___u:9867: (AVŚ_19,31.6c) mahyam audumbaro maṇir draviṇāni ni yachatu ||6||
GV00avs___u:9868: (AVŚ_19,31.7a) upa maudumbaro maṇiḥ prajayā ca dhanena ca |
GV00avs___u:9869: (AVŚ_19,31.7c) indreṇa jinvito maṇir ā māgant saha varcasā ||7||
GV00avs___u:9871: (AVŚ_19,31.8c) paśor annasya bhūmānaṃ gavāṃ sphātiṃ ni yachatu ||8||
GV00avs___u:9872: (AVŚ_19,31.9a) yathāgre tvaṃ vanaspate puṣṭhyā saha jajñiṣe |
GV00avs___u:9873: (AVŚ_19,31.9c) evā dhanasya me sphātim ā dadhātu sarasvatī ||9||
GV00avs___u:9874: (AVŚ_19,31.10a) ā me dhanaṃ sarasvatī payasphātiṃ ca dhānyam |
GV00avs___u:9875: (AVŚ_19,31.10c) sinīvāly upā vahād ayaṃ caudumbaro maṇiḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:9876: (AVŚ_19,31.11a) tvaṃ maṇīṇām adhipā vṛṣāsi tvayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir jajāna |
GV00avs___u:9877: (AVŚ_19,31.11c) tvayīme vājā draviṇāni sarvaudumbaraḥ sa tvam asmat sahasvārād ārād arātim amatiṃ kṣudhaṃ ca ||11||
GV00avs___u:9878: (AVŚ_19,31.12a) grāmaṇīr asi grāmaṇīr utthāya abhiṣikto 'bhi mā siñca varcasā |
GV00avs___u:9879: (AVŚ_19,31.12c) tejo 'si tejo mayi dhārayādhi rayir asi rayiṃ me dhehi ||12||
GV00avs___u:9880: (AVŚ_19,31.13a) puṣṭir asi puṣṭyā mā sam aṅgdhi gṛhamedhī gṛhapatiṃ mā
GV00avs___u:9882: (AVŚ_19,31.13c) audumbaraḥ sa tvam asmāsu dhehi rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ ni yacha rāyas poṣāya prati muñce ahaṃ tvām ||13||
GV00avs___u:9883: (AVŚ_19,31.14a) ayam audumbaro maṇir vīro vīrāya badhyate |
GV00avs___u:9884: (AVŚ_19,31.14c) sa naḥ saniṃ madhumatīṃ kṛṇotu rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīram ni yachāt ||14||
GV00avs___u:9886: (AVŚ_19,32.1c) darbho ya ugra oṣadhis taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe ||1||
GV00avs___u:9887: (AVŚ_19,32.2a) nāsya keśān pra vapanti norasi tāḍam ā ghnate |
GV00avs___u:9889: (AVŚ_19,32.3a) divi te tūlam oṣadhe pṛthivyām asi niṣṭhitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9891: (AVŚ_19,32.4a) tisro divo aty atṛṇat tisra imāḥ pṛthivīr uta |
GV00avs___u:9892: (AVŚ_19,32.4c) tvayāhaṃ durhārdo jihvāṃ ni tṛṇadmi vacāṃsi ||4||
GV00avs___u:9896: (AVŚ_19,32.6c) sahasva sarvān durhārdaḥ suhārdo me bahūn kṛdhi ||6||
GV00avs___u:9897: (AVŚ_19,32.7a) darbheṇa devajātena divi ṣṭambhena śaśvad it |
GV00avs___u:9898: (AVŚ_19,32.7c) tenāhaṃ śaśvato janāṃ asanaṃ sanavāni ca ||7||
GV00avs___u:9899: (AVŚ_19,32.8a) priyaṃ mā darbha kṛṇu brahmarājanyābhyām śūdrāya cāryāya ca |
GV00avs___u:9900: (AVŚ_19,32.8c) yasmai ca kāmayāmahe sarvasmai ca vipaśyate ||8||
GV00avs___u:9901: (AVŚ_19,32.9a) yo jāyamānaḥ pṛthivīm adṛṃhad yo astabhnād antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca |
GV00avs___u:9902: (AVŚ_19,32.9c) yaṃ bibhrataṃ nanu pāpmā viveda sa no 'yaṃ darbho varuṇo divā kaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:9903: (AVŚ_19,32.10a) sapatnahā śatakāṇḍaḥ sahasvān oṣadhīnāṃ prathamaḥ saṃ
GV00avs___u:9905: (AVŚ_19,32.10c) sa no 'yaṃ darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas tena sākṣīya pṛtanāḥ pṛtanyataḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:9906: (AVŚ_19,33.1a) sahasrārghaḥ śatakāṇḍaḥ payasvān apām agnir vīrudhāṃ
GV00avs___u:9908: (AVŚ_19,33.1c) sa no 'yaṃ darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvato devo maṇir āyuṣā saṃ sṛjāti naḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:9911: (AVŚ_19,33.2c) nudant sapatnān adharāṃś ca kṛṇvan darbhā roha mahatām indriyeṇa ||2||

GV00avs___u:9915: (AVŚ_19,33.4c) ojo devānāṃ balam ugram etat taṃ te badhnāmi jarase
GV00avs___u:9917: (AVŚ_19,33.5a) darbheṇa tvaṃ kṛṇavad vīryāṇi darbhaṃ bibhrad ātmanā mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9918: (AVŚ_19,33.5c) atiṣṭhāya varcasādhānyānt sūrya ivā bhāhi pradiśaś catasraḥ
GV00avs___u:9920: (AVŚ_19,34.1c) dvipāc catuṣpād asmākaṃ sarvaṃ rakṣatu jaṅgidaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:9921: (AVŚ_19,34.2a) yā gṛtsyas tripañcāśīḥ śataṃ kṛtyākṛtaś ca ye |
GV00avs___u:9923: (AVŚ_19,34.3a) arasaṃ kṛtrimaṃ nādam arasāḥ sapta visrasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9926: (AVŚ_19,34.4c) atho sahasvāñ jaṅgiḍaḥ pra na āyumṣi tāriṣat ||4||
GV00avs___u:9927: (AVŚ_19,34.5a) sa jaṅgiḍasya mahimā pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:9928: (AVŚ_19,34.5c) viṣkandhaṃ yena sāsaha saṃskandham oja ojasā ||5||
GV00avs___u:9929: (AVŚ_19,34.6a) triṣ ṭvā devā ajanayan niṣṭhitaṃ bhūmyām adhi |
GV00avs___u:9930: (AVŚ_19,34.6c) tam u tvāṅgirā iti brāhmaṇāḥ pūrvyā viduḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:9931: (AVŚ_19,34.7a) na tvā pūrvā oṣadhayo na tvā taranti yā navāḥ |
GV00avs___u:9934: (AVŚ_19,34.8c) purā ta ugrā grasata upendro vīryaṃ dadau ||8||
GV00avs___u:9935: (AVŚ_19,34.9a) ugra it te vanaspata indra ojmānam ā dadhau |
GV00avs___u:9936: (AVŚ_19,34.9c) amīvāḥ sarvāś cātayaṃ jahi rakṣāṃsy oṣadhe ||9||
GV00avs___u:9939: (AVŚ_19,35.1a) indrasya nāma gṛhṇanta ṛsayo jaṅgidaṃ daduḥ |
GV00avs___u:9940: (AVŚ_19,35.1c) devā yaṃ cakrur bheṣajam agre viṣkandhadūṣaṇam ||1||
GV00avs___u:9941: (AVŚ_19,35.2a) sa no rakṣatu jaṅgiḍo dhanapālo dhaneva |
GV00avs___u:9942: (AVŚ_19,35.2c) devā yaṃ cakrur brāhmaṇāḥ paripāṇam arātiham ||2||
GV00avs___u:9944: (AVŚ_19,35.3c) tāṃs tvaṃ sahasracakṣo pratībodhena nāśaya paripāṇo 'si
GV00avs___u:9946: (AVŚ_19,35.4a) pari mā divaḥ pari mā pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣāt pari mā vīrudbhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9947: (AVŚ_19,35.4c) pari mā bhūtāt pari mota bhavyād diśodiśo jaṅgiḍaḥ pātv
GV00avs___u:9949: (AVŚ_19,35.5a) ya ṛṣṇavo devakṛtā ya uto vavṛte 'nyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9954: (AVŚ_19,36.2c) madhyena yakṣmaṃ bādhate nainaṃ pāpmāti tatrati ||2||
GV00avs___u:9955: (AVŚ_19,36.3a) ye yakṣmāso arbhakā mahānto ye ca śabdinaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9957: (AVŚ_19,36.4a) śataṃ vīrān ajanayac chataṃ yakṣmān apāvapat |
GV00avs___u:9963: (AVŚ_19,37.1a) idaṃ varco agninā dattam āgan bhargo yaśaḥ saha ojo vayo balam |
GV00avs___u:9964: (AVŚ_19,37.1c) trayastriṃśad yāni ca vīryāṇi tāny agniḥ pra dadātu me
GV00avs___u:9965: (AVŚ_19,37.2a) varca ā dhehi me tanvāṃ saha ojo vayo balam |
GV00avs___u:9966: (AVŚ_19,37.2c) indriyāya tvā karmaṇe vīryāya prati gṛhṇāmi śataśāradāya
GV00avs___u:9967: (AVŚ_19,37.3a) ūrje tvā balāya tvaujase sahase tvā |
GV00avs___u:9968: (AVŚ_19,37.3c) abhibhūyāya tvā rāṣṭrabhṛtyāya pary ūhāmi śataśāradāya
GV00avs___u:9970: (AVŚ_19,37.4c) dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje ||4||
GV00avs___u:9971: (AVŚ_19,38.1a) na taṃ yakṣmā arundhate nainaṃ śapatho aśnute |
GV00avs___u:9972: (AVŚ_19,38.1c) yaṃ bheṣajasya gulguloḥ surabhir gandho aśnute ||1||
GV00avs___u:9973: (AVŚ_19,38.2a) viṣvañcas tasmād yakṣmā mṛgā aśvā iverate |
GV00avs___u:9974: (AVŚ_19,38.2c) yad gulgulu saindhavaṃ yad vāpy asi samudriyam ||2||
GV00avs___u:9976: (AVŚ_19,39.1a) aitu devas trāyamāṇaḥ kuṣṭho himavatas pari |
GV00avs___u:9977: (AVŚ_19,39.1c) takmānaṃ sarvaṃ nāśaya sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:9978: (AVŚ_19,39.2a) trīṇi te kuṣṭha nāmāni nadyamāro nadyāriṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:9980: (AVŚ_19,39.2e) yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā ||2||
GV00avs___u:9981: (AVŚ_19,39.3a) jīvalā nāma te mātā jīvanto nāma te pitā |
GV00avs___u:9983: (AVŚ_19,39.3e) yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā ||3||
GV00avs___u:9984: (AVŚ_19,39.4a) uttamo asy oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva |
GV00avs___u:9986: (AVŚ_19,39.4e) yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā ||4||
GV00avs___u:9987: (AVŚ_19,39.5a) triḥ śāmbubhyo aṅgirebhyas trir ādityebhyas pari |
GV00avs___u:9989: (AVŚ_19,39.5e) sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati |
GV00avs___u:9992: (AVŚ_19,39.6e) sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati |
GV00avs___u:9995: (AVŚ_19,39.7e) sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati |
GV00avs___u:9998: (AVŚ_19,39.8e) sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati |
GV00avs___u:9999: (AVŚ_19,39.9a) yaṃ tvā veda pūrva ikṣvāko yaṃ vā tvā kuṣṭha kāmyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10000: (AVŚ_19,39.9c) yaṃ vā vaso yam ātsyas tenāsi viśvabheṣajaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:10001: (AVŚ_19,39.10a) śīrṣaśokaṃ tṛtīyakaṃ sadaṃdir yaś ca hāyanaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10003: (AVŚ_19,40.1a) yan me chidraṃ manaso yac ca vācaḥ sarasvatī manyumantaṃ
GV00avs___u:10005: (AVŚ_19,40.1c) viśvais tad devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ saṃ dadhātu bṛhaspatiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:10006: (AVŚ_19,40.2a) mā na āpo medhāṃ mā brahma pra mathiṣṭana |
GV00avs___u:10007: (AVŚ_19,40.2c) suṣyadā yūyaṃ syandadhvam upahūto 'haṃ sumedhā varcasvī ||2||
GV00avs___u:10008: (AVŚ_19,40.3a) mā no medhāṃ mā no dīkṣāṃ mā no hiṃsiṣṭaṃ yat tapaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10009: (AVŚ_19,40.3c) śivā naḥ śaṃ santv āyuṣe śivā bhavantu mātaraḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:10010: (AVŚ_19,40.4a) yā naḥ pīparad aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamas tiraḥ |
GV00avs___u:10012: (AVŚ_19,41.1a) bhadram ichanta ṛṣayaḥ svarvidas tapo dīkṣām upaniṣedur agre |
GV00avs___u:10013: (AVŚ_19,41.1c) tato rāṣṭraṃ balam ojaś ca jātaṃ tad asmai devā
GV00avs___u:10015: (AVŚ_19,42.1a) brahma hotā brahma yajñā brahmaṇā svaravo mitāḥ |
GV00avs___u:10017: (AVŚ_19,42.2a) brahma sruco ghṛtavatīr brahmaṇā vedir uddhitā |
GV00avs___u:10018: (AVŚ_19,42.2c) brahma yajñasya tattvaṃ ca ṛtvijo ye haviṣkṛtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10020: (AVŚ_19,42.3a) aṃhomuce pra bhare manīṣām ā sutrāvṇe sumatim āvṛṇānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10021: (AVŚ_19,42.3c) imam indra prati havyaṃ gṛbhāya satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:10022: (AVŚ_19,42.4a) aṃhomucaṃ vrṣabhaṃ yajñiyānāṃ virājantaṃ prathamam adhvarāṇam |
GV00avs___u:10023: (AVŚ_19,42.4c) apāṃ napātam aśvinā huve dhiya indriyeṇa ta indriyaṃ dattam
GV00avs___u:10025: (AVŚ_19,43.1a) yatra brahmavido yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha |
GV00avs___u:10026: (AVŚ_19,43.1c) agnir mā tatra nayatv agnir medhā dadhātu me |
GV00avs___u:10028: (AVŚ_19,43.2a) yatra brahmavido yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha |
GV00avs___u:10029: (AVŚ_19,43.2c) vāyur mā tatra nayatu vāyuḥ praṇān dadhātu me vāyave svāhā
GV00avs___u:10030: (AVŚ_19,43.3a) yatra brahmavido yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha |
GV00avs___u:10031: (AVŚ_19,43.3c) sūryo mā tatra nayatu cakṣuḥ sūryo dadhātu me |
GV00avs___u:10033: (AVŚ_19,43.4a) yatra brahmavido yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha |
GV00avs___u:10034: (AVŚ_19,43.4c) candro mā tatra nayatu manaś candro dadhātu me |
GV00avs___u:10036: (AVŚ_19,43.5a) yatra brahmavido yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha |
GV00avs___u:10037: (AVŚ_19,43.5c) somo mā tatra nayatu payaḥ somo dadhātu me |
GV00avs___u:10039: (AVŚ_19,43.6a) yatra brahmavido yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha |
GV00avs___u:10040: (AVŚ_19,43.6c) indro mā tatra nayatu balam indro dadhātu me |
GV00avs___u:10042: (AVŚ_19,43.7a) yatra brahmavido yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha |
GV00avs___u:10043: (AVŚ_19,43.7c) āpo mā tatra nayatv amṛtam mopa tiṣṭhatu |
GV00avs___u:10045: (AVŚ_19,43.8a) yatra brahmavido yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha |
GV00avs___u:10046: (AVŚ_19,43.8c) brahmā mā tatra nayatu brahmā brahma dadhātu me |
GV00avs___u:10049: (AVŚ_19,44.1c) tad āñjana tvaṃ śaṃtāte śam āpo abhayaṃ kṛtam ||1||
GV00avs___u:10051: (AVŚ_19,44.2c) sarvaṃ te yakṣmam aṅgebhyo bahir nir hantv āñjanam ||2||
GV00avs___u:10057: (AVŚ_19,44.5c) vātaḥ prāṇaḥ sūryaś cakṣur divas payaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:10058: (AVŚ_19,44.6a) devāñjana traikakuda pari mā pāhi viśvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:10059: (AVŚ_19,44.6c) na tvā taranty oṣadhayo bāhyāḥ parvatīyā uta ||6||
GV00avs___u:10061: (AVŚ_19,44.7c) amīvāḥ sarvāś cātayan nāśayad abhibhā itaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:10062: (AVŚ_19,44.8a) bahv idaṃ rājan varuṇānṛtam āha pūruṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10063: (AVŚ_19,44.8c) tasmāt sahasravīrya muñca naḥ pary aṃhasaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:10064: (AVŚ_19,44.9a) yad āpo aghnyā iti varuṇeti yad ūcima |
GV00avs___u:10065: (AVŚ_19,44.9c) tasmāt sahasravīrya muñca naḥ pary aṃhasaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:10066: (AVŚ_19,44.10a) mitraś ca tvā varuṇaś cānupreyatur āñjana |
GV00avs___u:10067: (AVŚ_19,44.10c) tau tvānugatya dūraṃ bhogāya punar ohatuḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:10068: (AVŚ_19,45.1a) ṛṇād ṛṇam iva saṃ naya kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛto gṛham |
GV00avs___u:10070: (AVŚ_19,45.2a) yad asmāsu duṣvapnyaṃ yad goṣu yac ca no gṛhe |
GV00avs___u:10071: (AVŚ_19,45.2c) anāmagas taṃ ca durhārdaḥ priyaḥ prati muñcatām ||2||
GV00avs___u:10072: (AVŚ_19,45.3a) apām ūrja ojaso vāvṛdhānam agner jātam adhi jātavedasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10073: (AVŚ_19,45.3c) caturvīraṃ parvatīyaṃ yad āñjanaṃ diśaḥ pradiśaḥ karad ic chivās te ||3||
GV00avs___u:10074: (AVŚ_19,45.4a) caturvīraṃ badhyata āñjanaṃ te sarvā diśo abhayās te bhavantu |
GV00avs___u:10075: (AVŚ_19,45.4c) dhruvas tiṣṭhāsi saviteva cārya imā viśo abhi harantu te
GV00avs___u:10077: (AVŚ_19,45.5a) ākṣvaikaṃ maṇim ekaṃ krṇuṣva snāhy ekenā pibaikam eṣām |
GV00avs___u:10078: (AVŚ_19,45.5c) caturvīraṃ nairṛtebhyaś caturbhyo grāhyā bandhebhyaḥ pari
GV00avs___u:10084: (AVŚ_19,45.8a) somo mā saumyenāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe varcasa ojase |
GV00avs___u:10086: (AVŚ_19,45.9a) bhago ma bhagenāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe varcasa ojase |
GV00avs___u:10088: (AVŚ_19,45.10a) maruto mā gaṇair avantu prāṇāyāpānāyuṣe varcasa ojase tejase |
GV00avs___u:10090: (AVŚ_19,46.1a) prajāpatiṣ ṭvā badhnāt prathamam astṛtaṃ vīryāya kam |
GV00avs___u:10091: (AVŚ_19,46.1c) tat te badhnāmy āyuṣe varcasa ojase ca balāya cāstṛtas
GV00avs___u:10093: (AVŚ_19,46.2a) ūrdhvas tiṣṭhatu rakṣann apramādam astṛtemam mā tvā dabhan paṇayo yātudhānāḥ
GV00avs___u:10094: (AVŚ_19,46.2c) indra iva dasyūn ava dhūnuṣva pṛtanyataḥ sarvāṃ chatrūn vi
GV00avs___u:10096: (AVŚ_19,46.3a) śataṃ ca na praharanto nighnanto na tastire |
GV00avs___u:10097: (AVŚ_19,46.3c) tasminn indraḥ pary adatta cakṣuḥ prāṇam atho balam astṛtas
GV00avs___u:10099: (AVŚ_19,46.4a) indrasya tvā varmaṇā pari dhāpayāmo yo devānām adhirājo babhūva |
GV00avs___u:10100: (AVŚ_19,46.4c) punas tvā devāḥ pra ṇayantu sarve 'stṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu ||4||
GV00avs___u:10101: (AVŚ_19,46.5a) asmin maṇāv ekaśataṃ vīryāṇi sahasraṃ prāṇā asminn astṛte |
GV00avs___u:10102: (AVŚ_19,46.5c) vyāghraḥ śatrūn abhi tiṣṭha sarvān yas tvā pṛtanyād adharaḥ
GV00avs___u:10104: (AVŚ_19,46.6a) ghṛtād ullupto madhumān payasvānt sahasraprāṇaḥ śatayonir
GV00avs___u:10106: (AVŚ_19,46.6c) śambhūś ca mayobhūś corjasvāṃś ca payasvāṃś cāstṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu ||6||
GV00avs___u:10108: (AVŚ_19,46.7c) sajātānām asad vaśī tathā tvā savitā karad astṛtas tvābhi
GV00avs___u:10110: (AVŚ_19,47.1a) ā rātri pārthivaṃ rajaḥ pitur aprāyi dhāmabhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10111: (AVŚ_19,47.1c) divaḥ sadāṃsi bṛhatī vi tiṣṭhasa ā tveṣaṃ vartate tamaḥ
GV00avs___u:10112: (AVŚ_19,47.2a) na yasyāḥ pāraṃ dadṛśe na yoyuvad viśvam asyāṃ ni viśate yad ejati |
GV00avs___u:10113: (AVŚ_19,47.2c) ariṣṭāsas ta urvi tamasvati rātri pāram aśīmahi bhadre pāram aśīmahi ||2||
GV00avs___u:10114: (AVŚ_19,47.3a) ye te rātri nṛcakṣaso draṣṭāro navatir nava |
GV00avs___u:10115: (AVŚ_19,47.3c) aśītiḥ santy aṣṭā uto te sapta saptatiḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:10116: (AVŚ_19,47.4a) ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ ca revati pañcāśat pañca sumnayi |
GV00avs___u:10117: (AVŚ_19,47.4c) catvāraś catvāriṃśac ca trayas triṃśac ca vājini ||4||
GV00avs___u:10118: (AVŚ_19,47.5a) dvau ca te viṃśatiś ca te rātry ekādaśāvamāḥ |
GV00avs___u:10119: (AVŚ_19,47.5c) tebhir no adya pāyubhir nu pāhi duhitar divaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:10120: (AVŚ_19,47.6a) rakṣā mākir no aghaśaṃsa īśata mā no duḥśaṃsa īśata |
GV00avs___u:10121: (AVŚ_19,47.6c) mā no adya gavāṃ steno māvīnāṃ vṛka īśata ||6||
GV00avs___u:10122: (AVŚ_19,47.7a) māśvānāṃ bhadre taskaro mā nṛṇāṃ yātudhānyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10125: (AVŚ_19,47.8a) adha rātri tṛṣṭadhūmam aśīrṣāṇam ahiṃ kṛṇu |
GV00avs___u:10126: (AVŚ_19,47.8c) hanū vṛkasya jambhayā stenaṃ drupade jahi ||8||
GV00avs___u:10129: (AVŚ_19,48.1a) atho yāni ca yasmā ha yāni cāntaḥ parīṇahi |
GV00avs___u:10131: (AVŚ_19,48.2a) rātri mātar uṣase naḥ pari dehi |
GV00avs___u:10132: (AVŚ_19,48.2c) uṣā no ahne pari dadātv ahas tubhyaṃ vibhāvari ||2||
GV00avs___u:10133: (AVŚ_19,48.3a) yat kiṃ cedaṃ patayati yat kiṃ cedaṃ sarīsṛpam |
GV00avs___u:10134: (AVŚ_19,48.3c) yat kiṃ ca parvatāyāsatvaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ rātri pāhi naḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:10135: (AVŚ_19,48.4a) sā paścāt pāhi sā puraḥ sottarād adharād uta |
GV00avs___u:10136: (AVŚ_19,48.4c) gopāya no vibhāvari stotāras ta iha smasi ||4||
GV00avs___u:10137: (AVŚ_19,48.5a) ye rātrim anutiṣṭhanti ye ca bhūteṣu jāgrati |
GV00avs___u:10138: (AVŚ_19,48.5c) paśūn ye sarvān rakṣanti te na ātmasu jāgrati te naḥ paśuṣu jāgrati ||5||
GV00avs___u:10139: (AVŚ_19,48.6a) veda vai rātri te nāma ghṛtācī nāma vā asi |
GV00avs___u:10140: (AVŚ_19,48.6c) tāṃ tvāṃ bharadvājo veda sā no vitte 'dhi jāgrati ||6||
GV00avs___u:10141: (AVŚ_19,49.1a) iṣirā yoṣā yuvatir damūnā rātrī devasya savitur bhagasya |
GV00avs___u:10142: (AVŚ_19,49.1c) aśvakṣabhā suhavā saṃbhṛtaśrīr ā paprau dyāvāpṛthivī
GV00avs___u:10144: (AVŚ_19,49.2a) ati viśvāny aruhad gambhiro varṣiṣṭham aruhanta śraviṣṭhāḥ
GV00avs___u:10145: (AVŚ_19,49.2c) uśatī rātry anu sā bhadrābhi tiṣṭhate mitra iva svadhābhiḥ
GV00avs___u:10146: (AVŚ_19,49.3a) varye vande subhage sujāta ājagan rātri sumanā iha syām |
GV00avs___u:10147: (AVŚ_19,49.3c) asmāṃs trāyasva naryāṇi jātā atho yāni gavyāni puṣṭyā ||3||
GV00avs___u:10148: (AVŚ_19,49.4a) siṃhasya rātry uśatī pīṃṣasya vyāghrasya dvīpino varca ā dade |
GV00avs___u:10149: (AVŚ_19,49.4c) aśvasya bradhnaṃ puruṣasya māyuṃ puru rūpāṇi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī ||4||
GV00avs___u:10150: (AVŚ_19,49.5a) śivāṃ rātrim anusūryaṃ ca himasya mātā suhavā no astu |
GV00avs___u:10151: (AVŚ_19,49.5c) asya stomasya subhage ni bodha yena tvā vande viśvāsu dikṣu
GV00avs___u:10152: (AVŚ_19,49.6a) stomasya no vibhāvari rātri rājeva joṣase |
GV00avs___u:10153: (AVŚ_19,49.6c) asāma sarvavīrā bhavāma sarvavedaso vyuchantīr anūṣasaḥ
GV00avs___u:10154: (AVŚ_19,49.7a) śamyā ha nāma dadhiṣe mama dipsanti ye dhanā |
GV00avs___u:10155: (AVŚ_19,49.7c) rātrīhi tān asutapā ya steno na vidyate yat punar na vidyate ||7||
GV00avs___u:10156: (AVŚ_19,49.8a) bhadrāsi rātri camaso na viṣṭo viṣvaṅ gorūpaṃ yuvatir bibharṣi |
GV00avs___u:10157: (AVŚ_19,49.8c) cakṣuṣmatī me uśatī vapūmṣi prati tvaṃ divyā na kṣām
GV00avs___u:10159: (AVŚ_19,49.9a) yo adya stena āyaty aghāyur martyo ripuḥ |
GV00avs___u:10160: (AVŚ_19,49.9c) rātrī tasya pratītya pra grīvāḥ pra śiro hanat ||9||
GV00avs___u:10161: (AVŚ_19,49.10a) pra pādau na yathāyati pra hastau na yathāśiṣat |
GV00avs___u:10162: (AVŚ_19,49.10c) yo malimlur upāyati sa saṃpiṣṭo apāyati |
GV00avs___u:10164: (AVŚ_19,50.1a) adha rātri tṛṣṭadhūmam aśīrṣāṇam ahiṃ kṛṇu |
GV00avs___u:10165: (AVŚ_19,50.1c) akṣau vṛkasya nir jahyās tena taṃ drupade jahi ||1||
GV00avs___u:10166: (AVŚ_19,50.2a) ye te rātry anaḍvāhas tīkṣṇaśṛṅgāḥ svāśavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10167: (AVŚ_19,50.2c) tebhir no adya pārayāti durgāṇi viśvahā ||2||
GV00avs___u:10169: (AVŚ_19,50.3c) gambhīram aplavā iva na tareyur arātayaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:10171: (AVŚ_19,50.4c) evā rātri pra pātaya yo asmāṃ abhyaghāyati ||4||
GV00avs___u:10172: (AVŚ_19,50.5a) apa stenaṃ vāsayo goajam uta taskaram |
GV00avs___u:10174: (AVŚ_19,50.6a) yad adya rātri subhage vibhajanty ayo vasu |
GV00avs___u:10175: (AVŚ_19,50.6c) yad etad asmān bhojaya yathed anyān upāyasi ||6||
GV00avs___u:10176: (AVŚ_19,50.7a) uṣase naḥ pari dehi sarvān rātry anāgasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10177: (AVŚ_19,50.7c) uṣā no ahne ā bhajād ahas tubhyaṃ vibhāvari ||7||
GV00avs___u:10178: (AVŚ_19,51.1a) ayuto 'ham ayuto ma ātmāyutaṃ me cakṣur ayutaṃ me śrotram |
GV00avs___u:10179: (AVŚ_19,51.1c) ayuto me prāṇo 'yuto me 'pāno 'yuto me vyāno 'yuto 'haṃ
GV00avs___u:10181: (AVŚ_19,51.2a) devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prasūta ā rabhe ||2||
GV00avs___u:10182: (AVŚ_19,52.1a) kāmas tad agre sam avartata manaso retaḥ prathamaṃ yad āsīt
GV00avs___u:10183: (AVŚ_19,52.1c) sa kāma kāmena bṛhatā sayonī rāyas poṣaṃ yajamānāya dhehi
GV00avs___u:10184: (AVŚ_19,52.2a) tvaṃ kāma sahasāsi pratiṣṭhito vibhur vibhāvā sakha ā sakhīyate |
GV00avs___u:10185: (AVŚ_19,52.2c) tvam ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sasahiḥ saha ojo yajamānāya dhehi ||2||
GV00avs___u:10188: (AVŚ_19,52.4a) kāmena mā kāma āgan hṛdayād dhṛdayaṃ pari |
GV00avs___u:10189: (AVŚ_19,52.4c) yad amīṣām ado manas tad aitūpa mām iha ||4||
GV00avs___u:10190: (AVŚ_19,52.5a) yat kāma kāmayamānā idaṃ kṛṇmasi te haviḥ |
GV00avs___u:10191: (AVŚ_19,52.5c) tan naḥ sarvaṃ sam ṛdhyatām athaitasya haviṣo vīhi svāhā
GV00avs___u:10192: (AVŚ_19,53.1a) kālo aśvo vahati saptaraśmiḥ sahasrākṣo ajaro bhūriretāḥ |
GV00avs___u:10193: (AVŚ_19,53.1c) tam ā rohanti kavayo vipaścitas tasya cakrā bhuvanāni viśvā
GV00avs___u:10194: (AVŚ_19,53.2a) sapta cakrān vahati kāla eṣa saptāsya nābhīr amṛtaṃ nv
GV00avs___u:10196: (AVŚ_19,53.2c) sa imā viśvā bhuvanāny añjat kālaḥ sa īyate prathamo nu devaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:10197: (AVŚ_19,53.3a) pūrṇaḥ kumbho 'dhi kāla āhitas taṃ vai paśyāmo bahudhā nu santam |
GV00avs___u:10198: (AVŚ_19,53.3c) sa imā viśvā bhuvanāni pratyaṅ kālaṃ tam āhuḥ parame vyoman
GV00avs___u:10199: (AVŚ_19,53.4a) sa eva saṃ bhuvanāny ābharat sa eva saṃ bhuvanāni pary ait |
GV00avs___u:10200: (AVŚ_19,53.4c) pitā sann abhavat putra eṣāṃ tasmād vai nānyat param asti tejaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:10201: (AVŚ_19,53.5a) kālo 'mūṃ divam ajanayat kāla imāḥ pṛthivīr uta |
GV00avs___u:10202: (AVŚ_19,53.5c) kāle ha bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ceṣitaṃ ha vi tiṣṭhate ||5||
GV00avs___u:10203: (AVŚ_19,53.6a) kālo bhūtim asṛjata kāle tapati sūryaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10204: (AVŚ_19,53.6c) kāle ha viśvā bhūtāni kāle cakṣur vi paśyati ||6||
GV00avs___u:10205: (AVŚ_19,53.7a) kāle manaḥ kāle prāṇaḥ kāle nāma samāhitam |
GV00avs___u:10206: (AVŚ_19,53.7c) kālena sarvā nandanty āgatena prajā imāḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:10207: (AVŚ_19,53.8a) kāle tapaḥ kāle jyeṣṭham kāle brahma samāhitam |
GV00avs___u:10208: (AVŚ_19,53.8c) kālo ha sarvasyeśvaro yaḥ pitāsīt prajāpateḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:10209: (AVŚ_19,53.9a) teneṣitaṃ tena jātaṃ tad u tasmin pratiṣṭhitam |
GV00avs___u:10210: (AVŚ_19,53.9c) kālo ha brahma bhūtvā bibharti parameṣṭhinam ||9||
GV00avs___u:10211: (AVŚ_19,53.10a) kālaḥ prajā asṛjata kālo agre prajāpatim |
GV00avs___u:10212: (AVŚ_19,53.10c) svayaṃbhūḥ kaśyapaḥ kālāt tapaḥ kālād ajāyata ||10||
GV00avs___u:10213: (AVŚ_19,54.1a) kālād āpaḥ sam abhavan kālād brahma tapo diśaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10214: (AVŚ_19,54.1c) kālenod eti sūryaḥ kāle ni viśate punaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:10215: (AVŚ_19,54.2a) kālena vātaḥ pavate kālena pṛthivī mahī |
GV00avs___u:10217: (AVŚ_19,54.3a) kālo ha bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca putro ajanayat purā |
GV00avs___u:10218: (AVŚ_19,54.3c) kālād ṛcaḥ sam abhavan yajuḥ kālād ajāyata ||3||
GV00avs___u:10219: (AVŚ_19,54.4a) kālo yajñaṃ sam airayad devebhyo bhāgam akṣitam |
GV00avs___u:10222: (AVŚ_19,54.5c) imaṃ ca lokaṃ paramaṃ ca lokaṃ puṇyāṃś ca lokān vidhṛtīś ca puṇyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:10223: (AVŚ_19,54.5e) sarvāṃl lokān abhijitya brahmaṇā kālaḥ sa īyate paramo nu
GV00avs___u:10225: (AVŚ_19,55.1a) rātriṃrātrim aprayātaṃ bharanto 'śvāyeva tiṣṭhate ghāsam asmai |
GV00avs___u:10226: (AVŚ_19,55.1c) rāyas poṣeṇa sam iṣā madanto mā te agne prativeśā riṣāma
GV00avs___u:10227: (AVŚ_19,55.2a) yā te vasor vāta iṣuḥ sā ta eṣā tayā no mṛḍa |
GV00avs___u:10228: (AVŚ_19,55.2c) rāyas poṣeṇa sam iṣā madanto mā te agne prativeśā riṣāma
GV00avs___u:10229: (AVŚ_19,55.3a) sāyaṃsāyaṃ gṛhapatir no agniḥ prātaḥprātaḥ saumanasasya
GV00avs___u:10231: (AVŚ_19,55.3c) vasorvasor vasudāna edhi vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvaṃ puṣema
GV00avs___u:10232: (AVŚ_19,55.4a) prātaḥprātar gṛhapatir no agniḥ sāyaṃsāyaṃ saumanasasya
GV00avs___u:10234: (AVŚ_19,55.4c) vasorvasor vasudāna edhīndhānās tvā śataṃhimā ṛdhema ||4||
GV00avs___u:10237: (AVŚ_19,55.5e) sabhyaḥ sabhāṃ me pāhi ye ca sabhyāḥ sabhāsadaḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:10238: (AVŚ_19,55.6a) tvām indrā puruhūta viśvam āyur vy aśnavan |
GV00avs___u:10239: (AVŚ_19,55.6c) aharahar balim it te haranto 'śvāyeva tiṣṭhate ghāsam agne
GV00avs___u:10240: (AVŚ_19,56.1a) yamasya lokād adhy ā babhūvitha pramadā martyān pra yunakṣi
GV00avs___u:10242: (AVŚ_19,56.1c) ekākinā sarathaṃ yāsi vidvānt svapnaṃ mimāno asurasya yonau ||1||
GV00avs___u:10243: (AVŚ_19,56.2a) bandhas tvāgre viśvacayā apaśyat purā rātryā janitor eke ahni |
GV00avs___u:10244: (AVŚ_19,56.2c) tataḥ svapnedam adhy ā babhūvitha bhiṣagbhyo rūpam apagūhamānaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:10246: (AVŚ_19,56.3c) tasmai svapnāya dadhur ādhipatyaṃ trayastriṃśāsaḥ svar
GV00avs___u:10248: (AVŚ_19,56.4a) naitāṃ viduḥ pitaro nota devā yeṣāṃ jalpiś caraty antaredam
GV00avs___u:10249: (AVŚ_19,56.4c) trite svapnam adadhur āptye nara ādityāso varuṇenānuśiṣṭāḥ
GV00avs___u:10250: (AVŚ_19,56.5a) yasya krūram abhajanta duṣkṛto 'svapnena sukṛtaḥ puṇyam āyuḥ |
GV00avs___u:10251: (AVŚ_19,56.5c) svar madasi parameṇa bandhunā tapyamānasya manaso 'dhi
GV00avs___u:10253: (AVŚ_19,56.6a) vidma te sarvāḥ parijāḥ purastād vidma svapna yo adhipā ihā te |
GV00avs___u:10254: (AVŚ_19,56.6c) yaśaśvino no yaśaseha pāhy ārād dviṣebhir apa yāhi dūram
GV00avs___u:10255: (AVŚ_19,57.1a) yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yathā rṇaṃ samnayanti |
GV00avs___u:10256: (AVŚ_19,57.1c) evā duṣvapnyaṃ sarvam apriye saṃ nayāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:10257: (AVŚ_19,57.2a) saṃ rājāno aguḥ sam ṛṇāmy aguḥ saṃ kuṣṭhā aguḥ saṃ kalā aguḥ |
GV00avs___u:10258: (AVŚ_19,57.2c) sam asmāsu yad duṣvapnyaṃ nir dviṣate duṣvapnyaṃ suvāma ||2||
GV00avs___u:10259: (AVŚ_19,57.3a) devānāṃ patnīnāṃ garbha yamasya kara yo bhadraḥ svapna |
GV00avs___u:10260: (AVŚ_19,57.3c) sa mama yaḥ pāpas tad dviṣate pra hiṇmaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10262: (AVŚ_19,57.4a) taṃ tvā svapna tathā saṃ vidma sa tvaṃ svapnāśva iva kāyam aśva iva nīnāham
GV00avs___u:10263: (AVŚ_19,57.4c) anāsmākaṃ devapīyuṃ piyāruṃ vapa yad asmāsu duṣvapnyaṃ yad goṣu yac ca no gṛhe ||4||
GV00avs___u:10264: (AVŚ_19,57.5a) anāsmākas tad devapīyuḥ piyārur niṣkam iva prati muñcatām |
GV00avs___u:10267: (AVŚ_19,58.1a) ghṛtasya jūtiḥ samanā sadevā saṃvatsaraṃ haviṣā vardhayantī
GV00avs___u:10268: (AVŚ_19,58.1c) śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇo 'chinno no astv achinnā vayam āyuṣo varcasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:10269: (AVŚ_19,58.2a) upāsmān prāṇo hvayatām upa prāṇaṃ havāmahe |
GV00avs___u:10270: (AVŚ_19,58.2c) varco jagrāha pṛthivy antarikṣaṃ varcaḥ somo bṛhaspatir vidhattā ||2||
GV00avs___u:10271: (AVŚ_19,58.3a) varcaso dyāvāpṛthivī saṃgrahaṇī babhūvathur varco gṛhītvā
GV00avs___u:10273: (AVŚ_19,58.3c) yaśasam gāvo gopatim upa tiṣṭhanty āyatīr yaśo gṛhītvā pṛthivīm anu saṃ carema ||3||
GV00avs___u:10274: (AVŚ_19,58.4a) vrajaṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ sa hi vo nṛpāṇo varmā sīvyadhvaṃ bahulā
GV00avs___u:10276: (AVŚ_19,58.4c) puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīr adhṛṣṭā mā vaḥ susroc camaso dṛṃhata
GV00avs___u:10278: (AVŚ_19,58.5a) yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtir mukhaṃ ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi |
GV00avs___u:10279: (AVŚ_19,58.5c) imaṃ yajñaṃ vitataṃ viśvakarmaṇā devā yantu sumanasyamānāḥ
GV00avs___u:10280: (AVŚ_19,58.6a) ye devānām ṛtvijo ye ca yajñiyā yebhyo havyaṃ kriyate
GV00avs___u:10282: (AVŚ_19,58.6c) imaṃ yajñaṃ saha patnībhir etya yāvanto devās taviṣā mādayantām ||6||
GV00avs___u:10283: (AVŚ_19,59.1a) tvam agne vratapā asi deva ā martyeṣv ā |
GV00avs___u:10285: (AVŚ_19,59.2a) yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratāni viduṣāṃ devā aviduṣṭarāsaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10286: (AVŚ_19,59.2c) agniṣ ṭad viśvād ā pṛṇātu vidvānt somasya yo brāhmaṇāṃ
GV00avs___u:10288: (AVŚ_19,59.3a) ā devānām api panthām aganma yac chaknavāma tad anupravoḍhum |
GV00avs___u:10289: (AVŚ_19,59.3c) agnir vidvānt sa yajāt sa id dhotā so 'dhvarānt sa ṛtūn kalpayāti ||3||
GV00avs___u:10290: (AVŚ_19,60.1a) vāṅ ma āsan nasoḥ prāṇaś cakṣur akṣṇoḥ śrotraṃ karṇayoḥ |
GV00avs___u:10291: (AVŚ_19,60.1c) apalitāḥ keśā aśoṇā dantā bahu bāhvor balam ||1||
GV00avs___u:10294: (AVŚ_19,61.1a) tanūs tanvā me sahe dataḥ sarvam āyur aśīya |
GV00avs___u:10295: (AVŚ_19,61.1c) syonaṃ me sīda puruḥ pṛṇasva pavamānaḥ svarge ||1||
GV00avs___u:10296: (AVŚ_19,62.1a) priyaṃ mā kṛṇu deveṣu priyaṃ rājasu mā kṛṇu |
GV00avs___u:10297: (AVŚ_19,62.1c) priyaṃ sarvasya paśyata uta śūdra utārye ||1||
GV00avs___u:10298: (AVŚ_19,63.1a) ut tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devān yajñena bodhaya |
GV00avs___u:10299: (AVŚ_19,63.1c) āyuḥ prāṇaṃ prajāṃ paśūn kīrtiṃ yajamānaṃ ca vardhaya ||1||
GV00avs___u:10301: (AVŚ_19,64.1c) sa me śraddhāṃ ca medhāṃ ca jātavedāḥ pra yachatu ||1||
GV00avs___u:10303: (AVŚ_19,64.2c) tathā tvam asmān vardhaya prajayā ca dhanena ca ||2||
GV00avs___u:10304: (AVŚ_19,64.3a) yad agne yāni kāni cid ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi |
GV00avs___u:10305: (AVŚ_19,64.3c) sarvaṃ tad astu me śivaṃ taj juṣasva yaviṣṭhya ||3||
GV00avs___u:10306: (AVŚ_19,64.4a) etās te agne samidhas tvam iddhaḥ samid bhava |
GV00avs___u:10308: (AVŚ_19,65.1a) hariḥ suparṇo divam āruho 'rciṣā ye tvā dipsanti divam utpatantam |
GV00avs___u:10309: (AVŚ_19,65.1c) ava tāṃ jahi harasā jātavedo 'bibhyad ugro 'rciṣā divam ā roha sūrya ||1||
GV00avs___u:10310: (AVŚ_19,66.1a) ayojālā asurā māyino 'yasmayaiḥ pāśair aṅkino ye caranti |
GV00avs___u:10311: (AVŚ_19,66.1c) tāṃs te randhayāmi harasā jātavedaḥ sahasraṛṣṭiḥ sapatnān pramṛṇan pāhi vajraḥ
GV00avs___u:10320: (AVŚ_19,68.1a) avyasaś ca vyacasaś ca bilaṃ vi ṣyāmi māyayā |
GV00avs___u:10321: (AVŚ_19,68.1c) tābhyām uddhṛtya vedam atha karmāṇi kṛṇmahe ||1||
GV00avs___u:10322: (AVŚ_19,69.1a) jīvā stha jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam ||1||
GV00avs___u:10323: (AVŚ_19,69.2a) upajīvā sthopa jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam ||2||
GV00avs___u:10324: (AVŚ_19,69.3a) saṃjīvā stha saṃ jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam ||3||
GV00avs___u:10325: (AVŚ_19,69.4a) jīvalā stha jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam ||4||
GV00avs___u:10326: (AVŚ_19,70.1a) indra jīva sūrya jīva devā jīvā jīvyāsam aham |
GV00avs___u:10328: (AVŚ_19,71.1a) stutā mayā varadā vedamātā pra codayantāṃ pāvamānī dvijānām |
GV00avs___u:10329: (AVŚ_19,71.1c) āyuḥ prāṇaṃ prajāṃ paśuṃ kīrtiṃ draviṇaṃ brahmavarcasam |
GV00avs___u:10331: (AVŚ_19,72.1a) yasmāt kośād udabharāma vedaṃ tasminn antar ava dadhma enam
GV00avs___u:10332: (AVŚ_19,72.1c) kṛtam iṣṭaṃ brahmaṇo vīryeṇa tena mā devās tapasāvateha ||1||
GV00avs___u:10333: (AVŚ_20,1.1a) indra tvā vṛṣabhaṃ vayaṃ sute some havāmahe |
GV00avs___u:10335: (AVŚ_20,1.2a) maruto yasya hi kṣaye pāthā divo vimahasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10339: (AVŚ_20,2.1a) marutaḥ potrāt suṣṭubhaḥ svarkād ṛtunā somaṃ pibantu ||1||
GV00avs___u:10340: (AVŚ_20,2.2a) agnir āgnīdhrāt suṣṭubhaḥ svarkād ṛtunā somaṃ pibatu ||2||
GV00avs___u:10341: (AVŚ_20,2.3a) indro brahmā brāhmaṇāt suṣṭubhaḥ svarkād ṛtunā somaṃ pibatu ||3||
GV00avs___u:10342: (AVŚ_20,2.4a) devo draviṇodāḥ potrāt suṣṭubhaḥ svarkād ṛtunā somaṃ pibatu ||4||
GV00avs___u:10343: (AVŚ_20,3.1a) ā yāhi suṣumā hi ta indra somaṃ pibā imam |
GV00avs___u:10345: (AVŚ_20,3.2a) ā tvā brahmayujā harī vahatām indra keśinā |
GV00avs___u:10347: (AVŚ_20,3.3a) brahmāṇas tvā vayaṃ yujā somapām indra sominaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10349: (AVŚ_20,4.1a) ā no yāhi sutāvato 'smākaṃ suṣṭutīr upa |
GV00avs___u:10351: (AVŚ_20,4.2a) ā te siñcāmi kukṣyor anu gātrā vi dhāvatu |
GV00avs___u:10353: (AVŚ_20,4.3a) svāduṣ ṭe astu saṃsude madhumān tanve tava |
GV00avs___u:10355: (AVŚ_20,5.1a) ayam u tvā vicarṣaṇe janīr ivābhi saṃvṛtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10359: (AVŚ_20,5.3a) indra prehi puras tvaṃ viśvasyeśāna ojasā |
GV00avs___u:10361: (AVŚ_20,5.4a) dīrghas te astv aṅkuśo yenā vasu prayachasi |
GV00avs___u:10363: (AVŚ_20,5.5a) ayaṃ ta indra somo nipūto adhi barhiṣi |
GV00avs___u:10367: (AVŚ_20,5.7a) yas te śṛṅgavṛṣo napāt praṇapāt kuṇḍapāyyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10369: (AVŚ_20,6.1a) indra tvā vṛṣabhaṃ vayaṃ sute some havāmahe |
GV00avs___u:10371: (AVŚ_20,6.2a) indra kratuvidaṃ sutaṃ somaṃ harya puruṣṭuta |
GV00avs___u:10373: (AVŚ_20,6.3a) indra pra ṇo dhitāvānaṃ yajñaṃ viśvebhir devebhir |
GV00avs___u:10375: (AVŚ_20,6.4a) indra somāḥ sutā ime tava pra yanti satpate |
GV00avs___u:10377: (AVŚ_20,6.5a) dadhiṣvā jaṭhare sutaṃ somam indra vareṇyam |
GV00avs___u:10379: (AVŚ_20,6.6a) girvaṇaḥ pāhi naḥ sutaṃ madhor dhārābhir ajyase |
GV00avs___u:10381: (AVŚ_20,6.7a) abhi dyumnāni vanina indraṃ sacante akṣitā |
GV00avs___u:10383: (AVŚ_20,6.8a) arvāvato na ā gahi parāvataś ca vṛtrahan |
GV00avs___u:10385: (AVŚ_20,6.9a) yad antarā parāvatam arvāvataṃ ca hūyase |
GV00avs___u:10387: (AVŚ_20,7.1a) ud ghed abhi śrutāmaghaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ naryāpasam |
GV00avs___u:10389: (AVŚ_20,7.2a) nava yo navatiṃ puro bibheda bāhvojasā |
GV00avs___u:10391: (AVŚ_20,7.3a) sa na indraḥ śivaḥ sakhāśvāvad gomad yavamat |
GV00avs___u:10393: (AVŚ_20,7.4a) indra kratuvidaṃ sutaṃ somaṃ harya puruṣṭuta |
GV00avs___u:10395: (AVŚ_20,8.1a) evā pāhi pratnathā mandatu tvā śrudhi brahma vāvṛdhasvota gīrbhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10396: (AVŚ_20,8.1c) āviḥ sūryaṃ kṛṇuhi pīpihīṣo jahi śatrūṃr abhi gā indra
GV00avs___u:10398: (AVŚ_20,8.2a) arvāṅ ehi somakāmaṃ tvāhur ayaṃ sutas tasya pibā madāya |
GV00avs___u:10399: (AVŚ_20,8.2c) uruvyacā jaṭhara ā vṛṣasva piteva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:10400: (AVŚ_20,8.3a) āpūrṇo asya kalaśaḥ svāhā sekteva kośaṃ siṣice pibadhyai |
GV00avs___u:10401: (AVŚ_20,8.3c) sam u priyā āvavṛtran madāya pradakṣiṇid abhi somāsa indram
GV00avs___u:10402: (AVŚ_20,9.1a) taṃ vo dasmam ṛtīṣaham vasor mandānam andhasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10403: (AVŚ_20,9.1c) abhi vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava indraṃ gīrbhir navāmahe ||1||
GV00avs___u:10404: (AVŚ_20,9.2a) dyukṣaṃ sudānuṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtaṃ giriṃ na purubhojasam |
GV00avs___u:10405: (AVŚ_20,9.2c) kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ makṣū gomantam īmahe
GV00avs___u:10406: (AVŚ_20,9.3a) tat tvā yāmi suvīryaṃ tad brahma pūrvacittaye |
GV00avs___u:10407: (AVŚ_20,9.3c) yenā yatibhyo bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha ||3||
GV00avs___u:10408: (AVŚ_20,9.4a) yenā samudram asṛjo mahīr apas tad indra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10409: (AVŚ_20,9.4c) sadyaḥ so asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yaṃ kṣoṇīr anucakrade ||4||
GV00avs___u:10410: (AVŚ_20,10.1a) ud u te madhumattamā gira stomāsa īrate |
GV00avs___u:10411: (AVŚ_20,10.1c) satrājito dhanasā akṣitotayo vājayanto rathā iva ||1||
GV00avs___u:10412: (AVŚ_20,10.2a) kaṇvā iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryā iva viśvam id dhītam ānaśuḥ |
GV00avs___u:10413: (AVŚ_20,10.2c) indraṃ stomebhir mahayanta āyavaḥ priyamedhāso asvaran
GV00avs___u:10414: (AVŚ_20,11.1a) indraḥ pūrbhid ātirad dāsam arkair vidadvasur dayamāno vi śatrūn |
GV00avs___u:10415: (AVŚ_20,11.1c) brahmajūtas tanvā vāvṛdhāno bhūridātra āpṛṇad rodasī ubhe
GV00avs___u:10416: (AVŚ_20,11.2a) makhasya te taviṣasya pra jūtim iyarmi vācam amṛtāya bhūṣan
GV00avs___u:10417: (AVŚ_20,11.2c) indra kṣitīnām asi mānuṣīṇāṃ viśāṃ daivīnām uta pūrvayāvā ||2||
GV00avs___u:10418: (AVŚ_20,11.3a) indro vṛtram avṛṇoc chardhanītiḥ pra māyinām aminād varpaṇītiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10419: (AVŚ_20,11.3c) ahan vyaṃsam uśadhag vaneṣv āvir dhenā akṛṇod rāmyāṇām ||3||
GV00avs___u:10420: (AVŚ_20,11.4a) indraḥ svarṣā janayann ahāni jigāyośigbhiḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ
GV00avs___u:10421: (AVŚ_20,11.4c) prārocayan manave ketum ahnām avindaj jyotir bṛhate raṇāya ||4||

GV00avs___u:10428: (AVŚ_20,11.7c) vivasvataḥ sadane asya tāni viprā ukthebhiḥ kavayo gṛṇanti ||7||

GV00avs___u:10430: (AVŚ_20,11.8c) sasāna yaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām utemām indraṃ madanty anu dhīraṇāsaḥ ||8||

GV00avs___u:10436: (AVŚ_20,11.11c) śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām ||11||
GV00avs___u:10437: (AVŚ_20,12.1a) ud u brahmāṇy airata śravasyendraṃ samarye mahayā vasiṣṭha |
GV00avs___u:10438: (AVŚ_20,12.1c) ā yo viśvāni śavasā tatānopaśrotā ma īvato vacāṃsi ||1||
GV00avs___u:10439: (AVŚ_20,12.2a) ayāmi ghoṣa indra devajāmir irajyanta yac churudho vivāci |
GV00avs___u:10440: (AVŚ_20,12.2c) nahi svam āyuś cikite janeṣu tānīd aṃhāṃsy ati parṣy asmān
GV00avs___u:10441: (AVŚ_20,12.3a) yuje rathaṃ gaveṣaṇaṃ haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ |
GV00avs___u:10442: (AVŚ_20,12.3c) vi bādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvendro vṛtrāṇy apratī jaghanvān ||3||
GV00avs___u:10443: (AVŚ_20,12.4a) āpaś cit pipyu staryo na gāvo nakṣann ṛtaṃ jaritāras ta indra |
GV00avs___u:10444: (AVŚ_20,12.4c) yāhi vāyur na niyuto no achā tvaṃ hi dhībhir dayase vi vājān ||4||
GV00avs___u:10445: (AVŚ_20,12.5a) te tvā madā indra mādayantu śuṣmiṇaṃ tuvirādhasaṃ jaritre |
GV00avs___u:10446: (AVŚ_20,12.5c) eko devatrā dayase hi martān asmin chūra savane mādayasva
GV00avs___u:10447: (AVŚ_20,12.6a) eved indraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhuṃ vasiṣṭhāso abhy arcanty arkaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10448: (AVŚ_20,12.6c) sa na stuto vīravad dhātu gomad yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:10449: (AVŚ_20,12.7a) ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhas turāṣāṭ chuṣmī rājā vṛtrahā somapāvā |
GV00avs___u:10450: (AVŚ_20,12.7c) yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsad arvāṅ mādhyaṃdine savane matsad indraḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:10451: (AVŚ_20,13.1a) indraś ca somaṃ pibataṃ bṛhaspate 'smin yajñe mandasānā vṛṣaṇvasū |
GV00avs___u:10452: (AVŚ_20,13.1c) ā vāṃ viśantv indavaḥ svābhuvo 'sme rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni
GV00avs___u:10454: (AVŚ_20,13.2a) ā vo vahantu saptayo raghuṣyado raghupatvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10455: (AVŚ_20,13.2c) sīdatā barhir uru vaḥ sadas kṛtaṃ mādayadhvaṃ maruto madhvo
GV00avs___u:10457: (AVŚ_20,13.3a) imaṃ stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva saṃ mahemā manīṣayā |
GV00avs___u:10458: (AVŚ_20,13.3c) bhadrā hi naḥ pramatir asya saṃsady agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava ||3||

GV00avs___u:10462: (AVŚ_20,14.1a) vayam u tvām apūrvya sthūraṃ na kac cid bharanto 'vasyavaḥ
GV00avs___u:10464: (AVŚ_20,14.2a) upa tvā karmann ūtaye sa no yuvograś cakrāma yo dhṛṣat |
GV00avs___u:10465: (AVŚ_20,14.2c) tvām id dhy avitāraṃ vavṛmahe sakhāya indra sānasim ||2||
GV00avs___u:10466: (AVŚ_20,14.3a) yo na idamidaṃ purā pra vasya ānināya tam u va stuṣe |
GV00avs___u:10468: (AVŚ_20,14.4a) haryaśvaṃ satpatiṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sa hi ṣmā yo amandata |
GV00avs___u:10469: (AVŚ_20,14.4c) ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavā śatam
GV00avs___u:10470: (AVŚ_20,15.1a) pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satyaśuṣmāya tavase matiṃ bhare |
GV00avs___u:10471: (AVŚ_20,15.1c) apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharaṃ rādho viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam ||1||
GV00avs___u:10472: (AVŚ_20,15.2a) adha te viśvam anu hāsad iṣṭaya āpo nimneva savanā
GV00avs___u:10474: (AVŚ_20,15.2c) yat parvate na samaśīta haryata indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:10475: (AVŚ_20,15.3a) asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvara uṣo na śubhra ā bharā panīyase |
GV00avs___u:10476: (AVŚ_20,15.3c) yasya dhāma śravase nāmendriyaṃ jyotir akāri harito nāyase ||3||
GV00avs___u:10477: (AVŚ_20,15.4a) ime ta indra te vayaṃ puruṣṭuta ye tvārabhya carāmasi
GV00avs___u:10479: (AVŚ_20,15.4c) nahi tvad anyo girvaṇo giraḥ sadhat kṣoṇīr iva prati no harya tad vacaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:10480: (AVŚ_20,15.5a) bhūri ta indra vīryaṃ tava smasy asya stotur maghavan kāmam ā pṛṇa |
GV00avs___u:10481: (AVŚ_20,15.5c) anu te dyaur bṛhatī vīryaṃ mama iyaṃ ca te pṛthivī nema ojase ||5||
GV00avs___u:10482: (AVŚ_20,15.6a) tvaṃ tam indra parvataṃ mahām uruṃ vajreṇa vajrin parvaśaś
GV00avs___u:10484: (AVŚ_20,15.6c) avāsṛjo nivṛtāḥ sartavā apaḥ satrā viśvaṃ dadhiṣe kevalaṃ sahaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:10485: (AVŚ_20,16.1a) udapruto na vayo rakṣamāṇā vāvadato abhriyasyeva ghoṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:10486: (AVŚ_20,16.1c) giribhrajo normayo madanto bṛhaspatim abhy arkā anāvan
GV00avs___u:10487: (AVŚ_20,16.2a) saṃ gobhir aṅgiraso nakṣamāṇo bhaga ived aryamaṇaṃ nināya |
GV00avs___u:10488: (AVŚ_20,16.2c) jane mitro na dampatī anakti bṛhaspate vājayāśūṃr ivājau ||2||
GV00avs___u:10489: (AVŚ_20,16.3a) sādhvaryā atithinīr iṣirā spārhāḥ suvarṇā anavadyarūpāḥ |
GV00avs___u:10490: (AVŚ_20,16.3c) bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyo vitūryā nir gā ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:10491: (AVŚ_20,16.4a) āpruṣāyan madhunā ṛtasya yonim avakṣipann arka ulkām iva dyoḥ |
GV00avs___u:10492: (AVŚ_20,16.4c) bṛhaspatir uddharann aśmano gā bhūmyā udneva vi tvacaṃ bibheda ||4||
GV00avs___u:10493: (AVŚ_20,16.5a) apa jyotiṣā tamo antarikṣad udnaḥ śīpālam iva vāta ājat |
GV00avs___u:10494: (AVŚ_20,16.5c) bṛhaspatir anumṛśyā valasyābhram iva vāta ā cakra ā gāḥ
GV00avs___u:10495: (AVŚ_20,16.6a) yadā valasya pīyato jasuṃ bhed bṛhaspatir agnitapobhir arkaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10496: (AVŚ_20,16.6c) dadbhir na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādad āvir nidhīṃr akṛṇod usriyāṇām ||6||
GV00avs___u:10497: (AVŚ_20,16.7a) bṛhaspatir amata hi tyad āsāṃ nāma svarīṇāṃ sadane guhā yat
GV00avs___u:10498: (AVŚ_20,16.7c) āṇḍeva bhitvā śakunasya garbham ud usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanājat ||7||
GV00avs___u:10499: (AVŚ_20,16.8a) aśnāpinaddhaṃ madhu pary apaśyan matsyaṃ na dīna udani kṣiyantam |
GV00avs___u:10500: (AVŚ_20,16.8c) niṣ ṭaj jabhāra camasaṃ na vṛkṣād bṛhaspatir viraveṇā vikṛtya ||8||

GV00avs___u:10515: (AVŚ_20,17.3c) tasyed ime pravaṇe sapta sindhavo vayo vardhanti vṛṣabhasya śuṣmiṇaḥ ||3||

GV00avs___u:10520: (AVŚ_20,17.5c) na tat te anyo anu vīryaṃ śakan na purāṇo maghavan nota nūtanaḥ ||5||

GV00avs___u:10526: (AVŚ_20,17.8a) vṛṣā na kruddhaḥ patayad rajaḥsv ā yo aryapatnīr akṛṇod imā apaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10527: (AVŚ_20,17.8c) sa sunvate maghavā jīradānave 'vindaj jyotir manave haviṣmate ||8||

GV00avs___u:10533: (AVŚ_20,17.11a) bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ |
GV00avs___u:10534: (AVŚ_20,17.11c) indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇotu ||11||

GV00avs___u:10536: (AVŚ_20,17.12c) dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:10537: (AVŚ_20,18.1a) vayam u tvā taditarthā indra tvāyantaḥ sakhāyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10539: (AVŚ_20,18.2a) na ghem anyad ā papana vajrinn apaso naviṣṭau |
GV00avs___u:10541: (AVŚ_20,18.3a) ichanti devāḥ sunvantaṃ na svapnāya spṛhayanti |

GV00avs___u:10551: (AVŚ_20,19.2a) arvācīnaṃ su te mana uta cakṣuḥ śatakrato |
GV00avs___u:10553: (AVŚ_20,19.3a) nāmāni te śatakrato viśvābhir gīrbhir īmahe |
GV00avs___u:10557: (AVŚ_20,19.5a) indraṃ vṛtrāya hantave puruhūtam upa bruve |
