GV00avs___u:10563: (AVŚ_20,20.1a) śuṣmintamaṃ na ūtaye dyumninaṃ pāhi jāgṛvim |
GV00avs___u:10565: (AVŚ_20,20.2a) indriyāṇi śatakrato yā te janeṣu pañcasu |
GV00avs___u:10567: (AVŚ_20,20.3a) agann indra śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ dadhiṣva duṣṭaram |
GV00avs___u:10569: (AVŚ_20,20.4a) arvāvato na ā gahy atho śakra parāvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:10570: (AVŚ_20,20.4c) u loko yas te adriva indreha tata ā gahi ||4||
GV00avs___u:10571: (AVŚ_20,20.5a) indro aṅgaṃ mahad bhayam abhi ṣad apa cucyavat |
GV00avs___u:10573: (AVŚ_20,20.6a) indraś ca mṛlayāti no na naḥ paścād aghaṃ naśat |
GV00avs___u:10575: (AVŚ_20,20.7a) indra āśābhyas pari sarvābhyo abhayaṃ karat |
GV00avs___u:10577: (AVŚ_20,21.1a) ny ū ṣu vācaṃ pra mahe bharāmahe gira indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:10578: (AVŚ_20,21.1c) nū cid dhi ratnaṃ sasatām ivāvidan na duṣṭutir draviṇodeṣu
GV00avs___u:10580: (AVŚ_20,21.2a) duro aśvasya dura indra gor asi duro yavasya vasuna inas patiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10581: (AVŚ_20,21.2c) śikṣānaraḥ pradivo akāmakarśanaḥ sakhā sakhibhyas tam idaṃ gṛṇīmasi ||2||
GV00avs___u:10582: (AVŚ_20,21.3a) śacīva indra purukṛd dyumattama taved idam abhitaś cekite vasu |
GV00avs___u:10583: (AVŚ_20,21.3c) ataḥ saṃgṛbhyābhibhūta ā bhara mā tvāyato jarituḥ kāmam ūnayīḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:10584: (AVŚ_20,21.4a) ebhir dyubhir sumanā ebhir indubhir nirundhāno amatiṃ gobhir aśvinā |
GV00avs___u:10585: (AVŚ_20,21.4c) indreṇa dasyuṃ darayanta indubhir yutadveṣasaḥ sam iṣā rabhemahi ||4||
GV00avs___u:10586: (AVŚ_20,21.5a) sam indra rāyā sam iṣā rabhemahi saṃ vājebhiḥ puruścandrair
GV00avs___u:10588: (AVŚ_20,21.5c) saṃ devyā pramatyā vīraśuṣmayā goagrayāśvāvatyā rabhemahi
GV00avs___u:10589: (AVŚ_20,21.6a) te tvā madā amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā te somāso vṛtrahatyeṣu
GV00avs___u:10591: (AVŚ_20,21.6c) yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇy aprati barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:10592: (AVŚ_20,21.7a) yudhā yudham upa ghed eṣi dhṛṣṇuyā purā puraṃ sam idaṃ haṃsy ojasā |
GV00avs___u:10593: (AVŚ_20,21.7c) namyā yad indra sakhyā parāvati nibarhayo namuciṃ nāma māyinam ||7||
GV00avs___u:10594: (AVŚ_20,21.8a) tvaṃ karañjam uta parṇayaṃ vadhīs tejiṣṭhayātithigvasya
GV00avs___u:10596: (AVŚ_20,21.8c) tvaṃ śatā vaṅgṛdasyābhinat puro 'nānudaḥ pariṣūtā ṛjiśvanā ||8||
GV00avs___u:10597: (AVŚ_20,21.9a) tvam etāṃ janarājño dvir daśābandhunā suśravasopajagmuṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10598: (AVŚ_20,21.9c) ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā navatiṃ nava śruto ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadāvṛṇak ||9||
GV00avs___u:10599: (AVŚ_20,21.10a) tvam āvitha suśravasaṃ tavotibhis tava trāmabhir indra tūrvayāṇam |
GV00avs___u:10600: (AVŚ_20,21.10c) tva asmai kutsam atithigvam āyuṃ mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:10601: (AVŚ_20,21.11a) ya udṛcīndra devagopāḥ sakhāyas te śivatamā asāma |
GV00avs___u:10602: (AVŚ_20,21.11c) tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:10603: (AVŚ_20,22.1a) abhi tvā vṛṣabhā sute sutaṃ sṛjāmi pītaye |
GV00avs___u:10605: (AVŚ_20,22.2a) mā tvā mūrā aviṣyavo mopahasvāna ā dabhan |
GV00avs___u:10607: (AVŚ_20,22.3a) iha tvā goparīṇasā mahe mandantu rādhase |
GV00avs___u:10609: (AVŚ_20,22.4a) abhi pra gopatiṃ girendram arca yathā vide |
GV00avs___u:10613: (AVŚ_20,22.6a) indrāya gāva āśiraṃ duduhre vajriṇe madhu |
GV00avs___u:10615: (AVŚ_20,23.1a) ā tū na indra madryag ghuvānaḥ somapītaye |
GV00avs___u:10617: (AVŚ_20,23.2a) satto hotā na ṛtviyas tistire barhir ānuṣak |
GV00avs___u:10619: (AVŚ_20,23.3a) imā brahma brahmavāhaḥ kriyanta ā barhiḥ sīda |
GV00avs___u:10621: (AVŚ_20,23.4a) rārandhi savaneṣu ṇa eṣu stomeṣu vṛtrahan |
GV00avs___u:10623: (AVŚ_20,23.5a) matayaḥ somapām uruṃ rihanti śavasas patim |
GV00avs___u:10625: (AVŚ_20,23.6a) sa mandasvā hy andhaso rādhase tanvā mahe |
GV00avs___u:10629: (AVŚ_20,23.8a) māre asmad vi mumuco haripriyārvāṅ yāhi |
GV00avs___u:10631: (AVŚ_20,23.9a) arvāñcaṃ tvā sukhe rathe vahatām indra keśinā |
GV00avs___u:10633: (AVŚ_20,24.1a) upa naḥ sutam ā gahi somam indra gavāśiram |
GV00avs___u:10635: (AVŚ_20,24.2a) tam indra madam ā gahi barhiṣṭhāṃ grāvabhiḥ sutam |
GV00avs___u:10637: (AVŚ_20,24.3a) indram itthā giro mamāchāgur iṣitā itaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10639: (AVŚ_20,24.4a) indraṃ somasya pītaye stomair iha havāmahe |
GV00avs___u:10641: (AVŚ_20,24.5a) indra somāḥ sutā ime tān dadhiṣva śatakrato |
GV00avs___u:10643: (AVŚ_20,24.6a) vidmā hi tvā dhanaṃjayaṃ vājeṣu dadhṛṣaṃ kave |
GV00avs___u:10645: (AVŚ_20,24.7a) imam indra gavāśiraṃ yavāśiraṃ ca naḥ piba |
GV00avs___u:10647: (AVŚ_20,24.8a) tubhyed indra sva okye somaṃ codāmi pītaye |
GV00avs___u:10649: (AVŚ_20,24.9a) tvāṃ sutasya pītaye pratnam indra havāmahe |
GV00avs___u:10651: (AVŚ_20,25.1a) aśvāvati prathamo goṣu gachati suprāvīr indra martyas tavotibhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10652: (AVŚ_20,25.1c) tam it pṛṇakṣi vasunā bhavīyasā sindhum āpo yathābhito vicetasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:10653: (AVŚ_20,25.2a) āpo na devīr upa yanti hotriyam avaḥ paśyanti vitataṃ yathā rajaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10654: (AVŚ_20,25.2c) prācair devāsaḥ pra ṇayanti devayuṃ brahmapriyaṃ joṣayante varā iva ||2||
GV00avs___u:10655: (AVŚ_20,25.3a) adhi dvayor adadhā ukthyaṃ vaco yatasrucā mithunā yā saparyataḥ |
GV00avs___u:10656: (AVŚ_20,25.3c) asaṃyatto vrate te kṣeti puṣyati bhadrā śaktir yajamānāya sunvate ||3||
GV00avs___u:10657: (AVŚ_20,25.4a) ād aṅgirāḥ prathamaṃ dadhire vaya iddhāgnayaḥ śamyā ye sukṛtyayā |
GV00avs___u:10658: (AVŚ_20,25.4c) sarvaṃ paṇeḥ sam avindanta bhojanam aśvāvantaṃ gomantam ā paśuṃ naraḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:10659: (AVŚ_20,25.5a) yajñair atharvā prathamaḥ pathas tate tataḥ sūryo vratapā vena ājani |
GV00avs___u:10660: (AVŚ_20,25.5c) ā gā ājad uśanā kāvyaḥ sacā yamasya jātam amṛtaṃ yajāmahe
GV00avs___u:10661: (AVŚ_20,25.6a) barhir vā yat svapatyāya vṛjyate 'rko vā ślokam āghoṣate
GV00avs___u:10663: (AVŚ_20,25.6c) grāvā yatra vadati karur ukthyas tasyed indro abhipitveṣu raṇyati ||6||
GV00avs___u:10664: (AVŚ_20,25.7a) progrāṃ pītiṃ vṛṣṇa iyarmi satyāṃ prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam |
GV00avs___u:10665: (AVŚ_20,25.7c) indra dhenābhir iha mādayasva dhībhir viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:10668: (AVŚ_20,26.2a) ā ghā gamad yadi śravat sahasriṇībhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10672: (AVŚ_20,26.4a) yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣaṃ carantaṃ pari tasthuṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10674: (AVŚ_20,26.5a) yuñjanti asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe |
GV00avs___u:10676: (AVŚ_20,26.6a) ketuṃ kṛṇvann aketave peśo maryā apeśase |
GV00avs___u:10678: (AVŚ_20,27.1a) yad indrāhaṃ yathā tvam īśīya vasva eka it |
GV00avs___u:10682: (AVŚ_20,27.3a) dhenuṣ ṭa indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate |
GV00avs___u:10684: (AVŚ_20,27.4a) na te vartāsti rādhasa indra devo na martyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10686: (AVŚ_20,27.5a) yajña indram avardhayad yad bhūmiṃ vy avartayat |
GV00avs___u:10688: (AVŚ_20,27.6a) vāvṛdhānasya te vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10690: (AVŚ_20,28.1a) vy antarikṣam atiran made somasya rocanā |
GV00avs___u:10692: (AVŚ_20,28.2a) ud gā ājad aṅgirobhya āviṣ krṇvan guhā satīḥ |
GV00avs___u:10694: (AVŚ_20,28.3a) indreṇa rocanā divo dṛlhāni dṛṃhitāni ca |
GV00avs___u:10696: (AVŚ_20,28.4a) apām ūrmir madann iva stoma indrājirāyate |
GV00avs___u:10700: (AVŚ_20,29.2a) indram it keśinā harī somapeyāya vakṣataḥ |
GV00avs___u:10702: (AVŚ_20,29.3a) apāṃ phenena namuceḥ śira indrod avartayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10706: (AVŚ_20,29.5a) asunvām indra saṃsadaṃ viṣūcīṃ vy anāśayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10708: (AVŚ_20,30.1a) pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣaṃ harī pra te vanve vanuṣo haryataṃ madam |
GV00avs___u:10709: (AVŚ_20,30.1c) ghṛtaṃ na yo haribhiś cāru secata ā tvā viśantu
GV00avs___u:10711: (AVŚ_20,30.2a) hariṃ hi yonim abhi ye samasvaran hinvanto harī divyaṃ
GV00avs___u:10713: (AVŚ_20,30.2c) ā yaṃ pṛṇanti haribhir na dhenava indrāya śūśaṃ harivantam
GV00avs___u:10715: (AVŚ_20,30.3a) so asya vajro harito ya āyaso harir nikāmo harir ā gabhastyoḥ |
GV00avs___u:10716: (AVŚ_20,30.3c) dyumnī suśipro harimanyusāyaka indre ni rūpā haritā mimikṣire ||3||
GV00avs___u:10717: (AVŚ_20,30.4a) divi na ketur adhi dhāyi haryato vivyacad vajro harito na raṃhyā |
GV00avs___u:10718: (AVŚ_20,30.4c) tudad ahiṃ hariśipro ya āyasaḥ sahasraśokā abhavad dharimbharaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:10719: (AVŚ_20,30.5a) tvaṃtvam aharyathā upastutaḥ pūrvebhir indra harikeśa
GV00avs___u:10721: (AVŚ_20,30.5c) tvaṃ haryasi tava viśvam ukthyam asāmi rādho harijāta haryatam ||5||
GV00avs___u:10722: (AVŚ_20,31.1a) tā vajriṇaṃ mandinaṃ stomyaṃ mada indraṃ rathe vahato haryatā harī |
GV00avs___u:10723: (AVŚ_20,31.1c) purūṇy asmai savanāni haryata indrāya somā harayo dadhanvire ||1||
GV00avs___u:10724: (AVŚ_20,31.2a) araṃ kāmāya harayo dadhamire sthirāya hinvan harayo harī turā |
GV00avs___u:10725: (AVŚ_20,31.2c) arvadbhir yo haribhir joṣam īyate so asya kāmaṃ harivantam
GV00avs___u:10727: (AVŚ_20,31.3a) hariśmaśārur harikeśa āyasas turaspeye yo haripā avardhata
GV00avs___u:10728: (AVŚ_20,31.3c) arvadbhir yo haribhir vājinīvasur ati viśvā duritā pāriṣad dharī ||3||
GV00avs___u:10729: (AVŚ_20,31.4a) śruveva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya hariṇī davidhvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:10730: (AVŚ_20,31.4c) pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjad dharī pītvā madasya haryatasyāndhasaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:10731: (AVŚ_20,31.5a) uta sma sadna haryatasya pastyor atyo na vājaṃ harivāṃ
GV00avs___u:10733: (AVŚ_20,31.5c) mahī cid dhi dhiṣaṇāharyad ojasā bṛhad vayo dadhiṣe haryatas cid ā ||5||
GV00avs___u:10734: (AVŚ_20,32.1a) ā rodasī haryamāṇo mahitvā navyaṃnavyaṃ haryasi manma nu priyam |
GV00avs___u:10735: (AVŚ_20,32.1c) pra pastyam asura haryataṃ gor āviṣ kṛdhi haraye sūryāya
GV00avs___u:10736: (AVŚ_20,32.2a) ā tvā haryantaṃ prayujo janānāṃ rathe vahantu hariśipram indra |
GV00avs___u:10737: (AVŚ_20,32.2c) pibā yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvo haryan yajñaṃ sadhamāde daśoṇim ||2||
GV00avs___u:10738: (AVŚ_20,32.3a) apāḥ pūrveṣāṃ harivaḥ sutānām atho idaṃ savanaṃ kevalaṃ te
GV00avs___u:10739: (AVŚ_20,32.3c) mamaddhi somaṃ madhumantam indra satrā vṛṣaṃ jathara ā vṛṣasva ||3||
GV00avs___u:10740: (AVŚ_20,33.1a) apsu dhūtasya harivaḥ pibeha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharaṃ pṛṇasva |
GV00avs___u:10741: (AVŚ_20,33.1c) mimikṣur yam adraya indra tubhyaṃ tebhir vardhasva madam ukthavāhaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:10742: (AVŚ_20,33.2a) progrāṃ pītiṃ vṛṣṇa iyarmi satyāṃ prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam |
GV00avs___u:10743: (AVŚ_20,33.2c) indra dhenābhir iha mādayasva dhībhir viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:10744: (AVŚ_20,33.3a) ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayo dadhānā uśija ṛtajñāḥ |
GV00avs___u:10745: (AVŚ_20,33.3c) prajāvad indra maṃso duroṇe tasthur gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ
GV00avs___u:10746: (AVŚ_20,34.1a) yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān devo devān kratunā paryamūṣat
GV00avs___u:10747: (AVŚ_20,34.1c) yasya śuṣmād rodasī abhyasetāṃ nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsa indraḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:10748: (AVŚ_20,34.2a) yaḥ pṛthivīṃ vyathamānām adṛṃhad yaḥ parvatān prakupitāṃ aramṇāt |
GV00avs___u:10749: (AVŚ_20,34.2c) yo antarikṣaṃ vimame varīyo yo dyām astabhnāt sa janāsa
GV00avs___u:10751: (AVŚ_20,34.3a) yo hatvāhim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn yo gā udājad apadhā
GV00avs___u:10753: (AVŚ_20,34.3c) yo aśmanor antar agniṃ jajāna saṃvṛk samatsu sa janāsa
GV00avs___u:10755: (AVŚ_20,34.4a) yenemā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni yo dāsaṃ varṇam adharaṃ guhākaḥ
GV00avs___u:10756: (AVŚ_20,34.4c) śvaghnīva yo jigīvāṃ lakṣam ādad aryaḥ puṣṭāni sa janāsa
GV00avs___u:10758: (AVŚ_20,34.5a) yaṃ smā pṛchanti kuha seti ghoram utem āhur naiṣo astīty enam |
GV00avs___u:10759: (AVŚ_20,34.5c) so aryaḥ puṣṭīr vija ivā mināti śrad asmai dhatta sa janāsa indraḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:10760: (AVŚ_20,34.6a) yo radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya yo brahmaṇo nādhamānasya kīreḥ |
GV00avs___u:10761: (AVŚ_20,34.6c) yuktagrāvṇo yo 'vitā suśipraḥ sutasomasya sa janāsa indraḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:10762: (AVŚ_20,34.7a) yasyāśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvo yasya grāmā yasya viśve rathāsaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10763: (AVŚ_20,34.7c) yaḥ sūryaṃ ya uṣasaṃ jajāna yo apāṃ netā sa janāsa indraḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:10764: (AVŚ_20,34.8a) yaṃ krandasī saṃyatī vihvayete pare 'vare ubhayā amitrāḥ |
GV00avs___u:10765: (AVŚ_20,34.8c) samānaṃ cid ratham ātasthivāṃsā nānā havete sa janāsa indraḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:10766: (AVŚ_20,34.9a) yasmān na ṛte vijayante janāso yaṃ yudhyamānā avase havante
GV00avs___u:10767: (AVŚ_20,34.9c) yo viśvasya pratimānaṃ babhūva yo acyutacyut sa janāsa indraḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:10768: (AVŚ_20,34.10a) yaḥ śasvato mahy eno dadhānān amanyamānāṃ charvā jaghāna |
GV00avs___u:10769: (AVŚ_20,34.10c) yaḥ śardhate nānudadāti śṛdhyāṃ yo dasyor hantā sa janāsa
GV00avs___u:10771: (AVŚ_20,34.11a) yaḥ śambharaṃ parvateṣu kṣiyantaṃ catvāriṃśyāṃ śarady
GV00avs___u:10773: (AVŚ_20,34.11c) ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna dānuṃ śayānaṃ sa janāsa indraḥ
GV00avs___u:10776: (AVŚ_20,34.12c) antar girau yajamānaṃ bahuṃ janaṃ yasminn āmūrchat sa janāsa indraḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:10777: (AVŚ_20,34.13a) yaḥ saptaraśmir vṛṣabhas tuviṣmān avāsṛjat sartave sapta sindhūn |
GV00avs___u:10778: (AVŚ_20,34.13c) yo rauhiṇam asphurad vajrabāhur dyām ārohantaṃ sa janāsa indraḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:10779: (AVŚ_20,34.14a) dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī mamete śuṣmāc cid asya parvatā
GV00avs___u:10781: (AVŚ_20,34.14c) yaḥ somapā nicito vajrabāhur yo vajrahastaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:10782: (AVŚ_20,34.15a) yaḥ sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantaṃ yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī |
GV00avs___u:10783: (AVŚ_20,34.15c) yasya brahma vardhanaṃ yasya somo yasyedaṃ rādhaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ ||15||
GV00avs___u:10784: (AVŚ_20,34.16a) jāto vy akhyat pitror upasthe bhuvo na veda janituḥ
GV00avs___u:10786: (AVŚ_20,34.16c) staviṣyamāṇo no yo asmad vratā devānāṃ sa janāsa indraḥ
GV00avs___u:10787: (AVŚ_20,34.17a) yaḥ somakāmo haryaśvaḥ sūrir yasmād rejante bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV00avs___u:10788: (AVŚ_20,34.17c) yo jaghāna śambaraṃ yaś ca śuṣṇaṃ ya ekavīraḥ sa janāsa indraḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:10789: (AVŚ_20,34.18a) yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhra ā cid vājaṃ dardarṣi sa kilāsi satyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10790: (AVŚ_20,34.18c) vayaṃ ta indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema
GV00avs___u:10791: (AVŚ_20,35.1a) asmā id u pra tavase turāya prayo na harmi stomaṃ māhināya |
GV00avs___u:10793: (AVŚ_20,35.2a) asmā id u praya iva pra yaṃsi bharāmy āngūṣaṃ bādhe suvṛkti |
GV00avs___u:10794: (AVŚ_20,35.2c) indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyo marjayanta ||2||
GV00avs___u:10795: (AVŚ_20,35.3a) asmā id u tyam upamaṃ svarṣāṃ bharāmy āṅgūṣam āsyena |
GV00avs___u:10796: (AVŚ_20,35.3c) maṃhiṣṭham achoktibhir matīnāṃ suvṛktibhiḥ sūriṃ vāvṛdhadhyai ||3||
GV00avs___u:10797: (AVŚ_20,35.4a) asmā id u stomaṃ saṃ hinomi rathaṃ na taṣṭeva tatsināya |
GV00avs___u:10798: (AVŚ_20,35.4c) giraś ca girvāhase suvṛktīndrāya viśvaminvaṃ medhirāya
GV00avs___u:10799: (AVŚ_20,35.5a) asmā id u saptim iva śravasyendrāyārkaṃ juhvā sam añje |
GV00avs___u:10800: (AVŚ_20,35.5c) vīram dānaukasaṃ vandadhyai purāṃ gūrtaśravasaṃ darmāṇam
GV00avs___u:10801: (AVŚ_20,35.6a) asmā id u tvaṣṭā takṣad vajraṃ svapastamaṃ svaryaṃ raṇāya |
GV00avs___u:10802: (AVŚ_20,35.6c) vṛtrasya cid vidad yena marma tujann īśānas tujatā kiyedhāḥ
GV00avs___u:10803: (AVŚ_20,35.7a) asyed u mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyo mahaḥ pituṃ papivāṃ cārv annā
GV00avs___u:10804: (AVŚ_20,35.7c) muṣāyad viṣṇuḥ pacataṃ sahīyān vidhyad varāhaṃ tiro adrim astā ||7||
GV00avs___u:10805: (AVŚ_20,35.8a) asmā id u gnāś cid devapatnīr indrāyārkam ahihatya ūvuḥ |
GV00avs___u:10806: (AVŚ_20,35.8c) pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhra urvī nāsya te mahimānaṃ pari ṣṭaḥ
GV00avs___u:10807: (AVŚ_20,35.9a) asyed eva pra ririce mahitvaṃ divas pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣāt |
GV00avs___u:10808: (AVŚ_20,35.9c) svarāl indro dama ā viśvagūrtaḥ svarir amatro vavakṣe raṇāya ||9||
GV00avs___u:10809: (AVŚ_20,35.10a) asyed eva śavasā śuśantaṃ vi vṛścad vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ
GV00avs___u:10810: (AVŚ_20,35.10c) gā na vrāṇā avanīr amuñcad abhi śravo dāvane sacetāḥ
GV00avs___u:10811: (AVŚ_20,35.11a) asyed u tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yad vajreṇa sīm
GV00avs___u:10813: (AVŚ_20,35.11c) īśānakṛd dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādhaṃ turvaṇiḥ kaḥ
GV00avs___u:10814: (AVŚ_20,35.12a) asmā id u pra bharā tūtujāno vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ
GV00avs___u:10816: (AVŚ_20,35.12c) gor na parva vi radā tiraśceṣyann arṇāṃsy apāṃ caradhyai
GV00avs___u:10817: (AVŚ_20,35.13a) asyed u pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navya ukthaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10818: (AVŚ_20,35.13c) yudhe yad iṣṇāna āyudhāny ṛghāyamāṇo niriṇāti śatrūn
GV00avs___u:10819: (AVŚ_20,35.14a) asyed u bhiyā girayaś ca dṛlhā dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣas tujete |
GV00avs___u:10820: (AVŚ_20,35.14c) upo venasya joguvāna oṇiṃ sadyo bhuvad vīryāya nodhāḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:10821: (AVŚ_20,35.15a) asmā id u tyad anu dāyy eṣām eko yad vavne bhūrer īśānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10822: (AVŚ_20,35.15c) praitaśaṃ sūrye paspṛdhānaṃ sauvaśvye suṣvim āvad indraḥ
GV00avs___u:10823: (AVŚ_20,35.16a) evā te hāriyojanā suvṛktīndra brahmāṇi gotamāso akran |
GV00avs___u:10824: (AVŚ_20,35.16c) aiṣu viśvapeśasaṃ dhiyaṃ dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt ||16||
GV00avs___u:10825: (AVŚ_20,36.1a) ya eka id dhavyaś carṣaṇīnām indraṃ taṃ gīrbhir abhy arca ābhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10826: (AVŚ_20,36.1c) yaḥ patyate vṛṣabho vṛṣṇyāvānt satyaḥ satvā purumāyaḥ sahasvān ||1||
GV00avs___u:10827: (AVŚ_20,36.2a) tam u naḥ pūrve pitaro navagvāḥ sapta viprāso abhi
GV00avs___u:10829: (AVŚ_20,36.2c) nakṣaddābhaṃ taturiṃ parvateṣṭhām adroghavācaṃ matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham ||2||
GV00avs___u:10830: (AVŚ_20,36.3a) tam īmahe indram asya rāyaḥ puruvīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ |
GV00avs___u:10831: (AVŚ_20,36.3c) yo aṣkṛdhoyur ajaraḥ svarvān tam ā bhara harivo mādayadhyai
GV00avs___u:10832: (AVŚ_20,36.4a) tan no vi voco yadi te purā cij jaritāra ānaśuḥ sumnam indra |
GV00avs___u:10833: (AVŚ_20,36.4c) kas te bhāgaḥ kiṃ vayo dudhra khiduḥ puruhūta purūvaso
GV00avs___u:10835: (AVŚ_20,36.5a) taṃ pṛchantī vajrahastaṃ ratheṣṭhām indraṃ vepī vakvarī yasya nū gīḥ |
GV00avs___u:10836: (AVŚ_20,36.5c) tuvigrābhaṃ tuvikūrmiṃ rabhodāṃ gātum iṣe nakṣate tumram acha ||5||
GV00avs___u:10837: (AVŚ_20,36.6a) ayā ha tyaṃ māyayā vāvṛdhānaṃ manojuvā svatavaḥ parvatena |
GV00avs___u:10838: (AVŚ_20,36.6c) acyutā cid vīlitā svojo rujo vi dṛlhā dhṛṣatā virapśin
GV00avs___u:10839: (AVŚ_20,36.7a) tam vo dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭham pratnaṃ pratnavat paritaṃsayadhyai |
GV00avs___u:10840: (AVŚ_20,36.7c) sa no vakṣad animānaḥ suvahnendro viśvāny ati durgahāṇi ||7||
GV00avs___u:10841: (AVŚ_20,36.8a) ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayo 'ntarikṣā |
GV00avs___u:10842: (AVŚ_20,36.8c) tapā vṛṣan viśvataḥ śociṣā tān brahmadviṣe śocaya kṣām apaś
GV00avs___u:10844: (AVŚ_20,36.9a) bhuvo janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagatas tveṣasaṃdṛk
GV00avs___u:10845: (AVŚ_20,36.9c) dhiṣva vajraṃ dakṣiṇa indra haste viśvā ajurya dayase vi
GV00avs___u:10847: (AVŚ_20,36.10a) ā saṃyatam indra ṇaḥ svastiṃ śatrutūryāya bṛhatīm amṛdhrām |
GV00avs___u:10848: (AVŚ_20,36.10c) yayā dāsāny āryāṇi vṛtrā karo vajrint sutukā nāhuṣāṇi ||10||
GV00avs___u:10849: (AVŚ_20,36.11a) sa no niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedho viśvavārābhir ā gahi prayajyo |
GV00avs___u:10850: (AVŚ_20,36.11c) na yā adevo varate na deva ābhir yāhi tūyam ā madryadrik ||11||
GV00avs___u:10851: (AVŚ_20,37.1a) yas tigmaśṛṅgo vṛṣabho na bhīmaḥ ekaḥ kṛṣṭīś cyavayati pra
GV00avs___u:10853: (AVŚ_20,37.1c) yaḥ śaśvato adāśuṣo gayasya prayantāsi suṣvitarāya vedaḥ
GV00avs___u:10854: (AVŚ_20,37.2a) tvaṃ ha tyad indra kutsam āvaḥ śuśrūṣamāṇas tanvā samarye |
GV00avs___u:10855: (AVŚ_20,37.2c) dāsaṃ yac śuṣṇam kuyavaṃ ny asmā arandhaya ārjuneyāya śikṣan ||2||
GV00avs___u:10856: (AVŚ_20,37.3a) tvaṃ dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā vītahavyaṃ prāvo viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ sudāsam |
GV00avs___u:10857: (AVŚ_20,37.3c) pra paurukutsiṃ trasadasyum āvaḥ kṣetrasātā vṛtrahatyeṣu
GV00avs___u:10859: (AVŚ_20,37.4a) tvaṃ nṛbhir nṛmaṇo devavītau bhūrīṇi vṛtrā haryaśva haṃsi |
GV00avs___u:10860: (AVŚ_20,37.4c) tvaṃ ni dasyuṃ cumuriṃ dhuniṃ cāsvāpayo dabhītaye suhantu ||4||
GV00avs___u:10861: (AVŚ_20,37.5a) tava cyautnāni vajrahasta tāni nava yat puro navatiṃ ca
GV00avs___u:10863: (AVŚ_20,37.5c) niveśane śatatamāviveṣīr ahaṃ ca vṛtraṃ namucim utāhan
GV00avs___u:10864: (AVŚ_20,37.6a) sanā tā ta indra bhojanāni rātahavyāya dāśuṣe sudāse |
GV00avs___u:10865: (AVŚ_20,37.6c) vṛṣṇe te harī vṛṣaṇā yunajmi vyantu brahmāṇi puruśāka vājam
GV00avs___u:10866: (AVŚ_20,37.7a) mā te asyāṃ sahasāvan pariṣṭāv aghāya bhūma harivaḥ parādau
GV00avs___u:10867: (AVŚ_20,37.7c) trāyasva no 'vṛkebhir varūthais tava priyāsaḥ sūriṣu syāma ||7||
GV00avs___u:10868: (AVŚ_20,37.8a) priyāsa it te maghavann abhiṣṭau naro madema śaraṇe sakhāyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10869: (AVŚ_20,37.8c) ni turvaśaṃ ni yādvaṃ śiśīhy atithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan ||8||
GV00avs___u:10870: (AVŚ_20,37.9a) sadyaś cin nu te maghavann abhiṣṭau naraḥ śaṃsanty ukthaśāsa ukthā |
GV00avs___u:10871: (AVŚ_20,37.9c) ye te havebhir vi paṇīṃr adāśann asmān vṛṇīṣva yujyāya
GV00avs___u:10873: (AVŚ_20,37.10a) ete stomā narāṃ nṛtama tubhyam asmadryañco dadato maghāni |
GV00avs___u:10874: (AVŚ_20,37.10c) teṣām indra vṛtrahatye śivo bhūḥ sakhā ca śūro 'vitā ca nṛṇām ||10||
GV00avs___u:10875: (AVŚ_20,37.11a) nū indra śūra stavamāna ūtī brahmajūtas tanvā vāvṛdhasva |
GV00avs___u:10876: (AVŚ_20,37.11c) upa no vājān mimīhy upa stīn yuyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:10877: (AVŚ_20,38.1a) ā yāhi suṣumā hi ta indra somaṃ pibā imam |
GV00avs___u:10879: (AVŚ_20,38.2a) ā tvā brahmayujā harī vahatām indra keśinā |
GV00avs___u:10881: (AVŚ_20,38.3a) brahmāṇas tvā vayaṃ yujā somapām indra sominaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10883: (AVŚ_20,38.4a) indram id gāthino bṛhad indram arkebhir arkiṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10885: (AVŚ_20,38.5a) indra id dharyoḥ sacā saṃmiśla ā vacoyujā |
GV00avs___u:10887: (AVŚ_20,38.6a) indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi |
GV00avs___u:10889: (AVŚ_20,39.1a) indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10891: (AVŚ_20,39.2a) vy antarikṣam atiran made somasya rocanā |
GV00avs___u:10893: (AVŚ_20,39.3a) ud gā ājad aṅgirobhya āviṣ kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ |
GV00avs___u:10895: (AVŚ_20,39.4a) indreṇa rocanā divo dṛlhāni dṛṃhitāni ca |
GV00avs___u:10897: (AVŚ_20,39.5a) apām ūrmir madann iva stoma indrājirāyate |
GV00avs___u:10899: (AVŚ_20,40.1a) indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣase saṃjagmāno abibhyuṣā |
GV00avs___u:10903: (AVŚ_20,40.3a) ād aha svadhām anu punar garbhatvam erire |
GV00avs___u:10907: (AVŚ_20,41.2a) ichan aśvasya yac chiraḥ parvateṣv apaśritam |
GV00avs___u:10909: (AVŚ_20,41.3a) atrāha gor amanvata nāma tvaṣṭur apīcyam |
GV00avs___u:10913: (AVŚ_20,42.2a) anu tvā rodasī ubhe krakṣamāṇam akṛpetām |
GV00avs___u:10915: (AVŚ_20,42.3a) uttiṣṭhann ojasā saha pītvī śipre avepayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10917: (AVŚ_20,43.1a) bhindhi viśvā apa dviṣaḥ bādho jahī mṛdhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10919: (AVŚ_20,43.2a) yad vīlāv indra yat sthire yat parśāne parābhṛtam |
GV00avs___u:10921: (AVŚ_20,43.3a) yasya te viśvamānuṣo bhūrer dattasya vedati |
GV00avs___u:10923: (AVŚ_20,44.1a) pra samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnām indraṃ stotā navyaṃ gīrbhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10925: (AVŚ_20,44.2a) yasminn ukthāni raṇyanti viśvāni ca śravasya |
GV00avs___u:10927: (AVŚ_20,44.3a) taṃ suṣṭutyā vivāse jyeṣṭharājaṃ bhare kṛtnum |
GV00avs___u:10929: (AVŚ_20,45.1a) ayam u te sam atasi kapota iva garbhadhim |
GV00avs___u:10931: (AVŚ_20,45.2a) stotraṃ rādhānāṃ pate girvāho vīra yasya te |
GV00avs___u:10933: (AVŚ_20,45.3a) ūrdhvas tiṣṭhā na ūtaye 'smin vāje śatakrato |
GV00avs___u:10935: (AVŚ_20,46.1a) praṇetāram vasyo achā kartāraṃ jyotiḥ samatsu |
GV00avs___u:10937: (AVŚ_20,46.2a) sa naḥ papriḥ pārayāti svasti nāvā puruhūtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10939: (AVŚ_20,46.3a) sa tvaṃ na indra vājobhir daśasyā ca gātuyā ca |
GV00avs___u:10941: (AVŚ_20,47.1a) tam indraṃ vājayāmasi mahe vṛtrāya hantave |
GV00avs___u:10943: (AVŚ_20,47.2a) indraḥ sa dāmane kṛta ojiṣṭhaḥ sa made hitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10945: (AVŚ_20,47.3a) girā vajro na saṃbhṛtaḥ sabalo anapacyutaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10947: (AVŚ_20,47.4a) indram id gāthino bṛhad indram arkebhir arkiṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10949: (AVŚ_20,47.5a) indra id dharyoḥ sacā saṃmiśla ā vacoyujā |
GV00avs___u:10951: (AVŚ_20,47.6a) indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi |
GV00avs___u:10953: (AVŚ_20,47.7a) ā yāhi suṣumā hi ta indra somaṃ pibā imam |
GV00avs___u:10955: (AVŚ_20,47.8a) ā tvā brahmayujā harī vahatām indra keśinā |
GV00avs___u:10957: (AVŚ_20,47.9a) brahmāṇas tvā vayaṃ yujā somapām indra sominaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10959: (AVŚ_20,47.10a) yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣaṃ carantaṃ pari tasthuṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10961: (AVŚ_20,47.11a) yuñjanty asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe |
GV00avs___u:10963: (AVŚ_20,47.12a) ketuṃ kṛṇvann aketave peśo maryā apeśase |
GV00avs___u:10965: (AVŚ_20,47.13a) ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10967: (AVŚ_20,47.14a) apa tye tāyavo yathā nakṣatrā yanty aktubhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10969: (AVŚ_20,47.15a) adṛśrann asya ketavo vi raśmayo janāṃ anu |
GV00avs___u:10973: (AVŚ_20,47.17a) pratyaṅ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ ud eṣi mānuṣīḥ |
GV00avs___u:10975: (AVŚ_20,47.18a) yenā pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantaṃ janāṃ anu |
GV00avs___u:10977: (AVŚ_20,47.19a) vi dyām eṣi rajas pṛthv ahar mimāno aktubhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:10979: (AVŚ_20,47.20a) sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya |
GV00avs___u:10981: (AVŚ_20,47.21a) ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10983: (AVŚ_20,48.1a) abhi tvā varcasā giraḥ siñcanty ā caraṇyuvaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10985: (AVŚ_20,48.2a) tā arṣanti śubhriyaḥ pṛñcatīr varcasā payaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10989: (AVŚ_20,48.4a) āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnir akramīd asadan mātaraṃ puraḥ |
GV00avs___u:10991: (AVŚ_20,48.5a) antaś carati rocanā asya prāṇād apānataḥ |
GV00avs___u:10993: (AVŚ_20,48.6a) triṃśad dhāmā vi rājati vāk pataṅgo aśiśriyat |
GV00avs___u:10995: (AVŚ_20,49.1a) yac chakrā vācam āruhann antarikṣaṃ siṣāsathaḥ |
GV00avs___u:10999: (AVŚ_20,49.3a) śakro vācam adhṛṣṇuhi dhāmadharman vi rājati |
GV00avs___u:11001: (AVŚ_20,49.4a) taṃ vo dasmam ṛtīṣahaṃ vasor mandānam andhasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11002: (AVŚ_20,49.4c) abhi vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava indraṃ gīrbhir navāmahe ||4||
GV00avs___u:11003: (AVŚ_20,49.5a) dyukṣaṃ sudānuṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtam giriṃ na purubhojasam |
GV00avs___u:11004: (AVŚ_20,49.5c) kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ makṣū gomantam īmahe
GV00avs___u:11005: (AVŚ_20,49.6a) tat tvā yāmi suvīryaṃ tad brahma pūrvacittaye |
GV00avs___u:11006: (AVŚ_20,49.6c) yenā yatibhyo bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha ||6||
GV00avs___u:11007: (AVŚ_20,49.7a) yenā samudram asṛjo mahīr apas tad indra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11008: (AVŚ_20,49.7c) sadyaḥ so asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yaṃ kṣoṇīr anucakrade
GV00avs___u:11009: (AVŚ_20,50.1a) kan navyo atasīnāṃ turo gṛṇīta martyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11010: (AVŚ_20,50.1c) nahī nv asya mahimānam indriyaṃ svar gṛṇanta ānaśuḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11011: (AVŚ_20,50.2a) kad u stuvanta ṛtayanta devata ṛṣiḥ ko vipra ohate |
GV00avs___u:11012: (AVŚ_20,50.2c) kadā havaṃ maghavann indra sunvataḥ kad u stuvata ā gamaḥ
GV00avs___u:11013: (AVŚ_20,51.1a) abhi pra vaḥ surādhasam indram arca yathā vide |
GV00avs___u:11014: (AVŚ_20,51.1c) yo jaritṛbhyo maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇeva śikṣati ||1||
GV00avs___u:11015: (AVŚ_20,51.2a) śatānīkeva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe |
GV00avs___u:11016: (AVŚ_20,51.2c) girer iva pra rasā asya pinvire datrāṇi purubhojasaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11017: (AVŚ_20,51.3a) pra su śrutaṃ surādhasam arcā śakram abhiṣṭaye |
GV00avs___u:11018: (AVŚ_20,51.3c) yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sahasreṇeva maṃhate ||3||
GV00avs___u:11019: (AVŚ_20,51.4a) śatānīkā hetayo asya duṣṭarā indrasya samiṣo mahīḥ |
GV00avs___u:11020: (AVŚ_20,51.4c) girir na bhujmā maghatsu pinvate yad īṃ sutā amandiṣuḥ
GV00avs___u:11021: (AVŚ_20,52.1a) vayaṃ gha tvā sutāvanta āpo na vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11022: (AVŚ_20,52.1c) pavitrasya prasravaṇeṣu vṛtrahan pari stotāra āsate ||1||
GV00avs___u:11023: (AVŚ_20,52.2a) svaranti tvā sute naro vaso nireka ukthinaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11024: (AVŚ_20,52.2c) kadā sutaṃ tṛṣāṇa oka ā gama indra svabdīva vaṃsagaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11025: (AVŚ_20,52.3a) kaṇvebhir dhṛṣṇav ā dhṛsad vājaṃ darṣi sahasriṇam |
GV00avs___u:11026: (AVŚ_20,52.3c) piśaṅgarūpaṃ maghavan vicarṣaṇe makṣū gomantam īmahe ||3||
GV00avs___u:11027: (AVŚ_20,53.1a) ka īṃ veda sute sacā pibantaṃ kad vayo dadhe |
GV00avs___u:11028: (AVŚ_20,53.1c) ayaṃ yaḥ puro vibhinatty ojasā mandānaḥ śipry andhasaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11029: (AVŚ_20,53.2a) dānā mṛgo na vāraṇaḥ purutrā carathaṃ dadhe |
GV00avs___u:11030: (AVŚ_20,53.2c) nakiṣ ṭvā ni yamad ā sute gamo mahāś carasy ojasā ||2||
GV00avs___u:11031: (AVŚ_20,53.3a) ya ugraḥ sann aniṣṭṛta sthiro raṇāya saṃskṛtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11032: (AVŚ_20,53.3c) yadi stotur maghavā śṛṇavad dhavaṃ nendro yoṣaty ā gamat
GV00avs___u:11033: (AVŚ_20,54.1a) viśvāḥ pṛtanā abhibhūtaraṃ naraṃ sajūs tatakṣur indraṃ jajanuś ca rājase |
GV00avs___u:11034: (AVŚ_20,54.1c) kratvā variṣṭhaṃ vara āmurim utogram ojiṣṭhaṃ tavasaṃ tarasvinam ||1||
GV00avs___u:11035: (AVŚ_20,54.2a) sam īṃ rebhāso asvarann indraṃ somasya pītaye |
GV00avs___u:11036: (AVŚ_20,54.2c) svarpatiṃ yad īṃ vṛdhe dhṛtavrato hy ojasā sam ūtibhiḥ
GV00avs___u:11037: (AVŚ_20,54.3a) nemiṃ namanti cakṣasā meṣaṃ viprā abhisvarā |
GV00avs___u:11038: (AVŚ_20,54.3c) sudītayo vo adruho 'pi karṇe tarasvinaḥ sam ṛkvabhiḥ ||3||

GV00avs___u:11040: (AVŚ_20,55.1c) maṃhiṣṭho gīrbhir ā ca yajñiyo vavartad rāye no viśvā
GV00avs___u:11042: (AVŚ_20,55.2a) yā indra bhuja ābharaḥ svarvāṃ asurebhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11043: (AVŚ_20,55.2c) stotāram in maghavann asya vardhaya ye ca tve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
GV00avs___u:11044: (AVŚ_20,55.3a) yam indra dadhiṣe tvam aśvaṃ gāṃ bhāgam avyayam |

GV00avs___u:11046: (AVŚ_20,56.1a) indro madāya vāvṛdhe śavase vṛtrahā nṛbhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11047: (AVŚ_20,56.1c) tam in mahatsv ājiṣūtem arbhe havāmahe sa vājeṣu pra no
GV00avs___u:11049: (AVŚ_20,56.2a) asi hi vīra senyo 'si bhūri parādadiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11050: (AVŚ_20,56.2c) asi dabhrasya cid vṛdho yajamānāya śikṣasi sunvate bhūri te
GV00avs___u:11052: (AVŚ_20,56.3a) yad udīrata ājayo dhṛṣṇave dhīyate dhanā |
GV00avs___u:11053: (AVŚ_20,56.3c) yukṣvā madacyutā harī kaṃ hanaḥ kaṃ vasau dadho 'smāṃ indra vasau dadhaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:11054: (AVŚ_20,56.4a) mademade hi no dadir yūthā gavām ṛjukratuḥ |
GV00avs___u:11055: (AVŚ_20,56.4c) saṃ gṛbhāya puru śatobhayāhastyā vasu śiśīhi rāya ā bhara
GV00avs___u:11056: (AVŚ_20,56.5a) mādayasva sute sacā śavase śūra rādhase |
GV00avs___u:11057: (AVŚ_20,56.5c) vidmā hi tvā purūvasum upa kāmānt sasṛjmahe 'thā no 'vitā
GV00avs___u:11059: (AVŚ_20,56.6a) ete ta indra jantavo viśvaṃ puṣyanti vāryam |
GV00avs___u:11060: (AVŚ_20,56.6c) antar hi khyo janānām aryo vedo adāśuṣāṃ teṣāṃ no veda ā bhara ||6||

GV00avs___u:11067: (AVŚ_20,57.4a) śuṣmintamaṃ na ūtaye dyumninaṃ pāhi jāgṛvim |
GV00avs___u:11069: (AVŚ_20,57.5a) indriyāṇi śatakrato yā te janeṣu pañcasu |
GV00avs___u:11071: (AVŚ_20,57.6a) agann indra śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ dadhiṣva duṣṭaram |
GV00avs___u:11073: (AVŚ_20,57.7a) arvāvato na ā gahy atho śakra parāvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:11074: (AVŚ_20,57.7c) u loko yas te adriva indreha tata ā gahi ||7||
GV00avs___u:11075: (AVŚ_20,57.8a) indro aṅga mahad bhayam abhī ṣad apa cucyavat |
GV00avs___u:11077: (AVŚ_20,57.9a) indraś ca mṛlayāti no na naḥ paścād aghaṃ naśat |
GV00avs___u:11079: (AVŚ_20,57.10a) indra āśābhyas pari sarvābhyo abhayaṃ karat |
GV00avs___u:11081: (AVŚ_20,57.11a) ka īṃ veda sute sacā pibantaṃ kad vayo dadhe |
GV00avs___u:11082: (AVŚ_20,57.11c) ayaṃ yaḥ puro vibhinatty ojasā mandānaḥ śipry andhasaḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:11083: (AVŚ_20,57.12a) dānā mṛgo na vāraṇaḥ purutrā carathaṃ dadhe |
GV00avs___u:11084: (AVŚ_20,57.12c) nakiṣ ṭvā ni yamad ā sute gamo mahāṃś carasy ojasā ||12||
GV00avs___u:11085: (AVŚ_20,57.13a) ya ugraḥ sann aniṣṭṛta sthiro raṇāya saṃskṛtaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11086: (AVŚ_20,57.13c) yadi stotur maghavā śṛṇavad dhavaṃ nendro yoṣaty ā gamat
GV00avs___u:11087: (AVŚ_20,57.14a) vayaṃ gha tvā sutāvanta āpo na vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11088: (AVŚ_20,57.14c) pavitrasya prasravaṇeṣu vṛtrahan pari stotāra āsate ||14||
GV00avs___u:11089: (AVŚ_20,57.15a) svaranti tvā sute naro vaso nireka ukthinaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11090: (AVŚ_20,57.15c) kadā sutaṃ tṛṣāṇa oka ā gama indra svabdīva vaṃsagaḥ
GV00avs___u:11091: (AVŚ_20,57.16a) kaṇvebhir dhṛṣṇav ā dhṛṣad vājaṃ darṣi sahasriṇam |
GV00avs___u:11092: (AVŚ_20,57.16c) piśaṅgarūpaṃ maghavan vicarṣaṇe makṣū gomantam īmahe
GV00avs___u:11093: (AVŚ_20,58.1a) śrāyanta iva sūryaṃ viśved indrasya bhakṣata |
GV00avs___u:11094: (AVŚ_20,58.1c) vasūni jāte janamāna ojasā prati bhāgaṃ na dīdhima ||1||
GV00avs___u:11095: (AVŚ_20,58.2a) anarśarātiṃ vasudām upa stuhi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11096: (AVŚ_20,58.2c) so asya kāmaṃ vidhato na roṣati mano dānāya codayan ||2||
GV00avs___u:11097: (AVŚ_20,58.3a) baṇ mahāṃ asi sūrya baḍ āditya mahāṃ asi |
GV00avs___u:11098: (AVŚ_20,58.3c) mahas te sato mahimā panasyate 'ddhā deva mahāṃ asi ||3||
GV00avs___u:11099: (AVŚ_20,58.4a) baṭ sūrya śravasā mahāṃ asi satrā deva mahāṃ asi |
GV00avs___u:11100: (AVŚ_20,58.4c) mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohito vibhu jyotir adābhyam ||4||
GV00avs___u:11101: (AVŚ_20,59.1a) ud u tye madhu mattamā gira stomāsa īrate |
GV00avs___u:11102: (AVŚ_20,59.1c) satrājito dhanasā akṣitotayo vājayanto rathā iva ||1||

GV00avs___u:11104: (AVŚ_20,59.2c) indraṃ stomebhir mahayanta āyavaḥ priyamedhāso asvaran
GV00avs___u:11105: (AVŚ_20,59.3a) ud in nv asya ricyate 'ṃśo dhanaṃ na jigyusaḥ |

GV00avs___u:11109: (AVŚ_20,60.1a) evā hy asi vīrayur evā śūra uta sthiraḥ |
GV00avs___u:11111: (AVŚ_20,60.2a) evā rātis tuvīmagha viśvebhir dhāyi dhātṛbhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11113: (AVŚ_20,60.3a) mo ṣu brahmeva tandrayur bhuvo vājānāṃ pate |
GV00avs___u:11115: (AVŚ_20,60.4a) evā hy asya sūnṛtā virapśī gomatī mahī |
GV00avs___u:11117: (AVŚ_20,60.5a) evā hi te vibhūtaya ūtaya indra māvate |
GV00avs___u:11119: (AVŚ_20,60.6a) evā hy asya kāmyā stoma ukthaṃ ca śaṃsyā |
GV00avs___u:11121: (AVŚ_20,61.1a) taṃ te madaṃ gṛṇīmasi vṛṣaṇaṃ pṛtsu sāsahim |
GV00avs___u:11123: (AVŚ_20,61.2a) yena jyotīmṣy āyave manave ca viveditha |
GV00avs___u:11125: (AVŚ_20,61.3a) tad adyā cit ta ukthino 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā |
GV00avs___u:11127: (AVŚ_20,61.4a) tam v abhi pra gāyata puruhūtaṃ puruṣṭutam |
GV00avs___u:11129: (AVŚ_20,61.5a) yasya dvibarhaso bṛhat saho dādhāra rodasī |
GV00avs___u:11131: (AVŚ_20,61.6a) sa rājasi puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi jighnase |
GV00avs___u:11133: (AVŚ_20,62.1a) vayam u tvām apūrvya sthūraṃ na kac cid bharanto 'vasyavaḥ
GV00avs___u:11135: (AVŚ_20,62.2a) upa tvā karmann ūtaye sa no yuvograś cakrāma yo dhṛṣat |
GV00avs___u:11136: (AVŚ_20,62.2c) tvām id dhy avitāraṃ vavṛmahe sakhāya indra sānasim ||2||
GV00avs___u:11137: (AVŚ_20,62.3a) yo na idamidaṃ purā pra vasya ānināya tam u va stuṣe |
GV00avs___u:11139: (AVŚ_20,62.4a) haryaśvaṃ satpatiṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sa hi ṣmā yo amandata |
GV00avs___u:11140: (AVŚ_20,62.4c) ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavā śatam
GV00avs___u:11141: (AVŚ_20,62.5a) indrāya sāma gāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat |
GV00avs___u:11143: (AVŚ_20,62.6a) tvam indrābhibhūr asi tvaṃ sūryam arocayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11145: (AVŚ_20,62.7a) vibhrājaṃ jyotiṣā svar agacho rocanaṃ divaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11147: (AVŚ_20,62.8a) tam v abhi pra gāyata puruhūtaṃ puruṣṭutam |
GV00avs___u:11149: (AVŚ_20,62.9a) yasya dvibarhaso bṛhat saho dādhāra rodasī |
GV00avs___u:11151: (AVŚ_20,62.10a) sa rājasi puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi jighnase |
GV00avs___u:11153: (AVŚ_20,63.1a) imā nu kaṃ bhuvanā sīṣadhāmendraś ca viśve ca devāḥ |

GV00avs___u:11160: (AVŚ_20,63.3c) ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:11161: (AVŚ_20,63.4a) ya eka id vidayate vasu martāya dāśuṣe |

GV00avs___u:11165: (AVŚ_20,63.6a) yaś cid dhi tvā bahubhya ā sutāvāṃ āvivāsati |
GV00avs___u:11166: (AVŚ_20,63.6c) ugraṃ tat patyate śava indro aṅga ||6||
GV00avs___u:11167: (AVŚ_20,63.7a) ya indra somapātamo madaḥ śaviṣṭha cetati |
GV00avs___u:11168: (AVŚ_20,63.7c) yenā haṃsi ny attriṇaṃ tam īmahe ||7||

GV00avs___u:11173: (AVŚ_20,64.1a) endra no gadhi priyaḥ satrājid agohyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11174: (AVŚ_20,64.1c) girir na viśvatas pṛthuḥ patir divaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11175: (AVŚ_20,64.2a) abhi hi satya somapā ubhe babhūtha rodasī |
GV00avs___u:11177: (AVŚ_20,64.3a) tvaṃ hi śaśvatīnām indra dartā purām asi |
GV00avs___u:11178: (AVŚ_20,64.3c) hantā dasyor manor vṛdhaḥ patir divaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:11179: (AVŚ_20,64.4a) ed u madhvo madintaraṃ siñca vādhvaryo andhasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11181: (AVŚ_20,64.5a) indra sthātar harīṇāṃ nakiṣ te pūrvyastutim |
GV00avs___u:11183: (AVŚ_20,64.6a) taṃ vo vājānāṃ patim ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11185: (AVŚ_20,65.1a) eto nv indraṃ stavāma sakhāya stomyaṃ naram |

GV00avs___u:11190: (AVŚ_20,65.3c) jyotir na viśvam abhy asti dakṣiṇā ||3||
GV00avs___u:11193: (AVŚ_20,66.2a) evā nūnam upa stuhi vaiyaśva daśamaṃ navam |
GV00avs___u:11197: (AVŚ_20,67.1a) vanoti hi sunvan kṣayaṃ parīṇasaḥ sunvāno hi ṣmā yajaty ava dviṣo devānām ava dviṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11198: (AVŚ_20,67.1c) sunvāna it siṣāsati sahasrā vājy avṛtaḥ |

GV00avs___u:11200: (AVŚ_20,67.2a) mo ṣu vo asmad abhi tāni pauṃsyā sanā bhūvan dyumnāni mota jāriṣur asmat purota jāriṣuḥ |
GV00avs___u:11201: (AVŚ_20,67.2c) yad vaś citraṃ yugeyuge navyaṃ ghoṣād amartyam |
GV00avs___u:11202: (AVŚ_20,67.2e) asmāsu tan maruto yac ca duṣṭaraṃ didhṛtā yac ca duṣṭaram
GV00avs___u:11203: (AVŚ_20,67.3a) agniṃ hotāram manye dāsvantaṃ vasuṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ vipraṃ na jātavedasam
GV00avs___u:11204: (AVŚ_20,67.3c) ya ūrdhvayā svadhvaro devo devācyā kṛpā |
GV00avs___u:11205: (AVŚ_20,67.3e) ghṛtasya vibhrāṣṭim anu vaṣṭi śociṣājuhvānasya sarpiṣaḥ
GV00avs___u:11206: (AVŚ_20,67.4a) yajñaiḥ saṃmiślāḥ pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhir yāmaṃ chubhrāso
GV00avs___u:11208: (AVŚ_20,67.4c) āsadyā barhir bharatasya sūnavaḥ potrād ā somaṃ pibatā divo
GV00avs___u:11210: (AVŚ_20,67.5a) ā vakṣi devāṃ iha vipra yakṣi cośan hotar ni ṣadā yoniṣu triṣu |
GV00avs___u:11211: (AVŚ_20,67.5c) prati vīhi prasthitaṃ somyaṃ madhu pibāgnīdhrāt tava bhāgasya tṛsṇuhi ||5||
GV00avs___u:11212: (AVŚ_20,67.6a) eṣa sya te tanvo nṛmṇavardhanaḥ saha ojaḥ pradivi bāhvor
GV00avs___u:11214: (AVŚ_20,67.6c) tubhyaṃ suto maghavan tubhyam ābhṛtas tvam asya brāhmaṇād ā
GV00avs___u:11216: (AVŚ_20,67.7a) yam u pūrvam ahuve tam idaṃ huve sed u havyo dadir yo nāma patyate |
GV00avs___u:11217: (AVŚ_20,67.7c) adhvaryubhiḥ prasthitaṃ somyaṃ madhu potrāt somaṃ
GV00avs___u:11221: (AVŚ_20,68.2a) upa naḥ savanā gahi somasya somapāḥ piba |
GV00avs___u:11224: (AVŚ_20,68.3c) mā no ati khya ā gahi ||3||
GV00avs___u:11225: (AVŚ_20,68.4a) parehi vigram astṛtam indraṃ pṛchā vipaścitam |
GV00avs___u:11227: (AVŚ_20,68.5a) uta bruvantu no nido nir anyataś cid ārata |
GV00avs___u:11229: (AVŚ_20,68.6a) uta naḥ subhagāṃ arir voceyur dasma kṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11231: (AVŚ_20,68.7a) em āśum āśave bhara yajñaśriyaṃ nṛmādanam |
GV00avs___u:11233: (AVŚ_20,68.8a) asya pītvā śatakrato ghano vṛtrāṇām abhavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11235: (AVŚ_20,68.9a) taṃ tvā vājeṣu vājinaṃ vājayāmaḥ śatakrato |
GV00avs___u:11237: (AVŚ_20,68.10a) yo rāyo 'vanir mahānt supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā |
GV00avs___u:11239: (AVŚ_20,68.11a) ā tv etā ni ṣīdatendram abhi pra gāyata |
GV00avs___u:11243: (AVŚ_20,69.1a) sa ghā no yoga ā bhuvat sa rāye sa puraṃdhyām |
GV00avs___u:11245: (AVŚ_20,69.2a) yasya saṃsthe na vṛṇvate harī samatsu śatravaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11247: (AVŚ_20,69.3a) sutapāvne sutā ime śucayo yanti vītaye |
GV00avs___u:11249: (AVŚ_20,69.4a) tvaṃ sutasya pītaye sadyo vṛddho ajāyathāḥ |
GV00avs___u:11251: (AVŚ_20,69.5a) ā tvā viśantv āśavaḥ somāsa indra girvaṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11253: (AVŚ_20,69.6a) tvāṃ stomā avīvṛdhan tvām ukthā śatakrato |
GV00avs___u:11255: (AVŚ_20,69.7a) akṣitotiḥ saned imaṃ vājam indraḥ sahasriṇam |
GV00avs___u:11257: (AVŚ_20,69.8a) mā no martā abhi druhan tanūnām indra girvaṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11259: (AVŚ_20,69.9a) yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣam carantaṃ pari tasthuṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11261: (AVŚ_20,69.10a) yuñjanty asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe |
GV00avs___u:11263: (AVŚ_20,69.11a) ketuṃ kṛṇvann aketave peśo maryā apeśase |
GV00avs___u:11265: (AVŚ_20,69.12a) ād aha svadhām anu punar garbhatvam erire |
GV00avs___u:11267: (AVŚ_20,70.1a) vīlu cid ārujatnubhir guhā cid indra vahnibhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11269: (AVŚ_20,70.2a) devayanto yathā matim achā vidadvasuṃ giraḥ |
GV00avs___u:11271: (AVŚ_20,70.3a) indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣase saṃjagmāno abibhyuṣā |
GV00avs___u:11275: (AVŚ_20,70.5a) ataḥ parijmann ā gahi divo vā rocanād adhi |
GV00avs___u:11277: (AVŚ_20,70.6a) ito vā sātim īmahe divo vā pārthivād adhi |
GV00avs___u:11279: (AVŚ_20,70.7a) indram id gathino bṛhad indram arkebhir arkiṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11281: (AVŚ_20,70.8a) indra id dharyoḥ sacā saṃmiśla ā vacoyujā |
GV00avs___u:11283: (AVŚ_20,70.9a) indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi |
GV00avs___u:11287: (AVŚ_20,70.11a) indraṃ vayaṃ mahādhana indram arbhe havāmahe |
GV00avs___u:11289: (AVŚ_20,70.12a) sa no vṛṣann amuṃ caruṃ satrādāvann apā vṛdhi |
GV00avs___u:11291: (AVŚ_20,70.13a) tuñjetuñje ya uttare stomā indrasya vajriṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11293: (AVŚ_20,70.14a) vṛṣā yūtheva vaṃsagaḥ kṛṣṭīr iyarty ojasā |
GV00avs___u:11297: (AVŚ_20,70.16a) indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11301: (AVŚ_20,70.18a) ni yena muṣṭihatyayā ni vṛtrā ruṇadhāmahai |
GV00avs___u:11303: (AVŚ_20,70.19a) indra tvotāso ā vayaṃ vajraṃ ghanā dadīmahi |
GV00avs___u:11305: (AVŚ_20,70.20a) vayaṃ śūrebhir astṛbhir indra tvayā yujā vayam |
GV00avs___u:11307: (AVŚ_20,71.1a) mahāṃ indraḥ paraś ca nu mahitvam astu vajriṇe |
GV00avs___u:11309: (AVŚ_20,71.2a) samohe vā ya āśata naras tokasya sanitau |
GV00avs___u:11311: (AVŚ_20,71.3a) yaḥ kukṣiḥ somapātamaḥ samudra iva pinvate |
GV00avs___u:11313: (AVŚ_20,71.4a) evā hy asya sūnṛtā virapśī gomatī mahī |
GV00avs___u:11315: (AVŚ_20,71.5a) evā hi te vibhūtaya ūtaya indra māvate |
GV00avs___u:11317: (AVŚ_20,71.6a) evā hy asya kāmyā stoma ukthaṃ ca śaṃsyā |
GV00avs___u:11321: (AVŚ_20,71.8a) em enaṃ sṛjatā sute mandim indrāya mandine |
GV00avs___u:11325: (AVŚ_20,71.10a) asṛgram indra te giraḥ prati tvām ud ahāsata |
GV00avs___u:11327: (AVŚ_20,71.11a) sam codaya citram arvāg rādha indra vareṇyam |
GV00avs___u:11329: (AVŚ_20,71.12a) asmānt su tatra codayendra rāye rabhasvataḥ |
GV00avs___u:11331: (AVŚ_20,71.13a) saṃ gomad indra vājavad asme pṛthu śravo bṛhat |
GV00avs___u:11333: (AVŚ_20,71.14a) asme dhehi śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ sahasrasātamam |
GV00avs___u:11335: (AVŚ_20,71.15a) vasor indram vasupatiṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanta ṛgmiyam |
GV00avs___u:11337: (AVŚ_20,71.16a) sutesute nyokase bṛhad bṛhata ed ariḥ |
GV00avs___u:11339: (AVŚ_20,72.1a) viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānam ekaṃ vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svaḥ saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak |
GV00avs___u:11340: (AVŚ_20,72.1c) taṃ tvā nāvaṃ na parṣaṇiṃ śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi |
GV00avs___u:11341: (AVŚ_20,72.1e) indraṃ na yajñaiś catayanta āyava stomebhir indram āyavaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11342: (AVŚ_20,72.2a) vi tvā tatasre mithunā avasyavo vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣanta indra niḥsṛjaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11343: (AVŚ_20,72.2c) yad gavyantā dvā janā svar yantā samūhasi |
GV00avs___u:11344: (AVŚ_20,72.2e) āviṣ karikrad vṛṣaṇaṃ sacābhuvaṃ vajram indra sacābhuvam
GV00avs___u:11345: (AVŚ_20,72.3a) uto no asyā uṣaso juṣeta hy arkasya bodhi haviṣo havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ
GV00avs___u:11346: (AVŚ_20,72.3c) yad indra hantave mṛgho vṛṣā vajriṃ ciketasi |
GV00avs___u:11347: (AVŚ_20,72.3e) ā me asya vedhaso navīyaso manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:11348: (AVŚ_20,73.1a) tubhyed imā savanā śūra viśvā tubhyaṃ brahmāṇi vardhanā kṛṇomi |
GV00avs___u:11350: (AVŚ_20,73.2a) nū cin nu te manyamānasya dasmod aśnuvanti mahimānam ugra |
GV00avs___u:11351: (AVŚ_20,73.2c) na vīryam indra te na rādhaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11352: (AVŚ_20,73.3a) pra vo mahe mahivṛdhe bharadhvaṃ pracetase pra sumatiṃ kṛṇudhvam |
GV00avs___u:11354: (AVŚ_20,73.4a) yadā vajraṃ hiraṇyam id athā rathaṃ harī yamasya vahato vi sūribhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11355: (AVŚ_20,73.4c) ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sanaśruta indro vājasya dīrghaśravasas patiḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:11356: (AVŚ_20,73.5a) so cin nu vṛṣṭir yūthyā svā sacāṃ indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritābhi pruṣṇute |
GV00avs___u:11357: (AVŚ_20,73.5c) ava veti sukṣayaṃ sute madhūd id dhūṇoti vāto yathā vanam
GV00avs___u:11358: (AVŚ_20,73.6a) yo vācā vivāco mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrāśivā jaghāna |
GV00avs___u:11359: (AVŚ_20,73.6c) tattad id asya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasi piteva yas taviṣīṃ vāvṛdhe
GV00avs___u:11361: (AVŚ_20,74.1a) yac cid dhi satya somapā anāśastā iva smasi |

GV00avs___u:11382: (AVŚ_20,75.1a) vi tvā tatasre mithunā avasyavo vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣanta indra niḥsṛjaḥ |

GV00avs___u:11385: (AVŚ_20,75.2a) viduṣ ṭe asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puro yad indra śāradīr

GV00avs___u:11391: (AVŚ_20,75.3e) te anyāmanyāṃ nadyaṃ saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata ||3||
GV00avs___u:11392: (AVŚ_20,76.1a) vane na vā yo ny adhāyi cākraṃ chucir vāṃ stomo bhuraṇāv ajīgaḥ |

GV00avs___u:11394: (AVŚ_20,76.2a) pra te asyā uṣasaḥ prāparasyā nṛtau syāma nṛtam asya nṛṇām

GV00avs___u:11396: (AVŚ_20,76.3a) kas te mada indra rantyo bhūd duro giro abhy ugro vi dhāva
GV00avs___u:11397: (AVŚ_20,76.3c) kad vāho arvāg upa mā manīṣā ā tvā śakyām upamam rādho annaiḥ ||3||

GV00avs___u:11399: (AVŚ_20,76.4c) mitro na satya urugāya bhṛtyā anne samasya yad asan manīṣāḥ
GV00avs___u:11400: (AVŚ_20,76.5a) preraya sūro arthaṃ na pāraṃ ye asya kāmaṃ janidhā iva gman |
GV00avs___u:11401: (AVŚ_20,76.5c) giraś ca ye te tuvijāta pūrvīr nara indra pratiśikṣanty
GV00avs___u:11403: (AVŚ_20,76.6a) mātre nu te sumite indra pūrvī dyaur majmanā pṛthivī
GV00avs___u:11405: (AVŚ_20,76.6c) varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādnan bhavantu pītaye madhūni ||6||

GV00avs___u:11413: (AVŚ_20,77.1a) ā satyo yātu maghavāṃ ṛjīṣī dravantv asya haraya upa naḥ |
GV00avs___u:11414: (AVŚ_20,77.1c) tasmā id andhaḥ suṣumā sudakṣam ihābhipitvaṃ karate gṛṇānaḥ ||1||

GV00avs___u:11416: (AVŚ_20,77.2c) śaṃsāty uktham uśaneva vedhāś cikituṣe asuryāya manma ||2||
GV00avs___u:11417: (AVŚ_20,77.3a) kavir na niṇyaṃ vidathāni sādhan vṛṣā yat sekaṃ vipipāno
GV00avs___u:11419: (AVŚ_20,77.3c) diva itthā jījanat sapta kārūn ahnā cic cakrur vayunā
GV00avs___u:11421: (AVŚ_20,77.4a) svar yad vedi sudṛśīkam arkair mahi jyotī rurucur yad dha vastoḥ |
GV00avs___u:11422: (AVŚ_20,77.4c) andhā tamāṃsi dudhitā vicakṣe nṛbhyaś cakāra nṛtamo abhiṣṭau ||4||

GV00avs___u:11424: (AVŚ_20,77.5c) ataś cid asya mahimā vi recy abhi yo viśvā bhuvanā babhūva ||5||
GV00avs___u:11425: (AVŚ_20,77.6a) viśvāni śakro naryāṇi vidvān apo rireca sakhibhir nikāmaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11426: (AVŚ_20,77.6c) aśmānaṃ cid ye bibhidur vacobhir vrajam gomantam uśijo vi
GV00avs___u:11428: (AVŚ_20,77.7a) apo vṛtraṃ vavrivāṃsaṃ parāhan prāvat te vajraṃ pṛthivī sacetāḥ |
GV00avs___u:11429: (AVŚ_20,77.7c) prārṇāṃsi samudriyāṇy ainoḥ patir bhavaṃ chavasā śūra dhṛṣṇo ||7||
GV00avs___u:11430: (AVŚ_20,77.8a) apo yad adriṃ puruhūta dardar āvir bhuvat saramā pūrvyaṃ te
GV00avs___u:11431: (AVŚ_20,77.8c) sa no netā vājam ā darṣi bhūriṃ gotrā rujann aṅgirobhir gṛṇānaḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:11432: (AVŚ_20,78.1a) tad vo gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane |
GV00avs___u:11434: (AVŚ_20,78.2a) na ghā vasur ni yamate dānaṃ vājasya gomataḥ |
GV00avs___u:11436: (AVŚ_20,78.3a) kuvitsasya pra hi vrajaṃ gomantaṃ dasyuhā gamat |
GV00avs___u:11438: (AVŚ_20,79.1a) indra kratuṃ na ā bhara pitā putrebhyo yathā |
GV00avs___u:11439: (AVŚ_20,79.1c) śikṣā ṇo asmin puruhūta yāmani jīvā jyotir aśīmahi ||1||
GV00avs___u:11440: (AVŚ_20,79.2a) mā no ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyo māśivāso ava kramuḥ |
GV00avs___u:11441: (AVŚ_20,79.2c) tvayā vayaṃ pravataḥ śaśvatīr apo 'ti śūra tarāmasi ||2||
GV00avs___u:11442: (AVŚ_20,80.1a) indra jyeṣṭhaṃ na ā bharaṃ ojiṣṭhaṃ papuri śravaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11443: (AVŚ_20,80.1c) yeneme citra vajrahasta rodasī obhe suśipra prāḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11444: (AVŚ_20,80.2a) tvām ugram avase carṣaṇīsahaṃ rājan deveṣu hūmahe |
GV00avs___u:11445: (AVŚ_20,80.2c) viśvā su no vithurā pibdanā vaso 'mitrān suṣahān kṛdhi ||2||
GV00avs___u:11446: (AVŚ_20,81.1a) yad dyāva indra te śataṃ śataṃ bhūmir uta syuḥ |
GV00avs___u:11447: (AVŚ_20,81.1c) na tvā vajrint sahasraṃ sūryā anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī
GV00avs___u:11448: (AVŚ_20,81.2a) ā paprātha mahinā kṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā |
GV00avs___u:11449: (AVŚ_20,81.2c) asmāṃ ava maghavan gomati vraje vajrim citrābhir ūtibhiḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11450: (AVŚ_20,82.1a) yad indra yāvatas tvam etāvad aham īśīya |
GV00avs___u:11451: (AVŚ_20,82.1c) stotāram id didhiṣeya radāvaso na pāpatvāya rāsīya ||1||
GV00avs___u:11452: (AVŚ_20,82.2a) śikṣeyam in mahayate divedive rāya ā kuhacidvide |
GV00avs___u:11453: (AVŚ_20,82.2c) nahi tvad anyan maghavan na āpyaṃ vasyo asti pitā cana
GV00avs___u:11455: (AVŚ_20,83.1c) chardir yacha maghavadbhyaś ca mahyaṃ ca yāvayā didyum ebhyaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11456: (AVŚ_20,83.2a) ye gavyatā manasā śatrum ādabhur abhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā |
GV00avs___u:11457: (AVŚ_20,83.2c) agha smā no maghavann indra girvaṇas tanūpā antamo bhava
GV00avs___u:11458: (AVŚ_20,84.1a) indrā yāhi citrabhāno sutā ime tvāyavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11462: (AVŚ_20,84.3a) indrā yāhi tūtujāna upa brahmāṇi harivaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11464: (AVŚ_20,85.1a) mā cid anyad vi śaṃsata sakhāyo mā riṣaṇyata |
GV00avs___u:11465: (AVŚ_20,85.1c) indram it stotā vṛṣaṇaṃ sacā sute muhur ukthā ca śaṃsata
GV00avs___u:11466: (AVŚ_20,85.2a) avakrakṣiṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yathājuram gāṃ na carṣaṇīsaham |

GV00avs___u:11469: (AVŚ_20,85.3c) asmākaṃ brahmedam indra bhūtu te 'hā viśvā ca vardhanam
GV00avs___u:11470: (AVŚ_20,85.4a) vi tartūryante maghavan vipaścito 'ryo vipo janānām |
GV00avs___u:11471: (AVŚ_20,85.4c) upa kramasva pururūpam ā bhara vājaṃ nediṣṭham ūtaye ||4||
GV00avs___u:11472: (AVŚ_20,86.1a) brahmaṇā te brahmayujā yunajmi harī sakhāyā sadhamāda āśū |
GV00avs___u:11473: (AVŚ_20,86.1c) sthiraṃ rathaṃ sukham indrādhitiṣṭhan prajānan vidvāṃ upa yāhi somam ||1||
GV00avs___u:11474: (AVŚ_20,87.1a) adhvaryavo 'ruṇaṃ dugdham aṃśuṃ juhotana vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām |
GV00avs___u:11475: (AVŚ_20,87.1c) gaurād vedīyāṃ avapānam indro viśvāhed yāti sutasomam ichan ||1||
GV00avs___u:11476: (AVŚ_20,87.2a) yad dadhiṣe pradivi cārv annaṃ divedive pītim id asya vakṣi
GV00avs___u:11477: (AVŚ_20,87.2c) uta hṛdota manasā juṣāṇa uśann indra prasthitān pāhi somān
GV00avs___u:11478: (AVŚ_20,87.3a) jajñānaḥ somaṃ sahase papātha pra te mātā mahimānam uvāca |
GV00avs___u:11479: (AVŚ_20,87.3c) endra paprāthorv antarikṣaṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaś cakartha
GV00avs___u:11480: (AVŚ_20,87.4a) yad yodhayā mahato manyamānān sākṣāma tān bāhubhiḥ śāśadānān |
GV00avs___u:11481: (AVŚ_20,87.4c) yad vā nṛbhir vṛta indrābhiyudhyās taṃ tvayājiṃ sauśravasaṃ jayema ||4||
GV00avs___u:11482: (AVŚ_20,87.5a) prendrasya vocaṃ prathamā kṛtāni pra nūtanā maghavā yā cakāra |
GV00avs___u:11483: (AVŚ_20,87.5c) yaded adevīr asahiṣṭa māyā athābhavat kevalaḥ somo asya ||5||
GV00avs___u:11484: (AVŚ_20,87.6a) tavedaṃ viśvam abhitaḥ paśavyaṃ yat paśyasi cakṣasā sūryasya |
GV00avs___u:11485: (AVŚ_20,87.6c) gavām asi gopatir eka indra bhakṣīmahi te prayatasya vasvaḥ
GV00avs___u:11486: (AVŚ_20,87.7a) bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya |
GV00avs___u:11487: (AVŚ_20,87.7c) dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV00avs___u:11489: (AVŚ_20,88.1a) yas tastambha sahasā vi jmo antān bṛhaspatis triṣadhastho raveṇa |
GV00avs___u:11490: (AVŚ_20,88.1c) taṃ pratnāsa ṛṣayo dīdhyānāḥ puro viprā dadhire mandrajihvam ||1||
GV00avs___u:11491: (AVŚ_20,88.2a) dhunetayaḥ supraketaṃ madanto bṛhaspate abhi ye nas tatasre |
GV00avs___u:11492: (AVŚ_20,88.2c) pṛṣantaṃ sṛpram adabdham ūrvaṃ bṛhaspate rakṣatād asya yonim ||2||
GV00avs___u:11493: (AVŚ_20,88.3a) bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvad ata ā te ṛtaspṛśo ni ṣeduḥ |
GV00avs___u:11494: (AVŚ_20,88.3c) tubhyaṃ khātā avatā adridugdhā madhva ścotanty abhito virapśam ||3||
GV00avs___u:11495: (AVŚ_20,88.4a) bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāno maho jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman |
GV00avs___u:11496: (AVŚ_20,88.4c) saptāsyas tuvijāto raveṇa vi saptaraśmir adhamat tamāṃsi
GV00avs___u:11497: (AVŚ_20,88.5a) sa suṣṭubhā sa ṛkvatā gaṇena valaṃ ruroja phaligaṃ ravena |
GV00avs___u:11498: (AVŚ_20,88.5c) bṛhaspatir usriyā havyasūdaḥ kanikradad vāvaśatīr ud ājat
GV00avs___u:11499: (AVŚ_20,88.6a) evā pitre viśvadevāya vṛṣṇe yajñair vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11500: (AVŚ_20,88.6c) bṛhaspate suprajā vīravanto vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām
GV00avs___u:11501: (AVŚ_20,89.1a) asteva su prataraṃ lāyam asyan bhūṣann iva pra bharā stomam asmai |
GV00avs___u:11502: (AVŚ_20,89.1c) vācā viprās tarata vācam aryo ni rāmaya jaritaḥ soma indram
GV00avs___u:11503: (AVŚ_20,89.2a) dohena gām upa śikṣā sakhāyaṃ pra bodhaya jaritar jāram
GV00avs___u:11505: (AVŚ_20,89.2c) kośaṃ na pūrṇaṃ vasunā nyṛṣṭam ā cyāvaya maghadeyāya śūram
GV00avs___u:11506: (AVŚ_20,89.3a) kim aṅga tvā maghavan bhojam āhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayaṃ tvā śṛṇomi |
GV00avs___u:11507: (AVŚ_20,89.3c) apnasvatī mama dhīr astu śakra vasuvidaṃ bhagam indrā bharā
GV00avs___u:11509: (AVŚ_20,89.4a) tvāṃ janā mamasatyeṣv indra saṃtasthānā vi hvayante samīke |
GV00avs___u:11510: (AVŚ_20,89.4c) atrā yujaṃ kṛṇute yo haviṣmān nāsunvatā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭi śūraḥ
GV00avs___u:11511: (AVŚ_20,89.5a) dhanaṃ na spandraṃ bahulaṃ yo asmai tīvrānt somāṃ āsunoti
GV00avs___u:11513: (AVŚ_20,89.5c) tasmai śatrūnt sutukān prātar ahno ni svaṣṭrān yuvati hanti
GV00avs___u:11515: (AVŚ_20,89.6a) yasmin vayaṃ dadhimā śaṃsam indre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavā kāmam
GV00avs___u:11517: (AVŚ_20,89.6c) ārāc cit san bhayatām asya śatrur ny asmai dyumnā janyā namantām ||6||
GV00avs___u:11518: (AVŚ_20,89.7a) ārāc chatrum apa bādhasva dūram ugro yaḥ śambaḥ puruhūta
GV00avs___u:11520: (AVŚ_20,89.7c) asme dhehi yavamad gomad indra kṛdhī dhiyaṃ jaritre vājaratnām ||7||
GV00avs___u:11521: (AVŚ_20,89.8a) pra yam antar vṛṣasavāso ajman tīvrāḥ somā bahulāntāsa indram |
GV00avs___u:11522: (AVŚ_20,89.8c) nāha dāmānaṃ maghavā ni yaṃsan ni sunvate vahati bhūri
GV00avs___u:11524: (AVŚ_20,89.9a) uta prahām atidīvā jayati kṛtam iva śvaghnī vi cinoti kāle
GV00avs___u:11525: (AVŚ_20,89.9c) yo devakāmo na dhanaṃ ruṇaddhi sam it taṃ rāyaḥ sṛjati svadhābhiḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:11526: (AVŚ_20,89.10a) gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena vā kṣudhaṃ puruhūta viśve |
GV00avs___u:11527: (AVŚ_20,89.10c) vayaṃ rājasu prathamā dhanāny ariṣṭāso vṛjanībhir jayema
GV00avs___u:11528: (AVŚ_20,89.11a) bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghayoḥ |
GV00avs___u:11529: (AVŚ_20,89.11c) indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varīyaḥ kṛṇotu ||11||
GV00avs___u:11530: (AVŚ_20,90.1a) yo adribhit prathamajā ṛtāvā bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso haviṣmān |
GV00avs___u:11531: (AVŚ_20,90.1c) dvibarhajmā prāgharmasat pitā na ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti ||1||
GV00avs___u:11532: (AVŚ_20,90.2a) janāya cid ya īvate u lokaṃ bṛhaspatir devahūtau cakāra |
GV00avs___u:11533: (AVŚ_20,90.2c) ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puro dardarīti jayaṃ chatrūṃr amitrān pṛtsu sāhan ||2||
GV00avs___u:11534: (AVŚ_20,90.3a) bṛhaspatiḥ sam ajayad vasūni maho vrajān gomate deva eṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11535: (AVŚ_20,90.3c) apaḥ siṣāsant svar apratīto bṛhaspatir hanty amitram arkaiḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:11536: (AVŚ_20,91.1a) imāṃ dhiyaṃ saptaśīrṣṇīṃ pitā na ṛtaprajātāṃ bṛhatīm avindat |
GV00avs___u:11537: (AVŚ_20,91.1c) turīyaṃ svij janayad viśvajanyo 'yāsya uktham indrāya śaṃsan ||1||
GV00avs___u:11538: (AVŚ_20,91.2a) ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛju dīdhyānā divas putrāso asurasya vīrāḥ |
GV00avs___u:11539: (AVŚ_20,91.2c) vipraṃ padam aṅgiraso dadhānā yajñasya dhāma prathamaṃ mananta ||2||
GV00avs___u:11540: (AVŚ_20,91.3a) haṃsair iva sakhibhir vāvadadbhir aśmanmayāni nahanā
GV00avs___u:11542: (AVŚ_20,91.3c) bṛhaspatir abhikanikradad gā uta prāstaud uc ca vidvāṃ agāyat ||3||
GV00avs___u:11543: (AVŚ_20,91.4a) avo dvābhyāṃ para ekayā gā guhā tiṣṭhantīr anṛtasya setau |
GV00avs___u:11544: (AVŚ_20,91.4c) bṛhaspatis tamasi jyotir ichan ud usrā ākar vi hi tisra āvaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:11545: (AVŚ_20,91.5a) vibhidyā puraṃ śayathem apācīṃ nis trīṇi sākam udadher akṛntat |
GV00avs___u:11546: (AVŚ_20,91.5c) bṛhaspatir uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām arkaṃ viveda stanayann iva dyauḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:11547: (AVŚ_20,91.6a) indro valaṃ rakṣitāraṃ dughānāṃ kareṇeva vi cakartā raveṇa |
GV00avs___u:11548: (AVŚ_20,91.6c) svedāñjibhir āśiram ichamāno 'rodayat paṇim ā gā amuṣṇāt
GV00avs___u:11549: (AVŚ_20,91.7a) sa īṃ satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhir godhāyasaṃ vi dhanasair adardaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11550: (AVŚ_20,91.7c) brahmaṇas patir vṛṣabhir varāhair gharmasvedebhir draviṇaṃ
GV00avs___u:11552: (AVŚ_20,91.8a) te satyena manasā gopatiṃ gā iyānāsa iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11553: (AVŚ_20,91.8c) bṛhaspatir mithoavadyapebhir ud usriyā asṛjata svayugbhiḥ
GV00avs___u:11554: (AVŚ_20,91.9a) taṃ vardhayanto matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃham iva nānadataṃ sadhasthe |
GV00avs___u:11555: (AVŚ_20,91.9c) bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ śūrasātau bharebhare anu madema jiṣṇum
GV00avs___u:11556: (AVŚ_20,91.10a) yadā vājam asanad viśvarūpam ā dyām arukṣad uttarāṇi sadma
GV00avs___u:11557: (AVŚ_20,91.10c) bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhayanto nānā santo bibhrato jyotir āsā ||10||
GV00avs___u:11558: (AVŚ_20,91.11a) satyam āśiṣaṃ kṛṇutā vayodhai kīriṃ cid dhy avatha svebhir
GV00avs___u:11560: (AVŚ_20,91.11c) paścā mṛdho apa bhavantu viśvās tad rodasī śṛṇutaṃ viśvaminve ||11||
GV00avs___u:11561: (AVŚ_20,91.12a) indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinad arbudasya |
GV00avs___u:11562: (AVŚ_20,91.12c) ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:11563: (AVŚ_20,92.1a) abhi pra gopatiṃ girendram arca yathā vide |
GV00avs___u:11567: (AVŚ_20,92.3a) indrāya gāva āśiraṃ duduhre vajriṇe madhu |
GV00avs___u:11569: (AVŚ_20,92.4a) ud yad bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ gṛham indraś ca ganvahi |
GV00avs___u:11570: (AVŚ_20,92.4c) madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi triḥ sapta sakhyuḥ pade ||4||
GV00avs___u:11572: (AVŚ_20,92.5c) arcantu putrakā uta puraṃ na dhṛṣṇv arcata ||5||
GV00avs___u:11573: (AVŚ_20,92.6a) ava svarāti gargaro godhā pari saniṣvaṇat |
GV00avs___u:11575: (AVŚ_20,92.7a) ā yat patanty enyaḥ sudughā anapasphuraḥ |
GV00avs___u:11577: (AVŚ_20,92.8a) apād indro apād agnir viśve devā amatsata |
GV00avs___u:11578: (AVŚ_20,92.8c) varuṇa id iha kṣayat tam āpo abhy anūṣata vatsaṃ
GV00avs___u:11580: (AVŚ_20,92.9a) sudevo asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11582: (AVŚ_20,92.10a) yo vyatīṃr aphāṇayat suyuktāṃ upa dāśuṣe |
GV00avs___u:11583: (AVŚ_20,92.10c) takvo netā tad id vapur upamā yo amucyata ||10||
GV00avs___u:11584: (AVŚ_20,92.11a) atīd u śakra ohata indro viśvā ati dviṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11585: (AVŚ_20,92.11c) bhinat kanīna odanaṃ pacyamānaṃ paro girā ||11||
GV00avs___u:11586: (AVŚ_20,92.12a) arbhako na kumārako 'dhi tiṣṭhann avaṃ ratham |
GV00avs___u:11587: (AVŚ_20,92.12c) sa pakṣan mahiṣaṃ mṛgaṃ pitre mātre vibhukratum ||12||
GV00avs___u:11588: (AVŚ_20,92.13a) ā tū suśipra daṃpate rathaṃ tiṣṭhā hiraṇyayam |
GV00avs___u:11589: (AVŚ_20,92.13c) adha dyukṣaṃ sacevahi sahasrapādam aruṣaṃ svastigām
GV00avs___u:11591: (AVŚ_20,92.14a) tam ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate |
GV00avs___u:11592: (AVŚ_20,92.14c) arthaṃ cid asya sudhitaṃ yad etave āvartayanti dāvane ||14||
GV00avs___u:11594: (AVŚ_20,92.15c) pūrvām anu prayatiṃ vṛktabarhiṣo hitaprayasa āśata ||15||
GV00avs___u:11595: (AVŚ_20,92.16a) yo rājā carṣaṇīnāṃ yātā rathebhir adhriguḥ |
GV00avs___u:11596: (AVŚ_20,92.16c) viśvāsāṃ tarutā pṛtanānāṃ jyeṣṭho yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe ||16||
GV00avs___u:11597: (AVŚ_20,92.17a) indraṃ taṃ śumbha puruhanmann avase yasya dvitā vidhartari |
GV00avs___u:11598: (AVŚ_20,92.17c) hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśato maho dive na sūryaḥ
GV00avs___u:11599: (AVŚ_20,92.18a) nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśad yaś cakāra sadāvṛdham |
GV00avs___u:11600: (AVŚ_20,92.18c) indraṃ na yajñair viśvagūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭaṃ
GV00avs___u:11602: (AVŚ_20,92.19a) aṣālham ugraṃ pṛtanāsu sāsahiṃ yasmin mahīr urujrayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11603: (AVŚ_20,92.19c) saṃ dhenavo jāyamāne anonavur dyāvaḥ kṣāmo anonavuḥ ||19||
GV00avs___u:11604: (AVŚ_20,92.20a) yad dyāva indra te śataṃ śataṃ bhūmīr uta syuḥ |
GV00avs___u:11605: (AVŚ_20,92.20c) na tvā vajrint sahasraṃ sūryā anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī
GV00avs___u:11606: (AVŚ_20,92.21a) ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā |
GV00avs___u:11607: (AVŚ_20,92.21c) asmāṃ ava maghavan gomati vraje vajriṃ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:11608: (AVŚ_20,93.1a) ut tvā mandantu stomāḥ kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11610: (AVŚ_20,93.2a) padā paṇīṃr arādhaso ni bādhasva mahāṃ asi |
GV00avs___u:11612: (AVŚ_20,93.3a) tvam īśiṣe sutānām indra tvam asutānām |

GV00avs___u:11620: (AVŚ_20,93.7a) tvam indra sajoṣasam arkaṃ bibharṣi bāhvoḥ |
GV00avs___u:11622: (AVŚ_20,93.8a) tvam indrābhibhur asi viśvā jātāny ojasā |
GV00avs___u:11624: (AVŚ_20,94.1a) ā yātv indraḥ svapatir madāya yo dharmaṇā tūtujānas tuviṣmān |
GV00avs___u:11625: (AVŚ_20,94.1c) pratvakṣāṇo ati viśvā sahāṃsy apāreṇa mahatā vṛṣṇyena ||1||
GV00avs___u:11626: (AVŚ_20,94.2a) suṣṭhāmā rathaḥ suyamā harī te mimyakṣa vajro nṛpate gabhastau |

GV00avs___u:11628: (AVŚ_20,94.3a) endravāho nṛpatiṃ vajrabāhum ugram ugrāsas taviṣāsa enam |

GV00avs___u:11631: (AVŚ_20,94.4a) evā patiṃ droṇasācaṃ sacetasam ūrja skambhaṃ dharuṇa ā vṛṣāyase |
GV00avs___u:11632: (AVŚ_20,94.4c) ojaḥ kṛṣva saṃ gṛbhāya tve apy aso yathā kenipānām ino vṛdhe ||4||
GV00avs___u:11633: (AVŚ_20,94.5a) gamann asme vasūny ā hi śaṃsiṣaṃ svāśiṣaṃ bharam ā yāhi sominaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11634: (AVŚ_20,94.5c) tvam īśiṣe sāsminn ā satsi barhiṣy anādhṛṣyā tava pātrāṇi
GV00avs___u:11636: (AVŚ_20,94.6a) pṛthak prāyan prathamā devahūtayo 'kṛṇvata śravasyāni duṣṭarā |
GV00avs___u:11637: (AVŚ_20,94.6c) na ye śekur yajñiyāṃ nāvam āruham irmaiva te ny aviśanta kepayaḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:11638: (AVŚ_20,94.7a) evaivāpāg apare santu dūdhyo 'śvā yeṣāṃ duryuga āyuyujre |
GV00avs___u:11639: (AVŚ_20,94.7c) itthā ye prāg upare santi dāvane purūṇi yatra vayunāni
GV00avs___u:11641: (AVŚ_20,94.8a) girīṃr ajrān rejamānāṃ adhārayad dyauḥ krandad antarikṣāṇi kopayat |
GV00avs___u:11642: (AVŚ_20,94.8c) samīcīne dhiṣaṇe vi ṣkabhāyati vṛṣṇaḥ pītvā mada ukthāni śaṃsati ||8||
GV00avs___u:11643: (AVŚ_20,94.9a) imaṃ bibharmi sukṛtaṃ te aṅkuśaṃ yenārujāsi maghavaṃ chaphārujaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11644: (AVŚ_20,94.9c) asmint su te savane astv oktyaṃ suta iṣṭau maghavan bodhy ābhagaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:11645: (AVŚ_20,94.10a) gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudhaṃ puruhūta viśvām

GV00avs___u:11647: (AVŚ_20,94.11a) bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghayoḥ |
