GV00avs___u:11649: (AVŚ_20,95.1a) trikadrukeṣu mahiṣo yavāśiraṃ tuviśuṣmas tṛpat somam apibad viṣṇunā sutaṃ yathāvaśat
GV00avs___u:11650: (AVŚ_20,95.1c) sa īṃ mamāda mahi karma kartave mahām uruṃ sainaṃ saścad devo devaṃ satyam indraṃ satya induḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11651: (AVŚ_20,95.2a) pro ṣv asmai puroratham indrāya śūṣam arcata |
GV00avs___u:11652: (AVŚ_20,95.2c) abhīke cid u lokakṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahāsmākaṃ bodhi coditā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu ||2||
GV00avs___u:11654: (AVŚ_20,95.3c) aśatrur indra jajñiṣe viśvaṃ puṣyasi vāryaṃ taṃ tvā pari
GV00avs___u:11655: ṣvajāmahe nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu ||3||
GV00avs___u:11656: (AVŚ_20,95.4a) vi ṣu viśvā arātayo 'ryo naśanta no dhiyaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11657: (AVŚ_20,95.4c) astāsi śatrave vadhaṃ yo na indra jighāṃsati yā te rātir dadir vasu |
GV00avs___u:11659: (AVŚ_20,96.1a) tīvrasyābhivayaso asya pāhi sarvarathā vi harī iha muñca |
GV00avs___u:11660: (AVŚ_20,96.1c) indra mā tvā yajamānāso anye ni rīraman tubhyam ime sutāsaḥ
GV00avs___u:11661: (AVŚ_20,96.2a) tubhyaṃ sutās tubhyam u sotvāsas tvāṃ giraḥ śvātryā ā
GV00avs___u:11663: (AVŚ_20,96.2c) indredam adya savanaṃ juṣāṇo viśvasya vidvāṃ iha pāhi somam
GV00avs___u:11664: (AVŚ_20,96.3a) ya uśatā manasā somam asmai sarvahṛdā devakāmaḥ sunoti |
GV00avs___u:11665: (AVŚ_20,96.3c) na gā indras tasya parā dadāti praśastam ic cārum asmai kṛṇoti ||3||
GV00avs___u:11666: (AVŚ_20,96.4a) anuspaṣṭo bhavaty eṣo asya yo asmai revān na sunoti somam |
GV00avs___u:11667: (AVŚ_20,96.4c) nir aratnau maghavā taṃ dadhāti brahmadviṣo hanty anānudiṣṭaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:11668: (AVŚ_20,96.5a) aśvāyanto gavyanto vājayanto havāmahe tvopagantavā u |
GV00avs___u:11669: (AVŚ_20,96.5c) ābhūṣantas te sumatau navāyāṃ vayam indra tvā śunaṃ huvema
GV00avs___u:11670: (AVŚ_20,96.6a) muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñātayakṣmād uta rājayakṣmāt |
GV00avs___u:11671: (AVŚ_20,96.6c) grāhir jagrāha yady etad tasyā indrāgnī pra mumuktam enam
GV00avs___u:11672: (AVŚ_20,96.7a) yadi kṣitāyur yadi vā pareto yadi mṛtyor antikaṃ nīta eva |
GV00avs___u:11673: (AVŚ_20,96.7c) tam ā harāmi nirṛter upasthād aspārśam enaṃ śataśāradāya ||7||
GV00avs___u:11675: (AVŚ_20,96.8c) indro yathainaṃ śarado nayāty ati viśvasya duritasya pāram ||8||
GV00avs___u:11676: (AVŚ_20,96.9a) śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamānaḥ śataṃ hemantān chatam u vasantān |
GV00avs___u:11677: (AVŚ_20,96.9c) śataṃ ta indro agniḥ savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śatāyuṣā haviṣāhārṣam enam ||9||
GV00avs___u:11678: (AVŚ_20,96.10a) āhārṣam avidaṃ tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11679: (AVŚ_20,96.10c) sarvāṅga sarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuś ca te 'vidam ||10||
GV00avs___u:11681: (AVŚ_20,96.11c) amīvā yas te garbhaṃ durṇāmā yonim āśaye ||11||
GV00avs___u:11682: (AVŚ_20,96.12a) yas te garbham amīvā durṇāmā yonim āśaye |
GV00avs___u:11683: (AVŚ_20,96.12c) agniṣ ṭaṃ brahmaṇā saha niṣ kravyādam anīnaśat ||12||
GV00avs___u:11684: (AVŚ_20,96.13a) yas te hanti patayantaṃ niṣatsnuṃ yaḥ sarīsṛpam |
GV00avs___u:11685: (AVŚ_20,96.13c) jātaṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi ||13||
GV00avs___u:11686: (AVŚ_20,96.14a) yas ta ūrū viharaty antarā dampatī śaye |
GV00avs___u:11687: (AVŚ_20,96.14c) yoniṃ yo antar ārelhi tam ito nāśayāmasi ||14||
GV00avs___u:11688: (AVŚ_20,96.15a) yas tvā bhrātā patir bhūtvā jāro bhūtvā nipadyate |
GV00avs___u:11689: (AVŚ_20,96.15c) prajāṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi ||15||
GV00avs___u:11690: (AVŚ_20,96.16a) yas tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate |
GV00avs___u:11691: (AVŚ_20,96.16c) prajāṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi ||16||
GV00avs___u:11692: (AVŚ_20,96.17a) akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyāṃ chubukād adhi |
GV00avs___u:11693: (AVŚ_20,96.17c) yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ mastiṣkāj jihvāyā vi vṛhāmi te ||17||
GV00avs___u:11695: (AVŚ_20,96.18c) yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ vi vṛhāmi te ||18||
GV00avs___u:11696: (AVŚ_20,96.19a) hṛdayāt te pari klomno halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām |
GV00avs___u:11697: (AVŚ_20,96.19c) yakṣmaṃ matasnābhyāṃ plīhno yaknas te vi vṛhāmasi ||19||
GV00avs___u:11698: (AVŚ_20,96.20a) āntrebhyas te gudābhyo vaniṣṭhor udarād adhi |
GV00avs___u:11699: (AVŚ_20,96.20c) yakṣmaṃ kukṣibhyāṃ plāśer nābhyā vi vṛhāmi te ||20||
GV00avs___u:11701: (AVŚ_20,96.21c) yakṣmaṃ bhasadyaṃ śroṇibhyāṃ bhāsadaṃ bhāṃsaso vi vṛhāmi te ||21||
GV00avs___u:11703: (AVŚ_20,96.22[-]c) yakṣmaṃ sarvasmād ātmanas tam idaṃ vi vṛhāmi te ||22||
GV00avs___u:11705: (AVŚ_20,96.[-]22b) yakṣmaṃ pāṇibhyām aṅgulibhyo nakhebhyo vi vṛhāmi te
GV00avs___u:11707: (AVŚ_20,96.23c) yakṣaṃ tvacasyaṃ te vayaṃ kaśyapasya vībarheṇa viṣvañcaṃ vi vṛhāmasi ||23||
GV00avs___u:11708: (AVŚ_20,96.24a) apehi manasas pate 'pa kāma paraś cara |
GV00avs___u:11709: (AVŚ_20,96.24c) paro nirṛtyā ā cakṣva bahudhā jīvato manaḥ ||24||
GV00avs___u:11711: (AVŚ_20,97.1c) tasmā u adya samanā sutaṃ bharā nūnaṃ bhūṣata śrute ||1||
GV00avs___u:11712: (AVŚ_20,97.2a) vṛkaś cid asya vāraṇa urāmathir ā vayuneṣu bhūṣati |
GV00avs___u:11713: (AVŚ_20,97.2c) semaṃ naḥ stomaṃ jujuṣāṇa ā gahīndra pra citrayā dhiyā
GV00avs___u:11714: (AVŚ_20,97.3a) kad u nv asyākṛtam indrasyāsti pauṃsyam |
GV00avs___u:11715: (AVŚ_20,97.3c) keno nu kaṃ śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā ||3||
GV00avs___u:11716: (AVŚ_20,98.1a) tvām id dhi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11717: (AVŚ_20,98.1c) tvāṃ vṛtreṣv indra satpatiṃ naras tvāṃ kāṣṭhāsv arvataḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11718: (AVŚ_20,98.2a) sa tvaṃ naś citra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyā maha stavāno adrivaḥ
GV00avs___u:11719: (AVŚ_20,98.2c) gām aśvaṃ rathyam indra saṃ kira satrā vājaṃ na jigyuṣe
GV00avs___u:11720: (AVŚ_20,99.1a) abhi tvā pūrvapītaya indra stomebhir āyavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11721: (AVŚ_20,99.1c) samīcīnāsa ṛbhavaḥ sam asvaran rudrā gṛṇanta pūrvyam ||1||
GV00avs___u:11722: (AVŚ_20,99.2a) asyed indro vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo made sutasya viṣṇavi |
GV00avs___u:11723: (AVŚ_20,99.2c) adyā tam asya mahimānam āyavo 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā ||2||
GV00avs___u:11724: (AVŚ_20,100.1a) adhā hīndra girvaṇa upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe |
GV00avs___u:11726: (AVŚ_20,100.2a) vār ṇa tvā yavyābhir vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi |
GV00avs___u:11728: (AVŚ_20,100.3a) yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayorau ratha uruyuge |
GV00avs___u:11734: (AVŚ_20,101.3a) agne devāṃ ihā vaha jajñāno vṛktabarhiṣe |
GV00avs___u:11738: (AVŚ_20,102.2a) vṛṣo agniḥ sam idhyate 'śvo na devavāhanaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11740: (AVŚ_20,102.3a) vṛṣaṇaṃ tvā vayaṃ vṛṣan vṛṣaṇaḥ sam idhīmahi |
GV00avs___u:11743: (AVŚ_20,103.1c) agniṃ rāye purumīlha śrutaṃ naro 'gniṃ sudītaye chardiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11744: (AVŚ_20,103.2a) agna ā yāhy agnibhir hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe |
GV00avs___u:11745: (AVŚ_20,103.2c) ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭhaṃ barhir āsade ||2||
GV00avs___u:11746: (AVŚ_20,103.3a) acha hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaś caranty adhvare |
GV00avs___u:11747: (AVŚ_20,103.3c) ūrjo napātaṃ ghṛtakeśam īmahe 'gniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam ||3||
GV00avs___u:11748: (AVŚ_20,104.1a) imā u tvā purūvaso giro vardhantu yā mama |
GV00avs___u:11750: (AVŚ_20,104.2a) ayaṃ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudra iva paprathe |
GV00avs___u:11751: (AVŚ_20,104.2c) satyaḥ so asya mahimā gṛne śavo yajñeṣu viprarājye ||2||
GV00avs___u:11752: (AVŚ_20,104.3a) ā no viśvāsu havya indraḥ samatsu bhūṣatu |
GV00avs___u:11753: (AVŚ_20,104.3c) upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtrahā paramajyā ṛcīṣamaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:11754: (AVŚ_20,104.4a) tvaṃ dātā prathamo rāghasām asy asi satya īśānakṛt |
GV00avs___u:11755: (AVŚ_20,104.4c) tuvidyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavaso mahaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:11756: (AVŚ_20,105.1a) tvam indra pratūrtiṣv abhi viśvā asi spṛdhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11757: (AVŚ_20,105.1c) aśastihā janitā viśvatūr asi tvaṃ tūrya taruṣyataḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11758: (AVŚ_20,105.2a) anu te śuṣmaṃ turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśuṃ na mātarā |
GV00avs___u:11759: (AVŚ_20,105.2c) viśvās te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtraṃ yad indra tūrvasi ||2||
GV00avs___u:11760: (AVŚ_20,105.3a) ita ūtī vo ajaraṃ prahetāram aprahitam |
GV00avs___u:11761: (AVŚ_20,105.3c) āśuṃ jetāraṃ hetāraṃ rathītamam atūrtaṃ tugryāvṛdham ||3||
GV00avs___u:11762: (AVŚ_20,105.4a) yo rājā carṣaṇīnāṃ yātā rathebhir adhriguḥ |
GV00avs___u:11763: (AVŚ_20,105.4c) viśvāsāṃ tarutā pṛtanānāṃ jyeṣṭho yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe ||4||
GV00avs___u:11764: (AVŚ_20,105.5a) indraṃ taṃ śumbha puruhanmann avase yasya dvitā vidhartari |
GV00avs___u:11765: (AVŚ_20,105.5c) hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśato maho dive na sūryaḥ
GV00avs___u:11766: (AVŚ_20,106.1a) tava tyad indriyaṃ bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum |
GV00avs___u:11768: (AVŚ_20,106.2a) tava dyaur indra pauṃsyaṃ pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11770: (AVŚ_20,106.3a) tvāṃ viṣṇur bṛhan kṣayo mitro gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11772: (AVŚ_20,107.1a) sam asya manyave viśo viśvā namanta kuṣṭayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11774: (AVŚ_20,107.2a) ojas tad asya titviṣa ubhe yat samavartayat |
GV00avs___u:11776: (AVŚ_20,107.3a) vi cid vṛtrasya dodhato vajreṇa śataparvaṇā |
GV00avs___u:11778: (AVŚ_20,107.4a) tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaṃ yato jajña ugras tveṣanṛmṇaḥ
GV00avs___u:11779: (AVŚ_20,107.4c) sadyo jajñāno ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yad enaṃ madanti viśva ūmāḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:11780: (AVŚ_20,107.5a) vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojāḥ śatrur dāsāya bhiyasaṃ dadhāti
GV00avs___u:11781: (AVŚ_20,107.5c) avyanac ca vyanac ca sasni saṃ te navanta prabhṛtā madeṣu
GV00avs___u:11782: (AVŚ_20,107.6a) tve kratum api pṛñcanti bhūri dvir yad ete trir bhavanty ūmāḥ |
GV00avs___u:11783: (AVŚ_20,107.6c) svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛjā sam adaḥ su madhu madhunābhi
GV00avs___u:11785: (AVŚ_20,107.7a) yadi cin nu tvā dhanā jayantaṃ raṇeraṇe anumadanti viprāḥ
GV00avs___u:11786: (AVŚ_20,107.7c) ojīyaḥ śuṣmint sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan durevāsaḥ
GV00avs___u:11788: (AVŚ_20,107.8a) tvayā vayaṃ śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyanto yudhenyāni bhūri
GV00avs___u:11789: (AVŚ_20,107.8c) codayāmi ta āyudhā vacobhiḥ saṃ te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi
GV00avs___u:11790: (AVŚ_20,107.9a) ni tad dadhiṣe 'vare pare ca yasminn āvithāvasā duroṇe |
GV00avs___u:11791: (AVŚ_20,107.9c) ā sthāpayata mātaraṃ jigatnum ata invata karvarāṇi bhūri ||9||
GV00avs___u:11792: (AVŚ_20,107.10a) stuṣva varṣman puruvartmānaṃ sam ṛbhvāṇam inatamam āptam āptyānām |
GV00avs___u:11793: (AVŚ_20,107.10c) ā darśati śavasā bhūryojāḥ pra sakṣati pratimānaṃ pṛthivyāḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:11794: (AVŚ_20,107.11a) imā brahma bṛhaddivaḥ kṛṇavad indrāya śūṣam agniyaḥ svarṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:11795: (AVŚ_20,107.11c) maho gotrasya kṣayati svarājā turaś cid viśvam arṇavat tapasvān ||11||
GV00avs___u:11796: (AVŚ_20,107.12a) evā mahān bṛhaddivo atharvāvocat svāṃ tanvam indram eva |
GV00avs___u:11797: (AVŚ_20,107.12c) svasārau mātaribhvarī aripre hinvanti caine śavasā
GV00avs___u:11799: (AVŚ_20,107.13a) citraṃ devānāṃ ketur anīkaṃ jyotiṣmān pradiśaḥ sūrya udyan |
GV00avs___u:11800: (AVŚ_20,107.13c) divākaro 'ti dyumnais tamāṃsi viśvātārīd duritāni śukraḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:11801: (AVŚ_20,107.14a) citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ |
GV00avs___u:11802: (AVŚ_20,107.14c) āprād dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas
GV00avs___u:11804: (AVŚ_20,107.15a) sūryo devīm uṣasaṃ rocamānāṃ maryo na yoṣām abhy eti
GV00avs___u:11806: (AVŚ_20,107.15c) yatrā naro devayanto yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram ||15||
GV00avs___u:11807: (AVŚ_20,108.1a) tvaṃ na indrā bharaṃ ojo nṛmṇaṃ śatakrato vicarṣaṇe |
GV00avs___u:11809: (AVŚ_20,108.2a) tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā vaso tvaṃ mātā śatakrato babhūvitha |
GV00avs___u:11811: (AVŚ_20,108.3a) tvāṃ śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato |
GV00avs___u:11813: (AVŚ_20,109.1a) svādor itthā viṣuvato madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11814: (AVŚ_20,109.1c) yā indreṇa sayāvarīr vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīr anu svarājyam ||1||
GV00avs___u:11815: (AVŚ_20,109.2a) tā asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11816: (AVŚ_20,109.2c) priyā indrasya dhenavo vajraṃ hinvanti sāyakaṃ vasvīr anu svarājyam ||2||
GV00avs___u:11817: (AVŚ_20,109.3a) tā asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11818: (AVŚ_20,109.3c) vratāny asya saścire purūṇi pūrvacittaye vasvīr anu svarājyam ||3||
GV00avs___u:11819: (AVŚ_20,110.1a) indrāya madūne sutaṃ pari ṣṭobhantu no giraḥ |
GV00avs___u:11821: (AVŚ_20,110.2a) yasmin viśvā adhi śriyo raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11825: (AVŚ_20,111.1a) yat somam indra viṣṇavi yad vā gha trita āptye |
GV00avs___u:11826: (AVŚ_20,111.1c) yad vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11827: (AVŚ_20,111.2a) yad vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase |
GV00avs___u:11828: (AVŚ_20,111.2c) asmākam it sute raṇā sam indubhiḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11829: (AVŚ_20,111.3a) yad vāsi sunvato vṛdho yajamānasya satpate |
GV00avs___u:11830: (AVŚ_20,111.3c) ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:11831: (AVŚ_20,112.1a) yad adya kac ca vṛtrahann udagā abhi sūrya |
GV00avs___u:11833: (AVŚ_20,112.2a) yad vā pravṛddha satpate na marā iti manyase |
GV00avs___u:11835: (AVŚ_20,112.3a) ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire |
GV00avs___u:11837: (AVŚ_20,113.1a) ubhayaṃ śṛṇavac ca na indro arvāg idaṃ vacaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11838: (AVŚ_20,113.1c) satrācyā maghavā somapītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭha ā gamat ||1||
GV00avs___u:11839: (AVŚ_20,113.2a) taṃ hi svarājaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tam ojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ |
GV00avs___u:11840: (AVŚ_20,113.2c) utopamānāṃ prathamo ni ṣīdasi somakāmaṃ hi te manaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11841: (AVŚ_20,114.1a) abhrātṛvyo'anā tvam anāpir indra januṣā sanād asi |
GV00avs___u:11843: (AVŚ_20,114.2a) nakī revantaṃ sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11844: (AVŚ_20,114.2c) yadā kṛṇoṣi nadanuṃ sam ūhasy ād it piteva hūyase ||2||
GV00avs___u:11845: (AVŚ_20,115.1a) aham id dhi pituṣ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha |
GV00avs___u:11847: (AVŚ_20,115.2a) ahaṃ pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇvavat |
GV00avs___u:11849: (AVŚ_20,115.3a) ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvur ṛṣayo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ |
GV00avs___u:11851: (AVŚ_20,116.1a) mā bhūma niṣṭyā ivendra tvad araṇā iva |
GV00avs___u:11852: (AVŚ_20,116.1c) vanāni ni prajahitāny adrivo duroṣāso amanmahi ||1||
GV00avs___u:11854: (AVŚ_20,116.2c) sukṛt su te mahatā śūra rādhasānu stomaṃ mudīmahi ||2||
GV00avs___u:11855: (AVŚ_20,117.1a) pibā somam indra mandatu tvā yaṃ te suṣāva haryaśvādriḥ |
GV00avs___u:11857: (AVŚ_20,117.2a) yas te mado yujas cārur asti yena vṛtrāṇi haryaśva haṃsi |
GV00avs___u:11859: (AVŚ_20,117.3a) bodhā su me maghavan vācam emāṃ yāṃ te vasiṣṭho arcati praśastim |
GV00avs___u:11861: (AVŚ_20,118.1a) śagdhy ū ṣu śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11862: (AVŚ_20,118.1c) bhagaṃ na hi tvā yaśasaṃ vasuvidam anu śūra carāmasi ||1||
GV00avs___u:11863: (AVŚ_20,118.2a) pauro aśvasya purukṛd gavām asy utso deva hiraṇyayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11864: (AVŚ_20,118.2c) nakir hi dānaṃ parimardhiṣat tve yadyad yāmi tad ā bhara
GV00avs___u:11865: (AVŚ_20,118.3a) indram id devatātaye indraṃ prayaty adhvare |
GV00avs___u:11866: (AVŚ_20,118.3c) indraṃ samīke vanino havāmaha indraṃ dhanasya sātaye ||3||
GV00avs___u:11867: (AVŚ_20,118.4a) indro mahnā rodasī paprathac chava indraḥ sūryam arocayat |
GV00avs___u:11868: (AVŚ_20,118.4c) indre ha viśvā bhuvanāni yemira indre suvānāsa indavaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:11870: (AVŚ_20,119.1c) pūrvīr ṛtasya bṛhatīr anūṣata stotur meghā asṛkṣata ||1||
GV00avs___u:11871: (AVŚ_20,119.2a) turaṇyavo madhumantaṃ ghṛtaścutaṃ viprāso arkam ānṛcuḥ |
GV00avs___u:11872: (AVŚ_20,119.2c) asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo 'sme suvānāsa indavaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11873: (AVŚ_20,120.1a) yad indra prāg apāg udaṅ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11874: (AVŚ_20,120.1c) simā purū nṛṣūto asy ānave 'si praśardha turvaśe ||1||
GV00avs___u:11875: (AVŚ_20,120.2a) yad vā rume ruśame śyāvake kṛpa indra mādayase sacā |
GV00avs___u:11876: (AVŚ_20,120.2c) kaṇvāsas tvā brahmabhi stomavāhasa indrā yachanty ā gahi ||2||
GV00avs___u:11877: (AVŚ_20,121.1a) abhi tvā śūra nonumo 'dugdhā iva dhenavaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11878: (AVŚ_20,121.1c) īśānam asya jagataḥ svardṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:11879: (AVŚ_20,121.2a) na tvāvāṃ anyo divyo na pārthivo na jāto na janiṣyate |
GV00avs___u:11880: (AVŚ_20,121.2c) aśvāyanto maghavann indra vājino gavyantas tvā havāmahe
GV00avs___u:11881: (AVŚ_20,122.1a) revatīr naḥ sadhamāda indre santu tuvivājāḥ |
GV00avs___u:11883: (AVŚ_20,122.2a) ā gha tvāvān tmanāpta stotṛbhyo dhṛṣṇav iyānaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11885: (AVŚ_20,122.3a) ā yad duvaḥ śatakratav ā kāmaṃ jaritṝṇām |
GV00avs___u:11887: (AVŚ_20,123.1a) tat sūryasya devatvaṃ tan mahitvaṃ madhyā kartor vitataṃ saṃ jabhāra |
GV00avs___u:11888: (AVŚ_20,123.1c) yaded ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthād ād rātrī vāsas tanute simasmai ||1||
GV00avs___u:11889: (AVŚ_20,123.2a) tan mitrasya varuṇasyābhicakṣe sūryo rūpaṃ kṛṇute dyor upasthe |
GV00avs___u:11890: (AVŚ_20,123.2c) anantam anyad ruśad asya prājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyad dharitaḥ saṃ
GV00avs___u:11892: (AVŚ_20,124.1a) kayā naś citra ā bhuvad ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā |
GV00avs___u:11894: (AVŚ_20,124.2a) kas tvā satyo madānāṃ maṃhiṣṭho matsad andhasaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11896: (AVŚ_20,124.3a) abhī ṣu naḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām |
GV00avs___u:11898: (AVŚ_20,124.4a) imā nu kaṃ bhuvanā sīṣadhāmendraś ca viśve ca devāḥ |
GV00avs___u:11899: (AVŚ_20,124.4c) yajñaṃ ca nas tanvaṃ ca prajāṃ cādityair indraḥ saha
GV00avs___u:11901: (AVŚ_20,124.5a) ādityair indraḥ sagaṇo marudbhir asmākaṃ bhūtv avitā tanūnām |
GV00avs___u:11902: (AVŚ_20,124.5c) hatvāya devā asurān yad āyan devā devatvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ ||5||
GV00avs___u:11903: (AVŚ_20,124.6a) pratyañcam arkam anayaṃ chacībhir ād it svadhām iṣirām pary apaśyan |
GV00avs___u:11904: (AVŚ_20,124.6c) ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:11905: (AVŚ_20,125.1a) apendra prāco maghavann amitrān apāpāco abhibhūte nudasva
GV00avs___u:11906: (AVŚ_20,125.1c) apodīco apa śūrādharāca urau yathā tava śarman madema ||1||
GV00avs___u:11907: (AVŚ_20,125.2a) kuvid aṅga yavamanto yavaṃ cid yathā dānty anupūrvaṃ viyūya |
GV00avs___u:11908: (AVŚ_20,125.2c) ihehaiṣāṃ kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣo namovṛktiṃ na jagmuḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11909: (AVŚ_20,125.3a) nahi sthūry ṛtuthā yātam asti nota śravo vivide saṃgameṣu
GV00avs___u:11910: (AVŚ_20,125.3c) gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyanto vṛṣaṇaṃ
GV00avs___u:11912: (AVŚ_20,125.4a) yuvaṃ surāmam aśvinā namucāv āsure sacā |
GV00avs___u:11913: (AVŚ_20,125.4c) vipipānā śubhas patī indraṃ karmasv āvatam ||4||
GV00avs___u:11914: (AVŚ_20,125.5a) putram iva pitarāv aśvinobhendrāvathuḥ kāvyair daṃsanābhiḥ
GV00avs___u:11915: (AVŚ_20,125.5c) yat surāmaṃ vy apibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavann abhiṣṇak ||5||
GV00avs___u:11916: (AVŚ_20,125.6a) indraḥ sutrāmā svavāṃ avobhiḥ sumṛḍīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ
GV00avs___u:11917: (AVŚ_20,125.6c) bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ naḥ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma ||6||
GV00avs___u:11918: (AVŚ_20,125.7a) sa sutrāmā svavāṃ indro asmad ārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar
GV00avs___u:11920: (AVŚ_20,125.7c) tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma
GV00avs___u:11921: (AVŚ_20,126.1a) vi hi sotor asṛkṣata nendraṃ devam amaṃsata |
GV00avs___u:11922: (AVŚ_20,126.1c) yatrāmadad vṛṣākapir aryaḥ puṣṭeṣu matsakhā viśvasmād
GV00avs___u:11924: (AVŚ_20,126.2a) parā hīndra dhāvasi vṛṣākaper ati vyathiḥ |
GV00avs___u:11925: (AVŚ_20,126.2c) no aha pra vindasy anyatra somapītaye viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11926: (AVŚ_20,126.3a) kim ayaṃ tvāṃ vṛṣākapiś cakāra harito mṛgaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11927: (AVŚ_20,126.3c) yasmā irasyasīd u nv aryo vā puṣṭimad vasu viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:11928: (AVŚ_20,126.4a) yam imaṃ tvaṃ vṛṣākapiṃ priyam indrābhirakṣasi |
GV00avs___u:11929: (AVŚ_20,126.4c) śvā nv asya jambhiṣad api karṇe varāhayur viśvasmād indra
GV00avs___u:11931: (AVŚ_20,126.5a) priyā taṣṭāni me kapir vyaktā vy adūduṣat |
GV00avs___u:11932: (AVŚ_20,126.5c) śiro nv asya rāviṣaṃ na sugaṃ duṣkṛte bhuvaṃ viśvasmād
GV00avs___u:11934: (AVŚ_20,126.6a) na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat |
GV00avs___u:11935: (AVŚ_20,126.6c) na mat praticyavīyasī na sakthy udyamīyasī viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||6||
GV00avs___u:11937: (AVŚ_20,126.7c) bhasan me amba sakthi me śiro me vīva hṛṣyati viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:11939: (AVŚ_20,126.8c) kiṃ śūrapatni nas tvam abhy amīṣi vṛṣākapiṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||8||
GV00avs___u:11940: (AVŚ_20,126.9a) avīrām iva mām ayaṃ śarārur abhi manyate |
GV00avs___u:11941: (AVŚ_20,126.9c) utāham asmi vīriṇīndrapatnī marutsakhā viśvasmād indra
GV00avs___u:11943: (AVŚ_20,126.10a) saṃhotraṃ sma purā nārī samanaṃ vāva gachati |
GV00avs___u:11944: (AVŚ_20,126.10c) vedhā ṛtasya vīriṇīndrapatnī mahīyate viśvasmād indra
GV00avs___u:11946: (AVŚ_20,126.11a) indrāṇīm āsu nāriṣu subhagām aham aśravam |
GV00avs___u:11947: (AVŚ_20,126.11c) nahy asyā aparaṃ cana jarasā marate patir viśvasmād indra
GV00avs___u:11949: (AVŚ_20,126.12a) nāham indrāṇi rāraṇa sakhyur vṛṣākaper ṛte |
GV00avs___u:11950: (AVŚ_20,126.12c) yasyedam apyaṃ haviḥ priyaṃ deveṣu gachati viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:11951: (AVŚ_20,126.13a) vṛsākapāyi revati suputra ād u susnuṣe |
GV00avs___u:11952: (AVŚ_20,126.13c) ghasat ta indra ukṣaṇaḥ priyaṃ kācitkaraṃ havir viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ
GV00avs___u:11953: (AVŚ_20,126.14a) ukṣṇo hi me pañcadaśa sākaṃ pacanti viṃsatim |
GV00avs___u:11954: (AVŚ_20,126.14c) utāham admi pīva id ubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||14||
GV00avs___u:11956: (AVŚ_20,126.15c) manthas ta indra śaṃ hṛde yaṃ te sunoti bhāvayur
GV00avs___u:11958: (AVŚ_20,126.16a) na seśe yasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛt |
GV00avs___u:11959: (AVŚ_20,126.16c) sedīśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||16||
GV00avs___u:11960: (AVŚ_20,126.17a) na seśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate |
GV00avs___u:11961: (AVŚ_20,126.17c) sedīśe yasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛt viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||17||
GV00avs___u:11962: (AVŚ_20,126.18a) ayam indra vṛṣākapiḥ parasvantaṃ hataṃ vidat |
GV00avs___u:11963: (AVŚ_20,126.18c) asiṃ sūnāṃ navaṃ carum ād edhasyāna ācitaṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||18||
GV00avs___u:11964: (AVŚ_20,126.19a) ayam emi vicākaśad vicinvan dāsam āryam |
GV00avs___u:11965: (AVŚ_20,126.19c) pibāmi pākasutvano 'bhi dhīram acākaśaṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||19||
GV00avs___u:11966: (AVŚ_20,126.20a) dhanva ca yat kṛntatraṃ ca kati svit tā vi yojanā |
GV00avs___u:11967: (AVŚ_20,126.20c) nedīyaso vṛṣākape 'stam ehi gṛhāṃ upa viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||20||
GV00avs___u:11969: (AVŚ_20,126.21c) ya eṣa svapnanaṃśano 'stam eṣi pathā punar viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||21||
GV00avs___u:11971: (AVŚ_20,126.22c) kva sya pulvagho mṛgaḥ kam agaṃ janayopano viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ ||22||
GV00avs___u:11972: (AVŚ_20,126.23a) parśur ha nāma mānavī sākaṃ sasūva viṃśatim |
GV00avs___u:11973: (AVŚ_20,126.23c) bhadraṃ bhala tyasyā abhūd yasyā udaram āmayad viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ
GV00avs___u:11974: (AVŚ_20,127.1a) idaṃ janā upa śruta narāśaṃsa staviṣyate |
GV00avs___u:11975: (AVŚ_20,127.1c) ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā navatiṃ ca kaurama ā ruśameṣu dadmahe ||1||
GV00avs___u:11977: (AVŚ_20,127.2c) varṣmā rathasya ni jihīḍate diva īṣamāṇā upaspṛśaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:11978: (AVŚ_20,127.3a) eṣa iṣāya māmahe śataṃ niṣkān daśa srajaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11980: (AVŚ_20,127.4a) vacyasva rebha vacyasva vṛkṣe na pakve śakunaḥ |
GV00avs___u:11981: (AVŚ_20,127.4c) naṣṭe jihvā carcarīti kṣuro na bhurijoriva ||4||
GV00avs___u:11982: (AVŚ_20,127.5a) pra rebhāso manīṣā vṛṣā gāva iverate |
GV00avs___u:11984: (AVŚ_20,127.6a) pra rebha dhīm bharasva govidaṃ vasuvidam |
GV00avs___u:11989: (AVŚ_20,127.8c) kulāyan kṛṇvan kauravyaḥ patir vadati jāyayā ||8||
GV00avs___u:11990: (AVŚ_20,127.9a) katarat ta ā harāṇi dadhi manthāṃ pari śrutam |
GV00avs___u:11991: (AVŚ_20,127.9c) jāyāḥ patiṃ vi pṛchati rāṣṭre rājñaḥ parikṣitaḥ ||9||
GV00avs___u:11992: (AVŚ_20,127.10a) abhīvasvaḥ pra jihīte yavaḥ pakvaḥ patho bilam |
GV00avs___u:11993: (AVŚ_20,127.10c) janaḥ sa bhadram edhati rāṣṭre rājñaḥ parikṣitaḥ ||10||
GV00avs___u:11994: (AVŚ_20,127.11a) indraḥ kārum abūbudhad uttiṣṭha vi carā janam |
GV00avs___u:11995: (AVŚ_20,127.11c) mamedugrasya carkṛdhi sarva it te pṛṇādariḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:11996: (AVŚ_20,127.12a) iha gāvaḥ pra jāyadhvam ihāśvā iha pūruṣāḥ |
GV00avs___u:11998: (AVŚ_20,127.13a) nemā indra gāvo riṣan mo āsāṃ gopa rīriṣat |
GV00avs___u:11999: (AVŚ_20,127.13c) māsām amitrayurjana indra mā stena īśata ||13||
GV00avs___u:12000: (AVŚ_20,127.14a) upa no na ramasi sūktena vacasā vayaṃ bhadreṇa vacasā
GV00avs___u:12002: (AVŚ_20,127.14c) vanād adhidhvano giro na riṣyema kadā cana ||14||
GV00avs___u:12003: (AVŚ_20,128.1a) yaḥ sabheyo vidathyaḥ sutvā yajvātha pūruṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12004: (AVŚ_20,128.1c) sūryaṃ cāmū riśādasas tad devāḥ prāg akalpayan ||1||
GV00avs___u:12005: (AVŚ_20,128.2a) yo jāmyā aprathayas tad yat sakhāyaṃ dudhūrṣati |
GV00avs___u:12006: (AVŚ_20,128.2c) jyeṣṭho yad apracetās tad āhur adharāg iti ||2||
GV00avs___u:12007: (AVŚ_20,128.3a) yad bhadrasya puruṣasya putro bhavati dādhṛṣiḥ |
GV00avs___u:12008: (AVŚ_20,128.3c) tad vipro abravīd u tad gandharvaḥ kāmyaṃ vacaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:12009: (AVŚ_20,128.4a) yaśca paṇi raghujiṣṭhyo yaśca devāṃ adāśuriḥ |
GV00avs___u:12010: (AVŚ_20,128.4c) dhīrāṇāṃ śaśvatām ahaṃ tad apāg iti śuśruma ||4||
GV00avs___u:12011: (AVŚ_20,128.5a) ye ca devā ayajantātho ye ca parādadiḥ |
GV00avs___u:12012: (AVŚ_20,128.5c) sūryo divam iva gatvāya maghavā no vi rapśate ||5||
GV00avs___u:12018: (AVŚ_20,128.8c) ayabhyā kanyā kalyāṇī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā ||8||
GV00avs___u:12020: (AVŚ_20,128.9c) suyabhyā kanyā kalyāṇī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā ||9||
GV00avs___u:12021: (AVŚ_20,128.10a) parivṛktā ca mahiṣī svastyā ca yudhiṃ gamaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12023: (AVŚ_20,128.11a) vāvātā ca mahiṣī svastyā ca yudhiṃ gamaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12025: (AVŚ_20,128.12a) yad indrādo dāśarājñe mānuṣaṃ vi gāhathāḥ |
GV00avs___u:12026: (AVŚ_20,128.12c) virūpaḥ sarvasmā āsīt saha yakṣāya kalpate ||12||
GV00avs___u:12027: (AVŚ_20,128.13a) tvaṃ vṛṣākṣuṃ maghavann amraṃ maryākaro raviḥ |
GV00avs___u:12028: (AVŚ_20,128.13c) tvaṃ rauhiṇaṃ vyāsyo vi vṛtrasyābhinac chiraḥ ||13||
GV00avs___u:12029: (AVŚ_20,128.14a) yaḥ parvatān vyadadhād yo apo vyagāhathāḥ |
GV00avs___u:12030: (AVŚ_20,128.14c) indro yo vṛtrahānmahaṃ tasmād indra namo 'stu te ||14||
GV00avs___u:12031: (AVŚ_20,128.15a) pṛṣṭhaṃ dhāvantaṃ haryor auccaiḥ śravasam abruvan |
GV00avs___u:12033: (AVŚ_20,128.16a) ye tvā śvetā ajaiśravaso hāryo yuñjanti dakṣiṇam |
GV00avs___u:12034: (AVŚ_20,128.16c) pūrvā namasya devānāṃ bibhrad indra mahīyate ||16||
GV00avs___u:12113: (AVŚ_20,133.1a) vitatau kiraṇau dvau tāvā pinaṣṭi pūruṣaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12114: (AVŚ_20,133.1c) na vai kumāri tat tathā yathā kumāri manyase ||1||
GV00avs___u:12116: (AVŚ_20,133.2c) na vai kumāri tat tathā yathā kumāri manyase ||2||
GV00avs___u:12118: (AVŚ_20,133.3c) na vai kumāri tat tathā yathā kumāri manyase ||3||
GV00avs___u:12120: (AVŚ_20,133.4c) na vai kumāri tat tathā yathā kumāri manyase ||4||
GV00avs___u:12122: (AVŚ_20,133.5c) na vai kumāri tat tathā yathā kumāri manyase ||5||
GV00avs___u:12124: (AVŚ_20,133.6c) na vai kumāri tat tathā yathā kumāri manyase ||6||
GV00avs___u:12128: (AVŚ_20,134.4a) ihettha prāgapāgudagadharāk sa vai pṛthu līyate ||4||
GV00avs___u:12133: (AVŚ_20,135.2a) kośabile rajani granther dhānam upānahi pādam |
GV00avs___u:12140: (AVŚ_20,135.5a) patnī yadṛśyate patnī yakṣyamāṇā jaritarothāmo daiva |
GV00avs___u:12142: (AVŚ_20,135.6a) ādityā ha jaritar aṅgirobhyo dakṣiṇām anayan |
GV00avs___u:12143: (AVŚ_20,135.6c) tāṃ ha jaritaḥ pratyāyaṃs tām u ha jaritaḥ pratyāyan ||6||
GV00avs___u:12144: (AVŚ_20,135.7a) tāṃ ha jaritar naḥ pratyagṛbhṇaṃs tām u ha jaritar naḥ pratyagṛbhṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12145: (AVŚ_20,135.7c) ahānetarasaṃ na vi cetanāni yajñān etarasaṃ na purogavāmaḥ ||7||
GV00avs___u:12146: (AVŚ_20,135.8a) uta śveta āśupatvā uto padyābhir yaviṣṭhaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12148: (AVŚ_20,135.9a) ādityā rudrā vasavas tvenu ta idaṃ rādhaḥ prati gṛbhṇīhy
GV00avs___u:12150: (AVŚ_20,135.9c) idaṃ rādho vibhu prabhu idaṃ rādho bṛhat pṛthu ||9||
GV00avs___u:12151: (AVŚ_20,135.10a) devā dadatvāsuraṃ tad vo astu sucetanam |
GV00avs___u:12156: (AVŚ_20,135.12c) śyāmākaṃ pakvaṃ pīlu ca vārasmā akṛṇor bahuḥ ||12||
GV00avs___u:12159: (AVŚ_20,136.1a) yad asyā aṃhubhedyāḥ kṛdhu sthūlam upātasat |
GV00avs___u:12162: (AVŚ_20,136.2c) viṣvañcā vasyā vardhataḥ sikatāsv eva gardabhau ||2||
GV00avs___u:12164: (AVŚ_20,136.3c) vāsantikam iva tejanaṃ yanty avātāya vitpati ||3||
GV00avs___u:12176: (AVŚ_20,136.9c) itthaṃ phalasya vṛkṣasya śūrpe śūrpaṃ bhajemahi ||9||
GV00avs___u:12178: (AVŚ_20,136.10c) ayaṃ na vidma yo mṛgaḥ śīrṣṇā harati dhāṇikām ||10||
GV00avs___u:12180: (AVŚ_20,136.11c) imās tad asya gā rakṣa yabha mām addhyaudanam ||11||
GV00avs___u:12181: (AVŚ_20,136.12a) sudevas tvā mahānagnīr babādhate mahataḥ sādhu khodanam |
GV00avs___u:12184: (AVŚ_20,136.13c) mahān vai bhadro yabha mām addhyaudanam ||13||
GV00avs___u:12185: (AVŚ_20,136.14a) videvas tvā mahānagnīr vibādhate mahataḥ sādhu khodanam |
GV00avs___u:12186: (AVŚ_20,136.14c) kumārikā piṅgalikā kārda bhasmā ku dhāvati ||14||
GV00avs___u:12187: (AVŚ_20,136.15a) mahān vai bhadro bilvo mahān bhadra udumbaraḥ |
GV00avs___u:12188: (AVŚ_20,136.15c) mahāṃ abhikta bādhate mahataḥ sādhu khodanam ||15||
GV00avs___u:12189: (AVŚ_20,136.16a) yaḥ kumārī piṅgalikā vasantaṃ pīvarī labhet |
GV00avs___u:12193: (AVŚ_20,137.2a) kapṛn naraḥ kapṛtham ud dadhātana codayata khudata vājasātaye |
GV00avs___u:12194: (AVŚ_20,137.2c) niṣṭigryaḥ putram ā cyāvayotaya indraṃ sabādha iha somapītaye ||2||
GV00avs___u:12196: (AVŚ_20,137.3c) surabhi no mukhā karat pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat ||3||
GV00avs___u:12198: (AVŚ_20,137.4c) pavitravanto akṣaran devān gachantu vo madāḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:12199: (AVŚ_20,137.5a) indur indrāya pavata iti devāso abruvan |
GV00avs___u:12203: (AVŚ_20,137.7a) ava drapso aṃśumatīm atiṣṭhad iyānaḥ kṛṣṇo daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ |
GV00avs___u:12204: (AVŚ_20,137.7c) āvat tam indraḥ śacyā dhamantam apa snehitīr nṛmaṇā adhatta ||7||
GV00avs___u:12205: (AVŚ_20,137.8a) drapsam apaśyaṃ viṣuṇe carantam upahvare nadyo aṃśumatyāḥ
GV00avs___u:12206: (AVŚ_20,137.8c) nabho na kṛṣṇam avatasthivāṃsam iṣyāmi vo vṛṣaṇo yudhyatājau ||8||
GV00avs___u:12207: (AVŚ_20,137.9a) adha drapso aṃśumatyā upasthe 'dhārayat tanvaṃ titviṣāṇaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12208: (AVŚ_20,137.9c) viśo adevīr abhy ācarantīr bṛhaspatinā yujendraḥ sasāhe
GV00avs___u:12209: (AVŚ_20,137.10a) tvaṃ ha tyat saptabhyo jāyamāno 'śatrubhyo abhavaḥ śatrur indra |
GV00avs___u:12210: (AVŚ_20,137.10c) gūlhe dyāvāpṛthivī anv avindo vibhumadbhyo bhuvanebhyo
GV00avs___u:12212: (AVŚ_20,137.11a) tvaṃ ha tyad apratimānam ojo vajreṇa vajrin dhṛṣito jaghantha |
GV00avs___u:12213: (AVŚ_20,137.11c) tvaṃ śuṣṇasyāvātiro vadhatrais tvaṃ gā indra śacyed avindaḥ ||11||
GV00avs___u:12214: (AVŚ_20,137.12a) tam indraṃ vājayāmasi mahe vṛtrāya hantave |
GV00avs___u:12216: (AVŚ_20,137.13a) indraḥ sa dāmane kṛta ojiṣṭhaḥ sa made hitaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12218: (AVŚ_20,137.14a) girā vajro na saṃbhṛtaḥ sabalo anapacyutaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12220: (AVŚ_20,138.1a) mahāṃ indro ya ojasā parjanyo vṛṣṭimāṃ iva |
GV00avs___u:12222: (AVŚ_20,138.2a) prajām ṛtasya piprataḥ pra yad bharanta vahnayaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12224: (AVŚ_20,138.3a) kaṇvāḥ indraṃ yad akrata stomair yajñasya sādhanam |
GV00avs___u:12226: (AVŚ_20,139.1a) ā nūnam aśvinā yuvaṃ vatsasya gantam avase |
GV00avs___u:12227: (AVŚ_20,139.1c) prāsmai yachatam avṛkam pṛthu chardir yuyutaṃ yā arātayaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:12228: (AVŚ_20,139.2a) yad antarikṣe yad divi yat pañca mānuṣāṃ anu |
GV00avs___u:12230: (AVŚ_20,139.3a) ye vām daṃsāṃsy aśvinā viprāsaḥ parimāmṛśuḥ |
GV00avs___u:12232: (AVŚ_20,139.4a) ayaṃ vāṃ gharmo aśvinā stomena pari ṣicyate |
GV00avs___u:12233: (AVŚ_20,139.4c) ayaṃ somo madhumān vājinīvasū yena vṛtraṃ ciketathaḥ ||4||
GV00avs___u:12234: (AVŚ_20,139.5a) yad apsu yad vanaspatau yad oṣadhīṣu purudaṃsasā kṛtam |
GV00avs___u:12236: (AVŚ_20,140.1a) yan nāsatyā bhuraṇyatho yad vā deva bhiṣajyathaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12237: (AVŚ_20,140.1c) ayaṃ vāṃ vatso matibhir na vindhate haviṣmantaṃ hi gachathaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:12238: (AVŚ_20,140.2a) ā nūnam aśvinor ṛṣi stomaṃ ciketa vāmayā |
GV00avs___u:12239: (AVŚ_20,140.2c) ā somaṃ madhumattamaṃ gharmaṃ siñcād atharvaṇi ||2||
GV00avs___u:12240: (AVŚ_20,140.3a) ā nūnaṃ raghuvartaniṃ rathaṃ tiṣṭhātho aśvinā |
GV00avs___u:12241: (AVŚ_20,140.3c) ā vāṃ stomā ime mama nabho na cucyavīrata ||3||
GV00avs___u:12243: (AVŚ_20,140.4c) yad vā vāṇībhir aśvinevet kaṇvasya bodhatam ||4||
GV00avs___u:12244: (AVŚ_20,140.5a) yad vāṃ kakṣīvāṃ uta yad vyaśva ṛṣir yad vāṃ dīrghatamā juhāva |
GV00avs___u:12245: (AVŚ_20,140.5c) pṛthī yad vāṃ vainyaḥ sādaneṣv eved ato aśvinā cetayethām
GV00avs___u:12246: (AVŚ_20,141.1a) yātaṃ chardiṣpā uta paraspā bhūtaṃ jagatpā uta nas tanūpā
GV00avs___u:12248: (AVŚ_20,141.2a) yad indreṇa sarathaṃ yātho aśvinā yad vā vāyunā bhavathaḥ
GV00avs___u:12250: (AVŚ_20,141.2c) yad ādityebhir ṛbhubhiḥ sajoṣasā yad vā viṣṇor vikramaṇeṣu tiṣṭhathaḥ ||2||
GV00avs___u:12252: (AVŚ_20,141.3c) yat pṛtsu turvaṇe sanas tac chreṣṭham aśvinor avaḥ ||3||
GV00avs___u:12253: (AVŚ_20,141.4a) ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvinemā havyāni vāṃ hitā |
GV00avs___u:12254: (AVŚ_20,141.4c) ime somāso adhi turvaśe yadāv ime kaṇveṣu vām atha ||4||
GV00avs___u:12255: (AVŚ_20,141.5a) yan nāsatyā parāke arvāke asti bheṣajam |
GV00avs___u:12256: (AVŚ_20,141.5c) tena nūnaṃ vimadāya pracetasā chardir vatsāya yachatam
GV00avs___u:12257: (AVŚ_20,142.1a) abhutsy u pra devyā sākaṃ vācāham aśvinoḥ |
GV00avs___u:12258: (AVŚ_20,142.1c) vy āvar devy ā matiṃ vi rātiṃ martyebhyaḥ ||1||
GV00avs___u:12259: (AVŚ_20,142.2a) pra bodhayoṣo aśvinā pra devi sūnṛte mahi |
GV00avs___u:12260: (AVŚ_20,142.2c) pra yajñahotar ānuṣak pra madāya śravo bṛhat ||2||
GV00avs___u:12261: (AVŚ_20,142.3a) yad uṣo yāsi bhānunā saṃ sūryeṇa rocase |
GV00avs___u:12262: (AVŚ_20,142.3c) ā hāyam aśvino ratho vartir yāti nṛpāyyam ||3||
GV00avs___u:12263: (AVŚ_20,142.4a) yad āpītāso aṃśavo gāvo na duhra ūdhabhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:12264: (AVŚ_20,142.4c) yad vā vāṇīr anuṣata pra devayanto aśvinā ||4||
GV00avs___u:12265: (AVŚ_20,142.5a) pra dyumnāya pra śavase pra nṛṣāhyāya śarmaṇe |
GV00avs___u:12267: (AVŚ_20,142.6a) yan nūnaṃ dhībhir aśvinā pitur yonā niṣīdathaḥ |
GV00avs___u:12269: (AVŚ_20,143.1a) taṃ vāṃ rathaṃ vayam adyā huvema pṛthujrayam aśvinā saṃgatiṃ goḥ |
GV00avs___u:12270: (AVŚ_20,143.1c) yaḥ sūryāṃ vahati vandhurāyur girvāhasaṃ purutamaṃ vasūyum
GV00avs___u:12271: (AVŚ_20,143.2a) yuvaṃ śriyam aśvinā devatā tāṃ divo napātā vanathaḥ śacībhiḥ |
GV00avs___u:12272: (AVŚ_20,143.2c) yuvor vapur abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante vahanti yat kakuhāso rathe
GV00avs___u:12274: (AVŚ_20,143.3a) ko vām adyā karate rātahavya ūtaye vā sutapeyāya vārkaiḥ |
GV00avs___u:12275: (AVŚ_20,143.3c) ṛtasya vā vanuṣe pūrvyāya namo yemāno aśvinā vavartat ||3||
GV00avs___u:12276: (AVŚ_20,143.4a) hiraṇyayena purubhū rathenemaṃ yajñaṃ nāsatyopa yātam |
GV00avs___u:12277: (AVŚ_20,143.4c) pibātha in madhunaḥ somyasya dadhatho ratnaṃ vidhate janāya ||4||
GV00avs___u:12278: (AVŚ_20,143.5a) ā no yātaṃ divo acha pṛthivyā hiraṇyayena suvṛtā rathena |
GV00avs___u:12279: (AVŚ_20,143.5c) mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ saṃ yad dade nābhiḥ pūrvyā vām ||5||
GV00avs___u:12280: (AVŚ_20,143.6a) nū no rayiṃ puruvīraṃ bṛhantaṃ dasrā mimāthām ubhayeṣv asme |
GV00avs___u:12281: (AVŚ_20,143.6c) naro yad vām aśvinā stomam āvant sadhastutim ājamīlhāso agman ||6||
GV00avs___u:12282: (AVŚ_20,143.7a) iheha yad vāṃ samanā papṛkṣe seyam asme sumatir vājaratnā
GV00avs___u:12283: (AVŚ_20,143.7c) uruṣyataṃ jaritāraṃ yuvaṃ ha śritaḥ kāmo nāsatyā yuvadrik ||7||
GV00avs___u:12284: (AVŚ_20,143.8a) madhumatīr oṣadhīr dyāva āpo madhuman no bhavatv antarikṣam |
GV00avs___u:12285: (AVŚ_20,143.8c) kṣetrasya patir madhumān no astv ariṣyanto anv enaṃ carema
GV00avs___u:12286: (AVŚ_20,143.9a) panāyyaṃ tad aśvinā kṛtaṃ vāṃ vṛṣabho divo rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ |
GV00avs___u:12287: (AVŚ_20,143.9c) sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvāṃ it tāṃ upa yātā pibadhyai ||9||
